37a1(rgyud): pa dang / klad pa na ba dang / phol mig dang / g.yan pa dang / tshad pa dang / mig nad la sogs pa nye bar sgrub po/ /'di lta ste/ char ches pa
37a2(rgyud): dang | than pa dang / dus ma yin pa'i char gyis lo tog phun sum tshogs pa'i 'od 'phrog/ sems can rnams kyi mdangs 'phrog /tshe dang / stobs dang / mdog
37a3(rgyud): dang | gzugs 'phrog ste/ de'i tshe 'dzam bu'i gling na sems can thams cad nad sna tshogs kyis yongs su nyen to/ /gtum po seng ge dang / spyang ki dang / stag dang /
37a4(rgyud): sbrul la sogs pa'i gzugs kyis sems can rnams kyi mdangs 'phrog ste/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams la dus ma yin par chud za ba nye bar gnas pas
37a5(rgyud): sems can rnams nad las thar bar bya ba yang dka' ste/ 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir sems can rgan pa dang / bar ma dang / gzhon pa dag las dkrigs phrag sum cu
37a6(rgyud): 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i phyir nga dge slong khyod kyi gan du 'ongs kyi/ khyod kyis 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sgrogs shig /
37a7(rgyud): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i sems can thams cad ni/ 'di snyam du bdag cag ji ltar sdug bsngal gyis bcings pa thams cad las thar bar
37b1(rgyud): 'gyur snyam du re ba'i phyir ro/ /de lta bas na/ dge slong / khyod kyis sems can thams cad la mdo 'di sgrogs te/ sems can thams cad la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i phyir
37b2(rgyud): nan tan gyis shig / dkon mchog gsum la rtag par rgyun du dad par gyis shig/ lha rjed cig /de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten rnams sam/ sku gzugs rnams
37b3(rgyud): la spos dang / me tog dang / bdug pa rnams kyis mchod par gyis shig /khyad par can gyi gzungs kyang lhogs shig /nyi ma bdun yan lag brgyad pa dang ldan pa'i
37b4(rgyud): gso sbyong la nye bar gnas par gyis shig/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa blo yangs zab mo 'brug bsgrags rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di lta ste/ tad+ya thA/
37b5(rgyud): bi pu la gardzi te/ bi pu la swA re/ bi pu la yo ni she /a na la se/ a na la saM b+ha be/ a na la se/ a na la saM b+ha be/ a la sa ga tiM ga te swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa sgrib
37b6(rgyud): pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ he ma he ma/ ha ma ha ma swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ a mi d+b+ha
37b7(rgyud): be| a mi ta sam+b+ha be/ a mi ta bi krAn+te/ a mi ta bi krAn+ti ka re/ a mi ta ga ga na kIrti ka re swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan 'byung gnas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/
38a1(rgyud): ga ga na sa/ A ka ra/ ga ga na sam+b+ha bi/ ga ga na kirti ka re swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas spos mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/
38a2(rgyud): sa ma sa me swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan gyis 'brug bsgrags gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ a sa ma sa me swAhA/ de
38a3(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa nga rgyal gnon la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ ma na bi shud+d+he/ pad+me shwa re/ pad+ma sam b+ha be/ king ka ra/ hi taM ka rI ye swAhA/ sangs rgyas dang / byang
38a4(rgyud): chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba
38a5(rgyud): la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ shwe ta ka ra b+he dza li ne swAhA/ dza ma b+ha ne/ stam+b+ha ne/ mo ha ne swAhA/ pauN+Ta ri kA ya swAhA/ ho me d+harme/ d+harmA tsan+ta ye swAhA/ d+ha re b+hi d+ha re/ ka la
38a6(rgyud): ping+ka ru ta yai swAhA/ shan+ta kAn+ne nirba pa N+yai swAhA/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ bi du ru d+hi ye swAhA/ bi la ma pra tsun+dA yai swAhA/ a ba lo ki te/ bi lo ki tA yai swAhA/ Adz+nyA na bi d+ha ma n+yai swAhA/ pad+ma
38a7(rgyud): swA re/ pad+ma saM b+ha be/ kir ka re/ hi tang ka ri ye swAhA/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ tsan+d+ra pra d+he/ tsan+d+ra na gar+b+he/
38b1(rgyud): tsan+d+ra tsUr+Ne/ ke kai la sa ba ti/ sarba bud+d+ha/ a d+hi Sh+Thi ta a nu mo di te swAhA/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ dza ye dza ye/ dza ya la b+he/ dza
38b2(rgyud): ya mahA ma he swAhA/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ ga ga na aR+ye/ ga ga na sa mung+ga te/
38b3(rgyud): ga ga na bi krAn ta/ bi krAn ta/ e dze mi dzi/ pad mo mo dzi swAhA/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ he b+ha dre/ mahA b+ha dre/ a ti b+ha dre/ sa man+ta
38b4(rgyud): b+ha dre| bi ga ta rA dza se/ mahA bi ga ta rA dza se/ a ti bi ga ta rA dza se/ he ma ba ti/ karma A ba ra Na bi sho d+ha ne swAhA/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa byams pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
38b5(rgyud): tad+ya thA/ mai tri mai tri/ mai tri ma na se swAhA/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ gar+b+he gar+b+he/ gar+b+ha bi sho d+ha ne swAhA/ byang chub sems dpa'
38b6(rgyud): 'phags pa blo gros mi zad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ ak+Sha ye nu/ ak+Sha ye phu/ ak+Sha ya karma bi sho d+ha ne phu swAhA/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa dri ma med
38b7(rgyud): par grags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ kIrti tA/ sarba dzi nai/ a b+hi kIrta tA/ sarba dzi nai/ badzrA a ka re/ badzra sam+b+ha be/ badzra be dA kA re swAhA/ byang chub
39a1(rgyud): sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ sarba A bar Na bi skam bi N+yai swAhA/ d+hA tu bi ka ra N+yai swAhA/ me g+ha
39a2(rgyud): bi s+pho Ta me swAhA/ a pa rA dzi ta kA yai swAhA/ ba la dad N+yai swAhA/ bo d+h+yang dad N+yai swAhA/ karma nir+b+ha bi ta kA ye swAhA/ e kA rA ma yai swAhA/ yo gA tsa rA yai swAhA/ sarba bud+d+ha
39a3(rgyud): b+hi Shi ka tA yai swAhA/ brah+mo ba ku tA ye swAhA/ sarba d+har+m+ma a bi Shi ka tA ye swAhA/ sarba bud+d+ha a b+hi Shi ta yai swAhA/ e ka shring+ga yai swAhA/ a shring+ga ye swAhA/ b+hU tA yai swAhA/
39a4(rgyud): a saM b+hU tA yai swAhA/ sarba duHkho pra sha ma N+yai swAhA/ zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ tsan+d+ra pra b+he/ su pra b+he/ pra b+hA a ka ra/ pra b+hot+ka te/ pra
39a5(rgyud): b+hot+ka te/ pra b+ha ba ti/ pra b+ha ba ti/ d+harma bi shud+he/ karmA bi shu d+hir+b+ha tu me swAhA/ tshe brjod/ gang la la zhig rig sngags 'dis nyin zhag bdun du nyin lan bdun
39a6(rgyud): mtshan lan bdun du byab pa byas na/ de'i las kyi sgrib pa ma lus pa rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /dge slong bdun la zas sbyin no/ /me las me spel bar bya'o/ /
39a7(rgyud): mtshan mo mar me thogs te mchod rten la bsti stang du byas la skor ba bya'o/ /dam pa'i chos bri ba dang / bklag pa la brtson par bya'o/ /gal te yams kyi nang
39b1(rgyud): cher byung na khyim nas khyim dang / grong nas grong dang / grong khyer nas grong khyer du gan d+ha ra sa'i bdug pa dang / gtor ma dang / lha bshos kyis mchod pa bya'o/ /nad pa gang
39b2(rgyud): yin pa des kyang cho ga 'di bzhin du byas na de myur du nad las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ dge slong tshe brjod la 'di skad ces
39b3(rgyud): smras so/ /dge slong / rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin tam/ klog gam/ yi ger 'dri 'am/ yi ger 'drir 'jug
39b4(rgyud): gam| gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par ston na/ de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/ /yang 'jam dpal
39b5(rgyud): gzhon nur gyur pas dge slong tshe brjod la 'di skad ces smras so/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ci nas skye bo thams cad kyi rna lam du grag par 'gyur bar yul nas yul dang /
39b6(rgyud): grong khyer nas grong khyer dang / grong nas grong du bskur bar bya'o/ /yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas dge slong tshe brjod la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe brjod/ rigs
39b7(rgyud): kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lan gcig bklags na de bdag nyid thar bar 'gyur ro/ /sus lan gnyis bklags na de bu
40a1(rgyud): dang | chung ma dang / lhan cig thar bar 'gyur ro/ /sus lan gsum bklags na de rtsa lag gi tshogs kyi skye ba dang bcas te thar bar 'gyur
40a2(rgyud): ro| |sus lan bzhi bklags na de yul 'khor thams cad kyang thar bar 'gyur ro/ /sus lan lnga bklags na de nye 'khor gyi rgyal po dang bcas pa thar bar 'gyur
40a3(rgyud): ro| |yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ dge slong tshe brjod la 'di skad ces smras so/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di myur du yul gzhan dag tu bskur bar bya ste/
40a4(rgyud): der yang yon tan 'di dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /tshe brjod/ gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos la mi 'dzin tam/ mi klog gam/ yi ger mi 'dri 'am/ yi ger
40a5(rgyud): 'drir mi 'jug gam/ kun chub par mi byed dam/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu mi ston tam/ yul gzhan du mi 'byin tam/ sems can thams
40a6(rgyud): cad dang thun mong du byas te mi nyan tam/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su mi bsngo na mtshams med pa lnga byed pa rnams kyi 'gro pa ci 'dra ba
40a7(rgyud): de 'dra bar mngon par 'grub ste/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis smad pa'o/ /yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas dge slong tshe
40b1(rgyud): brjod la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe brjod/ su zhig 'di tshad mar mi byed pa de ni ngas thog ma nyid du dad par byas pa ma yin no/ /ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad bde bar 'gyur
40b2(rgyud): bar bya ba'i phyir/ nga ri'i rgyal po ri rab la song ste/ lha dang / dri za rnams la rjes su bstan pa dang mthun par sbyar bar bya ba'i phyir nan tan bya'o/ /de skad ces smras nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur
40b3(rgyud): gyur pa mi snang bar gyur to/ /dge slong tshe brjod kyis kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas smras pa la mngon par bstod de bzung nas song ngo / /'phags pa khyad par can zhes bya ba'i gzungs
40b4(rgyud): rdzogs so/ / //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzin mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la
40b5(rgyud): phab pa/ rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya aSh+Ta maN+Da la ka nA ma mahA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa dkyil 'khor brgyad pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub
40b6(rgyud): sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das ri gru 'dzin na 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas na byang
40b7(rgyud): chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen snying po zla ba snang ba zhes
41a1(rgyud): bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur nas 'dug pa de stan las langs nas/ chos gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te
41a2(rgyud): pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /gal
41a3(rgyud): te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
41a4(rgyud): pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen snying
41a5(rgyud): po zla ba snang ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rin chen snying po zla ba snang ba/ khyod ci dang / ci 'dod pa dris shig dang / ngas dris pa de dang / de'i lung bstan pas
41a6(rgyud): khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen snying po zla ba snang bas/ bcom ldan 'das
41a7(rgyud): la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig dkyil 'khor brgyad pa bgyid par 'tshal na des ji ltar bgyi/
41b1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod skye bo mang po la shin tu phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / dus gsum du skyes pa'i sems can rnams
41b2(rgyud): kyi mtshungs pa med pa'i ye shes bsgrub pa'i phyir/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod spobs pa skyes pa ni bzang ste/ legs so/ /legs so/ /rigs kyi bu/ de'i phyir snying po gang
41b3(rgyud): brjod pa tsam gyis mtshams med pa lnga 'byang zhing / dngos grub thams cad kyang thob par 'gyur ba byang chub sems dpa' brgyad kyi snying po nyon cig/ oM mahA hUM ma hA pI
41b4(rgyud): ra swA hA/ snying po 'dis ni dbus kyi bcom ldan 'das mchod do/ /oM hrIHhUM pad+ma pri ya swAhA/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po'o/ /oM mai tri ha ra Na
41b5(rgyud): swAhA/ byams pa'i snying po'o/ /oM a kA sha gar+b+ha ya swAhA/ nam mkha'i snying po'i'o/ /oM ma swa hri rA dza ya dz+wa swAhA/ kun tu bzang po'i snying po'o/ /oM ku ru b+ha na ra ha swAhA/ lag
41b6(rgyud): na rdo rje'i snying po'o/ /oM shrI aM raM ga swAhA/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i snying po'o/ /oM ni swa raM b+ha swAhA/ sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i snying po'o/ /
41b7(rgyud): oM k+Shi ti ha rA dzA swAhA/ sa'i snying po'i snying po ste byang chub sems dpa' brgyad kyi snying po'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dang ldan pa 'di rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo
42a1(rgyud): gang la la zhig gis/ dkyil 'khor gyi mdun du lan gcig brjod na/ de'i don thams cad 'grub par 'gyur te/ myur du bla na med pa yang
42a2(rgyud): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa'
42a3(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa dkyil 'khor brgyad pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i
42a4(rgyud): mdo rdzogs so/ / //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhus chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar
42a5(rgyud): bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa/ / //rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya swAlpA ak+Sha ra pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa
42a6(rgyud): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yi ge nyung du zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad
42a7(rgyud): bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod phung po'i ri la dge slong khri nyis stong lnga brgya'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /
42b1(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba la sogs pa lha bye ba khrag khrig
42b2(rgyud): 'bum gyis yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te/ dpal gyi snying po'i seng ge'i khril bzhugs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan
42b3(rgyud): ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su
42b4(rgyud): thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ 'dzum mul te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yi ge nyung du la bsod nams
42b5(rgyud): che ba| gang thos pa tsam gyis sems can thams cad kyi las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ba dang / byang chub la nges par gzhol bar 'gyur ba dang / gang dag
42b6(rgyud): gsang sngags sgrub par brtson pa de dag bgegs ma mchis par gsang sngags 'grub par 'gyur ba bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems
42b7(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod yun ring por sems can thams cad la
43a1(rgyud): phan pa'i phyir brtson pa legs so/ /de'i phyir/ rigs kyi bu/ legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu
43a2(rgyud): phyin pa yi ge nyung du la bsod nams che ba/ gang thos pa tsam gyis sems can thams cad kyi las kyi sgrib pa byang bar 'gyur ba dang / byang chub la nges par gzhol
43a3(rgyud): bar 'gyur ba dang / gang dag gsang sngags sgrub par brtson pa de dag bgegs med par sngags 'grub par 'gyur ba ngas khyod la bshad do/ /de nas byang chub
43a4(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /sems can thams cad la
43a5(rgyud): sman pa'i slad du bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe sems can thams cad dgrol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
43a6(rgyud): so| |mnyam par bzhag pa des smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu'i phrag nas 'od zer 'bum phrag du ma byung ste/ 'od zer de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams
43a7(rgyud): cad khyab par gyur to/ /sems can gang dag 'od zer des reg pa sems can dmyal ba yan chad sems can de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
43b1(rgyud): pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung du lha'i tsan+dan gyi phye ma'i char yang
43b2(rgyud): bab bo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gsungs pa/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' mnyam pa'i sems dang / byams pa'i
43b3(rgyud): sems dang / byas pa gzo ba dang / sdig pa thams cad dang bral ba'i sems su bya'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po 'di yang gdon par bya'o/ /de bzhin
43b4(rgyud): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ oM mu ne mu ne mahA mu na ye swAhA/ ngas shes rab kyi pha
43b5(rgyud): rol tu phyin pa 'di rnyed pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyang 'di las byung ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa
43b6(rgyud): chen po las/ khyod kyis 'di nyid thob pas de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mchog tu gyur to/ /khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
43b7(rgyud): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od zer kun nas 'phags pa dpal brtsegs rgyal po zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes sangs rgyas nyid du lung yang bstan to/ /gang dag
44a1(rgyud): khyod kyi ming nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher ston pa dang / glegs ba ma du bris nas mchod pa byed pa de dag
44a2(rgyud): thams cad ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro/ /tad+ya thA/ oM dza ya dza ya/ pad+ma b+he/ a ba me sa ra sa ra Ni/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ de ba ta a nu pA
44a3(rgyud): la ne| bud d+hota tA ra Ni pU ra ya pU ra ya b+ha ga ba ti/ sarbA sha ma sha ma pa ri pU ra ya sa pa ri wa ra s+ya sarba satwa nAny+tsa/ sarba karma A ba ra Na bi sho d+ha ya bi sho d+ha ya/ bud+d+ha
44a4(rgyud): a d+hiSh+Tha ne na swAhA/ don dam pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad bskyed pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i yum/ 'phral tu sdig pa 'phrog pa/
44a5(rgyud): byang chub sbyin par byed pa ste/ 'di lta ste/ bskal pa bye ba brgyar yang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis phan yon brjod par mi nus so/ /'di bklags pas dkyil 'khor
44a6(rgyud): thams cad du dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro/ /gsang sngags thams cad kyang mngon du 'gyur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan
44a7(rgyud): ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi/
44b1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ thabs sla ba'i phyir te/ sems can gang dag spro ba chung ba de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / yi ger
44b2(rgyud): 'dri ba dang / yi ger 'drir 'jug pa de dag thams cad thabs sla bas byang chub la gzhol bar 'gyur te/ de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/ /de skad ces bka'
44b3(rgyud): stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan
44b4(rgyud): 'das kyis ji tsam du sems can thams cad la sman pa dang / sems can bsod nams chung ngu rnams kyi don dang / sman pa dang / bde ba'i slad du chos kyi rnam grangs
44b5(rgyud): 'di bka' stsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ngo mtshar to/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ ngo mtshar to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems
44b6(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin
44b7(rgyud): dang | dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yi ge nyung du zhes
45a1(rgyud): bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/ / //rgya gar skad du/ b+ha ga wa ti pradz+nyA pA ra mi ta hr-i da ya/ bod skad du/ bcom ldan 'das
45a2(rgyud): ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po/ bam po gcig go/ bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa
45a3(rgyud): dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya rgod phung po'i ri la dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig
45a4(rgyud): tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das zab mo snang ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'
45a5(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo spyod pa nyid la rnam par lta zhing / phung po lnga po de dag la yang
45a6(rgyud): rang bzhin gyis stong par rnam par lta'o/ /de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan
45a7(rgyud): ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo spyod pa spyad par 'dod pa des
45b1(rgyud): ji ltar bslab par bya/ de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis che dang ldan ba sha radwa ti'i bu la 'di skad
45b2(rgyud): ces smras so/ shA ri'i bu/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo spyod pa spyad par 'dod pa des 'di ltar rnam par blta bar bya
45b3(rgyud): ste| phung po lnga po de dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong par rnam par yang dag par rjes su blta'o/ /gzugs stong pa'o/ /stong pa nyid gzugs so/ /gzugs las stong pa nyid gzhan
45b4(rgyud): ma yin| stong pa nyid las kyang gzugs gzhan ma yin no/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rnams stong pa'o/ /shA ri'i
45b5(rgyud): bu| de lta bas na/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid de/ mtshan nyid med pa/ ma skyes pa/ ma 'gags pa/ dri ma med pa/ dri ma dang bral ba med pa/ bri ba med pa/ gang ba med
45b6(rgyud): pa'o| |shA ri'i bu/ de lta bas na/ stong pa nyid la gzugs med/ tshor ba med/ 'du shes med/ 'du byed rnams med/ rnam par shes pa med/ mig med/ rna ba
45b7(rgyud): med| sna med/ lce med/ lus med/ yid med/ gzugs med/ sgra med/ dri med/ ro med/ reg bya med/ chos med do/ /mig gi khams med pa nas/ yid kyi khams
46a1(rgyud): med| yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du yang med do/ /ma rig pa med/ /ma rig pa zad pa med pa nas/ rga shi med/ rga shi zad pa'i bar du
46a2(rgyud): yang med do/ /sdug bsngal ba dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam med/ ye shes med/ thob pa med/ ma thob pa yang med do/ /shA ri'i bu/ de lta bas na/
46a3(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' rnams thob pa med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo la brten cing gnas te/ sems la sgrib pa med pas skrag pa med de/ phyin
46a4(rgyud): ci log las shin tu 'das nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar phyin to/ /dus gsum du rnam par bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
46a5(rgyud): phyin pa la brten nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs ba sangs rgyas so/ /de ltar bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngags/ rig pa
46a6(rgyud): chen po'i sngags/ bla na med pa'i sngags/ mi mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa'i sngags/ sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i sngags/ mi brdzun pas na
46a7(rgyud): bden par shes par bya ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngags smras pa/ tad+ya thA/ ga te ga te pA ra ga te/ pA ra saM ga te/ bo d+hi swAhA/ shA ri'i bu/ de
46b1(rgyud): lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo la bslab par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin
46b2(rgyud): de las bzhengs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba byin nas/ legs so/ /legs
46b3(rgyud): so| |rigs kyi bu/ de de bzhin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ de de bzhin te/ ji ltar khyod kyis bstan pa de bzhin du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo la spyad par bya ste/
46b4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang rjes su yi rang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dang / byang chub sems
46b5(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar
46b6(rgyud): bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po zhes
46b7(rgyud): bya ba'i mdo rdzogs so/ / //rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi ma la mi tra dang / lots+tsha ba dge slong rin chen sdes bsgyur cing / zhus chen gyi lots+tsha ba dge blo dang /
47a1(rgyud): nam mkha' la sogs pas zhus te gtan la phab pa/ dpal bsam yas lhun gyis grub pa'i gtsug lag gi dge rgyas bye ma gling gi rtsig ngos la
47a2(rgyud): bris pa dang zhus dag legs par bgyis so/ / //rgya gar skad du/ bud+d+ha b+ha ga wAn aSh+Ta sha ta nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
47a3(rgyud): 'das kyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das snying rje'i tsan+dan dri zhim po'i spos chus
47a4(rgyud): byugs pa'i sku/ zhabs pad+ma lha dang / lha ma yin gyi nor bu'i cod pan gyis gtugs pa/ rang byung sel mdzad bla ma 'jig rten la phan par mdzad pa/ ston pa de bzhin
47a5(rgyud): gshegs pa thub pa nyes pa dang bral pa/ zhi ba'i bdag nyid can/ gzugs mdzes pa/ mtshan gsal ba'i gzi brjid can/ sku dpe byad kyis brgyan pa/ yon tan
47a6(rgyud): thams cad yang dag par rdzogs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /pad+ma rgyas pa ltar zhal bzhad de/ tshems dkar zhing snyoms la thags bzang bas rab tu rgyas shing / snang
47a7(rgyud): la nor bu dri ma med pa ltar 'od gsal zhing mdzes te/ spa zhing gsal ba la nyi ma 'od zer stong 'bar ba mang po'i 'od snang ba'i dkyil 'khor zil gyis gnon pa/ thub
47b1(rgyud): pa'i mchog stobs bcu dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'dud do/ /rab tu 'dud do/ /bstod do/ /oM b+h+yo hUM hUM hUM/ A A/ hI hI/ shi ba shi ba/ shAn+ti shAn+ti/ sha ma sha ma/ sha mA pa ya/
47b2(rgyud): ta thA ga ta a nu ga ta/ swa b+hA ba/ a b+hA ba/ sa mud tA ya/ a sa ma ba la/ a bi ra la ba la/ a mi tA ba la/ a ti ba la/ hUM g+huM g+huM/ d+h+ro d+h+ro/ b+h+rau b+h+rau/ b+h+re du b+h+re du/ hI hI/
47b3(rgyud): b+ha ga ban/ b+ha bAn ta ka su ra ta b+ho ga ma hA shAn+ti ka ra/ pA ba kilbe Sha nA sha ka swA hA/ /de nas dpe byad mtshan gsal bas/ /yan lag thams cad rab brgyan cing / /nyi ma
47b4(rgyud): bzhin du gsal ba po/ /'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor rgyan mnga' ba/ /grags shing dri ma rab spangs la/ /dri med skyon bral chos kyi blo/ /khyab bdag chen po stobs bcur ldan/ /
47b5(rgyud): rdul bral dpal dang ldan pa po/ /rin chen sa gzhi chen po la/ /pho brang rtse mo rdo rje'i rtse/ /rgyal ba'i sras rnams gnas gyur pa/ /nor bu du ma rab 'phro zhing / /'od zer dri med
47b6(rgyud): gsal bkod pa'i/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor pho brang na/ /thub pa'i longs spyod sa gzhi la/ /seng ge'i khri rten yangs la bzhugs/ /nor bu dbyig gi sa gzhi dang / /khri chen rab
47b7(rgyud): spa de nyid la/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes chen gyis/ /phun sum tshogs pa rgyan bkod lta/ /thub pa me zla nor bu'i 'od/ /nyi zer non pa'i 'od ldan pa/ /bde blag shin tu bkra
48a1(rgyud): shis tshul/ /'od gsal skyil mo krung bcas nas/ /sku 'od 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor can/ /'od gsal rgyas pas thub dbang gi /dri med 'od
48a2(rgyud): zer bkye ba ni/ /mi g.yo rdo rje can zhes bya/ /dkyil 'khor chen por zhugs pa yi/ /rdo rje can dag rab 'dul ba/ /gang yin de kun dag byas nas/ /dkyil 'khor dri med
48a3(rgyud): skor bar byed/ /ngan song dam tshig dri ma kun/ /legs par shin tu dag pas so/ /srid gsum dkyil 'khor rgya che la/ /rnam pa du mar 'od gsal ba/ /'gro dang mi 'gro ma
48a4(rgyud): lus pa/ /bkod nas bde chen rdo rje can/ /rdo rje ral gri thogs pa de/ /cod pan ma g.yos nang du zhugs/ /de nas 'jigs pa'i sgra skad kyis/ /'gengs shing mig ni glog
48a5(rgyud): ltar 'gyu/ /rig sngags hUM zhes sgrogs pa po/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed 'jigs byed pa/ /bzhin mdzes 'dzum gyis rnam par brgyan/ /sdig med mig rtsa rgod gyur cing / /stan
48a6(rgyud): las langs te phyag 'tshal nas/ /legs par mchod byas smras pa ni/ /kye ma skye ba'i phyogs 'joms shing / /bskal pa du ma'i dri ma sel/ /rig sngags yon tan sgrub
48a7(rgyud): byed pa| |thub mchog rnams kyis rab tu gsungs/ /de gzigs dge ba du ma brnyes/ /sangs rgyas blo gros rgyas par gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' blo gros che/ /bskal ba
48b1(rgyud): gcig tu spyod pas kyang / /rgyud mar sangs rgyas kun 'byung zhing / /spyod pa du ma 'byung ba yi/ /yon tan brgya yi spos ldan 'di/ /thos pa spro bar mi nus so/ /longs spyod rgya mtsho
48b2(rgyud): chen po can/ /byang chub sems mchog dkyil 'khor du/ /rgyal mchog rnams kyis dbang bskur ba'i/ /phyir mi ldog pa'i chos chen ldan/ /'di thos sangs rgyas spyod pa yis/ /
48b3(rgyud): sems can kun gyi sdig pa rnams/ /ma lus rab tu bsal nas ni/ /blo gros dri ma med par 'gyur/ /zhi zhing dag byed bkra shis la/ /rdul med brgyan te zhi bar byed/ /dge zhing
48b4(rgyud): mya ngan thams cad sel/ /sdug bsngal thams cad nges par 'joms/ /dbang byed gsang sngags dam pa ste/ /sa steng sdig pa thams cad sel/ /ma smad 'bras bu nges par
48b5(rgyud): sbyin| |bstan pa yin te sdang ba 'dul/ /nyes pa byas pa sel ba yi/ /gzungs 'di gang gis thos gyur des/ /sangs rgyas rnyed par dka' ba yang / /ring por mi thogs thob par
48b6(rgyud): 'gyur/ /sgrib pa thams cad rab zhi zhing / /khyab bdag nyon mongs kun sel ba/ /gang zhig nyon mongs zhi byed pa'i/ /gzungs 'di 'chang bar byed pa yis/ /kun tu bzang po
48b7(rgyud): nyid dang ni/ /lag na rdo rje nyid kyang 'thob/ /rig sngags 'chang gi bdag po yang / /'di thos pas ni thob par 'gyur/ /'jig rten kun la lha ma me ba/ /bcom ldan rnam par
49a1(rgyud): snang mdzad kyang / /dkyil 'khor dam pa gting med pa/ /'di ni ji srid ma gsan par/ /rab zhi nyon mongs 'dul ba yi/ /rang byung go 'phang ma brnyes
49a2(rgyud): te| |rnam par dag phyir gsan gyur nas/ /gsan ma thag tu rnam par dag /de phyir phun sum tshogs pa dang / /legs par 'dod pas brjod par bya/ /gzhan gyis mi
49a3(rgyud): thub gzungs gsan nas/ /thub pa kun gyis gang brnyes pa/ /'khor ba 'di ni nam du yang / /bdud kyi las dang 'khrug med dang / /mya ngan med cing 'thab med pa/ /gzungs
49a4(rgyud): la gnas pas 'thob par 'gyur/ /gnas kyi dam pa thob nas kyang / /thub pa dri ma med pa'i blo/ /gzigs pa bzang rnams gar gshegs pa'i/ /bzang 'gro der ni 'gro
49a5(rgyud): bar 'gyur/ /legs par 'dod pa rnams kyis ni/ /tshig gi mdo 'di mnyan par bgyis/ /nyon mongs zad par bya ba la/ /rgyal bas gsungs pa'i gzungs 'di mchog /
49a6(rgyud): sdig pa byed cing dge la sdang / /sdig pa'i rang bzhin rab 'jungs pa/ /gang gis thos nas de spang ba/ /nga yis mngon sum 'byor par 'gyur/ /sdig pa gzhan yang mi
49a7(rgyud): bya zhing / /snga ma rnams kyang bshags par bya/ /gzungs mchog 'di yi mthu stobs kyis/ /sdig pa thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur/ /tshe rabs gzhan ni stong dag dang / /tshe
49b1(rgyud): 'phos bye ba phrag brgyar yang / /sdig pa mi dge gang byas pa/ /dag 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /yar gyi ngo yi tshes brgyad dang / /de bzhin tshes ni bco lnga la/ /bsnyen gnas legs
49b2(rgyud): par lhur blangs la/ /cho ga bzhin du sangs rgyas mchod/ /de nas rmongs pa med par yang / /nyon mongs dgra ni rab 'joms shing / /shin tu thub dka' dpe med pa/ /nyes pa zlog pa'i
49b3(rgyud): gzungs brjod na/ /thub pa'i zhal gyi zla ba'i 'od/ /'bar ba nges par mthong bar 'gyur/ /de nas tshogs rnams rdzogs pa yi/ /rgyal ba'i sras po nyid du 'gyur/ /'od dpag
49b4(rgyud): med la mnga' ba yi/ /yon tan mtha' yas rab brgyan pa/ /bskal pa bye ba stong du yang / /mtha' mi rtogs pa thob par 'gyur/ /de nas rdo rje 'chang gi tshig /dkyil 'khor dag
49b5(rgyud): na gnas rnams kyis/ /thos nas rgyan rnams sna tshogs ba/ /bcom ldan 'das la dbul bar byed/ /rdo rje ral gri la sogs pa/ /lha bdag gsal ba thams cad dang / /ri bo ti
49b6(rgyud): se ri rab la/ /gnas pa'i rig sngags 'chang rnams dang / /de bzhin dkyil 'khor chen po na/ /'khod pa'i rig sngags 'chang rnams dang / /ma la ya yi ri bo la/ /gnas
49b7(rgyud): shing rgyan 'bar thogs rnams dang / /khyab 'jug lha chen la sogs pa/ /lha yi bdag po rnams dang ni/ /lag na rdo rje la sogs pa/ /byang chub sems dpa' stobs chen
50a1(rgyud): rnams/ /nor bu'i dpung rgyan rna cha dang / /rgyan rnams rab tu g.yo ba'i lus/ /rab tu bskyod de langs nas ni/ /sdig bral mnga' bdag rgyal ba
50a2(rgyud): la| |phyag btsal thal mo sbyar byas nas/ /kun gyis sa yi dbang phyug bo/ /thub mchog dam pa de la ni/ /mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dag gis bstod/ /mnyam nyid chos de de
50a3(rgyud): bzhin nyid/ /shin tu rtogs pa lam me ba/ /dul ba brtan pa dri ma sel/ /dri ma med pa skyon bral ba/ /thub pa sangs rgyas shin tu zhi/ /'jig rten mgon po skye dgu'i
50a4(rgyud): bdag/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyon mongs thul/ /de bzhin rgyal ba rdul bsal ba/ /ston pa ston mdzad brtan pa ste/ /sdig pa med pa rdul dang bral/ /'jig rten mgon
50a5(rgyud): po snang mdzad pa/ /dag pa zhi ba zas gtsang sras/ /nyon mongs rab bcom phan 'dogs pa/ /ston pa po ste dri ma sel/ /spyod tshul dri med tshul bzang ba/ /zab pa rnam par
50a6(rgyud): gnon pa brtan/ /btsan po thugs brtse rnam par rgyal/ /mgon po de bzhin mgon mdzad pa/ /zhi ba'i bdag nyid zhe sdang bral/ /bcings pa las grol nges par grol//
50a7(rgyud): 'jig rten kun mchog 'khra ba'i sa/ /bdag gir mi 'dzin dri ma med/ /nyon mongs sel ba dpal dang ldan/ /dpal mdzad de bzhin phan mdzad pa/ /mnyam pa med
50b1(rgyud): pa dpe med pa/ /khyab bdag nyon mongs las rnams spong / /khengs pa med pa dman pa med/ /mnyam pa de bzhin mi mnyam mnyam/ /snang ba brnyes pa snang byed med/ /'jig rten
50b2(rgyud): snang mdzad sdig med pa/ /sgrib pa thams cad spangs pa ste/ /'jig rten kun la phan par brtson/ /dpa' bo zhi ba zhi mdzad pa/ /nyon mongs dgra rnams zad par mdzad/ /mnga'
50b3(rgyud): bdag thabs mkhyen thabs che ba/ /sems can kun gyi 'khras lags/ /don yod rnyed dka' blo dang ldan/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor thub par dka'/ /skyob pa 'jigs sel tshangs
50b4(rgyud): pa ste| |de bzhin sangs rgyas chos 'dzin pa/ /dpa' bo chen po 'jigs pa med/ /gzugs bzang mtshan rnams gsal ba ste/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan mnga' ba/ /chos kyi longs
50b5(rgyud): spyod rgya mtsho lags/ /dpe byad bzang po bkod pa yis/ /spras pa'i bdag nyid ya mtshan ston/ /dka' ba med pa'i ston pa po/ /de bzhin des pa bde sbyin pa/ /mthu chen yangs
50b6(rgyud): ba rgya che ba/ /bdud bzhi'i stobs rnams sel mdzad pa/ /brtson chen spro ba che ba ste/ /dgyes pa chen po stobs po che/ /mthu brnyes bstan pa chen po ste/ /gnas ldan dbang
50b7(rgyud): gis dar ba lags/ /gsal ba gsung ldan dpe med pa/ /dge ba stong pa nyid kyis rgyal/ /rab tu zhi ba mun pa med/ /blo gros chen po chos 'dzin te/ /phun sum tshogs
51a1(rgyud): ldan sa chen brnyes/ /'dod pa rnams ni 'dul mdzad pa/ /dpal mdzad dpal mnga' dpal dang ldan/ /dpal gyi longs spyod shin tu rgyas/ /bcom
51a2(rgyud): ldan legs bsgos bsgo bar mdzad/ /gsung ldan bkra shis rgyal ba'i gnas/ /mnyam nyid mnyam pa nyid mkhyen pa/ /mnyam pa nyid kyi mtshan dpag med/ /rab tu dgyes
51a3(rgyud): la longs spyod gsal/ /gzhi bcas sems pa mnyam pa lags/ /blo dag blo ldan dri ma spangs/ /gnas chen brtan par ldan pa ste/ /rgyas par longs spyod dri ma med/ /
51a4(rgyud): thub pa thugs rje'i rgyan mnga' ba/ /bskal pa bzang po 'jigs pa'i skyabs/ /de bzhin 'jigs med nyon mongs sel/ /dri med skyon bral longs spyod can/ /sna tshogs
51a5(rgyud): 'od ldan dkyil 'khor mdzes/ /sku bzang dag pa rig ba'i mchog /thugs rje'i 'od ldan 'od bzang ba/ /mi gnas longs spyod dam ba lags/ /chos kyi rgyu ste yon
51a6(rgyud): tan gnas/ /rjed 'os mchog gnas longs spyod che/ /nam mkha'i mtshan te rnam dag blo/ /rin chen gzugs 'dra bkra shis pa/ /khyu mchog che spyan ba rdzi ma/ /rgyal
51a7(rgyud): ba skyon bsal shes rab can/ /shes rab thabs dang ldan pa ste/ /'jig rten mi dge kun las 'das/ /dag par longs spyod brtan pa can/ /sa dang stobs dang ye
51b1(rgyud): shes bzod/ /pha rol phyin pa kun la mnga'/ /ting 'dzin mnyam par longs spyod pa/ /rnam par sgo la mngon sum pa/ /stong pas sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam/ /chos chen bde bar
51b2(rgyud): 'char ba lags/ /thams cad mkhyen ba yul las 'das/ /spyod yul sgrib pa mi mnga' ba/ /byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po rgyal/ /dam pa'i don te tshul che ba/ /shes
51b3(rgyud): bya'i yul rnams mtha' dag la/ /sgrib pa med par 'char ba brnyes/ /rigs chen mthun par skyes pa ste/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge ba'i gnas/ /khyad par brnyes pa mnyam
51b4(rgyud): nyid brnyes/ /mi mnyam sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam/ /don chen shin tu mthar phyin pa/ /nyon mongs bral ba thub par dka'/ /dge sbyong sdig pa sbyong mdzad pa/ /gnod pa med
51b5(rgyud): par bde bar 'byin/ /blo rgya che ba thams cad mkhyen/ /thos pa'i mtshon cha ma lus gsan/ /dkon pa bde bar thob 'gyur ba/ /mnyam pa khyad par yul dang ldan/ /'jig
51b6(rgyud): rten thams cad dar mdzad mgon/ /zhi gnas mtshon cha thub par dka'/ /bsam gyis mi khyab bsam yas yul/ /dpe med pa ste dper bya ba/ /'od bzang rab dgyes
51b7(rgyud): dpal dang ldan/ /legs gsung blo yi stobs kyis 'byung / /mkhas pa zhal bzang bde sbyin pa/ /rab dgyes 'das pa'i spyod yul can/ /gsung ba chen po ye shes che/ /
52a1(rgyud): gnas chen bkra shis chen po ste/ /mchod par gyur pa yul las 'das/ /bya ba'i mtshan nyid med pa po/ /sangs rgyas yul du skyes pa ste/ /shes
52a2(rgyud): bya'i spyod yul rgya che ba/ /kun mkhyen longs spyod 'bras bu can/ /'jig rten dbang 'das spyod yul ba/ /kun mkhyen yul gyi snang ba ste/ /thabs mkhas phun sum tshogs
52a3(rgyud): ldan pa/ /rdzu 'phrul rol pa'i thabs dang ldan/ /chos kyi gar thabs ston pa po/ /rab ston yon tan sgyur mdzad pa/ /spyod pa ma lus 'dul bar mdzad/ /yongs su rdzogs
52a4(rgyud): pa rnam par dag / sangs rgyas spyod yul rnam sangs rgyas/ /bgegs byed ma legs byed pa bcom/ /bdud kyi dregs pa sel bar mdzad/ /g.yul ngor rnam par rgyal ba
52a5(rgyud): brnyes/ /dpa' bo chen po pham med stobs/ /theg pa chen po'i shing rta bcibs/ /blo chen brgal bar dka' ba yi/ /nyon mongs rgya mtsho'i pha rol gshegs/ /theg pa chen
52a6(rgyud): po'i tshul la gnas/ /theg pa mchog la longs spyod pa/ /nyan thos 'das pa'i spyod yul can/ /rang rgyal las kyang 'das pa ste/ /sangs rgyas sa yi 'bras bur gnas/ /
52a7(rgyud): gong nas gong du khyad par mkhyen/ /khyod ni nam mkha'i gnas na bzhugs/ /bde 'byung sa dang zhing rnams kyi/ /mtsho chen dag la longs par spyod/ /sangs rgyas dbang
52b1(rgyud): po rgyas pa la/ /mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis bstod nas/ /de la lha sogs tshogs rnams kyis/ /phyag byas mgo smad phyogs gcig 'khod/ /de nas dkyil 'khor chen po na/ /gnas
52b2(rgyud): pa ma lus chem mer 'khod/ /thod du rdo rje'i thod 'ching ba/ /langs nas cod pan rab tu g.yos/ /dkyil 'khor mthon po thams cad du/ /skad ber chen por yongs bkang nas/ /
52b3(rgyud): nor bu'i rgyan ni rnam g.yo zhing / /ha ha grags pa'i sgra sgrogs te/ /kye ma sangs rgyas yon tan che/ /bskal pa grangs med gsum bsags pa/ /byang chub sems sogs mchog
52b4(rgyud): rnams kyis/ /mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad legs par brjod/ /kye ma rnyed dang bde 'byung ba/ /mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad thos nas kyang / /gang zhig klog cing rgyal la bstod/ /'bras bu
52b5(rgyud): chen po 'grub par 'gyur/ /mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags bcas pa/ /bcom ldan 'das drung brjod na ni/ /sgrib dang kun nas nyon mongs dang / /sdig pa thams cad dag pa thob/ /
52b6(rgyud): mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad mchog bton na/ /sgrib pa kun las nges grol zhing / /nyon mongs mtha' dag rnam par spong / /shes rab che ba nyid du 'gyur/ /de ni longs spyod chen po
52b7(rgyud): dang / /bde ba las kyang nyams mi 'gyur/ /de ni tshe rabs thams cad du/ /blo ldan tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/ /de nas rdo rje'i thod 'ching ba/ /yon tan mtha' yas sras de la/ /
53a1(rgyud): bcom ldan bdud las rgyal pa yis/ /mngon sum gzigs nas bka' stsal pa/ /rgyal ba'i sa 'di zhi ba ste/ /nga rgyal la sogs nyon mongs
53a2(rgyud): 'joms/ /'jig rten bde ba kun las 'das/ /de bzhin gshegs bde mngon du phyogs/ /gzhan gyi mi tshugs gzungs dang ni/ /mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad nyan byed pa/ /
53a3(rgyud): de dag rnam dag bdag nyid de/ /sems can kun la bde 'dod pa/ /lan gcig thos pa tsam gyis kyang / /de dag sa chen 'bras bur gnas/ /ring por mi thogs dga'
53a4(rgyud): 'gyur na/ /'chang sogs lta la ci zhig smos/ /de phyir rtag tu rab bsgrims la/ /gtan du bde ba 'dod pa yis/ /yon tan rgya mtsho ldan pa'i gzungs/ /mnyan par bya
53a5(rgyud): zhing bcang par bya/ /gang zhig nang par langs nas brjod/ /bdag nyid kyis kyang bton na ni/ /de yi don kun 'grub 'gyur la/ /gnod pa dang yang phrad mi 'gyur/ /'di
53a6(rgyud): ni yon tan kun gyi snod/ /dge ba phun sum tshogs sbyin pa/ /kun mkhyen 'bras bu bla med mchog /bde 'byung thob par byed pa yin/ /'bras bu 'byor pa ci yang
53a7(rgyud): rung | |thob par mi 'gyur dogs pa med/ /kun mkhyen go 'phang thob gyur nas/ /dpe med gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur/ /'di ni dge zhing 'bras bur ldan/ /sangs
53b1(rgyud): rgyas sa yi 'bras bu sbyin/ /yid du 'ong zhing yon tan ldan/ /snying rje dri ma med sbyin pa/ /'di ni mnyam pa nyid kyi mdo/ /'jig rten kun gnas dga' ba ste/ /'jig rten kun gyi
53b2(rgyud): bde 'byung ba/ /'di dang 'dra ba gang yang med/ /ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs so// //
53b3(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya many+dzu shrI mU la tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i rgyud/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag
53b4(rgyud): 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das gnas gtsang ma'i steng gi nam mkha'i dkyil na byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa'i 'khor
53b5(rgyud): gyi tshogs so so tha dad pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba/ so sor rab tu gnas pa dang / thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
53b6(rgyud): gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams la bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu dag /khyad cag nyon cig /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur
53b7(rgyud): gyur pa'i cho 'phrul gyi spyod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba/ ting nge 'dzin gyi bye brag dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor byang
54a1(rgyud): chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho ba/ tshe dang / nad med pa dang / dbang phyug dang / yid
54a2(rgyud): la bsams pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i sngags kyi gzhi dag sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir bshad par bya ste/ de shin tu legs par nyon la zungs shig
54a3(rgyud): dang ngas bshad par bya'o/ /de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu de dag gis thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la lags so zhes gsol te/ byang
54a4(rgyud): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par dang / sa chen po thob par bya ba dang / rdo rje'i gdan gnon pa dang / bdud gdul ba dang / chos kyi 'khor
54a5(rgyud): lo bskor ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi nges par 'byung ba dang / lha rnams dang / mi rnams su skye bar bya ba dang / sdug bsngal dang / dbul
54a6(rgyud): ba dang / nad rnams zhi bar byed pa/ longs spyod kyis phyug pa 'dren par byed pa/ 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sngags kyi spyod pas phongs par mi
54a7(rgyud): byed pa/ re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung 'bras bu med par byed pa ma yin pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
54b1(rgyud): byams pa'i thugs dang / phan pa'i thugs dang / bdag dang / sems can thams cad thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung nas/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bshad du gsol/ de nas
54b2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor dang / gnas gtsang ma'i gnas la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs nas dag pa'i yul la 'od rnam
54b3(rgyud): par spros te/ yul rnam par 'jig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu mdzod spu nas me tog kun tu
54b4(rgyud): skyes pa zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par bskul ba zhes bya ba'i 'od phyung ste/ 'od bye ba khri phrag brgya stong du ma'i 'khor gyis bcom ldan 'das la
54b5(rgyud): lan gsum bskor ba byas nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su song nas/ byang shar gyi phyogs su brgya stong gi gang gA'i klung gi 'jig rten gyi khams
54b6(rgyud): 'das nas/ me tog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams su rjes su zhugs te/ gang na me tog kun tu skyes pa'i rgyal po'i dbang po zhes bya ba'i de bzhin
54b7(rgyud): gshegs pa bzhugs par ro/ /der yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spyod pa dang
55a1(rgyud): ldan pa rnams dang lhan cig gnas par gyur to/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'od zer gyi snang ba de mthong nas bzhin cung zad 'dzum pa dang ldan
55a2(rgyud): par gyur nas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs de dag la smras pa/ rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'od 'di ni nga la yang dag par bskul ba'i phyir 'ongs pa yin gyi/ khyed cag g.yeng ba
55a3(rgyud): med par gyis shig ces smras so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa mig mi 'dzums shing kha bye bas 'od gang na ba de logs
55a4(rgyud): su mngon du bltas nas 'dug go / de nas bskul ba'i 'od des me tog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba chen pos snang bar byas te/ me tog kun tu skyes pa
55a5(rgyud): rgyal po'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i spyi bor nub par
55a6(rgyud): gyur to/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das me tog kun tu yang dag par skyes pa rgyal po'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa la
55a7(rgyud): lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ spyi bos phyag btsal nas pus mo gams pa'i lhang sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das me tog kun tu skyes pa rgyal po'i dbang po la 'di
55b1(rgyud): skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bdag la dgongs te/ bcom ldan
55b2(rgyud): 'das/ bdag ni bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / sngags thams cad kyi spyod pa dang / sgrub thabs dang / dkyil 'khor
55b3(rgyud): dang / cho ga dang / gsang ba dang / cho ga zhib mo dang / cho ga'i ngo bo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs dang / gsang ba dang / phyag rgya dang / dbang bskur ba bstan
55b4(rgyud): pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nas mchi bar 'tshal lo/ /de skad ces bcom
55b5(rgyud): ldan 'das me tog kun tu skyes pa rgyal po'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ting nge 'dzin gang la snyoms par zhugs pa
55b6(rgyud): na phyogs bzhi mtha' yas mu med pa steng dang / 'og dang / thad ka thams cad dang ldan pa'i phyogs sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis yang dag par gang bar gyur to/ /
55b7(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams de dang / bcom ldan 'das dang bcas pas/ rgyal ba'i sras/ legs so/ /legs so/ /'di lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par la snyoms par zhugs pa
56a1(rgyud): ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang mi nus/ byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa la zhugs pa dang / sa bcu la gnas pa dag gis kyang
56a2(rgyud): snyoms par zhugs par mi nus so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das me tog kun tu yang dag par skyes pa rgyal po'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
56a3(rgyud): de rnams dang lhan cig tu yang dag par bgros te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di'i snying po mchog tu gsang ba don thams cad sgrub pa'i snying po gsungs pa ni yi
56a4(rgyud): ge gcig pa zhes bya ba mchog tu gsang ba/ sems can thams cad kyi las thams cad byed pa/ sngags kyi spyod pa khyad par can bzang po yang dag par sgrub par byed
56a5(rgyud): pa'o| |de nas bcom ldan 'das me tog yang dag par skyes pa rgyal po'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa yud tsam zhig cang mi gsung bar gyur te/ thams cad dang ldan
56a6(rgyud): pa'i 'jig rten thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la yang dag par dgongs nas byams pa'i thugs kyis sngags
56a7(rgyud): gsungs so/ /na maHsarba bud d+hA nAM aM maM/ 'di ni 'jam dpal gyi snying po mchog yin te las thams cad byed pa'o/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ting nge
56b1(rgyud): 'dzin de las langs nas/ dper na/ skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa lag pa bskum pa las brkyang ba dang / brkyang ba las bskum pa'am/ se gol gtogs pa tsam mam/
56b2(rgyud): mig 'byed 'dzums tsam la rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyi shugs blo ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs te/ mi mjed
56b3(rgyud): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su chas te sngar 'khod nas/ steng gi nam mkha'i dkyil na nor bu rin po che rab tu gnas pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams gnas su 'dug ste/
56b4(rgyud): gnas gtsang ma'i gnas de thams cad 'od chen po'i snang bas gsal bar byas te/ 'od kyi rin po ches rab tu brgyan cing gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
56b5(rgyud): zhugs so/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu rin po che rnam pa tha dad pa du ma'i khang pa brtsegs pa dang / rin po che'i gdugs dang / dpag tshad
56b6(rgyud): brgya stong phrag du ma rgya che ba'i lha'i gos dang / dar mang po'i tshogs kyis nye bar mdzes par byas pa'i 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /'jam
56b7(rgyud): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa/ de'i dus la bab par shes na song zhig /'on kyang nga'i bkas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la gnod pa nyung ngam/ nyam nga ba chung ngam/ bskyod
57a1(rgyud): pa yang ngam/ bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes zhu bar bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das me tog yang dag par skyes pa rgyal po'i dbang po de bzhin
57a2(rgyud): gshegs pas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /gzhan yang / gzhon nu/ gang gA'i klung brgya stong gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs
57a3(rgyud): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis khyod kyi sngags kyi spyod pa dang / dkyil 'khor dang / cho ga zhib mo dang / gsang ba dang / dbang bskur ba dang /
57a4(rgyud): phyag rgya'i tshogs dang / cho ga dang / sbyin sreg dang / bzlas pa dang / brtul zhugs bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ sems can thams cad dga'
57a5(rgyud): bar byed pa/ 'od rin po che'i tshogs kyis rab 'byams/ 'das pa dang / da ltar byung ba dang / ma 'ongs pa shes pa/ rgyal po'i dbang phyug lung ston par byed pa/
57a6(rgyud): sngags bzla ba/ yul gyi mthar 'gro bar byed pa mi snang bar byed pa dang / dus dang / dam tshig rab 'byams kyi tshogs thams cad dang / 'jig rten pa ma lus pa dang /
57a7(rgyud): 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / 'phags pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi nges par 'byung ba'i spyod pa mthar thug
57b1(rgyud): pa gsungs pa dang / gsung ba dang / gsung bar 'gyur ba yin te/ de ltar rjes su yi rang ba nyid de/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa/ de'i dus la bab par shes na song
57b2(rgyud): zhig| shAkya thub pa'i spyan sngar mngon sum du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos par gyur te khyod kyang ston par 'gyur ro/ /'dir yang gsungs pa/ na maHsarba ta thA ga ta nAM/
57b3(rgyud): a tsin t+ya a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/ oM sma ra sma ra a pra ti ha ta shA sa na ku mA ra rU pa ha ri Na/ oM hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ 'di ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rtsa ba'i sngags
57b4(rgyud): so| |de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa/ gsung zhing gsung bar 'gyur la/ khyod kyang mi mjed kyi 'jig
57b5(rgyud): rten gyi khams su song nas dbye ba dang / rnam par dbye ba rgya cher ston par 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa zhes bya bas kyang las thams cad byed pa 'di rjes su
57b6(rgyud): gnang bar 'gyur ro/ /'dir snying po mchog tu gyur pa ni/ oM bA kye daM na maH 'dir nye ba'i snying po ni/ bA kye hUM/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa bcom ldan 'das me
57b7(rgyud): tog yang dag par skyes pa rgyal po'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pas gnang nas bkod pa thams cad kyi rgyan byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / rgyu mthun pa/ byang chub kyi
58a1(rgyud): snying po thob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub ba la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir lha'i me tog rnam par
58a2(rgyud): bkod pa dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / phreng ba'i tshogs dang / rin po che'i dril bu'i dra bas 'brel ba/ snyan pa'i sgra sgrogs pa/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub
58a3(rgyud): sems dpa'i sa thob par byed pa/ lha'i dri dang / byug pa dang / phreng ba dang / phye ma'i char dbab par mngon par sprul to/ /de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu
58a4(rgyud): rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa'i ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i cho 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa mthong nas ba spu ldang zhing gnas g.yo ba mthong nas snying 'dar zhing dngangs te/ ci bdag cag gi 'byor pa nyams par ma gyur tam zhes phan tshun du rings par 'gro zhing skad mthon pos smra ba rtsom par byed de/
58a5(rgyud): 'di skad du/ bcom ldan 'das/
58a6(rgyud): yongs su bskyab tu gsol/ shAkya thub pa/ yongs su bskyab tu gsol zhes gsol to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i
58a7(rgyud): 'khor rnams la bka' stsal pa/ grogs po dag /ma 'jigs shig /ma 'jigs shig /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur
58b1(rgyud): gyur pa 'di ni me tog yang dag par skyes pa'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa de'i spyan snga nas nga la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / don chen po'i spyod pa
58b2(rgyud): dang / sngags kyi tshig dang / rgya che zhing rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi tshig ston pa'i phyir 'ongs pa yin no/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la
58b3(rgyud): lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ mig mi 'dzums par bcom ldan 'das la blta zhing zhabs gnyis la btud de/ tshig 'bru 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa/ /skyes
58b4(rgyud): bu bskyed pa khyod phyag 'tshal/ /skyes mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /skyes bu gtso bo khyod phyag 'tshal/ /spyod pa thams cad don sgrub pa/ /skyes bu seng ge khyod phyag 'tshal/ /
58b5(rgyud): phung khrol thams cad zlog byed pa/ /dpa' po chen po khyod phyag 'tshal/ /ngan 'gro thams cad 'jig byed pa/ /skyes bu pad dkar khyod phyag 'tshal/ /kun nas bsod nams dri
58b6(rgyud): ldan ba/ /skyes bu pad+ma khyod phyag 'tshal/ /srid gsum 'dam ni rnam dag byed/ /rnam grol khyed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sdug bsngal ma lus rnam grol byed/ /zhi gyur khyod la/
58b7(rgyud): phyag 'tshal lo/ /thams cad ldan pa legs 'dul byed/ /thams cad grub pa khyod phyag 'tshal/ /sngags kyi spyod pa'i don sgrub byed/ /bkra shis khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
59a1(rgyud): bkra shis kun gyi bkra shis pa/ /sangs rgyas kun la khyod phyag 'tshal/ /chos kun rnam bar rtog mdzad pa/ /chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid spros pa med
59a2(rgyud): pa'i ngo bo la yang dag par rjes su zhugs shing ston par byed pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /shes pa dang / shes bya'i dngos po thams cad dang /
59a3(rgyud): 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang / theg pa gsum gyi lam dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam la 'jog par byed pa dang / gnas par byed pa thams cad mkhyen pa
59a4(rgyud): khyod la phyag 'tshal lo zhes tshig 'bru 'di dag brjod pa'i bstod pa'i tshig gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon sum du bstod nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan
59a5(rgyud): 'das/ 'di nas gang+gA'i klung brgya phrag stong gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das nas byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams na me tog yang dag par skyes pa zhes bya ba'i
59a6(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi zhing mchis te/ de na me tog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na gang du bcom ldan 'das me tog yang dag par skyes pa dbang po'i rgyal po/
59a7(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa/ dgra bcom pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ rig pa dang / zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/
59b1(rgyud): skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ lha dang / mi rnams kyi ston pa de chos ston te/ thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres
59b2(rgyud): pa| yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su dkar ba/ tshangs par spyod pa yang dag par ston to/ /de da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/ /sngags
59b3(rgyud): kyi spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod dang / lam gsum gyi spyod pa'i lam sgrub par byed pa/ skyob pa dang / gnas dang / skyabs dang / dpung gnyen dang / bde ba
59b4(rgyud): dang | shin tu mthar thug pa dang / shin tu yongs su mthar phyin par byed pa sems can rnams la ston te/ bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyis rjes su gnang nas bcom ldan 'das
59b5(rgyud): kyi zhabs drung 'dir mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das me tog yang dag par skyes pa rgyal po'i dbang po de yang bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ bde
59b6(rgyud): ba la reg par gnas sam zhes 'dri'o/ /'di skad kyang gsung ste/ gang du 'di lta bu'i snyigs ma lnga'i dus su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa 'byung ba ni ngo mtshar
59b7(rgyud): to zhes so/ /de yang lam gsum dang / byang grol dang / mir skye ba thob pa nyid kyi chos ston par byed do/ /gang du sems can gyi ris skal ba med pa dang / srid pa gsum yang
60a1(rgyud): dag par 'joms par byed pa'i lam dang / gtan du grub pa dang / bde ba dang / mthun pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa la sems can rnams 'god par
60a2(rgyud): byed pa'i bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i brtson 'grus ni ngo mtshar to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ni/ sangs
60a3(rgyud): rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen par 'gyur gyi/ bdag gis ci zhig 'tshal ba rngo thogs/ dbang phyug gis rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ rmad du byung
60a4(rgyud): ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa shes par gyur ram/ 'tshal bar ram/ thugs kyi spyad pa spyod pa'i rjes su 'jug pa'i
60a5(rgyud): sgrub pa dang / spyod pa 'tshal bar ram/ mdor na/ bskal pa bye ba khri phrag brgya stong gi bar du 'ang bstan par mi nus so/ /gang yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis de
60a6(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa bsdus pa'am/ tha dad ma lus pa'i ngo bo 'di ni chos 'dus ma byas su blta bar bya ste/ mthong bas spang bar bya ba la brten pa 'am/ yon
60a7(rgyud): tan ni| bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kho nas mkhyen pa yin gyi/ bdag gis ni ma lags so/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi
60b1(rgyud): rnam par 'phrul pas rin po che'i pad+ma sprul pa la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la blta zhing 'dug go / de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
60b2(rgyud): chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rjes su mthun pa'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs sngon du 'gro ba mdzad nas chos bstan pa dang / rjes su mthun pa dang /
60b3(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa sgrub pa dang / rjes su mthun pas tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang / ka la ping ka'i skad dang / 'brug sgra dang / rnga bo che'i sgra skad kyi gsung gi dbyangs kyis 'jam
60b4(rgyud): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa/ khyod legs par 'ongs sam/ sems dpa' chen po'i spyod pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin
60b5(rgyud): gyis brlabs pa bsgrub pas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi don thob par byed pa/ sngags thams cad kyi tshig dang / gsang ba dang bcas pa dang / dbang bskur ba dang /
60b6(rgyud): phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor dang / cho ga dang / dbang bskur ba dang / tshe dang / nad med pa dang / dbang phyug dang / bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ sgrub pa'i
60b7(rgyud): thabs thams cad dang ldan pa/ rgyud shes pa dang / shes bya dang / dus dang / mi snang ba dang / rgyal po'i zhing du gyur pa 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba shes
61a1(rgyud): par byed pa/ mdor na sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ rang gi yon tan dang / mthun pa'i sngags kyi spyod pa
61a2(rgyud): rjes su 'jug pa/ sems can gzhan dga' bar byed pa/ mi snang bar 'gro ba/ nam mkha' la 'gro ba/ chu la mi nub par 'gro ba/ yid gzhungs par byed pa/ 'gugs par
61a3(rgyud): byed pa/ sa 'og tu 'jug pa/ mngon du spyod par byed pa/ 'dod pa thams cad thob par byed pa/ gnod sbyin dang / gnod sbyin mo thams cad dang / mngag gzhug pa dang / sha
61a4(rgyud): za dang / 'byung po thams cad 'gugs par byed pa/ byis pa dang / rgan po dang / gzhon nu gnas ji lta ba bzhin 'jog par byed pa/ mdor na las thams cad byed pa ste/
61a5(rgyud): yid la re ba thams cad rdzogs par byed pa/ mngon spyod dang / rgyas pa dang / zhi ba'i las dag rab tu byed pa/ ji lta ji ltar rab tu sbyar ba de lta de ltar byang chub sems
61a6(rgyud): dpa'i sde snod phal po che bskal pa chen po'i rin po che'i le'u rab 'byams 'di ngas kyang rjes su gnang zhing sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang gsungs te/ sems can dag
61a7(rgyud): pa'i rang gi sngags spyod pa'i don gyi chos kyi mdzod/ skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / lha dang / mi rnams dang / sems can thams cad kyi don du
61b1(rgyud): stan pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i 'od kyi snang ba bkod pa'i rgyan yang dag par bskul ba zhes bya ba
61b2(rgyud): b yang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu dag pa'i sems can gyi 'od kyi snang bas gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sangs
61b3(rgyud): rgyas kyi zhing 'og min gyi gnas kyi bar dang / mnar med pa'i dmyal ba chen po'i bar du khyab par byas te/ sems can gang su dag shin tu sdug bsngal ba de dag thams
61b4(rgyud): cad kyi sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar gyur to/ /nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams yang dag
61b5(rgyud): par bskul nas/ 'od de yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i spyi bo'i gtsug tu nub par gyur to/ /'dir gang dag shar phyogs na rnam par gnas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
61b6(rgyud): zhing der 'od zer rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi reg pa'i bya bas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams yang dag par bskul te/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kyi zla ba dri snang ba'i dpal zhes
61b7(rgyud): bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUR+ya'i 'od dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dpal kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal po yang dag par
62a1(rgyud): 'phags pa zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sA la'i dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi dbang po'i
62a2(rgyud): rgyal po zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag tu med pa ye shes rnam par nges pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba mtha' yas dbang po'i
62a3(rgyud): rgyal po zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba'i 'od kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba dang / de dag la sogs pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs
62a4(rgyud): kyis yongs su bskor ba/ mtha' yas mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom
62a5(rgyud): ldan 'das 'dus pa dag la/ mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gnas gtsang ma'i khang bzang na de bzhin gshegs pa/ dgra bcom pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
62a6(rgyud): sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa lhan cig tu byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa ston pa dang / sngags kyi tshig gi don gyi le'u rab 'byams
62a7(rgyud): ston te/ de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang gi phyogs dang / phyogs mtshams dang / steng dang / 'og dang / thad ka thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
62b1(rgyud): snang bar byas te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du bdud kyi gnas thams cad dpa' gong bar byas nas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad kyis yongs su bskor cing nyan
62b2(rgyud): thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pas mdun gyis bltas te/ gnas gtsang ma'i gnas su sangs rgyas kyi 'phrul pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bdag nyid chen po blta bar 'dod pa
62b3(rgyud): dang / sngags kyi spyod pa bsgrub pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par dang / le'u'i tshogs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa thogs pa med pa gsal bar 'dod pas chas pa ni/

62b5(rgyud): cad du 'phags pa dang / chos 'phags dang / rin chen 'phags dang / rin chen dpal dang / lhun po'i dpal dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dpal dang / 'od byed dpal dang / 'od dpal
62b6(rgyud): dang / don thams cad kyi dpal dang / thams cad phyag na rin po che dang / phyag na gtsug gi rin po che dang / phyag na lhun po'i rgyal mtshan dang / rnam par snang mdzad snying po dang / rin
62b7(rgyud): chen snying po dang / ye shes snying po dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i don gyi snying po dang / chos 'phags kyi snying po dang / rgyal mtshan gyi tog dang / tog bzang dang / mtha' yas tog
63a1(rgyud): dang / dri ma med pa'i tog dang / mtha' dag gi tog dang / nam mkha'i tog dang / rin po che'i tog dang / 'brug sgra dang / rnga bo che'i skad kyi rgyal po dang /
63a2(rgyud): mtha' yas par snang ba'i ye shes kyi rgyal po dang / mun pa mun nag thams cad 'joms pa'i rgyal po dang / gnod pa thams cad rnam par 'jig pa'i rgyal po dang / spyod pa
63a3(rgyud): thams cad kyi yul shes pa'i rgyal po dang / 'jig rten gyi dbang po'i rgyal po dang / mngon par rtogs pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang / rnam par 'joms par byed pa'i rgyal po
63a4(rgyud): dang | nges par g.yo bar byed pa'i rgyal po dang / nyi ma'i rgyal po dang / dngos po med pa yang dag par 'phags pa'i rgyal po dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid yang dag par

63a7(rgyud): dang | 'od dang / blo dang / rtogs pa dang / bde ba dang / bde ba'i mu khyud dang / mu khyud tog dang / 'dod pa'i lha dang / lha dang / lha yul na yod pa dang / lte ba dang / rgyas

64a6(rgyud): dang / mdzes pa'i 'gros dang / mtha' yas 'gros dang / grags pa mtha' yas dang / grags pa bzang po dang / grags pa'i dri ma bral dang / grags pa'i 'gro ba dang / grags pa dri

64b7(rgyud): dang / gzhan yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang lhan cig bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang na bzhugs so/ /gzhan
65a1(rgyud): yang | byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bud med kyi gzugs 'chang ba rnams te/ spyod pa mtha' yas pa'i don/ 'jig rten sgrub pa'i don/
65a2(rgyud): sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa phyir mi ldog pa'i lam la dgod pas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rig pa'i tshig dang / sngags kyi tshig dang / gzungs dang / sman gyi cha byad

65a6(rgyud): dang | de bzhin gshegs pa dang / pad+ma dang / rdo rje'i rigs dang / 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rigs kyi rjes su zhugs pa/ dam tshig las mi 'da'
65a7(rgyud): zhing tshig gis lam la 'jog par byed pa/ dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi gcod par byed pa yin te/ 'di lta ste/ gtsug tor dang / mngon par 'phags pa dang /
65b1(rgyud): mngon par mtho ba dang / gdugs dkar po dang / 'dab ma mtha' yas dang / 'dab ma brgya pa dang / rgyal ba'i gtsug tor dang / 'jig rten mthon po dang / rnam par rgyal ba'i
65b2(rgyud): gtsug tor dang / mngon par 'phags pa'i gtsug tor dang / pad+ma'i 'od dang / me tog pad+ma'i 'od dang / me tog ka ta ka'i 'od dang / 'od dkar po dang / bkod pa'i gtsug tor dang /
65b3(rgyud): gser gyi phung po dang / dkar po'i phung po dang / gzi brjid phung po dang / nor bu'i phung po dang / kun nas phung po dang / rnam par grags pa'i phung po dang / 'byung ba'i phung po dang /

65b5(rgyud): la rab tu zhugs pa/ sems can gyi bsam pa rab tu rdzogs par byed pa/ rgyal ba thams cad kyi snying bo dang ldan pa/ gtsug tor gyi rgyal mo bskal ba bye ba khri phrag brgya stong gi
65b6(rgyud): bar du yang bgrang zhing mthar thug par mi nus so/ /stobs dag pha rol gnon pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bdag nyid kyang bstan par mi nus so/ /mdor bstan par bya ste/ brjod pa
65b7(rgyud): ni rig pa'i rgyal mo'i 'dus pa brjod par bya ste/ 'di lta ste/ mdzod spu dang / smin ma dang / spyan ma dang / rdzi ma dang / rna ba dang / mgrin pa dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / snying rje dang / byams
66a1(rgyud): ba dang / brtse ba dang / shes rab dang / 'od zer dang / sems pa dang / 'od dang / dri ma med pa dang / sgrib pa dang / mchog sbyin thams cad dang / de dag dang /

66a3(rgyud): pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzims mal dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i snang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i

66a5(rgyud): dag dang / gzhan yang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngags brjod pa rig pa'i rgyal po dang / rgyal mo dang / mdag gzhug pa dang / bran pho dang / bran mo dang / pho nya dang / pho nya
66a6(rgyud): mo dang / gnod sbyin dang / gnod sbyin mo dang / sems can dang / sems can ma yin pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par rgyu mthun pa las byung ba'i rgyan gyi tshogs kyi khyad

73a3(rgyud): 'das shAkya thub pa dkon mchog gsum sa bcu la gnas pa dag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so/ /nyan thos chen po nges par 'byung ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i
73a4(rgyud): dbyings la yang dag par rjes su zhugs pa du ma dag dang / 'dus ma byas kyi lam gyi theg pa la dmigs pa dang / dag cing 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / kun nas
73a5(rgyud): snang ba kun tu thob pa dang / sbyin pa'i gnas su gyur pa/ yon tan gyi zhing yon tan skyed par byed cing yongs su sbyong ba dag dang / sems can gyi snying po'i snying por
73a6(rgyud): gyur pa/ 'jig rten mchog gi bdag po/ lha dang / mi rnams kyis mchod pa/ bsod nams kyi zhing / rkang gnyis dang / rkang bzhi dang / rkang mang dang / sems can
73a7(rgyud): thams cad kyi mchog la/ 'di lta ste/ grags 'dzin ma dang / grags sbyin ma dang / skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo dang / legs skyes ma dang / dga' mo dang /
73b1(rgyud): sbom dga' mo dang / mdzes dga' mo dang / sgom pa mo dang / mdzes ma dang / mtha' yas ma dang / sa ga ma dang / bsam pa ma dang / rgyal ldan ma dang / gtsug phud
73b2(rgyud): ma dang / nye ba'i gtsug phud ma dang / lha mo ma dang / legs lha mo dang / gnas ma dang / dpal mo dang / rab mchog ma dang / rab dga' ma dang / smra dga' ma dang /

73b4(rgyud): nye ba'i ral pa ma dang / kun nas ral pa ma dang / don 'byung ma dang / 'od ma dang / yid mgyogs ma dang / skrag ldan ma dang / khyab 'jug 'dzin ma dang / khyab 'jug dga'

73b7(rgyud): dang / /srid gsum mthar byed ma dang / dri ma gsum mthar byed ma dang / sdug bsngal ston par byed ma dang / yid 'byung ma dang / kha dog gsum ma dang / pad+ma'i kha dog
74a1(rgyud): ma dang / pad+ma ldan ma dang / pad+ma'i 'od ma dang / dka' zlog rkang spyod ma dang / dka' zlog rkang spyod ldan ma dang / 'dab gsum ma dang / 'dab bdun
74a2(rgyud): ma dang / ut+pa la'i 'dab ma dang / de dag dang / gzhan yang / gnas brtan ma chen mo/ nyan thos chen mo dag bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal ba'i phyir nye bar
74a3(rgyud): lhags par gyur to/ /'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnam par 'phrul pa mthong bar 'dod nas 'dus shing 'khod
74a4(rgyud): par gyur te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir dang / sngags kyi spyod pa sgrub pa gsal bar 'dod par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i
74a5(rgyud): 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la gzigs nas lhag pa'i bsam pa dag dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid nam mkha'i ngo bo dang / chos kyi dbyings dus gsum las yang dag
74a6(rgyud): par 'das par mkhyen nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ sems can gyi don spyod pa la yang dag par soms shig bsam pa ji lta
74a7(rgyud): ba bzhin du mngon par dga' ba'i 'dod pa'i las kyi 'bras bu la dad pa dang ldan pa la sngags kyi spyod pa'i don yang dag par thob pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi tshig dang / las kyi tshig
74b1(rgyud): dang | zhi ba'i tshig dang / thar pa'i tshig dang / cho ga zhib mo sgrub pa dang / rnam par mi rtog pa'i mnyam pa nyid thob par byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu kun
74b2(rgyud): gyi stobs dang / bdud thams cad kyi stobs zil gyis gnon pa zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sgoms shig ces so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
74b3(rgyud): stsal ma thag tu 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa snyoms par zhugs par gyur to/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ de nas stong gsum gyi
74b4(rgyud): stob chen po 'di dang / 'jig rten gyi khams brgya phrag stong du ma'i rdu phra rab kyi rdul dang mnyam pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yang dag par rab
74b5(rgyud): tu g.yos te/ snang ba chen pos gsal bar yang byas nas rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs skyed pa ston te/ rang gi sngags kyi tshig kyang ston pa la/ na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ a b+hA ba
74b6(rgyud): swa b+hA ba mung+ga tA nAM/ na maHphra t+ye ka bud d+hA nAM/ AR+ya shrA ba kA nAM/ na mo bo d+hi sa twA nAM/ da sha b+hU mi pra tiSh+Tha te shwa rA nAM/ bo d+hi sa twA nAM/ ma hA satwa nAM/ tad+ya thA/ oM kha kha khA hi khA hi/ duSh+Ta
74b7(rgyud): sa twa da ma ka a si mu sa la bar shu pA sha ha sta/ tsa tur+b+hu dza/ tsa turmu kha/ Sha Ta tsa ra Na/ gats+tsha gats+tsha/ sarba big+h+na big+h+nan+ta ka ra/ bi kr-i tA na na/ sarba b+hu ta b+ha yaM ka ra/ aT+Ta T+Ta hA sa ni nA di

75a2(rgyud): tha ni rma tha/ sarba duSh+TA na/ pra be sha ya pra be sha ya/ maN+Da la mad d+h+ye/ pai ba satwa dzi bi tAn+ta ka ra/ ku ru ku ru ma ma sarba kAR+yan/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ mA bi lam+ba mA bi lam+ba/ sa ma
75a3(rgyud): ya ma nu sma ra/ hUM hUM phaT/ s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/ sarba A sha pa ri pU ra ka /he b+ha ga bAn kany+tsi rI ya si ma ma sarbA r+thaM sA d+ha ya/ 'di ni/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'jam dpal gzhon
75a4(rgyud): nur gyur pa'i khro bo chen po gshin rje'i gshed ces bya ba yin te/ gshin rje'i rgyal po yang 'joms pa dang / 'gugs par byed pa yin na sems can gzhan lta smos kyang
75a5(rgyud): ci dgos/ khro bo'i rgyal po chen pos gzungs sngags 'di smras ma thag tu sems can thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lhags par gyur te/ 'jigs
75a6(rgyud): pa dang / nyam thag pa dang / dngangs pa dang / yid skyo ba dang / snying 'gas par 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ma
75a7(rgyud): gtogs par skyabs gzhan med/ skyob pa gzhan med/ dpung gnyen gzhan med par gyur te/ de nas gang su dag sa la gnas pa dang / chu la gnas pa dang / nam
75b1(rgyud): mkha' la gnas pa dang / brtan par gnas pa dang / mi brtan par gnas pa dang / mngal nas skyes pa dang / sgo nga las skyes pa dang / drod gsher las skyes pa dang /
75b2(rgyud): rdzus te skyes pa'i sems can gyi grangs su gtogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa dag na rnam par gnas pa steng dang / 'og dang / thad ka dang / phyogs dang /
75b3(rgyud): phyogs mtshams dag tu skad cig de dang / yud tsam de la gab cing gnas pa dag skad cig de nyid la khro bo'i rgyal po chen pos 'di nyid du bkug par gyur to/ /khro bo rgyal
75b4(rgyud): po'i sngags 'di ni 'dod chags dang ma bral ba rnams kyi mdun du brjod par mi bya ste/ ci'i phyir na/ de yang 'chi bar 'gyur ba 'am/ skam par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /dam
75b5(rgyud): tshig la dmigs par byas nas sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs sam/ sku gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten nam/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i sku gzugs kyi
75b6(rgyud): spyan spang bzlas par bya'o/ /yang na las gzhan gyi ched du brjod par bya ste/ gang de dang / de dag tu ni brjod par mi bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ltas ngan chen po dang / mya
75b7(rgyud): ngan chen po dang / bdag nyid 'jigs pa chen por 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /thugs rje mchog dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems

80a2(rgyud): gnas pa dang / sa la gnas pa dang / shing la gnas pa dang / khyim na gnas pa dang / de bzhin du lha ma yin gyi dbang po rab tu tshim byed dang / stobs ldan dang / thags
80a3(rgyud): bzang ris dang / shin tu bkra dang / bde bkra dang / rig byed bkra dang / sgra gcan dang / lag pa dang / de dag la sogs pa lha ma yin bye ba khri phrag brgya stong du ma'i
80a4(rgyud): 'khor dang ldan pa 'gros sna tshogs dang / nor sna tshogs dang / lha dang 'thab pa'i lha ma yin de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs dang / byang chub sems
80a5(rgyud): dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor der 'dus par gyur to/ /gang yang gza' dang / gza' chen
80a6(rgyud): po de dag 'jig rten gyi khams su spyod pa/ bar snang la spyod pa la/ 'di lta ste/ nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / mig dmar dang / gza' lhag pa dang / phur bu dang / pa bsangs
80a7(rgyud): dang | spen pa dang / sgra gcan dang / sa 'gul dang / mjug ring dang / gnam lcags 'byin dang / skar ma dang / rgyal mtshan dang / mi bzad dang / dud ldan dang /
80b1(rgyud): dud pa dang / rdo rje dang / 'byor pa dang / char 'bebs dang / nye ba'i char 'bebs dang / nor 'dzin dang / mi snang byed dang / rgod ldan dang / rting par ldan dang / 'dod pa dang /
80b2(rgyud): ma rungs pa dang / 'jig rten mthar byed dang / rnam par ltung byed dang / kun tu ltung byed dang / rtog pa dang / gla sgang can dang / dus kyi mtha' dang / dur khrod dang / sha drag
80b3(rgyud): ldan dang / dkar po dang / bya bi bzhin dang / byi bzhin gyi bu dang / byams ldan dang / gzer bu dang / gzer bu gsum dang / rngon pa dang / gseng phrom dang / brtan pa dang / 'jig
80b4(rgyud): byed dang / stobs ldan dang / mi bzad pa dang / skya rengs dang / rnam par rgod pa dang / 'chi ltas min dang / skem byed dang / kun bged dang / nye ba'i kun bged dang /
80b5(rgyud): gzhon nu dang / rtse med dang / rgod byed dang / rab tu rgod byed dang / sems par byed pa dang / gar byed dang / 'theng po dang / gzugs ngan te/ gza' chen po de dag kyang
80b6(rgyud): rgyu skar brgya stong phrag du ma'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa la/ 'di lta ste/ tha skar dang / bra nye dang / smin drug dang / snar ma dang / mgo dang / lag dang / nab
80b7(rgyud): so dang / rgyal dang / skag dang / mchu dang / gre dang / dbo dang / me bzhi dang / nag pa dang / sa ri dang / sa ga dang / lha mtshams dang / smron dang / snrubs dang / chu
81a1(rgyud): stod dang / chu smad dang | gro bzhin dang / mon gru dang / mon gre dang / khrums stod dang / khrums smad dang / nam gru dang / lha mo 'dra dang / byi bzhin dang /
81a2(rgyud): pu na rna ba dang / 'od dang / ang gi ra si dang / rgyu skar dang / nye ba'i gre dang / gre ldan dang / 'jig rten rab mchog dang / rang mchog ldan dang / dpal ldan dang / 'jig rten
81a3(rgyud): mgon po dang / chang ldan dang / rgyal byed dang / nor ldan dang / lha don te/ de ltar rgyu skar gyi rgyal po de dag kyang de'i tshe gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang du rgyu skar
81a4(rgyud): brgya stong phrag du ma'i 'khor dang ldan pa sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po der 'dus te 'khod par gyur to/ /khyim sum cu rtsa drug la/ 'di
81a5(rgyud): lta ste/ lug dang / glang dang / sbyor ba dang / sbal ba dang / seng ge dang / bu mo dang / srang dang / sdig pa dang / gzhu dang / chu srin dang / bum pa dang / nya dang / mi'u
81a6(rgyud): thung dang / nye ba'i bum pa dang / b+h+ring ga ra dang / ral gri dang / glang po che dang / ma he dang / lha dang / mi dang / dge ltas dang / dri za dang / 'jig rten dang / g.yung drung
81a7(rgyud): rgyal dang / drag po'i gzi brjid dang / zla ba'i 'od dang / sa dang / mun pa dang / rdul dang / nye ba'i rdul dang / sdug bsngal dang / bde ba dang / byang chub dang / so so
81b1(rgyud): gcig dang / nyan thos dang / dmyal ba'i rig pa 'dzin pa dang / gzi brjid chen po dang / gzi brjid chen po ldan dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dwags dang / lha ma yin dang / sha
81b2(rgyud): ldan dang / sha za dang / gnod sbyin srin po dang / 'byung po thams cad pa dang / 'byung ba pa dang / phyogs kyi glang po dang / steng 'gro dang / thad kar 'gro dang / kha bye ba dang /
81b3(rgyud): bsam gtan 'gro dang / rnam 'byor 'gro dang / rab tu gnas dang / mchog dang / bar ma dang / tha ma ste/ khyim chen po de dag kyang khyim brgya stong phrag du ma'i 'khor dang
81b4(rgyud): ldan pa gang na gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang gang na bar 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po der lhags shing phyin te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la btud nas
81b5(rgyud): rang rang gi gnas su 'khod par gyur to/ /gang yang gnod sbyin mo dag gnod sbyin mo brgya stong phrag du ma'i 'khor dang bcas pa la/ 'di lta ste/ mig bzang ma dang / smin
81b6(rgyud): bzang ma dang / skra bzang ma dang / skad snyan ma dang / blo bzang ma dang / dge ldan ma dang / sna tshogs mig ldan ma dang / rdzogs byed ma dang / gsang ba ma dang / bzang po
