81b7(rgyud): ma dang / ska rags bzang po ma dang / pad+ma ltar smra ba dang / 'jigs byed ma dang / mi 'jigs sbyin ma dang / rgyal ma dang / rnam par rgyal ma dang / na ma gru ma dang / sgro gcan ma
82a1(rgyud): dang | sgra mthar byed ma dang / rlung ma dang / yid 'phrog ma dang / yid ldan ma dang / me tog ldan ma dang / me tog gi grong khyer la gnas ma dang /
82a2(rgyud): ser skya ma dang / 'phrog ma dang / dpal ldan ma dang / dpa' mo dang / dpa' bzang mo dang / shin tu mi bzad ma dang / mi bzad ldan ma dang / lha mdzes ma dang / ro
82a3(rgyud): bzang ma dang / gsang ba dam pa ma dang / shing la mu la gnas ma dang / mya ngan med ma dang / mun par mdzes ma dang / snang bar mdzes ma dang / 'od ldan ma dang /
82a4(rgyud): lhag par ldan ma dang / gzugs mdzes ma dang / dkar med ma dang / zhi ba ma dang / phyogs mtshams ma dang / stug ma dang / dga' byed ma dang / nye ba'i dga' byed
82a5(rgyud): ma dang / 'jig rten las 'das ma ste/ gnod sbyin mo chen mo 'di dag gnod sbyin mo brgya stong phrag du ma'i 'khor dang ldan pa 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po der
82a6(rgyud): rgyang ring po nyid nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal zhing 'khod par gyur to/ /gang yang sha za mo dag sha za mo brgya stong phrag du ma'i 'khor dang
82a7(rgyud): ldan pa 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po der rgyang ring po nyid nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal zhing 'khod par gyur pa la/ 'di lta ste/ sdud ma
82b1(rgyud): dang / phyag dar khrod kyi sha za mo dang / sha za mo drag mo dang / sha za mo skar mda' ma dang / sha za mo 'bar ma dang / thal ba za ma dang / sha za ma dang / dug ma dang / bung
82b2(rgyud): ba ma dang / rmongs byed ma dang / sdigs mdzub ma dang / dmar ldan ma dang / glang dmar ma dang / 'jig rten nye gnas ma dang / thal bar nye gnas ma dang / shing pi
82b3(rgyud): lu dang / ldan ma dang / mang ldan ma dang / mang ma dang / gdul dka' ma dang / e la ma dang / mtshon byed ma dang / du ba la gnas ma dang / du ba ma ste/ sha za mo
82b4(rgyud): chen mo 'di dag sha za mo'i 'khor bye ba brgya stong phrag du ma dang bcas pa de dag kyang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po der 'dus shing rab tu zhugs par gyur to/ /gang yang ma
82b5(rgyud): mo dang / ma mo chen mo dag 'jig rten gyi rjes su rnam par spyod cing sems can rnams la 'tshe bar byed cing gtor ma dang / me tog dman pa la spyod par byed pa dag la/
82b6(rgyud): 'di lta ste/ tshangs pa ma dang / dbang phyug chen po ma dang / khyab 'jug ma dang / gzhon nu ma dang / rgan byad ma dang / phag mo dang / dbang mo dang / gshin rje mo dang /
82b7(rgyud): me phyogs ma dang / nyi ma'i bu mo dang / 'jig rten mthar byed ma dang / chu lha ma dang / dbang ldan ma dang / rlung phyogs ma dang / gzhan gyi srog 'phrog ma dang / mgo
83a1(rgyud): bregs ma dang / bya ma dang / bya ma chen mo dang / srul mo dang / lus srul mo dang / skem byed ma ste/ ma mo chen mo de dag kyang ma mo'i 'khor
83a2(rgyud): b ye ba khri phrag brgya stong du ma dang bcas pa de dag kyang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po der sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i tshig 'don cing 'khod par
83a3(rgyud): gyur to/ /de bzhin du mi dang / mi ma yin pa bye ba khri phrag brgya stong du ma dang / sems can dang / sems can ma yin pa nas dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa nas srid
83a4(rgyud): pa'i rtse mo'i bar du thams cad kyang skabs 'dir nam mkha'i dkyil du snang bar gyur to/ /sems can gyi ris na srog chags su la yang phan tshun mi mthun pa med
83a5(rgyud): par gyur to/ /sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i cho 'phrul gyi rgyan gyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur
83a6(rgyud): gyur pa sems can thams cad kyi spyi bo'i gtsug na bzhugs par mthong bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten
83a7(rgyud): gyi khams su sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rnam par gzigs nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ dag pa'i sems dpa'/ sngags kyi spyod pa'i don
83b1(rgyud): rnam par gtan la dbab pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u rab 'byams byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod gang 'di bshad pa'i dus la bab par sems na shod cig /de nas 'jam
83b2(rgyud): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas rjes su gnang bar mdzad pa na/ nam mkha'i ngo bo dang 'dra ba'i rdo rje mthug cing sra ba'i rgyud bkod pa'i rgyan zhes bya
83b3(rgyud): ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang de dpag ched brgya stong
83b4(rgyud): du ma rgya che ba'i rdo rje'i rang bzhin du lhag par gnas par gyur to/ /gang du gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / dri za dang / rlung lha dang / sha za de dag dang / mdor na/ sems can
83b5(rgyud): gyi khams thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis gzhal med khang de dag rdo rje nor bu rin po che lta bur gyur te/ der rab tu zhugs nas 'khod par gyur kyang
83b6(rgyud): phan tshun rnam par 'tshe bar byed pa med do/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po de 'dus par gyur par shes nas khro bo'i rgyal po gshin
83b7(rgyud): rje'i gshed la smras pa/ kye khro bo chen po/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis rjes su nges par 'byung bar byed pa 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'dus pa
84a1(rgyud): 'di'i sems can thams cad srungs shig srungs shig / dbang du gyis shig /ma rungs pa gdul bar gyis shig /sems can zhi ba dag sad par
84a2(rgyud): gyis shig / sems can thams cad dad par gyis shig /ji srid du nga'i rang gi sngags kyi spyod pa rjes su sgrub pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod rgya che ba dag las sngags
84a3(rgyud): spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga 'chad par byed pa de srid kyi bar du 'di dag gi phyi rol tu sang la srung ba gyis shig / de skad ces smras pa dang / khro bo'i rgyal pos bka'
84a4(rgyud): mnyan nas/ khro bo chen po'i gzugs kyis sems can thams cad rjes su bsrung ba dang / rjes su bstan pa'i phyir 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du khro bo'i rgyal po
84a5(rgyud): gshin rje gshed khro bo'i 'khor brgya stong phrag du ma phyogs bzhi kun dang / steng dang / 'og dang / thad ka dag tu shin tu mi bzad pa'i sgra rab tu 'don cing gnas par gyur to/ /
84a6(rgyud): de nas sems can de dag zhi ba dang / yid dang / sems bzang po dang ldan par gyur te/ bka' las mi 'da' bar byed par gyur to/ /'di lta bu'i sgra yang thos par gyur te gang
84a7(rgyud): dam tshig 'di las 'da' par byed pa de dag ni ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du mgo tshal pa brgyar 'gas par 'gyur to/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyi rlabs kyang de yin
84b1(rgyud): no| |de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas rang gi sngags kyi spyod pa'i don du chos kyi tshig smras pa/ chos gcig la yang dag par bsams na byang chub sems dpa'
84b2(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po'i sngags 'grub par 'gyur te/ gcig po gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad spros pa med pa'i rnam par rjes su mthong ba'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'
84b3(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po chos gnyis la rab tu gnas na sngags 'grub par 'gyur te/ gnyis po gang zhe na/ byang chub kyi sems mi gtong ba nyid dang / sems can thams cad
84b4(rgyud): la sems mnyam pa'o/ /chos gsum dang ldan na sngags kyi spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ gsum po gang zhe na/ sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba nyid
84b5(rgyud): dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi sdom pa srung ba dang / rang gi sngags yongs su mi gtong ba nyid do/ /chos bzhi dang yang dag par ldan na dang po sems bskyed pa'i
84b6(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa'i sngags 'grub par 'gyur te/ bzhi po gang zhe na/ rang gi sngags yongs su mi gtong pa nyid dang / gzhan gyi sngags rjes su gcod pa med pa nyid dang /
84b7(rgyud): sems can thams cad la byams pas gnas pa nyid dang / snying rje chen pos yongs su bsgos pa'i sems pa nyid do/ /chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na dang po sems bskyed
85a1(rgyud): pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sngags 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /chos lnga dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod la 'jug cing sngags kyi spyod pa
85a2(rgyud): sgrub pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ lnga po gang zhe na/ rnam par dben pa'i phyogs yang dag par bsten pa nyid dang / bas mtha' dgon pa sten par byed pa nyid dang /
85a3(rgyud): sems can gzhan la zhe sdang med pa nyid dang / 'jig rten pa'i sngags la mi lta ba nyid dang / tshul khrims dang / thos pa dang / spyod pa la gnas par byed pa nyid de/ chos
85a4(rgyud): lnga po 'di dag dang ldan na sngags spyod pa'i don 'grub cing yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /chos drug dang ldan na sngags kyi spyod pa 'grub cing yongs su rdzogs par
85a5(rgyud): 'gyur te/ drug po gang zhe na/ dkon mchog gsum la dad pa rjes su mi gcod pa nyid dang / byang chub sems dpa' la dang ba rjes su mi gcod pa nyid dang / 'jig rten dang
85a6(rgyud): 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sngags la kun tu dga' ba nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings spros pa med pa la lta ba nyid dang / theg pa chen po'i mdo sde zab mo'i tshig gi don mi
85a7(rgyud): spong zhing skyo ba med pa'i sems nyid dang / sngags kyi spyod pa yongs su btsal ba dang / dge ba'i phyogs yongs su mi gtong ba nyid de/ chos drug po 'di dag dang ldan na
85b1(rgyud): rig pa'i spyod pa dang / sngags 'grub cing yang dag par sgrub pa nyid du 'gyur ro/ /chos bdun dang ldan na rig pa sgrub pa'i dus kyi thabs thob par 'gyur zhing sngags kyi spyod
85b2(rgyud): pa la rjes su spyod pa nyid du 'gyur te/ bdun po gang zhe na/ theg pa zab mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid sgom pa dang / klog pa dang / ston pa dang / 'don du 'jug pa dang /
85b3(rgyud): 'dri ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la mos pa nyid dang / dus dang / phyogs dang / nges par sdom pa dang / bzlas pa dang / sbyin sreg dang / mi smra ba dang / dka'
85b4(rgyud): thub la gzhol ba nyid dang / rtogs pa dang / blo dang / dran pa dang / shes rab dang / bstan pa la bsnyen pa nyid dang / byang chub kyi tshogs dang / theg pa chen po dang / zab
85b5(rgyud): pa'i chos kyi tshul la yang dag par rab tu zhugs pa nyid dang / rang dga'i sngags dgug pa'i bya ba la mkhas pa nyid dang / snying rje chen po dang / byams pa chen po dang /
85b6(rgyud): btang snyoms chen po dang / dga' ba chen po nyid yongs su bsgom pa nyid dang / spros pa med pa'i sems can gyi khams kyi dbyings kyi de bzhin nyid la 'jug pa gnyis
85b7(rgyud): su med pa'i ngo bo thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su 'tshol ba nyid dang / sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba nyid dang / theg pa dman pa la dga' ba med
86a1(rgyud): pa nyid de/ chos bdun po de dag gis ni rig pa dang / sngags 'grub cing yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /chos brgyad dang ldan na rig pa dang /
86a2(rgyud): sngags kyi spyod pa'i don 'grub cing lam du 'gro bar 'gyur te/ brgyad po gang zhe na/ mthong ba dang / ma mthong pa'i 'bras bu dag la blta ba dang / sems par 'dod pa nyid dang /
86a3(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa'i 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam par 'phrul pa nyid la the tshom med cing dang pa nyid dang / phyin ci ma ldog pa'i sngags gzung ba dang / bla
86a4(rgyud): ma la gus pa nyid dang / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyi sngags dang / rgyud dang / spyod pa bstan pa mi slu ba bzung zhing bdog pa thams cad yongs su
86a5(rgyud): gtong ba nyid dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gnas dang / gnas ma yin pa rmi lam na mthong ba rab tu ston pa la mkhas pa nyid dang / ser sna dang / gnyid dang / rmugs pa
86a6(rgyud): mtha' dag dang bral bar byed cing rtag tu brtson 'grus rtsom la/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' la bdag nyid 'bul bar byed pa nyid dang / mdor bsdu
86a7(rgyud): na dge ba'i rtsa bas cho ga mi shes shing go cha chen po bgos pa dang / bgegs thams cad rab tu sel bar 'dod pa nyid dang / byang chub kyi snying po gnon ba dang / longs
86b1(rgyud): spyod chen po dang / dbang che bar grags par bdag nyid 'dod pa nyid dang / dbang che bar grags pa'i gang zag la bsnyen pa dang / dge ba'i bshes dang mi 'bral bar bya ba
86b2(rgyud): dang | byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la nye bar gnas pa nyid de/ chos brgyad po 'di dag dang ldan na sngags spyod pa'i don 'grub pa'i yang dag
86b3(rgyud): pa'i lam du 'gyur ro/ /grogs po dag mdor na/ byang chub kyi sems dang mi 'bral ba dang / dkon mchog gsum la dad pa dang / mchog tu sdug bsngal zhing tshul khrims
86b4(rgyud): nyams pa la yang mi skyo ba'i yid kyis rtag tu mngon par brtson pa la/ nga'i sngags kyi le'u rab 'byams mtha' yas shing rmad du byung ba byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rgyu
86b5(rgyud): mthun pa'i yid las byung ba 'grub par 'gyur te/ de las gzhan du shes par bya ba ma yin no/ /rnam par rtog pa med pa'i yid du byas nas nyam sad pa'i phyir yang bsgrub
86b6(rgyud): par bya ba ma yin no/ /de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos rnams kyi byin
86b7(rgyud): gyis brlabs pa dag gis 'di skad du tshig brjod par byed de/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ legs so/ /legs so/ /sngags kyi spyod pa'i don rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i bya ba chos kyi
87a1(rgyud): tshul la rjes su 'jug pa dang mthun zhing chos bstan pa legs par bstan pa ni sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir ro/ /des na 'jam dpal gzhon
87a2(rgyud): nur gyur pas chos rnam pa sna tshogs bstan pa dang rjes su mthun zhing sngags kyi spyod pa dang rjes su mthun pa legs par bstan pa nyid do/ /rgyal po chen po/ gang la la
87a3(rgyud): zhig 'dus pa'i le'u 'di klog par 'gyur ba dang / 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang / yid la byed par 'gyur ba 'am/ g.yul gyi thog mar glang po che'i steng du bzhag pa dang / me
87a4(rgyud): tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mchod par byed na de la bdag cag byin gyis rlob par byed cing phyir rgol ba dang / dgra bo dag
87a5(rgyud): kyang dbang du 'gyur la/ gzhan gyi dmag gi dpung yang gzhig par bgyi'o/ /glegs bam la bris pa byas te rang gi khyim du bzhag na/ de la rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs
87a6(rgyud): kyi bu mo 'am/ rgyal po 'am/ rgyal po chen po 'am/ rgyal mo 'am/ rgyal mo chen mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen ma dag la
87a7(rgyud): srung ba chen po dang / longs spyod chen po dang ldan pa dang / tshe ring ba nyid dang / nad med pa nyid dang / longs spyod rtag tu mngon par 'phel ba nyid kyang bgyi'o/ /de
87b1(rgyud): skad ces smras nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor cang mi smra bar gyur to/ /theg pa chen po sngags kyi spyod pa bstan pa'i cho ga zhi ba mo las/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam
87b2(rgyud): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i le'u rab 'byams rtsa ba'i cho ga zhib mo las/ 'dus ba'i le'u ste dang po'o// // de nas 'jam dpal gzhon
87b3(rgyud): nur gyur pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la bltas nas/ sems can thams cad kyi dam tshig la rjes su 'jug cing kun tu lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
87b4(rgyud): la snyoms par zhugs so/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu lte ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs nas 'od zer bye ba brgya stong du ma'i 'khor dang
87b5(rgyud): ldan pa'i 'od zer phyung ste/ sems can gyi khams thams cad kun tu snang bar byas nas slar log ste/ gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang snang bar byas nas 'khod par
87b6(rgyud): gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la smras pa/ sems can thams cad kyi dam tshig la rjes su zhugs
87b7(rgyud): pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi le'u rab 'byams kyi spyod pa sgrub pa/ sems can thams cad kyi thun mong du gyur pa/ khyod kyi sngags kyi tshogs gang du sems can yang dag
88a1(rgyud): par zhugs na 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad kyi sngags 'grub pa yang dag par thob par 'gyur bas/ sems dpa' chen
88a2(rgyud): po| khyod smros shig / smros shig /de skad ces smras pa dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po gnod sbyin gyi bdag po la/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas mchog tu gsang ba'i
88a3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi rgyud smras so/ /rig pa thams cad yang dag par bskul ba zhes bya ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa ston par byed do/ /lag pa g.yas pa bteg nas
88a4(rgyud): sor mo'i rtse mos 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la ston par byed de/ sor mo'i rtse mo de las rig pa'i rgyal po bye ba khri phrag brgya stong du ma byung ste/ gyur nas kyang gnas gtsang ma'i
88a5(rgyud): gnas kyi gzhal med khang thams cad snang ba chen pos gnas par gyur to/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed kyi snying po
88a6(rgyud): las thams cad byed pa dang / dpa' bo gcig pa dang / spyan drang pa dang / gshags su gsol ba dang / zhi ba dang / rgyas pa dang / mngon spyod dang / mi snang ba dang /
88a7(rgyud): nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / sa 'og tu 'jug pa dang / chu la mi nub par 'gro ba dang / dgug pa dang / rnam par dbye ba dang / dbang du byed pa dang / dri thams
88b1(rgyud): cad dang / phreng ba dang / mar me dag kyang rang gi rgyud kyi sngags kyis sbyin par byed de/ mdor na/ ji lta ji ltar sbyar bde lta de ltar sgrub par byed pa ni yi ge gsum zhes bya ba/
88b2(rgyud): stobs chen po don thams cad sgrub par byed pa/ khro bo'i rgyal po'i sngags smras pa/ de gang zhe na/ oM AHhUM/ 'di ni khro bo chen po de'i snying po ste/ las thams cad
88b3(rgyud): byed pa/ dkyil 'khor thams cad dang / sngags thams cad kyi spyod pa la sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal dbyangs kyis smras te/ bgegs thams cad 'jig par
88b4(rgyud): byed pa'o/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas lag pa g.yas pa bteg ste khro bo'i spyi bor bzhag pa byas so/ /'di skad du yang smras te/ sangs rgyas thams cad
88b5(rgyud): la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dgongs su gsol/ gang su dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na rnam par gnas shing mtha' yas
88b6(rgyud): mu med pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dam tshig la lhag par gnas par gyis shig / de skad smras nas khro bo'i rgyal po la lag pa bskor
88b7(rgyud): nas btang par gyur to/ /khro bo'i rgyal po chen po btang ma thag tu thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag tu song nas/ skad cig tsam gyis gang dag sdang ba'i
89a1(rgyud): bsam pa dang ldan pa'i sems can rdzu 'phrul che ba dag tshar bcad cing der bkug par gyur nas/ chos kyi dkyil 'khor chen po gnas gtsang
89a2(rgyud): ma'i gzhal med khang der yang dag par bcug ste/ gnas ji lta ba bzhin gnas par byas nas sems can ma rungs pa dag la yang kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng ba'i
89a3(rgyud): tshogs su byas shing spyi bo la yang dag par gnas par byas so/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de la yang bltas nas/ sems
89a4(rgyud): can khyed cag thams cad nyon cig / gang yang dam tshig 'di las 'das par gyur na de la khro bo'i rgyal po 'dis chad pa gcod par 'gyur te/ gang gi phyir zhe na/ sangs
89a5(rgyud): rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi dam tshig ni 'da' bar bya ba ma yin te/ sngags kyi don gyi tshig gsang ba byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa rnams kyis
89a6(rgyud): mdor bstan pa brjod par bya yi/ de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang bshad par bya'o/ /oM AHhUM/ na maHsarba bud d+hA nAM/ oM ra ra sma ra a
89a7(rgyud): pra ti ha ta shA sa na/ ku mA ra rU pa d+hA ri Ne hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ grogs po dag 'di ni rtsa ba'i sngags yin te/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal zhes bya ba yin no/ /phyag rgya
89b1(rgyud): ni gtsug phud lnga pa zhes grags te/ de la rab tu sbyar bar bya'o/ /rtsa ba'i sngags 'di ni las thams cad ba zhes bya'o/ /snying po'i sngags ni las thams cad byed cing shes
89b2(rgyud): pa yin te/ oM bA kye daM na maH/ 'dir phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni gtsug phud gsum pa zhes bya ba yin te/ longs spyod thams cad mngon par 'phel bar byed pa'o/ /'dir nye ba'i snying
89b3(rgyud): por 'gyur ba ni/ bA kye hUM/ 'dir phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni gtsug phud gsum pa zhes grags pa yin te/ sems can thams cad 'gugs par byed pa yin no/ /'dir snying po
89b4(rgyud): mchog tu 'gyur ba ni/ maM| 'dir phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni rma bya'i gdan zhes bya bar bstan pa yin te/ sems can thams cad dbang du byed pa'o/ /gzhan yang / phyag rgya
89b5(rgyud): thams cad kyi snying po dpa' bo chen po zhes bya ba yi ge brgyad yod de/ dpal mchog tu byed pa dag byed chen po/ srid pa gsum gyi chos nye bar gcod par byed pa/ ngan 'gro
89b6(rgyud): thams cad zlog par byed pa/ zhi ba thams cad byed pa/ las thams cad byed pa/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba thob par byed pa/ sangs rgyas mngon sum du mthong ba bzhin
89b7(rgyud): du nye bar gnas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa nyid bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/ sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir mchog tu gsang ba'i
90a1(rgyud): ngo bos nye bar gnas pa/ re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ gang du dran pa tsam gyis mtshams med pa lnga yang yongs su sbyong bar byed na
90a2(rgyud): bzlas pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de yang gang zhe na/ oM A bI ra hUM/ khe tsa ra/ grogs po dag /'di ni yi ge brgyad po dpa' bo chen po zhes bya ba gsang ba'i snying po'i
90a3(rgyud): bdag nyid yin te/ sangs rgyas nyid bzhin du rab tu nye bar gnas pa yin no/ /mdor na/ bya ba thams cad la yon tan gyi mtha' rgya chen po brjod par ni bskal pa bye ba
90a4(rgyud): khri phrag brgya stong du mar yang mi nus te/ 'dir phyag rgya yang stobs po che zhes rnam par grags pa/ re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'o/ /spyan drang ba'i sngags ni/ oM
90a5(rgyud): he he ku mA bi shwa rU pi NI/ sarba bA la b+hA Shi ta pra bo d+ha ne/ e h+ye hi b+ha ga bAn/ e h+ye hi ku mA ra/ kr-I Da nut+pa la d+hA ri Ne maN+Da la ma d+h+ye tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/ a pra ti
90a6(rgyud): ha ta shA sa nA nA na hUM/ mA bi laM ba ku ru phaT swA hA/ 'di ni bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gyi spyan drang ba'i sngags so/ /sangs rgyas thams cad dang / byang chub sems
90a7(rgyud): dpa' thams cad dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / 'phags pa nyan thos dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding
90b1(rgyud): dang | mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / sha za dang / srin po dang / 'byung po thams cad kyi'ang yin no/ /tsan+dan gyi chur byas te/ lan bdun sngags nas phyogs bzhi dang /
90b2(rgyud): steng dang / 'og dang / thams cad du gtor na sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa rang nyid 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad dang /
90b3(rgyud): 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad dang / sngags dang / de bzhin du 'byung po'i tshogs dang / sems can thams cad 'gugs par 'gyur ro/ /na maH
90b4(rgyud): sarba bud d+hA nAn/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAn/ oM d+hu d+hu ra d+hu ra d+hu ma bA si ni/ d+hu ma ra tsi shi hUM ti Sh+Tha sa ma ya ma nu sma ra swAhA/ bdug pa'i sngags so/ /tsan+dan dang / ga bur dang /
90b5(rgyud): gur gum gcig tu byas te/ bdug pas bdug na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / sems can thams cad bdug pas tshim
90b6(rgyud): zhing dgyes nas bzhugs par 'gyur ro/ /'dir yang phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni/ /pad+ma'i phreng ba zhes grags pa/ /thams cad 'gugs byed zhi ba yin/ /spyan drang ba yi sngags la
90b7(rgyud): yang | |pad+ma'i phreng ba bzang po zhes/ bya ba'i phyag rgya 'di nyid do/ /sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / sems can thams cad byon pa la mchod yod
91a1(rgyud): dbul bar bya ste/ ga pur dang / tsan+dan dang / gur gum chu dang sbyar nas me teg ku su dang / mA li ka dang / dbyar gyi me tog dang / me tog pu na
91a2(rgyud): nA ga dang / me tog ba ku la dang / me tog paN+DI ta ga ru 'di dag gang yang rung ba'i me tog gam/ dus ji lta ba'i me tog dri zhim po bcug ste/ sngags 'dis mchod yon
91a3(rgyud): dbul bar bya'o/ /na maHsarba bud d+hA nAM/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/ tad+ya thA/ he he mahA kA ru Ni ka bi shwa rU pa d+hA ra Ni/ ar+g+haM pra tIts+tsha pa ya/ sa ma ya ma nu smar/ tiSh+Tha
91a4(rgyud): tiSh+Tha/ maN+Da la ma d+h+ye pra be sha ya pra be sha ya/ sarba b+hu tA nu kaM pa ka gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM/ aM ba ra bi tsA ri Ni swAhA/ 'dir yang phyag rgya ni gang ba zhes bya bar grags pa sems can
91a5(rgyud): thams cad dang rjes su mthun zhing brtan pa'o/ /'dir yang dri'i sngags su 'gyur ba ni/ na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ na maHsa man+ta gan+d+ha a ba b+hA sa shri ye/ ta thA ga tA
91a6(rgyud): ya| tad+ya thA/ gan d+hA+e gan d+hA+e ga nad+h+yA de/ gan+d+ha na mor the/ pra tIts+tsha pra tIts+tsha maM/ gan+d+haM sa ma tA nu tsA ri Ni swA hA/ 'dir phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni lo ma zhes bya ba re ba thams cad
91a7(rgyud): yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /'dir me tog gi sngags su 'gyur ba ni/ na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/ na maHsaM ku su mi ta rA dza s+ya/ ta thA ga
91b1(rgyud): ta s+ya/ tad+ya thA/ ku su me ku su me ku su mA d+h+ye/ ku su ma pU ra bA si ni/ ku su ma ba ti swA hA/ bdug pa'i sngags 'di nyid dang / gong du bstan pa'i bdug pas bdug par
91b2(rgyud): bya'o| |sku ni rmad byung bsam mi khyab/ /sangs rgyas thams cad phyag 'tshal te/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa yi/ /gtor ma'i sngags ni bshad par bya/ /na maH
91b3(rgyud): sarba bud d+hA nAM/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/ tad+ya thA/ he he b+ha ga bAn/ mahA satwa sarbA ba lo ki te i maM ba liM gr-ih+Na pa ya gr-ih+Na pa ya hUM hUM/ sarba bi shwa ra ra Ta Ta phaT swA hA/ 'dir ni
91b4(rgyud): bshos dbul bar bya ste/ 'byung po thams cad kyi gtor ma yang bya'o/ /'dir phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni/ mdung zhes bya ba ma rungs pa/ /thams cad zlog par byed pa'o/ /na
91b5(rgyud): maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/ sarba ta mou0f85n+d+ha kA ra bi d+h+waM sA nAM/ na maHsa man+ta dz+yo ti gan+d+hA rba b+hA sa shri ye/ ta thA ga tA ya/ tad+ya thA/ he he b+ha ga bAn/ dz+yo ti ra smi
91b6(rgyud): sha ta sa ha sra pra ti maN+Di ta sha rI ra bi kurba bi kurba mahA bo d+hi satwa sa man+ta dz+wa lod d+yo ti ta mUrti khurda khurda/ a ba lo ka ya/ a ba lo ka ya mAn/ laM sarba/ sa twa nany+tsa swA hA/ mar
91b7(rgyud): me'i sngags te/ 'dis mar me dbul bar bya'o/ /kha bye ba zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya ni sems can kun gyis mthong ba'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/ tad+ya
92a1(rgyud): thA| dz+wA la dz+wA la/ dz+wA la ya dz+wA la ya/ hUM bi b+ho da ka ha ri kr-iSh+Na ping+ga la swA hA/ me'i bya ba byed pa'i sngags so/ /'dir yang phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni/ /sems
92a2(rgyud): can kun la 'od gsal byed/ /kha sbyar zhes byar 'jig rten grags/ /byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan gyis/ /thub pa mchog gis sngon bshad pa'o/ /de nas 'jam
92a3(rgyud): dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la smras pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ sngags kyi tshig 'di ni gsang ba dang bcas shing mchog tu
92a4(rgyud): gsang par bya ba yin te/ /khyod pu 'jig rten rnam grags pa'i/ /mi bzad pa ni gang yin pa/ /sngags rnams dag ni thams cad kyis/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis
92a5(rgyud): bsgrubs pa ste/ /spyi bo'i gdu bu zhes grags pa/ /rdo rje pad+ma'i rigs kyang yin/ /de ni rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir/ /rig pa 'di ni yang dag brjod/ /na maHsa
92a6(rgyud): man+ta bud d+hA NAM/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/ oM ka ra ka ra/ ku ru ku ru/ ma ma kAR+yaM b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/ sarba big+h+na da ha da ha sarba badzra bi nA ya kAM mur+d+ha ga TaM dzI bi tAn+ta ka ra ma hA
92a7(rgyud): bi kr-i ta rU pa d+hA ri Ni/ pa tsa pa tsa sarba duSh+TA na/ mahA ga na pa ti dzI bi tAn+ta ka ra ban d+ha ba na d+ha sarba gra hA na/ Sha Ta mu kha Sha Ta b+hu dza/ Sha Ta tsa ra Na ru dra mA na ya/ biSh+Nu ma nA/
92b1(rgyud): ya brah+ma d+ya de ba mA na ya mA bi laM ba/ la hu la hu maN+Dal ma d+h+ye pra be sha ya/ sa ma ya ma nu smar hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ 'di ni 'jam dpal
92b2(rgyud): gzhon nur gyur pa'i mchog tu gsang ba'i sngags chen po gdong drug pa zhes bya ba yin te/ khro bo'i rgyal po bgegs thams cad 'jigs par byed pa ste/ 'di brjod pa tsam
92b3(rgyud): gyis sa bcu'i dbang phyug la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang 'jigs par byed pa yin na bgegs ma rungs ba lta smos kyang ci dgos/ 'di brjod pa tsam nyid kyis
92b4(rgyud): srung ba chen po byas par 'gyur ro/ /'dir yang phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni/ nag po chen po zhes bya ba'i/ bgegs rnams thams cad zhi byed pa'o/ /'di nyid kyi khro bo'i rgyal po'i
92b5(rgyud): snying po ni/ oM hrIHSh+TiHbi kr-i tA na na hUM sarba sha trUM nA sha ya staM b+ha ya phaT phaT swA hA/ sngags 'di brjod pas dgra thams cad zug gzer chen po dang / nad chen po dang /
92b6(rgyud): nyin bzhi pa'i rims kyis thebs par 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu dga' ba med pa dang / byams pa med pa dang / snying rje'i sems thob par mi 'gyur te/ bzlas pa zin gyi bar du
92b7(rgyud): grol bar mi 'gyur zhing 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /dkon mchog gsum la gnod pa byed pa dag la bya yi/ zhi ba'i sems yod pa gzhan dag la ni ma yin no/ /phyag rgya ni rtse
93a1(rgyud): gsum chen po zhes bya ba sbyar bar bya'o/ /'dir nye ba'i snying por 'gyur ba ni/ oM tri kA la rU pa hUM khaM swA hA/ phyag rgya ni rtse gsum chen po zhes bya
93a2(rgyud): ba nyid sbyar bar bya'o/ /ma rungs pa thams cad la gang 'dod pa de byed par 'gyur ro/ /snying po'i mchog sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i yi ge
93a3(rgyud): gcig pa zhes bya'o/ /hUM| 'di ni las thams cad byed pa'o/ /phyag rgya yang rtse gsum chen po zhes bya bar sbyar bar bya'o/ /phung khrol thams cad zlog par byed pa/
93a4(rgyud): 'byung po thams cad dbang du byed pa ste/ mdor na/ khro bo'i rgyal po 'di ni las thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bzlas pa byas na grub
93a5(rgyud): pa'i dus su khyad par du 'phags par 'gyur ro/ /'dir gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags su 'gyur ba ni/ na maHsarba bud d+hA nAM/ oM pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/ tad+ya thA/
93a6(rgyud): dza ya dza ya su dza ya/ mahA kA ru Ni ka bi shwa rU pi Ni gats+tsha sarba bud d+hA sh+tsa/ bi sar+dz+dza ya sa ba bi bA raM swA b+hA ba nAM tsa pra be sha ya sa ma ya ma nu sma ra sarbA r+thA sh+tsa ma sid d+h+yan+tu man+t+ra pA
93a7(rgyud): da ma no ra thany+tsa/ me pa ri pU ra yan+tu swA hA/ 'di ni gshegs su gsol pa'i sngags te/ las thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o/ /phyag rgya ni bzang po'i gdan zhes bya ba yin
93b1(rgyud): ta| 'dis gdan la yang sbyar bar bya'o/ /yid kyis bzlas pa bdun byas te gshegs su gsol lo/ /'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor
93b2(rgyud): dang | sngags dang / sngags grub pa dag dang / dam tshig dang / bzlas pa dang / dus dang / nges par sdom pa dag la yang sbyar bar bya'o/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur
93b3(rgyud): gyur pas gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang la yang bltas te/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po dang / rang gi rig pa'i tshogs kyi sngags kyi le'u rab 'byams smras so/ /
93b4(rgyud): na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ a pra ti ha ta gA trA NAM/ oM ri Ti ni swA hA/ 'di ni 'jam dpal gyi rjes su 'brang ba sgra can ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa/ las thams cad byed pa/ phyag rgya
93b5(rgyud): chen po gtsug phud lnga zhes bya ba dug gi las thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o/ /na maHsarba bud d+hA nAM/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/ oM ni ti Te/ 'di ni nye ba'i sgra can ma zhes
93b6(rgyud): bya ba'i rig pa yin te/ las thams cad byed pa'o/ /phyag rgya ni kha bye ba zhes bya ba gza' thams cad kyi las la sbyar bar bya'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ a pra ti ha ta
93b7(rgyud): ga tI nAM/ laM ni/ rig pa 'di ni pad+ma can zhes bya ste/ las thams cad byed cing dge ba'o/ /phyag rgya bzang po'i gdan zhes bya ba dang ldan pas gnod sbyin mo nges par dgug
94a1(rgyud): par bya'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ a tsin t+yAd b+hu ta rU pI NAM/ oM Sh+Tai Sh+Tai swA hA/ /phyag rgya mdung ni bsdam pa yis/ /mkha' 'gro ma rnams
94a2(rgyud): 'joms par byed/ /sangs rgyas dag ni thams cad kyis/ /thams cad gzugs can rab bsdigs pa/ /rig pa thod can zhes bya ba/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis
94a3(rgyud): bshad pa yin/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ a pra ti ha ta tsa rI NAM/ tad+ya thA/ oM ba ra de swA hA/ /phyag rgya gtsug phud gsum nyid ni/ /dpal sbyin byed pas sbyar bar bya/ /
94a4(rgyud): gzugs mnga' 'chang ba lha ma ni/ /myur du longs spyod sgrub byed pa'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ a tsin t+yad b+hu ta rU pI NAM/ oM b+hu ru swA hA/ phyag rgya mdung rtse yang
94a5(rgyud): dag sbyar/ /rims nad thams cad rnam 'jig yin/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ a tsin t+yAd b+hu ta rU pI NAM/ oM tA re swA hA/ /rig pa phug ron zhes bya ba/ /las
94a6(rgyud): rnams kun la rab tu bsngags/ /phyag rgya mdung dang ldan pa yis/ /bgegs ni 'joms par byed pa yin/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ a tsin t+yAd b+hu ta rU pI NAM/ tad+ya
94a7(rgyud): thA| oM bi lo ki ni swA hA/ /rig pa snang ldan zhes bya ba/ /'jig rten thams cad dbang du byed/ /bde ba thams cad sbyin byed pa/ /gdong gi phyag rgya sbyar bar bya/ /na maHsa man+ta
94b1(rgyud): bud d+hA nAM/ a cin t+yAd b+hu ta rU pI NAM/ tad+ya thA/ oM bi shwe bi shwe saM b+hA be bi shwa rU pI Ni ka ha ka ha A be sha A be sha sa ma ya ma nusma ra ru ru tiSh+Tha swA hA/ /rig pa chen po stobs
94b2(rgyud): chen 'di/ /'jig rten 'dren pas bstan pa ste/ /mche ba'i phyag rgya ldan byas na/ /sems can thams cad 'bebs shing dge /'byung po kun la mchog sbyin pa/ /thams cad
94b3(rgyud): ces ni yang dag bsgrags/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ a tsin t+yAd b+hu ta rU pI NAM/ oM shwe te shrI ba su swA hA/ /rma bya'i gdan gyi phyag rgya yis/ /rnam dgod las ni thams cad byed/ /
94b4(rgyud): dkar mo chen mo zhes bya ba/ /rmad byung bsam med gzugs can te/ /'jig rten rnams kyi skal ldan byed/ /skyes pa bud med dbang du 'gyur/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ a tsin
94b5(rgyud): t+yAd b+hu ta rU pI NAM/ tad+ya thA/ oM khi khi ri khi ri b+hang gu ri sarba sha truM staM b+ha ya dzam b+ha ya mo ha ya ba sha mA na ya swA hA/ /rig pa 'di ni rig chen po/ /rnal 'byor ma zhes rab tu bstan//
94b6(rgyud): phyag rgya gdong gsum sbyar byas na/ /ma rungs sems can 'dul bar byed/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ a pra ti ha ta shAk+ti pra tsa rI NAM/ tad+ya thA/ oM shrIH/ rig pa 'di ni dpal
94b7(rgyud): chen mo/ /'jig rten mgon gyis bstan pa ste/ /phyag rgya kha sbyar sbyar byas na/ /rgyal srid chen po sbyin byed pa 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ sarba sa twA b+ha ya pra da yi nAM/ oM
95a1(rgyud): a dzi te ku mA ra rU pI Ni e h+ye hi A gats+tsha ma ma kAR+yaM ru ru swAhA/ rgyal byed ma zhes rnam grags pa/ /gzhon nu bdud rtsi las byung ba/ /rdzogs pa'i
95a2(rgyud): phyag rgya ldan pa yis/ /dgra rnams thams cad zlog par byed/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ a tsin+t+yad b+hu ta rU pI NAM/ tad+ya thA/ oM dza ye swAhA/ bi dza ye swAhA/ a dzi te swAhA/ a pa rA
95a3(rgyud): dza te swAhA/ sring mo bzhi zhes rnam grags pa/ /byang chub sems dpa'i rjes 'gro ba/ /sa rnams thams cad kun 'gro zhing / /kun la rjes su 'dzin byed pa'o/ /ming po gtum
95a4(rgyud): bu ru zhes grags/ /'di dag gi ni rjes su 'brang / /gru yi bzhon pa la zhon nas/ /rgya mtsho la ni gnas pa yin/ /khu tshur phyag rgya bcings pa yis/ /bsam pa thams cad
95a5(rgyud): yongs rdzogs byed/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ lo kA grA d+hi pa tI nAM/ tad+ya thA/ oM ku mA ra mahA ku mA ra kr-i Ta kr-i Ta/ shaM mu kha bo d+hi satwa nu dz+nyA ta/ ma yu rA sa na/ shak+tod+ya ta pA
95a6(rgyud): Ne| rak+taM ga rak+taM ga d+hA nu le pa na pr-i ya/ kha kha khA hi khA hi hUM nr-i t+ya nr-i t+ya/ rak+ta puSh+pA tsi ta mU rti sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/ b+h+ra ma b+h+ra ma/ b+h+ra ma ya b+h+ra ma ya/ lA hu lA hu ma bi lam+ba sarba
95a7(rgyud): kAr+yA Ni me ku ru ku ru/ bi tsi tra rU pa d+hA ri NI/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha hUM sarba bud d+hA nu dz+nyA ta swAhA/ skyob pa byang chub sems dpa' ni/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis bshad pa na/ /sa rnams
95b1(rgyud): ma lus rnam drug tu/ /kun nas yongs su rab tu g.yos/ /sems can kun gyi don phyir dang / /ma rungs sems can zlog pa'i phyir/ /mi bzad dbang phyug bu'i gzugs su/ /
95b2(rgyud): gdul ba'i don du 'dir skyes te/ /skem byed dang ni mig dmar gyi/ /phyag mtshan gyis ni mtshon pa ste/ /snying rjes thugs ni brlan pa yi/ /'jam pa'i ngag gis gsungs pa
95b3(rgyud): yin| |sems dpa'i nang na bdag nyid che/ /byis pa rnams la phan byed gang / /sems can spyod phyir brtson pa ni/ /'gro ba kun la rnam par spyod/ /phyag rgya mdung dang ldan pa
95b4(rgyud): yis| |bdag nyid chen pos sbyar na ni/ /tshangs pa sogs pa'ang 'gugs byed na/ /mi rnams la ni smos ci dgos/ /gzhon nu'i sems su mtha' dag ni/ /bsdus nas
95b5(rgyud): yongs su bshad par bya/ /smin drug bu dang 'jam dpal gyi/ /sngags su 'di ni yang dag bstan/ /sems can rjes su gzung ba'i phyir/ /byang chub sems dpar 'di
95b6(rgyud): ston to/ /yig gsum zhes bya'i snying po ni/ /'di yi sngags su brjod pa yin/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /longs spyod 'dren pa'i mchog de yin/ /phyag rgya
95b7(rgyud): mdung dang ldan pa yis/ /bkod na las kun byed pa yin/ /oM hUM dz+dzaH/sngags ni 'di ru bsdu byas na/ /mi rnams kyi ni don byed do/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ sa man+ta d+yo ti
96a1(rgyud): ta murtI nAM/ oM bi kr-i ta gra ha hUM phaT swA hA/ /'di yang nye ba'i snying po ste/ /de bzhin phyag rgya mdung ldan pas/ /'byung po thams cad 'gugs
96a2(rgyud): byed cing / /de bzhin gza' dang ma mor bcas/ /phyag rgya kun gyis phyag rgyal/ /bkod na 'bras bur bcas par 'gyur/ /'byung po rnams ni dngangs byed cing / /ma
96a3(rgyud): rungs 'jug pa zlog par byed/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di'i gdong drug gi pu zhes bya ba'i 'jam dpal gzhon nu'i rjes su 'brang ba ste/ las thams cad
96a4(rgyud): byed pa ste/ bzlas pa tsam kho nas las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /'byung po thams cad dngangs par byed pa dang / skrag par byed pa dang / 'gugs par byed pa
96a5(rgyud): dang | dbang du byed pa dang / sgom par byed pa dang / 'jig par byed pa dang / rig pa 'dzin pa ji ltar 'dod pa de thams cad sgrub par byed pa'o/ /na maHsa man+ta
96a6(rgyud): bud d+hA nAM/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/ tad+ya thA/ oM brah+ma brah+ma ba ra tsas shAn+ting ku ru swA hA/ /sngags 'di tshangs pa chen po ste/ /byang chub sems dpas bshad pa
96a7(rgyud): yin| |'byung pos zhi gyur rab tu thob/ /skad cig nyid la bsil bar gyur/ /phyag rgya gcug phud lnga sbyar na/ /myur du dge legs thob par 'gyur/ /mngon spyod dag ni
96b1(rgyud): thams cad la/ /sring srung gi ni rig byed 'dod/ /'di ni mdor bsdu bstan pa ste/ /'di yi chog bsdus pa yin/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/ tad+ya
96b2(rgyud): thA| oM ga ru Da bA ha na tsa kri pA Ni/ tsa tur+b+hu dza hUM hUM sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/ bod+hi satwa A dz+nyA ba ya ti swA hA/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis bka' stsal pa/ /zhi ba'i don ni myur byed yin/ /
96b3(rgyud): 'byung po rnams ni rnam 'jig cing / /khyab 'jug gzugs kyi lus can yin/ /phyag rgya gtsug phud gsum sbyar na/ /las rnams kun byed brtan po yin/ /gang dag khyab
96b4(rgyud): 'jug rgyud las ni/ /bya ba rgya cher bstan pa dag /thabs kyis gdul bya'i sems can la/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis bshad pa yin/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ a pra ti ha ta
96b5(rgyud): shA sa nA nAM/ tad+ya thA/ oM ma hA ma he shwa ra b+hu tA d+hi pa ti pr-i Sha b+ha d+h+wa dza pra laM ba ja TA dza Ta mu ku Ta d+hA ri Ne/ si ta b+hasma d+hu sa ri ta mUrti hUM hUM phaT phaT/ bo d+hi satwA dz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/
96b6(rgyud): sems can rnams la phan 'dod pas/ /sngags 'di bdag gis smras pa ste/ /phyag rgya mdung rtse gsum sbyar na/ /'byung po thams cad rnam 'jig pa'o/ /bdag gis sngon
96b7(rgyud): ni gang bstan pa/ /'di yi cho ga sngon byung ba/ /sems can sa steng gnas pa la/ /zhib pa zhes brjod pa ste/ /yon tan sna tshogs rgya che ba/ /zhi ba'i rgyud las pa yis
97a1(rgyud): bstan/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/ tad+ya thA/ oM shA ku na ma hA shA ku na/ pad+ma bi dA ta pak+Sha sarba pAM nA ga nA shA ga kha kha khA hi
97a2(rgyud): khA hi sa ma ya ma nu sma ra hUM tiSh+Tha po d+hi satwa a dz+nyA pa ya ta swA hA/ /sngags 'di mthu ni chen po ste/ /nam mkha' lding zhes rnam par grags/ /gdul dka' 'dul byed rnams
97a3(rgyud): kyi mchog / gdengs ka can gyi dug rnams 'joms/ /phyag rgya che dang sbyar byas na/ /phung khrol shin tu mi bzad 'joms/ /gnas dang 'gro ba'i dug dag ni/ /gso
97a4(rgyud): bar byed par the tshom med/ /sems can gdul ba'i thabs su ni/ /byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag dka'/ /nam mkha' lding gzugs la spyod/ /'dab chags
97a5(rgyud): dbang po 'od chen ldan/ /ji srid nam mkha' lding rgyud du/ /cho ga rgya cher bstan de dag /sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir/ /thams cad nga yis bstan pa ste/ /byang
97a6(rgyud): sems dpa' nam mkha' lding / /gdul ba'i don du 'di bstan to/ /gdengs can dug ni gzhom bya'i phyir/ /'dab chags tshul gyis rnam par rgyu/ /'jig rten sngags
97a7(rgyud): ni ji srid pa/ /cho ga 'di ni bstan pa na/ /sems can gdul bya'i don du ni/ /de lta de ltar rnam par rgyu/ /gang yang de bzhin gshegs sngags dang / /rdo rje pad+ma'i rigs
97b1(rgyud): dag kyang / /nga yis cho ga rab 'byams dang / /mdo dag kyang ni bstan pa yin/ /ji ltar ma mo mang po ni/ /'bad pas byis pa rnam srung ba/ /de bzhin byis pa blo can la/ /sngags
97b2(rgyud): kyi tshul gyi nga yis bshad/ /sngon ni stobs bcu ldan pas bstan/ /da ni nga yis bstan pa yin/ /sngags rgyud don ni ma lus pa/ /'od chen gzhon nus bstan pa yin/ /rgyal
97b3(rgyud): ba mchog gis gang gsungs dang / /stobs bcu ldan pa'i sras gsungs dang / /rmad byung bsam mi khyab tshul gyis/ /'jam dbyangs kyis gsungs de dag go /de nas
97b4(rgyud): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po la gzigs nas dam tshig yang
97b5(rgyud): dag par bskul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /gang du ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa na sems can mtha' dag gi sgrub pa'i spyod pa sems
97b6(rgyud): la rab tu zhugs par gyur to/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu thams cad dang ldan pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang nor bu
97b7(rgyud): rin po che sna tshogs pa'i rgyan bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor du gyur te/ bsam gyis mi khyab cing rmad du byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rang sangs rgyas thams
98a1(rgyud): cad dang / 'phags pa nyan thos dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la zhugs pa dang / sa bcu'i dbang phyug la gnas pa dag gis kyang
98a2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor de bri ba 'am/ 'dri 'jug par mi nus na so so'i skye bor gyur pa'i sems can gyis lta smos kyang ci dgos/ 'phags pa'i dkyil 'khor bzang po de
98a3(rgyud): grub pa'i gnas skabs la gnas pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas gzigs nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad dang / rang sangs rgyas thams
98a4(rgyud): cad dang / 'phags pa nyan thos thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu la rab tu gnas pa/ rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur ba thams cad dang / spyod pa la
98a5(rgyud): zhugs pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa thams cad 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis sangs rgyas dang / byang chub
98a6(rgyud): sems dpa'i mdzad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyu mthun pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par gyi thugs las byung ba'i dkyil 'khor la zhugs par bdag nyid kyis
98a7(rgyud): yang dag par shes par gyur to/ /sems can so so'i skye bo'i yid kyis kyang de dmigs par mi nus na bri ba 'am/ 'dir 'jug pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de nas
98b1(rgyud): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas dkyil 'khor chen po bzang po de la rab tu zhugs pa'i sems can de dag la smras pa/ grogs po dag nyon cig 'di ni de bzhin
98b2(rgyud): gshegs pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis 'da' bar bya ba ma yin na/ sems can gzhan 'phags pa dang / 'phags pa ma yin pa rnams kyis
98b3(rgyud): lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ mi las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor
98b4(rgyud): dam pa yid las byung ba ni bstan to/ /mi rnams kyi dkyil 'khor bstan par bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'das na'ang / sems can rnams
98b5(rgyud): gang du yang dag par zhugs na/ 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sngags thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes
98b6(rgyud): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la smras pa/ rgyal ba'i sras/ gang de dus la bab par shes na gsungs shig /gsungs shig /shAkya seng+ge mgon po ni/ /yongs su mya
98b7(rgyud): ngan 'das 'og na/ /sems can rnams kyi sangs rgyas nyid/ /sa steng khyod kyi dkyil 'khor byed/ /mthong ba tsam gyis 'jig rten na/ /sngags ni rab tu 'grub par 'gyur/ /mi
99a1(rgyud): shes cho ga nyams pa 'am/ /dam tshig bdag por ma gyur na/ /bdag nyid chen po tshangs pa yang / /sngags rnams 'grub par mi 'gyur ro/ /
99a2(rgyud): sngags la dad pa med pas ni/ /'bad pa du ma byas gyur kyang / /sngags rnams 'grub par mi 'gyur pas/ /ma rungs dam tshig mi bstan to/ /dam tshig sbyor ba
99a3(rgyud): nyams pa ni/ /rab 'byams brgya byin yin na yang / /sngags rnams 'grub par mi 'gyur na/ /mi rnams smos kyang ci zhig dgos/ /dam tshig bstan bcos de nyid
99a4(rgyud): shes| |las kyi spyod pa sgrub pa la/ /'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa yi/ /sngags rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor
99a5(rgyud): ni| |las kun byed la rab zhugs na/ /bstan pa la ni gzhon nu bzhin/ /sngags rnams 'grub par 'gyur ba yin/ /de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na
99a6(rgyud): rdo rjes sems dpa' chen po de la gsol ba btab pa/ kye sems can chen po/ sems can gyi don gyi phyir mdor bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor gsungs shig ces so/ /
99a7(rgyud): gsang ba pa'i bdag pos de skad ces smras pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas sems can gyi don gyi phyir dkyil 'khor gyi chog smras pa/ re zhig dang po cho 'phrul
99b1(rgyud): gyi zla phyed dam/ dbyid zla 'bring po 'am/ dpyid zla tha chungs sam/ zla ba yar ngo 'am/ nyin zhag dge ba dang / gza' bzang po bltas te/ rgyu skar bzang po dang ldan pa yar
99b2(rgyud): ngo'i tshes gcig dang / zla ba nya ba 'am/ dus gzhan la dbyar gyi dus spangs la/ snga dro sa byin gyis brlab par bya ste/ gang du grong khyer chen po la brten pa 'am/ dkyil 'khor
99b3(rgyud): gyi slob dpon rang nyid 'dug par bya'o/ /rgya mtsho chen por 'jug pa'i gnas sam/ rgya mtsho'i ngogs dang nye ba'i grong khyer chen po'i byang shar gyi phyogs su ha cang yang mi ring
99b4(rgyud): ha cang yang mi nye bar dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon song ste/ lo ma'i spyil bu byas pa la zhag bdun nam/ zla ba phyed kyi bar du gcig pu rab tu gnas par bya ste/ gang gnas de
99b5(rgyud): dag tu yang gtsang ma'i sa phyogs rdo ba med pa/ gyo mo dang / thal ba dang / sol pa dang / phub ma dang / rus pa spangs pa/ shin tu gtsang ba/ shin tu yongs su sbyangs
99b6(rgyud): pa'i sa phyogs su srog chags med pa'i chu la ba'i rnam lnga 'am/ tsan+dan dang / ga bur dang / gur gum gyi chus bsres pa/ khro bo gshin rje gshed kyi sngags stong rtsa brgyad
99b7(rgyud): bzlas te/ gtsug phud lnga'i phyag rgya chen po dang ldan pas sa phyogs der phyogs bzhi dang / steng dang / 'og dang / thad ka dang / phyogs mtshams thams cad du bsang
100a1(rgyud): gtor bya'o/ /de nas phyogs der kun nas gru bzhir khru bcu drug gam/ khru bcu gnyis sam/ khru brgyad pa byas te/ de la chen po khru bcu drug
100a2(rgyud): pa'o| |'bring ni khru bcu gnyis pa'o/ /chung ngu ni khru brgyad pa'o/ /dkyil 'khor 'di ni rnam pa gsum/ /thams cad gzigs pas gsungs pa yin/ /rgyal po 'dod
100a3(rgyud): pas chen po ste/ /'bring ni longs spyod 'phel byed pa/ /chung ngus dam tshig yang dag srung / /las rnams kun byed zhi ba yin/ /de dag las yid la gang 'dod pa'i
100a4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor bri ba ni de la sa phyogs der khru do tsam brkos la/ der rdo ba dang / sol ba dang / thal ba dang / rus pa dang / skra la sogs pa dang / srog chags kyi rigs
100a5(rgyud): rnam pa sna tshogs gal te mthong na sa'i phyogs gzhan du brko ba byas na gnod pa med pa dang / 'tshe ba med par 'gyur ro/ /ri bo'i rtse mo dang / chu bo'i ngogs dang /
100a6(rgyud): rgya mtsho'i 'gram dang / chu bo chen po'i ngogs su bye ma'i phung po chen po rnams 'bad pas shin tu so sor brtags te/ shin tu gtsang ba dang / srog chags med
100a7(rgyud): par byas la bri bar bya'o/ /sa phyogs de yang srog chags med pa'i chu la ba'i rnam pa lnga bsres te/ chu bo'i klung gi sa gtsang ma 'am/ grog mkhar gyi sa gang du
100b1(rgyud): srog chags med pa'i sa des dgang bar bya'o/ /bkang nas kyang legs par brdungs te kun nas mnyam par byas la dkyil 'khor rnam pa gsum gang 'dod par bya'o//
100b2(rgyud): seng ldeng gi phur pa bzhi la khro bo'i rgyal po'i sngags lan bdun bzla zhing phyogs bzhir gdab bo/ /tshon sna lnga'i skud pa la khro bo'i snying po lan bdun bzlas pa byas te/
100b3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor phyogs bzhi kun nas bskor bar bya'o/ /de bzhin du dbus kyi gnas su nang du yang zur bzhir bya'o/ /dbus na gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis
100b4(rgyud): rang gi rig pa rtsa ba'i sngags stong rtsa brgyad bzla bar bya'o/ /gtsug phud lnga'i phyag rgya chen po bcings nas rtsa ba'i sngags kyis grogs po dang / bdag nyid bsrung bar byas
100b5(rgyud): la| sngags zlo bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol tu byung ste/ dkyil 'khor de la g.yas su bskor ba byas nas kha shar phyogs su bltas te ku sha'i stan la 'dug par
100b6(rgyud): bya'o| |sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yid la byas te/ dkyil 'khor de'i gru bzhi kun tu ku shas bskor zhing dgram par bya'o/ /de nyid kyi phyi rol tu
100b7(rgyud): yang pa rnams zhag gcig gnas pas bsnyal zhing dbyung bar bya'o/ /de la dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis sngon du bya ba rnams byas nas rang gi rgyud kyi sngags la mkha'
101a1(rgyud): pa dang / sems can gyi don gyi thabs kyi phyir theg pa chen po la mos pa dang / zhag gcig smyung bar byas pa dang / grogs bzang po dang ldan pa
101a2(rgyud): dang | bstan bcos sna tshogs kyi las mthong bas tshon sna lnga'i phye ma zhib mo shin tu gsal zhing legs par sbyar ba byas la/ yi ge drug pa'i snying po mngon par bzlas
101a3(rgyud): pa'i phye ma dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gzhag par bya'o/ /phyi rol tu yang rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bsgreng ba dang / rta babs bzhis brgyan pa/ chu shing 'bras bu'i tshogs
101a4(rgyud): kyis g.yur za ba dang / rnga bo che dang / rdza rnga brdung ba dang / dung gi sgra dang / dga' ba dang / bkra shis pa'i sgra sgrogs pa dag bya'o/ /zur bzhi nas chos mnyan pa dag la
101a5(rgyud): bshad par bya'o/ /phyogs bzhir theg pa chen po'i mdo sde bklag par bya ba la/ 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lho phyogs su
101a6(rgyud): bklag par bya'o/ /'phags pa zla ba sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin nub phyogs su bklag par bya'o/ /'phags pa sdong po brgyan pa byang phyogs su bklag par bya'o/ /'phags pa
101a7(rgyud): gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde shar phyogs su bklag par bya'o/ /glegs bam dag med na mdo sde bzhi po shes pa'i gang zag chos 'chad pa po la chos mnyan pa'i phyir bskul
101b1(rgyud): bar bya'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon langs nas tsan+dan dang / ga bur dang / gur gum bsres pa'i me tog dri zhim pa dkar po la rtsa ba'i sngags bzlas te/ dkyil 'khor
101b2(rgyud): de thams cad du chal par dgram par bya'o/ /mngon par bkram pa byas nas phyi rol tu byung ste/ zhag bdun gyi bar du 'dod pa'i kha zas bsten pa'i ri mo mkhan gnyis sam/
101b3(rgyud): gsum byang chub tu sems bskyed pa/ gso sbyong nye bar bsten pa/ mkhas pa dag bcug ste/ rtsa ba'i sngags kyis gtsug phud bcing ba byas la/ de nas gser dang /
101b4(rgyud): dngul dang / zangs dang / rin po che rnams pa sna tshogs las tshon sna lnga shin tu mdzes pa yid du 'ong ba'i phye ma zhib mo rab tu blangs te/ longs spyod chen po dang ldan pa dang /
101b5(rgyud): chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal po dag 'drir gzhug pa byas na/ dkyil 'khor mthong ba tsam gyis nges par byang chub 'thob pa yin na/ sngags sgrub par byed pa lta smos kyang
101b6(rgyud): ci dgos/ /shAkya'i skyes mchog 'das gyur nas/ /sems can bsod nams chung ba la/ /'di 'dra'i longs spyod ga la yod/ /de bas chog 'di bstan bya/ /'jam dbyangs
101b7(rgyud): 'od chen ldan pa yis/ /skye bo phongs par gzigs nas ni/ /nyung zhing dkyil bsdus dkyil 'khor ni/ /mdor bsdus nas ni bstan pa yin/ /'bras sA lu dang / thug po che'i
102a1(rgyud): phye ma shin tu zhib pa'i tshon sna lnga bzang po/ dkar ba dang / ser ba dang / dmar ba dang / nag po dang / ljang gu dag gis bsgyur te/ sngar bzhag
102a2(rgyud): pa'i tshon gyi phye ma slob dpon rang gis blangs nas gtsug phud lnga'i phyag rgya chen po bcings te/ rtsa ba'i sngags kyi bzlas pa byas nas phye ma de la phyag rgya bcing ngo / /sgrub
102a3(rgyud): pa'i grogs mchog gi slob dpon gyis dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol shar lho mtshams kyi phyogs su cho ga mthong ba'i las kyis thab khung bya ste/ rgyar khru do la zabs su khru
102a4(rgyud): gang pa/ kun nas 'khor bar pad+ma'i ze ba 'dra ba/ phyi rol yang pad+ma'i ze ba 'dra ba/ shing pa la sha'i yam shing gis me sbar bar bya/ shing bil ba'i yam shing
102a5(rgyud): mtho gang tsam rlon pa la zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar la btags pa la rtsa ba'i sngags 'bru drug pa'am/ snying pos khu tshur gyi phyag rgya bcings te me lha spyan drang bar
102a6(rgyud): bya'o| |spyan drangs nas sngar bstan pa nyid kyi rtsa ba'i sngags kyi yi ge gcig pa'i snying pos phyir yang brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon
102a7(rgyud): gyis cod pan dang / 'tshog chas byas nas bdag nyid dang / ri mo mkhan yang rtse gcig par byas nas sbyin sreg byed du gzhug go /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon
102b1(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams yid la bya ste/ sngar bstan pa'i bdug pas bdugs nas thal mo sbyar nas/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la rab
102b2(rgyud): tu btud nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la yang phyag byas te/ tshon gyi phye ma blangs nas sku'i gzugs kyi sa bcad pa la ri mo mkhan gyi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /
102b3(rgyud): chog 'di dag gis dang por sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa nyid rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa/ seng+ge'i khri la bzhugs pa gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal
102b4(rgyud): med khang na chos ston cing bzhugs pa bri bar bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon ri mo 'dri ba na 'dir sgrub pa'i grogs mchog gis slob dpon bdag nyid bsrung ba'i phyir
102b5(rgyud): rtsa ba'i sngags kyis 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma gtang bar bya ste/ phyi rol gyi phyogs bzhi dang / steng dang / 'og dag tu gtor bar bya'o/ /de nas khrus byas te thab
102b6(rgyud): khung du nye bar song nas gos gtsang ma gos te/ gtsang sbra dang / srung ba'i chog byas nas gur gum dang bsres pa'i mar gyi sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad bya'o/ /de nas ku
102b7(rgyud): sha'i khres la 'dug nas bzlas pa bya ste/ de nyid du gnas par bya'o/ /yungs kar la khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed kyi sngags brgya rtsa brgyad kyis mngon par sngags
103a1(rgyud): la kham por kha sbyar gyi nang du gzhag par bya'o/ /bgegs kyi rnam pa 'jigs su rung ba'i gzugs can mi bzad pa'i sgra rnam pa du ma rlung dang /
103a2(rgyud): char dang / yul ngan gzhan dang / gzhan gang yang rung ba mthong na/ khros pa yungs kar chang par bcangs te/ lan bdun sbyin sreg byas pa des ni bgegs rab
103a3(rgyud): tu 'joms par 'gyur ro/ /mi'i bgegs la ni lan lnga tshang ba nas sbyin sreg byas na skyes bu de rengs par 'gyur ba 'am/ nus pa med par 'gyur ba'am/ 'chi bar
103a4(rgyud): 'gyur ba'am/ skad cig de nyid la mi ma yin pas zin par 'gyur ba la nams kyang the tshom med de/ brgya byin yang 'chi bar byed na ma rungs pa'i sems dang ldan
103a5(rgyud): pa'i mi'am/ bgegs tha mal pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ khro bo gshin rje gshed kyis 'jigs pas bgegs rnams phan tshun du 'bros shing mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /
103a6(rgyud): de nas sgrub pa'i grogs mchog gis de nyid du ku sha'i khres la gnas nas/ khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed kyi bzlas pa byed cing gnas par bya'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor
103a7(rgyud): gyi slong dpon gyis bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sku gzugs kyi g.yas ngos su rang sangs rgyas nyid pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs par bya'o/ /de gnyis kyi 'og tu nyan thos
103b1(rgyud): chen po gnyis chos nyan par bya'o/ /de dag gi yar g.yas su bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ ston ka'i 'dam
103b2(rgyud): bu'i mdog ltar dkar ba/ pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa/ phyag g.yon pa na pad+ma bsnams pa/ phyag g.yas pa mchog sbyin pa/ de'i yang g.yas na bcom ldan 'das yum
103b3(rgyud): gos dkar mo/ phyag g.yon pa na pad+ma bsnams pa/ phyag g.yas pas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal ba/ pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa/ phyag gser gyi
103b4(rgyud): cod pan 'chang ba/ der la dkar po'i na bza' mnabs pa/ thal ba nag pos thig le gsum byas pa/ de bzhin du sgrol ma dang / khro gnyer can yang rang rang gi gnas su spyod
103b5(rgyud): lam dag gis gnas par bya'o/ /de dag gi steng du ni bcom ldan 'das yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan dang / gtsug tor gyi rgyal mo
103b6(rgyud): rnams bya'o/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' bcu drug bya ba la/ 'di lta ste/ kun tu bzang po dang / sa'i snying po dang / nam mkha' mdzod dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam
103b7(rgyud): par sel ba dang / ngan song rnam par sbyong ba dang / byams pa rnga yab lag na thogs shing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / dri ma med par 'gro ba dang / dri ma med
104a1(rgyud): pa'i tog dang / nor bzang dang / zla ba'i 'od dang / dri ma med par grags pa dang / nang thams cad gso bar byed pa dang / chos thams cad kyi dbang
104a2(rgyud): phyug gi rgyal po dang / 'jig rten 'gro ba dang / blo chen po dang / blo bzang po ste/ sems dpa' chen po 'di dag ni lus shin tu zhi ba dang / rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bri
104a3(rgyud): par bya'o/ /rig pa'i rgyal po'i gtso bo dang / rig pa'i rgyal mo dang / pad+ma'i rigs gzugs dang / phyag rgya lung ji lta ba bzhin gnas ji lta ba ma lus pa dag tu bri bar bya'o/ /
104a4(rgyud): mtha'i gru bzhi'i gnas dag tu ni gnas rnams gzhag par bya'o/ /pad+ma'i me tog legs par byas pa dang / rig pa'i lha gang dran pa yang de dag tu gzhag par bya'o/ /de
104a5(rgyud): bzhin du lho phyogs su bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa dang / 'di sangs rgyas gnyis ni ri spos kyi ngad ldang ba la bzhugs pa bri bar bya'o/ /de bzhin du dkyil 'khor
104a6(rgyud): gyi shar du bdag nyid blta ba dang / thams cad la yang 'jug pa'i sgo rnams bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i g.yon phyogs su rang sangs rgyas gzhan
104a7(rgyud): gnyis te/ tsan+dan dang / grub ba zhes bya ba gnyis bri bar bya'o/ /de gnyis kyi 'og tu nyan thos gnyis ni 'od srung chen po dang / kA t+yA ya na bri bar bya'o/ /de dag gi yang
104b1(rgyud): g.yon du 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje ut+pa la ltar mdog sngo bsangs gzugs shin tu mdzes pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ lag pa g.yas pa na rnga yab thogs pa/ g.yon
104b2(rgyud): pa khro bo'i lus kyis gnas pa/ rdo rje khu tshur ma/ rdo rje lcags kyu ma/ rdo rje lu gu rgyud ma/ dpung bzang ma/ rdo rje sde ma cha byad ji lta ba bzhin du bgegs kyi gdan la gnas pa/
104b3(rgyud): rig pa'i rgyal po thams cad dang / rig pa'i rgyal mo 'khor dang bcas pa bzlas pa dang / phyag rgya dang ldan pa ji ltar shes pa bzhin bri bar bya'o/ /de dag gi yang g.yon
104b4(rgyud): du zur bzhir sna tshogs rdo rje'i phyag rgya bri bar bya'o/ /bris nas kyang gnas gang du rig pa'i tshogs ma dran pa'i gnas de dag kyang bzhugs shig ces brjod par bya'o/ /de'i
104b5(rgyud): steng du pha rol du phyin pa drug dang / bcom ldan 'das yum mA ma kI bri bar bya ste/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ gzugs shin tu mdzes par bya'o/ /de dag gi steng du
104b6(rgyud): gtsug tor gyi rgyal po brgyad kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng ba'i phyag rgya bcings nas rang rang dag gis 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po chen po'i gzugs su bri bar bya ste/ gser
104b7(rgyud): gyi mdog can dbang po shin tu dul la rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa la zur gyis lta ba dag la/ 'di lta ste/ gtsug tor 'khor los bsgyur ba dang /
105a1(rgyud): gtsug tor mngon par 'phags pa dang / gtsug tor gdugs dkar po dang / rgyal ba'i gtsug tor dang / pad+ma'i gtsug tor dang / rnam par rgyal ba'i
105a2(rgyud): gtsug tor dang / gzi brjid phung po'i gtsug tor dang / gtsug tor mthon po ste brgyad po 'di dag ni gtsug tor gyi rgyal po rnams so/ /g.yon du bri ba ni rang sangs rgyas rnams
105a3(rgyud): so| |'jug pa'i phyogs kyi sgor ni byang chub sems dpa' gnyis bya ste/ g.yas phyogs su ni 'jig rten las 'das par 'gro ba zhes bya ba ral ba'i cod pan 'chang
105a4(rgyud): ba| lus zhi ba/ lag pa g.yas pa mchog sbyin pas phreng ba 'dzin pa/ lag pa g.yon pas spyi blugs 'dzin cing sgo la mngon du phyogs pa/ bzhin cung zad khro gnyer
105a5(rgyud): dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o/ /'jug pa'i sgo'i g.yon phyogs su ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po ma rgyal ba las rgyal ba zhes bya ba bri bar bya ste/ lus rab tu zhi ba/ ral
105a6(rgyud): pa'i cod pan 'chang ba/ lag pa g.yon pa na dbyig pa dang / spyi blugs 'dzin pa/ lag pa g.yas pa na mchog sbyin pas phreng ba 'dzin pa/ bzhin cung zad khro gnyer dang
105a7(rgyud): ldan pa sgo la mngon par phyogs pa bri'o/ /seng+ge'i khri'i 'og tu chos kyi 'khor lo kun tu 'bar bas khyab pa/ de'i 'og tu rin po che'i gzhal med khang de la gnas pa/
105b1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba/ gzhon nu'i gzugs can sku mdog dmar skya/ zhi ba'i gzugs dang / mdzes pa'i gzugs
105b2(rgyud): can| cung zad zhal 'dzum pa/ phyag g.yon pa na ut+pa la sngon po bsnams pa/ phyag g.yas pa ni bil ba bsnams pa/ byis pa'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ gtsug
105b3(rgyud): phud lngas nye bar mdzes par gyur pa/ mu tig gi phreng bas mchod phyir thogs pa/ dar la'i stod g.yogs mnabs pa/ dar gyi na bzas smad g.yogs mdzad pa/ 'od kun
105b4(rgyud): nas 'phro ba/ 'bar ba'i phreng bas kun nas khyab pa/ pad+ma'i gdan la nye bar bzhugs pa/ khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje'i gshed la gzigs pa/ dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i
105b5(rgyud): sgo la mngon du phyogs pa/ blta na sdug pa bri bar bya'o/ /de'i g.yas phyogs kyi ngos kyi pad+ma'i 'og tu khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje'i gshed bri bar bya ste/ mi sdug pa chen
105b6(rgyud): po'i gzugs can/ kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab pa/ bka' len cing 'dzin pa/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i phyogs su lta ba'o/ /g.yon phyogs kyi pad+ma'i
105b7(rgyud): 'og tu gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu gzugs can/ byang chub sems dpa' lnga bri bar bya ba la/ 'di lta ste/ shin tu dri med dang / shin tu dul ba dang / dag pa dang /
106a1(rgyud): mun sel dang / kun tu snang ba'o/ /de dag thams cad kyang gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang na 'dug pa/ rin po che du ma 'bar ba'i rdo'i
106a2(rgyud): steng dang 'dra ba kun nas 'bar ba/ me tog sna tshogs kyis gcal bkram pa/ shin tu mdzes pa bri bar bya'o/ /phyi rol khor yug tu zur bzhi'i rnam par byas te/ rta
106a3(rgyud): babs bzhi dang ldan pa/ phyogs bzhi nas rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i tshon sna lngas gsal bas ri mo shin tu drang ba dang ldan pa nang gi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o/ /shar
106a4(rgyud): g yi bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i steng du ri mo'i dbus su me tog kun nas skyes pa'i rgyal po'i dbang pos pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i
106a5(rgyud): gzugs cung zad chung bar bya'o/ /'od kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab pa/ mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya dang ldan pa/ skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/ de'i g.yas su
106a6(rgyud): gtsug tor 'khor los bsgyur ba'i phyag rgya bri bar bya'o/ /g.yon du ni gzi brjid phung po'i phyag rgya bri bar bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan gyi steng du ni shes rab kyi
106a7(rgyud): pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyag rgya bri bar bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'phags ba spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi steng dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyag rgya'i g.yas
106b1(rgyud): su bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag tu med pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs can bya ste/ phyag rgya mchog sbyin pa/ pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa/ kun nas 'od 'bar ba'i
106b2(rgyud): phreng bas khyab pa/ de'i yang g.yas phyogs su lhung bzed dang / chos gos kyi phyag rgya'o/ /de bzhin du mthar gyis 'jug pa'i gnas la ni pad+ma'i phyag rgya bya'o/ /bcom ldan
106b3(rgyud): 'das me tog yang dag par skyes pa'i rgyal po'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa'i g.yon phyogs su gcug tor gzi brjid phung po'i phyag rgya bri ste/ kun nas 'od 'bar
106b4(rgyud): ba'i phreng bas khyab pa/ de'i g.yon phyogs su de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog bya ste/ rin po che'i ri bo'i steng du chos ston cing bzhugs pa/ bai DUR+ya sngon po dang / marga
106b5(rgyud): dang | pad+ma rA ga rnam pa sna tshogs 'bar ba'i 'od 'phro ba'i kun nas 'od dang ldan pa bri bar bya'o/ /de'i yang g.yon phyogs su rgyal ba'i gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya kun nas
106b6(rgyud): 'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab pa bri'o/ /de'i yang g.yon phyogs su chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya kun nas 'bar ba dang ldan pa bri'o/ /de'i yang g.yon phyogs su 'khar gsil
106b7(rgyud): dang | sbyi blugs dang / phreng ba dang / bzang po'i gdan gyi phyag rgya bri'o/ /mthar gyis sgo'i gnas su rdo rje rtse gsum pa gnyi ga la yang kun nas 'bar ba bri'o/ /bcom ldan
107a1(rgyud): 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i 'og tu phyag rgya chen po gtsug phud lnga zhes bya ba dang / ut+pa la'i phyag rgya kun nas 'bar ba 'di gnyis
107a2(rgyud): phan tshun 'brel ba bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor kun nas sgo bri bar bya'o/ /sgo dag ni rgyab kyis lta ba dang / 'jug pa na ni mdun gyis blta bar bya'o/ /phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor thams
107a3(rgyud): du 'gyur ba yang kha dog lnga'i tshon shin tu gsal ba/ sna tshogs blta na sdug pa/ zur bzhis rnam par 'byes pa/ rta babs bzhi'i rnam pa phyogs bzhir khru gnyis
107a4(rgyud): tsam| nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol gyi shar phyogs su tshangs pa chen po bri bar bya ste/ gdong bzhi pa/ gos dkar po bgos pa la stod g.yogs gos dkar po dang /
107a5(rgyud): tshangs skud dkar po thogs pa/ kha dog gser 'dra ba/ ral pa'i cod pan 'dzin pa/ lag na dbyug pa dang / spyi blugs 'dzin pa/ de'i g.yas phyogs su 'od gsal gyi
107a6(rgyud): lha'i bu bya ste/ mdog gser 'dra ba/ bsam gtan khyad par can gyi gzugs can/ dar la'i gos bgos pa/ dar la'i stod g.yogs byas pa/ bzhin shin tu
107a7(rgyud): gsal ba/ ral pa'i cod pan 'dzin pa/ mchod phyir thogs dkar po can/ skyil mo krung gis 'dug pa/ lag pa g.yas pas mchog sbyin pa/ de'i g.yas phyogs
107b1(rgyud): su 'og min gyi lha'i bu bya ste/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ lus rab tu zhi ba/ bsam gtan gyi rnam pa'i cha byad can/ dar la'i gos bgos pa/ dar la'i gos kyi stod
107b2(rgyud): g.yogs byas pa/ skyil mo krung gis 'dug pa/ lag pa g.yas pas mchog sbyin pa/ mchod phyir thogs dkar pos byas pa/ de'i rim gyis dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga'
107b3(rgyud): dang | gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / 'thab bral dang / brgya byin la sogs pa'i lha'i bu bri bar bya ste/ go rims ji lta ba dang / cha byad dang / dbyibs ji lta ba bzhin du'o/ /
107b4(rgyud): brgya byin gyi 'og tu rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris la rtag tu myos dang / phreng thogs dang / lag na gzhong thogs dang / pi wang gnyis pa dang / sa bla'i lha'i bu dag go rims ji
107b5(rgyud): lta ba dang / cha byad ji lta ba bzhin du bri bar bya'o/ /de bzhin du lho phyogs su mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / dge chung dang / bsod
107b6(rgyud): nams skyes la sogs pa'i lha'i pu cha byad dang / dbyibs ji lta ba bzhin bri bar bya'o/ /nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs su yang de bzhin te/ de dag ni rim pa 'og ma
107b7(rgyud): gnyis la brten te bri bar bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor gnyis kyi phyi rol tu dkyil 'khor gsum par 'gyur ba la mthar gyis phyogs bzhi'i rgyal po chen po bzhi ste/ byang phyogs nas
108a1(rgyud): 'jug pa'i g.yas ngos su gter nye bar gnas pa la gnod spyin rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ gtsug phud cung zad 'dud pa/ gnod spyin gyi
108a2(rgyud): gzugs can/ de'i g.yas su nor bu bzang po dang / gang ba bzang po gnod spyin gyi bdag po gnyis bri'o/ /de bzhin du mthar gyis gnod spyin mo chen mo 'phrog ma yang
108a3(rgyud): bri'o| |de bzhin du mthar gyis nub phyogs su chu lha lag na zhags pa thogs pa dang / klu dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo dang / 'jog po dang / nor rgyas la sogs pa klu'i
108a4(rgyud): rgyal po chen po brgyad po bri'o/ /de bzhin du rim pa gnyis la gnas pa'i mthar gyis gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / drang srong
108a5(rgyud): dang | grub pa dang / yi dwags dang / sha za dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa la sogs pa dang / sman dang / nor bu rin po che'i bye brag dang / ri dang /
108a6(rgyud): chu bo dang / gling dang / mthar gyis gtso bo thams cad bri bar bya'o/ /lho phyogs su ni gshin rje ma mo bdun gyi 'khor dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o/ /shar lho mtshams
108a7(rgyud): su me kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab pa/ dbyug pa dang / spyi blugs dang / phreng ba lag na thogs pa/ ral ba'i cod pan 'dzin pa/ gos dkar po bgos pa/ dar
108b1(rgyud): la'i stod g.yogs byas pa/ mchod phyir thogs dkar po thogs pa/ mdog gser 'dra ba/ thal ba'i thig le gsum byas pa/ de bzhin du rgyan dang / mtshon cha dang / cha byad
108b2(rgyud): dang | dbyibs dang / kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs pa rim pa gnyis pa la brten te bri bar bya'o/ /thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i sgo'i phyi rol tu dka' zlog gi bdag po
108b3(rgyud): khyu mchog la zhon pa/ lag na mdung rtse gsum thogs pa/ lha mo dka' zlog ma kha dog sna tshogs pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ smin drug gi bu rma bya'i stan la 'dug pa/
108b4(rgyud): mdud thogs pa/ gzhon nu'i gzugs can/ gdong drug pa/ lus dmar por snang ba/ gos ser po bgos pa/ gos ser bo'i stod g.yogs can/ lag pa g.yon pa na dril
108b5(rgyud): bu dang / ba dan dmar po thogs pa/ mthar gyis b+h+r-ing gi ri ti shin tu ring pa 'dri ba dang / tshogs kyi bdag po chen po dang / dga' byed dbang phyug dang / nag po chen po dang /
108b6(rgyud): ma mo bdun po rgyan dang / mtshon cha dang / kha dog dang / dbyibs ji lta ba bzhin bri bar bya'o/ /nor lha brgyad dang / drang srod bdun dang / khyab 'jug lag pa bzhi na 'khor
108b7(rgyud): lo dang / dung dang / ga dA dang / ral gri thogs pa/ gdan nam mkha' lding rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ gza' brgyad dang / rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa bdun dang / gang yang nye ba'i
109a1(rgyud): gza' brgyad sa steng gi dkyil 'khor na rab tu rgyu ba yang bri bar bya'o/ /mthar gyis tshes grangs bco lnga dang / yar ngo dang / mar ngo'i phyogs dang /
109a2(rgyud): khyim bcu gnyis dang / dus drug dang / zla ba bcu gnyis dang / lo tshigs dang / sring mo bzhi gru la zhon pa dang / ming po lnga gru la zhon cing tshul gnas pa ste/ mdor na
109a3(rgyud): phyag rgyar gzhag par bya ba yang yin no/ /lha mo de dag mthar gyis rim pa gnyis pa la brten te bya ba yin no/ /slob dpon bdag nyid phyi rol tu byung nas dkyil 'khor
109a4(rgyud): de la g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te/ mdor na dkyil 'khor gsum yang dkyil 'khor gsum la brten cing bri bar bya ste/ dkyil 'khor gsum char yang gru
109a5(rgyud): bzhir rnam par gnas par bya ba yin no/ /mdor na/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams kyi mgon po ni nges par bri bar bya'o/ /pad+ma'i rigs
109a6(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kyang nges par bri bar bya'o/ /rdo rje'i rigs 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje'ang nges par bri bar bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams
109a7(rgyud): kyi gtso bo 'phags pa kun tu bzang po'ang nges par bri bar bya'o/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa yang nges par bri bar bya'o/ /lhag ma rnams ni ji ltar rnam par gzhag
109b1(rgyud): pa bzhin phyag rgya bri bar bya'o/ /'di ni nang gi dkyil 'khor ro/ /dkyil 'khor bar ma la yang shar phyogs su ni mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa bri bar bya'o/ /de bzhin du 'od
109b2(rgyud): gsal ba ni lho phyogs su'o/ /'og min gyi gzugs can rnams lha'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par ro/ /'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched kyi bar ni brjod par mi
109b3(rgyud): bya'o| |byang phyogs su brgya byin lha'i rgyal po dang / rab 'thab bral dang / yongs su dga' ldan dang / rab 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / 'od chung la sogs
109b4(rgyud): pa'i lha'i bu rnams nges par lha'i rgyal po re re bya'o/ /lhag ma rnams ni phyag rgyar gnas par bya'o/ /de bzhin du dkyil 'khor gsum par yang byang phyogs su 'byung po'i bdag
109b5(rgyud): po dbang ldan dka' thub zlog ma dang bcas pa nges par bri'o/ /'jam dpal gyi sgo gnyis pa'i sgo'i drung du ni smin drug gi bu rma bya'i stan yod pa/ lag na mdung thogs pa/
109b6(rgyud): lus kyi kha dog dmar pa/ gos ser pos stod g.yogs dang / gos byas pa/ lag pa g.yas pa na dril bu dang / ba dan thogs pa/ gzhon nu'i gzugs can 'khor la
109b7(rgyud): lta ba'o/ /shar phyogs su ni nam mkha' lding 'dab chags kyi gzugs can dang / drang srong gi nang nas mar kaN+Da nges par bri bar bya'o/ /lhag ma ni ji ltar gnas pa
110a1(rgyud): bzhin phyag rgyar bri bar bya'o/ /shar lhor ni gzhon nu ma bzhi dang / ming po gzhon nu dang bcas pa/ gru'i bzhon pa la gnas pa/ rgya mtsho chen
110a2(rgyud): po la rnam par rgyu ba dang / me lha'i rgyal po yang nges par bri bar bya'o/ /de bzhin du lho phyogs su ni srin po'i bdag po las ni grong khyer lang ka'i bdag po bi b+hi sha na
110a3(rgyud): shing pi tsu marda la gnas pa dang / dzam+b+ha la chu dbang zhes bya ba gnod sbyin gyi gzugs can byang chub sems dpa' nges par bri bar bya'o/ /de bzhin du mthar gyis
110a4(rgyud): gshin rje'i rgyal po yi dwags rdzu 'phrul chen po nges par bri bar bya'o/ /de bzhin du sha za'i rgyal po rnam par g.yengs byed ces bya ba nges par bri bar bya'o/ /lhag ma ni ji
110a5(rgyud): ltar gnas pa bzhin phyag rgyar bri rar bya'o/ /de bzhin du lho nub kyi mtshams su ni klu'i gtso bo dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo nges par bri bar bya'o/ /gza'i gtso bo nyi ma bri
110a6(rgyud): bar bya'o/ /nub phyogs su ni drang srong thub pa'i mchog gcar bu pa mu stegs kyi mchog gcer bu'i gzugs bri bar bya'o/ /lhag ma ni ji ltar gnas pa bzhin phyag rgyar
110a7(rgyud): bri bar bya'o/ /nub byang mtshams su ni gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po mchog sbyin dang / dri za'i rgyal po gtsug phud lnga pa dang / mi'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa nges par bri bar bya'o/ /
110b1(rgyud): lhag ma ni gnas ji lta ba dang / dbyibs ji lta ba bzhin du phyag rgyar bri bar bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor bzhi pa byi rol tu ri mo lngar bkod de/ phyag rgya'i phreng bas nye bar mdzes par byas
110b2(rgyud): pa| zur bzhi nas rta babs bzhi dang / rgyal po chen po bzhis brgyan pa/ ji ltar gnas pa la/ 'di lta ste/ phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni sgor 'jug pa la ut+pa la sngon po bri'o/ /g.yas
110b3(rgyud): dang | g.yon gyi phyogs su ni pad+ma/ rdo rje/ dgra sta/ ral gri /mdung dang / mdung rtse gsum pa dang / ga dA dang / 'khor lo dang / sra sti ka dang / bum pa dang / nya dang / dung
110b4(rgyud): dang | gdub kor dang / spyi blugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / zhags pa dang / dril bu dang / chu gri dang / gzhu dang / tho ba dang / 'di dag rnam pa 'di dag 'dra
110b5(rgyud): ba'i mtshon cha'i mchog gi phyag rgyas dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs su kun nas khyab par bya'o/ /de nas phyi rol gyi phyogs bzhir rgya mtsho chen po gzhag par bya ste/ byang phyogs su ni
110b6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gru bzhir bya ste/ sna tshogs rdo rje rtse gsum yod pa kun nas 'bar ba bya'o/ /shar phyogs su ni dkyil 'khor gzhu'i dbyibs can byas te bzhag la kun nas 'bar
110b7(rgyud): ba'i pad+ma'i phyag rgyas mtshan pa'o/ /lho phyogs su ni dkyil 'khor zur gsum pa byas te/ kun nas 'bar ba'i lhung bzed kyis mtshan pa'o/ /nub phyogs su ni dkyil 'khor
111a1(rgyud): kun nas zlum por byas te/ ut+pa la sngon po sdong bu dang / 'dab ma dang bcas pa kun nas 'bar bas mtshan pa'o/ /phyogs mtshams bzhir yang
111a2(rgyud): phyag rgya bri bar bya ba yin te/ nub byang gi phyogs su ni dkyil 'khor zlum po bya ste/ zhags pa kun nas 'bar bas mtshan pa'o/ /lho nub kyi mtshams su ni dkyil 'khor
111a3(rgyud): gzhu 'dra ba bya ste/ dbyug pa kun nas 'bar bas mtshan pa'o/ /shar lho'i mtshams su ni dkyil 'khor gru gsum pa bya ste/ dgra sta 'od zer kun nas 'bar bas mtshan
111a4(rgyud): pa'o| |byang shar gyi mtshams su ni ral gri 'od kun nas 'bar ba gzhag par bya'o/ /de ltar thams cad bris nas steng dang / 'og dang / thang kar phyag rgya gsum dkyil
111a5(rgyud): 'khor gyi phyi rol sgo dang nye bar phye ma dang bri bar bya la/ 'di lta ste/ na bza' dang / rnga yab dang / lha mo 'od zer kun nas 'bar ba bri bar bya'o/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs ni blo
111a6(rgyud): can gyis/ /sems can rnams la phan bzhed nas/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni cho ga rnams/ /'dir ni mdor bsdus bstan pa yin/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon
111a7(rgyud): gyis dang po nyid du slob ma gzung bar bya ba la/ dbang po ma tshang ba med pa dang / yan lag thams cad mdzes pa dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang
111b1(rgyud): dmangs rigs dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / theg pa chen por zhugs pa'i rang bzhin can dang / theg pa dman pa'i 'dod pa'i ngang tshul can dang / sems dpa'
111b2(rgyud): chen po dang / dad pa dang ldan pa dang / dge ba'i chos can dang / rgyal po chen po mngon par 'dod pa dang / longs spyod chung ba la smod pa dang / longs spyod chen po mngon par
111b3(rgyud): 'dod pa dang / ldan pa dang / bzang ba dag dang / dul ba dang ldan pa dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma
111b4(rgyud): rnams yang dag par sdom pa la nges par gnas pa dang / gso sbyong la nye bar gnas shing sdom pa la gnas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po la zhe mi sdang ba dang / phyogs
111b5(rgyud): chen po dang / rigs mthon po dang / rang bzhin nyid kyis chos spyod pa dang / zhag gcig smyung ba byas pa dang / gos gtsang ma bgos pa dang / skra dri zhim pa dang / dus gsum
111b6(rgyud): du khrus byed pa dang / de'i nyin zhag la ga pur dang / gur gum dang / li shi'i dri zhim pos dri zhim par byas pa/ rtag tu nye reg dang ldan pa dang / ku sha'i khres la 'dug pa dang /
111b7(rgyud): srung ba'i cho ga byas pa dang / tshangs par spyod pa dang / bden pa dang ldan pa dang / dus mtshams las rgyal ba dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol de nyid du ha cang yang mi nye/ ha cang yang
112a1(rgyud): mi ring bar gzhag par bya'o/ /shin tu gtsang ba dang / shin tu gtsang sbra dang ldan pa gcig nas brgyad kyi bar te/ de las gzhan ma yin pa de dag kyang
112a2(rgyud): phan tshun gnyen du 'brel ba/ rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po chen po dag gi bu gzhon nu ma'am/ gzhon nu grong gi chos mi shes pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir
112a3(rgyud): zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das gzhon nu'i gzugs can byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal ni byis pa'i skye bo dga' bar byed pa/ gzhon nu'i rol pa la dgyes pa des na/
112a4(rgyud): dang po nyid du gzhon nu nang du gzhug par bya'o/ /rgyal po chen po mngon par 'phel ba dang / tshe dang / nad med pa dang / dbang phyug dang / skal ba chen po mngon par
112a5(rgyud): 'phel ba yin te/ khyad par du byis pa rnams la nges par sngags grub pas grub pa gnas pa yin te/ de dag sngar gzhag pa byas nas grogs po bag yod pa bzang po
112a6(rgyud): dang ldan pas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis ga pur gyi bdug pas bdugs te/ rgyab kyis phyogs pa ma yin pas phyi rol tu byung bar bya ste/ byung nas dus dang /
112a7(rgyud): ji ltar mthun pa'i chu legs par gtsang sbra byas pa dang / srog chags med pa la rtsa ba'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bzlas te/ gtsug phud lnga'i phyag rgya chen pos
112b1(rgyud): phyag rgyar byas pa'i chus khrus byas la nye reg byas nas gos gtsang ma bgos pa'i gtsang bas me thab kyi drung du song ste/ ku sha'i khres la 'dug nas byang shar gyi phyogs su
112b2(rgyud): mngon par bltas te/ mar gyi sbyin sreg ga pur dang / gur gum dang / tsan+dan bsres pas stong rtsa brgyad bya'o/ /sngar bshad pa'i chogs spyan drang ba dang / gshegs
112b3(rgyud): su gsol ba bya ste/ yang dkyil 'khor du 'jug par bya'o/ /nges par yang bum pa gang ba brgyad ras gtsang ma'i gos dang ldan pa/ shing a mra'i lo ma dang / 'bras bu
112b4(rgyud): dang ldan pa/ gser dang / dngul dang / rin po che dang / 'bras dang / 'bru nang du bcug pa gcig bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la dbul lo/ /gnyis pa ni sangs rgyas
112b5(rgyud): thams cad la'o/ /gsum pa ni rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / 'phags pa nyan thos la'o/ /bzhi pa ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po thams cad la'o/ /lnga pa ni byang
112b6(rgyud): chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa 'jam dpal la'o/ /drug pa ni lha thams cad la'o /bdun pa dang / brgyad pa ni dkyil 'khor gnyis pa'i sgo khang la gzhag
112b7(rgyud): par bya ste/ gcig ni 'byung po thams cad la'o/ /gcig ni sems can thams cad kyi thun mong du gyur bar bsngos nas gzhag par bya'o/ /de bas na sngar bshad pa'i cho
113a1(rgyud): gas spyan drang bar bya'o/ /de bzhin du me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / mar me dang / lha bshos kyang sngar bstan pa nyid kyi las kyis
113a2(rgyud): dbul bar bya ste/ thams cad kyi thams cad du go rims bzhin du bya'o/ /mar me 'dzin pas mar gyi mar me gzung bar bya'o/ /'phags pa dang / 'phags pa ma yin
113a3(rgyud): pa thams cad la lha bshos zhes smos pa ni 'bras sA lu'i chan zho dang bcas pa dang / sbrang rtsi dang ldan pa'i 'o thug khyad par can gyis nye bar sbyar ba'i mar la btsos
113a4(rgyud): pa'i snum khur gyis 'breng bu la sogs pa dang / khaN+Da la sogs pa'i bza' ba thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la dbul bar bya'o/ /mar gyis gang ba
113a5(rgyud): dang | tsan+dan gyi thang chu sbrang rtsi'i snying po dang / 'o mar btsos pa'i bza' ba ni rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / 'phags pa nyan thos dang / byang chub sems dpa'
113a6(rgyud): chen po dang / 'phags pa'i lha thams cad la dbul bar bya'o/ /de bzhin du gar+b+hod u lo pi ka ri ka dang / khyad par du snum khur gyi yo byad 'byung po thams cad dang /
