113a7(rgyud): sems can thams cad la sngags dang ldan pa'i chogs sbyin par bya'o/ /de bzhin du me tog dri zhim pa sna ma'i me tog dang / rgya spos dang / klu'i me tog dang / me tog bun
113b1(rgyud): nA ga la sogs pa sngar bstan pa sangs rgyas dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / 'phags pa nyan thos dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po dang / 'phags pa dang /
113b2(rgyud): 'phags pa ma yin pa'i lha rnams la dbul bar bya'o/ /khyad par du de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la ni sna ma'i me tog dang / pad+ma'i rigs la ni me tog pad+ma dang / de bzhin du
113b3(rgyud): rdo rje'i rigs la ni me tog ut+pa la dang / lha gzhan dag la ni gzhan gang yang rung bas dbul bar bya'o/ /ga bur gyi bdug pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la'o/ /tsan+dan ni
113b4(rgyud): pad+ma'i rigs la'o/ /de bzhin du gu gul ni gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la shes par bya'o/ /lha gzhan thams cad ni bdug pa tha ma la bas bya'o/ /mar gyi mar me
113b5(rgyud): 'phags pa rnams/ /thams cad la ni dbul bar bya/ /'phags min lha ni thams cad la/ dri zhim 'bru mar dbul bar bya/ /cho ga ji bzhin rim pas ni/ /bdug pa mthong
113b6(rgyud): ba'i rgyu yis so/ /de ltar gsungs pa de bzhin dri/ /sngags rnams kun la rtag tu bya/ /spyan ras gzigs la gang gsungs dang / /gang gsungs phyag na rdo rje la/ /rang rang gi ni
113b7(rgyud): sngags dag gis/ /sngags spyod don du sgrub pa'o/ /cho ga gcig bu blta bya ste/ /rtag tu rjes su mthun par bya/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis sngar mthong ba'i cho
114a1(rgyud): gas spyan drang ba dang / mchod pa dang / bdug pa la sogs pa byas nas gtsor mthun pa'i bya ba byas te/ de'i 'og tu sgrub pa'i grogs mchog gis
114a2(rgyud): mkhas pa dang / myur bas 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma sha med pa/ kun nas rnga pa Ta ha dang / dung gi sgra dga' ba'i sgra sgrogs pa la sogs pa des bdug pa dang /
114a3(rgyud): spos dang / me tog dang / phreng bas brgyan pa'i phyogs bzhi/ mtshams brgyad/ steng dang / 'og dang / thad ka thams cad du dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol tu bskor ba bya zhing 'byung
114a4(rgyud): po thams cad pa'i gtor ma rgya cher gtong bar bya'o/ /de nas khrus byas te yang zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis bsgos pa'i sA lu dang / 'bras thug po che'i sbyin sreg rtsa ba'i
114a5(rgyud): sngags yi ge drug pa dang / snying pos stong rtsa brgyad bya'o/ /sbyin sreg byas nas dkyil 'khor la rjes su bcug cing sngar bzhag pa'i sems dpa' chen po la srung ba byas
114a6(rgyud): nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyi slob ma nyid du khas blangs pa/ byang chub tu sems bskyed pa/ gso sbyong byas pa/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' la bdag nyid
114a7(rgyud): kyi lus phul ba/ dngos grub kyi phyir sems can thams cad kyi nye bar longs spyod pa dang / yongs su longs spyod pa thun mong du gyur pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bla na med pa'i byang
114b1(rgyud): chub kyi snying po gnon par bya ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi sangs rgyas thob par bya ba la dkyil 'khor bstan par bya'o/ /bstan ba tsam nyid kyis sdig pa'i rnyog pa
114b2(rgyud): thams cad las grol bar 'gyur te/ mtshams med pa lnga byed pa'i skye bo yang de ma thag tu grol bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis ras ma nyams pa thag
114b3(rgyud): mas btags ma thags pa skra med pa la rtsa ba'i sngags kyis lan gsum bzlas te/ dri zhim po'i tsan+dan dang / gur gum gyis bsgos pa'i ras kyi gdong g.yogs par bya'o/ /dang
114b4(rgyud): por byis pa lo gsum nas lo bcu drug pa'i bar zur phud lngas nye bar mdzes pa'am/ gtsug phud gcig gis nye bar mdzes pa'am/ gtsug phud kyis nye bar mdzes ba skra dang
114b5(rgyud): ldan pa/ rgyal po'i bu spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'am/ rgyal rigs kyi bu'am/ gzhan bdag nyid chen po rgyal po chen po 'dod pa dkyil 'khor du gzhug par bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor gnyis
114b6(rgyud): pa la phyin pa na gdong g.yogs par bya ste/ ut+pa la'i phyag rgya bcings nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rtsa ba'i sngags lan gcig brjod du gzhug ste/ me tog dri zhim po
114b7(rgyud): tsan+dan dang / gur gum dang bsres pa shin tu gtsang ba byas pa/ lag pa gnyis su byin la me tog 'dor du bzhug go /gang du de'i me tog babs pa der de'i sngags sbyin par bya
115a1(rgyud): ste| sngags 'di ni de'i yin par bstan te/ skye ba brgyud pa nas de dang rjes su 'brel ba yin te/ de nyid dge ba'i bshes gnyen byang chub kyi snying
115a2(rgyud): po la gnon pa/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs pa'i don du mngon par sgrub par byed pa/ longs spyod chen po dang /
115a3(rgyud): rgyal po chen po dang / grags pa chen po dang / gang zag rtse gcig par mngon par sgrub pa yin no/ /tshe 'di nyid la'ang chos thams cad la the tshom med par bsgrub par bya
115a4(rgyud): ba 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du mthar gyis dngos grub 'dod pas brgya snyed kyi bar du bya ste/ gzhan la ni ma yin no/ /gzhan dag la ji ltar sdig pa spang ba'i phyir
115a5(rgyud): dam tshig tsam sbyin par bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis dbang bskur na dang por re zhig dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol ha cang yang mi nye/ ha cang yang mi ring bar byang
115a6(rgyud): shar gyis phyogs su rtsa ba'i sngags kyis dag par byas pas byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /rgyal po dbang bskur ba bzhin du bdag nyid sems pa dang / gcig tu
115a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la dad cing dang ba dang / spro ba chen po dang ldan pa dang / byang chub kyi sems dang mi 'bral ba dang / theg pa chen po la zhugs pa
115b1(rgyud): dang | dkon mchog gsum la phan par byed pa dang / dbang po mtshang ba med pa dang / ma smad pa dang / tshe 'di nyid la sngags 'grub par 'dod pa dang / bsam pa bzang ba dang /
115b2(rgyud): sngags kyi spyod pa la spro ba dang / blta bar 'dod pa'i rang bzhin can dang / sad par 'dod pa'i phyir yang sngags kyi don pa rnam par rtog pa med pa dang / der gtod pa'i yid
115b3(rgyud): dang | gcig la sogs pa nas lnga'i bar du dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /lhag ma ni spang bar bya'o/ /shes rab can dang / spyod pa la rmongs pa med pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa la dbang
115b4(rgyud): bskur bar bya yi/ gzhan dag ni ma yin no/ /de nas rgyal po thams cad bskur ba bzhin du yo byad thams cad bsogs te/ slob dpon mkhan po mnyes na/ de nas bla re chen po
115b5(rgyud): bres te/ rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan mthon po bsgreng zhing / gdugs dkar po dbu la 'dzin pa dang / rnga yab dkar pos g.yob pa dang / bkur sti chen pos dung dang / rnga bo
115b6(rgyud): che'i dga' ba'i sgra sgrogs shing rgyal ba'i sgra dang / bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa dang / bde legs dang / rab tu bsngags pa'i tshigs su bcad pa rgyal bas gsungs pas
115b7(rgyud): mngon par bstod pa dang / dkyil 'khor de la bskor ba byas te/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' la phyag byas nas/ 'di skad du/ slob dpon/ bdag ni sangs rgyas
116a1(rgyud): dang | byang chub sems dpa'i sngags kyi spyod pa sgrub pa la yang dag par 'jug pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i
116a2(rgyud): gsang pa'i rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor la yang dag par 'jug pa dang / chos kyi rgyal srid thams cad kyi sangs rgyas nyid rtogs par 'dod pa dang / mdor na/ sangs
116a3(rgyud): rgyas nyid du 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir ro zhes brjod par bya'o/ /de nas ku sha'i khres la 'dug ste/ shar gyi phyogs su phyogs te dkyil 'khor la blta zhing / dang por re zhig
116a4(rgyud): rig pa'i dbang bskur ba byin te/ phyag rgya chen po gtsug phud lnga 'ching du gzhug par bya'o/ /de nas rang 'dod pa'i sngags gang dang / gang la dga' ba gro ga'i 'dab ma la gi
116a5(rgyud): wang gis bri bar bya ste/ bris nas kyang tsan+dan dang / gur gum gyi chus lag pa dang / kham por kha sbyar bkrus la/ de nas gro ga'i 'dab ma de kham phor kha sbyar gyi nang du
116a6(rgyud): gzhag par byas pa dkyil 'khor gyi nang du byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyi zhabs drung du gzhag par bya'o/ /de nas ku sha de la gnas nas rig pa'i rtsa ba'i
116a7(rgyud): sngags brgya rtsa brgyad snga ma nyid du bzla bar bya'o/ /de nas ku sha'i khres la 'dug pa la dbang bskur bar bya ste/ phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor la gang sems can thams cad
116b1(rgyud): dang thun mong du gyur pa'i bum pa gang ba sgo dang nye bar sngar bzhag pa blangs te/ slob dpon gyis rtsa ba'i sngags brjod pas spyi bo nas dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /gzhan dag la ni
116b2(rgyud): ji ltar 'dod pa'i chus so/ /de nas kham por kha sbyar de de la sbyin par bya ste/ mar me la klog tu gzhug par bya'o/ /gal te de nyid yin na ni rim gyis 'bad pas 'grub par
116b3(rgyud): 'gyur ro/ /yang na ji ste gzhan na ni sngags bzlas pa kho nas 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /yang na yi ge'i yan lag nyams ba'am/ lhag pa byin na ni dang po sgrub pa kho na la
116b4(rgyud): 'grub par the tshom med do/ /de ltar slob dpon gyis sngar bris pa'i sgrub pa gsum gyis nges par 'grub par the tshom med do/ /de bzhin du dang pos ni rig pa'i dbang bskur
116b5(rgyud): ba sbyin par bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor gnyis pa la dbang bskur ba ni gnyis pa'i dkyil 'khor du lha thams cad la bstabs pa'i sngar gyi bum pa des dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /spyi
116b6(rgyud): po la sngar gyi cho ga ji lta ba de nyid kyis byas na sdig pa'i rnyog pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis gnang zhing / sangs rgyas
116b7(rgyud): dang | byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad kyi dam tshig dang / dkyil 'khro dang / sngags dang / phyag rgya thams
117a1(rgyud): cad sgrub pa la byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur zhing slob dpon du dbang bskur ba sbyin no/ /dkyil 'khor gsum pa la ni rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /
117a2(rgyud): nyan thos thams cad la phul ba'i bum pa gang ba de nyid kyi cho gas spyi bo nas dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul chen po dang
117a3(rgyud): ldan pa thams cad kyis 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad kyi sngags rgyud dag 'don pa dang / dkyil 'khor bri ba dang / ston pa dang / phyag rgya dang /
117a4(rgyud): spyod pa ston pa dang / rang nyid spyod cing ston par khyod la rjes su gnang zhing brjod par bya ba yang tshe 'di nyid la yin la/ phyi nas skye ba brgyud pa dag la ni sangs rgyas nyid
117a5(rgyud): thob par 'gyur ba yin no/ /de bzhin du rgyal ba dang / rnam par rgyal ba'i dbang bskur ba yang sngar bstan pa'i chogs sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la sngar phul
117a6(rgyud): ba'i bum pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' la phul ba'i bum pa gang bas kyang de bzhin du dbang bskur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad dang / byang chub
117a7(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po dang / nyan thos rnams kyis kyang de bzhin du brjod par bya zhing khyod la rjes su gnang ba yin no/ /'byung po thams cad kyis rab tu thub par dka' zhing
117b1(rgyud): lus can thams cad kyis mi pham pa dang / sngags pa thams cad las khyod rgyal ba dang / ji ltar 'dod pa sgrubs shig pa'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis re re la
117b2(rgyud): yang ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du dbang bskur ba lnga sbyin par bya'o/ /sems can rnams la yang lnga po nyid kyis bya'o/ /de dag mthar gyis dkyil 'khor la bcug ste/ sangs
117b3(rgyud): rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bdag nyid phul nas dkyil 'khor la bskor ba lan gsum byas te slar gtang bar bya'o/ /de las gzhan pa'i nyin zhag
117b4(rgyud): la mthar gyis sngags kyi spyod pa la bslab par bya zhing sbyar bar bya'o/ /skad cig de nyid la bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur
117b5(rgyud): gyur pa la sngar phul ba'i bum pa gang ba blangs nas dkyil 'khor du zhugs ba de dag la chu khyor ba gsum shar du mngon par blta bar bya ba la blud par bya'o/ /'di skad du
117b6(rgyud): brjod par bya ste/ kye/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i gsang ba'i dam tshig las 'das par gyur nas/ bsod nams ma yin pa mang po skye bar
117b7(rgyud): ma byed cig / sngags thams cad kyang 'dor bar ma byed cig /sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dag kyang slu bar ma byed cig /bla ma mnyes par gyis shig /gzhan
118a1(rgyud): du dam tshig las 'das par gyur na sngags 'grub par mi 'gyur zhing bsod nams ma yin pa mang po 'gyur ro zhes de ltar smras la gtang bar bya'o/ /
118a2(rgyud): de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis kyang zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pa'i sA lu dang / 'bras thugs po che'i sreg blugs gyis yi ge brgyad pa'i snying po
118a3(rgyud): dang | sbyin sreg bya'o/ /de nas langs nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su zhugs te/ sngar bstan pa'i me tog gis sder bstan pa'i chogs lha thams cad yid la bya ste/
118a4(rgyud): mchod yon dbul lo/ /bdug pas sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos thams cad dang / lha
118a5(rgyud): dang | klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / dri za dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / srin po dang / sha za dang / 'byung po dang / rnal 'byor pa
118a6(rgyud): dang | grub pa dang / drang srong rnams dang / sems can thams cad yang dag par bdug nas me tog gtor te/ tsan+dan dang / gur gum gyis bsangs la sngar
118a7(rgyud): bstan pa'i chogs slar gshegs su gsol bar bya ste/ sems kyis thams cad gtang ba yin no/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis bshos dang / gtor ma
118b1(rgyud): dang / sa tshon thams cad chu bor dor bar bya ba 'am/ srog chags sdug bsngal ba rnams la sbyin par bya'o/ /sa phyogs de legs par byugs shing 'jam par byas te/
118b2(rgyud): legs par phyag pa byas nas ba lang gi lci bas byug tu gzhug pa'am/ chus byug par bya ba 'am/ shin tu gtsang ba'i sas byug pa'am/ bye mas gtor bar byas la/ de nas ji
118b3(rgyud): ltar 'dod par 'gro bar bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor la zhugs pa des bdag nyid 'o ma dang / 'bras zan gyi zas sam/ lha la dbul ba'i kha zas bza' bar bya'o/ /byang chub sems
118b4(rgyud): dpa'i sde snod cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po'i dbang po las/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa byang chub sems dpa'i le'u rab 'byams las/ dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga
118b5(rgyud): bstan pa ste/ le'u gnyis pa rdzogs so// //de nas/ gzhan yang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang gi 'khor gyi dkyil
118b6(rgyud): 'khor chen po 'dus pa la gzigs nas/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag btsal te/ yi ge gcig pa mchog tu gsang ba/ dug thams cad
118b7(rgyud): 'joms par byed pa/ las thams cad byed pa/ sngags dang / dkyil 'khor chung ngu sgrub pa'i thabs dang / las phran tshegs thams cad la nye bar sbyar bar bya ba smras so/ /
119a1(rgyud): de yang gang zhe na/ na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ tad+ya thA/ oM dza/ grogs po dag /'di ni 'byung po thams cad nyon cig /sngags 'di nyid ni yi ge gcig gi
119a2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gnyis pa'i cho ga thams cad du dgos pa/ khru brgyad dam/ khru bzhi sa'i phyogs yang dag par byas la/ tshon sna lnga'i phye mas rang nyid kyis bri bar bya ste/ gzhan
119a3(rgyud): gyis ni ma yin te/ gang de dang / de dag tu'ang 'dir ni nges pa med do/ /dkyil 'khor gru bzhi mnyam pos nye bar mdzes pa/ gtsug phud lnga'i phyag rgya chen po dang por re zhig
119a4(rgyud): bri'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i ut+pa la'i phyag rgya dang / mche ba'i phyag rgya dang / zhal gyi phyag rgya dang / dbug pa'i phyag rgya ste/ phyag rgya 'di
119a5(rgyud): dag dkyil 'khor gyi nang du shar gyi char bri bar bya'o/ /de nas pad+ma dang / rdo rje dang / ut+pa la dang phyag mtshan dang / ba dan dang / gdugs dang / rta babs dang / shing
119a6(rgyud): rta dang / glang po che dang / rta dang / glang dang / ma he dang / swa sti ka dang / rma bya dang / ra dang / lug dang / skyes bu gzhon nu'i gzugs can phyi rol gyi sgo'i rtsa bar bri
119a7(rgyud): bar bya ste/ mthar gyis rim pa la brten nas bris te/ dkyil 'khor gsum la brten nas de ltar bri bar bya'o/ /de nas yi ge gcig pa'i sngags nyid kyis shar lho'i
119b1(rgyud): phyogs kyi char me'i las bya ste/ shing a pa m+r+ga'i yam shing zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar la btags pas stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o/ /de nas me tog gi mchod yon
119b2(rgyud): dbul lo/ /yi ge gcig pa'i sngags nyid kyis ji ltar 'dod par gtor ma dang / lha bshos dang / mar me dang / bdug pa dang / spyan drang ba dang / gshegs su gsol ba
119b3(rgyud): rnams bya'o/ /de nas rgyal srid 'dod pas ni grong khyer gyi dbus su bri bar bya'o/ /longs spyod 'dod pas ni shing a mra'i drung du'o/ /bu 'dod pas ni bo de rtse'i shing gi drung
119b4(rgyud): du'o| |chung ma dang / glang po che dang / rta 'dod pas ni glang po che'i bres skyu'am/ rta'i bres skyur ro/ /chu 'dod pas ni mtsho chen po'am/ klu'i gnas su'o/ /nyin bzhi pa'i rims
119b5(rgyud): sam| rtag pa'i rims sam/ rims thams cad la rtags gcig pa'am/ grong gi g.yas phyogs su'o/ /srin pos zin pa la ni dur khrod dam/ khang pa stong par bya'o/ /yang
119b6(rgyud): srin pos zin pa la ni ba ru ra'i shing gi drung ngam/ e raN+Da'i shing gi drung du bya'o/ /ma mo thams cad kyis zin pa la ni bzhi mdo 'am/ shi ba'i khyim dang / bu btsas pa'i khyim
119b7(rgyud): du nye bar bya'o/ /tshangs pa'i srin pos zin pa la ta la'i shing du'o/ /sbyar ba'i dug 'byin pa la ni yi ge gcig pa'i sngags kyis chu la lan gsum sngags pa bya ste/ dkyil 'khor de
120a1(rgyud): nyid du blud pa byas na grol bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du bud med dam/ skyes pa grags pa 'dod pa la ni bzhi mdo 'am/ bram ze gnas par bri bar
120a2(rgyud): bya'o| |bu shi ba la ni shing 'bras bu can nam/ 'o ma can gyis shing drung du'o/ /'bras sA lu smin pa'i sa dang / zhing gi dbus su ni bu med pa la bri bar bya'o/ /nad rnam pa gsum
120a3(rgyud): bdag gir byas pa dang / gzhan gyis nyams pa la ni 'jug dogs la sogs pa la'o/ /nad chen pos btab pa la ni dkyil 'khor chu bo'i ngogs dang / 'gram du bya'o/ /nad
120a4(rgyud): thams cad kyis thams cad du btab pa la ni ri'i rtse mor bri bar bya'o/ /mkha' 'gro mas byas pa la yang bram ze'i ldum ra 'am/ khang pa stong pa 'am/ gnas dben pa
120a5(rgyud): gzhol pa'i sa phyogs su bya'o/ /de bzhin du las thams cad la nam phyed dam/ dus thams cad du mngon par bri bar bya'o/ /yi ge gcig ba de nyid kyi sngags kyis me
120a6(rgyud): tog gi mchod yon phul te gshegs su gsol la/ dkyil 'khor la chus gtor ba byas na nad thams cad bsrung ba chen pos byas par 'gyur te/ nad thams cad
120a7(rgyud): las grol bar yang 'gyur ro/ /bu med pas ni bu rnyed cing / /skal med rnams kyang skal ldan 'gyur/ /dbul po rnams kyis nor thob pa/ /dkyil 'khor mthong ba tsam
120b1(rgyud): gyis so/ /skyes pa'am yang na bud med kyang / /thos nas the tshom med byas na/ /ci 'dod rnam pa sna tshogs ni/ /thob 'gyur rtag tu phun sum tshogs/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sde
120b2(rgyud): snod kyi cho ga rab 'byams las/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba'i rtsa ba las kyi dkyil 'khor gsum pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste gsum pa rdzogs so// // de nas
120b3(rgyud): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i gnas gtsang ma la gzigs nas/ gzhan yang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po der 'dus pa la yang gzigs te/
120b4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i zhabs gnyis la bcud nas zhal 'dzum pa dang ldan pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sems can thams
120b5(rgyud): cad la phan pa'i phyir sngags kyi spyod pa'i cho ga sgrub pa'i rgyu mthun pa/ chos kyi char ji ltar 'dod pa'i 'bras bu sgrub pa'i cho ga rab 'byams las/ ras kyi ri mo'i cho ga bsod
120b6(rgyud): nams bla na med pa bskyed pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sa bon mngon par sgrub par byed pa/ mdor na/ bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/
120b7(rgyud): sngags thams cad kyi 'bras bu la rab tu sbyor zhing 'bras bu dang bcas par byed pa/ don med pa ma yin pa grub cing sgrub par byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa'
121a1(rgyud): thams cad kyi spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i go cha bgos pa/ bdud thams cad kyi stobs zil gyis
121a2(rgyud): mnan cing rgyab kyis phyogs par byed pa/ bdag dang / sems can thams cad la thugs brtse ba'i phyir de legs par bshad du gsol/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur
121a3(rgyud): gyur pas de skad ces gsol ba dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /'jam dpal
121a4(rgyud): gzhon nur gyur pa/ khyod skye bo mang po la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba'i phyir gang khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di 'dri bar sems
121a5(rgyud): pa ni legs so/ /legs so/ /de shin tu legs par nyon la yid la zungs shig dang ngas bshad par bya'o/ /khyod kyi ras ris kyi cho ga rab 'byams sngags thams
121a6(rgyud): cad sgrub par byed pa la rab tu 'jug pa mthar gyis ngas bshad par bya'o/ /sngon yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bstan te da ltar yang ngas bshad par
121a7(rgyud): bya'o| |dang por re zhig sa'i phyogs gtsang ba rdul med pa las ras bal yang dag par blangs la/ dam tshig la zhugs pa'i sems can rnams kyis ras bal de yang
121b1(rgyud): dag par dag par byas te/ yang sngags 'dis dkyil 'khor gyis brgya rtsa brgyad du sngags par bya'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ bo d+hi satwa a pra ti ha ta ga ti ma ti pra tsA ri NAM/
121b2(rgyud): na maHsaM sho d+ha na duHkha pra sha ma nen+d+ra rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyak+saM bud d+hA ya/ ta d+ya thA/ oM sho d+ha ya saM sho d+ha ya/ sarba big+h+naM g+ha ta ka ma hA kA ru Ni ka ku mA ra rU
121b3(rgyud): pa d+ha ri Ni/ bi kurba bi kurba/ sa ma ya ma nu sma ra tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha hUM hUM phaDa phaDa swAhA/ de nas grong gi chos mi shes pa'i gzhon nu ma bram ze'i rigs dang / rgyal rigs su skyes
121b4(rgyud): pa dang / rje'u'i rigs su skyes pa dang / rigs ngan pa'i skye gnas yongs su spangs pa/ dbang po mtshang ba med pa/ yan lag thams cad mdzes pa/ pha dang / mas rjes su
121b5(rgyud): gnang ba/ gso sbyong byas pa/ byang chub tu sems bskyed pa/ snying rje dang ldan pa/ bzhin dkar ba/ kha dog gzhan rnam par spangs pa/ mdor na/ bud med kyi mtshan nyid
121b6(rgyud): rab tu zhi ba'i mtshan nyid kyis mtshan pa/ shin tu nyin zhag shis pa dang / zla ba yar ngo dang / gza' bzang po bltas te/ du ba dang / khug rna med cing sprin dang bral ba/
121b7(rgyud): rlung med cing gtsang ba'i sa phyogs su sngar bstan pa'i gzhon nu ma khrus byas shing gos gtsang ma bgos te/ gos kyi legs par bkab pa byas pa la sngags 'di phyag
122a1(rgyud): rgya chen po dang ldan pas bsrung bar bya ste/ tsan+dan dkar po dang / gur gum srog chags med pa'i chu dang sbyar bas ras bal de dang / bu mo de
122a2(rgyud): sngags de nyid kyis yang dag par sbyangs te gtor la tsan+dan dkar po dang / gur gum gyi chus steng dang / 'og dang / phyogs bzhir yang gtor bar bya'o/ /tsan+dan
122a3(rgyud): dkar po dang / gur gum dang / ga bur gcig tu byas pa'i bdug pas bdugs par bya ste/ rang nyid kyis sbyin pa'am/ sgrub pa'i grogs mchog gi slob dpon gyis
122a4(rgyud): sbyin par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / sa bcu'i dbang phyug la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams/ ras kyi dog pa
122a5(rgyud): 'di la lhag par gnas par mdzod cig ces lan gsum brjod par bya'o/ /de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po
122a6(rgyud): rnams dgongs su gsol zhes byas nas bdug pas bdug pa de'i dus su rma bya dang / khrung khrung dang / ngang pa dang / bzhad dang / ngur pa rnam pa sna tshogs bya dge
122a7(rgyud): ba thang la gnas pa'am/ chu la spyod pa rnams nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ba'am/ dge ba'i skad 'don na las 'di ni 'bras bu dang bcas pa yin no zhes sgrub pa
122b1(rgyud): pos shes par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis bdag gi ras skud 'di la byin gyis brlabs te/ bdag gi skye ba dam
122b2(rgyud): pa ni legs par 'tsho ba yin te/ bdag gi sngags sgrub pa 'bras bu med par mi 'gyur ro/ /rnga pa Ta ha dang / rnga bo che dang / rdza rnga dang / dung dang / pi wang dang / gling bu dang /
122b3(rgyud): 'khar rnga dang / rdza rnga chen po'i sgra thos pa'am/ bud med dang / khye'u 'am/ bu mo'am/ skyes pa rnams bcos ma'am/ bcos ma ma yin pa de'i dus su glo bur du/ 'di skad
122b4(rgyud): ces| rgyal ba dang / grub pa dang / sbyin pa dang / byin pa dang / khyer cig ces pa dang / dpal dang / 'bras bu dang / 'bras bu yod pa dang / cho ga dang / brgya byin dang / mang
122b5(rgyud): po dang / de dag la sogs pa'i sgra gzhan rab tu dge ba 'don pa'am/ dril bu'i sgra dang / dga' ba'i sgra thos na/ des na rig pa 'dzin pas shes par bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas
122b6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs pa ni 'di yin te/ don yod pa'i grub pa ni 'di yin zhing gzhan du ma yin no zhes so/ /
122b7(rgyud): ji ste de'i dus su ma rungs pa'i tshig 'don pa khyer cig /zo shig /zungs shig /nyams pa/ rnam par nyams pa/ kyi hud/ rid pa/ shin tu rid pa/ med pa zhes bya ba la sogs
123a1(rgyud): pa'i sgra 'don pa'am/ spre'u dang / ma he dang / ce spyang dang / bong bu dang / byi la dang / ba lang dang / dud 'gro smad ba rkang gnyis sam/ rkang bzhi
123a2(rgyud): pa'i sgra 'don par gyur na/ des ni sgrub pa pos bdag gi dngos grub ni med pa yin no zhes shes par bya ste/ skabs der brtul par bya zhing yang snga ma bzhin du yang
123a3(rgyud): brtsam par bya'o/ /de bzhin du lan bdun gyi bar du byas la/ bdun pa'i las kyi bya ba la ni mtshams med pa lnga byas pa yang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de nas sgrub pa pos
123a4(rgyud): gzhon nu ma de bsrung ba byas la ku sha'i khres la gzhag par bya ste/ shar ram/ byang phyogs su phyogs par bzhag la/ bdag nyid srung ba dang / lha la dbul ba'i kha
123a5(rgyud): zas zas su sbyin no/ /sngar sbyang ba byas pa'i ku sha'i khres de nyid kyi cho gas ras bal la yang bya'o/ /dog pa de 'jam pa dang / legs par bsgrims pa dang / sngar bslabs

123a7(rgyud): dang ldan pas bya'o/ /de las rab ni bcu drug bya/ /de bzhin brgyad ni bar ma ste/ /phran tshegs las la sgrub pa ni/ /gcig dang lnga ni tha ma'o/ /las rnams kun la sngags
123b1(rgyud): rig pas/ /ji ltar nus pa bzhin du bya/ /de nas brtsams te gang cung zad/ /sdig pa sngar ni byas pa dag /dog par sems kyis dmigs pa na/ /de yi mod la 'jig par 'gyur//

123b3(rgyud): ba'am/ /gur gum tsan+dan la sogs dang / /me tog ma le tsam pa ka /dri zhim sogs pas yongs su bsgo/ /bsrung ba'i cho ga byas nas ni/ /gtsang ma'i phyogs su yang dag
123b4(rgyud): bzhag / sngags rig las kun shes pa yis/ /shin tu mnyam gzhag bzlas pa bya/ /de nas tha ga par song nas/ /ci 'dod pa yi rin spyin no/ /rang dbang yan lag ma nyams
123b5(rgyud): dang | |dkar po'i chos la rtag tu dad/ /rgan min nad kyis gdungs pa min/ /lud pa dbugs mi bde ba spangs/ /ma ning smad pa ma yin dang / /'phye bo ma yin skra dkar spangs/ /

123b7(rgyud): bzang btags pa'i ched du bskul/ /grogs po rigs bzang rab bsngags shing / /blo ldan bzo ni mkhas pa dang / /shin tu khyad par mchog gyur pa'i/ /ras thags bzang la
124a1(rgyud): bskul bar bya/ /rab ni rab tu bsgrub par bya/ /'bring ni 'bring la bsgrub par bya/ /tha ma phran tshegs las la ni/ /dman pa nyid na thams cad la/ /

124a4(rgyud): lha dang mi yi bde ba sbyin/ /'byung po kun gyi dpal 'gyur zhes/ /yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis gsungs/ /de nas rig pa 'dzin pas thag pa la rgyu skar bzang po 'am/

124a6(rgyud): tog skyes shing / shing gi mchog rnams kyi yal ga dang / me tog rgyas pa de'i dus mtshams su snga dro nyi ma 'char ba la sngar bstan pa'i tha ga pa lha la dbul bar 'os
124a7(rgyud): ba'i kha zas bstan cing gos gtsang ma bgos la/ mgo la cod pan bcings nas khrus legs par byas te/ tsan+dan dkar po dang / gur gum gang yang rung bas lus byugs

126a1(rgyud): la sogs pa'i sbyor ba'am/ /gzhan ni rgyal bas gsungs pa dang / /rnam dpyad rang bzhin 'bad pa yis/ /ras ni ma lus tha ga bya/ /ras kyi tha ga

126b7(rgyud): kha dog gsal ba dang ldan pa'i tshon rtsi rnams blangs te/ sngar tha ga pa la byas pa'i cho ga ji lta ba de nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pas ri mo mkhan la snga ma bzhin sbyang bar bya ste/

127a6(rgyud): mchog dang ldan pa/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis mtshan pa/ sku dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus nye bar mdzes pa/ rin po che'i pad+ma la bzhugs pa/

128a1(rgyud): pa la blta ba/ bzhin cung zad rgod pa/ 'od 'bar ba dang ldan pas dkyil 'khor kun tu khyab pa bri'o/ /pad+ma gnyis pa la 'phags pa zla ba'i 'od shin tu
128a2(rgyud): gzhon sha can de bzhin du bri bar bya'o/ /gsum pa la ni nor bzang ngo / /bzhi pa la ni sgrib pa rnam par sel ba'o/ /lnga pa la ni nam mkha' mdzod do/ /drug pa la ni sa'i snying

128a7(rgyud): g.yon par bgos pa/ lag pa g.yon pas phreng ba 'dzin cing de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag byed pa/ der gtod pa'i lta ba sems kyi spyod pa bsam gtan la dmigs pa'i rnam

129a2(rgyud): 'di bzhin du bya'o/ /cha byad ni ji ltar sngar bstan pa bzhin bya'o/ /de bzhin du pad+ma lnga pa la ni 'phags pa blo gros chen po/ drug pa la ni blo gros zhi ba/ bdun pa la ni rnam

129a4(rgyud): thams cad kyis shin tu mdzes pa/ dar las stod g.yogs byas pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ g.yo ba dang ldan pa'i gos bgos pa'o/ /de dag gi steng du'ang rang
129a5(rgyud): sangs rgyas brgyad bri bar bya ste/ dge slong gi cha byad 'dzin pa/ lus skyes bu chen po'i mtshan dang ldan pa/ chos gos dmar po gyon pa/ skyil mo krung gis nye bar gnas
129a6(rgyud): pa| rin po che'i ut+pa la la 'dug pa/ cha byad zhi ba'i bdag nyid kun nas 'od 'phro ba'i phreng bas khyab pa/ me tog dri zhim pos gcal bkram pa la/ 'di lta ste/ me tog mA
129a7(rgyud): li dang / dbyar gyi me tog dang / d+hA nuSh+ka ri ka dang / pun nA ga dang / nA ga ge sar la sogs pa'i me tog gis ras ris kun nas gcal bkram par bri bar bya'o/ /bcom
129b1(rgyud): ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i g.yon phyogs su 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi steng du rin po che du mas nye bar spras pa/ shin tu yangs pa'i gzhal med khang gi dkyil 'khor brag
129b2(rgyud): gi tshogs kyis shin tu nye bar mdzes par byas pa/ rin po che'i ut+pa las shin tu bkab pa/ ri'i rnam pa lta bu bri bar bya'o/ /gnas der sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das brgyad bri bar
129b3(rgyud): bya ste/ 'di lta ste/ rin chen gtsug tor can rin po che baiDUR+ya'i 'od rnam par 'phro ba/ kun nas 'od 'dom gang ba/ rin po che pad+ma rA ga dang / in+d+ra nI la dang / ma rgad la sogs
129b4(rgyud): pa dang / bai DU R+ya dang / asma gar b+ha la sogs pa nor bu rin po che chen po'i bye brag kun nas 'od 'phro ba dang ldan pa/ nyi ma 'char ka'i mdog 'dra ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
129b5(rgyud): sku lhung bzad dang / chos gos dang / bla gos dang ldan pa/ skyil krung gis bzhugs shing chos 'chad pa/ na bza' ser po mnabs pa/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan gyis sku la khyab
129b6(rgyud): pa| dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus sku nye bar mdzes pa/ zhi ba'i gzigs pa dang ldan pa/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen gtsug tor can
129b7(rgyud): bri bar bya'o/ /gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pa me tog yang dag par skyes pa'i dbang po kha dog gser 'dra ba bri bar bya'o/ /gsum pa pad+ma'i gtsug tor pad+ma'i ge sar dang 'dra
130a1(rgyud): ba'i chos 'chad pa bri bar bya'o/ /bzhi pa spyan bzang po yang bri bar bya'o/ /lnga pa bsnyen par dka' ba dang / drug pa rgyal ba rnam par snang mdzad dang / bdun
130a2(rgyud): pa sman gyi bla bai DUR+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po dang / brgyad pa de bzhin gshegs pa sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar byed pa'i spyan gyi rgyal po bri bar bya'o/ /'di dag thams cad kyang

130a4(rgyud): gtsang ma'i lha'i bu gnyis lus mi snang bar me tog gi char 'bebs pa bri bar bya ste/ bar snang la gnas nas sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /

130b1(rgyud): dang | mu khyud dang / mu khyud bzang po'o/ /'di dag thams cad kyang shin tu mdzes pa/ zhi ba'i cha byad kyi bdag nyid can/ shin tu dul ba'i cha byad can no/ /nyan thos chen po dag
130b2(rgyud): kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la lta ba'o/ /steng du gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i bu gzhan gnyis nye bar kun nas gos kyi bla re chu zheng yangs pa/ shin tu mdzes pa
130b3(rgyud): 'dzin cing sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos rnams kyi steng du lha'i gos dang / phreng ba 'dzin pa bri bar
130b4(rgyud): bya'o| |bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i steng dbu'i steng du mu tig gi phreng ba dang / tha gu dmar po pad+ma rA ga dang / in+d+ra nI la la sogs pa'i mdud pa byas pa/ rin po che'i tha
130b5(rgyud): gu'i tshogs bya'o/ /de la yang gos kyi bla re shin tu legs par kun nas bkod pa dang / mu tig gi phreng ba 'phyang bas mdzes pa bri bar bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi
130b6(rgyud): 'og tu ni pad+ma'i mtsho las 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi zhabs drung dang nye ba na klu'i rgyal po nye dga'i phyogs su rin po che chen po'i ri bo pad+ma'i mtsho las mngon par thon pa/ rin po che'i myu gu dang /
130b7(rgyud): phug dang / ri sul dang / byu ru'i yal ga dang / rin po che'i shing gis yongs su bskor ba/ drang srong chen po'i gnas dang / grub pa dag gis de la
131a1(rgyud): bsten pa/ ri'i rtse mo'i steng du khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje'i gshed shin tu mi bzad pa'i gzugs can/ lag pa g.yas pa na zhags pa thogs pa/
131a2(rgyud): lag pa g.yon pa na gzhu thogs pa/ bzhin khro gnyer dang ldan pa/ bka' nyan cing 'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyogs te lta ba/ gsus pa 'phyang ba/ skra gyen du

136b1(rgyud): ku ltar sngo bsangs sngam bzhin du bri bar bya'o/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi g.yas phyogs su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug snga ma bzhin rin po che'i ri la gnas

136b3(rgyud): bya'o| |ras kyi mtha' ma dang nye ba'i zur du 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi seng ge'i khri'i 'og g.yas phyogs su khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed snga ma bzhin du bri bar bya'o/ /de'i

136b5(rgyud): gshegs pa me tog yang dag par skyes pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po bri bar bya ste/ rin po che'i ri'i phug sor bcu drug gi tshad tsam gyi nang na bzhugs pa/ rI stod kyi cha khang pa brtsegs/
136b6(rgyud): pa 'dra ba bri bar bya'o/ /ras ris kyi khor yug tu ri'i rnam pas yongs su 'khor ba bri bar bya'o/ /steng gi ras kyi mtha' gnyis la gnas pa'i ri'i stod kyi cha la lding ba bzhin du me
136b7(rgyud): tog gi tshogs 'thor ba'i gnas gtsang mi'i ris kyi lha'i bu dag pa dang / rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba gnyis snga ma bzhin du bri bar bya zhing ras la me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyi
137a1(rgyud): gcal bkram pa yang bri bar bya'o/ /rnam gsum ras ris mtshan nyid ni/ /thams cad 'dir ni bstan pa las/ /'di ni tha ma zhes bya ste/ /phran tshegs
137a2(rgyud): las rnams dag la shes/ /bskal pa bye bar mi bzad las/ /ras ris mthong ba tsam gyis grol/ /ras ris mthong ba tsam gyis ni/ /skad cig de la grol bar 'gyur/ /

137a5(rgyud): pas bsod nams gang thob de/ /ras ris tha ma mthong ba yin/ /dge ba dag gi las rnams la/ /longs spyod phyir yang 'dir spyad do/ /sngags rnams gang dag ci yod pa//
137a6(rgyud): tshangs dbang drang srong gis bshad dang / /nam mkha' lding gis gang bshad dang / /chu lha nyi ma lus ngan dang / /nor sbyin sogs dang srin po dang / /lha min dbang po lto

137b1(rgyud): zhi ba bya ba ste/ /de bzhin du ni rgyas pa bya/ /'dir ni mngon spyod spang bya ste/ /thub pa mchog gis smad pa yin/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po'i mdo sde shin
137b2(rgyud): tu rgyas pa las/ 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga zhib mo le'u drug pa'i cho ga rab 'byams las/ ras ris chung ngu gsum pa'i cho ga rdzogs so// //de nas 'jam dpal
137b3(rgyud): gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag btsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das
137b4(rgyud): la 'di skang ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa ni legs so//
137b5(rgyud): legs so/ /rig pa thams cad kyi brtul zhugs spyad pa'i don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brdze ba'i phyir dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs la
137b6(rgyud): mkhas pa ston pa/ phung po lhag ma dang bcas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer du 'gro bar byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rgyud nges par byang chub sgrub par byed pa/
137b7(rgyud): sngags kyi spyod pa thams cad kyi don sgrub par byed pa/ bdag gi gsang sngags 'di skye bo thams cad la rgyas par byed par 'gyur ro/ /ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'jig rten gyi bla ma 'das
138a1(rgyud): pa na/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyi ma'i rigs nub pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad spangs pa dang / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems

138a4(rgyud): thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur te/ le lo can dang / dran pa nyams pa dang / ma dad pa dang / mi srun pa dang / mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa dang / g.yo sgyu dang

138a6(rgyud): ches bar mi 'gyur ro/ /log pa'i ltab skye zhing bsod nams ma yin pa 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /mtshams med par gzhol zhing shin tu mi bzad pa'i yang shin tu mi bzang

138b1(rgyud): ba'i sbyor ba/ sngags kyi ras kyi ri mo'i cho ga gang de'i dus la bab par mkhyen na bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas 'jam
138b2(rgyud): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'dri bar sems pa legs so/ /legs so/ /'jam
138b3(rgyud): dpal/ khyod kyi mchog tu gsang ba rig pa'i brtul zhugs spyod pa'i le'u ras ris kyi cho ga rab 'byams yod do/ snying po mchog rnams kyi don mchog tu gsang ba dam pa don

139b1(rgyud): bas shin tu rgya che ba'i ras ris kyi cho ga'i sgrub pa la sogs pa rtsom par mi nus te/ de dag gi phyir shin tu mdor bstan par bya'o/ /dang por re zhig dpa' bo'i tshong gis dog pa srang

140a7(rgyud): khri la skyil mo krung phyed pas bzhugs pa la/ zhabs g.yas pas rin po che'i zhabs rten la bzhag pa/ g.yon pa seng ge'i gdan la bzhugs pa/ rgyan thams

142b1(rgyud): kyis bstan pa'i sems can de dag gi phyir le'u'i cho ga rab 'byams 'di thabs sla bas 'grub par 'gyur ba ngas kyang bstan te/ de dag gi don gyi phyir yon tan rgya che ba'i bye brag gi

142b6(rgyud): dog lta bu byung ste/ 'od zer de byang ma thag tu thams cad dang ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor snang bar byas nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bdud thams cad zil
142b7(rgyud): gyis mnan nas rgyu skar gyi 'od dang / ri bo'i tshogs thams cad kyi 'od dang / gang 'di zla ba dang / nyi ma rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba de dag gi 'od kyang zil gyis mnan te/ mi
143a1(rgyud): gsal zhing 'od med par 'gyur ba dang / rnam par mdzes par mi 'gyur zhing gsal bar mi 'gyur ro/ /nor bu thams cad dang / sngags dang / sman dang

143a4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das ni rgyu ma mchis/ rkyen ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags/
143a5(rgyud): rkyen gang lags/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ phyag na rdo rje/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ ji

143a7(rgyud): gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga rig pa'i spyod pa rjes su sgrub pa/ las sgrub pa'i thabs la yang dag par gzhol ba/ chos kyi sbrin la rten pa la yang dag par 'jug cing rjes su bzang bar byed pa dang /
143b1(rgyud): 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang / klog par 'gyur ba dang / dad par 'gyur ba dang / glegs bam la 'dri ba byas nas mchod par 'gyur ba dang / tsan+dan gyi phye ma dang / byug pa dang / bdug
143b2(rgyud): pa dang / phreng ba dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rnam pa sna tshogs pa 'am/ tshig gi bye brag gis sam/ sil snyan rnam pa sna tshogs dang / pheg rdob pa dag gam/ tha na rjes su
143b3(rgyud): yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems rgyud la thob pa 'am/ ba sbu ldang bar byed pa 'am/ rig pa'i mthu thos nas dga' ba skyes pa 'am/ rjes su yi rang bar 'gyur ba 'am/ spyod pa thob par 'gyur
143b4(rgyud): bde dag ni ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur bar lung bstan te/ des na rgyal ba de ltar 'dzum pa mdzad kyi gzhan du ni ma yin no/ /
143b5(rgyud): 'dir dang por re zhig cho ga'i rgyal po 'di la dam tshig mthong ba sngon du bya ba rnams byas pa dang / dbang bskur ba thob pa rtsa ba'i sngags sam/ snying po 'am/ nye ba'i snying po 'am/ sngags
143b6(rgyud): gang yang rung ba bzung nas yi ge gcig pa 'am/ gang 'dod pa dgon pa chen por song ste/ 'bum phrag gsum bzla bar bya'o/ /'bras bu dang / chus 'tsho ba 'am/ rtsa ba dang / lo ma'i bza'

144a1(rgyud): khres la 'dug nas/ pad+ma dkar po la tsan+dan dang / gur gum gyis btags te/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa dang / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'
144a2(rgyud): thams cad dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / nyan thos dag la 'bum phrag gcig ri mo'i ras ris kyi 'og tu dbul bar bya'o/ /ga bur gyi bdug pa yang ci 'byor pas bdug go /lha'i bu dang /

150b6(rgyud): bshad pa'i cho gas rig pa 'bum phrag drug cu bzla'o/ /bzlas pa zin pa na gru de rgya mtsho chen por 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /sgrub pa po'i yo byad yang dag par blangs te/ sngar gyi gnas su
150b7(rgyud): gzhag par bya'o/ /de nas gru'i bzhon pa rgya mtsho chen por 'gro ba na 'jigs par mi bya ste/ bzlog par yang mi bya'o/ /sgrub pa po ma gtogs pas zlog par nus pa yang ma yin no/ /de nas
151a1(rgyud): dpag tshad stong du gnas pa'i rgya mtsho chen por yang yud tsam gyis 'jug par 'gyur na/ lam thung du lta smos kyang ci dgos/ rgya mtsho chen po der
151a2(rgyud): phyin pa na sgrub pa pos bsgrub pa'i las brtsam par bya'o/ /de nas seng ldeng gi shing gis me spar la/ sngar byas pa'i me thab bam/ rdza mkhan gyis byas pa'i sa'i snod la me tog nA
151a3(rgyud): ga ge sar/ tsan+dan dkar po dang / ga bur gyis bsres pa'i sreg blugs kyis shin tu nyung ba'am/ rab tu mang ba yang rung / 'bum phrag drug cu sbyin sreg bya'o/ /sbyin sreg byed pa na
151a4(rgyud): yang lang ka'i grong khyer na gnas pa'i srin po gzugs dang / /cha byad mang po 'dzin pa ha ha zhes bya ba'i sgra sgrogs pa dang / klu'i grong khyer gdengs ka dang ldan pa na gnas pa'i rgyal
151a5(rgyud): po rnams langs par gyur te/ cha byad rnam pa sna tshogs 'dzin pa/ rab tu drag pa dang / rab tu zhi ba'i klu de rnams dang / srin po de rnams/ 'di skad du/ khyed bzhengs shig /
151a6(rgyud): bzhengs shig /bdag cag gi bdag po mdzad du gsol zhes brjod do/ /de bzhin du lha ma yin dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / grub pa dang / mi ma yin pa thams
151a7(rgyud): cad kyang rab tu chags par byed na ldang bar mi bya/ 'jigs par mi bya'o/ /de nas rig pa 'dzin pas sngags zlo zhing lag pa g.yon pa'i mdzub mos sdigs mdzub byas na de nas phan
151b1(rgyud): tshun du 'gro ba dang / 'byer ba dang / 'bros par byed do/ /de nas sbyin sreg zin pa na gru de sgrub pa po des blangs na/ skad cig gis 'og min du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten gyi khams
151b2(rgyud): gzhan du yang 'gro ba dang / 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sems dang mthu mnyam par 'gyur/ mngon par shes pa lnga dang / rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / mthu chen po dang ldan par
151b3(rgyud): 'gyur ro/ /'dis 'phags pa 'jam dpal yang rtag tu mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos ma gtogs pa
151b4(rgyud): klu'i rgyal po thams cad dang / srin po thams cad dang / gnod sbyin thams cad dang / lha thams cad dang / lha ma yin thams cad dang / sems can thams cad kyang 'di'i bka' bzhin
151b5(rgyud): byed cing dbang du 'gyur ro/ /'di'i sngags grub pa de dag la yang byams pa'i bdag nyid du 'gyur zhing rjes su dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can thams cad kyang 'di'i bka' bzhin
151b6(rgyud): 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang las sgrub pa'i thabs dam pa yod de/ shing bil ba chen po las gru'i bzhon pa byas la/ yang na shing gcig gi shing gi tshogs las gnas chen po byas te/ gang
151b7(rgyud): gA'i dbus kyi klung der gru'i bzhon pa'i gnas byas la/ der yang gru'i bzhon pa la zhon pa'i skyes bu brgya nyi shu rnams mar me lag na thogs pa/ gos dkar po bgos pa/ bsrung ba byas pa/
152a1(rgyud): cho ga snga mas yang dag par bzhag pa'i ras ris mdun du gzhag par bya ste/ de nas ras ris la mchod pa chen po byas nas/ nA ga ge sar gyi phye ma/ tsan+dan
152a2(rgyud): dkar po dang / gur gum dang / ga bur gyis bsres pa'i sreg blugs kyis seng ldeng gi me la stong phrag sum cu rtsa drug sbyin sreg bya'o/ /de nas sbyin sreg zin pa na skad cig gis tshangs
152a3(rgyud): pa'i 'jig rten du 'gro ba dang / 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin rnam par rgyu bar byed do/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa mngon sum du mthong bar
152a4(rgyud): 'gyur te/ mthong ba tsam gyis sa thob par yang 'gyur ro/ /mngon par shes pa lnga 'thob pa dang / yun ring du 'tsho zhing bskal pa chen por gnas par yang 'gyur/ rig pa
152a5(rgyud): 'dzin pa'i 'khor los bsgyur bar yang 'gyur ro/ /mar me 'dzin pa de dag kyang rig pa 'dzin pa 'di'i grogs por 'gyur te/ de dag dang lhan cig ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du rgyu
152a6(rgyud): zhing rang dbang du 'gro bar yang 'gyur/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur byed par mngon par dga' bar 'gyur zhing 'phral yang sangs rgyas
152a7(rgyud): nyid du nges par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang sgrub pa'i thabs kyi las dam pa yod de/ chu klung rgya mtsho'i 'gram dag gam/ /de bzhin ri po kha ba can/ /ri yi rgyal po
152b1(rgyud): 'bigs byed la/ /las kyi mchog ni bsgrub par bya/ /ma la ya ri sa ha dang / /spos kyi ngad ldang ar bu dang / /ri yi rgyal po sum brtse gsal/ /las kyi mchog ni bsgrub par bya/ /de bzhin rgya mtsho
152b2(rgyud): chen po dang / /ri ni shing ldan me tog yod/ /'di dag gi ni phyogs dag tu/ /sngags grub par ni rgyal bas gsungs/ /gtsang zhing bas mtha' dben phyogs su/ /grong gi chos ni rnam par
152b3(rgyud): spangs/ /de bzhin ri yi tshang ching du/ /sngags kyi rgyal po thams cad 'grub/ /bas mtha'i gnas mal nyams dga' dang / /rgyal bas de bzhin bsngags pa dang / /ma rungs sems
152b4(rgyud): can thams cad la/ /sngags kyi rgyal pa thams cad 'grub/ /chos ldan rgyal po yod pa dang / /gtsang sbra spyod pa'i skye bo yod/ /pha dang ma la gus pa dang / /bram ze'i rigs ni yod pa yi/ /gnas
152b5(rgyud): der lha rnams 'grub 'gyur te/ /gzhan du 'grub pa ma yin no/ /chu bo gang gA'i 'gram dang ni/ /de bzhin legs mdzes ya mu na/ /sin+du nar ma dA nang dang / /zla ba'i cha ni gtsang dogs dang / /
152b6(rgyud): de bzhin kA ba'i sa ra swad/ /chu bo chen po sI ta rnams/ /'di dag grub pa'i zhing du ni/ /stobs bcu ldan sras rnams kyis bshad/ /stobs bcu ldan pas bshad pa'i zhing / /byang phyogs
152b7(rgyud): yod pa'i ri dag dang / /kha che dang ni rgya yul dang / /bal po de bzhin mang yul dang / /rgya yul che dang li yul dang / /de dag ma lus grub pa'i zhing / /byang phyogs la ni gnas pa dang / /nas dang
153a1(rgyud): gro la spyod pa dang / /ri dang chu bo dag la yang / /bsod nams yul du bstan pa yin/ /sems can snying rje ldan gang gnas/ /de dag la ni nges 'grub 'gyur/ /dpal
153a2(rgyud): gyi ri bo'i ri chen ni/ /lho phyogs na ni yang dag gnas/ /dpal ldan 'bras phung mchod rten ni/ /rgyal ba'i ring bsrel gnas pa'i sa/ /thams cad don gyi gnas dag la/ /der ni sngags
153a3(rgyud): rnams myur du 'grub/ /mchod rten chen po rdo rje gdan/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor dang / /thub mchog zhi bar rab gshegs pa/ /der yang grub par rab tu snang / /lha las
153a4(rgyud): babs pa'i mchod rten dang / /nai ka sha dang cho 'phrul bstan/ /grong mchog ser skya zhes bya dang / /nags tshal lum bi nir 'khrungs la/ /sngags kyi rgyal po 'grub 'gyur zhes/ /
153a5(rgyud): rgyal bas rab bsngags brjod pa yin/ /bya rgod phung po'i ri dang ni/ /de bzhin sa steng bsil ba'i tshal/ /grong mchog me tog ces bya dang / /rtag tu de bzhin ga sha dang //
153a6(rgyud): bcom brlag kan n+ya ku ba dza dang / /sa steng grong ni 'phags rgyal dang / /de bzhin yangs pa can mchod rten/ /mi thi la yi grong khyer sa/ /grong dang grong khyer mchog dag ni/ /gang
153a7(rgyud): gzhan skye bo yang dag 'byung / /rab bsngags bsod nams yul dag ni/ /de dag du ni bsgrub pa bya/ /de dang gzhan yang yul dag dang / /grong dang ljongs dang ri bo dang / /
153b1(rgyud): gnas dang grong mchog gtso bo ni/ /bsod nams gnas la rab brten nas/ /der ni slong mos rjes 'tsho zhing / /bzlas dang sbyin sreg dga' ba dang / /gnas khang bla gab med pa
153b2(rgyud): dang / /rtag tu khyim ni stong pa la/ /sngags rnams las ni thams cad la/ /thog ma nyid du bya ba yin/ /sngags pas rtag tu yul dbus su/ /sngags bzlas mngon par 'dod pas

153b5(rgyud): phyogs 'dod pa yin/ /'bras bu me tog yang dag ldan/ /dri med rab bsngags chu yod par/ /sngags rig sngags ni brten byas na/ /sbyor ba thams cad rab tu 'grub/ /gzhan yang dur
153b6(rgyud): khrod chen po ni/ /der ni bzlas pa rtag tu bya/ /dri med chu dang 'bab chu ni/ /srog chags dag kyang rnam par spangs/ /der ni de nyid bzla bya ste/ /mnyam par gzhag pas sngags bzla bya/ /

154a1(rgyud): las gzhan du'ang 'gro bya ste/ /der ni dam tshig thob bsten pa/ /cung zad gus te gzhan du min/ /de nas gzhan du'ang myur du ni/ /sngags rig pas

154a7(rgyud): dag ma rnyed na/ gang yang rung ba'i gnas de dag tu gtsang sbra byas te/ sngon du bsnyen pa byas la dad cing mos pas sgrub pa'i thabs kyi lam dam pa brtsam par bya ste/ dang po re
154b1(rgyud): zhig ras ris chen po nub tu bltas pas bzhag ste/ bdag nyid shar du bltas la grog mkhar gyi sa'am/ gang gA'i klung gi ngogs na yod pa'i sa blangs te/ rtswa u shi ra dang /

155b7(rgyud): la yang dag par mthong la/ gal te bzhon pa'i khyad par sgrub pa pos gzung bar 'gyur na ni de la zhon nas ji ltar 'dod par 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te rgyan gyi khyad par ram/ mtshon

156b6(rgyud): lus 'di nyid kyis 'jig rten gyi khams dag tu 'gro ba nyid dang / stobs bcu'i rgyu yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir dang / 'phags pa 'jam dpal mngon sum du mthong ba nyid
156b7(rgyud): kyi phyir dang / 'bras bu yod bar mthong ba'i chos ston pa mnyan pa'i phyir dang / sangs rgyas kyi gdung rgyun mi gcad pa'i phyir dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mthar gyis rjes
157a1(rgyud): su thob pa nyid kyi phyir dang / chos kyi sprin las byung ba'i sngags bzang po la 'jug pa nyid kyi phyir dang / nyon mongs pa bskam pa dang / bdud rtsi'i char gyis
157a2(rgyud): nyon mongs pa zhi bar bya ba'i phyir dang / 'jig rten rjes su gzung ba la rab tu 'jug par rjes su sgrub pa nyid kyi phyir dang / de bzhin du chos kyi tshul gzung ba'i phyir dang / de bzhin
157a3(rgyud): gshegs pa'i gsung don yod par bya ba'i phyir dang / sngags kyi thabs kyi sgrub pa'i cho ga rab tu gsang ba nyid kyi phyir dang / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams
157a4(rgyud): cad dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos kyi bdag nyid chen po 'byung ba'i phyir dang / cho ga'i rgyal po rab 'byams sngags kyi mthu dang rab tu rnam par ldan pa 'di
157a5(rgyud): ras ris chen po'i mdun du nye bar gnas la bsgrub par bya ste/ 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sngags kyi cho ga dang / sngags rgyud thams cad kyi cho ga'i lam gyi
157a6(rgyud): ste| mdor na/ 'dir cho ga gzhan du gsungs pa'i las kyis kyang cho ga'i rgyal po 'di bsgrub par bya ste/ myur du de dag gi sngags rnams 'grub par 'gyur te/ gang ngas bstan
157a7(rgyud): pa de dag nges par 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga bcu pa
157b1(rgyud): ras ris chen po'i cho ga'i le'u rab 'byams rdzogs so/ / //de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas yang gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang la gzigs
157b2(rgyud): nas| 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ khyod kyi ras ris bar ma'i cho ga gzhan sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga yod de/ mdor bsdus nas bshad kyis
157b3(rgyud): de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang bshad do/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'jig
157b4(rgyud): rten la thugs brtse ba dang / ston pa sems can thams cad la phan par dgyes pa dang / bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i phyir dang / ma 'ongs pa'i skye bo rnams la gzigs nas de'i dus la bab par
157b5(rgyud): mkhyen na de bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /'jam dpal nyon cig /dang por re zhig tshul khrims
157b6(rgyud): dang | brtul zhugs dang / gtsang sbra'i spyod pa dang / nges par sdom pa dang / bzlas pa dang / sbyin sreg dang / bsam gtan dang / cho ga gang du legs par rab tu gnas pa la sngags
157b7(rgyud): thams cad spyod pa sgrub pa'i las 'bras bu dang bcas shing don yod par 'gyur te/ sngags thams cad kyi sbyor ba 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /nges bshad pa de gang zhe na/ gzhon nu nyon cig /
158a1(rgyud): dang por re zhig rig pa dang / brtul zhugs dang / tshul khrims kyi yi dam dang po nyid du blang bar byas la/ dang po re zhig dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis bstan
158a2(rgyud): pa'i dam tshig khyod kyi cho ga'i rgyal por bstan cing sngar bshad pa la rjes su 'jug par bya'o/ /blo gsal ba/ yid gzhungs pa dang ldan pa/ slob dpon du dbang bskur ba/ khyod kyis bstan
158a3(rgyud): pa'i cho ga shes pa/ dge ba/ gsal ba'i chos dang ldan pa/ bden par smra ba/ spro ba chen po dang ldan pa/ byas pa gzo ba/ yid gzhungs pa dang ldan pa/ 'dris brtan pa/ ha cang mi rgan/
158a4(rgyud): ha cang mi gzhon pa/ rnyed pa dang / bkur sti la chags pa med pa/ tshangs par spyod pa snying rje dang ldan pa/ rnyed pa tsam mam/ longs spyod kyi rgyu tsam mam/ rjes su chags pa'i rgyur yang
158a5(rgyud): rdzun mi smra na/ cung zad tsam mam/ chags pa'am/ rmongs pa tsam gyis rnam par lta smos kyang ci dgos/ dam bcas pa brtan pa dang / sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa
158a6(rgyud): dang | snying rje dang ldan pa dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang / sngon du spyad pa byas pa dang / khyod kyi gsang ba'i sngags rjes su zlos pa dang / snga ma nyid du rig pa goms par byas
158a7(rgyud): pa dang / khyod kyi dkyil 'khor la mthar gyis yang dag par zhugs pa dang / 'jig rten shes pa dang / cho ga shes pa dang / yang dag bar rjes su 'dzin par byed pa dang / 'bras
158b1(rgyud): bu dang ldan zhing mkhas pa dang / legs pa la rab tu zhugs pa dang / gzugs mdzes pa dang / 'dod pa med pa dang / chags pa med pa dang / dpa' ba dang / brtson 'grus brtan pa dang /
158b2(rgyud): nad med pa ste/ nad gang gis las mi nus pa'i ngang tshul can gyi nad med pa dang / rigs mthon por skye ba'o/ /yon tan de dag dang ldan na ni dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon du 'gyur la sgrub pa po
158b3(rgyud): yang de dang mnyam pa ste/ yan lag lhag pa'am/ ma tshang ba cung zad kyang med pa'o/ /de lta bu'i dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon la mchod pa byas shing don du gnyer bar byas te/ slob dpon dang lhan
158b4(rgyud): cig byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i dam tshig la rjes su 'jug par 'tshal na/ slob dpon gyis bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du phan pa'i
158b5(rgyud): thugs dang / brtse ba'i thugs kyis de bshad du gsol/ de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon des sngar bstan pa'i cho gas slob ma la snga ma ji lta ba bzhin du brtags nas rab tu
158b6(rgyud): gzhug par bya ste/ sngar ji ltar dbang bskur ba bzhin du phyis kyang sbyin par bya'o/ /go rim ji lta ba bzhin du dam tshig bstan te/ gsang ba'i phyag rgya dang / rgyud dang / sngags dang /
158b7(rgyud): las kyang dus ring po nyid nas nges par brtags te/ bsam pa shes nas brtan par bya ste/ sngags la sogs pa'i las rnams kyang thams cad du gzhan du ma yin no zhes cho ga 'di ltar
159a1(rgyud): bstan pa yin no/ /de nas slob mas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon la ci nus pas gang gis slob dpon dgyes pa bdag dang /
159a2(rgyud): longs spyod rab tu dbul bar bya'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon des bu'i 'du shes nye bar gzhag par bya ste/ bu bzhin du bsgrub par bya zhing ma
159a3(rgyud): bzhin du yang longs spyod kyis nye bar bsdu bar bya'o/ /de nas sgrub pa po des sngags gang yang rung ba bzung ste/ gcig pu dben par song nas sngar bstan pa gong
159a4(rgyud): ma bzhin du rgya cher sbyar te/ de dag nyid kyis sngags dag gis ni spyan drang ba dang / gshegs su gsol ba dang / mar me dang / dri dang / bdug pa dang / gtor
159a5(rgyud): ma dang / lha bshos dkyil 'khor la gsungs pa nyid kyi tshogs rgya cher byas te/ spyan drangs nas gdan dang / mchod yon phul la dus mtshams gsum du
159a6(rgyud): khrus lan gsum bya zhing / gos gsum brje zhing nyin re bzhin du bzlas pa bya'o/ /de la dus gsum zhes bya ba ni mtshan mo'i mtha' nas brtsams pa yin te/
159a7(rgyud): zung tsam nas nyi ma 'char ba'i bar 'dir dang po'i dus su brjod do/ /nyi ma'i gung na nyi ma gnyi ga'i gung tsam gyi tshad du nam mkha' la gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor
159b1(rgyud): la nyi ma gung gi dus zhes brjod do/ /nyi ma nub pa'i dus su lhag ma zung tsam lus pa'i dus gsum pa zhes brjod do/ /tshul khrims brtul zhugs yang dag ldan/ /slob dpon mkhas pa chen
159b2(rgyud): po dang / /mthon po'i rigs su skyes pa dang / /rnam pa kun tu brtson 'grus brtan/ /sngags rgyud dag la mngon brtson dang / /bya ba kun la blo gros dge /zhib cing mkhas la chog shes dang //
159b3(rgyud): chos kyi dbyings ni rtag tu 'dzin/ /spro ba che zhing gzi brjid che/ /'jig rten chos la ltos pa med/ /thub mchog chos la dad pa dang / /'jig rten na ni yongs su bsngags/ /dben pa shes
159b4(rgyud): shing bzlas pa byed/ /sngon du bsnyen pas rjes bsnyen byed/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi sngags shes shing / /mthong bas nges 'dzin de mchog byed/ /sangs rgyas gsungs pa'i sngags
159b5(rgyud): rnams la/ /'jig rten pa yi sbyor ba shes/ /srung byed mthu ni brtan pa dang / /rtag tu gtsang sbra'i spyod la dga'/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa'i lam la ni/ /thams cad du ni 'jug
159b6(rgyud): par byed/ /rab bsngags rgyal bas bstod pa yi/ /sngags zlos pa la brtson par byed/ /las 'bras dag la rtag yid che sa/ /'jig rten pha rol de bzhin no/ /sdig pa kun la
159b7(rgyud): 'jigs byed pa/ /shin tu phra ba'ang de bzhin no/ /gtsang zhing grims dang le lo med/ /yid gzhungs blta na sdug pa dang / /stobs bcu ldan pas sngags bshad dang / /de bzhin rgyal ba'i
160a1(rgyud): sras dang ni/ /gang dag 'jig rten sngags dag dang / /rdo rje pad+ma'i rigs dag gis/ /de la rtag tu brtson byed dang / /gzhung dang bstan bcos don klog pa//
160a2(rgyud): nad med pa dang stobs ldan dang / /rgas dang gzhon pa rnam par spangs/ /sngags grub de bzhin shes nyes can/ /kun nas myur du byed pa dang / /las mtha' mi ring nga rgyal chung / /zur
160a3(rgyud): tsam gyis go khyad par can/ /tshangs par spyod cing shes rab che/ /gcig pu 'dre bar mi byed dang / /'jam dpal gyis gsungs rgyud dag la/ /dbang bskur thob cing dpa' ba dang / /
160a4(rgyud): bzlas pa'i mthar byas ldan pa dang / /de bzhin rig pa goms byas dang / /sems dpa' che zhing 'jig rten shes/ /'gro ba'i de nyid rjes sems dang / /legs pa'i lam nyid
160a5(rgyud): rab sbyar byad/ /sbyin byed 'byung po phan la dga'/ /khyad par can de'i slob dpon la/ /rtag tu don du gnyer bar bya/ /dkyil 'khor de ni bris pa la/ /sngags rnams grub pa ster
160a6(rgyud): par 'gyur/ /de nyid kyi ni dbang bskur na/ /'bras bu chen po ster bar 'gyur/ /grub pa 'dod pa'i slob mas kyang / /thub mchog de ni rtag tu mchod/ /de yi bka' ni ma 'gom par/ /
160a7(rgyud): slob mas 'bad nas bya ba yin/ /ji ltar 'byor ba yod pa bzhin/ /longs spyod de la sbyin par bya/ /nyung ba'ang yang na mang ba'ang rung / /gang gis dga' ba thob 'gyur ba/ /lus dang srog
160b1(rgyud): gi don phyir ni/ /nor ni ji ltar sbyin pa bzhin/ /slob ma chos rig de bzhin du/ /slob dpon phyir ni nor sbyin na/ /tshe dang nad med de bzhin du/ /grags pa thob par 'gyur ba yin/ /slob mas bla
160b2(rgyud): ma de mchod na/ /dag pa'i 'gro ba thob par 'gyur/ /lam ni sna tshogs nyar bstan pas/ /de la sngags ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /de la bsten dang bsnyen bkur byas/ /ri mo byas dang mchod pas
160b3(rgyud): ni| |sangs rgyas rnams dang de bzhin du/ /rgyal ba'i sras rnams mnyes par 'gyur/ /bla ma rtag tu bsnyen bkur na/ /lha rnams thams cad dga' bar 'gyur/ /bla ma sngags rnams mthong ba
160b4(rgyud): yis| |de ltar thams cad bstan pa yin/ /sgrub pa pos ni dang por yang / /dam tshig la ni 'jug par bya/ /dma' ba'ang de dang mnyam pa'ang rung / /gal te khyad par gyur na yang / /rmongs pa'am
160b5(rgyud): lhag pa yin yang rung / /rtag tu bla ma brnyas mi bya/ /ji ltar de nyid rjes mthong la/ /sngags 'grub pa la bya ba yin/ /sngar bstan pa yi slob ma yis/ /de la phrag dog bya ba min/ /lus can
160b6(rgyud): brtse ba 'phel byed pa'i/ /mig ni gang la yod gyur pa/ /de ni slob ma nyid bya ste/ /slob dpon rgyur yang bya ba yin/ /gang du phan tshun rgyud la ni/ /brtse ba'i phreng ba yod pa dang / /brtse ba'i rgyud ni
160b7(rgyud): 'dzin pa la/ /de la sngags ni sbyin par bya/ /slob dpon la ni slob ma 'am/ /bla mas slob ma mthong ba'ang rung / /rtag tu spro bar 'gyur ba la/ /gnyi ga la ni grub pa gnas/ /de dag la ni rtag
161a1(rgyud): tu yang / /sngags spyod lam ni bstan par bya/ /gnyi gas pha dang bur shes la/ /sngags ni 'bras bcas gnas pa yin/ /slob ma bla mas rtag tu ni/ /brtan dang dga'
161a2(rgyud): ba de bzhin thob/ /bu ni chos dang rjes mthun la/ /'bad pas rtag tu bsrung bar bya/ /de dag la ni sangs rgyas chos/ /rtag tu rgyun mi chad par 'gyur/ /gal te de med mgon bral la/ /sngags
161a3(rgyud): rnams ji skad gsungs pa sbyin/ /sems can dbul po rnams la ni/ /khyad par du yang sngags byin na/ /sems can kun la'ang sbyin pa bas/ /sngags kyi spyod pa khyad par 'phags/ /
161a4(rgyud): mchog dang bar ma tha ma ni/ /dus rnams kun tu bya ba ste/ /rtag tu sems can kun la ni/ /rjes su gzung ba'i phyir bya'o/ /'gro ba'ang skye gnas rnams brtags nas/ /'dod pa dag
161a5(rgyud): la sbyin par bya/ /de ni ji ltar 'dod pa'i sngags/ /slob mas de la blang bar bya/ /de nyid kyis bstan lam yin te/ /gzhan du de lta ma yin no/ /'jig rten pha rol pa la ni/ /grub pa de
161a6(rgyud): las bslang bar bya/ /pha bzhin mgo bos phyag byas nas/ /de nas ji ltar 'dod bzhin 'gro /de nas gcig bu 'gro byas nas/ /mnyam par gzhag ste bzlas pa bya/ /slong mo slong bas
161a7(rgyud): rjes 'tsho zhing / /thub pa dus gsum zlos par byed/ /sngar ni ji ltar bstan pa bzhin/ /lam du rab tu 'jug par byed/ /de la rjes 'jug bsten pa dang / /'dug pa dang ni gnas pa
161b1(rgyud): 'o| |dben pa chen po ri rtse dang / /de bzhin chu bo'i ngogs gtsang dang / /ba lang gnas dang mtsho chen dang / /dben pa skye bo rnams spangs dang / /lha khang stongs dang shing dang ni/ /mtshan
161b2(rgyud): gcig ri ni mthon po dang / /rgya mtsho che ngogs dga' ba dang / /gling rnams chen po dag dang ni/ /rnam pa sna tshogs sngar bstan pa'i/ /yul ni yid du 'ong ba dang / /'di dag las ni phyogs
161b3(rgyud): gzhan du/ /mnyam gzhag sngags ni bzla bar bya/ /grogs po mtshan nyid ldan pa ni/ /sngags don lugs dang tshad mar ldan/ /zur gyi rnam pa de nyid shes/ /bdag dang de yang 'dra ba'o/ /dpa'
161b4(rgyud): zhing g.yul las rnam rgyal dang / /snying stobs che zhing bzod dang ldan/ /rgyal bas gsungs pa'i bstan pa dang / /sngags kyi spyod pa la dad cing / /sngags pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan la/ /bzod dang
161b5(rgyud): ldan pa'i grogs po la/ /de la 'bad pa med par ni/ /sngags kyi las rnams 'grub par 'gyur/ /tho rangs mal nas langs nas ni/ /mtsho chen las byung chu bo las/ /byung chu srog chags
161b6(rgyud): skyon med pa'i/ /bzang pos khrus ni rab tu bya/ /sa dang lci ba phye ma yis/ /sngags shes pas ni lus dril bya/ /sngags kyis de bzhin dag byas pa'i/ /dri med gtsang sgrar byas pa'i chus/ /sngags ldan
161b7(rgyud): bdag nyid khrus bya zhing / /ha cang ring bar 'dug mi bya/ /de nas langs nas chu dogs 'dug /sa dag gis kyang lag gnyis bkru/ /bdun dang bdun dang yang bdun ni/ /nyi shu rtsa gcig bar du'o//
162a1(rgyud): de bzhin du yang nye reg bya/ /so shing dag kyang yang dag byed/ /so shing rnam par bor nas ni/ /de nas skyob la phyag kyang bya/ /'jig rten mgon la phyag
162a2(rgyud): 'tshal nas/ /mchod pa yid du 'ong bar bya/ /rnam pa sna tshogs mchod bstod dang / /yang dag bstod pa yang yang bya/ /dri zhim me tog de bzhin du/ /ston la 'dod pas mchod
162a3(rgyud): yon dbul/ /sangs rgyas rnams dang de'i slob la/ /spyi bos rab btud phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jig rten mgon po de dag gi /mdun du sdig pa bshags par bya/ /ras ris bar
162a4(rgyud): ma'i mdun du ni/ /bdag nyid dag kyang dbul bar bya/ /ku sha'i khres ni byas pa der/ /legs par mnyam gzhag 'dug nas ni/ /des ni phreng ba thogs nas su/ /'bad pas
162a5(rgyud): bzlas pa bya ba yin/ /ji ltar rnyed pa'i sngags kyis bya/ /de tshe sngags gzhan bzlas mi bya/ /ha cang ngan pa spang bya ste/ /ha cang bzang po'ang de bzhin no/ /bar ma bar ma'i las dag
162a6(rgyud): la| |sdom chen sngags ni rtag tu bzla/ /ha cang skad mthon 'bad pas spang / /tshig ni dma' ba'ang ma yin no/ /bar ma dbus kyi yul dag tu/ /rjes mthun rgyal bas bsngags pa 'o/ /ha
162a7(rgyud): cang skad mtho dma' ba'ang min/ /bar mas rtag tu bzlas pa bya/ /sangs rgyas snga ma kun gyis ni/ /tshig ni legs ldan yin zhes gsungs/ /rtag tu gzhan gyi rna lam dang / /
162b1(rgyud): gzhan gyi drung du mi bzla 'o/ /dben pa'i phyogs su'ang bdag rig pas/ /sngags kyang bar ma bzla bar bya/ /de ltar sngags bzlas rab sbyar na/ /sngags ni gang yang myur du 'grub/ /
162b2(rgyud): bar ma'i sngags ni 'grub 'dod na/ /yang dang yang du bzlas pa bya/ /de bas bzlas pa rnam bral dang / /sngags kyi de nyid don legs thos/ /dben zhing gdung ba med par
162b3(rgyud): ni| |zlos pas sngags ni bzla bar bya/ /mtshan mo yi ni bzhi cha dang / /de phyed de bzhin phyed nyid dang / /skya reng dmar po zung tsam la/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'char ba na/ /dang po
162b4(rgyud): bar ma nyid du ni/ /thub pa mchog gis gsungs pa yin/ /zung tsam khru ni bzhi pa ste/ /bar mar yongs su bsgrags pa yin/ /de nas nyi ma phyed shar na/ /sngags bzlas de tshe spang bar
162b5(rgyud): bya| |sngags bzlas de tshe btang ba na/ /sdom brtson mchod yon slar gshegs gsol/ /de tshe btang ba'i lhag dus la/ /thub pa'i bstan la dge ba bya/ /dam chos bklag la sogs pa
162b6(rgyud): ni| |shes rab pha rol phyin la sogs/ /glegs bam sa bcu zhes bya ba/ /mchod dang bklag pa rtag tu bya/ /de nas dus la bab gyur na/ /rang sngags sngags kyi mgon po dang / /
162b7(rgyud): thub pa mchog la phyag 'tshal nas/ /de nas 'tsho ba'i don du 'gro /dus dang spyod dang de bzhin ldan/ /dus su zas spyod dbang bo thul/ /chos can sgrub la brtson pa dang / /sangs
163a1(rgyud): rgyas bstan la rab tu dad/ /mi smra grong gi nang du 'dug /rtag tu gtsang sbra spyod la dga'/ /chos ldan sems can khyim du ni/ /slong dus rtag zlos
163a2(rgyud): byed cing 'dug / srog chags med chos grub pa yi/ /zas ni gtsang bar grags pa dang / /yang dag lta ba'i khyim dang / dang / /sangs rgyas bstan la dang ba yi/ /de 'dra'i khyim
163a3(rgyud): la rtag tu ni/ /slong ba'i don du slong mo blang / /ji ltar dpa' bos go bgos te/ /nyam nga'i g.yul du 'jug pa na/ /rtag tu dgra ni 'joms byed de/ /dgra yis 'joms kyang
163a4(rgyud): mi nus pa/ /de bzhin sngags pa rtag grong du/ /slong mo'i 'tsho bas 'jug pa na/ /gzugs sgra la sogs bzang po ni/ /de ltar mthong bas chags gyur na/ /'dod chags
163a5(rgyud): zhi ba'i don gyi phyir/ /dge ba mi gtsang bsgom par bya/ /lang tsho'i rnam pas brgyan pa yi/ /bud med gzugs ni mthong ba na/ /mi gtsang dri ngan bsgom bya zhing / /shin tu smad
163a6(rgyud): pa rnag dang gcin/ /srin bus zos dang dur khrod gnas/ /lus ni mi rtag sdug bsngal yin/ /byis pa sngags la rmongs pa yis/ /'gro ba lnga po dag tu 'khor/ /las kyi skud
163a7(rgyud): pas bcings nas ni/ /yun ring dus su mya ngan byed/ /mi shes sgrib pas rmongs pas na/ /dmus long sdug bsngal rgyu yang yin/ /gang du blo ni phyin ci log /skye bo chags
163b1(rgyud): pas phongs par gyur/ /rnam pa sna tshogs las gar gyi/ /rnam pa du mar chags byed pas/ /yun ring res kyis gnas nas ni/ /'gro dang 'ong bar spyod par byed/ /gar byed bzhin du spyod pa
163b2(rgyud): yis| |bran bzhin du ni gtong bar byed/ /mi gtsang dga' ba'i sems can gang / /yun ring lam du phongs par 'gyur/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i chu 'byung ba/ /zo chun gyi ni rnam pa bzhin/ /
163b3(rgyud): 'gro ba de dag mi bzad pa'i/ /sdug bsngal chu yis khyab pa yin/ /sangs rgyas kyis ni bud med dag /ma 'dres sdug bsngal rtsa bar gsungs/ /nyan thos byang chub sems dpa' dang / /
163b4(rgyud): rang rgyal thub pas de bzhin gsungs/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtsho mi 'khrugs pa/ /rgya mtsho 'di ni skam par dga'/ /bud med sems kyis bslus pas ni/ /gang du sems can bying gyur
163b5(rgyud): nas| |dmyal ba dud 'gro'i 'jig rten dang / /yi dwags 'jig rten lha ma yin/ /de bzhin mi yi 'jig rten dang / /lha yi 'gro ba'i 'gro bar 'gro /bud med chags pas bslus
163b6(rgyud): pas na| |kun nas yongs su 'khor 'gyur zhing / /'dam chen nang du 'bying 'gyur la/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtsho btson ra yin/ /bud med chags pa'i blun po'i mi/ /rul pa'i ro la
163b7(rgyud): wa bzhin no/ /gang du mi ni chags byed pa/ /shin tu mi bzad sdug bsngal bzod/ /dkar po'i chos ni nges nyams byed/ /sangs rgyas bstan la zhugs pas ni/ /sdug bsngal 'khor
164a1(rgyud): ba'i rgya mtsho nyid/ /thams cad yongs su zlog byed cing / /sngags zlos dga' zhing brtson pa dang / /grags pa che zhing chags dang bral/ /gzi brjid ldan
164a2(rgyud): zhing kun dang mdza'/ /de dag la ni sdug bsngal med/ /yang dag sdom dang tshangs bden shes/ /bla ma lha la mchod byed dang / /ma dang pha la gus pa rnams/ /de dag la ni sdug
164a3(rgyud): bsngal med/ /dam pa'i don la brten na ni/ /mi rtag sdug bsngal stong pa dang / /de bzhin dbyig dug zug rdu bzhin/ /zlos pa bud med lus bsam bya/ /blo ngan phung ba'i lcags
164a4(rgyud): kyus zin/ /'khor ba las ni 'byung mi nus/ /rtag tu bud med chags gyur pa/ /de la grub pa yod ma yin/ /zlos pa 'di la tshul khrims nyams/ /de la grub pa mchog med cing / /
164a5(rgyud): grub pa 'bring yang yong med de/ /grub pa tha ma'ang yod ma yin/ /tshul khrims 'chal la thub dbang gis/ /sngags grub par ni ma gsungs te/ /mya ngan 'das grong 'gro ba
164a6(rgyud): yi| |yul dang phyogs kyang ma yin no/ /byis pa ngan pa 'di la ni/ /sngags grub pa ni ga la yod/ /skye bo tshul khrims 'chal 'di la/ /de la bde 'gro ga la yod/ /mtho
164a7(rgyud): ris su yang mi 'gyur zhing / /bde ba mchog tu'ang mi 'gyur na/ /rgyal bas gsungs pa'i sngags rnams ni/ /'grub par 'gyur ba smos ci dgos/ /ta la'i shing gi mgo
164b1(rgyud): pa ni| |gang tshe bcad par gyur pa na'ang / /sngon po nyid kyi skal med na/ /myu gu nam zhig 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin sngags grub rmongs pa dang / /tshul khrims nyams shing sdig las
164b2(rgyud): byed| |rtag tu bud med chags pa la/ /'dir ni rab tu bstan pa yin/ /mi dge'i bshes gnyen bsten pa la/ /sngags kyi rgyal po ga la 'grub/ /de bas dul dang rtag bzlas byed/ /bud med skyon
164b3(rgyud): ni rnam spyod la/ /de la chags pa rnam spang ba/ /de la grub par brjod pa yin/ /byis pa bud med la brgyal ba/ /gzhan la grub pa bstan pa min/ /blo ldan g.yeng ba med la dga'/ /gtsang
164b4(rgyud): zhing ma chags shes nyen can/ /rigs mtho brtan dang dpa' ba dang / /brtser ldan mthong na dga' ba dang / /chos dang chos min rnam dpyod shes/ /de la grub pa rnyed mi dka'/ /de ltar
164b5(rgyud): sngags shes zhugs pa ni/ /grong du slong phyir rab tu 'jug /sngar ni brtags pa'i gnas dag tu/ /ji ltar 'dod bzhin song nas ni/ /blo ldan dag pas bslang ba'i snod/ /gtsang ba'i phyogs su yang
164b6(rgyud): dag gzhag / phyi rol song nas rkang gnyis bkru/ /de nas yang ni yan lag ste/ /de tshe srog chags me dpa'i chus/ /lag pa g.yas pas byin pa g.yas/ /lag pa g.yon pas byin pa g.yon/ /yang
164b7(rgyud): na gnyis ka dus gcig bkru / sa ni lag g.yon yang bzhag nas/ /sngar ni yang dag bzhag pa yi/ /bdug pa gtsang ma'i sa dag gis/ /lag pa gnyis ni rab tu bkru /de nas sngags kyis
165a1(rgyud): dag byas pa'i/ /dri med gtsang sbra dag snod la/ /ba ni ser skyas bor ba yis/ /lci ba sar pa blang bar bya/ /srog chags med pa'i chur sbyar bas/ /ston pa la
165a2(rgyud): ni dkyil 'khor bya/ /dang po thub pa mchog la ni/ /khor yug khru gang tsam du bya/ /gnyis pa rang sngags mgon po la/ /gsum pa rang rigs lha la 'o/ /sngags pa bzlas pa gang
165a3(rgyud): byed pa| |rtag tu'ang de nyid bya ba yin/ /yang ni sems can thams cad kyi/ /longs spyod phyir ni bstan pa yin/ /g.yas su 'jig rten mgon po yi/ /dkyil 'khor 'di ni rtag tu bya//
165a4(rgyud): dkon mchog gsum gyi dkyil 'khor ni/ /gru bzhi dag tu bya ba yin/ /gnyis pa rang sangs rgyas rnams la/ /gsum pa stobs bcu ldan pa'i sras/ /dkyil 'khor bdun po
165a5(rgyud): 'di dag ni/ /kun nas gru bzhir bya ba yin/ /khru gang ngam ni khru phyed du/ /nyin re zhing ni bya ba yin/ /sdig pa 'jig byed bzlas pa ni/ /dben pa'i phyogs su nyin re bya/ /sngags
165a6(rgyud): pa de nas langs nas ni/ /'bad pas lag gnyis rab tu bkru /gtsang ba'i chu yis nye reg bya/ /dag cing srog chags spangs pa yi/ /dri med gtsang sbras 'bad nas ni/ /gtsang ba'i
165a7(rgyud): snod ni de tshe blang / /mtsho chen dang ni 'bab chu 'am/ /chu mig chu bo la gnas dang / /gtsang ba'i phyogs nas byung ba yi/ /sems can dag pa lag blangs la/ /gnyis sam gsum du
165b1(rgyud): rtag tu yang / /sngags pas nye reg bya ba yin/ /de nas chus reg gdong dang ni/ /de bzhin du ni rna khung dag /mig dang sna dang lag gnyis dang / /spyi bo lte ba'i phyogs reg bya/ /dge ba spyod
165b2(rgyud): pas lan lnga 'am bdun/ /cho ga ji bzhin thams cad bya/ /gtsang sbra'i spyod pa legs ldan pas/ /zlos pa gtsang bar gyur pa yis/ /slong snod yang dag blangs nas ni/ /chu yi gzhir ni 'gro
165b3(rgyud): bar bya| |gang du chu yi rgyun 'bab gnas/ /de bzhin du ni chu mig dang / /chu bo rab tu 'bab pa la/ /rtag tu zas ni bkru bar bya/ /gtsug lag khang ngam gnas khang du/ /de nas langs nas
165b4(rgyud): 'gro bar bya/ /gang du sngon ni brten pa dang / /gang du gnas pa der 'gro bya/ /de nas zlos pas lhung bzed de/ /song nas phyogs ni der gzhag bya/ /de nas nye reg myur byas nas/ /de bzhin
165b5(rgyud): yang ni lhung bzed blangs/ /lhung bzed sa 'am lo ma'am/ /dngul dang gser gyi snod dang ni/ /zangs ma shing shun dag kyang rung / /ston pa la ni dbul bar bya/ /sten pa la ni bshos
165b6(rgyud): phul nas/ /rang sngags sngags kyi rgyal po'ang brjod/ /'gron zhig sdug bsngal gyur 'ongs na/ /ci nus par ni sbyin par bya/ /rnam pa kun tu kha zas ni/ /ha cang mang ba sbyin mi
165b7(rgyud): bya| |sngags rig lus gdung mi bya ste/ /rnam pa kun tu ci rigs bya/ /lto ba'i tshad tsam gzhag bya ste/ /lhag ma'i zas ni rtag tu sbyin/ /bkres dang skom pas nyen gyur na/ /sngags
166a1(rgyud): kyi don la rten mi nus/ /kha zas mang dang nyung zos na/ /sngags rnams mnyes par mi nus so/ /de nyid phyir na thub dbang gis/ /sems can zas kyis
166a2(rgyud): gnas pa'o zhes/ /lus can rnams la gsungs pa ste/ /gang gis mi rnams 'tsho ba dang / /lha dang lha min dri za dang / /klu dang gnod sbyin mi'am ci/ /srin po yi dwags sha
166a3(rgyud): za dang / /'byung po skar ma gza' rnams dag /gang zhig kha zas mi za ba/ /de ni gang yang yod ma yin/ /rags pa'i zas ni gang yin pa/ /kham gyi zas su rnam par bsgrags//
166a4(rgyud): sems can phra ba'i zas can yang / /de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis gsungs/ /bsam gtan zas can rnams la ni/ /gzugs kyi khams na spyod pa'o/ /gzugs med khams
166a5(rgyud): kyi lha dag ni/ /ting 'dzin 'bras bu la spyod pa'o/ /srid pa bar ma'i sems can rnams/ /dri yi zas su rab tu bsgrags/ /de bzhin 'dod khams sems can dag /sna tshogs zas
166a6(rgyud): la spyod pa yin/ /de nyid phyir na thub dbang gis/ /las kyi rgyu yis gsungs pa ni/ /sems can zas kyis gnas pa zhes/ /thams cad la ni rab tu bsgrags/ /zlos la rtag
166a7(rgyud): tu brtson pas ni/ /zas kyi tshod rig bya ba yin/ /gang phyir sngags brten nus pa ni/ /kha zas la ni rab tu gnas/ /spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang / /dge zhing tshangs par
166b1(rgyud): spyod pa dang / /kha zas tshod ni rig pa la/ /de la grub pa rnyed mi dka'/ /ji ltar shing rta'i shing rta babs/ /mig ni yongs su bskus pa ni/ /yun ring dus su brtan phyir dang / /khal ni 'dogs
166b2(rgyud): bar bya phyir ro/ /de bzhin sngags pa sngags shes pas/ /kha zas gnas phyir 'dzin byed dang / /lus kyang tshim par bya ba'i phyir/ /zlos pas rtag tu gso bar bya/ /sngags rnams bsgrub pa'i
166b3(rgyud): phyir dang ni/ /byang chub tshogs ni bya ba'i phyir/ /de bzhin du ni sngags bzla ba/ /mi yi 'jig rten bsrung bya'o/ /de nyid phyir na thub mchog ni/ /'od srung zhes bya sngon byung ba/ /de tshe de dus sa
166b4(rgyud): steng 'dir/ /'od chen ldan pa des gsungs pa/ /'byung po rnams la legs don du/ /sngags 'di rab tu gsungs pa ni/ /'jig rten ma lus sdug bsngal dang / /dman dang dbul dang skyo ba dang //
166b5(rgyud): 'bad rtsol dag la nyon mongs pa/ /de dag don phyir gsungs pa ni/ /'byung po rnams la legs don dang / /de bzhin gnas par 'dod pa yang / /'byung po rnams la zas don du/ /sngags
166b6(rgyud): mchog 'di ni gsungs pa yin/ /nyan thos dag ni thams cad dang / /byang chub la gnas thams cad nyon/ /bdag gis sngags 'di rab brjod kyi/ /nad rnams 'jig byed zungs shig
166b7(rgyud): dang / /gang yang bkres nad kyis nyen dang / /gang yang sems can skom pa rnams/ /kun gyi sdug bsngal nyer zhi'i phyir/ /'byor ba 'dod rnams rab nyon cig /'od srung 'od ni chen
167a1(rgyud): po pa/ /thub pa mchog gis de skad gsungs/ /nyan thos rnams ni yid dga' nas/ /khyab bdag la ni gsol ba 'debs/ /chos mkhyen sngags ni
167a2(rgyud): bshad du gsol/ /chos kyi rgyal po thub pa che/ /sems can brtse ba'i mchog gyur pa/ /dus ni rab tu nye bar gnas/ /de skad gsol nas thub mchog gis/ /ka la ping ka'i
167a3(rgyud): sgra skad dang / /rnga bo che yi sgra skad dang / /tshangs dbyangs stobs ni chen po dang / /tshangs shes rgyal ba sngon 'dren pas/ /'byung po'i tshogs ni gang su dag /'dir lhags gyur
167a4(rgyud): pa kun nyon cig / rkang med dang ni rkang mangs dang / /rkang gnyis dang ni rkang bzhi pa/ /mdor na sems can kun gyi phyir/ /bde 'byung sngags ni bshad par bya/ /'das dang ma 'ongs
167a5(rgyud): da ltar gyi/ /sems can gang dag 'dir lhags pa/ /'byor pa 'dod rnams da nyon cig /mdor na bdag gis rab bshad bya/ /na maHsarba bud+d+ha nAM/ a pra ti ha ti shA sa nA nAM/
167a6(rgyud): tad+ya thA/ oM ga ga ne ga ga na gany+dze A na ya sarba la hu la hu sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/ A kaR+Sha Ni/ mA bi laM ba mA bi laM ba/ ya the bi staM me saM pa dA ya swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das 'od srung
167a7(rgyud): gis de skad gsungs nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gis bar der rig pa'i sngags kyi tshig rgya cher gsungs
167b1(rgyud): pa na nam mkha' de thams cad chen po la 'os pa'i zas kyi sprin gyis yongs su khengs par gyur to/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi nam mkha'i dkyil
167b2(rgyud): kun tu zas kyi sprin gyis khyab par snang bar gyur to/ /sems can gyi bsam pa ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i bza' ba dang / ji ltar 'dod pa'i zas de dag la char bzhin du bab par gyur
167b3(rgyud): to| |ji ltar 'dod pa'i zas dang / bza' ba'i bya ba ni bkres pa'i sdug bsngal zhi ba'i don dang / skom pa rnams kyis btung bar bya ba ni yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chu'i rgyun yid
167b4(rgyud): la 'dod pa bzhin du der bab par gyur to/ /de'i tshe de'i dus kyi skad cig de nyid la bkres pa'i nad thams cad rab tu zhi ba dang / skom pa thams cad dang bral bar gyur to/ /thams cad
167b5(rgyud): dang ldan pa'i 'khor de yang ngo mtshar dang / rab tu dga' ba thob par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod de rjes su yi rang nas bcom ldan 'das
167b6(rgyud): kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag btsal te de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas su rnam par bzhugs
167b7(rgyud): so| |bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ngas kyang de'i tshe de ltar bshad cing rjes su yi rang bar byas so/ /sngags kyi rgyal po'i mchog 'di la sems can thams cad kyi don du bkres pa
168a1(rgyud): dang / /skom pa sel ba'i phyir dang / sngags thams cad zlos pa dag la yang khyad par du sel bar 'gyur ro/ /dang po re zhig zlos pas sngags 'di bsgrub
168a2(rgyud): par bya ste/ gal te bsod snyoms la 'gro bar spro bar med na ri'i rtse mo la 'dzegs te 'bum phrag bdun bzla bar bya zhing zas dkar gsum mam/ 'o ma'i zas bza' zhing ri'i rtse
168a3(rgyud): mo de nyid du 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi ras ris bar ma gong ma bzhin bzhag ste/ mchod pa chen po byas nas shin tu rgya che ba'i gtor ma phul te/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
168a4(rgyud): sangs rgyas 'od srung 'di nyid kyis gsungs pa'i sngags kyis seng ldeng gi yam shing gi me rab tu spar te/ shing u dum bA ra'i yam shing la mar dang / sbrang rtsis btags pa'i shing rlon
168a5(rgyud): mtho gang tsam mam/ bil ba'i 'bras bu'i yam shing stong rtsa brgyad kyis sbyin sreg bya'o/ /de nas nam phyed kyi dus mtshams su sprin nag po chen po dang / rlung gi dkyil 'khor byung na 'jigs
168a6(rgyud): par mi bya/ /langs te gzhan du 'gro bar mi bya zhing / 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi yi ge brgyad kyi snying pos bdag nyid bsrung ba dang / dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang / grogs bsrung ba yang
168a7(rgyud): byas na| snga ma lta bu'i sprin nag po dang / rlung nag po de yang mi snang bar gyur te/ bud med yang rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis phyogs thams cad
168b1(rgyud): snang bar byas te/ sgrub pa po'i mdun du 'dug nas smra ba ni/ kye sems can chen po/ longs shig /khyod ni grub pa yin no zhes so/ /de nas sgrub pa pos sna ma'i me tog gis bsres pa'i
168b2(rgyud): dri zhim po'i chus mchod yon sbyin no/ /de nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /gang de'i nyin mo nas bdag nyid dang / grogs po nyi shu rtsa lnga 'am/ yang ci 'dod pa'i grogs po dag
168b3(rgyud): la ci 'dod pa'i kha zas dang / ji ltar 'dod pa'i yo byad rnams yang dag par ster bar byed do/ /de nas sgrub pa pos ras ris la gshegs su gsol ba'i mchod yon dbul te/
