168b4(rgyud): lan gsum bskor ba byas nas ras ris blangs te/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' la phyag byas nas/ sngar bstan pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs ji lta bu'i gnas dgon pa chen
168b5(rgyud): po 'am/ ri'i rtse mo 'am/ mi med pa'i gnas su 'gro bar bya'o/ /der lo ma'i spyil po byas te/ bdag nyid dang / grogs po gnyi gar bcas te rab tu gnas par bya'o/ /der
168b6(rgyud): gnas pa dang / gnas de la nam mkha' la 'gro ba la sogs pa'i las byas te/ de nas sgrub pa pos snga ma bzhin du ku sha'i khres la 'dug nas ras ris bar ma snga ma bzhin du
168b7(rgyud): bzhag ste/ seng ldeng gi yam shing gis me rab tu sbar la/ dus gsum du me tog pad+ma dkar po zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pa stong rtsa brgyad nyi ma nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar
169a1(rgyud): du sbyin sreg bya'o/ /de nas mtshan phyed kyi dus su sbyin sreg gi mthar 'phags pa 'jam dpal mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /'dod pa'i mchog
169a2(rgyud): stsol bar yang 'gyur ro/ /nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / mi snang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang / rang sangs rgyas nyid dam/ nyan thos nyid dam/ tshe ring ba nyid dam/
169a3(rgyud): rgyal srid chen po dang / longs spyod chen po nyid dam/ rgyal po dga' ba nyid dam/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal dang lhan cig rjes su spyod par 'gyur te/ mdor na/ gang 'dod pa
169a4(rgyud): de thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /gang don du gnyer ba de yang rjes su stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /grub pa'i rdzas thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /sems can chen po rnams
169a5(rgyud): kyang 'gugs par byed par 'gyur ro/ /mdor na/ ji lta ji ltar brjod pa de thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /sngon gyi las kyi nyes pa yang yang dag par spyod par byed do
169a6(rgyud): zhes bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas gsungs so/ /gzhan yang / las kyi thabs par ma sgrub pa yang yod de/ dang po re zhig de ltar khyad par du gyur pa'i gnas sam/
169a7(rgyud): gtsang ba'i sa phyogs sam/ chu bo 'am/ chu gling gi ngogs su snga ma bzhin du thams cad bya ste/ ras ris nub cu bstan te bzhag la bdag kyang shar du mngon du phyogs par
169b1(rgyud): byas nas ku sha'i khres la 'dug ste/ snga ma bzhin du rgya cher sbyar bar byas nas dus gsum du yi ge drug pa bzlas par bya ste/ bzlas pa rdzogs pa dang / dong ka'i me tog la tsan+dan
169b2(rgyud): dkar po 'am/ gur gum gyis bsgos pas snga ma bzhin du sbyin sreg stong phrag brgya bya'o/ /de bzhin du me sbar nas sbyin sreg gi mjug tu ras ris rab tu 'gul ba na ni blon po nyid thob
169b3(rgyud): par 'gyur ro/ /ras ris las 'od kyi snang ba byung na ni 'od las rgyal srid thob par 'gyur ro/ /ras ris 'od 'bar ba'i phreng bas kun khyab na ni rgyal po chen po bzhi'i rgyal srid
169b4(rgyud): thob par 'gyur ro/ /ras ris las me stag byung na ni sum cu rtsa gsum gyi dbang phyug brgya byin nyid thob par 'gyur ro/ /ras ris las chos 'chad pa'i sgra byung na ni byang chub sems
169b5(rgyud): dpa'i sa gsum gyi dbang phyug nyid thob par 'gyur ro/ /ras ris kyi phyag gis mgo la phyug par mdzad na ni mngon par shes pa lnga dang / sa bdun pa thob pa dang / stobs bcu la
169b6(rgyud): gnas pa mthar gyis thob pa yin no/ /de nas sgrub pa po la bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gis gsungs pa'i sngags bsgrubs te/ bkres pa dang / skom pa rab tu bsal ba'i don
169b7(rgyud): rjes su thob pa de nyid kyi 'tshog chas/ sngags spyod pa'i don sgrub thabs kyi chos la yang dag par rjes su bsgrub par bya'o/ /gzhan du ni 'di 'grub par mi 'gyur ro/ /de ltar mthar
170a1(rgyud): gyis sngags kyi spyod pa la rjes su 'jug cing / mdor na/ nges par 'bad pa la ni rdzas dang / sman dang / yo byad kyi khyad par dang / nor bu rin po
170a2(rgyud): che sngar ji skad bshad pa rnams 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /sngags rig sngags ni zlos pa dang / /sems ni cho ga la mkhas dang / /sngags pa de tshe de yul du/ /de tshe gtsang ba'i
170a3(rgyud): kha zas bza'/ /zos nas yid ni dga' ba dang / /rtag tu dbang po rgyas pa dang / /lhung bzed lhag ma blangs nas ni/ /chu bo gtsang ba dag tu 'gro /dben par yongs su bor
170a4(rgyud): nas ni| |sdom can gyis sbyin dud 'gro la/ /dud 'gro la ni byin nas kyang / /'bad pas snod ni bkru bar bya/ /de nas 'bad pa byas nas ni/ /sa yi snod kyang bsreg par bya/ /lhag
170a5(rgyud): ma lhung bzed bya ba ni/ /snum med zas ni med pa dang / /dri nyid yongs su spang bya zhes/ /lhag ma lhung bzed thub pas gsungs/ /gang du slong ba'i lhung bzed la/ /der ni
170a6(rgyud): kha zas mi spyad do/ /shing thog dngos rnams thams cad dang / /bca' ba rnams kyang der mi spyad/ /pad+ma'i lo mar bza' mi bya/ /ut+pa snod la bza' ba min/ /me tog dri
170a7(rgyud): mchog la min te/ /sngags pas de la bza' mi bya/ /gang yang lo ma ku mu dang / /p+lak+sha u dum bA ra las byung / /pa Ta shing gi lo ma'ang min/ /tsher ma'i shing dang ri khrod byung / /
170b1(rgyud): a mra'i lo ma dag la'ang min/ /de bzhin pa Ta la las byung / /sa la shri sha'i lo ma dang / /byang chub shing las yang dag byung / /gang du bcom ldan sangs rgyas ni/ /shAkya seng+ge bzhugs
170b2(rgyud): pa yi/ /shing de 'bad pas spang bya ste/ /so shing du yang bca' mi bya/ /klu shing gi ni ge sar dang / /lo ma dag kyang mi btung zhing / /gang du'ang nam yang bza' mi bya/ /mkhas pas de
170b3(rgyud): kun rnam par spongs/ /thub pa'i lo ma'i spyil po las/ /rmongs pas nam yang 'god mi bya/ /sngags pa dam tshig nyams 'gyur bas/ /lo ma de dag la mi bza'/ /lo ma
170b4(rgyud): gzhan la bza' bya ste/ /sngags pas der ni bza' bar bya/ /sa dang zangs mar bstan pa dang / /de bzhin dngul dang gser las byung / /shel dang rdo yi rang bzhin las/ /
170b5(rgyud): rtag tu bza' ba blang bar bya/ /lo ma'i rgyab tu mi bza' ste/ /lag pa'i mthil du'ang de bzhin no/ /stobs bcu ldan dang de yi sras/ /gang yang rang rgyal bse ru dang / /nyan thos
170b6(rgyud): gang zag dag la ni/ /phul ba'i lo ma gang yin pa/ /de dag zlos pas spang bya ste/ /rkang pas kyang ni mi 'gom mo/ /zas snod rnam pa sna tshogs dang / /de bzhin btung dang bza'
170b7(rgyud): ba rnams/ /thams cad de ltar phul bas na/ /sngags pas 'bad pas blang mi bya/ /rgyal dang rgyal ba'i mchog rnams dang / /de bzhin nyan thos gang zag dang / /dkon
171a1(rgyud): mchog gsum la phul ba yang / /zlos pas de dag rtag tu spang / /cung zad tsam yang lus can la/ /sngags rnams de la mi 'grub ste/ /bkra shis thams
171a2(rgyud): cad 'dod pa dang / /legs pa bzang po smos ci dgos/ /rgyas pa dang ni zhi ba dang / /bsam pa thams cad rdzogs byed pa/ /bshos ni za bar byed de la/ /de tshe 'grub par mi
171a3(rgyud): 'gyur ro/ /gtsang zhing shes rab tshul khrims ldan/ /snying rjes snying rje'i las can dang / /gtsang sgra'i spyod la dga' ba nyid/ /sngags rnams kun tu 'grub par
171a4(rgyud): 'gyur| |sems can gzhan la sbyin pa'i zas/ /zlos pas de ni bza' mi bya/ /gzhan gyis rab tu ma bstabs pa'i/ /zas gzhan bza' bar mi bya'o/ /cung zad tsam
171a5(rgyud): gyi kha zas kyang / /rang la byin pa blang bar bya/ /sngags shes de ltar 'jug gang yin/ /de las grub pa dpag na gnas/ /zlos pa 'di yi cho ga yis/ /sdom can bza'
171a6(rgyud): ba blang bar bya/ /thub pa rnams kyis bsngags pa yi/ /sngags rnams ma lus bsgrub par bya/ /mdor na cho ga mthong bas ni/ /bza' ba kun bya las rnams la/ /de nas
171a7(rgyud): gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /sngags kyis ma lus dbang du byed/ /de nas zlos pas nye reg byas/ /de tshe sngags ni bzlas par bya/ /sngags pas de tshe lan bdun du/ /lus
171b1(rgyud): sbyangs phyir ni bzlas nas su/ /'byung po'i tshogs dang lha rnams dag /de don rgya cher rab nyon cig /lus kun nye reg byas nas ni/ /thub pa'i sngags 'di brjod par bya/ /
171b2(rgyud): na maHsarba bud d+hA nAM/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/ tad+ya thA/ oM sarba kilbi Sha nA sha ni/ nA sha ya nA sha ya/ sarba duSh+Ta pra yuk+taM/ sa ma ya ma nu sma ra hUM dzaHswAhA/ /sngags 'dis
171b3(rgyud): bslangs pa'i zas ji ltar yongs su spyod pa'i kha zas la lan gsum sngags te yongs su spyad par bya'o/ /zos nas kyang snga ma bzhin du nye reg bya ste/ spyi bo la sogs pa lus
171b4(rgyud): thams cad du nye reg byas nas de nas ngal gso bar bya ste/ ngal sos nas yud tsam gyi phyed dam/ thun gcig ste/ de nas ras ris dang / sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal
171b5(rgyud): nas| dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam bklag par bya'o/ /'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 'phags pa zla ba'i sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'phags pa sa bcu
171b6(rgyud): pa dang / 'phags pa gser 'od dam pa dang / 'phags pa rma bya chen mo dang / 'phags pa rin po che tog gi gzungs dang / 'di dag las gang yang rung ba bklag par bya'o/ /
171b7(rgyud): nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor zung tsam gyi tshad kyi dus na/ de nas yongs su grub pa ni ji ltar nus pa de bzhin du bklag par byas nas glegs bam brtul ba'am/ gos gtsang ma bgos
172a1(rgyud): te/ dam pa'i chos la phyag byas nas/ de nas khrus kyi don du chu'i ngogs sam/ mtsho chen por song ste 'jug par bya'o/ /phyin nas srog chags med pa'i sa
172a2(rgyud): blangs te/ lan bdun bzlas te de chu la gdab bo/ /de yang gang zhe na/ na maHsarba bud d+hA nAM/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/ tad+ya thA/ oM sarba duSh+Ta na stam+b+ha ya hUM/ na di ba rA bA ra Ni/ ku mA
172a3(rgyud): ra kr-I Da rU pa Ni ban d+ha ban d+ha/ sa ma ya ma nu sma ra phaT phaT swAhA/ 'dis bsrung ba byas nas phyogs rnams bcing ba dang / grogs rnams dang / dkyil 'khor dang / thab
172a4(rgyud): khung bcing ba dang / ma rungs pa dang / rab tu ma rungs pa thams cad 'gugs par byed pa dang / skud pa dkar po la lan bdun bzlas te/ rked pa'i phyogs su bcings na
172a5(rgyud): thams cad du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /bzlas pa'i dus thams cad dang / khrus kyi dus thams cad du yang bgegs ma rungs pa rnam par 'jig pa dang / rab tu zhi bar bya
172a6(rgyud): ba'i phyir sngags 'di 'bum phrag gcig bzlas na des ni las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /gtsug phud lnga'i phyag rgya chen po dang ldan pa dgod par bya'o/ /
172a7(rgyud): las thams cad la thams cad du byed par 'gyur te gzhan du ma yin no/ /de nas sgrub pa po sa sa dang / lci ba'i phye ma la sogs pa blangs te ci bde bar khrus byas
172b1(rgyud): te| srog chags med pa'i chus kyang bkrus te/ las thams cad la yang srag chags med pa'i chus bya'o/ /de nas sa dang / lci ba'am/ gzhan yang dri zhim bo dang ldan pa'i yo byad
172b2(rgyud): kyi khyad par gyis byugs te de'i 'og tu khrus bya'o/ /chu'i nang du bshang gci yang dor bar mi bya'o/ /chu gtor zhing dor bar yang mi bya'o/ /chu la rtse bar yang mi bya'o/ /snying rjes
172b3(rgyud): bdag dang / sems can thams cad la so sor brtag par bya'o/ /bdag med pa dang / stong pa dang / sdug bsngal gyis khyab pa/ tshor bas mngon par gnod pa/ sdug bsngal
172b4(rgyud): thob pa bzhin du 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba'i sbyor bas sdug bsngal ba/ de bzhin du sems can sgrub pa dang bral ba/ sngags rig pas 'di lta bur 'jig pa dang / rnam par g.yeng
172b5(rgyud): ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gyi tshogs kyis nye bar khyab pa/ 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho brgal dka' ba la gnas pa'i bdag nyid du mthong zhing
172b6(rgyud): gnas med pa dang / skyob pa med pa dang / skyabs med pa dang / shin tu dman pa'i yid can du bdag nyid brtags la sgom pa pos mi gang tsam gyi chu'am/ lte ba tsam gyi
172b7(rgyud): chu la gnas te/ chu de nyid kyi dbus su sems rtse gcig tu nye bar gnas par bya'o/ /dang po re zhig pad+ma chen po'i rtse lag la me tog pad+ma chen po dang ldan pa/ pad+ma
173a1(rgyud): chen po'i 'dab mas nye bar mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ sdong bu rin po che bai DUR+ya'i rang bzhin las byung ba/ pad+ma'i ge sar rin po che margad las
173a2(rgyud): grub pa 'dab ma stong shel las byas pa/ shin tu rnam par kha phye ba/ de'i rjes su skyes pa'i shel dang / pad+ma rA ga'i me tog gis mdzes par byas pa/ de'i steng du seng ge'i
173a3(rgyud): khri rin po che'i rang bzhin las grub pa rin po che du mas nye bar mjes pa/ ras bcos bu zung gis rab tu bkab pa/ de'i steng du bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
173a4(rgyud): 'das bsgom par bya ste/ chos 'chad cing bzhugs pa/ gser gyi mdog ltar snang ba/ kun nas 'od 'bar ba'i phreng ba can/ 'od 'dom gang ba'i phreng ba can/ 'od 'dom
173a5(rgyud): gang gi dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan pa/ sku'i tshad chen po nam mkha' la thug pa dang 'dra ba/ skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/ g.yas su yang 'phags pa 'jam dpal rgyan
173a6(rgyud): thams cad kyis nye bar mdzes par byas pa/ pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa/ rnga yab thogs pa/ bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa'i zur na gnas pa/ sku'i kha dog dmar skya
173a7(rgyud): 'am| gur gum bdar ba lta bu'o/ /g.yon du'ang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kha dog ston ka'i zla rgyu 'dra ba rnga yab thogs pa/ de bzhin du byang chub sems
173b1(rgyud): dpa' brgyad la 'phags pa byams pa dang / kun tu bzang po dang / sa'i snying po dang / nam mkha' mdzod dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / ngan song sbyong ba dang /
173b2(rgyud): 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje dang / khams bzang can te/ byang chub sems dpa' bcu po de dag gi g.yas logs su rang sangs rgyas brgyad bsgom par bya ste/ tsan+dan dang /
173b3(rgyud): spos kyi ngad ldang dang / tog dang / legs tog dang / tog dkar dang / 'dod pa dang / nye ba'i 'dod pa dang / mu khyud de 'di brgyad do/ /de nyid du nyan thos chen po brgyad gnas
173b4(rgyud): pa la| 'di lta ste/ 'phags pa maud gal gyi bu chen po dang / shA ri'i bu dang / ba lang bdag dang / b+ha ra dwa dza bsod snyoms len dang / pi lin da'i bu dang / 'phags pa sgra
173b5(rgyud): gcan 'dzin dang / 'od srung chen po dang / 'phags pa kun dga' bo'o/ /nyan thos chen po de dag dang nye bar dge slong gi dge 'dun mtha' yas pa bsgom par bya'o/ /rang
173b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang nye ba na rang sangs rgyas bsam gyis mi khyab pa bsgom par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen po brgyad kyi gnas su yang byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun bsam
173b7(rgyud): gyis mi khyab pa bsgom par bya'o/ /de bzhin du nam mkha'i dkyil thams cad du 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po dang ldan pa bsgom par bya ste/ bdag kyang lte ba tsam gyi chu la
174a1(rgyud): gnas bzhin du lha dang / mi'i me tog rnam pa sna tshogs pa la me tog man dA ra ba dang / man dA ra ba chen po dang / pad+ma dang / pad+ma chen po dang /
174a2(rgyud): d+ha nu ska ri dang / ba shi ka dang / ut+pal la sngon po dang / me tog rnam pa sna tshogs la tshad chen po dang / tshan chen por gyur pa'i ri rab tsam gyi me tog gi snyim pas bcom
174a3(rgyud): ldan 'das la yang dag par mchod de/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams la lha dang / mi'i phye ma dang / gos dang
174a4(rgyud): gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag dang / mar me rab tu mang po bya ba khri phrag brgya stong yid du 'ong bas yang dag par mchod par byed la/ de bzhin du lha dang /
174a5(rgyud): mi'i gtor ma dang / bdug spos dang / bshos la sogs pa bsnyen bkur thams cad dang / yo byad rnams nye bar dbul bar bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i
174a6(rgyud): mdzod spu nas kyang 'od zer byung ste/ bdag nyid dang / phyogs thams cad kyang snang bas khyab par sgom mo/ /zlos pa po bsam gtan la zhugs ma thag tu tshangs pa'i
174a7(rgyud): bsod nams dang mnyam pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur/ nges par byang chub la yang gzhol bar 'gyur ro/ /de la sogs pa'i bsam gtan ni/ /'jig rten gang zag
174b1(rgyud): mchog gis gsungs/ /'byung po kun la legs pa dang / /sngags pa rnams la phan pa'i don/ /bsam gtan de tshe dang po'i gtsos/ /sngags pa rnams la phan don du/ /
174b2(rgyud): gsungs pa sems can rnams la ni/ /de nas thub mchog bdun pa yis/ /dkyil 'khor rnam pa de nyid ni/ /gang yin dang po thub pas gsungs/ /gnyis pa yi ni dkyil 'khor
174b3(rgyud): dang / /gsum par yang ni de las gzhan/ /dang po mchog gi grub pa yin/ /gnyis pa de bzhin de las gzhan/ /tha ma grub pa phra mo zhes/ /thub pa mchog gis nges par gsungs//
174b4(rgyud): mchog dang bar dang tha ma ni/ /de bzhin ras ris bar ma bsgom/ /mdor na rnam gsum sgom pa ni/ /sdig pa'i rnyog pa ma lus 'jig /mkhas pas sgom pa'i rnam pa ni/ /de las
174b5(rgyud): gzhan du mi bsten te/ /sngags rnams de la 'grub par 'gyur/ /bsam gtan de la rab tu gnas/ /ci 'dod cho ga bstan nas ni/ /zlos pas bsam gtan byas nas su/ /sngags kyi
174b6(rgyud): lha ni gshegs gsol te/ /mchod yon gsol nas ci bde bar/ /chu bzhi de las byung nas ni/ /ci bde bar na 'gro bar bya/ /gnas kyang sngar ni bstan pa yi/ /cho ga legs dben
174b7(rgyud): mthong ba yi/ /sngags pas sngags ni de tshe bzla/ /ji bzhin las ni sngar bstan pa'o/ /rang gi lha ni spyan drangs pa/ /der ni sngags kyis gshegs su gsol/ /de nas rang nyid bsrung bya
175a1(rgyud): zhing / /de bzhin grogs po dag kyang bsrung / /dge ba'i las kyi de nyid shes/ /cho ga'i las la dga' zhing 'dog /bstod pa'i rnam pa mang pos mchod/ /
175a2(rgyud): gang zag mchog la bstod nas ni/ /rang sngags sngags kyi mgon po dang / /nyan thos rang rgyal bse ru dang / /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ /'jig rten gsum la rjes
175a3(rgyud): gzung mdzod/ /sngags zlos pas ni gnas de nas/ /de nas kyang ni langs nas su/ /gnas ni thag ring song nas ni/ /phyi rol rlung ni rnam spangs par/ /snabs dang mchil ma rnam par
175a4(rgyud): dor| |bshang dang gci ba'ang de bzhin te/ /nyin par byang du kha bltas te/ /mtshan mo lhor ni blta bar bya/ /der ni don rnams mi bsam ste/ /sngags zlos nam yang bya ba min/ /
175a5(rgyud): der ni sngags kyang mi bzla zhing / /las bcas rigs kyang bshad ma yin/ /rab sngags 'gros dang mtshan sogs kyis/ /de tshe sa la 'dug par bya/ /gtsang phyir gos mtha' chur
175a6(rgyud): gzhug bya/ /chu gtsang gis ni nye reg bya/ /'bad pas rkang gnyis bkru bya ste/ /sa ni khyor ba bdun blangs nas/ /lan bdun sa de nyid kyis so/ /bshang ba la ni sum cus bya/ /
175a7(rgyud): mchil ma dor dang de bzhin du/ /snabs dor ba la re re'o/ /de nas nye reg bya ba yin/ /sgra med de bzhin song nas ni/ /lam la sogs pa spangs pa'o/ /de nas gzhan yang ci
175b1(rgyud): 'dod par/ /lho phyogs mtha' ni phyi rol tu/ /g.yangs zhing dang tshwa sgo dang / /de bzhin bye mas khyab pa la/ /chu bo spangs shing ngogs kyang spangs/ /mi gtsang ba yang spang bar bya/ /rab
175b2(rgyud): tu bkab dang dben yid ches/ /bas mtha' skye bo rnam spangs pa/ /sngags pas de 'dra'i sa dag tu/ /mi gtsang ba ni dor bar bya/ /sngags zlos dus ni shes pa yis/ /ji ltar
175b3(rgyud): 'dod pa'i shugs dag min/ /de nas gtsang mtha'i phyogs song nas/ /bshang gci'i bya ba byas nas ni/ /de nas gnas su ci bder gnas/ /gsal ba'am dben ba'am g.yogs pa
175b4(rgyud): 'am| |skye bo med pa'i sa phyogs su/ /mi smra lus reg spangs nas ni/ /rtag tu bshang gci bya ba yin/ /bshang dang gci ba med byas nas/ /sdom can gtsang sbra rtag tu bya/ /reg na 'jam
175b5(rgyud): dang 'dod pa yi/ /srog chags rnam par spangs pa yi/ /sa gsum yongs su blangs nas su/ /gcig gis bshang ba'i phyogs su bya/ /sa yi cha gnyis dag gis kyang / /lag pa gnyis
175b6(rgyud): ni bkru bar bya/ /sngags pas sa dag rtag tu ni/ /sngar bstan pa dag blang bar bya/ /'bad pas rkang g.yon bkru bya ste/ /de nas g.yas pa bkru bar bya/ /phan tshun nyid du bshibs
175b7(rgyud): nas ni/ /zlos pas rkang pa bkru bar bya/ /sngags zlos pas ni gtsang sbra dag /sngar ni rgya chen bstan pa yin/ /dri nga med pa'i gtsang sbra yang / /thub pas sngar ni bstan pa yin/ /
176a1(rgyud): sngags zlos pa yi gtsang sbra ni/ /'dir ni mdor bsdus bstan pa yin/ /dri ma bral ba'i gtsang sbra yi/ /gtsang sbra nyid ni rtag tu bya/ /rgyud rnams kun
176a2(rgyud): la snang ba zhes/ /thub pa'i dbang pos gsungs pa yin/ /de nas 'dod pas nye reg bya/ /sdom can gyis grub las kyang bya/ /sngar bstan pa yi cho ga yis/ /yid ni nang gi dag pa yin//
176a3(rgyud): rgyud rnams kun la bsngags pa yi/ /gtsang sbra lnga yi cho ga gsungs/ /lus kyi dag dang ngag dag dang / /yid kyi dag pa yin par bstan/ /bzhi ba bden pa'i dag pa ste/ /chu
176a4(rgyud): yi dag pa lnga par bshad/ /bden pa'i chos can khro ba thul/ /de nyid shes shing bstan bcos mthong / /phra ba'i de nyid don la mkhas/ /sngags shes las la grags pa dang / /
176a5(rgyud): phyi dang nang la mkhas pa dag /de la dngos grub rnyed mi dka'/ /bden pa'i chos ni rnam spangs pa'i/ /rdzun gyi tshig ni smra mi bya/ /de nyid thams cad rnam spangs pa'i/ /ma rungs
176a6(rgyud): rab tu ma rungs dang / /rnam par sdang dang 'khrug bcas dang / /rtsub dang gnad rnams smra ba dang / /bden ba'i chos ni rnam nyams pa/ /sems can gzhan la gnod byed pa/ /phra ma
176a7(rgyud): nyon mongs can sems dang / /chos kun rnam par spangs pa dang / /rtag tu 'tshe ba'i bdag nyid dang / /khrims 'chal chos min spyod pa dang / /zlos pa'i sngags pas rtag tu spang //
176b1(rgyud): grong gi chos dang de bzhin no/ /khro ba log par 'byung ba yi/ /'jig rten pha rol 'jigs rnams la/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang / /blo ldan rnams kyis yongs su smad/ /
176b2(rgyud): rtag tu rang rgyal bse ru dang / /nyan thos kyis kyang rtag tu smad/ /brdzun pa de bzhin 'jig rten na/ /sa steng grub pa 'dod rnams la'o/ /brdzun pa nye bar smra ba dag /shin tu mi bzad dmyal
176b3(rgyud): bar 'gro / de bzhin dud 'gro yi dwags dang / /gshin rje'i 'jig rten rtag tu 'gro /rdzun ni nye bar smra ba yis/ /der ni rtag tu gnas pa yin/ /blo ngan mi bzad ltung ba ni/ /thig nag rab tu tsha ba
176b4(rgyud): dang / /yang sos ral gri'i lo ma dang / /de bzhin shal ma li nags su/ /rdzun smra ba yi gang zag ni/ /bskal pa mang por der gnas so/ /log par smra bar gyur ba dang / /rmongs pas log par
176b5(rgyud): brjod pa yis/ /'byung po rnams las slu byed pa/ /de la sngags grub ga la yod/ /des na rmongs pa'i las de yis/ /sngags ni grub par ma mthong nas/ /'di skad du ni tshig smra ba/ /sngags
176b6(rgyud): la grub pa med do zhes/ /de skad kyi ni tshig smra ba/ /gang gis sangs rgyas bstan pa 'di/ /sa steng 'dir ni spangs pa yin/ /bskal ba bye ba mang por yang / /de la grub pa ga la yod/ /des na
176b7(rgyud): mi bzad dmyal bar 'tshed/ /mnar med 'jigs pa chen po dang / /yang sos dang ni thig nag dang / /rab tu tsha ba'i dmyal bar ni/ /dam pa'i chos la brnyas pa yis/ /der ni bskal pa chen
177a1(rgyud): por gnas/ /gang yang dmyal ba mi bzad par/ /byis pa'i skye bo 'tshed byed pa/ /dam pa'i chos la brnyas byed dang / /zhe sdang mun pas bsgribs pa'o/ /
177a2(rgyud): mi shes byis pa'i ngo bo'am/ /rmongs pa log pa'i nga rgyal gyis/ /rig pa'i rgyal po brnyas byed pa/ /mi bzad dmyal bar 'gyur ba yin/ /de bas sdig pa mi bya zhing / /log bar
177a3(rgyud): smra ba'ang smad pa dang / /dam pa'i chos kyang mi brnyas shing / /lta ba log pa'ang smad par bya/ /de bas rtag tu dad gyur nas/ /sngags kyi cho ga rtag tu bsten/ /chos shes bden
177a4(rgyud): par smra ba dang / /sems can rnams la phan par dga'/ /sngags dang sngags shes bsten gyur pa/ /nges par de la grub pa yin/ /mchog dang bar ma tha ma las/ /rnam pa sna tshogs
177a5(rgyud): las byed de/ /las ni bya bas byed pa ste/ /bya ba mi byed rtag tu ni/ /bya ba las ni ldan pa las/ /rtag tu de las grub par 'gyur/ /bya phyir las rnams thams cad phyir/ /las phyir rtag tu
177a6(rgyud): bya ba yin/ /bya ba'i don du bya ba min/ /bya ba las la sbyar ba yin/ /don bcas nyid kyi bya ba la/ /bya ba nyid kyis rtag tu bya/ /bya ba las dang 'bras bu nyid/ /bya ba las 'bras rtag tu
177a7(rgyud): bya| |'bras med pa las 'bras 'byung zhing / /'bras bu nyid kyang rtag 'bras 'gyur/ /'bras med 'bras bur bcas pa yang / /thams cad 'bras bu kho nar 'gyur/ /yang dag
177b1(rgyud): ldan pas sngags grub ste/ /yang dag ldan pas sngags grub pa'o/ /ldan pas rnam par bral ba ni/ /mi ldan ldan pa grub pa min/ /bsgrub bya sgrub pa med pa ni/ /de la grub pa mi 'grub bo/ /
177b2(rgyud): grub pa'i rdzas ni thams cad kyang / /grub pa'i rgyu dang 'gal ba yin/ /sngags pa ma grub sgrub byed pa/ /sngags ni sgrub par byed pa min/ /byed pa rab 'dod las yin te/ /las la
177b3(rgyud): 'dod pa bya bar 'dod/ /las min las ni thams cad la/ /las kyi rgyur ni mi bya'o/ /sngags dang rgyud kyi don ldan pa'i/ /'bras bcas las ni brtsam par bya/ /brtsam pa'i las
177b4(rgyud): ni brtsam par bya/ /las med nyid la brtsam mi bya/ /ma brtsams bya ba'i sngags rnams ni/ /lus can kun la 'grub mi 'gyur/ /sems can kun la thugs brtse bas/ /thub pa mchog gis sngon
177b5(rgyud): gsungs pa/ /sngags ni rgyu yi sgo dag nas/ /rgyal ba'i sras la dam tshig bshad/ /sgrub pa sngags ni kun shes shing / /sngags kyi rgyal po mchog 'di ni/ /sngags kyi tshul du bstan pa
177b6(rgyud): yin| |yang dag rdzogs lam rgyud yin pas/ /gang du rigs pa rtags yod la/ /sngags rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /dus ni ring po mi thogs par/ /mkhas
177b7(rgyud): pa'i grub pa thob pa yin/ /'byung po rnams la zhi don du/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis rab tu bstan/ /lam yang sngags kyi tshul gyis ni/ /mya ngan 'das grong 'gro ba yin/ /
178a1(rgyud): de bzhin rtag tu byang chub lam/ /las don thams cad rdzogs par byed/ /de yi mthar thug dpung gnyen ni/ /dang po'i gnas ni sangs rgyas nyid/ /
178a2(rgyud): de bzhin 'bad med grub pa ni/ /'di las 'bras bcas thob pa yin/ /sna tshogs las dang las shes yin/ /sngags bzlas dag ni byed par 'gyur/ /tshul khrims bsam
178a3(rgyud): gtan rnam thar rnams/ /mdor bsdus 'di yis thob pa ste/ /don kun sgrub byed grub pa ste/ /rgyal ba mchog gis gsungs pa yin/ /nor rnams rgyas par thob 'gyur te/ /
178a4(rgyud): dam pa'i 'gro bar gnas pa dang / /de bzhin rtag tu gnod sbyin spyan/ /lha mi'i rgyal srid byed par 'gyur/ /mi lha lha min 'jig rten gyi/ /de bzhin bdag po thob gyur te/ /
178a5(rgyud): bdag po ma lus de dag gi/ /sngags pas thams cad thob pa dang / /'bras bcas bya ba byed par 'gyur/ /gtsang sbra'i spyod dang ldan pa dang / /tshul khrims bsam gtan rtag
178a6(rgyud): tu dga'/ /rgyud rnams kun las gsungs pa yi/ /sngags pas rtag tu bzlas pa bya/ /sngags pa 'byor pa 'dod pa yis/ /las rnams sna tshogs bya ba ste/ /de bzhin mchog
178a7(rgyud): dang bar ma dang / /tha ma nyid kyang bya ba yin/ /tha mas longs spyod 'phel ba'i gnas/ /'bring gis gong ma'i lus thob cing / /mchog gis rab tu 'gro ba ste/ /zlos pas
178b1(rgyud): rtag tu thob par 'gyur/ /sngags pas zlos mthar ngal bso zhing / /ji srid dus su bsdad par bya/ /zlos pas dus la bab pa na/ /der ni bsgrub par bya ba yin/ /de lta mod kyi de la sngags pas
178b2(rgyud): las rnams sgrub pa na der rtag tu bzlas na/ skyes bu rnams kyi sdig pa zad par byed cing las rnam pa sna tshogs skye ba rgyud pa dag tu gang du gang byas pa de dag la grub pa gnas par nam
178b3(rgyud): zhig 'gyur zhe na/ skyes bus ji srid tshogs pa rnyed pa na sngags pa'i ngo bos sngags bzlas pa na sdig pa zad pa'i don dang / las bsrabs pas sngags 'grub par 'gyur te/ de bzhin
178b4(rgyud): du mchog dang / bar ma dang / tha ma dang / 'jig rten gyis mchod pa dang / bzlas pas sdig pa mtha' dag zad par byed cing lus can thams cad kyi skye ba brgyud pa dag tu gang byas pa'i
178b5(rgyud): sdig pa de dag thams cad 'jig par byed de/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sngags bzlas na lus rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa yid dga' zhing yon tan thams cad kyis grags
178b6(rgyud): par 'gyur ba dang / gnod sbyin gyi tshogs kyi rgyal po nyid dang / rtag tu don thams cad thob pa dang ldan pa yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin
178b7(rgyud): tu rgyas pa'i mdo las/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga rab 'byams las/ sgrub pa'i thabs kyi las kyi gnas bzhi pa las bzlas pa dang / nges par sdom pa dang /
179a1(rgyud): sbyin sreg dang / bsam gtan dang / gtsang sbra'i spyod pa dang / las thams cad kyi cho ga sgrub pa'i le'u rab 'byams bcu gcig pa rdzogs so// //
179a2(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang la gzigs nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/
179a3(rgyud): 'jam dpal nyon cig /khyod kyi rig pa'i sngags rjes su spyod pa/ sems can thams cad kyi don la rjes su brtson pa/ sems can rnams gang zlos par byed pa dang / gang gis
179a4(rgyud): zlos par byad pa dang / de'i phreng ba'i cho ga de thams cad rgyud thams cad kyi spyi sngags thams cad kyi sgrub pa'i thabs legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig /de skad
179a5(rgyud): ces bka' stsal ba dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ /legs so/ /legs so/ /bdag la thugs
179a6(rgyud): brtse ba'i don dang / sngags thams cad kyi spyod pa dang / dam tshig la zhugs pa rnams kyis sems can rnams kyi slad du de bshad du gsol/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom
179a7(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /'jam dpal nyon cig /rnam par dbye ba rgya cher bshad par bya ste/ sngags thams cad kyi
179b1(rgyud): spyod pa la mngon bar brtson pa na sems can thams cad kyi don sgrub par byed de/ dang por re zhig sngags su 'gyur ba de gang zhe na/ na maHsarba bud d+hA nA/ a tsin t+yad b+hu ta rU pI NAM/ tad+ya thA/ oM
179b2(rgyud): ku ru ku ru/ sarbA r+n+rA na sA d+ha ya/ sarba duSh+TAM bi mo ha ni/ ga ga nA bi lam+be bi sho d+ha ya swAhA/ sngags 'dis phreng ba thams cad la las bya'o/ /sbyang ba dang / dgug pa dang / blang ba dang / rgyu ba la
179b3(rgyud): sogs pa'i las bya'o/ /dang po phreng ba'i shing la ni/ /sngags kyis lan grangs nyi shu bdun/ /mngon par sngags pa byas nas ni/ /sdom brtson rtag tu bsrung ba bya/ /mtshan gcig der ni nyal
179b4(rgyud): byas na/ /rmi lam nang du des mthong ba/ /mi ma yin gzugs grub pa ni/ /mi sdug mche ba gtsigs pa'o/ /sngags pa la ni des smras pa/ /nor ni ci 'dod khyer cig ces/ /sgrub byed nang par
179b5(rgyud): langs nas ni/ /shing de las ni 'gro bar byed/ /sngags pas shing de bor nas ni/ /gzhan dag tu ni 'gro byed na/ /mi sdug gzugs ni 'jigs byed pa/ /rmi lam du yang mthong mi 'gyur//
179b6(rgyud): dang po ru drA k+Sha yin te/ /in drAk+Sha ni gnyis pa yin/ /tha ma bo de tse yin la/ /gzhan yang 'bras bu yod pa'o/ /shing la legs par 'dzeg mkhas pa'i/ /grogs dang lhan cig 'dzeg
179b7(rgyud): par bya/ /grogs po med par gyur na ni/ /rang nyid de la 'dzeg par bya/ /steng gi yal ga'i 'bras gnas su/ /sdoms brtson brtul bzhugs can 'dzegs te/ /rtag tu de la bag yod
180a1(rgyud): pas| |steng gi yal ga la byung nas/ /yal ga'i steng gi 'bras blangs te/ /steng gi las la sbyar bar bya/ /steng gi grub pa mchog tu ni/ /gang zag mchog gis
180a2(rgyud): gsungs pa yin/ /bar ma bar ma'i grub pa ste/ /grub pa tha ma'ang tha ma yin/ /rtag tu srog chags ma zos pa'i/ /'bras bu yang dag blang bar bya/ /nub kyi yal ga las thob pa/ /
180a3(rgyud): rdzas kyi rgyur ni grub pa yin/ /byang gi gnod sbyin la sogs dang / /lha rnams rtag tu 'gugs par byed/ /skad cig 'gugs par byed bsten pa'i/ /'byung po thams cad zhi
180a4(rgyud): phyir dang / /lha dang lha min dri za dang / /mi 'am ci dang srin po rnams/ /dbang du bya ba'i las byed de/ /'byung po kun yang rgyas par byed/ /don yod las ni byed pa ste/ /las rnams sna
180a5(rgyud): tshogs ma lus byed/ /shar phyogs yal ga la skyes shing / /yang dag 'byung ba'i 'bras bu ni/ de tshe 'bad de byas gyur na/ /tshe ni ring ba'i rgyu yang yin/ /rtag tu sngags
180a6(rgyud): grub 'bras bu ni/ /rnam pa sna tshogs byed pa yin/ /gang zhig lhor ni 'gro ba yi/ /yal ga lo mar rab ldan pa'i/ /sngags pas de ni 'bad de spang / /sems can rnams kyi srog
180a7(rgyud): 'phrog byed/ /lhor bstan pa yi yal ga dang / /'bras bu gang dag skyes pa ni/ /blangs na gdung byed dgra rnams kyi/ /srog ni 'jig par byed pa yin/ /zlos pas 'bad de spang bar bya/ /
180b1(rgyud): bsod nams ma yin mang po'i rgyu/ /yal ga 'og tu 'phyang gnas la/ /'bras bu gang zhig rab bsgrags pa/ /lha min bu mo gnas pa yi/ /sa yi 'og tu 'gro bar 'gyur/ /de
180b2(rgyud): yi 'bras bu'i phreng ba ni/ /blangs nas 'og tu 'gro brten pa/ /sa yi 'og tu gnas par ni/ /des na de ni 'gro bar byed/ /der zhugs lha yi bde ba ni/ /zlos pas thob bar 'gyur ba yin/ /
180b3(rgyud): lha min bu mo chags bzhin du/ /bskal par de ni gnas par byed/ /me tog phreng ba kun blangs nas/ /de nas zlos pa slar log bya/ /grogs dang lhan cig bsrung byas nas/ /de nas
180b4(rgyud): ji ltar bde bar 'gro / gnas nas thag ring song nas ni/ /de bzhin gtsang phyogs cho ga bzhin/ /de nas sngags pas rtag tu 'dug /phreng ba yongs su sbyang bar bya/ /brtson pas
180b5(rgyud): phreng ba'i 'bras blangs te/ /kun nas yongs su dag byas nas/ /sngags pa bzang pos phreng ba dbug /gsum bdun brgyad dang gcig gam ni/ /nyi shu dang ni rtsa gcig tu/ /sngags
180b6(rgyud): kyi de nyid shes pas bkru/ /snga ma'i sngags kyis rtag tu yang / /bdun nam brgyad du bzlas par bya/ /de nas dag par yang dag 'dod/ /pad+ma'i rtsa lag dag las ni/ /bu mos
180b7(rgyud): bkal ba'i skud pa dag / gsum dang lnga lnga ba byas pa yi/ /sdom can gyis ni phreng skud bya/ /sngags kyi de nyid shes pas brgyu/ /'bru ni phra zhing shin tu zlum/ /rtag tu srog chags
181a1(rgyud): bu ga med/ /legs 'jam smad ba'ang med pa yin/ /mdzes dang kha dog mdzes pa dang / /de bzhin gas med bu ga med/ /ru drA k+Sha dang bo de ce/ /in drA k+Sha
181a2(rgyud): yi 'bras bu nyid/ /rtag tu lung tang mdzes pa dang / /gzhan yang 'bras bu 'dod pa dag /'bad pa yis ni phreng ba dag /sngags pas brtson byas de tshe brgyu/ /gser ram yang na
181a3(rgyud): dngul dag gam/ /nor bu shel las byas pa dang / /dung dang mu sar dag dang / /mu tig las kyang bya ba yin/ /byu ru rnam pa sna tshogs kyi/ /phreng ba dag kyang bya ba yin/ /gzhan yang
181a4(rgyud): rin chen bzang po yi/ /phreng ba legs par rab tu bya/ /sa ni rab bzlums ril bu dag /mnyam par gzhag nas skud pas brgyu/ /gzhan yang ril bu cung zad gang / /'bras bu
181a5(rgyud): 'byung khung dag las bya/ /ku sha'i rtse mo'i mdud pas kyang / /sngags pas 'bad de bya ba yin/ /brgya rtse brgyad dam nyi shu 'am/ /lnga bcu nyid ni bar ma yin/ /sngags pa
181a6(rgyud): mnyam par bzhag nas ni/ /tshad 'dis phreng ba brgyu ba yin/ /rtsa brgyad stong du bya ba ni/ /phreng ba'i mchog tu bya ba yin/ /phreng ba'i rnam pa 'di bzhi yang / /sngags pas
181a7(rgyud): rtag tu brgyu ba yin/ /de ltar brgyu ba byas nas ni/ /rim pa gsum mam gnyis su bya/ /lcags bzang rang bzhin gdu bur bya/ /de bzhin gser dngul dag dang ni/ /de bzhin
181b1(rgyud): zangs ma'i gdu bu yis/ /phreng ba kun yang bcing bar bya/ /de nas yang mig kun mthar ni/ /kun la'ang de bzhin gdags par bya/ /'bad pas dam du bcing bya ste/ /ji ltar dam por 'gyur
181b2(rgyud): bar ro| |yongs su gsal bar byas nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor lta bur mthong ba yin/ /de ltar sbrul gyi gdengs ka ltar/ /yongs su 'khor bas brgyan pa yin/ /mu tig phreng ba 'dra ba
181b3(rgyud): yis| |mgul pa brgyan pa lta bur bya/ /chu bo dag ni dri med pa'i/ /chu gtsang dag gis khrus bya zhing / /ji ltar go rims khrus byas nas/ /chu bzhi las ni ldang nas su/ /'bad pas
181b4(rgyud): de bzhin nye reg bya/ /phreng ba rje su blangs nas ni/ /ba yi rnam lngas rab tu bkru /de bzhin sa yi phye ma dang / /chu gtsang dag gis rab bkrus te/ /dri zhim dag gis rjes byugs shing / /
181b5(rgyud): rab tu sngags pa'i kha dog kyang / /tsan+dan dkar dang gur gum mo/ /de nas de bzhin gnyi ga 'gro /'bad pa yis ni rab tu bkru /de bzhin khrus byas song nas ni/ /gang na ras ris
181b6(rgyud): bar ma de/ /rgyal ba gtso bo thub mchog ni/ /shAkya seng ge mi yi mchog /de bzhin rtag tu ston pa'i gzugs/ /sa steng rgyal ba'i ring bsrel can/ /de yi mdun du phreng ba ni/ /de dang nye bar gzhag
181b7(rgyud): par bya| |de dang nye bar bzhag nas ni/ /de yi mdun du nyer gnas nas/ /stong phrag gcig dang brgyad dang ni/ /brgya dang rtsa brgyad bzlas nas kyang / /nyin zhag gcig ni smyung byas te/ /bdun pa thub
182a1(rgyud): la phreng ba dbul/ /lnga pa de bzhin blas byas nas/ /tshad kyang de dang mnyam par bya/ /de nas phreng ba la bzlas nas/ /de yi mtshan mo nyal bar bya/ /
182a2(rgyud): ku sha bting ba'i sa la ni/ /sngags shes der ni nyal bar bya/ /gal te des ni rmi lam na/ /dge ba'i rmi lam mthong na ni/ /'bras bcas rmi lam ston pa ste/ /de la grub par bstan
182a3(rgyud): pa yin| |sangs rgyas nyan thos bse ru ni/ /gal te 'di yis rmi lam mthong / /sngags pa de yi bya ba ni/ /'bras bcas nges par 'grub par 'gyur/ /gzhon nu'i gzugs can
182a4(rgyud): byis pa ni/ /rnam pa sna tshogs mdzes mthong ba/ /gal te rmi lam des mthong dang / /phreng ba stsol ba'ang de bzhin te/ /don yod de ni 'grub 'gyur te/ /sngags kyi don
182a5(rgyud): rnams sgrub byed pa'o/ / //byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho
182a6(rgyud): ga las/ ras ris bar ma'i cho ga rab 'byams las/ phreng ba'i cho ga rab 'byams bcu gnyis pa rdzogs so// //de nas bcom ldan 'das
182a7(rgyud): shAkya thub pas/ gzhan yang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang la gzigs nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/
182b1(rgyud): stsal pa| 'jam dpal/ khyod kyi sngags mtha' dag rnam par dgod pa'i khyad par gyi cho ga dang / sbyin sreg gi las la rab tu sbyor ba'i rig pa sgrub pa yod de/ me la nye bar spyod pa'i
182b2(rgyud): khyod par gyi cho ga'i phyir/ gang gis rig pa thams cad kyi spyod pa la mngon par brtson pa'i sems can rab tu 'jug cing gnas par 'gyur ro/ /de gang zhe na/ gsang ba'i rig sngags kyi gzhi
182b3(rgyud): ni/ 'di lta ste/ oM ut+tiSh+Tha ha ri ping+ga la lo hi tAk+Sha/ de hi da dA pa ya hUM s+phaT s+phaT sarba bi g+h+naM bi nA sha ya swAhA/ 'jam dpal/ 'di ni me'i snying po'i mchog /las thams cad byed pa/
182b4(rgyud): 'dod pa thams cad ster bar byed pa yin te/ dang po re zhig sgrub pa pos me'i snying po 'di la lan gcig bzlas pas sreg blugs gsum gyis me la sbyin sreg byas na me spyan drang bar
182b5(rgyud): 'gyur ro/ /de ltar rab tu sbyar na zhi ba dang / rgyas pa dang / drag po'i las dag la yam shing rnam pa gsum du 'gyur te/ mya ngan med shing zhi don du/ /rlon pa nyid ni rab tu
182b6(rgyud): bsngags/ /mtho gang ngam ni khru gang tsam/ /sor gsum srid du bya ba yin/ /snum pa'i rnam pa rab tu bsngags/ /cho ga 'di ni bya ba yin/ /bu ga med cing nang stong min/ /de
182b7(rgyud): bzhin ne tso'i 'dab ma dang / /ljang dang dkar ba'i kha dog gam/ /kha dog nag po spang bar bya/ /srin bu rnams kyis zos pa'ang spang / /bu ga yod pa'ang rnam par bzlog /
183a1(rgyud): gzhan yang kha dog rab bsngags min/ /tha ma nyid kyang rnam par spangs/ /ha cang skam min rlon pa'ang min/ /tshig min las ni brtsam par bya/ /rul pa
183a2(rgyud): dang ni yo ba'ang min/ /shin tu ring ba'ang spang bar bya/ /de nas me thab bya ba ni/ /kun nas gru bzhir bya ba ste/ /'og nyid du yang brko ba ni/ /'bad pas khru ni bzhi yi tshad/ /bru
183a3(rgyud): gsum dang ni khru gnyis dang / /de bzhin khru gcig tshad du bya/ /rtag tu srog chags spangs pa dang / /bye mas legs par sbyar ba gang / /de nas pad 'dra'i lan kan ni/ /kun nas
183a4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor 'dra ba 'o/ /yang na 'bad pas zur bzhi yang / /de bzhin lan kan dbyibs su bya/ /rdo rje'i rnam pa 'dra ba yi/ /rtse mo gnyis su'ang rtse gsum bya/ /me thab kyi ni thad
183a5(rgyud): ka la| |khru gnyis thad kar bya ba yin/ /gtsang dang de bzhin gsal ba'i gnas/ /chu klung de bzhin chu dbus dang / /shing gcig gi ni phyogs dag dang / /dur khrod dang ni kha stong
183a6(rgyud): du| |sbyin sreg legs par yang dag brtsam/ /de bzhin ri bo'i rtse dag tu'o/ /rtag tu lha khang stong pa dang / /dgon pa chen po'ang de bzhin no/ /gang yang sgrub pa'i phyogs
183a7(rgyud): dag tu| |gang zag mchog gis rab gsungs pa/ /sbyin sreg gnas ni thams cad la/ /gnas de dag ni thams cad gsungs/ /ku sha'i khres ni khru gang tsam/ /de la 'dug par
183b1(rgyud): byas nas ni/ /sngags shes der ni sbyin sreg las/ /khyad par du yang bya ba yin/ /gnas de dag la 'dug na ni/ /myur du 'grub par the tshom med/ /shar dang byang du bltas pas kyang / /
183b2(rgyud): zhi ba dang ni rgyas par bya/ /lhor bltas nas ni drag po'i las/ /sngags pas de ni spang bar bya/ /shar du bltas pas zhi ba 'grub/ /byang du bltas pas rgyas pa 'o/ /'di yis sngags
183b3(rgyud): pa dus rtag tu/ /sngags kyi ngo bo yang dag brtsam/ /bil ba blag sha n+ya gro d+has /rgyas pa'i las ni yongs su bya/ /mngon spyod shing las bya ba ni/ /dkar dang tshwa dang skyur dang rno/ /
183b4(rgyud): de dag thams cad spang bya ste/ /thub pa rnams kyis rtag tu bkag /zhi dang rgyas pa'i las la ni/ /shing rlon dag ni rab tu bsngags/ /drag po'i las la shing skam ste/ /thub pa rnams
183b5(rgyud): kyis rtag tu spangs/ /yam shing de dag med na ni/ /tha mal shing dag kun tu brtag /gnyi ga'i rtse mor bya ba ni/ /ku shas kun tu yang dag dkri/ /sngo dang snum pa 'dra ba dang / /rma bya'i
183b6(rgyud): mgrin pa 'dra ba dang / /de 'dra'i ku shas rtag tu ni/ /zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa bya/ /ma rgad rnam pa 'dra ba dang / /rtsa skam gyis ni rtag tu yan/ga /sdig pa'i las rnams bya ba yin/ /'dir ba'i
183b7(rgyud): thub pa mchog gis bkag / dri med chu ni yongs dag pa/ /srog chags dag gis rtag spangs pa/ /des ni kun nas gtor byas nas/ /g.yas phyogs su ni bskor byas te/ /sdom brtson
184a1(rgyud): gyis ni me sbar bya/ /cho ga ji bzhin nye reg bya/ /gtsang ba'i rtswa yi rtsa bas ni/ /me sgron tshad dang ldan byas nas/ /de nas chad par bcangs nas ni/ /'bad
184a2(rgyud): pas me ni spar bar bya/ /kha yi rlung gis mi bya ste/ /rtag tu gos kyi mthas kyang min/ /sham thabs bla gos rnam par spangs/ /gos gzhan dag ni bkag ma yin/ /shin tu drag
184a3(rgyud): pas de mi bya/ /gnod par dga' bas ma yin na/ /rlung yab gtsang dang de bzhin gos/ /lo mas kyang ni rlung yab bya/ /rlung gis khyad du mi gsod pa/ /me ni rab tu sad byas nas/ /
184a4(rgyud): sngags shes pas ni me spar te/ /sbyin sreg don du legs mnyam gzhag /lag pa de ni g.yon pa yis/ /lan gsum bar du chus gtor nas/ /der ni ba yi mar gyis ni/ /sreg
184a5(rgyud): blugs gsum ni des sbyin bya/ /de nas kyang ni phyag bya ste/ /sangs rgyas kun dang skyob pa dang / /rang sngags sngags kyi mgon po la/ /de nas ci 'dod phyag bya'o/ /de tshe me yi snying
184a6(rgyud): po yis/ /sngags kyis lan bdun rtag bzlas pa'i/ /dri zhim me tog dag gis ni/ /sdom brtson me ni spyan drang bya/ /sngags shes rtag tu spyan drangs nas/ /mkhas pas gnas ni
184a7(rgyud): sbyin par bya/ /gdan dang gnas ni sbyin byed na'ang / /de nyid sngags yin gzhan pas min/ /zho dang mar gyis spags pa dang / /sbrang rtsis spags pa'i yam shing gis/ /rgyas pa'i
184b1(rgyud): las ni bya ba'i phyir/ /sngags kyis kun tu sbyin sreg bya/ /mar dang sbrang rtsir ldan pa 'am/ /yang na zho dang ldan pa yi/ /yam shing rdzas dang ldan pa yis/ /gnyi ga la gnas de tshe bya/ /
184b2(rgyud): stong ngam yang na 'bum mam ni/ /yang na brgya rtsa brgyad du brtag /de tshe sngags pas sngags bzung nas/ /lan re bzlas shing me la dor/ /'bar ba'i me yi phreng ba 'am/ /de
184b3(rgyud): bzhin me lce gcig gyur la/ /zhi ba'i las kyi sbyin sreg bya/ /dud pa med la rgyas pa'ang bya/ /dud bcas drag po'i las la bya/ /de ni rgyal bas smad cing spangs/ /gal te me ni mdog
184b4(rgyud): ldan na/ /sbyin sreg las ni rab tu sbyar/ /zhi la kha dog dkar po ni/ /rgyal ba mchog gis rtag tu bsngags/ /gal te me dkar sbyin sreg byas/ /der ni sngags rnams 'grub par 'gyur/ /
184b5(rgyud): de bzhin rtag tu mdog dmar la/ /rgyas par 'grub par 'dod pa yin/ /gnag dang du ba'i kha dog dang / /ser skya la ni sdig ldan pas/ /kha dog rnam gsum bstan pas ni/ /rnam gsum
184b6(rgyud): grub pa 'di dag yin/ /mdog gzhan sprin gyi kha dog gam/ /rnam pa sna tshogs mdog ldan pa/ /sa steng 'di la sngags rnams ni/ /grub pa yod pa ma yin no/ /de 'dra'i kha dog 'dra ba
184b7(rgyud): 'am| |rnam pa sna tshogs mdog ldan pa'i/ /me ni 'bar ba de mthong na/ /las kyi sbyor ba'ang brtsam par bya/ /gal te sngags ni grub 'dod na/ /phyi rol me ni spar bar bya/ /cho ga mthong
185a1(rgyud): ba'i las kyis ni/ /phyir yang sbyin sreg rab tu bya/ /me yi sngags ni zlos pa yis/ /gshegs gsol spyan drang nyid kyang bya/ /dkyil 'khor 'dir ni cho
185a2(rgyud): ga bzhin/ /sngar ni rab tu brtags pa yis/ /de nyid kyis ni sbyin sreg bya/ /gshegs gsol spyan drang la sogs pa'ang / /de nyid kyi ni las dag gis/ /las rnams thams cad
185a3(rgyud): nyid kyang bya/ /me yi las dang de bzhin gzugs/ /ras ris mdun du brtsam byas na/ /der ni sngags rnams 'grub 'gyur zhes/ /sngon gyi bde gshegs rnams kyis gsungs/ /rgyal
185a4(rgyud): bas bsngags pa'i las rnams dag / der ni rnam pa kun tu bya/ /sdig pa dag ni khyad par du/ /gang yang rgyal bas smad pa dang / /'jig rten 'gro bas smad pa dag /gzhan gyis smad
185a5(rgyud): pa'ang bya ba min/ /'khor los bsgyur bzang nyid dang ni/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'thob dang / /de bzhin mngon shes lnga 'thob dang / /de nas lha nyid thob pa 'o/ /ras ris la rtag brtson zhing
185a6(rgyud): shes| |spyin sreg las la 'jigs med dang / /sa 'og gi ni bdag po 'am/ /yang na bar snang spyod par 'gyur/ /sa bdag lha dang gnod spyin nyid/ /rtag tu gnod sbyin mo 'gugs byed/ /rgyal srid bdag
185a7(rgyud): po nyid dang ni/ /yul nyid dang ni grong dag dang / /rig pa 'dzin dang lha min nyid/ /sems can thams cad dbang du byed/ /bdag nyid che dang sems can che/ /'byung po rnams ni 'gugs
185b1(rgyud): bar byed/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ /sa bcu la ni yang dag gnas/ /sbyin sreg las kyis 'gugs byed na/ /sa steng mi rnams smos ci dgos/ /sde dpon bdag dang de bzhin
185b2(rgyud): du| |khyad par 'jig rten dbang phyug 'gyur/ /dbang 'gyur cig car 'byung po kun/ /de bzhin mi yi dbang po nyid/ /sems can kun la dbang don dang / /yang na rgyal po dbang du 'gyur/ /
185b3(rgyud): de bzhin rtag tu las kun la/ /sbyin sreg gis ni kun tu bya/ /thams cad kun la brtson bdag nyid/ /las kun las ni bsten byas na/ /de ni nges par 'grub 'gyur te/ /las dge'i
185b4(rgyud): don ni dam pa yin/ /bar ma nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur/ /tha ma'i las kyang de bzhin po/ /rdzas rnams dag ni de bzhin du/ /grub dang ldan pa'ang rnam pa gsum/ 'bras dang
185b5(rgyud): bcas par grub snang ste/ /sbyin sreg las la rab tu bstan/ /phyag rgya gtsug phud lnga bcings nas/ /sngags kyang skra can mas byas nas/ /las rnams kun ni bya ba dang / /sngags pas
185b6(rgyud): bdag nyid bsrung ba bya/ /sbyin sreg las la rab 'jug pas/ /de nas sngags 'di brjod par bya/ /bdun nam brgyad du bzlas pa yis/ /las 'di la ni rtag tu bya/ /na maHsarba bud
185b7(rgyud): d+ha bo d+hi sa twA nAM/ a pra ti ha ta ga tiM ga tA nAM/ tad+ya thA/ oM dz+wA la tiSh+Tha hUM ru ru bi shwa saM b+ha ba saM b+ha be swAhA/ spags kyi sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /yang dang yang du shing la bzla/ /gnyis
186a1(rgyud): sam bdun du bzlas pa yis/ /sngags rig des ni sbyin sreg bya/ /me tog bdug pa dri yang rung / /ma lus thams cad dag dang ni/ /chu la sngags rnams bzlas
186a2(rgyud): pa yang / /'di nyid kyis ni sbyin par bya/ /las rnams kun gyi rgyu yi phyir/ /de nas cho ga brtsam par bya/ /las rnams dag ni thams cad la/ /snga ma'i sbyor ba nyid kyis bya/ /snga
186a3(rgyud): ma'i gtsug phud lnga bcings te/ /phyag rgya chen po grags ldan ma/ /snga ma'i gtsug phud lnga bcing bya/ /skra can ma nyid rab bzlas pas/ /des na srung ba byed par 'gyur/ /grub pa'i rgyu
186a4(rgyud): la 'jigs med pas/ /las rnams thams cad brtsam par bya/ /gal te la nye bzang po 'am/ /rtag tu dge ba'i sgra thos na/ /de la sngags ni don yod de/ /ji ltar 'dod
186a5(rgyud): bzhin mchog stsol 'gyur/ /dang po'i las la rab sbyor dang / /sngags kyi rgyu la rab 'jug na/ /thams cad 'bras bu bcas pa dang / /de la grub bar brjod pa yin/ /rgyal
186a6(rgyud): sgra rnga ni pa Ta ha/ /rnga bo che yi sgra dag ni/ /brtson byas grub pa ma lus 'gyur/ /sbyin sreg las la yang dag bsten/ /gzhan yang la nye bzang po dang / /'dab chags dge ba'i sgra dag
186a7(rgyud): dang / /rnam pa sna tshogs nges pa'i sgra/ /rgyal ba rnams kyis bsngags pa dang / /bkra shis bzang po rab bzangs dang / /rnam pa sna tshogs yid 'ong sgra/ /gdugs dang rgyal mtshan
186b1(rgyud): ba dan dang / /bud med rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang / /de bzhin mchod yon bum pa gang / /mthong na 'grub pa'i rgyu rnams yin/ /rnam pa du ma'i kha dog gam/ /'jig rten gyis mchod rab
186b2(rgyud): bsngags pa/ /de dag mthong na grub 'gyur ba/ /sngags rnams du ma'i spyod yul yin// //byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas
186b3(rgyud): pa'i mdo las/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga bcu gsum pa ste/ sbyin sreg gi cho ga rab 'byams rdzogs so// //de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas/
186b4(rgyud): gzhan yang / gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang la gzigs te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ khyod kyi gsang ba'i rig pa yod de/ sngags
186b5(rgyud): thams cad kyi sgrub pa po'i thabs/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis yang dag par rjes su gnang ba/ chos kyi mdzod las byung ba/ chos kyi sprin gyi rjes su zhugs pa/ nam mkha'i ngo bo
186b6(rgyud): nyid 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sngags thams cad kyi mnga' bdag /shin tu gtso bor gyur pa/ gzhon nu/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can thams cad
186b7(rgyud): kyi mchog tu brjod de/ shin tu gtso bor gyur cing dam pa yin la/ lha dang / mi rnams kyis kyes bu khyu mchog sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yin no/ /gzhon nu/ de bzhin du rig pa'i rgyal po
187a1(rgyud): 'di ni sngags thams cad kyi mchog tu bstan cing shin tu gtso bo yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa gang gA'i glung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan
187a2(rgyud): 'das brjod du med pa dag gis sngon gsungs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog gi snying po mchog tu gsang ba/ kun nas bkra shis par 'dod pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis
187a3(rgyud): yang dag par bstod pa/ rab tu bsngags pa/ sems can thams cad yang dag par dbugs 'byin pa/ sdig pa thams cad rab tu 'jig par byed pa/ 'dod pa thams cad sbyin
187a4(rgyud): par byed pa/ re ba yongs su rdzogs par byed pa de yang gang zhe na/ bar 'dir bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas smin mtshams kyi mdzod spun sa sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag
187a5(rgyud): par bskul ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer phyung bar gyur to/ /gang 'di phyogs bcu steng 'og thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing snang bas khyab par mdzad de/ sems can
187a6(rgyud): thams cad kyi yid tshim par mdzad nas slar log ste/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya shub pa'i dbu'i gtsug tor du nub par gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi gtsug tor nas kun nas
187a7(rgyud): 'bar ba'i 'od dang ldan pa'i lus can blta bar mi nus pa/ sems can thams cad kyis mi thub pa/ 'od chen pos yang dag par 'phags pa/ 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis
187b1(rgyud): lus brgyan pa/ rnam pa sna tshogs kyi gzugs dang ldan pa/ 'khor los bsgyur ba chen po'i gzugs can rig pa'i rgyal po yi ge gcig pa zhes bya ba byung bar gyur to/ /byung nas
187b2(rgyud): nam mkha'i dkyil thams cad snang bar byas te/ rig pa'i rgyal po thams cad kyis yongs su bskor ba/ rig ba du ma bye ba khri phrag brgya stong 'byin par byed pa/ yi ge gcig
187b3(rgyud): pa'i sgra 'don cing 'od zer chen po 'bar ba rab tu 'byin pa/ steng gi phyogs nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la mngon du blta ba dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i gnas gtsang
187b4(rgyud): ma'i gzhal med khang gi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po yang snang bar byas nas bar snang la gnas par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas yi ge gcig pa'i
187b5(rgyud): rig pa'i 'khor los bsgyur ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog ces bya ba'i snying po mchog tu gsang ba/ de bzhin gshegs
187b6(rgyud): pa thams cad las bcom ldan 'das rin chen tog gis yang dag par thob pa/ sA la'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang / 'od dpag med dang / bsnyen par dka' ba dang / spyan bzang dang
187b7(rgyud): tog bzang dang / me tog dbang po dang / gnyid mthar phyin dang / 'jig rten thub pa dang / gser thub la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis gsungs shing rjes su yi rang ba dang /
188a1(rgyud): 'das pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang gsungs shing rjes su yi rang ba de yang gang zhe na/ tad+ya thA/ oM b+h+rUM/ 'jam dpal/
188a2(rgyud): 'di ni snying po dam pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog sngags thams cad kyi rig pa'i 'khor los bsgyur ba yi ge gcig pa zhes bya ba dag byed chen po 'di yang dag
188a3(rgyud): par bsgrubs na sngags thams cad 'grub par 'gyur te/ gzhon nu/ gang yang khyod kyi cho ga'i rgyal po'i mchog la sngags thams cad dang rjes su mthun pa/ mchog tu gsang
188a4(rgyud): ba'i mchog yang dag par rjes su gnang ba/ las kyi sgrib pa thams cad yang dag par sbyong bar byed pa/ dang po re zhig sgrub pa pos nges par 'bum phrag gsum bzlas
188a5(rgyud): brjod bya'o/ /de nas las rnams sngags dang bcas pa 'dir gzhon nu khyod kyi cho ga'i rgyal po la 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sngags dang / rgyud rnams
188a6(rgyud): bsgrub par bya'o/ /'dis bsrung ba byas na 'byung po thams cad kyis tshugs par mi 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bgegs thams cad kyis
188a7(rgyud): zil gyis non par mi 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas de gsungs ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad rnam pa
188b1(rgyud): drug tu g.yos par gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du yang snang bas khyab cing / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor der 'dus par gyur te/
188b2(rgyud): gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang du 'khod par gyur to/ /sa bcu thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir
188b3(rgyud): mi ldog pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa'i sems can thams cad dang / rig pa'i rgyal po rnams 'od zer gyis yang
188b4(rgyud): dag par bskul nas lhags par gyur to/ /'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag na rnam par gnas pa'i sems can mang po dbang du gyur to/ /dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro
188b5(rgyud): dang / yi dwags kyi ngan 'gro la gnas pa rnams 'od zer chen po'i snang bas reg cing snang bar byas pas sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba'i rgyun la gnas pa yid shin tu bde bas tshim
188b6(rgyud): zhing skyo ba med par gyur te/ nges par theg pa gsum la gnas par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas 'khor de la gzigs nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur
188b7(rgyud): pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal nyon cig /rig pa'i rgyal po 'di rdzu 'phrul che ba/ dba' bo gcig pu/ las thams cad byed pa/ rig pa thams cad kyi rgyal po 'khor los bsgyur
189a1(rgyud): ba| sems can gyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par mdzad ba/ cho ga zhi ba mo thams cad yongs su rgyas pa/ khyod kyi sngags dang / rgyud dang / cho ga rab
189a2(rgyud): 'byams la yang dag par zhugs pa/ sngags thams cad sgrub par byed pa/ thun mong du gyur pa/ grags pa che ba dang / spro ba che ba dang / sems can sgrub pa po'i khyad par gyi thabs
189a3(rgyud): dang / shes rab la mkhas pa/ byang chub kyi lam thams cad yongs su sbyong bar byed pa/ mya ngan las 'das pa la rab tu 'jug par byed pa/ bdud zil gyis gnon par byed
189a4(rgyud): pa| byang chub kyi snying po la gnas par byed pa/ dge ba'i tshogs yang dag par 'byung bar byed pa'o/ /'di nyid mdor bsdus na/ cho ga zhib mo rgyas pa ras ris kyi cho ga'i
189a5(rgyud): d kyil 'khor sgrub pa'i thabs sngon gyi sngags kyi spyad pa rjes su spyod pa gang la rab tu gnas na sems can gyi rig pa'i rgyal po 'khor los sgyur ba chen po sgrub par 'gyur
189a6(rgyud): te| rmad du byung ba chen po sngags thams cad kyi dbang phyug dam pa/ 'od byed pa thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ rnam par 'dren pa/ 'gro ba thams cad
189a7(rgyud): la phan par byed pa/ sangs rgyas bzhin du mngon sum du nye bar bzhugs pa rang byung du gyur pa/ mchog dang / bar ma dang / tha ma'i las thams cad byed pa/ shin tu bde ba
189b1(rgyud): dam pa| shis pa dang / zhi bar byed pa/ sdig pa thams cad rab tu 'jig par byed pa'o/ /lha rnams kyi yang lha nyid de/ /thub ba rnams kyi thub ba mchog /sangs rgyas nyi ma'i gnyen
189b2(rgyud): gyur pa| |dag pa 'jig rten rnam par grags/ /chos kun rang gi ngo bo mkhyen/ /yang dag mthar gyur rnyog pa med/ /de yi cho ga mchog bshad bya/ /'byor pa 'dod pas mnyan par
189b3(rgyud): gyis| |re zhig dang por ras bzang po/ /skyon rnams dang ni ma 'dres pa/ /sar ba phra ba'i khyad par ldan/ /kha tshar dang bcas nyid la bri/ /chur ni khru do'i tshad yin la/ /zheng du khru gang
189b4(rgyud): tshad du bya/ /de 'dra'i bzang po kho na la/ /dri med blta na sdug pa dang / /bcos bu dkar po de bzhin du/ /phra dang legs bkrus ras bal spangs/ /phyag dar dri ma med pa yi/ /du gu
189b5(rgyud): la yi ras nyid la/ /rgyu ni shing kun nyid dang ni/ /dag la rgyud ni rnam spangs pa/ /chu ngan las ni bkrus min dang / /skye bos zhal mthong phul ba'ang min/ /ma gos pa dang de bzhin
189b6(rgyud): du| |gzhan yang cung zad dam pas bsngags/ /de 'dra'i ras ni bzang po la/ /gzhal med khang ni bri bar bya/ /'od kyi dkyil 'khor phreng ba can/ /ston pa'i gzugs ni yang dag bri/ /
189b7(rgyud): de bzhin gser gyi mdog can ni/ /'od zer phreng ldan bri bar bya/ /gcig bu phug ni bzhugs pa ni/ /ri bo la gnas grags pa che/ /dar la'i bla re bre ba ni/ /rin chen phreng ba 'phyang
190a1(rgyud): ba 'o| |steng du lha ni gnyi ga yang / /'dzin pa dag ni yang dag bri/ /ri rnams kyi ni steng dag tu/ /rin chen phreng ba rab tu bya/ /bla re khor yug mu tig gi /dra
190a2(rgyud): ba dra phyed dag gis brgyan/ /ri rgyal steng du 'bad pa yis/ /'di dag thams cad bri bar bya/ /ri bo dag gi rtsa ba yang / /rgya mtsho chen bor nub par bya/ /ras ris mthar yang me
190a3(rgyud): tog ni| |kun nas 'khor bar yang dag bri/ /nA ga ge sa ra pun nA ga /ba ku la dang zhu ti ka/ snam me tog pri yang ku /de bzhin ku ra ba ka dang / /ut+pa la dang dri mchog
190a4(rgyud): dang / /de las gzhan yang pad+ma dkar/ /me tog rigs ni sna tshogs dang / /de bzhin gzhan yang drir ldan pa'i/ /me tog dag ni 'di dag nyid/ /gang yang rung ba rtag
190a5(rgyud): blangs nas/ /ston pa la ni mchod don du/ /yid du 'ong ba'i mchod yon dbul/ /sngar bstan cho gas ras ris ni/ /mchog dang de bzhin gzhan dag kyang / /dog pa tha ga pa
190a6(rgyud): dag dang / /ri mo mkhan yang de bzhin 'dod/ /cho 'phrul gyi ni zla phyed kyi/ /nyi ma dge ba dag la ni/ /dus ni de ltar gyur pa la/ /bzlas pa nyid kyang bya ba yin/ /'di la
190a7(rgyud): sems can thams cad kyis/ /sngar bstan bzhin du yang dag spyad/ /tshon gsal rnam pa sna tshogs kyis/ /ston pa'i gzugs ni bri bar bya/ /rnam pa du mar ldan pa yi/ /dong
190b1(rgyud): ga'i me tog mdog 'dra dang / /tsab pa ka yi mdog 'dra dang / /gser gyi mdog dang 'dra bar bri/ /de lta'i rnam pa ldan pa yi/ /rin chen rigs skyes thub pa bri/ /chags pa chen po rin chen
190b2(rgyud): tog |gtso bo thub mchog dam pa ni/ /chos rnams thams cad yongs thob pa'i/ /sangs rgyas dkon mchog de bri bya/ /rin chen ri bor gnas pa dang / /rin chen phug gis nyer mdzes
190b3(rgyud): shing / /skyil krung gis ni bzhugs pa dang / /chos ni rjes su 'chad cing stsol/ /cung zad 'dzum zhing brtan pa dang / /thugs ni bsam gtan la dmigs dang / /phyi rol phug ni
190b4(rgyud): yang dag bri/ /'og dang de bzhin 'khor yug tu'o/ /ras mtha'i zur du sgrub pa bos/ /pus mo'i lha nga yang dag btsugs/ /bdug spos lag na thogs bzhin du/ /lus ni cung zad 'dud
190b5(rgyud): pa dang / /bla gos gcig tu byas nas ni/ /cha byad ji lta bzhin du yang / /bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas phyogs kyi/ /'og gi rgya mtsho che steng du/ /sngags pas dge ba'i don gyi phyir/ /sdom
190b6(rgyud): brtson rtag tu pri bar bya/ /las kyi cho ga 'di dag ni/ /'jig rten gyi sngags bstan pa yin/ /dkyil 'khor de yi lha dag kyang / /da ni rab tu brjod par bya/ /de tshe sngags pas rig pa'i
190b7(rgyud): sngags/ /de tshe sngags ni rig pa des/ /sngags la rtag tu bsnyen byas dang / bzlas pa phun sum tshogs mngon shes/ /'jam dbyangs cho ga 'di la ni/ /de tshe sngags pa dbang bskur
191a1(rgyud): ba| |dkyil 'khor rnam pa la mkhas shing / /rtag tu gtsang sbra byed pa dang / /sngags rnams kun la dbang bskur dang / /dkyil 'khor 'di la 'jigs pa
191a2(rgyud): med| |rig pa'i sngags dang sngags bcas dang / /bdag nyid bsrung dang phan 'dogs dang / /grogs kyang de bzhin bsrung shes dang / /yongs su legs brtags 'od chen
191a3(rgyud): ldan| |slob dpon legs par yang dag rtsom/ /rtsom zhing sbyangs yon bsten pa dang / /shes rab che zhing legs 'jam dang / /dpal ldan snying rjer rtag tu ldan/ /grogs
191a4(rgyud): po dag ni thams cad kyang / /mtshan nyid de bzhin kun tu bstan/ /gcig gnyis gsum dang de bzhin du/ /gzhan yang de bzhin brgyad kyi bar/ /slob ma legs par sbyang
191a5(rgyud): ba bya| |mang po dag ni spang bar bya/ /sngar bstan cho ga ji lta bar/ /dkyil 'khor 'di la'ang yang dag spyad/ /stobs bcu ldan pas dang por ni/ /dkyil 'khor gang dag rab bstan pa/ /
191a6(rgyud): 'jam pa'i dbyangs las gzhan min dang / /rgyu gzhan dag gis bri mi bya/ /dkyil 'khor 'od chen ldan pa yi/ /tshad ni rab tu bstan par bya/ /khru bzhi'am khru ni gnyis pa dang / /
191a7(rgyud): de bzhin gzhan yang khru brgyad par/ /gtsang ba'i phyogs sam chu klung ngam/ /khyad par du ni ri bo'i rtser/ /tshon sna lnga yi phye ma dang / /sngar bstan pa yi las kyis so/ /gru bzhi sgo
191b1(rgyud): ni bzhi pa dang / /rta babs bzhi yis brgyan pa dang / /zur bzhi mnyam zhing bzang ba dang / /lha yi rnam pa 'dra ba'i mdog /tshon rtsi gsal ba sna tshogs dang / /mdzes pa'i kha
191b2(rgyud): dog legs mdzes dang / /dri zhim bzang dang gzugs bzang dang / /grogs bzang dag gis yang dag brtsam/ /thub pa'i brtul zhugs yang dag spyad/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i brtul
191b3(rgyud): zhugs bsten/ /nyon mongs med sems zas tshod rig /chos ldan rtag tu zlos pa byed/ /sdig med las dang yongs srung byed/ /de bzhin zhi dang rgyas pa shes/ /de nas dkyil 'khor
191b4(rgyud): dbus bzhugs nas/ /bstan bcos las gsungs bzhin du bri/ /rin chen lha tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i/ /ri mo dang por bri bar bya/ /der zhugs gzhi brjid chen po ni/ /de bzhin
191b5(rgyud): gshegs pa rin chen tog / skyil krung gis ni legs bzhugs pa/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rjes bskor ba'o/ /ras ris la ni ji lta bar/ /bstan bcos la sngags thams cad bri/ /ri
191b6(rgyud): mo'i phreng ni gsum dag dang / /phyag rgyas rab tu brgyan pa dang / /gser mdog rim pas 'khor yug tu/ /yongs su bri bar bya ba yin/ /gsal dang yongs su rdzogs pa dang / /drang po
191b7(rgyud): de yi rnam pa'o/ /'khor los bsgyur ba'i bdag po che/ /de yi dbus su bya ba yin/ /nyi ma 'char ka 'dra ba dang / /gur gum rnam pa 'dra mdog can/ /'khor lo chen po'i rjes
192a1(rgyud): 'brang ba/ /'bad par gnas pas kun tu bri/ /rgyal po chen po mnyam 'dra ba/ /gzhal med khang bcas rgyan gyis brgyan/ /sems dpa' chen po'i cod
192a2(rgyud): pan can/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rab tu brgyan/ /dar la mdzes pa'i smad g.yogs can/ /sna tshogs dar las stod g.yogs shing / /phreng ldan zhi ba'i kha dog 'od/ /gos dang phreng
192a3(rgyud): bas brgyan pa dang / /me tog phreng ba ba ku la/ /lag pas g.yas pas snyoms par byed/ /bzhin ni cung zad 'dzum pa'i lha/ /mthu chen 'od dang ldan pa'o/ /gzugs bzang gzugs
192a4(rgyud): ni mdzes pa dang / /byis pa rgan po rnam par spangs/ /lag pa g.yon na 'khor lo ste/ /'bar ba'i 'od kyi phreng ba can/ /de ni yongs su bskor ba dang / /skyil krung phyed kyis gnas
192a5(rgyud): pa bri| |gzugs bzang gzugs la bsten nas ni/ /lha yi gzugs 'dra bri bar bya/ /ri bo 'od chen ldan pa'i steng / /rin chen du ma'i steng du gnas/ /sngags rnams kun la che ba
192a6(rgyud): dang | |rtag tu mchog sbyin la 'jug byed/ /'bar ba'i me dang 'dra ba dang / /'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis mdzes pa/ /rlung gis sbar ba'i me bzhin du/ /kun nas me ni 'bar ba'o/ /de bzhin
192a7(rgyud): sngags kyi sbyor ba yis/ /khyab bdag me yis 'bar bar byed/ /stobs chen de dang 'dra ba yi/ /sngags kun rab tu sgrub byed pa/ /gang gis bdag nyid chen po mthong / /sdig pa kun las
192b1(rgyud): yongs su grol/ /mtshams med lnga po byed pa dang / /tshul 'chal blo ni chung ba dang / /sdig pa kun la 'dzud byed pa/ /khyab bdag mthong ba tsam gyis grol/ /lha yi lha ni 'khor lo'i bdag /
192b2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor mthong ba tsam gyis ni/ /gzhan yang sdig tu yongs bstan pa/ /de yi mod la grol bar 'gyur/ /sngags pas rtag tu khyab bdag gi /de nas shar sgo yang dag sbyar/ /
192b3(rgyud): rta babs kun nas yongs bsgreng ste/ /ba dan dag gis nyer mdzes bya/ /mtha' dag gzugs ni mdzes pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor yongs su gsal byas nas/ /bshos dang bdug pa dri dang
192b4(rgyud): ni| |rtag tu phreng ba bzang po yis/ /cho ga snga ma kho na ltar/ /de dag thams cad gus par bya/ /dbus kyi bum pa gang ba ni/ /'khor lo can gyi mdun du dgod/ /de bum rnam par rgyal
192b5(rgyud): zhes bya| |sngags shes pas ni de mi bteg / cho ga mthong ba'i las kyis ni/ /me thab snga ma bzhin du bya/ /sbyin sreg cho ga yang dag brtsam/ /cho ga sngags ni gzhan pas min/ /sbyin
192b6(rgyud): sreg kyang ni brgya rtsa brgyad/ /seng ldeng bud shing me la ni/ /pa la sha dang bil ba'i shing / /bil ba u dum arka dang / /'bad pas las rnams kun la ni/ /a pa mar gas sbyin sreg
192b7(rgyud): bya| |til la mar gyis btags pa'am/ /zho la sbrang rtsi bsres pa yis/ /las rnams kun la sbyin sreg ni/ /stong rtsa brgyad ni rtag tu bya/ /dus gsum dus ni kun bstan pa/ /khrus
193a1(rgyud): dang gos ni brje ba dang / /dkar gsum rgyu skar bzang po ni/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis bstan pa yin/ /las rnams sngar ni bstan pa yi/ /bzlas
193a2(rgyud): dang sbyin sreg de bzhin gzhan/ /sngags dang yang dag ldan pas sam/ /'khor los bsgyur ba'i rigs kyis bya/ /las rnams dag ni kun la yang / /yi ge gcig pa'i
193a3(rgyud): sngags kyis bya/ /de ni mthu chen don ldan te/ /dpa' bo gcig pu rtag pa mchog /de la rtag tu zlos byed pa/ /sngags rnams kun gyi cho ga spyod/ /'jig rten pa yi 'jig rten
193a4(rgyud): 'dod| |cho ga thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /'jig rten 'das pa'i brtson 'grus che/ /rig pa'i rgyal po dka' thub che/ /sngags kun 'grub par 'gyur ba ni/ /cho ga
193a5(rgyud): 'di las gzhan pas min/ /thub pa rnams kyis sngags gsungs dang / /de bzhin stobs bcu ldan sras dang / /'jig rten skyong ba brgya byin sogs/ /khyab 'jug dbang
193a6(rgyud): ldan tshangs pa dang / /zla ba nyi ma de bzhin gzhan/ /gnod sbyin dbang po srin po dang / /lto 'phye che dang mi'am ci/ /de bzhin sa steng drang srong mchog /nam mkha' lding dang
193a7(rgyud): rlung lha dang / /sems can ming ldan 'jig rten gzhan/ /gang gis bshad pa'i sngags rnams ni/ /'di yang 'grub par 'gyur ba yin/ /sngags rnams kun la 'gugs
193b1(rgyud): byed dang / /las rnams kun la ston byed dang / /'byung bo kun gyi sngags rgyud ni/ /rgyas dang bcas pa dbang du byed/ /yi ge gcig pa'i sngags 'di ni/ /sngags pa kun gyi
193b2(rgyud): rab byed pa/ /bzlas pa tsam gyis don ldan te/ /lha rnams kun ni 'gugs byed la/ /cho ga rnams ni dbang du byed/ /yi ge gcig chen bdag po yin/ /dam pa rnams kyis rab
193b3(rgyud): bsngags pa'i/ /rnam pa sna tshogs byed pa yin/ /'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'i sngags/ /yang dag sbyar na sgrub par byed/ /ma lus mthong na mdzes pa yi/ /ras ris gsal
193b4(rgyud): ba byas nas ni/ /gtsang ba'i phyogs dang 'bab chu'i ngogs/ /ri bo'i rtser yang gzhag par bya/ /snga ma'i las kyi sbyor ba yis/ /nub kyi phyogs su rtag tu bstan/ /cho ga
193b5(rgyud): mthong ba'i las kyis ni/ /sgrub pa po ni shar du blta/ /dur ba'i khres la 'dug nas ni/ /'du 'dzi med par bzlas par bya/ /sgra ni drag min dal bas min/ /gzhan la ngan
193b6(rgyud): sems med gyur na/ /sangs rgyas ma lus kun gyi yang / /'di la myur du 'grub pa yin/ /rtag tu 'jig rten byams sems dang / /sdug bsngal can la snying brtser ldan/ /mgon
193b7(rgyud): med sems ni dman pa dang / /phongs pas nyams thag stobs chung dang / /mi bzad 'khor bar ltung ba la/ /snying rje'i sems ldan 'grub par 'gyur/ /'bad pas ras ris mdun
194a1(rgyud): dag tu| |mchod pa chen po rtag tu bzhag / dngos su 'byor dang yid kyis sprul/ /bzang po sems las byung ba dang / /rgyal dbang gzugs kyi ri mo ni/ /
194a2(rgyud): bsam pa'am yang na bya ba yin/ /de nyid kyi ni cho ga yis/ /de nyid du ni me thab bya/ /me ni shin tu 'bar ba la/ /sgrub pas sreg blugs sbyin sreg bya/ /tsan+dan dkar dang ga bur dang / /gur
194a3(rgyud): gum gyis bsres mang po ni/ /brgya ni rtsa brgyad sreg blugs kyis/ /sngags rig me 'bar sbyin sreg bya/ /seng ldeng blag sha n+ya gro d+ha/ /pa la sha ni gang yin pa/ /de dag las byung shing
194a4(rgyud): dag gis/ /me chen rab tu sbar bar bya/ /shing de dag ni med gyur na/ /shing gzhan yongs su gzung bar bya/ /pi tsu marda tshwa dang skyur/ /po son cha las byung ba'i shing / /tsher ma can sogs
194a5(rgyud): spang bya ste/ /sdig pa'i las la rab tu bsgrags/ /yi ge gcig pa'i sngags nyid kyis/ /zhi dang rgyas pa byas gyur na/ /de ni myur du 'grub par 'gyur/ /sdig pa'i las ni spyad mi bya/ /
194a6(rgyud): sngags mchog kun kyang 'di la ni/ /las rnams cho ga rgya chen kun/ /rnam rtog med pas rab sbyar na/ /rtag tu 'grub par 'gyur ba yin/ /de tshe sngags ni 'grub 'gyur zhing / /
194a7(rgyud): mchog sbyin nyid du'ang 'gyur ba yin/ /yam shing blag sha u dum bar/ /yang na blag sha n+ya gro d+ha/ /mar gyis btags dang sbrang rtsir ldan/ /zho dang ldan pas mnyam bzhag nas/ /
194b1(rgyud): sa steng rgyal thabs 'dod pa yi/ /sngags pas dus kun sbyin sreg bya/ /lha yi rgyal po 'dod pas ni/ /gur gum tsan+dan sbyin sreg bya/ /rig pa 'dzin pa'i lha dag gi /bdag po nyid ni 'dod gyur na/ /
194b2(rgyud): pad+ma'i sbyin sreg 'bum phrag ni/ /sum cu rtsa drug ge sar bcas/ /sbyin sreg mthar ni mchod yon yang / /bstan bcos las byung bzhin du dbul/ /rgyal bas bsngags pas ras ris mchog /
194b3(rgyud): der ni kun nas yongs su 'bar/ /de la reg pa tsam gyis ni/ /tshangs pa'i 'jig rten dag dang ni/ /'og min gyi ni bar dag nas/ /yang na sa 'og rim par 'gro/ /bar skabs 'dir ni grub
194b4(rgyud): rnams kyi/ /der ni rgyal por rtag tu 'gyur/ /stobs chen brtan zhing pha rol gnon/ /'byung po rnams ni 'byor par byed/ /rtag tu rig 'dzin rgyal por 'gyur/ /las rnams yongs su
194b5(rgyud): sbyong bar byed/ /de ni dus ring 'tsho 'gyur te/ /bskal pa tsam du'ang gnas pa yin/ /gang tshe lus ni shi 'phos nas/ /nges par byang chub gzhol bar 'gyur/ /gzhan yang las ni 'di
194b6(rgyud): dag kyang / /mdo dang rgyas pa bstan par bya/ /pad+ma dkar po yongs blangs nas/ /tsan+dan dkar dang ldan pa yi/ /sbyin sreg 'bum phrag brgya byas na/ /des ni rin chen tog mthong 'gyur/ /rgyal
194b7(rgyud): ba dam pa de mthong na/ /de tshe mngon shes lnga thob 'gyur/ /bskal pa chen por ring 'tsho zhing / /sangs rgyas rjes su 'gro bar 'gyur/ /mtha' yas phyogs na bzhugs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas
195a1(rgyud): de nas mthong bar 'gyur/ /de dag la ni rtag mchod cing / /de dag nyid dang lhan cig gnas/ /rin chen ldan zhes 'jig rten khams/ /gcig na bcom
195a2(rgyud): ldan de bzhugs pa/ /thub gtso mchog ni dam pa ste/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog /de la de ni rtag gnas te/ /sngags kyis dag par the tshom med/ /gzhan yang las ni
195a3(rgyud): 'dod pa dag / gang zag mchog gis gsungs pa ni/ /nA ga ge sar ga pur dang / /tsan+dan gur gum cha mnyam pa/ /sngags pas de tshe gcig byas nas/ /sbyin sreg 'bum phrag bdun cu
195a4(rgyud): brgyad| |de tshe lha ni sbyin sreg mthar/ /'khor lo can de 'dir byon nas/ /rtag tu dgyes nas mchog stsol te/ /sgrub byed spyi bor byug par mdzad/ /de tshe reg pa tsam gyis ni/ /sngags pa
195a5(rgyud): sa bdun bdag por 'gyur/ /rgyal sras thugs las skyes pa yi/ /byang chub sems dpar der brjod do/ /nges pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang / /de ni lung bstan 'gyur ba yin//
195a6(rgyud): de nas brtsams nas cung zad gang / /shes dang shes bya rgyal ba'i sras/ /shes 'gyur sngags rnams ma lus ni/ /rtogs pa'i bdag nyid cher rgyas yin/ /de la reg pa tsam gyis ni/ /
195a7(rgyud): mngon shes lnga ldan sngags rgyal 'gyur/ /rtag tu bdag dang gzhan bdag nyid/ /rnam pa sna tshogs byed par 'gyur/ /rnam pa kun mchog ldan pa yi/ /mchod pa'i las la rtag
195b1(rgyud): tu dga'/ /skad cig de nyid kho na la/ /byang chub las la brtson par 'gyur/ /de tshe skad cig tsam gyis ni/ /'jig rten sangs rgyas zhing der 'gro /'jig rten khams ni stong dag tu/ /thams
195b2(rgyud): cad du yang 'gro bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' ni/ /de tshe spyod bcas mthong bar 'gyur/ /de las chos ni thos pa dang / /mchod pa'i las la brtson par 'gyur/ /rgyal pa
195b3(rgyud): 'khor los bsgyur gsungs pa'i/ /'dir ni las rnams gzhan yod de/ /mar me yon du dbul ba ni/ /mar bcas snying po gtsang ba ni/ /gser dang dngul gyi snod dag dang / /zangs ma sa
195b4(rgyud): dag nyid yin na'ang / /der ni mar me rab spar te/ /skyes bu grangs ni 'bum dag gis/ /grangs kyi tshad tsam nges bzhag ste/ /brgya phrag stong las lhag pa min/ /bud med spangs pa'i skyes pa
195b5(rgyud): yis| |kho ra 'khor yug mar me 'dzin/ /mchod pa'i las kyi don du ni/ /ston pa'i ras ris sku la dbul/ /sngags rnams re re 'ang 'don bzhin du/ /thams cad mnyam par rab zhugs nas/ /ston
195b6(rgyud): pa la ni 'bul byed na/ /de yi mod la grub par ston/ /kun nas sgra ni sgrogs byed cing / /rnga bo che yi sgra yang sgrogs/ /gang phyir lha tshogs du ma ni/ /legs so zhes pa'i sgra rab 'don/ /sangs rgyas
195b7(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' yang / /de tshe nam mkha' la bzhugs nas/ /shes rab can khyod legs so legs/ /legs byas las ni yongs su byas/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtshor nub pa dang /
196a1(rgyud): sdug bsngal yang ni mthong mi 'gyur/ /bde dang zhi ba mya ngan 'das/ /'jigs med sangs rgyas nyid kyang thob/ /lam ni dge dang dri ma med/ /yan
196a2(rgyud): lag brgyad la legs par spyod/ /yi ge gcig pa mnyes byas nas/ /sngags kyi ngo bo'i mgon po mnyes/ /gzhan yang las ni 'di nyid ni/ /dam pa'i 'gro ba la gnas nas/ /
196a3(rgyud): mthu chen por ni rnam shes pa'i/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs/ /nim pa'i rang bzhin shing blangs nas/ /rtse gsum rdo rje gnyis mthar bya/ /dbus kyi phyogs su bya ba
196a4(rgyud): ni| |rdo rje rigs te mi bskyod pa/ /de nas sngags kyis dag byas nas/ /de ni ras ris mngon du bzhag /de nas sngags pas lag reg nas/ /sngags ni mnyam par gzhag nas bzla//
196a5(rgyud): rtsa brgyad 'bum phrag bcu drug ni/ /yongs su rdzogs nas grub par 'dod/ /de nas rdo rje gcig 'bar te/ /kun nas de ni rab tu 'bar/ /de nas rdo rje de blangs nas/ /'di ltar de ni
196a6(rgyud): steng 'gro 'o/ /de nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten nam/ /gzhan yang lha gnas gang 'dod 'gro/ /de nas nam mkhar 'gro 'gyur te/ /grub pa kun gyi sngon du 'dren/ /grub pa'i rig 'dzin
196a7(rgyud): la sogs kyi/ /bdag po nyid kyang byed par 'gyur/ /lha yi 'dus pa mang po yi/ /'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur/ /bdag nyid kyi ni spyod pa yang / /rnam pa sna tshogs byed
196b1(rgyud): par 'gyur/ /bar gyi bskal pa bcu yi bar/ /yun ring gnas te bar chad med/ /bde ba la brten rtag tu mchod/ /rtag tu skyes bu dam par ldan/ /byang chub sems kyis yang dag spyod/ /skye
196b2(rgyud): ba'i sdug bsngal rnam par spangs/ /grub pa'i dbang phyug 'gyur ba ste/ /sdig pa thams cad rnam par spangs/ /de la shi 'phos mir skye zhing / /bde ba mang la rab tu gzhol/ /'gro ba ma lus
196b3(rgyud): skyob byas nas/ /byang chub yang dag gzhol bar 'gyur/ /rnam pa sna tshogs las mtha' yas/ /mang po 'jig rten don mchod pa/ /sngags kyi rgyal po 'dir brjod pa/ /cho ga rgya chen cho gar
196b4(rgyud): bcas/ /sa bdag brgya byin nyid dang ni/ /'khor los bsgyur nyid yang dang yang / /rig 'dzin rnams dang de bzhin du/ /lha nyid dang ni bdag po'ang byed/ /rnam pa du ma'i ngo bo 'am/ /las ni gang
196b5(rgyud): dag 'di gsungs pa/ /thams cad grub pa thob 'gyur te/ /sngags pa legs par sbyor byed na'o/ /mtshan mo skyil mo krung bcas te/ /sdom can don yod bzlas byas na/ /tho rangs grub pa thob
196b6(rgyud): 'gyur te/ /zlos pa mngon shes lnga thob 'gyur/ /dur khrod ro la 'dug nas ni/ /sdom can 'gul med zlos pa ni/ /yi ge gcig po don chen te/ /tho rangs grub par 'dod pa yin/ /rig pa'i
196b7(rgyud): rgyal po rdzu 'phrul che/ /gal te dur khrod gnas nas bzlas/ /zla ba drug gis grub thob ste/ /ji ltar 'dod pa'i 'bras bu byed/ /gang yang rung ba'i gnas dag tu/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po zlos
197a1(rgyud): byed na| |der gnas grub pa thob 'gyur te/ /sngags pa legs par sbyor byed pa'o/ /gdugs dkar de bzhin ral gri dang / /nor bu'i lha ma dang gdub gong
197a2(rgyud): dang / /mu tig phreng ba dpung rgyan dang / /gdu bu dang ni sor gdub dang / /'og pag dang ni de bzhin gos/ /so shing dang ni spyi blugs dang / /mchod phyir thogs dang zhwa dang ni/ /khrab dang go cha
197a3(rgyud): nyid dang ni/ /g.yang gzhi dang ni ril ba dang / /phreng ba dang ni mchil lham dang / /'jig rten gnyis na 'dod pa yi/ /rgyan gyi gtso bo thams cad de/ /lha dang mi dang de bzhin du/ /gzhan
197a4(rgyud): yang rgyan 'gyur 'di la brgyan/ /de dag thams cad thob 'gyur te/ /ras ris mdun du zlos byed la'o/ /rdzas rnams kun dang 'byung khung dang / /rgyan dang nor bu rnams dang ni/ /mtshon cha
197a5(rgyud): thams cad du ma ni/ /ras res mdun du bzhag nas ni/ /dag byas gcig car bzla bya ba/ /'bum phrag brgyad kyis g.yo ba dang / /thams cad bcas te 'bar ba dang / /zlos pa reg
197a6(rgyud): pas gyen du 'gro / rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs ldan pa/ /sems can rang bzhin yin yang rung / /rgyan dang mtshon cha yin yang rung / /ngo bo nyid dam sa rang bzhin/ /rang tshul spyod dam
197a7(rgyud): bcos ma dang / /'dab chags sna tshogs tshogs kyang rung / /gang dag 'byung po kun la grags/ /bcos ma'am bcos ma min pa'am/ /'du shes can nam 'du shes med/ /sngags pa mchod
197b1(rgyud): pas grub par 'gyur/ /rnam pa sna tshogs rdzas bzhag dang / /rnam pa sna tshogs khams las byung / /rang byas byed du bcug pa dang / /'gro ba'i skye gnas dag na bsngags/ /sngar
197b2(rgyud): bstan cho ga bzhin du ni/ /ras ris mdun du rnam par gzhag /lan ni drug gam bdun dag gis/ /sngags pas reg nas bzla bar bya/ /bzlas mthar de dag rab 'bar te/ /grub pa
197b3(rgyud): rgyas pa thob par 'gyur/ /de ni de la reg tsam gyis/ /phyogs bzhi dag tu 'gro bar 'gyur/ /'dir ni lha yul thob nas ni/ /ring du 'tsho zhing bde bar 'gyur/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po
197b4(rgyud): rig rgyal la/ /ji lta ji ltar rab sbyor ba/ /de lta de ltar dga' 'gyur zhing / /rtag tu mchog kyang ster bar 'gyur/ /gzhan yang las la rab sbyor ba/ /las rnams dus ni yun ring ba/ /
197b5(rgyud): rig pa'i rgyal po rdzu 'phrul che/ /de nyid kyis ni myur 'grub 'gyur/ /gtsang zhing sems ni gtsang ba dang / /gtsang ba'i las la rtag tu dga'/ /gtsang ba'i phyogs dang sngags shes pa/ /
197b6(rgyud): gtsang ba'i grub pa thob par 'gyur/ /las gang byed pa de 'bras thob/ /mchog gi mchog tu 'gyur ba dang / /'bring gi las kyi 'bring du 'gyur/ /tha mas kyang ni tha mar ro/ /ma bsgrubs
197b7(rgyud): las kyis grub pa yang / /cung zad tsam gyis 'bras 'byin te/ /bu mo'am nor ni mang po dag /yang dag spyod pas byed par 'gyur/ /rtag tu bzlas pa tsam gyis ni/ /longs spyod che zhing
198a1(rgyud): stobs kyang che/ /rgyal po dga' zhing blon po nyid/ /rtag tu bzlas pas byed par 'gyur/ /sngags kyi rgyal po lan gcig bzlas/ /de yi sdig pa rab tu 'jig /
198a2(rgyud): gnyis su bzlas sam bdun bzlas pas/ /bdag nyid srung ba chen por 'gyur/ /lan brgyad de ni bzlas pa yis/ /grogs po thams cad srung bar byed/ /gos la lan gnyis
198a3(rgyud): mngon sngags na/ /sngags pa dag ni rtag tu yang / /nad rnams kun las shin tu grol/ /gos ni gnyis ka la sngags nas/ /gos dag la ni reg byas na/ /lus can nad ni med
198a4(rgyud): par 'gyur/ /gdong dang mig gnyis dag la ni/ /'bad pas mngon par rab sngags na/ /khros pa rnams kyi khro ba ni/ /sngags pas bltas pa tsam gyis 'jig /gang yang 'byung
198a5(rgyud): tshogs ma rungs pa/ /'tshe byed sdig pa'i las can la/ /sngags rgyal sum cu rab bzlas te/ /de dag gdong la blta ba'am/ /rang lag nyid la yang dang yang / /mngon par sngags
198a6(rgyud): pa byas nas ni/ /de dag thal mo brdabs na ni/ /lus can kun ni grol bar 'gyur/ /byis pa la ni rtag bya ba/ /khrus dang bza' dang btung ba la/ /sngags mchog drug cu bzlas
198a7(rgyud): nas ni/ /lha yi dam pa mchod byas na/ /sha za ma mo dag gi gdon/ /ma rungs kun las grol bar 'gyur/ /sngags kyi 'jigs pas 'jigs byed cing / /rtag tu byis pa gtong
198b1(rgyud): bar byed/ /de ltar rnam pa du ma'i las/ /sa steng myur du rtag 'jig na/ /mi rnams la ni de bzhin byed/ /gang dag 'byung po sdig sbrul ni/ /rnam pa sna tshogs gnas 'gro ba/ /dug bcas
198b2(rgyud): dug ni med pa nyid/ /sngags kyi mthu yis 'jig par byed/ /gang dag sdug bsngal sna tshogs dang / /gang dag tshor ba thams cad ni/ /sngags kyi rgyal po bzlas pa yis/ /myur du zhi bar
198b3(rgyud): rab tu 'gro / rnam pa sna tshogs gnod sdug bsngal/ /mang po 'chi ba 'og ba'i nad/ /sngags kyi rgyal po drug brgya bzlas/ /myur ba nyid du sel bar 'gyur/ /sbyin sreg las ni bya ba
198b4(rgyud): la| |zho dang mar gyis thams cad bsre/ /ud pal sngon po'i dri bzang ni/ /rtsa brgyad stong gis bzlas pa bya/ /zhi zhing 'byung po rnams song nas/ /'gro ba rnams ni bde gnas thob/ /
198b5(rgyud): de ltar rnam pa du ma ni/ /mang po'i las ni yang dag 'byung / /sngags pa legs par rab sbyor na/ /myur du thams cad byed par 'gyur/ /bzlas pa tsam gyis byed pa ni/ /dgra
198b6(rgyud): rnams kyi ni khro ba sel/ /sngags 'di don dang ldan gyur pa/ /cho ga mang po rgya che ba/ /de dag cho ga mthong ba yis/ /de dag 'dir ni grub pa yin/ /'dir ni sngags rnams
198b7(rgyud): zlo byed pa/ /phran tshegs las kyang don yod 'gyur/ /thams cad la yang bzlas pa yis/ /myur du don rnams rtag tu byed/ /'byung po rnams ni dbang byed 'dod/ /
199a1(rgyud): dus gsum du ni bzlas pa yin/ /rtag tu sna ma'i me tog gis/ /sbyin bsreg las kyang bya ba yin/ /tsan+dan dkar dang ga pur dang / /
199a2(rgyud): gur gum gyis kyang bya ba yin/ /bzlas nas sngags pa mchog sbyin zhing / /rtag tu 'bras bcas byed par 'gyur/ /rtag tu zlos pas sbyin sreg bya/ /yid la
199a3(rgyud): 'dod pa'i don sgrub byed/ /ga pur la sogs ldan pa yis/ /rtag tu sbyin sreg rab tu brtag /ji ltar 'dod par yongs brtags pa'i/ /rnam pa sna tshogs cho ga bsgrub/ /
