199a4(rgyud): tha ma las ni tha ma dang / /chen po las ni chen po 'byung / /bar ma bar ma'i las dag las/ /rtag tu grub par bstan pa yin/ /de bas las rnams kun la ni/ /khyad
199a5(rgyud): par du ni sbyin sreg bya/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che thegs chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga las/
199a6(rgyud): le'u bcu bzhi pa 'khor los bsgyur ba'i ras ris kyi cho ga dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'i thabs rab 'byams rdzogs so// //de nas byang chub
199a7(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje 'khor gyi nang der 'dug shing 'khod par gyur te/ 'dug pa de stan las langs nas lan gsum bskor ba byas
199b1(rgyud): te| bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la btud nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ legs so/ /legs so/ /legs par rab tu bstan pa dang / mchog tu
199b2(rgyud): legs par gsungs pa'i rig pa thams cad kyi sngags kyi sbyor ba/ chos chen po'i sprin las nges par byung ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po/ rig pa chen
199b3(rgyud): po'i rgyal po/ 'khor los bsgyur ba/ cho ga chen po rgya che ba/ don thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ 'bras bu dang bcas pa sgrub par byed pa/ byang chub kyi lam bla na
199b4(rgyud): med pa/ /bya ba'i bye brag yang dag par sdom pa dang / bzlas pa dang / sbyin sreg dang / rig pa dang / spyod pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyi lam/ 'bras bu bstan pa'i las kyi rkyen skyed
199b5(rgyud): pa'i rgyu dang / mtshan ma/ rmad du byung ba'i stobs bcu/ nod par byed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba/ byang chub kyi snying po nod par byed cing nges par pha rol du 'gro bar byed pa de/
199b6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das/ de ni legs so/ /sngags sgrub par byed pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i rmi lam na mthong bar byed pa'i mtshan ma de ston pas bshad du gsol/ gang gis
199b7(rgyud): rig pa thams cad sgrub pa'i rjes su spyod pa'i sems can grub pa'i mtshan ma'i las rtsom par byed par 'gyur ba dang / 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i rig pa thams cad kyi
200a1(rgyud): mtshan mar 'gyur ba'o/ /de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces
200a2(rgyud): bka' stsal to/ /gnod sbyin gyi bdag po/ khyod skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i don dang /
200a3(rgyud): phan pa dang / bde ba dang / rig pa thams cad sgrub par byed pa'i sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir legs so/ /legs so/ /de legs par rab tu nyon la zungs shig dang /
200a4(rgyud): ngas khyod la bshad do/ /dang po re zhig las thams cad kyi sngar 'du 'dzi med pa'i gnas su song ste/ ri bo'i rtse'am/ chu bo'i 'gram mam/ phug gi nang ngam/ gtsang ba'i
200a5(rgyud): phyogs su lo ma'i spyil po byas la de nyid kyi cho ga snga ma bzhin du ras ris bzhag cing mchod pa chen po byas la las thams cad la yang yar ngo'i zla ba phyed dam/ cho
200a6(rgyud): 'phrul chen po'i zla ba phyed la nges par nyin zhag bzang po'i mtshan mo'i thun dang po la tsan+dan dkar po dang / gur gum dang / ga pur gcig tu byas la tsan+dan gyi shing
200a7(rgyud): gis me rab tu spar zhing ras ris kyi mdun du khru bzhi'i tshad tsam gyi me thab la du ba dang / sol ba med pa'i me la sreg blugs stong rtsa brgyad kyis sbyin sreg bya'o/ /de nas
200b1(rgyud): yang sbyin sreg gi mthar pad+ma'i me tog tsan+dan dkar po'i chus bsang gtor byas pa'i stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o/ /sbyin sreg gi mthar yang bzang po'i gdan dang / gdong
200b2(rgyud): bkab la rang gi lha la rang gi sngags kyis spyan drang bar bya zhing sngags 'dis sbyin sreg bya'o/ /na maHsarba bud d+hA nAM/ a pra ta hi ta sha sa nA nAM/ tad+ya thA/ oM ku mA ra rU pi Ne
200b3(rgyud): daR+sha ya daR+sha ya/ At+ma no b+hu mi mud b+hA ba swap+naM me ni be da ya wA b+hu taM/ hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ /sngags 'dis srung ba byas shing sbyin sreg gi las thams cad la las
200b4(rgyud): bya'o| |de nas ku sha'i rtse mo gnyis ka phyi rol du bstan te bting la ku sha'i khres kyi sngags byas te/ mgo shar phyogs su bstan la ras ris kyi mdun nas ha cang yang mi
200b5(rgyud): ring | ha cang yang mi nye bar nyal bar bya'o/ /thun dang po la mi nyal ba'i sbyor bas rjes su brtson par byas nas/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phyag byas nas
200b6(rgyud): sdig pa rnams so sor bshags te/ sangs rgyas thams cad la bdag nyid phul la/ de nas ji ltar bde bar gnyid kyi dbang du 'gro bar bya'o/ /dang po'i thun gyi rmi lam gang / /
200b7(rgyud): bad ka na las byung shes par bya/ /gnyis par gang byung mkhris pa ste/ /'jig rten la yod smad pa yin/ /gsum pa rlung byung shes par bya/ /bzhi pa bden par 'byung
201a1(rgyud): ba yin/ /bad kan rmi lam dang po ni/ /'di 'dra rtag tu mthong ba yin/ /nor bu shel gyi khang ba ni/ /kun nas mu tig phreng ba can/ /a mra'i shing
201a2(rgyud): tshogs rab mang po/ /bdag nyid chu nang 'bying bar mthong / /kun nas 'bab chus khyab pa dang / /rgya mtsho chen pos khyab pa dang / /gang du bdag gi lus gnas
201a3(rgyud): pa| |de nyid du ni mthong bar byed/ /gang du phyogs der rdzing dag gis/ /kun nas yongs su khyab pa dang / /gru dang chu ni 'thung ba dang / /btung ba'i khang pa khang pa dang //
201a4(rgyud): kun nas yongs su 'khor ba ni/ /chu chen gyis ni khyer bar mthong / /kha ba can ni byis pa dang / /chu bo chen por shel gnas pa/ /shing dang ri yi rgyal po dang / /shel
201a5(rgyud): gyis yongs su bcings pa dang / /mu tig dra bas legs g.yogs dang / /mu tig phung po mthong ba dang / /char chen 'bab pa chu yi tshogs/ /mthong na bad kan las
201a6(rgyud): gyur yin/ /gdugs ni dkar po dag dang ni/ /rgyan rnams kun kyang dkar ba dang / /ban glang dag ni dkar po'i gzugs/ /bad kan rmi lam dag tu brjod/ /rnga ma
201a7(rgyud): dkar ram skyes bu 'am/ /yang na gos dag mthong ba 'am/ /lan tshwa la sogs reg pa ni/ /kun tu gsal te mthong ba ni/ /ras bal btso ma'i gos dag gam/ /ra gan
201b1(rgyud): dngul dang a ga ru/ /reg dang za bar byed pa nyid/ /bad kan rmi lam dag tu 'dod/ /mon sran gre'u za ba dang / /til btags bu ram 'bras chan dang / /mon sran rnam mang za ba
201b2(rgyud): ni| |bad kan rmi lam dag tu 'dod/ /swa sti ga dang u lo pi/ /kri sa ra dang 'o thug dang / /de dag za byed rmi lam ni/ /bad kan rmi lam bya ba yin/ /'breng bu sa bcud bza' ba
201b3(rgyud): sogs/ /rnam pa sna tshogs snum khur ni/ /reg dang za bar byed pa nyid/ /bad kan 'phel ba'i rmi lam yin/ /snum khur rnam pa du ma ni/ /bza' dang spyad par rjes
201b4(rgyud): 'dod dang / /zos dang reg par byed de dag /bad kan rmi lam shes par bya/ /gnas dang gnas mal theg pa dang / /bzhon pa sems can las byung ba/ /reg dang 'dzeg
201b5(rgyud): par byed pa nyid/ /dang po'i thun la mthong pa nyid/ /gal te rmi lam snang gyur na/ /thams cad bad kan can du brjod/ /rnam pa de lta'i rmi lam dang / /chu la 'byung
201b6(rgyud): dang spyod pa dang / /rnam pa sna tshogs bza' la spyod/ /mthong na bad kan can du brjod/ /de dag rmi lam dag tu mthong / /bad kan can gyi spyod pa yin/ /rmi lam ma lus du
201b7(rgyud): ma ni| |'jig rten mgon pos gsungs pa yin/ /gnyis pa'i thun la lus can gyi/ /rmi lam mkhris pa can gyi yin/ /'bar ba'i me yi gzugs mthong dang / /
202a1(rgyud): sna tshogs rin chen mthong ba dang / /mes tshig skar mda' ltung ba dang / /ri dang phyogs ni rab 'bar ba/ /skye bo gang gis rab mthong ba/ /de
202a2(rgyud): ni mkhris par gyur pa yin/ /rin chen pad+ma rA ga dang / /gzhan yang rin chen gang yin pa/ /gang du rmi lam mthong na ni/ /lus can mkhris pa las gyur yin/ /me
202a3(rgyud): dang tshab sten pa dang / /reg dang za bar byed pa dang / /rnam pa sna tshogs kha dog ser/ /rmi lam mkhris pas brgyal ba yin/ /rtag tu tsha ba'i nyi ma dang / /nyi ma rtag
202a4(rgyud): tu bde bar ni/ /gang gis rmi lam mthong gyur na/ /lus can mkhris pa las gyur yin/ /nam mkha' gser gyi mdog gyur dang / /sa yi steng ni kha dog ser/ /
202a5(rgyud): rmi lam na ni gang gis mthong / /mkhris pa las gyur na ba yin/ /me ni kun nas 'bar ba yis/ /nam mkha'i ngos ni rab gsal bar/ /rmi lam dus su mthong ba ni/ /
202a6(rgyud): mkhris pas gnod pa'i lus can yin/ /sa dang de bzhin ri bo dang / /brag ni mthon po 'ang gser gyi mdog /shing chen de bzhin theg pa ni/ /rtag tu thams cad gser
202a7(rgyud): rang bzhin/ /rtag tu rmi lam gnas mthong na/ /mkhris pa las gyur rmi lam yin/ /theg pa rgyan dang bzhon pa dang / /snod rnams gser gyi rang bzhin dang / /
202b1(rgyud): stan rnams dang ni gnas mal rnams/ /sa le sbram gyi rang bzhin la/ /reg dang 'gro bar byed pa nyid/ /rmi lam mthong na mkhris gyur yin/ /phreng ba ser po thogs pa dang / /
202b2(rgyud): ser po'i gos kyis nyer mdzes dang / /ser po'i 'od dang dri yis byugs/ /ser po'i mchod phyir thogs pa dang / /bdag nyid ser po'i rnam pa dag /gang gis rmi
202b3(rgyud): lam la mthong ba/ /gnyis pa'i thun du mthong na ni/ /mkhris pa las gyur shes par bya/ /de bzhin rnam pa sna tshogs pa/ /gang gzhan rmi lam dag tu brjod/ /
202b4(rgyud): rnam pa sna tshogs ser por snang / /rmi lam mkhris las yang dag byung / /mkhris pas lus can rab gnon pa/ /gnyis pa'i thun la bstan pa yin/ /rnam pa du ma'i
202b5(rgyud): gzugs can ni/ /ser por snang ba yang dag 'byung / /'jig rten gtso bos gsungs pa ni/ /rmi lam mkhris las yang dag byung / /gang yang rlung byung rmi lam ni/ /gsum
202b6(rgyud): pa'i thun du bstan pa yin/ /khor yug tu ni 'od 'phro ba/ /phyogs rnams kun tu rab tu snang / /nam mkha' la ni 'gro ba dang / /nam mkha'i dkyil du thad drang 'gro /bar snang
202b7(rgyud): nam mkha'i dkyil du ni/ /kun nas 'khor ba rtag tu 'gro/ /rlung byung rmi lam zhes bstan pa/ /'di lta bu la bya ba yin/ /rgal dang mchong dang de bzhin du/ /shing rnams la ni mngon
203a1(rgyud): par 'dzeg / bstan bcos ma lus 'don pa dang / /khyad par du ni sngags rnams dang / /bshad dang rjod par byed pa yang / /phal cher yang ni
203a2(rgyud): rlung las gyur/ /shing rnams tsher ma can 'dzeg dang / /kha ba dag kyang za ba dang / /bza' ba ma lus tsha dang skyur/ /zos ba rlung las gyur pa yin/ /gtsor yang rlung ni
203a3(rgyud): yang dag 'byung / /shing thog rlung ni rab bskyod pa/ /de dag za bar rmi lam mthong / /rlung las byung ba yang dag bstan/ /dngos rnams rlung ni skyed pa yi/ /bza' dang
203a4(rgyud): bca' ba khyad par ldan/ /de bzhin skye bo sems 'khrugs dang / /reg par byed dang smra bar byed/ /'byung po rnams ni gar byed dang / /bdag nyid dang ni gar byed pa/ /gang
203a5(rgyud): gis rmi lam mthong na ni/ /de 'dra rlung nad can du shes/ /rnam pa sna tshogs spyod pa dang / /rnam pa sna tshogs 'khyud dang smra/ /rnam pa sna tshogs mi bzad gzugs/ /rmi lam
203a6(rgyud): rlung nad can gyis mthong / /de la sogs pa'i rmi lam ni/ /'jig rten mchog gis gsungs pa yin/ /rnam gsum sbyor ba rab ldan pa/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti
203a7(rgyud): mug yin/ /chags can bad kan can zhes bya/ /zhe sdang las byung mkhris pa can/ /rmongs pa rlung las gyur pa yin/ /'dres pa'ang rnam par 'dres pa'o/ /grong
203b1(rgyud): chos ni mthong ba las/ /rmi lam chags pas sa bon byung / /der ni bud med la chags pa/ /bad kan las byung rmi lam yin/ /rtsod bcas ngang tshul zhe sdang can/ /
203b2(rgyud): mkhris pa las byung rmi lam yin/ /ma rig las byung rmongs pa rnams/ /dran pa nyams par mthong ba yin/ /rnam 'dres rnam par 'dres pa ni/ /rmi lam na ni rtag tu
203b3(rgyud): mthong / /de bas rnam pa thams cad kyis/ /rmi lam zhes bya yod pa spangs/ /bya ba dus kyi rim pa nyid/ /de nyid gzigs pas bstan pa yin/ /sems can bad kan can gsungs
203b4(rgyud): pa| |mdog ldan snyan par smra ba dang / /tshe ring yid ni gzhungs pa dang / /kha dog snum zhing 'jigs pa med/ /bong tshad ring zhing dkar ba dang / /bud med la phrad rtag tu dga'/ /
203b5(rgyud): chos ldan rtag tu dpa' ba dang / /btung ba mngal rtag tu dga'/ /rgyal rigs su ni bstan pa yin/ /ser sna ldan zhing mtshon pa med/ /de bzhin sa yi bdag po dang / /dmag
203b6(rgyud): dpon don du gnas pa ste/ /longs spyod chen po skye 'gyur zhing / /rang gi las kyi nye bar 'tshe/ /rang gi las 'bras bstan pa ni/ /las kyi sngags ni spang ba min/ /las
203b7(rgyud): min sngags ni gtso bo zhes/ /rnam par 'dren pas gsungs pa yin/ /de bas sems can bad kan can/ /sa steng grub pa byed pa mi/ /sa bdag 'dod pa byed pa la/ /
204a1(rgyud): de la grub pa thob par 'gyur/ /zlos pas bad kan can gyi zas/ /ma lus bsten par mi bya'o/ /gang phyir shin tu bsten gyur na/ /rmi lam don/
204a2(rgyud): gyis stong 'gyur bas/ /grub pa'i don du ma brjod pas/ /sngags pas de tshe de mi bsten/ /mkhas pa rig pa ldan pa yis/ /de yi dus su gnyid log min/ /mkhris pa can
204a3(rgyud): gyis sems can gyi/ /rtag tu spyod pa brjod par bya/ /zhe sdang gis ni rnam 'khrugs na/ /kha dog nag dang stobs chung dang / /drag po drag pa'i las dang ni/ /rtag tu yon por
204a4(rgyud): byed pa yin/ /dpa' dang bab chol rtag tu byed/ /stobs dang blo dang ldan pa dang / /mang du smra zhing grogs po mang / /bstan bcos ting 'dzin mang po rtogs/ /chos ldan
204a5(rgyud): las kyi mtha' brtan cing / /zhe sdang slong brjod par byed/ /yid ldan dgra ni mang ba dang / /zhe sdang mtshon pa skye bar 'gyur/ /nor mang dpa' bo la sdang dang / /'jig rten
204a6(rgyud): shes shing mthong na dga'/ /des grol chags pa med pa dang / /brtan cing sdug bsngal rtag tu bzod/ /nga rgyal phrag dog ma rungs pa/ /bud med rnams la dga' bar
204a7(rgyud): byed/ /spro chen brtan dang blon po dang / /longs spyod chen por skye bar 'gyur/ /shes bzhin las kyis nyer spyod pa'i/ /sems can zil gyis mnan nas spyod/ /sngags
204b1(rgyud): ni srog la gnod byed pa/ /de ni de la myur 'grub 'gyur/ /mi bzad thub pas spangs pa'i don/ /myur du sgrub par byed pa yin/ /sems can gnod phyir byed pa'i las/ /lus can
204b2(rgyud): de la grub par 'gyur/ /cho ga sbyar ba'i chos rnams gang / /sngags pas thams cad rab sbyar na/ /spyod pa des ni 'grub 'gyur te/ /gzhan las sems can de las min/ /
204b3(rgyud): sngags pa zhes sdang can dag la/ /sems can gzhan la gnod pa dang / /de bzhin gzhan gyi sngags gcod pa/ /sems can khro ba la grub 'gyur/ /gzhan gyi rdzas ni 'phrog don
204b4(rgyud): dang / /gzhan gyi srog ni gcod pa la/ /khro ba'i sngags kyis grub 'gyur te/ /sngags gzhan dag la sbyar mi bya/ /zhe sdang rigs kyis sems can 'di/ /bdag po nyid kyang byed
204b5(rgyud): par 'gyur/ /mdog nag pa'am sngo ba sangs sam/ /dkar ba'am yang na 'dres pa yi/ /mi ni khro ldan gser gyi mdog/ rnam par spangs pa skye bar 'gyur/ /mi ni rtsu ba mdog
204b6(rgyud): du ba'i mdog/ /ser skya'i mdog tu'ang skye ba yin/ /dpa' dang de bzhin drag pa dang / /chags ldan sdig pa'i khyim las skyes/ /gza' ni mig dmar zhing bdag gnas/ /
204b7(rgyud): pad kan can la phur bu'i bdag /skye 'gyur nyung du za ba dang / /tsha dang skyur ba'i ro bsten cing / /de yi tshe ni ring 'gyur zhing / /dran dang ldan pa skye bar 'gyur/ /spyod pa dang ni
205a1(rgyud): rjes spyod pa/ /rlung nad can gyi bshad par bya/ /mdog mi sdug dang rtsub mdog dang / /bong tshod med cing shin tu rjud/ /blo nyams shes rab med pa
205a2(rgyud): dang / /mi brtan gnas pa med pa dang / /lus ni 'gul dang 'khor ba dang / /skyug cing bshang gci mang du 'byung / /mang du za zhing rtag par za/ /de dag gang phyir nad mang
205a3(rgyud): 'gyur/ /'jig rten rigs dang mi mthun zhing / /dgra ni mang po skye bar 'gyur/ /de ni sa steng 'di dag tu/ /tshul 'chal sdug bsngal skye 'gyur te/ /mi snang ba yi sngags
205a4(rgyud): dag ni/ /de la 'grub par bstan pa yin/ /gang zhig rlung nad 'khrug byed pa'i/ /zas la de ni dga' bar 'gyur/ /zlos pa las ni grub 'dod pas/ /de ni yongs su
205a5(rgyud): bsten mi bya/ /sems can rlung nad 'khrug pa la/ /gti mug nye bar zhi ba dang / /rmongs pa'i rigs can la gsungs pa/ /rmongs pa'i sngags ni rab sgrub pa/ /rtag tu
205a6(rgyud): de dag rmongs pa la/ /rmongs pa dag ni 'grub par 'dod/ /rgyu skar khyim ni chu skyes dang / /gza' ni bdag po spen par blta/ /rlung nad skyes pa'i sems can ni/ /
205a7(rgyud): dge ba'i las la mi spyod de/ /'byung po dbang dang 'gugs par byed/ /de bzhin rmongs dang rengs pa'o/ /rlung nad can gyi sems can la/ /gti mug can de sdig
205b1(rgyud): pa byed/ /rmi lam bden par mthong ba ni/ /mtshan nyid 'di dag gsungs pa ni/ /sems can rnams kyi don sgrub pa/ /thub pa rnams kyis sngon gsungs pa'o/ /lug glang dang ni sbyor
205b2(rgyud): ba dang / /sbal pa seng ge nyid dang ni/ /srang dang bu mo sdig pa dang / /de bzhin gzhu dang chu srin dang / /bum pa nya dang glang po dang / /lha dang spre 'u lha ma yin/ /grub dang dri za gnod sbyin
205b3(rgyud): sogs/ /mi rnams gang gis rab bsgrags pa/ /sems can rnams kyi khyim mang po/ /gang zag mchog gis gsungs pa yin/ /rnam pa mang po sna tshogs don/ /rnam pa sna
205b4(rgyud): tshogs las bstan pa/ /de dag las ni thams cad la/ /yon tan rgya cher smin par 'gyur/ /las las gol ba med par ni/ /lus can yon tan mi
205b5(rgyud): smin te/ /yon tan kho na las ldan pas/ /skye bar yang ni byed pa yin/ /yon tan chos don ldan pa ni/ /sngags la 'grub pa skye bar 'gyur/ /zlos pa sems can yon
205b6(rgyud): tan shes/ /yon tan yon tan min las 'ching / /yon tan med la bya min gang / /de yi las ni bya ba min/ /gang phyir bya ba las byed de/ /bya ba yon tan med pa yin/ /bya
205b7(rgyud): ba las dang yon tan nyid/ /yang dag ldan pa sgrub par 'gyur/ /chog sngon 'gro bya ba'i las/ /stobs bcu ldan pas sngon bstan to/ /rdzas dang sems can spyod
206a1(rgyud): pa gzhan/ /bya ba las dang yon tan yin/ /rnam pa sna tshogs rmi lam tshul/ /las las 'byung bar snang ba yin/ /de bas rmi lam mtshan ma
206a2(rgyud): yis/ /rgya che las la rab sbyar bya/ /rnam pa sna tshogs rnam pa dang / /yid 'ong blta na sdug pa dang / /bgegs kyi gzugs dang gzugs med pa/ /rmi lam rgyur ni snang ba
206a3(rgyud): yin/ /mthu che sbro ba che ba ni/ /mi ni grub pa 'dod pa yin/ /mchog dang tha ma 'bring dag ni/ /de dag la ni grub par brtag /drag cing las rnams ma rungs ni/ /rmi lam
206a4(rgyud): rtag tu 'phral du min/ /bzang po bstan pa'i las dag ni/ /yun ring dus su grub phyir ro/ /'jig rten 'jig rten 'das rnams kyi/ /yon tan skye par yang dag 'byung //
206a5(rgyud): rmi lam rnam pa sna tshogs snang / /zlos pas sngags rnams 'grub par 'gyur/ /mi 'grub don du sngags rnams ni/ /gnyid dang snyom pa rab tu brtag /bgegs 'joms
206a6(rgyud): byed pa'i sngags rnams ni/ /de yi dus su rab tu brtag /de tshe sngags ni rigs tshul gyis/ /zlos pas de tshe rab tu sbyar/ /khro bo chen po phyag drug dang / /zhal drug nyid
206a7(rgyud): du brtag par bya/ /sngags chen yi ge bzhi ba ni/ /gzhon nu'i gzugs la gnas pa yin/ /drag po'i gzugs ni gzugs chen bo/ /phag gi rnam par yang dag 'byung / /bgegs
206b1(rgyud): kun rnam par gzhig bya'i phyir/ /dus mtshan de ni lha yi rgyal/ /stag gi lpags pa'i sham thabs can/ /sprul gyi gdengs ka rnam par 'phyang / /lag na ral gri sems dpa' che/ /
206b2(rgyud): gzi brjid chen po gshin rje'i gzugs/ /bgegs rnams kun la gtse bar byed/ /log 'dren rnams kyi srog 'phrog byed/ /'byung po kun ni rab nyon cig /mi bzad
206b3(rgyud): sngags ni bshad par bya/ /cho 'phrul chen po bgegs rnams kun/ /ma rungs sems can 'jigs par byed/ /sngags rnams kun ni sgrub byed pa/ /lha yi tshogs rnams nga
206b4(rgyud): la nyon/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/ t+d+ya thA/ he he mahA kro d+ha Sha Na mu khaSh+Ta tsa ra Na/ sarba big+h+Na big+h+Na g+hA ta ka hUM hUM/ kiny+tsi ra ya si bi nA yA ka dzI bi tan+ta
206b5(rgyud): ka ra duHswa b+na ma nA sha ya/ la hu la hu sa ma ya ma nu sma ra phaT phaT swAhA/ /khro bo'i rgyal po chen pos 'di gsungs ma thag tu bgegs dang / log 'dren thams cad 'jigs
206b6(rgyud): shing nyam thag nas snying gas te yid shin tu skrag nas/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal bar byed cing dam tshig la
206b7(rgyud): gnas par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas thams cad dang ldan ba'i gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang la gzigs nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen
207a1(rgyud): po de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kye kye lha'i tshogs chen po dag /khro bo'i rgyal po 'di ni 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa thams
207a2(rgyud): cad kyi sngags rnams 'don par byed pa na/ gang zhig ma rungs pa'i sems can gyi gzugs can gyis rnam par 'tshe bar byed pa de la/ khro bo'i rgyal po 'dis ni rigs rgyud thams
207a3(rgyud): cad 'dul bar byed cing srog kyang 'dzin par mi byed de/ yongs su gdung bar byed cing yongs su skem par byed pa'i rnam par gzhag par bya ba la 'jog par byed cing zlos
207a4(rgyud): pa dag la yang srung ba dang / sba ba dang / sbed pa la gnas par 'jog par byed cing rjes su 'phel bar byad pa dang / gang zhig dam tshig 'di las 'da' bar byed ba
207a5(rgyud): dang / khro bo'i rgyal pos sgrub pa po bsrung bar byas pa la rnam par tho 'tsham par byed na mgo bo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du rnam pa bdun du 'gas par 'gyur ro/ /thub
207a6(rgyud): pa mchog gis legs gsungs nas/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs la de tshe gsungs/ /gzhon nu khyod kyi sngags rnams la/ /ma lus don ni rgya chen ngon/ /sngags rgyud don
207a7(rgyud): dang ldan pa dang / /sgrub pa rnams la khyad par du/ /bgegs rnams ma lus 'joms pa yi/ /rgyud la khro rgyal bstan pa yin/ /'jig rten mgon gyis sngon 'di ni/ /
207b1(rgyud): de bzhin du ni yang dag sbyar/ /ma lus bgegs rnams 'jig bya'i phyir/ /dgra rnams kyi ni khro ba sel/ /zlos pas rtag tu 'di dag ni/ /mtshan mo rtag tu gdon byas la/ /
207b2(rgyud): sems can rnams ni srung don dang / /rmi lam ngan pa sel bar byed/ /sngags rnams ma lus sgrub pa la/ /'jig rten mchog gis gsungs pa yin/ /de nas gzhan yang
207b3(rgyud): rab bshad pa/ /skyes bu'i mtshan nyid bzang po yin/ /gang la sngags rnams 'grub 'gyur ba/ /mchog dang tha ma bar ma 'o/ /gzi brjid ldan dang shes ldan dang / /gser
207b4(rgyud): mdog gsus pa che ba dang / /dkyus ring mig dang snum pa dang / /chags chung khro ba rnam par spangs/ /mig rtsa dmar zhing snyan par smra/ /de la grub pa mchog 'gyur la/ /
207b5(rgyud): lpags pa sra ba cing sngo bsangs mdog/ ha cang ring min yan lag phra/ /spro ba che zhing gzi brjid che/ /chog shes kun nas dge ba byed/ /skye gnas bzang po dag pa
207b6(rgyud): dang / /'dod pa chung zhing cung zad dge/ las rnams kun la snang ba ni/ /de la nges par grub pa mchog/ yan lag thams cad mtshang med/ /dur bsngo bsangs gzi brjid che/ /
207b7(rgyud): nyon mongs med sems shes pa can/ /rtag tu gtsang zhing changs par spyod/ /phra ba'i gsol rtag tu dga'/ /chos kyi ngang tshul 'jig rten shas/ /grogs mang rtag tu
208a1(rgyud): gtong ba dang / /zas tshod rig dag rtag gtsang ldan/ /shes nyen tshul khrims spyod ba dang / /gtsang ba'i spyod la rtag tu dga'/ /bden par smra
208a2(rgyud): zhing snying rje can/ /de la grub pa mchog tu 'gyur/ /yon tan rgya che yan lag tshang / /rigs ldan rtag tu chos dang ldan/ /pha dang ma la gus pa dang / /bram ze la ni mchod
208a3(rgyud): pa byed/ /shin tu snying rje ldan zhing brtan/ /de la'ang grub pa mchog tu 'gyur/ /sngo bsangs dkar dang snum pa dang / /rtag tu gtsang zhing nyung du smra/ /bsod pa'i kha zas
208a4(rgyud): la dga' zhing / /gtsang ba'i spyod bas mngon par 'gro/ /mang 'dod sems can 'jig rten shes/ /de la'ang grub pa mchog tu 'gyur/ /ha cang ring min thung ba'ang min/ /
208a5(rgyud): sku ni mig sman bzhin du gnag/ mig dang mig 'bras rab tu snum/ /gtsang zhing rtag tu khrus la dga'/ /dkon mchog gsum la shin tu dad/ /de yi grub pa
208a6(rgyud): mchog tu 'gyur/ /mchog gi las ni rab ston cing / /sems can rnams kyi bsam pa shes/ /bzod ldan snyan par smra ba dang / /rgyal pa'i sras la rab tu dga'/ /de
208a7(rgyud): tshe 'jig rten 'das pa grub/ /de 'bras bcas pa grub par 'gyur/ /sems dpa' che zhing brtson 'grus che/ /gzi brjid che zhing brtul zhugs che/ /longs spyod che
208b1(rgyud): zhing sngags rnams shes/ /sngags rnams kun la de nyid rig/ rigs kyi mchog ni rgyal rigs sam/ /bram ze shes dang ldan ba dang / /bud med la brten de la chags/ /de bzhin
208b2(rgyud): gser gyi mdog dang ldan/ /bong tshod che zhing dkar ba dang / /sna ni mtho zhing lag ba che/ /dpa' zhing lag pa ring ba dang / /rgyal po che la mngon par 'dod/ /rgyal pa'i sras la
208b3(rgyud): dad pa dang / /bud med ming ldan lha la mchod/ /dkon mchog gsum la gus pa dang / /byang chub sems kyis brgyan pa yin/ /lhag par snying rje brtan pa dang / /cung zad khro
208b4(rgyud): zhing cung zad rmongs/ /longs spyod che zhing gtong ba che/ /gzi brjid che zhing thul bar dka'/ /bud med rnams ni dga' dang dpa'/ /de yi grub pa'ang mchog yin no/ /shin
208b5(rgyud): tu btung dang dga' dang dpa'/ /rtag tu bud med la chags dang / /gser gyi mdog dang byin pa phra/ /rked pa che zhing gtsang ba dang / /brtse dang snying rje ldan mkhas pa/ /yon
208b6(rgyud): tan mang 'dod 'jig rten shes/ /rtag tu sngags rnams zlos la gus/ /rgyal ba la ni srog kyang gtong / /de bzhin nyan thos sras rnams dang / /bse ru la yang rtag tu gtong / /
208b7(rgyud): stobs ldan 'jig rten gtso bo dang / /rigs ni gnyis pa bzang po yin/ /yan lag thams cad ma tshang med/ /ma rungs rtag tu bab col byed/ /gtong ldan tshul ldan dgra las
209a1(rgyud): rgyal| |chos dang chos min rnam dpyod byed/ /ha cang sbom min rjud pa'ang min/ /ha cang ring min thung ba'ang min/ /bar ma'i mi ni mchog yin te/ /de
209a2(rgyud): yi grub pa mchog tu 'gyur/ /sen mo zangs mdog legs snum dang / /lag mthil dmar dang gtsang ba dang / /rkang ba'i mthil dmar snum pa dang / /'khor lo swa sti kas
209a3(rgyud): brgyan dang / /rgyal mtshan rta babs nya dang ni/ /ba dan pad+ma thob dang / /mi gang rkang ba lag pa la/ /mtshan ni 'di dag yod gyur pa/ /de 'dra'i skyes bu dam pa la/ /grub
209a4(rgyud): pa mchog tu brtag par bya/ /mche ba dkar zhing bzang ba dang / /mtho ba'i ri bo dang 'dra dang / /sna bzang mtho zhing mig dkyus ring / /smin ma stug cing kos ko bzang / /ba yi
209a5(rgyud): rdzi ma 'jig rten mtshan/ /nag pa'i lta ba'i mig 'bras mtshan/ /dpral ba'i dbyes gang rgya che zhing / /mgo bo gdugs 'dra'i rnam pa bzang / /mgo bo gtsug tor 'dra
209a6(rgyud): ba dang / /rna ba bzang ba dam pa yin/ /rtag tu seng ge'i 'gram 'dra dang / /ma mchu bim pa smin 'dra'i mdog/ gang gi lce ni rab snang ba/ /pad+ma 'dab ma dmar 'dra'i mdog
209a7(rgyud): mgrin pa bum pa 'dra ba dang / /thal gong rgyas shing yang dag 'phags/ /mchan khung thong ka bzang ba mchog/ /de bzhin brla ni rgya che dang / /lte ba'i phyogs kyang chung ba
209b1(rgyud): dang / /rked pa rgya che bzang ba dang / /lte ba zab cing g.yas su 'khyil/ /kun nas dkar med ba spu dang / /lag ring lag ni ne ba dang / /rked pa seng ge 'dra ba'i mtshan/ /gang gi brla
209b2(rgyud): ni zlum pa dang / /gru mo nyams med zlum pa dang / /byin pa e na ya lta bur/ /zlum po'i nang na zlum por grub/ /rkang ba sha dang ldan pa dang / /sor mo rnams ni
209b3(rgyud): ring ba yin/ /dmar zhing sen dmar snum pa dang / /sha rgyas pas ni snum pa yin/ /nang stong ma yin mthil mnyam gnas/ /dge zhing mthong na dga' ba dang / /'jam zhing
209b4(rgyud): kha dog dag pa dang / /rab bsngags 'jig rten bkra shis dang / /de dag gi ni steng dag tu/ /rtsa yi dra ba mngon pa med/ /bshang ba 'byung ba'i lam dag tu/ /ri mo zab cing
209b5(rgyud): g.yas su 'khyil/ /mchig pa rab bsngags shin tu chung / /rtag tu zlum zhing dge ba yin/ /ma 'brel dum bum yin dang / /gcig min nyid du bstan pa yin/ /gang tshe
209b6(rgyud): skyes dbang gtsang ba dang / /rtse mo dmar la yang ngag gnas/ /skye bo nyal khar kha zas ni/ /ro ni btsa' bar byed pa za/ /bshang ba kha dog sngo ba'am/ /gal te dmar po rab
209b7(rgyud): snang zhing / /mang po ma yin snum pa dang / /dge pa'i mtshan gyis rab mtshan ba/ /de lta'i sems can gang yin pa/ /grub pa mchog tu 'dod pa yin/ /lan gsum
210a1(rgyud): bshang zhing sngags drug dang / /gtsang sbra'i spyod dka' yongs su gtsang / /gang zhig thun ni tha mar nyal/ /tho rangs ldang ba'i skye bo rnams/ /de yi grub
210a2(rgyud): pa rtag tu mchog/ las kun byed par snang ba yin/ /'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs dang / /phun tshogs rnam pa mang po la/ /mi rnams rjes su 'dod pa yang / /mtshan nyid
210a3(rgyud): kyis ni mngon mtshan pa'o/ /rgyu skar dag la'ang skyes pa ni/ /rgyal dang nam gru gre dbo dang / /mchu dang lha mtshams dag dang ni/ /nag pa snar ma smin drug dang / /nus
210a4(rgyud): pa'i gza' rnams kyis mtshan pa/ /de dag la ni skyes mthong dang / /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'char kha ni/ /tho rangs dus su gang skyes dang / /gang tshe de yi dus su skyes/ /de la
210a5(rgyud): grub par rab tu snang / /nyin phyed dang ni tho rangs dang / /nyi ma'i mthar yang gza' bzang po/ /dkar ba zla ba ba sangs/ /ser ba gza' lhag phur bu yin/ /skye bo rnams kyis
210a6(rgyud): mthong na ni/ /'bras bu 'grub phyir nus pa yin/ /mi ni gang zhig dge las kyis/ /'di la skyes par gyur pa yi/ /sngags don ma lus sgrub pa la/ /de dag 'bad med
210a7(rgyud): 'grub par 'gyur/ /nyi ma phyed ni 'das pa dang / /rtag tu nyi ma nub pa na/ /lus can rnams kyis rtag de la/ /ma rungs gza' mthong gang yin pa/ /ma rungs nyi ma mig
210b1(rgyud): dmar dang / /mjug ring sgra gcan spen pa dang / /gang yang gza' ni gtso bo dang / /las ni ngan 'joms skar mda' can/ /skar ma shin tu mi bzad nyid/ /de bzhin nag po 'chi
210b2(rgyud): ltas dang / /dus min 'chi ba sa la ni/ /mi bzad de tshe snang ba yin/ /nyi ma 'char ba'i dus su ni/ /gza' lhag gis ni sa rnams mthong / /gnya' shing gang tsam nyi mas phyin/ /
210b3(rgyud): phur bus sa de mthong par 'gyur/ /de nas pha rol gnya' shing tsam/ /pa sangs nor spyan gyis de mthong / /nyi ma phyed ni yongs rdzogs na/ /zla bas lus can ma lus mthong / /
210b4(rgyud): gza' lhag dus su rgyal thabs thob/ /phur bus nor dang longs spyod byed/ /pa sangs nor ni nges sgrub dang / /rgyal srid tshe dang longs spyod ldan/ /zla ba de bzhin tshe ring zhing / /
210b5(rgyud): dbang phyug dang ni 'bras bu bcas/ /de bzhin nyin phyed nyi ma ni/ /nyi ma phyed du mnyam par mthong / /rtag tu nyin phyed rnam 'das na/ /nyi mas phyogs ni mthong bar byed/ /
210b6(rgyud): thung gyur nyi ma gnya' shing tsam/ /byed pa nyid du bstan pa ni/ /sgra gtan spen pa nyid dag yin/ /mun pa dus dang dus mthar byed/ /de nas phar ni thung pa na/ /'chi ltas skar
210b7(rgyud): mda' sa 'gul byed/ /li khri tshogs kyis mdog bsgyur ba'o/ /nyi ma nub gar zangs ma'i mdog/ gza' yi gtso bo gang yin de/ /byis pa gzhon nu'i tshul 'dzin cing / /
211a1(rgyud): lag na mdung thogs ma rungs pa/ /mig dmar nyid kyis mthong ba yin/ /de nas nyi ma gnya' shing 'das/ /dge ba'i gza' ni 'byung ba yin/ /nyi
211a2(rgyud): mas mthong ba las skyes pa/ /ma rungs bab col byed bar 'gyur/ /spen pa mig dmar las skyes pa/ /khro ldan brkam zhing nga rgyal can/ /mjug rings 'chi ltas
211a3(rgyud): dus rnams la/ /skyes ba nad ni yang dag 'byung / /dbul zhing nad btab glen pa dang / /de bzhin du ni rtag tu rmongs/ /dus dang mun pa 'gul byed dang / /skar mda' can
211a4(rgyud): dang gza' ngan dang / /'gul byed sgra drag dmar ba'i mdog/ gnam lcags nyid kyang rab rdung byed/ /de bzhin rdo rje 'chi ltas dang / /gzhan yang khyim sogs rab tu
211a5(rgyud): mthong / /skye bo kun gyi sgra gcan ni/ /mi bzad rab tu mthong gyur na/ /dbul zhing mgon med tshul khrims 'chal/ /mi ni rtag tu sdig pa spyod/ /mi ni sdug bsngal skye
211a6(rgyud): 'gyur te/ /nad kyi gzhi ni skye bar 'gyur/ /mdze can nad ni mang ba dang / /long ba 'theng po shu bar bcas/ /za ma ma ning mo sham dang / /bud med mtshan ni ngan pa dang //
211a7(rgyud): skyes pa bud med de bzhin gzhan/ /gza' ni ngan pa mthong ba yin/ /de ltar skyes gyur skyes pa dag /'jig rten mang po skye ba yin/ /dkar dang ser ba'i gza' mchog
211b1(rgyud): ni| |de dag las skyes dge ba yin/ /mdog ni dkar dang ser ba dag/ rgyal bas rab tu bsngags par gsungs/ /gza' ni gtso bo bzhir bshad pa/ /pa sangs zla ba bla ma lhag /
211b2(rgyud): zlos pa las rnams kun la ni/ /de dag mthong na 'grub pa'i don/ /sems can byis ba rnams la yang / /rtag tu de dag skye ba bzang / /lo ni kun la'ang 'dod pa zhes/ /'jig
211b3(rgyud): rten mchog gis gsungs pa yin/ /skad cig tsam yang de bzhin du/ /mig 'byed mig 'dzum se gol gtogs/ /'di ni mdor bsdus skye ba zhes/ /'jig rten mchog
211b4(rgyud): gis gsungs pa yin/ /'di tsam gyi ni tshad dag tu/ /gza' kun 'jig rten dgongs pa yin/ /de dag de bzhin rtag tu 'char/ /'di dag dus kyi de nyid yin/ /'di dag
211b5(rgyud): dge dang sdig pa'i gza'/ /'khor lo bzhin du rtag tu 'khor/ /'jig rten dge dang mi dge byed/ /de nyid 'jig rten gnas pa yin/ /des na de dag gang cung zad/ /sdig
211b6(rgyud): pa'i blo yang skye bar 'gyur/ /sems can dge dang mi dge 'bras/ /mang po yang ni skye bar 'gyur/ /gza' rnams las la spyod pa zhes/ /des na 'di ni mthong zhes
211b7(rgyud): gsungs/ /myur ldan myur bcas 'od 'gyur zhing / /myur bar 'ong bas myur ldan yin/ /mig gis mthong dang ma mthong ba'i/ /se gol gtogs pa'i myur 'gros yin/ /'di
212a1(rgyud): tsam gyi ni tshad dag tu/ /blo mchog rnams kyis bstan pa yin/ /de nas gzhan yang rab bshad ba/ /nges par zlos pas rtag tu bya/ /yud tsam dag ni bcu
212a2(rgyud): gnyis dang / /dus dang dus min 'gro ba'i rgyu/ /grub pa'i rgyu 'am ma yin pa/ /'gro ba min pa'ang bshad par bya/ /'jig rten la nye bzang ba dang / /char dang char min yang dang
212a3(rgyud): yang / /yul 'khor 'jig dang mu ge dang / /lo legs nyi ma gsal mthong dge/ dus dang de bzhin dbang po'i gzhu/ /skye bo rnams la rtag zhi byed/ /mjug rings sa
212a4(rgyud): 'gul nam gru dang / /skar mda' dang ni lho bur dang / /rgyu skar gza' dang skar rnams kyi/ /spyod pa dge dang mi dge ba/ /'byung po rnams kyi spyod pa ni/ /dge dang mi
212a5(rgyud): dge'i spyod pa yin/ /sha za dang ni ma mo dang / /drag po ma rungs nyer 'joms byed/ /sha za rnams kyi spyod pa ni/ /de bzhin ma rungs sems can brjod/ /gang du lha la
212a6(rgyud): rab dad dang / /rin chen chos dang blo mchog dang / /dge ba'i las dang rtag tu ldan/ /byams sems brtse bar ldan pa dang / /legs par spyod pa'i don ldan blo/ /gzhan
212a7(rgyud): gyi sdug bsngal dag la sems/ /sngags dang rig pa rnams kyis drangs/ /sman gyi don du bzas spyod/ /gang du mtshan nyid la brten pas/ /spyod pa rgya cher bstan ba yin/ /
212b1(rgyud): gzhan gyi lus la gnas nas ni/ /mi lus brten nas gnas pa yin/ /lha ni mchod ba zhes bshad de/ /lha min nga rgyal can gyi rgyus/ /gnas der gnas pa'ang rnam pa gnyis/ /
212b2(rgyud): rim bzhin lha dang lha ma yin/ /de yang der ni rnam gnyis te/ /grags pa dang ni thun mong yin/ /de yang der ni rnam gnyis 'gro/ dge dang mi dge 'gro ba lnga/ /der gnas rnam gsum
212b3(rgyud): 'gro ba ste/ /nyi shu sum cu grangs med pa'o/ /lha dbang dang ni 'og min par/ /go rims ji bzhin sa med pa'o/ /'jig rten khams ni mtha' med pa/ /dge dang mi dge'i 'jig
212b4(rgyud): rten yin/ /'khor spyod sems can ji snyed dang / /'phags pa nyan thos ji snyed dang / /sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / /de yi thugs las skyes sras dang / /byang chub
212b5(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ /sa bcu la ni rab gnas dang / /rtag tu sems can thams cad kyi/ /sems can skye gnas yang dag brten/ /byis pa'i skye bo thams cad kyi/ /
212b6(rgyud): 'gro ba'i skye gnas rten pa dang / /rtag tu 'phags rnams thams cad kyi/ /mtshan nyid dang ni spyod pa dang / /tshig dang brda dang de nyid kyang / /rgya cher rab tu bshad par bya/ /sngags
212b7(rgyud): dang rgyud ni rigs bcas pas/ /'byung bo kun ni dgug par bya/ /dbab dang dgug pa'i sngags shes pas/ /gzhan gyi lus la yang dag brten/ /dge dang mi dge'i las
213a1(rgyud): shes shing / /bag yod rigs ni bza' ba dang / /mi blun spyod pa'i sems can dang / /tshar gcad rjes gzung spyod pa dang / /'jig rten sa stang
213a2(rgyud): 'gugs byed pa/ /mi ni sngags zlos byed pa dag/ de dag grub pa'i mtshan ma ni/ /de nyid thams cad bshad par bya/ /mi rnams kyi ni mdor bsdu na/ /de dag gi ni lus
213a3(rgyud): bzung nas/ /rtag tu shin tu chos don dang / /thar pa'i don du rnam par brtag/ ma rungs rnams ni tshar gcad dang / /rnam dag rnams ni mchod pa ste/ /tshar gcad rjes
213a4(rgyud): gzung nyid la ni/ /sngags dang rgyud ni rab tu brtag/ rlung dang bad kan mkhris can ni/ /rnam gsum dag la spyod pa'ang gsum/ /de dag zhi bar rab brtags la/ /
213a5(rgyud): rnam gsum nyid du rim par 'dod/ /mi rnams kyi ni gso ba la/ /sngags dang rgyud kyis rtag tu bya/ /'byung ba chen por rnam brtags pa/ /'byung dang 'byung min la
213a6(rgyud): sogs shes/ /'byung ba min dang 'byung ba dang / /lhag par 'byung ba de la brjod/ /skye bo gang tshe lhag 'byung zin/ /de tshe bde ba med par 'gyur/ /'byung dang 'byung
213a7(rgyud): min rnam ba ni/ /rnam pa gnyis su rab tu brtag/ rtag tu sems can 'byung ba che/ /sems can ma yin rab tu brtag /mkhris pa bad kan de bzhin rlung / /gang gzhan
213b1(rgyud): rnam pa sna tshogs byas/ /'byung ba chen po bzhi dang ni/ /lnga pa dag ni nam mkhar brjod/ /chu dang me dang ldan ba dang / /sa dang rlung du yang dag ldan/ /blo dang ldan pas rtag tu yang / /
213b2(rgyud): sems can min pa'i grangs su bstan/ /'jig rten mchog gi bdag po dang / /'od chen ldan pas gsungs ba yin/ /sems can ma yin grangs su bstan/ /sems can grangs
213b3(rgyud): 'gro mi ma yin/ /blo mchog smra ba dam pa yis/ /mi rnams sems can nyid du gsungs/ /mi ma yin dang mi dag kyang / /rtag tu sems can grangs nyid do/ /sems can rnams la
213b4(rgyud): dge don du/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i gsung yang yin/ /'das dang ma byon sangs rgyas dang / /de bzhin da ltar byung rnams kyis/ /dge ba'i las kyi las 'byung phyir/ /las 'di
213b5(rgyud): dag ni yongs su gsungs/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi gsung dag pa/ /las ni don med mi byed de/ /de yi rgyu mtshan rigs dang spyi/ /grub pa nyid du bar snang ste/ /thams cad mkhyen
213b6(rgyud): pa'i ye shes dang / /bde zhing zhi la rtag tu gtsang / /mthar thug dag dang bdag med dang / /don dam thar par 'dod pa ste/ /de nyid chos ni btsal bya'i phyir/ /rgyud 'di yongs
213b7(rgyud): su bshad pa yin/ /rgyud dang sngags dang sman bzang po/ /bka' ni yang dag gsungs pa yin/ /byung dang 'byung 'gyur da ltar gyi/ /bstan bcos thams cad legs bsngags
214a1(rgyud): dang / /'jig rten mchog dang chos bdag med/ /rtag tu zhi dang shes pa'i gnas/ /'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i gsung / /de yi go 'phang mchog gnas
214a2(rgyud): pa| |thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'byung / /ma 'dres rab tu brtags pa yin/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi mthu dang ni/ /byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan dang / /sngags rnams
214a3(rgyud): kun gyi cho ga la/ /grub pa kun tu bstan pa yin/ /des na 'di nyid thub dbang gis/ /cho ga'i rgyal por gsungs pa yin/ /lus can rnams ni sngags tshul gyi/ /'di nyid
214a4(rgyud): kyi ni lam gyis 'gro/ zhi ba nad med phun sum tshogs/ /mya ngan 'das grong phyin par 'gyur/ /mya ngan med dang rdul med dang / /rtag tu byang chub gzhol zhing shes/ /gang
214a5(rgyud): 'di bstan pa dag la ni/ /sngags kun 'don par byed pa na/ /kun mkhyen shes dang shes bya yi/ /las kyi rgyud ni 'brel pa dang / /sngags zlos pa yi ched du ni/ /rgyud
214a6(rgyud): rnams mtha' dag sa steng gsungs/ /sngags rgyud ma lus don dag ni/ /byang chub rnam gsum gzhol ba ste/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes dag/ cho ga 'dir ni rab
214a7(rgyud): tu bstan/ /sems can rnams la'ang phan pa'i phyir/ /'jig rten kun la rab tu bskor/ /gzhan la cho ga rab snang ba/ /cho ga'i rgyal po 'di la'ang yod/ /thub mchog
214b1(rgyud): thub pa'i sras dag gis/ /gzhan du cho ga gang bstan pa/ /sngags rnams thams cad 'di la yod/ /des na cho ga rgya chen yin/ /de nyid phyir na thub dbang gis/ /lus can kun
214b2(rgyud): la gsungs pa yin/ /gang du cho ga'i rgyal po 'dis/ /dbang 'gyur min dang bkug min pa/ /sa steng 'jig rten gsum 'di na/ /rig pa'i sngags rgyal de yod min/ /thub pa'i
214b3(rgyud): zla ba rab nub cing / /sa yi dkyil 'khor stongs pa na/ /cho ga 'jig rten 'di gnas pa/ /bstan pa'i don ni byed par 'gyur/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs ni rtag tu dge/ 'byung ba kun
214b4(rgyud): la gzhon nu ni/ /de tshe sangs rgyas mdzad pa ni/ /'jig rten bstan la byed par 'gyur/ /cho ga'i rgyal po mthu la ni/ /yun ring dus su 'dod pa rnams/ /lan cig thos kyang grol
214b5(rgyud): 'gyur te/ /rtag tu de la 'grub par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung dag ni/ /rtag tu dge ba don yod 'gyur/ /sngags rnams kun la sngags pa ni/ /bzlas dang sbyin sreg rtag
214b6(rgyud): 'dod pa'o/ /dus gsum dag tu shes bya la/ /mkhyen pa gang du rab 'jug pa/ /de bzhin 'di la 'jug byed pa/ /cho ga'i rgyal po dam pa yin/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstan
214b7(rgyud): pa ni/ /sngags su rab gnas de 'dir gsungs/ /sngags de rnam par mi rtog par/ /cho ga de 'dir gsungs ba yin/ /don dang don min sems can gyi/ /dge dang mi dge
215a1(rgyud): byed par 'gyur/ /de tshe 'gro ba blo bzhin du/ /'jig rten kun gyi dge mi dge/ de nyid cho ga 'dir spros pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa spros pa med/ /'jig
215a2(rgyud): rten 'das pa rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /'jig rten phyir ni 'di gsungs so/ /las rnams kun la shin tu lhag/ 'jig rten las las rab tu 'das/ /chos rnams rnams pa sna tshogs
215a3(rgyud): byed/ /'jig rten kun gyis rab tu bsngags/ /sngags rgyal las la brtson par byed/ /de bzhin sems can tshogs la phan/ /gzhon nu 'jam pa'i dbyangs de ni/ /sangs
215a4(rgyud): rgyas mdzad pa byed par 'gyur/ /de don yon tan nges grub dang / /'jig rten khams kyi dge mi dge/ bag med ma bskul ma yin te/ /bskul nas ngas ni chos bshad
215a5(rgyud): do| |sems can ma lus phan nyid phyir/ /sangs rgyas kyis ni bshad pa yin/ /'das pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyis kyang / /bshad cing ngas kyang bshad pa yin/ /sangs
215a6(rgyud): rgyas gdung ni mi gcod phyir/ /bdag gis kyang ni bshad pa yin/ /sngags pa'i las rnams kun la ni/ /kun mkhyen ye shes 'byung don du'o/ /kun mkhyen ye shes rab
215a7(rgyud): 'jug la/ /las rnams gcig tu bsngags pa yin/ /'jig rten sngon las bdag yin te/ /de ni de ltar yongs su spyod/ /de bas las rnams rab tu bya/ /tshe 'dir
215b1(rgyud): dka' ba legs spyad cing / /las ldan tshe ni 'di la yang / /'bad pa med par sngags rnams 'grub/ /las ni 'di la'ang snang gyur na/ /skye ba 'di la'ang 'grub par 'gyur/ /de bas
215b2(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ /las ni gcig pu rab tu bsngags/ /las de cho gar ldan pa ni/ /de ni 'di la myur du 'grub/ /sems can byis pa cho ga nyams/ /rab tu rmongs pa 'khor
215b3(rgyud): bar 'gyur/ /de bas rnam pa kun gyis ni/ /las ni gcig pu rab bsngags yin/ /cho ga las ni yang dag ldan/ /sgrub pa pos ni bsgrub par bya/ /de bzhin cho ga nyams pa'i las//
215b4(rgyud): shin tu yun ring dag gis 'grub/ /bsam gtan med par thar pa med/ /thar pa med par bsam gtan med/ /de bas bsam gtan thar pa ni/ /yang dag ldan pa byang chub
215b5(rgyud): brjod/ / //'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las/ las thams cad kyi
215b6(rgyud): bya ba'i don gyi le'u rab 'byams bco lnga pha rdzogs so/ / //de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas/ gzhan yang / gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang la
215b7(rgyud): gzigs nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ blo dang ldan pa gnod sbyin gyi bdag po lag na rdo rjes nga la dris nas/ 'jam dpal/ khyod kyi don tham/
216a1(rgyud): cad bya ba'i las kyi le'u rab 'byams 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi nang du rgya cher sngar bstan pa yin no/ /sngags kun don dang ldan pa yi/ /rmi
216a2(rgyud): lam dge dang mi dge yin/ /des na zhar la 'di kun ni/ /sngags kyi bzlas pa bstan pa yin/ /gnod sbyin bdag po yid dga' nas/ /thal sbyar spyi bor byas nas ni/ /
216a3(rgyud): ston la mgo bos phyag btsal nas/ /de tshe tshig ni 'di skad zhus/ /'jig rten rjes su gzung don du/ /blo mchog rnams kyis gsungs pa dang / /bdag la'ang rjes su thugs brtse
216a4(rgyud): dang / /sems can rnams ni bde don du/ /zlos pa'i sngags ni thams cad la/ /rmi lam dge dang mi dge dang / /sems can mchog dang tha ma yi/ /spyod pa'i yon tan rgya cher
216a5(rgyud): bstan/ /bzang po'i 'gro ba'i skye gnas dang / /rgyu dang shes pa'i rnam pa spyod/ /'das dang ma 'ongs shes pa dang / /dge dang mi dge da ltar gyi/ /thams cad kun 'gro'i
216a6(rgyud): shes pa dang / /kun mkhyen ye shes spyod pa dang / /snang med dmigs pa med pa dang / /spros med rab tu spros pa yin/ /rnam pa kun mchog ldan pa dang / /shis pa zhi
216a7(rgyud): ba bstan pa yin/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi mthu rnams ni/ /blo mchog gis ni bstan pa yin/ /khyad par du ni zlos pa la/ /sngags rnams don dang ldan par bshad/ /las
216b1(rgyud): dang las 'bras sems can gyi/ /bya ba dus dang de bzhin du/ /de bzhin snod dang gnas dang ni/ /cha byad rmi lam zhar la gsungs/ /gnod sbyin bdag pos thung mchog ni/ /de bzhin
216b2(rgyud): gshegs pa bdun pa la/ /gang zhig skal bzang sangs rgyas pa/ /shAkya'i skye mchog bdun ba ni/ /shAkya'i seng ge dgra las rgyal/ /'di ni bdun par rab tu brtags/ /kun gyi tha
216b3(rgyud): mar rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /'jig rten mgon po 'od byed pa/ /brtson 'grus che zhing shes rab che/ /thub pa mthu ni chen po thob/ /lag na rdo rje gnod sbyin bdag/ byang chub sems
216b4(rgyud): dpa' phyag byas te/ /rang gi gnas su 'dug gyur nas/ /blo ldan de nas cang mi smra/ /de nas 'jam dpal shes rab che/ /de tshe thub pas dris pa ni/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas la bskul
216b5(rgyud): ba ni/ /thub mchog dam pa tha mal/ /legs so bcom ldan rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /las dang shes pa rgya cher bcas/ /btsas pa'i gza' ni gtso bo ste/ /dge dang mi dge legs
216b6(rgyud): tshul bshad/ /las dang shes pa rgyur bcas pa'i/ /sems can mang po'i spyod pa gsungs/ /mchog dang tha ma'i spyod pa dang / /dge ba'i don dang ldan pa dang / /zlos pa grub
216b7(rgyud): pa'i mtshan ma dang / /bsgrub bya sgrub min rnam par brtags/ /'byor pa 'dod dang de bzhin du/ /'jig rten dbang phyug longs spyod 'dod/ /rgyal po khyad par can 'dod dang //
217a1(rgyud): rig pa 'dzin grub 'dod pa dang / /thams cad kun 'gro'i ye shes kyis/ /mdor bsdus nas ni bshad du gsol/ /rgyal ba'i sras kyis gsol btab
217a2(rgyud): nas/ /thub pa mchog gis gsungs pa ni/ /blo ldan ka la ping ka'i skad/ /lha yi rnga sgra'i skad dang ni/ /brtson 'grus chen po tshangs pa'i sgra/ /'brug sgra yi ni sgra skad kyis/ /thub
217a3(rgyud): pa bdun pas tshigs bcad nas/ /sangs rgyas gsung ni dag pas gsungs/ /gzhon nu 'di ni dngos don khyab gyur cing / /ma byung 'jig rten pham pa sgrub byed la/ /'gro ba
217a4(rgyud): kun la phan pa bde phyir ston/ /thar pa shes shing dag pa'i gnas su 'dug/ bden dang brtse dang bzod pa phan sems dang / /gang zhig rtag tu byams dang sbyin la dga'//
217a5(rgyud): de dag rtag tu grub pa thob par byed/ /kye ma gzhan la'ang grub pa yod ma yin/ /rtag tu sngags mchog la ni dga' dad dam/ /bstan dang 'khor lo 'dzin dang 'jam mchog
217a6(rgyud): dang / /de ni bdud 'dul chos kyi 'khor lo bskor/ /'khor lo 'dzin par 'dir ni rigs pa yin/ /gang gi gsung ni bzang po yid 'ong zhing / /rtag tu byis pa'i skye bo rnam
217a7(rgyud): spangs yin/ /yid 'ong bzang po rnar ni snyan pa dang / /dga' skyed snyan pa dang ni rjes su mthun/ /sems ni tshim byed bde ba rab tu sbyin/ /'jam zhes bya bar sangs rgyas
217b1(rgyud): yang dag gsungs/ /de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i khyad par gyis/ /gang gi mthu ni mkhyen par mi spyod de/ /de dag gi sras de bzhin sar zhugs pa/ /'jig rten 'das pa de bzhin
217b2(rgyud): bcu yi grangs/ /khyod kyang lha'i dbang phyug 'jig rten khyad par gyis/ /thub bzang shes par nus pa ma yin no/ /gzugs dang gzugs med de bzhin sa gnas dang / /'dod
217b3(rgyud): ldan lha dang mi ni yid las skyes/ /rnal 'byor grub pa thob dang 'jig rten na/ /khyad par can kun de bzhin mi yi gtso/ /de yi che ba gang gis shes gyur pa/ /sems can gang de
217b4(rgyud): yod pa ma yin te/ /khyod kyi che ba 'di ni yongs shes pa/ /'jam zhes bya bar rab shes sangs rgyas yin/ /'jam dpal zhes byar yongs su brtags pa ni/ /khyod kyi ming ni sngon
217b5(rgyud): gyi rgyal bas mdzad/ /khyod kyi ming du 'di ltar brtags byas pa/ /'das dang ma byon da ltar sangs rgyas kyis/ /gzhan du ma yengs rtse gcig yid dag pas/ /khyod kyi ming ni
217b6(rgyud): 'khor gyi nang du thos/ /des ni 'di la shis dang zhi ba 'thob/ /srid mthar byang chub mchog ni khyad par thob/ /sngags rnams ma lus grub par 'gyur ba dang / /'gro ba'i skye
217b7(rgyud): gnas mchog ni rab thob cing / /rtag tu chos mchog la ni yang dag gnas/ /bgegs rnams rnam par spangs shing grub pa thob/ /'dod pa'i sngags rnams ma lus 'grub
218a1(rgyud): par byed/ /byang chub shing dbang drung du myur du 'gro/ song nas byang chub mchog ni thob par byed/ /song nas sems can phan phyir der 'dug ste/ /
218a2(rgyud): sangs rgyas byang chub 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /de ltar rgyal ba'i gtso bos yon tan gsungs/ /'jam dpal zhes ni khyod kyi ming dran pa/ /yon tan bsam mi khyab ces rgyal
218a3(rgyud): bas gsungs/ /rgyal ba'i gtso bo sngar gshegs thams cad kyis/ /rtag tu khyod kyi mthu ni bstan pa yin/ /gzhon nu dag pa khyod kyis sngags rtogs pa/ /bskal pa grangs
218a4(rgyud): med rtag tu'ang ston mi nus/ /'jam dpal khyod kyi sngags kyi spyod pa ni/ /sangs rgyas ma lus dag gis rab tu bshad/ /gzhon nu 'di ni thams cad kun tu 'gro/ nga yi bstan
218a5(rgyud): la khyod ni mi mchog bstan/ /dag pa'i gnas la gnas pa'i skye bo rnams/ /'dir ni ma lus mtha' dag zhi bar 'gyur/ /khyod kyi sngags ni nam yang 'da' ma gyur/ /khyod
218a6(rgyud): kyi sngags ni nam yang nyams ma gyur/ / //'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas
218a7(rgyud): pa'i mdo las/ tshigs su bcad pa'i le'u rab 'byams bcu drug pa rdzogs so// //de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams
218b1(rgyud): cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas 'od zer
218b2(rgyud): sngon po dang / ser po dang / dkar po dang / le brgan dang / shel gyi kha dog lta bu byung ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad kyang snang bar byas shing 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan
218b3(rgyud): dag kyang snang bar mdzad nas/ gza' dang / rgyu skar thams cad kyang yud tsam gyis zil gyis mnan te bkug par gyur to/ /bkug nas kyang rang rang gi gnas la yang dag par
218b4(rgyud): sbyar nas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor der sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis bkug nas bcom ldan 'das kyi mdzod spu de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /gza' dang / rgyu skar
218b5(rgyud): dang / skar ma thams cad kyi 'od med par byas nas nyam thag pa dang / 'jigs pas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la skyabs su 'gro zhing thal mo sbyar nas 'dug par
218b6(rgyud): gyur te/ de ltar rab tu 'dar zhing yang dang / yang sa'i steng du 'gyel bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas gza' dang / rgyu skar dang / skar ma thams cad
218b7(rgyud): la mkhas pa rnams dang / byis pa'i skye bo'i blo dang ldan pa'i sems can rjes su gzung ba'i phyir bka' stsal pa ni/ lha'i tshogs mi dang bcas pa'i grogs po dag/ khyed
219a1(rgyud): cag nyon cig/ 'jig rten sna tshogs ni las nyid la sems can rnams rnam par rten par byed de/ gang yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi rdo rje'i
219a2(rgyud): sku yang mngon par grub la/ gang yang lha dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten yang 'khor zhing 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa chen por rab tu zhugs la/ 'jig rten
219a3(rgyud): rnam pa sna tshogs kyi lus mngon par grub ste/ thams cad kyang las dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang 'brel pa las skyes la/ de la byed pa'i byed pa po'am/ dbang phyug gam/
219a4(rgyud): gtso bo'am/ skyes bu'am/ grangs can gyis rab tu 'byin par byed pa ni gang yang med do/ /las las skyes pa ni ma gtogs te/ de yang las kyi rkyen gyis skyed pa rgyu la
219a5(rgyud): ltos pa yin te/ de yang rgyu dang / rkyen la ltos pa'o/ /de bzhin du rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i rkyen phan tshun du 'byung ba nye bar 'brel ba yin te/ lhag ma 'byung po
219a6(rgyud): rnams mngon par 'grub pa ni 'byung ba chen po las skyes pa yin te/ 'byung ba chen po de yang ma 'ongs pa'i phung po gzhan dag tu 'gro bar skye bar 'gyur zhing / skyes
219a7(rgyud): nas kyang 'gro ba dang / yul gzhan rgya che ba'i rnam par dbye ba dag tu skye bar 'gyur te/ dus gzhan na lugs las bzlog ste 'gag na ye shes kyi mes bskul te/
219b1(rgyud): las kyis bsags pa'i bag chags mtha' dag mngon par bsregs nas theg pa rnam gsum mnyam zhing spros pa med par dag par bsgrub par 'gyur ro/ /theg pa chen po ni dus
219b2(rgyud): ring por nye bar chags pa'i las bdag gir byed pa dang / dus bar ma ni rang rgyal bse ru lta bu rang byung gi shes rab rab tu 'byung ba dang / gzhan gyi sgra'i rjes su 'jug pa nyan
219b3(rgyud): thos ni dus thung dus mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'o/ /chos gzhan la blo nyid 'jug par 'gyur ba ni ma yin te/ byis pa rnams kyi rnam par rmongs pa nyid dang / ci ste yang 'jig rten
219b4(rgyud): sna tshogs gnas pa 'di ni las las skyes pa yin te/ phyogs dang / cha byad zhig na nad med pa'i go 'phang mya ngan med pa/ rdul med pa/ las kyis 'jig rten grub pa la
219b5(rgyud): ltos pa yin te/ dri ma med pa'i lam rnam par grol ba/ yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa/ shin tu bsil ba'i las nyid kyis byed de/ las gzhan la ltos pa ma yin zhing las dang /
219b6(rgyud): las ma yin pa las rnam par grol te/ spros pa med pa la nye bar gnas pa yin no/ /theg pa rnam gsum rab 'jug las/ /zhi ba gzhan yang yod min te/ /sngags kyang rnam
219b7(rgyud): pa gsum du 'gyur/ /rnam gsum las su yang dag bsgrags/ /de las rnam zlos rnam gsum las/ /rnam pa gsum du rab tu snang / /rigs kyang rnam gsum gsungs pa ni/ /sngags
220a1(rgyud): rnams kun gyi gzhi yang yin/ /rigs gsum rnam pa brgyad du yang / /rgyud dag la ni rab tu snang / /rnam pa gcig tu'ang rigs snang ste/ /sngags
220a2(rgyud): rnams kun gyi gnas kyang yin/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi dag pa'i thugs/ /rigs ni zhi ba mya ngan 'das/ /yan lag so so de nyid las/ /sngags rnams kun tu rab tu bstan//
220a3(rgyud): 'jig rten skar mkhan yan lag ni/ /grub pa'i rgyur ni rab tu brtag/ /de nyid yan lag las yin te/ /rkyen gyi yan lag dag la 'jug/ ji ltar sA lu'i 'bru rnams ni/ /
220a4(rgyud): myu gus rnam par shes par byed/ /de bzhin grub pa'i rdzas rnams ni/ /mtshan nyid kyis ni rnam par shes/ /ji ltar kha dog dkar po ni/ /tha snyad kyis ni rnam par brtag/
220a5(rgyud): de bzhin skar ma ldan pas ni/ /tha snyad don du rab tu brtag/ thams cad du ni thams cad ldan/ /las ni gcig pu rab tu bsngags/ /las rnams med par mtshon pa
220a6(rgyud): med/ /gang na'ang lus ni yod ma yin/ /rgyu mtshan dang ni spyod pa dang / /skye ba dang ni rigs dang gnas/ /rtag tu la nye sna tshogs pa/ /las de las ni nye bar dmigs/ /las
220a7(rgyud): ni gang du'ang lus can min/ /nang na gnas shing mtshon pa med/ /kun nas skye bo rgas pa na/ /rnam par 'gyur las nye bar dmigs/ /de bzhin lus la brten nas ni/ /
220b1(rgyud): las ni lus can dag la snang / /'bras bu dge dang mi dge'i rtags/ /skye bar yang ni rab brjod dang / /rnam pa sna tshogs la nye bzang / /las rnams sna tshogs dag las byung / /
220b2(rgyud): dus tshod de bzhin 'gro ba dang / /rnam pa sna tshogs srog chags sgra/ /grub dang ma grub mtshan ma ni/ /rkyen gyi don la ltos pa yin/ /rgyu mtshan spyod dang mtshan ma ni/ /rkyen la mngon
220b3(rgyud): par rab tu brtag/ de bas rnam kun 'bad nas ni/ /rkyen la rag las bya ba yin/ /zlos pa'i sngags rnams rtag tu ni/ /grub pa rgyu la ltos pa yin/ /'di dag rkyen gyi yan lag
220b4(rgyud): ni| |las ni bdag gir byed pas mtshon/ /mi mtshon sngags rnams thams cad ni/ /bgegs las shin tu mi bzad 'gyur/ /de bas 'di dag thams cad kyi/ /yan lag
220b5(rgyud): tu ni thub pas gsungs/ /sa dbang rgyal po thams cad mkhyen/ /byang chub snying por ting 'dzin thob/ /sngags ni yongs su gsungs pa na/ /bgegs rnams ma lus rab tu
220b6(rgyud): 'jig/ rmi lam ngan dang mtshan ma ngan/ /bzod par dka' ba'ang rnam par 'joms/ /kun mkhyen bdag nyid chen po yi/ /de thugs byang chub la zhugs pa/ /ma rungs bdud
220b7(rgyud): kyi sems kyis ni/ /bgegs chen 'jig par ga la 'gyur/ /de nas 'jigs pa chen po ni/ /des ni rgyu mtshan med par snang / /rnam pa sna tshogs 'jigs pa rnams/ /de la
221a1(rgyud): rgyu mtshan med par byung / /de ni bsod nams stobs bskyed pa/ /yun ring dus su yongs su bsngags/ /de yi sngags kyi stobs kyis ni/ /de tshe bdud
221a2(rgyud): ni bcom par 'gyur/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing brtson 'grus che/ /de yi 'od chen ldan par 'gyur/ /de yi sngags kyi mthu yis ni/ /byang chub dam pa thos par 'gyur/ /rmi
221a3(rgyud): lam ngan pa nyer 'jig pa/ /sngags de 'dir ni bshad par bya/ /gang dag sa la spyod pa yi/ /'byung po'i tshogs kun rab nyon cig/ rmi lam ngan pa bzod dka' dang //
221a4(rgyud): ma rungs sems can zlog byed pa/ /rgyal ba sA la dbang po yi/ /sngon ni sngags rgyal yongs gsungs pa/ /lha yi tshogs dang gza' rnams dang / /rgyu skar skar mkhan rnams
221a5(rgyud): nyon cig / gza' dang rgyu skar skar ma rnams/ /ma rungs tshar gcad don dang ni/ /'byung po rnams ni thams cad kyang / /zhi ba'i sems ni rab bskyed phyir/ /gang dag sa la
221a6(rgyud): spyod pa dag / rkang med rkang mang dag dang ni/ /rkang gnyis dang ni rkang bzhi dang / /mdor na sems can thams cad ni/ /'gro ba dang ni gnas pa yi/ /'byung bo'i tshogs
221a7(rgyud): rnams kun nyon cig/ na maHsarba bud+d+ha nAM/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/ oM kha kha khA hi khA hi hUM hUM dz+wA la dz+wA la/ pra dz+wA la pra dz+wA la/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha Sh+Ti phaT phaT swAhA/ /gtsug
221b1(rgyud): tor 'bar ba zhes bsgrags pa'i/ /sngags 'di sngags rnams kun gyi mchog/ gang zhig las rnams stong phrag ni/ /dgu bcu rtsa bzhi dag dang ni/ /bkra shis thams cad 'dod pa
221b2(rgyud): yi| |rnam pa sna tshogs las rnams byed/ /rmi lam ngan dang mtshan ma ngan/ /lan gcig bzlas pas sel bar byed/ /las rnams gzhan yang byed pa ni/ /sngags rnams kun gyi
221b3(rgyud): bdag po yin/ /'byung po kun la dbang byed pa/ /bla ma mnga' bdag sangs rgyas 'di/ /sngags 'di dran pa tsam gyis ni/ /sngags rnams ma lus rab tu sems/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas
221b4(rgyud): pa lha yi lhas/ /thub mchog gis ni de gsungs nas/ /yud tsam mi gsungs bzhugs nas ni/ /cung zad dus ni gzhag par mdzad/ /de tshe gnas gtsang gnas pa yi/ /lha yi
221b5(rgyud): tshogs kyang 'dug par 'gyur/ /lha rnams gtso bo thams cad ni/ /rgyu skar gza' dang skar ma rnams/ /gtsug tor sngags kyi byin rlabs kyis/ /'jigs shing dam tshig la
221b6(rgyud): gnas phyir/ /gtsug tor zhes bya mthu bo che/ /mthu mnyam mthu ni chen po ste/ /brgya phrag lnga'am bzhi'am ni/ /de bzhin bdun nam brgyad dang dgu/ gnyis dang drug dang
221b7(rgyud): lnga dang bdun/ /gtsug tor dbang po rab tu bsgrags/ /da ltar grangs dang grangs med ni/ /gtsug tor rgyal po dge ba yin/ /de dag dang ni sngags 'di mtshungs/ /sngon gyi
222a1(rgyud): rgyal ba rnams kyis bshad/ / //'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin
222a2(rgyud): tu rgyas pa'i mdo las/ las bdag gir byas pa'i rkyen gyi le'u rab 'byams las/ bcu bdun pa rdzogs so// //de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas rgyu skar
222a3(rgyud): dang / gza' dang / skar ma dang / skar mkhan thams cad 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa dang / phyogs thams cad du rnam par gnas pa'i rdzu 'phrul chen
222a4(rgyud): po dang ldan pa'i mchog rnams la bka' stsal pa/ grogs po dag/ khyed cag nyon cig/ gza' dang / rgyu skar thams cad kyi mthu'i tshig khyed cag thams cad dag la
222a5(rgyud): yang ston cig/ khyed kyi sngags bya ba'i don thams cad kyang sgrubs shig/ khyod kyis dam tshig la yang gnas par gyis shig/ sngags kyi rgyal po 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis
222a6(rgyud): bstan pa 'di grub na/ de nas gzhan cho ga'i rgyal po grub pa la yang khyed cag yid dad par gyis shig ces so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas gza' rnams
222a7(rgyud): kyi spyod pa sems can thams cad kyi don du gsungs te/ zlos pa thams cad la phan pa'i phyir dang / sngags kyi don yang rab tu bsgrubs pa'i phyir thams cad kyang thams
222b1(rgyud): cad mkhyen pas gsungs so/ /tha skar dang ni bra nye dang / /smin drug dang po'i rgyu skar te/ /rgyu skar gsum po 'di dag la/ /mig dmar gza' ni bdag po yin/ /lug ni khyim du
222b2(rgyud): bstan pa ste/ /'di la grub pa yod ma yin/ /grub mchog bar ma tha ma nyid/ /grub pa yin par 'dod pa yin/ /las rnams kun tu'ang mi 'gro zhing / /ma rungs gza' ni rnam
222b3(rgyud): par zlog / snar ma mgo dang de bzhin du/ /lag tu rgyu skar brjod pa yin/ /rgyu skar nab so rgyal dang ni/ /skag tu'ang rab tu brjod pa yin/ /mchu dang de bzhin gre dang dbo/ /de
222b4(rgyud): bzhin me bzhi nag pa dang / /sa ri sa ga lha mtshams dang / /snron dang de bzhin snrubs dang ni/ /chu ni stod smad dge ba ste/ /zlos pa la phan rab tu bsngags/ /rgyu skar gro bzhin
222b5(rgyud): mon gru ni/ /drag po'i las la rab tu bsngags/ /mon gre khrums ni stod smad gnyis/ /rgyu skar grub pa'i rgyu yin no/ /nam gru la skyes dpal dang ldan/ /'thab la dga'
222b6(rgyud): zhing 'jigs pa med/ /rgyu skar lhag ma gtso bo ni/ /dus kyi tha mar 'byung pa min/ /ji bzhin legs par spyod pa dang / /grub dang bsod nams rab tu bsgrags/ /nye rgyal dang
222b7(rgyud): ni tha chung dang / /'dod pa dag ni nyid yin no/ /yang dag bden dang 'jig rten dang / /snang bar yang ni brjod pa yin/ /longs spyod sbyin dang dge sbyin dang / /ma 'gags
223a1(rgyud): pa dang 'gags pa nyid/ /grags sbyin gzi brjid rgyal po dang / /de bzhin rgyal po 'jig rten dang / /rgyu skar mang po gsungs pa ste/ /stong phrag drug cu rtsa
223a2(rgyud): bzhi 'o/ /dus kyi tha ma 'di la ni/ /'di dag gi ni nus pa yod/ /cho ga rgyal 'di bde don du/ /de tsam shes par gsungs pa yin/ /rang nyid 'od ldan sems can ni/ /de yi dus
223a3(rgyud): su rdzogs ldan yin/ /thams cad nam mkha' la 'gro zhing / /rga dang 'chi ba rnam par spangs/ /de yi dus su rgyu skar med/ /nyi ma zla ba skar ma med/ /lha dang lha min 'jig
223a4(rgyud): rten med/ /dang po'i dus ni dus mchog yin/ /ming med rigs kyang yod ma yin/ /tshes dang skye ba'i skar ma med/ /bsnyung ba med cing sngags kyang med/ /dge dang mi dge'i
223a5(rgyud): las kyang med/ /'di dag rang dgar spyod pa ste/ /bza' dang bza' bar bya ba'ang med/ /'di dag nad med dag pa ste/ /rtag tu sems can rnam mang po/ /de nas dus ni bri ba
223a6(rgyud): na| |'jig rten snod min rab tu 'jug / sngon gyi las kyis drangs nas ni/ /de nas sa yi steng du 'gro/ /sa steng lha gnas gzhal med khang / /lha dang lha min yang dag byung //
223a7(rgyud): bar ma'i dus su phyin gyur nas/ /mi yi lus la yang dag rten/ /bza' dang btung la brkam chags pas/ /'od de dag ni rab tu nyams/ /lus ni sra ba nyid gyur cing / /dge
223b1(rgyud): dang mi dge rnam par spyod/ /de nas nyin zhag zla ba dang / /gza' yi 'od ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de nas bzung nas gang cung zad/ /skar ma'i dpyad shes pa nyid dang / /sems can rjes su
223b2(rgyud): gzung bar brjod/ /ngas ni de dag bstan pa yin/ /sngon ni drang srong cha byad gyur/ /blo ldan tshangs pa'i cha byad dang / /dbang phyug chen po'i lus bstan cing / /yang na khyab 'jug cha
223b3(rgyud): byad kyis/ /nam mkha' lding gi lus spyad dang / /gnod sbyin srin po dri za dang / /sha za dag gi lus nyid gyur/ /skye dang skye bar bdag nyid skyes/ /byang chub sems dpas mkhas
223b4(rgyud): pa ni/ /de dang der ni skye ba la/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod don phyir/ /rtag tu skye ba'i dbang gis so/ /bdag nyid de tshe dus dag tu/ /sngon gyi byang chub sems dpar gyur/ /
223b5(rgyud): mi shes mun pas bsgribs pa laM/ /bdag ni de tshe byis par gyur/ /'jig rten ji snyed yod pa yi/ /khyab 'jug gis byas gzo spyad dang / /lugs kyi bstan bcos sngon gyi
223b6(rgyud): rabs/ /de bzhin rig byed brda sprod pa/ /sdeb sbyor skar ma'i dpyad nyid dang / /rtsis dang sgyu rtsal 'dod pa dang / /log shes de bzhin shes pa dang / /de bzhin log par spyod
223b7(rgyud): nyid dang / /'jig rten bstan bcos thams cad ni/ /yun ring bdag gis sngon bstan to/ /zhi ba thub bdag ji ltar bar/ /ye shes bdag gis thob ma yin/ /byang chub rgyu
224a1(rgyud): ni grol don dang / /de bzhin du ni thar pa'i phyir/ /'khor ba'i btson rar rab bcings pas/ /las kyang las kyang bdag ma grol/ /zhi ba rnam rgyal sangs
224a2(rgyud): rgyas nyid/ /ma nyams go 'phang mya ngan 'das/ /yun ring don du mngon 'dod cing / /legs par yongs su btsal bas thob/ /de ltar bdag gis rig ldan pas/ /tshegs
224a3(rgyud): chung bya bas thob pa yin/ /rgyal bas sngon ni bstan pas na/ /rang byung ye shes thob pa yin/ /de 'dra'i gnas ni rab mthong ba/ /phyi rol lam gyis thob ma yin/ /byang chub
224a4(rgyud): rgyu ni rnyed dka' bas/ /'khor ba'i dgon par 'khyams pa yin/ /bdag gi rang byung 'di 'dra ba/ /ye shes bdag gis thob pa min/ /rig pa bzang po'i las dga'
224a5(rgyud): bas/ /de ni mya ngan 'das pa thob/ /bdag gis bstan bcos 'di dag ni/ /bsdus pa 'ba' zhig byas pa yin/ /las las grol ba med par ni/ /grub pa'i rgyu ni rnyed
224a6(rgyud): ma yin/ /'khor ba'i yun ring zhags pa 'dis/ /las kyi 'ching bas nges par bcings/ /de yi 'gro 'di bdag nyid che/ /dge dang mi dge'ang smin par 'gyur/ /rgyu skar
224a7(rgyud): gza' dang skar ma'i dpyad/ /mtshon par byed pa kho nar zad/ /chos dang mi ldan mi rnams dang / /gzhan la rtags ni snang mi 'gyur/ /de nyid kyis na gza' gsungs pa/ /
224b1(rgyud): dge dang mi dge'i rjes gzung phyir/ /'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dag dang / /khams ni bzhi po dag dang ni/ /chu dang sa dang rlung dang me/ /nam mkha' yongs su bstan pa yin/ /'byung ba
224b2(rgyud): yang dag bsdu ba'i phyir/ /'di dag 'byung ba chen po yin/ /sems can yang dag bsdu ba'i phyir/ /bag med las kyis byas pa yin/ /de dag dus ni nges pa yis/ /sngags rnams
224b3(rgyud): grub par gyur pa yin/ /de yi skye ba 'bad pa yis/ /dge dang mi dge bsrung bar bya/ /rang bzhin gyis ni 'jig rten gtso/ /lha yi dbang phyug brgya byin sogs/ /de yang de tshe de
224b4(rgyud): dus su/ /dus kyi mthar ni yongs su brtags/ /dus kyi tha ma dag la ni/ /sngags rnams grub pa nges pa yin/ /de nyid kyis na thub dbang pos/ /gzhon nu yongs su brtags
224b5(rgyud): pa ni/ /shes rab chen po 'jam pa'i dbyangs/ /byis pa gzhon nu'i gzugs dang ldan/ /'jig rten 'dir ni kun tu rgyu/ /sems can rjes su bzung bar bzod/ /de yi dus su
224b6(rgyud): grub pa ni/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs ni rab tu mthong / /rgyu skar skar ma'i dpyad shes pa/ /de yi tshe na 'byung bar 'gyur/ /nyi shu rtsa bdun rgyu skar dang / /yud tsam dag tu rab tu
224b7(rgyud): bsgrags/ /dus kyi tha ma de la ni/ /bcu gnyis khyim yang yod pa yin/ /rgyu skar tshogs la brten nas ni/ /de dag gza' ni rnam par dbye/ /thams cad so sor gyur pa ni/ /
225a1(rgyud): 'jam dpal gyis ni so sor mdzad/ /skye ba dang ni spyod pa nyid/ /khyim rnams kun la rab tu gnas/ /skye bo rmongs pas khyab gyur la/ /dge dang mi dge
225a2(rgyud): 'bras bu 'byung / /de nyid las kyi 'ching ba yis/ /de dag khyim ni yang dang yang / /sems can rnams kyis grub pa tsam/ /dge dang mi dge rtog par byed/ /rgyu skar snar mar ldan
225a3(rgyud): par ni/ /skye bar yongs su rab brtags pa/ /dpal ldan bzod pa phun sum tshogs/ /tshe ring bu ni mang ba dang / /rtag tu de tshe nor skal ldan/ /de ni dmag gi bdag po byed/ /
225a4(rgyud): 'di ni khyu mchog khyim skyes na/ /khyu mchog nyid la yongs su 'chi/ /mgo nyid la ni 'jig rten shes/ /chas ldan mthong na dga' bar 'gyur/ /smin drug char skyes rtag tu ni//
225a5(rgyud): sa bdag rgyal por snang ba ste/ /yang dag skye ba de la rten/ /rtag tu rgya mtsho gsum bdag 'gyur/ /phyogs gcig skyes pa bgrod dka' ba'i/ /phyogs gcig rgyal por
225a6(rgyud): 'gyur ba yin/ /gza' ni bla mas mtshan pa yi/ /gal te skye bar 'byung gyur na/ /sa ni khor yug ma lus par/ /rjes su spyod par 'gyur ba yin/ /lo ni bcu dang lnga bo nyid/
225a7(rgyud): de yi rgyal thabs byed par 'gyur/ /tha skar bra nye nyid dang ni/ /smin drug cha la skyes gyur pa/ /khyim 'di dag gi nus pa ni/ /tshong gi don gyis nor sgrub 'gyur/ /gal te
225b1(rgyud): skyes pa des byung na/ /dbang phyug longs spyod phun sum tshogs/ /rgyu skar 'di la skyes pa na/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dmar bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin nyi ma nub pa na/ /de ni 'chi bar
225b2(rgyud): 'gyur ba yin/ /ma rungs tsham tshom med pa dang / /bden par smra ba ma yin dang / /lus kyi lpags srab dmar ba'i mdog/ sa yi steng na de snang ngo / /'di yi 'gro ba skad
225b3(rgyud): cig ni/ /mig 'byed 'dzums su rab tu bstan/ /'di yi bar du gar skyes pa/ /rgya che yon tan de 'di yin/ /se gol gtogs gnas tsam du ni/ /'di yi 'gro ba rab tu
225b4(rgyud): bstan/ /de na de dag 'gro ba nyams/ /gza' rnams kyis ni mthong ma yin/ /skye ba rnam par 'dres gyur pa'i/ /sems can rnam pa sna tshogs skye/ /'dres pa'i 'gro ba phun
225b5(rgyud): sum tshogs/ /'dres pa'i longs spyod ldan pa yin/ /de nyid kyis na mi skye ste/ /skye ba nyid du brjod pa yin/ /skye ba'i skar ma sum cu ni/ /dge dang mi dge'i 'bras bu 'byung /
225b6(rgyud): gza' ni mig dmar gyis mtshan pa/ /'di ni ma rungs skye bar 'gyur/ /gsus che lus ni snum pa dang / /mig dkyus ring zhing snyan par smra/ /gza' ni phur bus bltas pa
225b7(rgyud): ni| |rtag tu brtan ldan skye bar 'gyur/ /chu tshod zung tsam nyi ma dang / /zla ba'i lha ni ra ba bshad pa/ /de bzhin rtag tu nyin mtshan la/ /yang dag skye bar 'dod pa yin/ /phyin
226a1(rgyud): ci log pa'i skye ba gzhan/ /phyin ci log tu'ang brtags pa yin/ /gza' ni dge ba mthong ba dang / /mi dge'i skye ba dge mi dge /mi dge'i 'bras bu
226a2(rgyud): grub pa dang / /yang dag skye ba bzang po 'byung / /'gro ba'i skye gnas la brten nas/ /khyim la skye bar rab tu gnas/ /gza' ni ngan spong bus mtshan pa/ /sbyin byed sems
226a3(rgyud): dpa' che ba ste/ /lag dang nab so dag dang ni/ /skag gi cha la rab tu brjod/ /'di dag la skyes gtong ba che/ /g.yo sgyu can ni bab col byed/ /don dang don med 'byor
226a4(rgyud): pa la/ /rtag tu brkam chags bud med chags/ /gzhan gyi bud med mngon 'gro zhing / /de nyid nag po la spyod dang / /dud pa'i mdog 'drar skye 'gyur te/ /drag cing 'khrig
226a5(rgyud): pa la yang dga'/ /sbyor ba'i khyim la rab brten nas/ /de ni spen pa dag la skye/ /nyin dang mtshan du yang dang yang / /der gnas spen pa rgyu bar byed/ /de las skyes pa nyi ma
226a6(rgyud): phyed/ /sems ni stobs dang ldan par 'gyur/ /de yi dus la gang skyes pa/ /de yi mtshan nyid brjod par bya/ /nor ni grub par 'gyur ba dang / /dbang phyug gis ni legs
226a7(rgyud): mtshan pa'o/ /rgyu skar da bzhin rgyal dang ni/ /skag la yang ni gang skyes pa/ /'di ni sbal ba'i khyim yin te/ /dge dang ldan zhing rdzu 'phrul che/ /mdog ni ser po dang
226b1(rgyud): ldan zhing / /de ni skye ba mchog tu bstan/ /rtag tu de bzhin mtshan phyed du/ /'di ni skye bar bstan pa yin/ /de yi dus kyi tshad la ni/ /gal te sems can skye bar 'dod/ /cho ga
226b2(rgyud): mthong ba'i rgyu yis na/ /'di ni don rnams thams cad sgrub/ /de ni shin tu gzhon pa nas/ /rgyal thabs byed cing nor rnams thob/ /mdog ni ser dang sngo bsangs ni/ /kha dog
226b3(rgyud): rgyas pa snang bar 'gyur/ /gtsang sbra'i spyod la dga' ba dang / /de ni dpal ldan 'jigs med skye/ /mchu dang de bzhin gre dang ni/ /de bzhin dbo yi cha dag ni/ /snang byed kyi ni
226b4(rgyud): zhing du 'gyur/ /seng ge'i khyim du bya ba yin/ /de la skyes ba dpa' bo che/ /sha yi kha zas de la dga'/ /ri yi rdzong la brten nas ni/ /rgyal thabs dbang phyug byed par 'gyur//
226b5(rgyud): gal te de skyes thob gyur na/ /zhing la gnas shing des sdom rten/ /de bzhin nyi ma 'char ba na/ /skyes pa 'di la brjod pa yin/ /rgyu skar dbo yi cha dag ni/ /de bzhin me bzhi
226b6(rgyud): nag pa nyid/ /rgyu skar de la skye gnas pa/ /mi ni yongs su dpa' bar 'gyur/ /sdom min gzhan gyi bud med 'gro/ de ni dmag dpon byed par 'gyur/ /gal te skye bar
226b7(rgyud): thob 'gyur na/ /nges par rgyal thabs byed par 'gyur/ /gang du skar ma de dag gnas/ /'di ni bu mo'i khyim du 'gyur/ /'di yi bdag po gza' lhag ste/ /kha cig tu ni
227a1(rgyud): gzhan yang yin/ /'di skad skar ma mchog la ni/ /gza' ni mi bzad bsrung bar 'gyur/ /zla ba yang ni bzang ba ste/ /yang na zla ba'i bu bdag yin/ /nyin
227a2(rgyud): phyed rdzogs na skye ba ni/ /'di yi skye ba snang ba yin/ /nag pa'i cha dang sa ri dang / /sa ga'i phyed kyis lhag pa la/ /srang gi khyim ste bzang po'i don/ /zla ba la spyod sems
227a3(rgyud): can gyi/ /'di ni mi bzad zhing yin te/ /skal med ma yin nor gyi gnas/ /'di yi skye ba skye gyur gnas/ /mtshan mo'i thun gyi tha ma 'o/ /mi ni 'di la skyes gyur pa/ /rtag tu
227a4(rgyud): btung ba dag la dad/ /spyi mtshan ma yin ngo tsha med/ /mang pos bkur cing mchod pa dang / /la lar rgyal srid longs spyod dang / /nor chen thob par 'gyur ba yin/ /nges
227a5(rgyud): med skye ba yongs snang zhing / /byis par mas ni spangs pa yin/ /gal te skye ba thob gyur na/ /pu mang bde ba skye bar 'gyur/ /rgyu skar lha mtshams las skyes pa/ /bzo yi las
227a6(rgyud): ni sgrub pa dang / /byams pa'i bdag nyid grogs po mang / /rtag tu dpa' zhing rtul phod che/ /'jig rten snron la skyes pa ni/ /mi ni rab gtum bstan pa yin/ /sdug bsngal
227a7(rgyud): mang po bzod pa dang / /mi ni ma rungs skye bar 'gyur/ /khyim ni sdig par bshad pa ste/ /rtag tu rno zhing bab col byed/ /'di dag nyid la rtag skyes pa/ /skye bar yang dag
227b1(rgyud): brjod pa yin/ /de bzhin nyin phyed nyi ma la/ /gal te mi ni skyes gyur na/ /dag cing g.yul las rnam rgyal ba'i/ /rgyal por de ni nges par 'gyur/ /byis pa gzhon nu gzugs yod pa'i//
227b2(rgyud): de yi skad cig gzas mthong 'gyur/ /sa yi lha mo'i bur gyur ba/ /gang yin de ni mig dmar gsungs/ /de nyid phyir na sa la spyod/ /rang bu nyid kyis gsod par phyed/ /de las gzhan
227b3(rgyud): pa bzlog pas ni/ /dge dang mi dge'i skye ba nyid/ /tshe ring gzi brjid ldan pa dang / /shes ldan nyid du'ang skye bar 'gyur/ /lha mtshams la ni rab skyes pa/ /shes rab che zhing grogs
227b4(rgyud): la byams/ /mig dmar gyi ni zhing 'di yin/ /yang na rtag tu gza' 'dres yin/ /rgyu skar snubs la skyes pa dang / /de bzhin du ni chu stod dang / /chu smad kyi ni cha dag la/ /gzhu
227b5(rgyud): yi khyim du rab tu bstan/ /de yi skye ba'i skye ba ni/ /phur bu'i zhing der bstan pa yin/ /nyi ma phyi dror gyur pa dang / /zla ba nam snad gyur pa la/ /de yi skye ba zhes bstan pa/ /gang zhig
227b6(rgyud): skyes pa skye ba'i rgyu/ /snubs la skyes pa rang rigs 'jig /tha mar bzang por 'gyur ba yin/ /skyes gnas par ma longs spyod ni/ /thob par de ni the tshom med/ /gzhon pa yongs
227b7(rgyud): su 'das pa na/ /snang byed dkyil 'khor ji lta bar/ /rgas pas gyur na rgyal por 'gyur/ /longs spyod che zhing nor cher 'gyur/ /dma' ba'i phyogs su lus 'gyur gyi/ /
228a1(rgyud): gzhan gyi phyogs su ma yin no/ /de las gzhan du bzlog par ni/ /rnam pa sna tshogs skye bo snang / /chu smad kyi ni cha dag dang / /gro bzhin nyid du bstan pa
228a2(rgyud): dang / /mon gru rgyu skar mchog nyid ni/ /khyim 'di chu srin kho na yin/ /'di ni spen pa'i zhing yin te/ /yang na gza' gzhan gyis mtshan pa'o/ /rtag tu 'di la skyes gnas pa//
228a3(rgyud): de yang sa steng 'di la snang / /dang po'i mtha' dang bar ma'i mtha'/ /mtshan mo'i cha ni 'das pa la/ /de dag las skyes longs spyod che/ /kun nas snang bar 'gyur ba yin//
228a4(rgyud): mtho dang dma' ba'i rigs gnas shing / /de dag sa yi bdag por 'gyur/ /rab gtum kha dog nag po'am/ /sngo bsangs mdog tu de dag 'gyur/ /mig mtha' dmar//
228a5(rgyud): zhing 'jam pa dang / /rtag tu dpa' zhing rtul yang phod/ /de bzhin chu yis khyab pa yi/ /phyogs su rgyal po byed par 'gyur/ /tshe ring bu ni med pa dang / /sdug bsngal
228a6(rgyud): mang po bzod par 'gyur/ /de las gzhan pa bzlog pa la/ /skye bo rnam par bzlog par snang / /mon gru'i phyed dang mon gre dang / /de bzhin khrums stod phyed dag ni/ /de
228a7(rgyud): yi khyim du 'gyur pa ni/ /bum pa zhes ni brjod pa yin/ /'di la gza' yi gtso bo ni/ /zhing du rtag tu brten pa yin/ /de bzhin 'dres pa'ang zla ba dang / /blo ldan pa
228b1(rgyud): ba sangs nyid yin/ /'di dag skye bar 'gyur ba ni/ /mtshan mo'am nam ni langs par snang / /rtag tu skye 'di bzang po ste/ /'jig rten spyod pa dag pa yin/ /mi ni ma rungs las byed cing //
228b2(rgyud): blo dang ldan par brjod pa yin/ /longs spyod sna tshogs phun sum tshogs/ /sa steng rjes su spyod par 'gyur/ /de las gzhan du bzlog na ni/ /dbul zhing nang rnams snod du 'gyur/ /rgyu
228b3(rgyud): skar khrums smad nyid dang ni/ /nam gru zhes ni brjod pa dang / /khrums stod kyi ni bzhi cha la/ /khyim ni nya ru rab tu brtags/ /skye ba de dag rtag gnas pa/ /kun tu ji ltar snang zhe na/ /
228b4(rgyud): mtshan mo'i thun gyi bar ma dang / /nyin par nyi ma shar ba dang / /nyi ma thun phyed 'das pa dang / /nyin phyed cung zad 'das pa dang / /lhag ma khru gang tsam 'das par/ /'di yi dus su'ang
228b5(rgyud): skyes pa ni/ /dag pa dang ni rab dag nyid/ /pa sangs nyid kyis rab tu mchod/ /pa ba sangs kyi zhing zhes pa/ /lha yi rigs zhes tshangs par spyod/ /ser dang dkar ba'i mdog dag gi /
228b6(rgyud): gza' yis kyang ni rab tu bsten/ /des zhing rtag tu dge ba dang / /chos ldan mchog tu bzang ba yin/ /mi ni de la skyes gyur pa/ /yan lag kun kyang shin tu mdzes/ /brtson 'grus
228b7(rgyud): che zhing rgyal po 'dod/ /gnyen dang bshes ni brtan pa dang / /tshe ring longs spyod che ba dang / /dma' ba'i yul la yang dag bsten/ /shar gyi phyogs la brten nas ni/ /de
229a1(rgyud): dag rtag tu skye bar 'gyur/ /de dag mya ngan phyogs su ni/ /rtag tu skye bar mi 'gyur te/ /nya ni thang la yongs spyod par/ /nam yang snang ba ma yin no/ /drang
229a2(rgyud): srong rnams kyi chu gnas dang / /chu bo dag tu 'phel bar 'gyur/ /de la skye ba rab brtan pa/ /khyim nyid du ni rab tu bstan/ /mi ni de dag las skyes pa/ /dma' ba'i yul du
229a3(rgyud): rnam par 'phel/ /rtag tu shar gyi phyogs gnas pa'i/ /sa bdag skal ba chen por 'gyur/ /phur bu dang ni spen pa dag/ gza' mchog gi ni mngon par bltas/ /shar gyi
229a4(rgyud): phyogs kyi bdag po byed/ /de dag las skyes the tshom med/ /khyim ni rnam pa mang po dang / /rgyu skar du ma gsungs pa yang / /rnam pa sna tshogs gza' mchog kyang / /sngon gyi
229a5(rgyud): dus yin da ltar min/ /mi rnams de las skyes pa yang / /de bzhin tshes grangs bco lnga dang / /nyin zhag sum cu dag nyid de/ /des na zla bar rab tu bstan/ /zla phyed nyin
229a6(rgyud): mtshan bco lnga ste/ /zla phyed gnyis la zla bar brjod/ /des na zla ba bcu gnyis la/ /lo gcig tu ni rab tu bsgrags/ /'di tsam dus kyi tshod la ni/ /dus kyi tha mar yongs
229a7(rgyud): su brtags/ /rtsod pa'i dus su phyin pa na/ /'di yi grangs su rab tu bstan/ /mi rnams tshe ni de bzhin du/ /lo brgya dag tu bsgrags pa yin/ /de dag lo tshigs phyin
229b1(rgyud): pa na/ /dus ni drug tu rab tu brjod/ /dang po bar dang tha mar ni/ /de dag gsum du rab tu bstan/ /lha mtshams la ni sa 'gul na/ /mi rnams 'dir ni tshe ring 'gyur/ /de dag mi yi
229b2(rgyud): 'jig rten 'dir/ /skye zhing 'phel bar 'gyur ba yin/ /mi ma yin pa 'jig rten 'dir/ /phan tshun du ni 'byer bar 'gyur/ /de dag rnam skrag 'jigs pa dang / /phan tshun du ni
229b3(rgyud): rnam par rgyu/ /lha dang lha min gtso bo ni/ /gang tshe 'thab par rab 'jug pa/ /de tshe mi yi 'jig rten 'dir/ /nad ni 'byung bar byed pa yin/ /mjug ring las dang skar mda'
229b4(rgyud): dang / /gnam lcags dang ni rdo rje dang / /dud pa phyogs ni mtha' dag tu/ /du ba mjug ring rab tu snang / /zla ba nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la/ /mun nag gis ni khebs par gnas/ /
229b5(rgyud): nyi zla rdzu 'phrul chen po dag/ bug pa yod par snang ba dang / /de ltar rnam pa sna tshogs pa/ /rnam mang yang ni snang 'gyur na/ /mu ge tshe ni nyams pa dang / /de bzhin yul 'khor
229b6(rgyud): 'jig pa dang / /mi yi bdag po 'chi ba dang / /sdom brtson 'jigs pa chen po 'byung / /'jig rten dag ni thams cad la/ /der ni 'jigs su rung ba 'byung / /mchu dang
229b7(rgyud): tha skar dag dang ni/ /nab so la ni sa 'gul na/ /de tshe dbus kyi yul dag tu/ /rkun ma bab col byed la gnod/ /lho mi phyogs la gnas pa yi/ /rgyal po chen po rnam par
230a1(rgyud): 'jig/ bra nye smin drug nyid dang ni/ /gang tshe snar ma dang ni mgo /'gul na 'jig rten 'jigs pa che/ /de la dogs pa rab tu 'byung / /nub phyogs
230a2(rgyud): na ni gnas pa yi/ /de tshe rgyal po 'chi bar 'gyur/ /gang yang mtha' 'khob gnas pa yi/ /kla klo rku bas 'tsho byed dang / /de bzhin 'bigs byed steng gnas dang / /nang
230a3(rgyud): du mi yi dbang phyug gnas/ /de yang de yi dus dag tu/ /nad kyis brgyal zhing gnod par 'gyur/ /de dag la ni dgra rnams 'byung / /gcig la gcig ni yul 'phrog
230a4(rgyud): 'gyur/ /rgyu skar lag dang rgyal dang ni/ /skag dang de bzhin gre dang dbo/ /'di dag la ni sa 'gul na/ /mi bdag kun ni mi mthun nas/ /phan tshun gnod pa byed 'gyur ba//
230a5(rgyud): gsod dang 'ching dang gnod pa dang / /mu ge dag kyang rab tu 'byung / /me bzhi nag pas ri dang / /de bzhin lha mtshams snron nyid la/ /snod kyi 'jig rten sar gyur pa/ /
230a6(rgyud): 'di la gang tshe 'gul 'gyur na/ /kha ba can gnas kla klo dang / /rkun ma kun nas gnas pa dang / /bal yul gyi ni bdag po dang / /kha sha'i lung par gnas pa yi/ /der
230a7(rgyud): ni mi bdag ma lus pa/ /phan tshun du ni mi mthun nas/ /thams cad g.yul la spyod 'gyur bar/ /'dir ni the tshom med pa yin/ /rgyu skar gang yin snrubs dang ni/ /chu
230b1(rgyud): ni stod smad gnyi ga la/ /sa yi steng du 'gul bar ni/ /'di dag la ni rab mthong na/ /shar gyi phyogs kyi mi rnams dang / /ban dra o dra kA ma ru/ /b+hang+ga la bdag rgyal po ni/ /'chi ba
230b2(rgyud): 'di la the tshom med/ /gau DA'i bdag po dpal dang ldan/ /yul 'khor gzhan gyis yongs bskor ba'am/ /'phral la na bar gyur pa dang / /la lar yang na 'chi bar 'gyur/ /
230b3(rgyud): 'jig rten rgya mtsho'i ngogs gnas dang / /gang gA'i 'gram du yang dag gnas/ /chu yis thams cad khyer ba'am/ /nad rnams mang po kun non byed/ /gro bzhin dang ni mon gru
230b4(rgyud): dang / /mon gre dang ni chu stod dang / /de bzhin du ni chu smad dang / /gal te nam gru las skyes pa/ /rab tu 'gul ba nyin byed la/ /snod kyi 'jig rten yang dag 'gul/ /sa rnams
