230b5(rgyud): thams cad rab 'gul ba/ /ri bo dang ni gnas su bcas/ /rtag tu nam mkha' la snang ba/ /'phar zhing 'og tu 'byung byed na/ /byang phyogs kyi ni yul dag dang / /nub phyogs la ni
230b6(rgyud): yang dag gnas/ /lho yi phyogs ni thams cad dang / /phyogs rnams kun la gnas byed pa'i/ /mi mchog sa ni mang spyod pa/ /phan tshun du ni gnod pa byed/ /sems can rnams ni
230b7(rgyud): gnod chen ldan/ /mu ges yul 'khor 'byer bar 'gyur/ /tho rangs sa ni 'gul gyur na/ /lus can shis dang zhi bar 'gyur/ /de las cung zad phyi dus na/ /drag po'i 'gu
231a1(rgyud): ba rab tu skye/ /de nas cung zad phyis 'gul na/ /yul ni ma ga d+har gnod dang / /ang+ga'i yul du gnod 'gyur te/ /ma ga d+ha rgyal de bzhin no/ /de nas
231a2(rgyud): cung zad nyin phyed dam/ /phyi dro'i dus su gyur pa na/ /gal te sa ni 'gul bar gyur/ /sa steng ma lus nyid dag gi /rab tu byung ba thams cad la/ /rtag tu nad ni 'byung ba thob//
231a3(rgyud): rims dang yi ga 'chus dang gzer/ /de bzhin nad ni 'brum bu yis/ /zhag bdun btab par gyur nas ni/ /de nas de dag sos par 'gyur/ /de nas nyi ma yang 'das
231a4(rgyud): nas/ /sa ni gal te 'gul gyur na/ /rigs bzhi dag gi mchog gyur pa/ /bram ze rtswa ni so ma 'thung / /nyon mongs rgyal po'i blon po ni/ /'chi bar 'gyur bar the tshom
231a5(rgyud): med/ /mdun na 'don ni chos dang ldan/ /blon po'am zham 'bring byed pa na/ /gzhan yang sdom can gtso bo ni/ /sngags rgyud don la mkhas pa dang / /bram ze dang ni rgyal
231a6(rgyud): rigs dang / /de bzhin dmangs rigs rje'u'i rigs/ /brtan pa mkhas pa dag dang ni/ /bstan bcos de nyid don lugs ldan/ /gsod dang rab tu nyams pa'am/ /
231a7(rgyud): dran ldan thos dang de nyid shes/ /sngon byung ba ni sems pa dag/ myur du nad kyis 'jigs 'gyur te/ /gnam lcags rdo rjes shing la bzhin/ /de nas nyi ma nub pa na//
231b1(rgyud): de nas yang ni song ba na/ /phyi dro dus kyi mtha' la ni/ /gal te sa ni rab tu 'gul/ /de bzhin sems can 'dres pa dang / /dud 'gro dag gi 'gro ba dang / /mi yi 'jig rten
231b2(rgyud): gtso bo dag/ de tshe 'gum dang rnam par 'jig/ mtshan mo'i thun ni dang po la/ /gal te sa ni 'gul 'gyur na/ /sems can 'dres pa sna tshogs dang / /dud 'gro'i skye
231b3(rgyud): gnas rnams su ni/ /mi ni 'jig rten gtso rnams su/ /char chen rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur/ /cung zad thun de bri gyur la/ /sa ni 'gul bar gyur pa yi/ /de tshe rtags de
231b4(rgyud): snang gyur na/ /rlung dang char pa'i 'jigs chen 'byung / /de nas thun de zad pa'i mthar/ /'gul snang las ni mi bzad pa/ /nub phyogs mi yi bdag po yi/ /pha rol dmag
231b5(rgyud): tshogs 'byung bar shes/ /thun ni gnyis pa dang po la/ /gal te sa ni 'gul 'byung gyur/ /gzhan gyi dmag tshogs nad dang 'chi/ /khong pa'i nad ni mi bzad 'byung //
231b6(rgyud): mkhris pa bad kan las gyur nad/ /skye bo rnams la 'byung bar 'gyur/ /'byung po rnams ni skyo 'gyur zhing / /de tshe phyogs dang phyogs su 'gro/ de nas gnyis pa'i thun
231b7(rgyud): dkyil du/ /sa ni rab tu 'gul byung na/ /rlung chen 'byung ba shes bya ste/ /shing dang lha khang 'gyel bar 'gyur/ /yang thog ra ba ni rnams kyi/ /rtse mo 'jigs par the
232a1(rgyud): tshom med/ /gnas dang 'dug gnas bzang po dang / /khang pa dang ni rta babs dang / /dud 'gro rnams kyi 'dug gnas kyang / /sa la myur du ltung bar
232a2(rgyud): 'gyur/ /de nas mtshan phyed dus dag tu/ /gal te sa ni 'gul ba byung / /de tshe shar phyogs yul gyi bdag /mi mchog gtso bo 'chi ba'am/ /de bu 'chi bar 'gyur ba'am//
232a3(rgyud): mu ge 'byung bar rab tu ston/ /bar ma'i thun ni bri gyur nas/ /tha mar nye la 'gul ba byung / /sa rnams dag ni ma lus la/ /zhi zhing nad med nges par ston/ /de nas mtshan
232a4(rgyud): phyed mthar gyur la/ /gal te sa ni 'gul bar snang / /gsher chen yul gyi dbus dag tu/ /mi yi bdag po nad kyis gnod/ /phan tshun mi mthun gyur nas ni/ /sdug
232a5(rgyud): bsngal mi bzad 'chi bar 'gyur/ /thun ni gsum par phyin nas 'gul/ /byis pa rnams la bde ba 'byung / /sbrang bu sha sprang phye leb dang / /rkun po rnams ni 'jig par
232a6(rgyud): 'gyur/ /tho rangs 'gul bar gyur na ni/ /tshe ring nad med lo legs byed/ /grong khyer gyi ni khor yug dag /me yis tshig par shes par bya/ /nyi ma 'char ba'i dus dag
232a7(rgyud): tu| |sa ni rab tu 'gul pa byung / /dbus kyi yul ni thams cad du/ /rkun mas rnam par 'tshe bar 'gyur/ /de tshe zhag ni bdun dag las/ /rgyal po 'chi bar snang ba yin//
232b1(rgyud): gang du stobs ni rab che ba/ /sa ni 'gul bar gyur pa yin/ /de tshe gnas ni de dag tu/ /dge dang mi dge'i sbyor ba snang / /skar mda' gnam grum sa 'gul ni/ /skar mda' dkar
232b2(rgyud): po 'bar 'gyur na/ /des ni sngar bstan sel bar byed/ /de bzhin dkar mdog rtag tu ni/ /dge zhing rab tu bsngags pa yin/ /mi bzad chen po kha dog dmar/ /me yis
232b3(rgyud): tshig par nye bar ston/ /dud ka'i mdog nag nag po ni/ /rgyal po 'chi bar ston pa yin/ /ser ba'am yang na ser skya 'am/ /'dres pa'i mchog ni snang gyur na/ /de che
232b4(rgyud): 'bres pa'i las 'gyur ba/ /skar mda' ltung bas rnam par ston/ /gnam grum nyid du bstan pa ni/ /gar 'byung de ni ston pa ste/ /gal te dbus na de tshe dbus/ /yul
232b5(rgyud): nyid du ni rab tu bstan/ /sgra brnyan snyan pa byung na ni/ /bde zhing nad med ston par byed/ /ma rungs mi bzad 'jig rten du/ /rnga sgra yis ni dge ba sbyin/ /'jigs dang shin
232b6(rgyud): tu 'jigs rung sgra/ /der ni mu ge stan pa yin/ /de la sogs par sbyor ba ni/ /rtag tu gza' rnams 'dod pa yin/ /rgyu skar 'di dag mthong ba la/ /grub pa'i las ni de tshe
232b7(rgyud): bya| |tha skar snar ma nyid dang ni/ /rgyal dang khrums ni stod smad gnyis/ /nam gru dang ni lha mtshams dag /bzlas pa'i dus su rab tu bsngags/ /'di dag la ni sngags
233a1(rgyud): rnams 'grub/ /grub pa'i don yang ster bar byed/ /skar ma dag ni 'di dag la/ /dkyil 'khor nyid kyang bri bar bya/ /gza' yi res kyi gtso bo ni/ /ser dang dkar
233a2(rgyud): bar snang ba yin/ /tshes ni 'di dag la dge ste/ /rtag tu zla ba nya ba yin/ /yul gzhan dag tu 'gro byed dang / /dkyil 'khor dag kyang bri bar bya/ /dang po gsum pa lnga pa
233a3(rgyud): dang / /bcu pa dang ni bdun pa dang / /bcu gsum pa la ci bde bar/ /mi yi bdag bo 'gro bar brtag/ skye bo kun la dge ba sbyin/ /chags shing 'gro bar rab tu bsngags//
233a4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi ni sngags rgyud dag/ sngags rnams thams cad mi bri 'o/ /'di dag la ni sngags mi 'grub/ /bgegs kyi rgyur ni bstan pa yin/ /'gro dang sbyin sreg
233a5(rgyud): grub pa la/ /tshes grangs gza' ni dam par ldan/ /phur bu pa sangs zla ba dang / /gza' lhag mchog ni las kun la/ /gza' mchog 'di dag rtag tu ni/ /bzhi po tshes
233a6(rgyud): dang ldan pa ni/ /sa steng 'jig rten kun tu ni/ /'gro ba'i las ni grub par byed/ /ma rungs 'chi ltas bral ba yi/ /nyi ma la ni brtag par bya/ /yud tsam bcu gnyis kho
233a7(rgyud): na ni/ /de yi dus su rab tu sbyar/ /dkar dang byams ldan nyid dang ni/ /mig dmar du yang rab tu bstan/ /drag bo dbang chen dag pa dang / /byi bzhin nyid dang legs
233b1(rgyud): mdzes dang / /'khor dang 'khor bar byed pa nyid/ /dge ba sbyin zhes bstan pa yin/ /zla ba mchog ni sbyin pa nyid/ /'di dag bcu gnyis mtshan nyid yin/ /yud tsam dag tu
233b2(rgyud): bstan pa ni/ /nyin zhag sum cu nyid la 'o/ /bcu pa char ni 'bab 'gyur te/ /bcu bzhi pa ni yul 'khor 'jig/ brgyad pa bcu gnyis pa nyid dang / /bzhi pa nyid ni spang bar
233b3(rgyud): bya| |myur la sogs pa'i grangs dang ldan/ /mar ngo la ni mtshan mo yin/ /lhag ma bgegs ni byed pa yang / /log 'dren yin te bzhi pa'o/ /'di dag grangs ni ldan pa
233b4(rgyud): la/ /dus 'di dag tu rab tu bstan/ /mig ni 'byed dang 'dzums pa dang / /se gol myur ba'i 'gros 'di ni/ /'di dag dus kyi tshad dag ni/ /rgya cher yang ni bstan par bya//
233b5(rgyud): se gol brgya yi tshogs dag la/ /rtsa rgyun gcig tu bstan pa yin/ /rtsa rgyun bzhi la chu tshod bstan/ /chu tshod bzhi la thun zhes bya/ /thun bzhi la ni nyin par te/ /mtshan mo
233b6(rgyud): dag kyang de bzhin bstan/ /de ltar brgyad dang ldan pa la/ /nyin mtshan du ni rab tu brtags/ /mig gi 'byed 'dzums bcu la ni/ /skad cig tsam du rab tu brtags/ skad
233b7(rgyud): cig bcu zhes bshad pa ni/ /yud tsam du ni yongs su brtags/ /yud tsam bzhi la thun gcig ces/ /sngags rig pas ni yongs su brtags/ /'di tsam dus kyi tshad la ni/ /
234a1(rgyud): gsum gyi grangs su yongs su brtags/ /sbyin sreg dus dang bzlas pa yi/ /grub pa'i dus dang sbyar bar bya/ /nyal ba'i dus dang mi nyal dang / /rtag tu nyin
234a2(rgyud): zhag phrugs btungs la/ /nyin dang mtshan ni nyi ma zhes/ /de ltar ming ni 'jug pa yin/ /nyi ma bco lnga nyid la ni/ /zla ba phyed du rab tu bstan/ /zla phyed gnyis la zla ba zhes/ /
234a3(rgyud): rtsis shes 'jigs pa med pas bstan/ /de bzhin zla ba zla drug gis/ /sgra gcan gyis kyang 'dzin pa yin/ /de nas zla ba bcu gnyis la/ /lo yi sgrar ni rab tu bsgrags/ /
234a4(rgyud): de nas lo ni bcu gnyis la/ /lo chen zhes ni de la bya/ /gza' dang rgyu skar phyin ci log/ lha min dbang po thams cad kyang / /de nas lo ni bcu gnyis la/ /'dir ni
234a5(rgyud): dge dang mi dge byed/ /gang tshe yang ngor lha min dbang / /sgra gcan rab tu snang 'gyur zhing / /zla ba nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /ma lus rab tu zin gyur na/ /mtshon gyi tshogs
234a6(rgyud): ni chen po yang / /sa yi steng du snang bar 'gyur/ /de la sogs pa chen po ni/ /dus dang dus su rab sbyor 'gyur/ /rnam pa du ma mang po yi/ /bgegs ni mi bzad snang
234a7(rgyud): bar 'gyur/ /dus kyi tha mar phyin pa na/ /'jig rten snod ni chos min la/ /rgyu skar snubs la gnas pa la/ /zla ba ma lus 'dzin 'gyur zhing / /mtshan mo ma lus 'dzin

234b2(rgyud): dbang po'i grib ma yis/ /gal te 'jigs shing nub gyur na/ /shar phyogs gnas pa'i rgyal po ni/ /sdang bas gsod par the tshom med/ /rang nyid 'chi ba'i 'jigs pas sam/ /
234b3(rgyud): gzhan gyis de ni gsod par 'gyur/ /kla klo yi ni bdag po nyid/ /shar phyogs su ni gsod par byed/ /o Da'i yul gyi mi rnams dang / /de tshe rdo rje zhes bdag kyang / /gal te tha skar
234b4(rgyud): snar ma dang / /de bzhin du ni bra nye dang / /smin drug dag la nyi zla ni/ /gang tshe 'dzin par snang gyur na/ /rnam pa sna tshogs bad kan dang / /mkhris pa dang ni rlung gyur dang / /de
234b5(rgyud): bzhin 'dres par gyur pa na/ /gzhan yang lus can kun la 'byung / /byis pa dag ni thams cad la/ /rnam pa du ma'i nad rnams 'byung / /gal te rgyu skar mchu dang ni/ /gre
234b6(rgyud): dang de bzhin dbo nyid dang / /me bzhi nag pa sa ri dang / /sa ga dag gi rgyu skar ni/ /de la nyi zla shar ba na/ /'dzin par the tshom med 'gyur zhing / /nyi zla gnyis ni shar phyogs
234b7(rgyud): su| |sgra gcan gyis ni zin gyur na/ /shar phyogs mi yi bdag po dang / /lA Da yul gyi bdag po dang / /ang+ga ma ga d+ha rgyal po/ /mig gi nad kyis 'debs pa'am/ /bu rnams 'chi
235a1(rgyud): bar 'gyur ba'am/ /de rnams 'chi bas nyer 'jigs 'gyur/ /dgra rnams snang ba'i sems ldan rnams/ /tshogs kyang de tshe 'byung bar 'gyur/ /
235a2(rgyud): mgo dang lag dang nab so dang / /de bzhin rgyal dang skag nyid dang / /nyi ma zla ba 'di dag la/ /sgra gcan gyis zin snang gyur na/ /ma ga d+hA rgyal gnod 'gyur zhing / /de bzhin

235a4(rgyud): la snang / /de tshe nad rnams kun tu 'gro/ yul mi kun la'ang nad rnams 'byung / /gsod dang 'ching dang nyon mongs dang / /gnod pa rnam pa du ma byung / /'ching dang

235a7(rgyud): mo na gru dag la ni/ /gal te nyi zla gzas zin te/ /gza' ni byung bar shes gyur na/ /kha dog nag pa la brten nas/ /mya ngan chen po nyon mongs dang / /mu ge kun
235b1(rgyud): tu 'byung bar ni/ /yul mi kun la 'byung ba dang / /rgyal po rkun ma'i 'jigs chen 'byung / /nam gru rgyu skar nyid dang ni/ /gang tshe khrums smad dag la ni/ /zla ba nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du/ /

235b4(rgyud): bar 'gyur/ /gang nyid sa steng 'gul ba ni/ /'jig rten mtshan mas bstan pa dag/ dge dang mi dge de dang der/ /de bzhin gzas zin shes par bya/ /khug rna ser ba mjug rings

236a1(rgyud): rgyu skar gang la sa 'gul ba/ /de la khug rna yang dag bstan/ /phyogs rnams ma lus khug rna ni/ /mi bzad 'od ni spangs pa dang / /nyin zhag lnga yi

242a5(rgyud): bsgyur bar 'gyur ro/ /zla ba re re zhing zla ba nya ba dang / cho 'phrul gyi zla ba phyed lnga'i bar gyis 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /'di grub pa tsam gyis chos thams cad mngon sum du
242a6(rgyud): 'gyur ro/ /mngon par shes pa thams cad rab tu thob par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mngon par dgyes pa dang / sangs rgyas dang /

242b1(rgyud): dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /de nas gtsug tor 'khor los bsgyur ba bsgrub par 'dod na gser dang / dngul dang / zangs ma dang / nor bu'i rang bzhin gyi dbyug pa khru gang tsam byas

242b5(rgyud): par yang 'gyur ro/ /ci ste nor bu rin po che bsgrub par 'dod na gser gyi dbyig pa'am/ nor bu bzang po dang / shel gyi nor bu byas te/ gos 'phyang bar byas la cho ga 'di nyid

245b1(rgyud): lce 'byin par 'gyur te/ de bcad na g.yog 'khor brgya dang bcas te nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur/ bar gyi bskal par gnas par 'gyur/ ri rab kyi rtse mor rtse zhing dga' bar 'gyur/

249a1(rgyud): ro| |ci ste ral gri bsgrub par 'dod na ral gri ma nyams pa blangs la mar ngo'i tshes brgyad dam/ bcu bzhi la ras ris la mchod pa rgya chen po dang /

249a6(rgyud): zhing tshes nas nyi ma re re zhing re res bskyed pa'i dge slong dag la bshos drang bar bya'o/ /tha mar nub gsum smyung ba byas la sku gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi
249a7(rgyud): mdun du ras ris rab tu bzhag cing mchod pa rgya chen po byas la/ mar gyi mar me brgya rab tu sbar zhing ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug par bya'o/ /lag pa gnyis kyis rdo rje
249b1(rgyud): bzung la ji srid 'bar ba de'i bar du bzlas pa bya zhing / de bzung na de 'khor dang bcas pa nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur/ rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los bsgyur par 'gyur/ phyag
249b2(rgyud): na rdo rje dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ pha rol gnon par 'gyur/ bskal pa chen por 'tsho bar 'gyur/ lus zhig nas phyag na rdo rje'i gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du mdung rtse
249b3(rgyud): dang / 'khor lo dang / mda' dang / mdung la sogs pa mtshon thams cad dang / mchil lham dang / so shing dang / mchod phyir thogs la sogs pa gzhan gyi cho ga'i bya bas
249b4(rgyud): bsgrub par bya zhing thams cad kyang grub pa rnam pa gsum yin no/ /zhi ba byed par 'dod pa la pad+ma'i rnam pa 'dra ba'i thab khung byas la/ mchod sbyin la 'os pa'i yan lag
249b5(rgyud): gis me rab tu sbar la blugs gzar gyis zas mchog dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar dang sbyar ba'i sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad zhag gsum byas na bdag dang / gzhan zhi
249b6(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro/ /zhag bdun gyis ni grong ngam/ grong khyer gyi 'chi ba mang po'i nye bar 'tshe ba zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /shing sha ma'i yam shing la zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis
249b7(rgyud): btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad kyang bya'o/ /yang na shing u dum bA ra'i yam shing la zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags ba'i sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad kyang
250a1(rgyud): bya'o/ /char mi 'bab pa la ni mngar gsum gyis sbyin sreg byas na thams cad du mchog tu zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro/ /slong mo'i zas za zhing cho 'phrul
250a2(rgyud): chen po'i zla phyed kyi zla ba nya'i bar du nub gsum smyung ba byas la/ zla ba gzas zin pa na ba nag mo'i 'o ma lan brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par sngags te 'thungs na bcud kyis
250a3(rgyud): len gyi yon tan dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /rtswa dUr ba'i 'jag ma la zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pas stong rtsa brgyad nub bcu'i bar du sbyin sreg byas na dus
250a4(rgyud): ma yin par 'chi ba rab tu zhi zhing tshe ring bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal mtshan dang / dung la sogs pa la mngon par bsngags na mthong ba dang / thos pas pha rol gyi sde dpung gis
250a5(rgyud): mi g.yo bar byas par 'gyur ro/ /bum pa gsar pa 'bru thams cad dang / spos chus bkang ba la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas pas log 'dren gyis gtses
250a6(rgyud): shing zin pa bkrus te dbang bskur na dpal dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /'dis dbang bskur na sdig pa kun las grol bar 'gyur te/ dkyil 'khor gyi las dang / gdon
250a7(rgyud): gyis las rnams kyang byed par 'gyur ro/ /rma bya'i mjug ma la lan 'bum bzlas brjod byas na dug thams cad sel bar 'gyur ro/ /de nyid kyis rims dang / mig
250b1(rgyud): gi nad dang / gzer thabs la sogs pa sel bar byed do/ /srung ba'i skud pas ni nad thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro/ /phyag rgya dang ldan pa'i ji skad gsungs pa'i sngags kyis
250b2(rgyud): seng ldeng gi yam shing la zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na lha ma yin gyi sngags 'joms par byed do/ /dus gsum du nyin mtshan
250b3(rgyud): nyi shu rtsa gcig la 'bras thug po che la zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyi btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na longs spyod thob par 'gyur ro/ /lha dbang du bya bar 'dod na
250b4(rgyud): a ga ru'i yam shing la zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg dus gsum du nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig la stong rtsa brgyad bya'o/ /'bras thug po che la zho
250b5(rgyud): dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pa gcig tu byas pas sbyin sreg byas na zas mi zad par 'gyur ro/ /gnod sbyin dbang du byed na gu gul gyi ril bu la zho dang / sbrang rtsi
250b6(rgyud): dang / mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad bya'o/ /shing mya ngan med kyi yam shing gis ni gnod sbyin mo rnams la bya'o/ /klu rnams la ni klu shing gi me tog
250b7(rgyud): gis bya'o/ /'phags pa phyag na rdo rje la ni a ga ru'i yam shing gis bya'o/ /rig pa 'dzin pa la ni po son cha'i shing gi yam shing gis so/ /sa ga ru'i yam shing la du
251a1(rgyud): ru ska'i 'bru mar gyis btags pas ni dri za la sbyin sreg bya'o/ /yi dwags rnams ni bil ba'i shing gi yam shing gi so/ /mi 'am ci rnams la ni
251a2(rgyud): sra rtsi pog gi sbyin sreg gis so/ /log 'dren thams cad la ni zhag bdun du sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o/ /rgyal po'i bu la ni yungs kar til mar gyis btags pa dus
251a3(rgyud): gsum du zhag bdun la sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad bya zhing nyi ma la mngon du phyogs nas bzlas brjod 'bum byas na sdig pa thams cad las rab tu grol bar 'gyur ro/ /rig
251a4(rgyud): pa thams cad tshim par byed par 'dod na ba gcin dang / nas kyi kha zas za zhing rtswa u shi ra las gzugs brnyan byas te/ me tog dkar pos mchod cing 'o ma brgya rtsa
251a5(rgyud): brgyad kyis sbyin sreg byas nas 'o mas khrus byas te bzlas pa brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas shing / a ga ru'i dud pas bdugs na tshim zhing rgyas par byas par 'gyur ro/ /lan
251a6(rgyud): gcig bzlas pas bdag bsrung ba byas par 'gyur ro/ /lan gnyis bzlas pas gzhan bsrung ba byas par 'gyur ro/ /lan gsum bzlas pa byas pas rdzas bsrung ba

251b1(rgyud): brnyan du byas te me tog dkar pos mchod la/ 'dis gtsug tor gyi rgyal po'i ras ris kyi mdun du yungs kar gyi rgyal po la zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags la sbyin

251b4(rgyud): sha'i stan de nyid du gnyid log na rmi lam du 'ongs te 'bras bu med pa'i rgyu ston par 'gyur ro/ /ci ste me tog pad+ma bsgrub par 'dod na tsan+dan dmar po las pad+ma byas te
251b5(rgyud): mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas zhag gsum smyung ba byas te/ pad+ma lag pa g.yas pas bzung la ji srid 'bar ba de srid kyi bar du bzlas pa byas na g.yog 'khor nyi shu dang nam

251b7(rgyud): ci ste rdo rje bsgrub par 'dod na grog mkhar gyi sa dang / bye ma bsres nas rdo rje byas la bslangs pa'i kha zas kyis 'tsho zhing mi smra ba'i dka' thub dang / lam 'gog par byed
252a1(rgyud): cing rdo rje bzung ste myur du bzlas pa 'bum bya'o/ /rdo rje ni rtse gcig bar byas te/ rdo rje de yungs kar gyi nang du gzhag la/ yungs kar de ji srid du tsi ti'i
252a2(rgyud): tsi ti'i sgra sgrogs ba de srid du bzlas pa byas na rdo rje 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje de blangs nas las thams cad byed par 'gyur te/ ri'i rtse mo yang phye mar byed la/ klu'i shing yang
252a3(rgyud): skems par byed cing chu bo yang rgyun phyogs las zlog par byed do/ /klu rnams 'byer bar byed do/ /dug rnams dug med par byed do/ /srog chags thams cad rengs par
252a4(rgyud): byed do/ /rmongs par byed do/ /ltung bar byed do/ /sngags phye mar byed do/ /shing rta la sogs pa yang rengs par byed do/ /de la sogs pa'i las thams cad byed par 'di

252a6(rgyud): rgyas kyi spyan gyi sngags kyis thog ma dang / tha mar lan re re bzlas pa byas na de dag zhi ba nyid du 'gyur zhing grub pa yang mngon sum du 'gyur ro/ /de nas rgya mtsho chen
252a7(rgyud): por 'bab pa'i chu bo la yi ge gcig pas pad+ma 'bum dor na dpal rang 'ongs nas mchog dang / rgyal srid kyang sbyin par byed do/ /ci ste 'bru gcig pa dang bcas
252b1(rgyud): pa'i pad+ma 'bum phrag gsum dor nas kun la dbang ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/ /lnga 'bum bzlas na dzam+bu'i gling gi bdag por 'gyur ro/ /sa 'og tu 'jug pa'i sgor rkang pa bzhag
252b2(rgyud): ste 'bum phrag gsum bzlas na 'khrul 'khor thams cad bcom nas dogs pa med par 'gyur zhing / zhugs nas kyang bcud kyis len thams cad 'byin par 'gyur ro/ /ci ste de
252b3(rgyud): nyid du 'dug na'ang khyab 'jug gi 'khor lo'i 'jigs pa med par 'gyur ro/ /ci ste 'khor lo nang du byung na'ang sngags dran pa tsam gyis thal bar 'gyur ro/ /bsams pa
252b4(rgyud): tsam gyis phyir gso bar yang nus so/ /nam yang phyis rab tu 'jug par yang mi 'gyur ro/ /yar ngo de dang / de'i tshes gcig nas brtsams te dus gsum du sna ma'i me tog
252b5(rgyud): la lan gcig bzlas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi mthe bo'i drung du gzhag pa byas nas/ ji tsam na zhabs kyi mthe bong nas 'od zer byung nas sgrub pa po de'i lus la
252b6(rgyud): zhugs par gyur gyi bar du byas na/ de'i mod kho na la skra 'khyil zhing 'khor dang ldan par yang 'gyur ro/ /'khor dang bcas pa nam mkha' la 'gro zhing rig pa 'dzin pa'i
252b7(rgyud): rgyal por yang 'gyur ro/ /bskal par yang gnas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas rgya mtsho'i ngogs su ras ris nub phyogs su bstan te bzhag la klu shing gis me rab tu spar nas
253a1(rgyud): rgya mtsho la dmigs nas klu shing gi me tog gis sbyin sreg 'bum byas na rgya mtsho'i rlabs 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de ni grub pa'i mtshan ma yin pas 'jigs
253a2(rgyud): par mi bya'o/ /ji srid rgya mtsho las bram ze'i gzugs kyis 'ong bar 'gyur te/ bdag gis ci zhig bya zhes smra ba na khyod nga'i dbang du gyis shig ces bya bar smra bar bya'o/ /de
253a3(rgyud): nas gang ci bsgo ba de thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /sa la pad+ma 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa bris te/ de'i steng du 'dug nas brgya phrag stong bzlas pa byas na pad+ma de sa las
253a4(rgyud): 'phags nas g.yog 'khor stong dang bcas pa nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /bskal pa chen por gnas pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal por yang 'gyur ro/ /lam gcod
253a5(rgyud): par yang mi nus so/ /'od dpag tshad lngar snang bar byed par 'gyur ro/ /cho 'phrul chen po'i zla ba phyed la sna ma'i me tog dang ldan pa re res bzlas shing / bcom ldan

253a7(rgyud): kho na la mngon par shes pa lnga thob par 'gyur ro/ /'bum phrag bcu bzlas pa byas na ji lta ji ltar rab tu sbyar ba de lta de ltar las byed par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das

253b7(rgyud): ba'i bum pa blangs nas dri zhim po thams cad kyi lde gus byugs te/ tsan+dan dkar po dang / chu'i nang du bcug ste/ stong rtsa brgyad mngon par sngags pa byas nas gal te gter

254b6(rgyud): dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / nyan thos dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ bstan pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nor

255a1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'das shing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag stongs ba na dam pa'i chos kyi tshul nub pa'i dus tshod na de

255b4(rgyud): 'grub pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ sngags zlos pa thams cad kyis kyang nges par tshe dang / ye shes dpag tu med pa rnam par nges pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po bcom ldan 'das de

255b6(rgyud): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin du de nas 'od dpag med dang / rin chen tog la phyag bya'o/ /de nas
255b7(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag byas nas ci 'dod ba'i sngags bzlas ba byas na myur du grub pa stsol bar 'gyur te / gang gi phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa gsum gyi
256a1(rgyud): mtshan yongs su bsgrags pa dang / phyag 'tshal bas ni bsod nams chen po 'phel ba'i phyir dang / de bzhin gshegs ba thams cad la yang phyag
256a2(rgyud): 'tshal bas na nges par byang chub la gzhol ba dang / dge ba'i tshogs 'di yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i grangs su 'gro zhing de'i sngags kyang
256a3(rgyud): myur du 'grub pa stsol par 'gyur ro/ /tshe dang / ye shes dpag tu med pa rnam par nges pa'i dbang bo'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
256a4(rgyud): pa'i sangs rgyas kyis yi ge gcig pa'i sngags 'di gsungs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po dang / sngags dang / rgyud thams cad kyi mngon par 'dod
256a5(rgyud): pa| sngags thams cad kyi don sgrub par byed pa/ 'jam pa'i dbyangs khyod kyi cho ga'i rgyal po mchog tu gtsang ba dang / gtsang ba dam pa dang / 'jig rten rnams la
256a6(rgyud): phan pa'i phyir rab tu sbyar bar bya'o/ /slob ma ma yin pa dang / chos dang mi ldan pa dang / de bzhin du ston pa dang / bstan pa la ma dad pa dang / gzhan gyis pham pa
256a7(rgyud): dang / ma rungs pa dang / nga rgyal can dang / ston pa dang / /bstan pa la nyes ba tshol ba la ni nam yang rab tu sbyar bar mi bya'o/ /rgyal ba'i sras la rab tu mi dang pa dang /
256b1(rgyud): nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams la yang mchod pa dang / rjes su gzung ba mi bzod pa de la ni ngas sbyin par mi bya'o/ /de la ni sngags grub pa mi snang ste/ dad cing zhi ba'i
256b2(rgyud): sems ldan dang / /sangs rgyas bstan la rab tu dad/ /byang chub sems la rtag tu ni/ /mchod dang rjes gzung de gtsor byed/ /de la sngags 'di 'grub 'gyur zhes/ /cho ga 'dir
256b3(rgyud): ni yang dag bstan/ /sngags chen yi ge gcig pa ni/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis nges par sbyar/ /'jig rten mgon 'dis sngags 'di ni/ /re ba skyed byed stsol ba yin/ /sangs
256b4(rgyud): rgya kun gyi snying po yin/ /sngags rnams ma lus 'byung ba'i gnas/ /bdun cu rtsa drug bye ba ni/ /rang byung nyid kyis sngon gsungs pa/ /lus can sdig pas rmongs rnams la//
256b5(rgyud): sngags rnams dge ba'i don du yin/ /de bzhin gshegs rnams kun gyi sngags/ /ston pa'i gzugs su yang dag gnas/ /de dag la 'di snying por gyur/ /rig pa'i rgyal po rdzu
256b6(rgyud): 'phrul che/ /yi ge gcig bor rtag par gnas/ /ther zug tu yang 'di rab 'jug/ 'dir ni chos kyi mthar gnas te/ /'gro la phan phyir sangs rgyas yin/ /chos kyi tshul la
256b7(rgyud): yang dag gnas/ /'di ni yi ge gcig pa yin/ /sngags ni don rnams ma lus sgrub/ /rgyal po ma rungs zlog byed yin/ /las ni sna tshogs byed pa yin/ /las kun ma lus
257a1(rgyud): sgrub pa'o/ /las ni rtsa brgyad stong po rnams/ /nges par yang ni byed par 'gyur/ /cho ga mthong ba'i las kyis ni/ /phun sum tshogs pa sna tshogs ster//
257a2(rgyud): 'jam dpal gyi ni snying po ni/ /yi ge ma dang yang dag ldan/ /yi ge u dang rtag 'gro zhes/ /'jig rten na ni rtag 'jug 'gyur/ /tshe dang ye shes dpag med rgyal/ /dpang pos
257a3(rgyud): nges pa'i don du gsungs/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs la sangs rgyas kyis/ /dbang gi don du 'di rab sbyin/ /des na dus mtha'i 'jig rten 'dir/ /ston pa mya ngan 'das pa na/ /cho
257a4(rgyud): ga mthong ba'i rgyu yis ni/ /myur du grub par 'gro bar 'gyur/ /tshe ni dpag med ces bya bas/ /rnam par brtags par gyur pa yin/ /der ni bcom ldan sangs rgyas te/ /
257a5(rgyud): chos kyi 'khor lo skor byed pa/ /dpag med bskal par gnas pa dang / /tshe la dbang bar byin gyis brlabs/ /de nyid phyir na de mtshan gyur/ /dpag med tshe dang ye shes
257a6(rgyud): des/ /'jig rten kun gyi rgyal po'i dbang / /rdzu 'phrul che 'di de bzhin gshegs/ /des ni sngags mchog gtso 'di byin/ /sangs rgyas sras po blo dang ldan/ /sras kyi
257a7(rgyud): gtso bo dam pa ni/ /rdzu 'phrul che zhing stobs kyang che/ /de nas sras po de nyid kyis/ /'di ni kun tu bzang la sbyor/ /de nas sangs rgyas sras rnams la/ /de ni de bzhin
257b1(rgyud): gshegs dag gis/ /sngags rnams kyis ni mchog gyur pa/ /chos kyi rgyal pos gsungs pa ni/ /'byung po rnams la phan don du/ /sngags rnams ma lus gsungs pa yin/ /
257b2(rgyud): tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa rnam par nges pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sa
257b3(rgyud): la'i dbang po'i rgyal po tshe dpag tu med pa dang / 'od dpag tu med pa dang / rin chen tog la sogs pa sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de rnams la phyag 'tshal
257b4(rgyud): nas lan gsum sngags bzlas par bya'o/ /yi ge gcig po de gang zhe na/ mu/ grogs pa dag/ 'di ni tshe dang / ye shes dpag tu med pa rnam par gdon mi za ba'i dbang po'i
257b5(rgyud): rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bkod pa dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su bzhugs te/ gsungs
257b6(rgyud): ba ni sems can thams cad kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba'i phyir dang / skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i don dang / ma 'ongs pa'i skye bo dag la
257b7(rgyud): gzigs nas/ bstan pa nub pa'i dus tshod du mkhyen nas dus kyi tha ma la dkon mchog gsum la gnod pa byed ba'i ma rungs pa'i rgyal po bzlog pa'i phyir dang / de
258a1(rgyud): b zhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi sras kyi gtso bo mthu chen po thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po la sbyin pa'i phyir
258a2(rgyud): dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis kun tu bzang po la byin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po des kyang 'jam dpal gzhon
258a3(rgyud): nur gyur pa la byin no/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa des kyang sems can thams cad rjes su gzung ba'i phyir snying rje chen po'i dbang gis snying gi gnas su
258a4(rgyud): rang gi lus la bzhag go/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus la bltos nas dus kyi tha ma bstan pa nub pa'i dus tshod la de bzhin gshegs pa'i tha ma bdag gis kyang bstan te/ rtsod
258a5(rgyud): pa'i dus dang / bstan pa 'jig pa'i dus su nga'i bstan pa yang dag par bsrung ba'i don byed par 'gyur ro/ /'di'i cho ga gzhan yang mdor bsdus nas brjod par bya
258a6(rgyud): ba ni/ 'jam pa'i dbyangs gzhon nu nyon cig/ bdag nyid chen po'i cho ga rgya che ba 'di'i cho ga'i rgyal po'i dbang po brjod par bya ste/ dang por re zhig ri'i rtse mor
258a7(rgyud): 'dzegs te 'bum phrag sum cu bzlas pa byas na sngar bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro/ /'o mas 'tsho zhing mi smras ba'i brtul zhugs dang / sngags gzhan la mi rten pa
258b1(rgyud): dang / gzhan la mi sems pa dang / skyabs gsum yongs su blangs pa dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed ba dang / khrims lnga'i sdom pa yang dag par blangs ba dang / byang chub sems
258b2(rgyud): dpa'i sdom pa yang dag par blangs pas bzlas pa byas la/ des las rnams bya ba ste/ dang por re zhig ras la ri mo bya ba ni ri mo mkhan gso sbyong byas la tshon ma 'dres pa dag gis
258b3(rgyud): bri'o/ /gtsang ma'i ras kyi dum bu gang yang rung ba'am/ der la tsan+dan dang / ga bur dang / gur gum gyis chus gtor la/ gtsang ba'i sa phyogs su gtsang ba'i ri mo byed pa dkar
258b4(rgyud): gsum za zhing gos dkar po gyon pas zla ba nya ba'i bco lnga la nyi ma 'char ba'i dus su rnam par dag pa'i rgyu skar la nyi ma phyed pa'i bar du bya ste/ de nas bri ba spangs par
258b5(rgyud): bya'o/ /de bzhin du nyin re zhing yang yongs su rdzogs kyi bar du bya'o/ /dang por re zhig ras la tshe dpag tu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams bri bar bya'o/ /ras khru gang tsam mam/
258b6(rgyud): bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang gi tshad dam/ ras khru bzhi pa la khor yug tu tshe dpag tu med ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams bri'o/ /pad+ma rA ga dang / in+d+ra nI la dang / shel
258b7(rgyud): dang / rin po che margad kyis ras ris kyi 'og gi phyogs su mdzes bar bya'o/ /de dag gi phyogs su rin po che'i zhal med khang mdzes ba'i rnam ba dang / rgyal mtshan dang /
259a1(rgyud): ba dan mdzes pa'i rnam par bsgreng ba dang / de'i dbus su tshe dpag tu med pa rnam par gdon mi za ba'i dbang po'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa
259a2(rgyud): chos 'chad pa seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa kun nas 'od kyi phreng ba rab tu 'bar ba/ kha dog cung zad dmar zhing dkar ba/ g.yon phyogs su mthing shing gi rdo la bzhugs
259a3(rgyud): pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob phyag g.yas na rnga yab thogs shing de bzhin gshegs pa la gtod pa'i lta ba dang / lag pa g.yon na skyur
259a4(rgyud): rtsi chen po'i shing thog thogs pa/ me tog pri yang ku ltar sngo bsangs/ gzhon nu'i rgyan gyis lus brgyan pa/ kun nas 'khor yug tu 'od 'phro ba/ g.yas ngos su byang chub
259a5(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po rin po che'i ri la bzhugs pa/ lag pa g.yas pa na rnga yab thogs shing g.yob pa/ lag pa g.yon pa na rin po che
259a6(rgyud): thogs pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ rin po che'i cod pan gyis brgyan pa/ me tog pri yang ku ltar cung zad dkar ba/ ras sngon po g.yo ba dang ldan pas g.yogs
259a7(rgyud): pa| mu tig gi phreng ba dang / rin po ches mchod phyir thogs byas pa/ khor yug rab tu 'bar bas 'brel ba/ de'i g.yas ngos su 'phags pa 'jam dpal rin po che'i
259b1(rgyud): ril gnas pa/ gzhon nur gyur pa/ zur phud lngas mgo legs par mdzes par byas pa/ byis pa gzhon nu'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ gser gyi mdog dang 'dra ba/ dar sngon po g.yo ba can
259b2(rgyud): mnabs pa/ mu tig gi phreng ba dang / rin po che 'dzin cing 'dres pa'i mchod phyir thogs byas pa/ de bzhin gshegs par song ba'i lta ba/ cung zad bzhin 'dzum pa dang ldan pa/ zhi
259b3(rgyud): ba'i rnam pa/ gzugs mdzes pa dang / thal mo sbyar ba/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa bri bar bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu rtags dang / cha byad dang / dbyibs 'dzin pa'i sgrub pa
259b4(rgyud): po me tog gi phreng ba 'dzin cing / pus mo'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas yang dag par 'dug pa dang / mgo mngon par btud pa ras ris kyi zur kyi mtha' ma'i phyogs su bri bar bya'o//
259b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhi bri bar bya'o/ /g.yas phyogs su de bzhin gshegs pa gnyis bri bar bya ba la sA la'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang / rin
259b6(rgyud): chen tog khor yug tu kun nas 'bar ba'i 'od dang ldan pa/ g.yon phyogs su gser thab dang / 'od srung rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang dan pa/ me tog thams cad kyis gca'
259b7(rgyud): bkram pa/ pad+ma'i gdan gnyis la bzhugs pa/ ha cang mi ring ba na cho ga 'chad cing skyil mo krung gis bzhugs ba/ zhi ba'i rnam pa dang ldan pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi steng nas
260a1(rgyud): me tog gi char rab tu 'bebs pa/ sprin gyi nang nas ro stong byung ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nam mkha' la lding ba spyan mdzes zhes bya ba mngon
260a2(rgyud): par bri bar bya ba ni rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan ba/ kun nas 'bar ba'i 'od kyi phreng ba dag ldan pa/ phyag g.yas pas mchog sbyin pa/ phyag g.yon pas chos gos
260a3(rgyud): kyi mtha' ma la 'dzin pa 'di ni tshe dang / ye shes dpag tu med pa rnam par gdon mi za ba'i rgyal bo'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
260a4(rgyud): pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ras ris cho ga bcom ldan 'das 'di nyid yi ge gcig pa'i sngags kyi mchog 'di yin te/ 'di ni gtsug tor gyi rgyal po gtsug tor 'khor los
260a5(rgyud): bsgyur ba dang rab tu 'gran pa/ brtson 'grus mtshungs pa/ stobs mtshungs pa 'di'i yon tan rgya che ba'i mthu ni bsam gyi mi khyab ste/ rdzu 'phrul che zhing stobs che
260a6(rgyud): ba| mdor na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor gyi rgyal po 'khor los bsgyur ba yin no/ /yi ge gcig pa la cho ga rgya cher bstan pa gang yin pa de
260a7(rgyud): thams cad kyang byed do/ /ma bsgrubs kyang bzlas pa tsam gyis kyang las byed na bsgrubs pas lta smos kyang ci dgos/ ji ltar 'dod pa'i 'bras bu phun sum
260b1(rgyud): tshogs pa dang / 'dod pa yang thob par 'gyur ro/ /yid kyis gang mngon par 'dod pa de ras ris mthong ba tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /nges par byang chub la gzhol bar
260b2(rgyud): 'gyur ro/ /de nyid bcom ldan 'das tshe dang / ye shes dpag tu med pa rnam par gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po'i dbang pos byin gyis brlabs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams
260b3(rgyud): cad kyi snying po zhes brjod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor gyi rgyal po zhes brjod do/ /'khor los bsgyur ba zhes brjod do/ /'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal
260b4(rgyud): po chen po zhes brjod do/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba'i snying po zhes brjod do/ /yi ge gcig pa zhes brjod do/ /mdor na 'di'i mthu ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ gang gi
260b5(rgyud): phyir sangs rgyas rnams kyi byin gyis brlabs pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /sgrub pa mod pa dang / sngon du spyod
260b6(rgyud): pa ma byas pa dang / khyim gyi rtsom pa thams cad la rab tu gnas pa dang / bza' ba thams cad sha dang / chang dang / grong gi chos la rab tu zhugs pa dag la'ang 'grub ste/
260b7(rgyud): dad pa med ba dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed ba med pa ni ma gtogs te/ 'di dag la ni grub pa med do/ /dkon mchog gsum la gnod pa byed pa dang / de la zhugs pa
261a1(rgyud): la gnod byed pa dang / 'di dag la yang las phra mo yang grub pa med na grub pa 'bring dang / rab la ni lta smos kyang ci dgos/ 'dod pa thams cad
261a2(rgyud): dang / bza' ba dang / spyod pa gtsor byed pa'i sgrub pa po la ni las stong rtsa brgyad kyi las phran tshogs la rab tu sbyar bas 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de dag kyang gang zhe na/ dang por
261a3(rgyud): re zhig lan gcig bzlas pas bdag bsrung ngo / /lan gnyis bzlas pas gzhan bsrung bar 'gyur ro/ /lan gsum bzlas pas srung ba dam par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems
261a4(rgyud): dpa' chen po sa bcu la rab tu gnas pas kyang yang dag par bskyod par mi nus na/ de las gzhan pa'i sems can gyis lta smos kyang ci dgos/ tshon sna lnga'i skud pa la
261a5(rgyud): lan bzhi bzlas nas rked par bcings na sa bon bsdams par 'gyur ba yin te/ rmi lam na yang 'di la sa bon 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rang 'dod pa ni ma gtogs te/
261a6(rgyud): de nyin bar ram/ mtshan mo gcig la gal te 'dod pa na nyi ma re re zhing bya'o/ /ci ste mi 'dod na thal ba la lan bdun sngags pa byas nas lte ba'i phyogs su bskus na zhag
261a7(rgyud): bdun phrag gsum du sa bon bsdams pa byas par 'gyur ro/ /lan lnga bzlas te sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsgoms na gang la reg pa de dbang du 'gyur ro/ /zla ba gzas
261b1(rgyud): zin cing zla ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad 'dzin pa na shing ar ka'i me rab tu sbar la/ ras ris mad kyang shar du mngon par bltas te mar gyi sreg blugs stong phrag bcus sbyin
261b2(rgyud): sreg bya'o/ /rgyal po'i pho brang dang nye ba chu bos bar ma bcad pa/ lha'i gnas su ma byas pa/ phyogs gang du rgyal po gnas pa de dang nye bar sbyin sreg rab tu sbyar na tho rangs rgyal po
261b3(rgyud): dbang du 'gyur ro/ /gang smras pa de thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /gal te dbang du ma gyur pa de'i tshe de'i sems phyin ci log tu 'gyur ba'am/ sems g.yeng ba thob par 'gyur
261b4(rgyud): na phyir yang bzlog par bya ste/ 'o ma'i sreg blugs stong rtsa brgyad kyis sbyin sreg byas na/ gang de'i dus de nas brtsams nas rang bzhin du gnas par 'gyur ro/ /las de dag ni dad
261b5(rgyud): pa dang ldan pa dang / dkon mchog gsum la dad pa dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa rnams la ni mi bya ste/ gal te byed na shin tu bsod nams ma yin pa'i phung po chen po
261b6(rgyud): 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /gzhan dag la gnod pa byed pa ma rungs pa'i sems dang / drag po'i sems dang ldan pa rnams la ni bya ba yin no/ /nyin re zhing yang mthong ba sbyin par
261b7(rgyud): byas na sems zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te zhi bar ma gyur na phung khrol chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /srog ni lhag ma tsam lus par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang las su 'gyur
262a1(rgyud): b a ni zla ba gzas zin gyi dus su shing pa la sha'i yam shing gis me rab tu sbar te mar gyi sreg blugs stong rtsa brgyad byas na tho rangs yul gyi bdag
262a2(rgyud): po'i rgyal po spyan drangs par 'gyur ro/ /de dang lhan cig gros byas na bsam pa bden pa nye bar ston par 'gyur te/ de la bstan dag byas na zla ba drug gi nang du bsod nams stong
262a3(rgyud): yod pa'i grong ster bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te mtshan phyed du sbyin sreg byas na zla ba gsum gyis ster bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te thun thams cad kyi mtshan mo sbyin sreg byas na zla ba
262a4(rgyud): gcig gis thob par 'gyur ro/ /gal te zla gcig gi mtshan mo re re la sbyin sreg byas na yul thob par 'gyur ro/ /yang na yul dang 'dra ba'i grong ngam/ yang na gzhan cung
262a5(rgyud): zad nor yod pa la'ang dgra yod par mi 'gyur te/ gal te dgra yod na'ang las rnam byas pa yin te zla ba gzas zin pa na shing a pa margas me rab tu sbyar la/ shing pa la sha'i
262a6(rgyud): yam shing la zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pas bram ze'i skra la sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad bya'o/ /de'i tha mar shing bi tsu ma rda'i lo ma la ske tshe'i 'bru mar gyis brtags
262a7(rgyud): pa'i sreg blugs kyis sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na tho rangs bram ze'i dgra zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te rgyal po sdang bar gyur na las gzhan yang yod de/ zla ba gzas zin pa
262b1(rgyud): la shing ji snyed pas me rab tu sbar la mar gyi sreg blugs kyis sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas la/ sbyin sreg gi tha mar phyogs gang na rgyal po yod pa de phyogs su thal ba de gtor na de
262b2(rgyud): dbang du 'gyur ro/ /dus gang la longs spyod gang 'dod pa rgya che ba de dag gi grogs kyang byed par 'gyur ro/ /grong nyung ba'am/ /mang po rab tu ster bar 'gyur te/ nges par zla ba drug gis
262b3(rgyud): don yod par 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de nas rigs bzhi las gang yang rung ba rtags gtso bo dang ldan pa'am/ lha gzhan nam/ 'jig rten pa la dad pa dag sems 'khrug par gyur na
262b4(rgyud): phyogs gang na gnas pa der thal ba de gtor na yul gzhan du 'gro bar 'gyur ba'am/ skyo bar 'gyur ba'am/ mtshan mo glal bar 'gyur ba 'am/ nye du la gnod par 'gyur ro/ /de'i
262b5(rgyud): phyir gso ba ni 'o ma'i sreg blugs stong rtsa brgyad kyis sbyin sreg byas na sos par 'gyur ro/ /yang na gza' bzhi po nyid kyi tshogs sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sku gzugs
262b6(rgyud): dang / ras ris sam/ dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam mam/ sku gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten la gos gtsang ma bgos shing nyin zhag gcig smyung pa byas te/ srog chags med pa'i
262b7(rgyud): chus las bya zhing / me tog dkar po dri zhim po dang / gur gum dang ldan pa dang / ga bur gyi dud pas bdug par bya'o/ /gang du las la sbyar ba ni bram ze'i dgra la ni shing pa la shas
263a1(rgyud): bya'o/ /rgyal rigs kyi dgra la ni shing a shwa twas bya'o/ /rje'u rigs kyi dgra la ni shing seng ldeng gis bya'o/ /dmangs rigs kyi dgra la ni de las gzhan pa'i
263a2(rgyud): shing gis me rab tu sbar la de nyid kyi las bya'o/ /bram ze la ni shing pa la sha'i yam shing dang / rgyal rigs la ni a shwat+tha'i yam shing dang / rje'u rigs la ni seng ldeng gi yam
263a3(rgyud): shing dang / dmangs rigs la ni a pa marga'i yam shing ngam/ de las gzhan ji snyed pas mar gyi sbyin sreg bya'o/ /de bzhin du las gzhan yang bya ba ni rgyal po chen po la ni shing
263a4(rgyud): a pa ri dzi ta'i rtsa ba'i yam shing dang / mar gyi sreg blugs stong rtsa brgyad kyis sbyin sreg bya'o/ /tha mar yang de nyid kyi thal bas gtor bar bya'o/ /gang gi phyogs nas sdang ba'i sems
263a5(rgyud): dang ldan pa 'ong ba de'i phyogs su gtsug tor 'khor los bsgyur ba'i yi ge gcig pa'i phyag rgya bcings nas gtor ro/ /yang na ut+pa la'i phyag rgya bcings na de 'jigs na ldog
263a6(rgyud): pa'am/ dmag gi tshogs nyams par 'gyur ba'am/ gzhan gang cung zad rnam par ltung ba chen por 'gyur ba'am/ 'gro ba'i nad chen po'am/ sems sdug bsngal bar gnas
263a7(rgyud): pa'am/ gang gis 'di'i ngag ldog par 'gyur ba'am/ 'di dag dang / gzhan yang / ji ltar 'dod pa'i las rnams byed par 'gyur ro/ /gos la mngon par sngags te bgos
263b1(rgyud): na skal pa bzang por 'gyur ro/ /mig sman la mngon par sngags te mig la bskus na skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /mig dang / gdong la lan bdun bsngags pa byas la khros pa'i
263b2(rgyud): gdong la bltas na zhi ba dang / dbang du 'gyur ro/ /me tog dang / 'bras bu'am/ gzhan gang cung zad dri zhim pa la lan bdun mngon par sngags pa byas la rgyal po la byin na de bsnams
263b3(rgyud): pa tsam gyis dbang du 'gyur ro/ /gzhan sems can gang la la mthong ba tsam gyis de dbang du 'gyur ro/ /yan lag thams cad na ba la brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bzlas pa byas la chu
263b4(rgyud): dron mos khrus byas na bde legs su gnas par 'gyur te/ las 'di rnams ni bya ba yin no/ /sems can sdug bsngal ba thams cad dang / mgon med par gyur pa dang / bkren pa
263b5(rgyud): dang / bstan pa 'di'i brtul zhugs can dang / dkon mchog gsum la dad pa la ni 'di lta bu'i las mi bya'o/ /bud med la yang las mi bya'o/ /de bzhin du byis pa dang / rgan po dang
263b6(rgyud): nad pa dang / dbul po dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / sems can phra mo dang / skye gnas phan par skyes pa 'di dag la'ang mi bya ste/ las 'di dag ni sems can chen po dag la rab
263b7(rgyud): tu sbyar bar bya'o/ /dpa' zhing brkam chags bab tshol med/ /phyogs chen por ni che ba dang / /mngon pa'i nga rgyal rab gtum la /las ni 'di 'dra bya ba yin/ /bstan la zhe sdang khro
264a1(rgyud): ba dang / /gzhan gyi nor ni 'phrog byed dang / /sngags rnams kun dang sman rnams dang / /rnal 'byor ldan la ma dad pa/ /spyos brtsam gdug pa'i sems ldan
264a2(rgyud): dang / /'jig rten gyis smad rgyal po ste/ /'di dag la ni las sbyar ba/ /chos dang ldan la rnam par spangs/ /las rnams gzhan yang 'di skad brjod/ /blo yis de ni yongs su
264a3(rgyud): spang / /de nyid khros pas thal ba ni/ /bzlas pas phyogs su gtor byas na/ /de rnams dgra ni rab khros dang / /rgyal po dag kyang rnam 'jig 'gyur/ /nges par skye bo de dag kyang //

264b1(rgyud): pas bstan pa yin/ /sangs rgyas thugs ni dag pa yis/ /gdug pa'i las 'di gsung mi 'gyur/ /srog la gnod par byed pa'i las/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis smad pa yin/ /grub pa

264b4(rgyud): ba'i las rnams ni/ /'dres pa dag tu rnam par smin/ /de bzhin las 'di sna tshogs su/ /de nyid sangs rgyas gzigs pa yi/ /thugs rje can gyis gsungs pa'o/ /de las zlos pa spang

265a1(rgyud): par bya/ /zlos pa dge la gnas pa la/ /de yi sngags ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /dkar po'i las la gzhol byed la/ /de yi thar ba mi ldog 'gyur/ /sngags kyis
265a2(rgyud): dge ba 'grub 'gyur zhes/ /de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu gsungs/ /las rnams sna tshogs gsungs pa ni/ /sgrub pa rnams la bsdus don yin/ /ci 'dod las ni stong phrag

270b5(rgyud): byug pa byas na nad las grol bar 'gyur ro/ /mig gi nad la ni zar ma'i me tog gis sbyin sreg byas na nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /ras ris kyi cho ga'i las gzhan yang sngar bstan
270b6(rgyud): pa'i cho gas ras ma nyams pa skra med pa la 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'drir gzhug par bya ste/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ kha dog dmar ba/ gzhon
270b7(rgyud): nu'i gzugs can/ pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa/ g.yas ngos su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug/ g.yon ngos su kun tu bzang po 'phags pa 'jam dpal las cung
271a1(rgyud): zad chung ba/ ras ris de bzhag la bzlas pa bye ba byas na rgyal por 'gyur ro/ /tsan+dan gyi yam shing la gur gum gyis btags pas sbyin sreg
271a2(rgyud): 'bum byas na rgyal por 'gyur ro/ /sna ma'i me tog mar gyis btags pas sbyin sreg bye ba byas na rgyal por 'gyur ro/ /gang gi tshad dang ldan pa'i pad+ma'i
271a3(rgyud): tshogs kyis sbyin sreg byas pa de'i tshad kyi ti na ra'i tshogs rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /ji srid du bzlas pa de tsam gyi tshad dang ldan pa'i ti na ra ma blangs pa de ni rig pa
271a4(rgyud): 'dzin pa'i 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro/ /go phye'i sbyin sreg 'bum byas na ti na ra stong sbyin par byed do/ /nad 'joms par byed pa'i 'bras bus sbyin
271a5(rgyud): sreg 'bum byas na nor bdag chen por 'gyur ro/ /gu gul gyi yam shing stong rtsa brgyad kyis sbyin sreg byas na nor dang / 'bru rnams thob par 'gyur ro/ /
271a6(rgyud): rtag tu til gyis sbyin sreg byas na 'bru rgyun mi 'chad par rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /ba lang gi lci ba las byung ba'i 'bras thug po che zho dang bcas pas sbyin sreg
271a7(rgyud): 'bum byas na ba stong thob par 'gyur ro/ /bo de tse'i 'bras bu dang / sho ma'i 'bras gcig tu byas te sbyin sreg byas na gang 'dod pa'i bu mo rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /
271b1(rgyud): sho ma'i lo mas sbyin sreg byas na 'dod pa thams cad thob par 'gyur ro/ /zar ma'i me tog la 'o mas btag pas sbyin sreg bya ba ni bram ze dbang du bya ba la'o//
271b2(rgyud): shing ka ra bI ra'i me tog la shing 'o ma can 'o ma med pas sbyin sreg bya ba ni rgyal rigs dang dbang du bya ba la'o/ /dong ka'i me tog gis sbyin sreg bya ba ni rgyal po dbang du
271b3(rgyud): bya ba la'o/ /b+ha du ra'i me tog gi sbyin sreg bya ba ni dmangs rigs dbang du bya ba la'o/ /shing arga'i me tog la zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pas sbyin sreg
271b4(rgyud): 'bum byas na nad thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/ /'di nyid kyi cho gas me tog dri zhim pa la lan 'bum bzlas te zhabs kyi drung du bzhag na rtag tu
271b5(rgyud): bde bar 'gyur ro/ /shing a shwat+ta'i yam shing gis me rab tu sbar la sha ma'i me tog gis sbyin sreg byas na rgyu skar gyi gnod pa nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /gi wang
271b6(rgyud): la sngags mngon par bris te spyi bo la bcings nas g.yul du 'jug na mtshon gyis reg par mi 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nu'i ras
271b7(rgyud): ris glang po che'i mtshog ma la bzhag ste dpung gi tshogs kyis sngon du btang na mthong ba tsam gyis gzhan gyi dpung 'jig par 'gyur ro/ /gzhon nu'i gzugs
272a1(rgyud): can gser gyi rma bya'i gdan la bzhugs pa byas te/ rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mor btags nas g.yul du zhugs na mthong ba nyid kyis gzhan gyi
272a2(rgyud): dpung 'jig par 'gyur ro/ /sna ma'i me tog la lan 'bum bzlas te zhabs drung du bzhag la/ de nyid ku sha bting ba'i stan byas na rmi lam du 'di la ji ltar 'dod
272a3(rgyud): pa ston par 'gyur ro/ /mar me stong la de bzhin du mar me re re la yang pad+ma'i skud pa'i snying po byas te/ shing mngar gyis dkri ba byas la me rab tu sbar nas

272a7(rgyud): du bu mo la kha zas sbyin par bya'o/ /glu dang / rol mo dang / glegs bam bklags par yang bya'o/ /bzlas pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang / me tog gsum gyis
272b1(rgyud): mchod yon gsol te slar gshegs su gsol lo/ /cho ga snga ma bzhin du spyan drangs pa dang / gshegs su gsol bar bya'o/ /pad+ma'i phyag rgya bcings nas ni bzlas pa bya'o//
272b2(rgyud): rgyal mtshan gyi phyag rgyas ni spyan drang bar bya'o/ /bkra shis ldan gyi phyag rgyas ni bzhugs su gsol lo/ /gang ba'i phyag rgyas ni mchod yon no/ /rtags gcig pa'i phyag
272b3(rgyud): rgyas ni me tog dbul lo/ /yid la re ba'i phyag rgyas ni mar me'o/ /g.yo ba'i phyag rgyas ni spos so/ /rma bya'i gdan gyi phyag rgyas ni dri'o/ /srog shing gi phyag rgyas ni bshos

272b6(rgyud): 'das byang chub sems dpas yongs su bskor ba chos 'chad pa mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /gang gi don du byed pa de nyid kyi las bya'o/ /gso sbyong byas shing yar ngo'i

273b6(rgyud): ro| |sman bram ha'i khu bcud mar dang ldan pa zangs ma'i snod du bzhag la/ bzlas pa khri rdzogs pa'i bar du bzlas nas de nas 'thungs na rgol ba thams cad
273b7(rgyud): las rnam par rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /shin tu zhe sdang ba la ni stong rtsa brgyad bong ba la mngon par sngags te khros pa'i mdun du bor na khro ba med par 'gyur ro/ /

278a5(rgyud): byas na sngar bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro/ /kha tshar gyi rtse mo ma bcad pa'i ras la ri mo mkhan gso sbyong byas pas/ tshon ma 'dres pa dag gis 'phags pa

278b1(rgyud): rig pa 'dzin pa gnyis phreng ba thogs shing sprin gyi nang nas byung bar bri bar bya'o/ /'og tu ni sgrub pa po lag na spos snod thogs pa'o/ /khor yug tu ni ri'i rtse mo'i
278b2(rgyud): 'og tu ni pad+ma'i mtsho 'drir gzhug par bya'o/ /sku gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten dang / ras ris nub tu bstan te rab tu gzhag la/ mchod pa rgya chen po byas
278b3(rgyud): nas mar me yang rab tu spar zhing sna ma'i me tog la re re la yang mngon par bzlas nas me tog stong rtsa brgyad 'jam dpal gyi zhal la gtor ro/ /de nas zab pa chen
278b4(rgyud): po'i yi ge hUM gi sgra thos pa'am/ ras ris rab tu 'gul bar 'gyur ro/ /yi ge hUM gi sgras ni sa kun la dbang ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/ /ras ris 'gul bas ni rgol
278b5(rgyud): ba thams cad la lan 'debs nus pa dang / 'jig rten pa thams cad kyi bstan bcos shes par 'gyur ro/ /ci ste ma grub kyang las thams cad la nus pa dang
278b6(rgyud): ldan par 'gyur ro/ /'di ni cho ga dang po'o/ /a ga ru'i yam shing sor phyed dang gnyis kyi tshad la du ruSh+ka'i thang chus sil ha ras btags pas seng ldeng gi mdag
278b7(rgyud): ma du ba med pa la mtshan thog thag tu sbyin sreg byas na skya reng 'char ba tsam na 'phags pa 'jam dpal mthong bar 'gyur zhing / des ci 'dod pa'i mchog stsol
279a1(rgyud): bar 'gyur te/ 'dod pa dbang du bya ba ni ma gtogs so/ /de nyid kyi ras ris kyi mdun du tsan+dan gyi spos kyi rgyun chad pa med par mtshan
279a2(rgyud): thog thag tu bdugs te bzlas pa byas na/ de'i 'og tu 'phags pa 'jam dpal mngon sum du gshegs te zab mo'i chos ston pa de la mos par 'gyur ro/ /

279a4(rgyud): d mar po las byas pa'i pad+ma rtsa lag dang bcas pa sor drug tsam tsan+dan dmar po'i 'de gus bskus nas lan stong sngags shing dgang gzar gyi lan stong blug
279a5(rgyud): pa byas la/ zla ba nya la ras ris kyi mdun du pad+ma'i snod bzhag la lag pas bzung nas ji srid rab tu 'bar ba de srid du bzlas pa byas na de bzung bas lo bcu
279a6(rgyud): drug gi na tshod dang / mdog gser btso ma 'dra ba dang / nyi ma bas lhag pa'i gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang / lha gzhon nu lta bur 'gyur ba dang / rig pa 'dzin pa
279a7(rgyud): thams cad kyis phyag byas pa dang / bskal pa chen por 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /lus zhig nas mngon par dga' bar skye bar 'gyur ro/ /zla ba gzas zin pa
279b1(rgyud): la shu dag dkar po blangs la ba'i rnam lngas bkrus te shing a shwat+tha'i lo mas bkab pa byas la/ ji srid drod dang / du ba 'thul ba dang / 'bar ba de srid kyi bar
279b2(rgyud): du bzlas pa byas na dro ba 'byung bas ni skye bo thams cad dbang du 'gyur ba dang / rgol ba thams cad las rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /du ba 'thul bas ni mi snang
279b3(rgyud): ba dang / stong phrag sum cur 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /'bar bas ni nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / bskal pa chen por 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /ba ser skya'i be'u
279b4(rgyud): dang bcas pa'i mar khu blangs la/ zangs ma'i snod du shing ashwat+tha'i lo ma bdun gyis bkab ste bzhag la/ ji srid grub pa rnam gsum thob pa de srid du
279b5(rgyud): bzlas pa byas la de 'thungs na thos pa 'dzin pa dang / mi snang bar 'gyur ba dang / nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /sman puskar mU la'i sa bon zla ba
279b6(rgyud): gzas zin pa la khar bcug nas ji srid du tsu lu tsu lu zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byung ba de srid du bzlas pa byas la/ sman de phyung nas lcags gsum gyis yongs su
279b7(rgyud): dkri ba byas la/ yang khar rab tu bcug na mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /sman de skyug na ni snang bar 'gyur ro/ /li shi dri zhim po khar bcug la bzlas pa 'bum byas
280a1(rgyud): na gang dang smra ba de dbang du 'gyur ro/ /'o ma dang / nas chan khyor gang za zhing bzlas pa 'bum phrag bcu gnyis byas na rig pa 'dzin

281b1(rgyud): dag kyang / /der ni 'grub par rab tu snang / /gnod sbyin lngas rtsen dag dang ni/ /'phrog ma gnod sbyin skye gnas dang / /gang dag dri za'i sngags rnams ni/ /de dag tu

286a5(rgyud): nges par byang chub chen po'ang de/ /nges par sangs rgyas nyid rigs nyid/ /de bzhin byang chub sems rigs dang / /rigs med nyid dang dus dang ni/ /
286a6(rgyud): sems can skal ldan brjod pa'ang yin/ /dam tshig gis ni mngon mtshon pas/ /bden pa kun ni des ston 'gyur/ /skad cig tsam ston rnal 'byor la/ /
286a7(rgyud): dus ring dus su sdod ma yin/ /skad cig de la gang cung zad/ /yid la bsams shing don du gnyer/ /myur du sngags grub kho na la/ /de dag thams cad ston
286b1(rgyud): par byed/ /ci 'dod mngon par re ba dag /phun sum tshogs pa thams cad thob/ /sngags pas slar ni gshegs gsol ba/ /myur du mchod yon phul nas 'gyel//
286b2(rgyud): cho ga mthong ba'i las kyis ni/ /snod ni yang dag bsrung ba bya/ /sems can lus ni 'gyel ba yang / /sa yi steng du nyal ba nyid/ /gtsug tor sngags dang ldan pa
286b3(rgyud): yi| |sngags ni cho gar gsungs pa dag / de nyid kyis ni bsrung ba dang / /phyag rgya gtsug phud lnga yis so/ /de tshe lus ni bde legs 'gyur/ /sa yi steng las ldang bar
286b4(rgyud): 'gyur/ /sems can kun la'ang 'jug pa yi/ /srung ba 'di ni rab tu brtag /snod la brten te 'tshe byed par/ /gdug pa'i sems can gyis mi nus/ /skye bo snod
286b5(rgyud): du gyur pa la/ /'di ni srung ba chen po yin/ /de yi tshig ni bar mar gnas/ /dbus kyi yul gyir rab tu bsgrags/ /lha yi skye gnas la brten pa'i/ /'og min gzugs
286b6(rgyud): dang ldan pa dang / /de dang de yi rtags rnams dang / /gzugs ni rab tu snang ba yin/ /'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug dang / /'dod dang ldan pa'i lha dag dang / /
286b7(rgyud): de las dman pa'i 'gro ba'i rtags/ /tshig nyid kyang ni shin tu snyan/ /de nas sa la gnas pa dang / /gzhal med khang gnas lha rnams kyi/ /tshig ni ku sha'i grong
287a1(rgyud): khyer mtshungs/ /ma ga d+hA yi gnod sbyin tshig /de bzhin ang+ga'i yul gyi tshig /lto 'phye chen po rab tu bstan/ /gzi brjid chen po nam mkha'
287a2(rgyud): lding | |de dag shar phyogs tshig tu 'gyur/ /bang ga'i yul du yang dag skyes/ /gang dag tshig ni bstan pa ni/ /de bzhin mi 'am ci yi tshig /de yi tshig tu rab
287a3(rgyud): brtag bya/ /rtag tu piN+Da'i tshig gyur pa/ /grub dang ral gri'i rig pa 'dzin/ /de tshig rig pa 'dzin pa dang / /drang srong 'dod pa'i gzugs can yin/ /de tshig mngon
287a4(rgyud): shes lnga dang ni/ /drang srong rnams kyis yongs su brtags/ /gang yang yul tshig ma ga d+hA/ /gang yang ha ri ki la'i tshig /mi gsal mi dong nyid dang ni/ /yi ge ta
287a5(rgyud): la shin tu rten/ /la yi yi ge mang ba'i tshig /sha za'i tshig tu brjod pa yin/ /las tshon zhes bya'i gling dang ni/ /na li ke ra 'byung ba'i gnas/ /gling ni rtsub
287a6(rgyud): par byed nyid dang / /gcer bu stobs ldan bu gnas kyang / /sems can dag byed gnas pa dag /de bzhin 'di dag gling las byung / /yi ge la mang tshig dag
287a7(rgyud): dang | |tshig ni gsal ba'i rnam pa med/ /mi gsal bsri ba med nyid dang / /khro bcas yi dwags skye gnas tshig /lho phyogs pa yi tshig dag dang / /an+d+ra kar
287b1(rgyud): Na dra bi DA/ /sems can ko sal 'brog gnas dang / /sing ga la yi gling dag na/ /yi ge ga dang rar bcas pa/ /de ni srin po'i tshig tu shes/ /de dag gling la gnas pa
287b2(rgyud): de'i| |ming ni gang zhig brjod pa yang / /ma mo rnams ni gzi brjid che/ /de yi tshig 'dir gsungs pa yin/ /tshig ni nub phyogs phyogs mtshams dang / /ma la ba yi tshig
287b3(rgyud): dag dang / /be'u nya dang rgya mtsho'i tshig /sha ra se yi rnam brtags dang / /rgya mtsho bcu 'dus chu bo 'dus/ /dpal mgrin dang ni ko dz+wa ri/ /'di dag tshig ldan 'jug
287b4(rgyud): pa ni| |nyi ma la sogs gza' mchog gdon/ /de lan gzhan don gtso bo ni/ /yul ni ba ri ya tra'i tshig /yul ni ar bu ta sa h+ya/ /ri ni mA la yar gnas dang / /
287b5(rgyud): lang ba'i yul du yang dag skyes/ /tshig ni ci 'dra yod pa yi/ /de 'dra'i tshig tu smra ba ni/ /grul bum skye gnas 'dzin pa yin/ /yi ge sha Sha sa dang ni/ /ra lA ba las
287b6(rgyud): yang dag 'byung / /yi ge g+ha dang ldan pa'i tshig /lha ma yin du nges par bstan/ /kha che'i yul las 'byung ba dang / /skye ba'i gnas na ka bi sha /gnod sbyin rgyal
287b7(rgyud): po'i rigs las byung / /phyag na rdo rje'i rigs su bstan/ /de dag lnga yi gtso bo ni/ /kun gyi tshig tu 'dod pa yin/ /de bzhin dbus kyi phyogs gnas dag /pad+ma'i
288a1(rgyud): rigs kyi skye gnas rten/ /tshig dang 'gros dang mtshan ma yi/ /pad+ma'i rigs su snang ba yin/ /rgyal ba'i sras kyis rnam brtags pa/ /snga
288a2(rgyud): ma nyid du bstan pa yin/ /'dod chags bral ba'i mtshan ma gang / /rgyal ba'i mtshan mar rab tu 'byung / /yul phyogs gang gi tshig smra ba/ /der gnas 'gros dang
288a3(rgyud): spyod pa yin/ /der bstan sems can nyid dang ni/ /'gros dang mtshan ma'ang kun tu bstan/ /kha ba can gyi nang gnas pa/ /dri za drang srong skye bo'i tshig /gang+gA'i ngogs
288a4(rgyud): kyi byang phyogs pa/ /gnod sbyin tshig tu rab tu snang / /ri ni 'bigs byed la gnas pa/ /gang+gA'i 'gram gyi lho phyogs dang / /dpal gyi ri bor skyes gyur dang / /gang yang
288a5(rgyud): skye bo rnams dag ni/ /srin po skar ma yi dwags dang / /ma mo cha lugs ngan pa dang / /mi bzad gzugs can bgegs chen po/ /gdon ni shin tu ma rungs pa/ /brkam
288a6(rgyud): zhing gzhan gyi srog 'phrog byed/ /de yi tshig ni yang dag 'byung / /gang dag yul ni de dag brtag /de dag yul gyi 'gros dang spyod/ /de dag tshig tu smra ba ni/ /ma
288a7(rgyud): rungs gdon 'jug rnam spyod yin/ /'di dag gzhan yang mang po ni/ /gang gi spyod 'gros spyod pa dang / /rnam pa sna tshogs tshul dang ni/ /rnam pa sna tshogs mtshan
288b1(rgyud): nyid dang / /rnam pa sna tshogs sems can gtso/ /rnam pa sna tshogs skye gnas 'dod/ /de ltar gdon 'jug mtshan ma ni/ /mtshan nyid 'gros dang spyod pa yin/ /mi rnams
288b2(rgyud): kyi ni bde skyed pa/ /sems can du yang bya ba ste/ /gzhon nu sna tshogs yang dag 'byung / /bsrung ba'i don du rab sbyar bya/ /yi ge drug pas bya ba ni/ /phyag rgya chen po dang
288b3(rgyud): ldan pa'i/ /sngags nyid kho na bzlas byas na/ /bsrung ba chen por 'gyur ba yin/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po
288b4(rgyud): che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las/ gdon 'jug pa'i spyod pa'i cho ga'i le'u rab 'byams las nyi shu rtsa lnga pa rdzogs so// //de nas bcom
288b5(rgyud): ldan 'das shAkya thub pas/ gzhan yang / gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang la gzigs nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam
288b6(rgyud): dpal/ khyod kyi sngags rnams rgyud thams cad la yang dag par 'jug pa/ rig pa thams cad la 'os pa/ dus dpag tu med pa'i yon tan ma lus pa'i 'bras
288b7(rgyud): bu byung ba yang rjes su 'brel ba'i mtshan ma'i tshad yod de/ de 'grub par bya ba'i rgyud bshad pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ skye ba gzhan gyis 'grub pa nyid/ /dus kyi rgyus ni
289a1(rgyud): 'grub pa med/ /de yi ched dang sbyor ba ni/ /sngon byung rgyu las byung ba yin/ /rtse gcig bdag gir byed pas 'grub/ /grub pa rig pa rnam
289a2(rgyud): dpyod pa'o/ /rigs pa gzhon nu khyod bstan na/ /lus can kun la rab tu snang / /mthar gyis byas pa'i las rnams ni/ /rigs pa zhes ni bya ba yin/ /dpa' bo'i
289a3(rgyud): rigs ldan de sbyor bas/ /grub pa mchog ni thob par 'gyur/ /grub med bsgrub bya'i las rnams med/ /las rnams med par 'grub pa'ang med/ /las dang
289a4(rgyud): byed par yang dag ldan/ /yang dag ldan pas grub pa 'thob/ /cho ga ldan pa'i rgyu yis ni/ /gnas pa mchog ni thob par 'gyur/ /sngags pa sngags ni mi sgrogs
289a5(rgyud): na| |sngags min pa yang sngags par 'gyur/ /thub pa'i las ni yang dag spyod/ /grub pa rgyas pa thob par 'gyur/ /rigs kyi sa bon la brten na/ /blo
289a6(rgyud): yi mchog la gnas par 'gyur/ /gnas mchog dam par des sdom na/ /dang po bgrod pa thob par 'gyur/ /blo dang bsam pa legs gnas la/ /nad med
289a7(rgyud): go 'phang thob par 'gyur/ /gang gis dus dang mtshan ma las/ /dus min grub par 'dod pa ni/ /mdor na brgya byin yin na yang / /de yi sngags rnams
289b1(rgyud): mi 'grub bo/ /'byung po skye bo mi phan dang / /dus min par yang rtsom pa yang / /bdag nyid chen po tshangs pa yang / /de la grub pa mi snang ngo / /snyom dang sred dang
289b2(rgyud): yang dag ldan/ /dregs dang nga rgyal ldan pa dang / /lhod dang yun ring 'thab la dga'/ /grong gi skye bo la rtag dga'/ /le lo phan tshun sbyor ba la/ /'di la grub
289b3(rgyud): pa ga la yod/ /gang yang lha yi bla ma dang / /gang yang rtag tu lha min bla/ /sngags rnams de dag gis bsgrub kyang / /cho ga spangs na nus med yin/ /de bzhin cho ga'i
289b4(rgyud): las nyams na/ /sems ni rnam par rmongs par byed/ /de bas sngags ni bzla mi bya/ /cho ga med par rigs pa min/ /byis pa rnams kyi mthong ba rmongs/ /de lta
289b5(rgyud): bus ni skyed par 'gyur/ /de bas byis pa rmongs pa yang / /shin tu dka' ba'i 'gro bar lhung / /de nas de dag sngags spyod pa/ /de las de dag drang ba yang / /
289b6(rgyud): mthar gyis de dag grub pa ni/ /dge ba 'gro ba rab tu thob/ /de las zlos pa'i sngags pas ni/ /mi g.yo zhi ba'i gnas su 'jog /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngags
289b7(rgyud): bzlas pa/ /de ltar sngags rnams don yod de/ /sems can mig zur gyis bltas pa'ang / /rjes su gzung ba nyid du 'gyur/ /de dag dge ba'i bshes gnyen
290a1(rgyud): te| |'di dag sems can mnyes gshin pa'o/ /'di dag grub par bstan pa ste/ /theg gsum mnyam pa nyid zhi ba/ /de bas rnam
290a2(rgyud): kun rab 'bad nas/ /mnyam par gzhag cing sngags zlos bya/ /sngags zlos rab tu sbyor byed pa/ /sngags ni cho ga med par sbyor/ /yun ring dus su
290a3(rgyud): 'khor ba na/ /nam zhig cig na grub par 'dod/ /shin tu yun ring dus song nas/ /sngags rnams grub par snang ba 'o/ /cho ga ldan pa'i sngags kyis ni/ /
290a4(rgyud): myur du grub pa rab tu 'thob/ /'bras bu grub par mthong ba ste/ /'bras med sngags ni gsung ba min/ /gsang sngags 'bras bu ldan pa ni/ /tshe 'di nyid
290a5(rgyud): la grub par gsungs/ /grub med 'bras bu las ma yin/ /las med par yang 'bras mi 'dod/ /'bras bu las dang yang dag ldan/ /'bras bcas
290a6(rgyud): las su bstan pa yin/ /de bas skye dang rga spangs pa/ /de ltar yang dag byung 'gyur pa/ /'jig rten zhi bar gsungs pa ste/ /zhi ba srid las rnam grol
290a7(rgyud): yin| |bdag nyid chen po der 'gror rtogs/ /sangs rgyas chos ni rjes su bstan/ /'jig rten phyin ci log dus su/ /de la'ang grub par rab tu snang / /tshe
290b1(rgyud): 'di nyid la'ang grub 'gyur te/ /tshe rabs gzhan du'ang 'byung bar 'gyur/ /zhi ba'i lam ni 'dus ma byas/ /mthar thug zhi ba'i bar du 'gyur/ /gang du 'jig
290b2(rgyud): rten rnam bstan pa/ /zhi ba'i gnas ni dri med bzang / /sangs rgyas nyid ni legs bstan pa/ /rgyal bas kun tu bstan pa yin/ /de la mthar ni de dag phyin/ /
290b3(rgyud): sngags grub par ni gsungs pa yin/ /rang rig so so'i rgyal ba yis/ /sngags 'di bstan pa ma yin te/ /thub pa rdzu 'phrul chen po yis/ /'jig rten dag
290b4(rgyud): la sngags bstan to/ /tshe 'dir lus can rnams la ni/ /mngon sum du ni grub pa bstan/ /de nyid stong pa rig pa yis/ /sngags ni sangs rgyas nyid du ston/ /
290b5(rgyud): rtsod dus tha ma'i dus dag tu/ /zhi ba'i de nyid khyad par du/ /sngags 'grub par ni mi 'gro zhing / /myur ba'i las la'ang 'grub pa med/ /de yi dus su sbyor pa
290b6(rgyud): ni| |cho ga mthong ba'i las dag gis/ /sngags rgyud shes pa sgrub bo zhes/ /bstan pa 'di la thub pas gsungs/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa na/ /
290b7(rgyud): grub mchog myur du grub par 'dod/ /de bzhin bar ma'i dus dag tu/ /bar ma'i grub pa nye bar bstan/ /tha ma'i dus la brten nas ni/ /tha ma'i grub par
291a1(rgyud): gsungs pa yin/ /bzang po yi ni dus dag la/ /de bzhin nam mkhar 'gro ba dang / /sngags rnams kun ni rab grub par/ /'jig
291a2(rgyud): rten 'dren pas bstan pa yin/ /de dus rgyal ba'i dbang po ni/ /rigs kyi mchog de rab tu 'grub/ /pad+ma'i rigs ni bar mar 'grub/ /dus kyi mtha' la rdo

291a4(rgyud): gnod sbyin rgyal/ /rin chen rigs spyod gnod sbyin ni/ /dus rnams kun tu 'grub par 'gyur/ /lha rnams kun gyi sngags gzhan ni/ /gang yang chags
291a5(rgyud): can gyis rab sbyar/ /rtsod pa'i dus su 'grub 'gyur zhing / /'jig rten pa yi bstan pa'ang 'grub/ /lha dang mi dang lha min gyi/ /dbang po gnod sbyin srin
291a6(rgyud): po dang / /drang srong nam mkha' lding dang ni/ /sha za 'byung po gza' tshogs dang / /mi dang mi ma yin pa dang / /'dod pa'i khams na gnas pa yi/ /bsod
291a7(rgyud): nams ldan pa rdzu 'phrul che/ /ma rungs las ni mi zad ldan/ /brgya byin changs pa drag po dang / /dbang ldan de bzhin gzhan dag kyang / /khyab 'jug 'byung
291b1(rgyud): po thams cad dang / /rdzu 'phrul chen pos sngags bstan pa/ /de dag dus kyi tha ma la/ /bzlas pas 'grub par 'gyur ba yin/ /de dus 'jigs pa chen po la//
291b2(rgyud): sdang ba'i las ni de bzhin 'grub/ /'byung po dbang dang dgugs bya ba/ /sa steng sha za'i las dag 'grub/ /don med grub par snang ba ste/ /'jig rten pha rol
291b3(rgyud): dag tu smod/ /des na rgyal ba'i dbang po yis/ /de dus 'jigs pa chen po la/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis yang dag bstan/ /kun la rjes gzung gtsor byas
291b4(rgyud): nas| |zlos pa la ni sngags gzugs kyis/ /zlos pa bstan pa la dad cing / /dkon mchog gsum la mchod byed la/ /de tshe sems can sngags gzugs kyis//
291b5(rgyud): gdul bar byed par 'gyur ba yin/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i

292a1(rgyud): 'jam dpal/ khyod kyi cho ga'i rgyal po chos kyi dbyings kyi mdzod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rgyu mthun
292a2(rgyud): pa'i rjes su spyod pa/ mdo chen po'i mchog /rin po che'i le'u/ de bzhin gshegs pa gsang ba'i rjes su gnang ba/ sngags kyi mchog sgrub pa la rgyu
292a3(rgyud): mtshan shes pa dang / rtags dang / dus gzhan shes pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs rnams nges par bstan cing yang dag par bstan no/ /'byung po thams cad kyi
292a4(rgyud): sgra sgrogs pa dang / sems can dang / sems can ma yin pa'i ming gi sgrar 'gyur ba ni sgra las byung ba'i ming du shes pa dang / sgra las byung ba ma yin
292a5(rgyud): par bstan pa dang / de bzhin du 'dren ma dang ldan pa'i sngags rnams ni rnam pa gsum du bya ba yin te/ sgra bzang yang dag ldan pa dang / /rtag tu don dang
292a6(rgyud): rab tu 'brel/ /zur chag tshig dang rtag tu bral/ /legs par sbyar don gyis brgyan pa/ /phyi rol grub mtha' yod ma yin/ /'phags pa'i sngags su rab
292a7(rgyud): tu bsgrags/ /rtag tu tshig don ldan pa ste/ /rnam pa gsum gyi dbye bar 'gyur/ /ring dang thung dang de bzhin du/ /bar ma'i yi ges brgyan pa'ang yin/ /
292b1(rgyud): sngags kyi lha mor gyur pa ni/ /dbyangs yig sdeb sbyor gyis brgyan pa/ /dag ni legs sbyar legs sbyar min/ /ci ste don dang don med min/ /don ldan tshig dang don
292b2(rgyud): med tshig / sngags don rnam par gsungs pa yin/ /rnam rtog mang po'i tshig dag ni/ /'jig rten pa rnams kun gyi sngags/ /gcig dang gnyis kyi yi ge dag/
292b3(rgyud): sdeb sbyor dbyangs yig bzang po bzhi/ /gsum dang bzhi dang lnga dang drug /de bzhin bdun pa brgyad pa yin/ /dgu pa bcu pa de bzhin du/ /yi ge dag ni grub
292b4(rgyud): par 'dod/ /yi ge bcu dang yang dag ldan/ /yi ge rnams kyi gnas pa mnyan/ /ji srid 'di dag bcu 'gyur ni/ /sa steng 'di la yi ge mthong / /yi ge drug dang nyi
292b5(rgyud): shu dang / /yi ge gcig gi bar du 'gyur/ /'di tsam tshad kyi yi ge ni/ /sngags kyi tshig ni rtag tu sbyar/ /rkang pa bzhi dang yang dag ldan/ /sngags ni don kun sgrub
292b6(rgyud): pa'o| |mchog ni rab mchog don ldan pa/ /sngags ni gang zhig rgyal bas gsungs/ /de sras rgyal ba'i sras dag gis/ /gsungs pa dag ni bar ma yin/ /'jig
292b7(rgyud): rten kun gyi bstan pa yi/ /sngags ni tha mar 'gyur pa yin/ /bden bral gyis bstan ngan pa'ang yin/ /bco brgyad bdun nam nyi shu 'am/ /brgya dang lnga bcu dag
293a1(rgyud): gi bar/ /'di tsam tshad kyi sngags rnams ni/ /rgyal ba 'phags bas gsungs pa yin/ /gcig dang gnyis kyi yi ge dang / /lnga brgya'i
293a2(rgyud): yi ge'i bar 'gyur ba/ /de tsam tshad kyi sngags rnams ni/ /byang chub sems dpas rab tu gsungs/ /de nang tshig ni dgod pa dang / /sngags dang ldan par brjod
293a3(rgyud): pa yin/ /sdeb sbyor ldan zhing dbyangs yig ldan/ /skad byings don gyi rnam par brgyan/ /tshig dang legs par rab ldan dang / /rgyud dang rigs par ldan pa
293a4(rgyud): dang | |sgra dang dbyangs yig rnam bral ba/ /nam zhig na ni grub par 'gyur/ /legs par rab ldan sgra rnams kyang / /spyi bo drod gnas rkan dang ni/ /so mchu
293a5(rgyud): lkog ma'i sgra dag ni/ /sbyar ba bzhin du rim gyis 'byung / /mi gsal brjod pas ldog gyur pa/ /legs par rab ldan brjod pa yin/ /yongs rdzogs tshig
293a6(rgyud): dang sgra dag dang / /yang dag ldan pas bsgrub par 'gyur/ /sgrub pa nyams dang bya ba nyams/ /sgra dang don dang rnam bral na/ /myur du sngags rnams mi 'grub
293a7(rgyud): ste| |yun ring dus su 'gro ba yin/ /de la grub pa yong med min/ /log par yang ni de mi byed/ /skye ba gzhan du'ang snang ba ste/ /sngags grub mchog
293b1(rgyud): kyang ster bar 'gyur/ /yun ring dus su bzlas pa yi/ /de yi sngags kyi mthu yis ni/ /sngags rig skye bo'i sngags de ni/ /don med las ni byed ma yin/ /sngags
293b2(rgyud): rnams kun gyi tha ma ni/ /mi ma yin pa'i 'jig rten pa/ /'byung po kun ni ser snar bcas/ /gang yin des ni sngags bstan pa'o/ /yi ge gang dag nges bstan
293b3(rgyud): pa| |gcig dang gnyis kyi grangs dag dang / /rnam pa sna tshogs kla klo'i skad/ /yul gyi skad du bstan pa ste/ /phreng du bsdebs dang ldan pa dang / /sgra ni 'dres par
293b4(rgyud): gyur pa yin/ /de dag yi ge gcig pa nas/ /rtsa brgyad stong gi bar du'o/ /tshig rkang bzhi dang rkang med dang / /rkyang pa tshigs su sbyar nges bstan/ /tshigs bcad
293b5(rgyud): rgyun chags cha dag dang / /tshigs bcad tshigs su brjod pa yin/ /yang dang yang ni brjod don ldan/ /gsal ba'i don gyis brgyan pa yin/ /zur chag legs
293b6(rgyud): sbyar sgra nyams kyang / /don ni rab tu brtag pa yin/ /mi gsal gsal ba med pa dang / /yi ge nyams kyang 'dod pa yin/ /'gro ba yul dang rnam bral ba/
293b7(rgyud): de la'ang sngags ni 'grub par brjod/ /de ltar sngags rnams kun la ni/ /rtag tu phan pas rigs par gsungs/ /zag med zas bcas thams cad kyi/ /sngags
294a1(rgyud): rnams 'di yi mtshan nyid yin/ /gang la yi ges mang zhing / /oM ni ta yis brgyan pa ni/ /de las de yi mod la ni/ /de dag la ni nges
294a2(rgyud): grub 'gyur/ /dang por sngags ni yi ge oM/ /mtha' na yi ge ma yod la/ /yi ge sa ni rkang par ldan/ /de bzhin ta yis bar mdzes shing / /ta yi rnam pa zur
294a3(rgyud): bzhir ldan/ /mtha' gnas yi ge rnam par spangs/ /ra gnyis ldan pa yi ge ta/ /sngags rnams kyi ni grub pa byed/ /dang por ra gnyis mang ba dang / /yi
294a4(rgyud): ge hUM gi yon tan yang / /yi ge tsa ni gru bzhir snang / /de dag yi ge sgrub par brjod/ /yi ge b+ha ni rar ldan zhing / /yig mthar ma dang yi ge gnas/ /dang
294a5(rgyud): por ma dang mang yi ge / de ni sngags kyi mchog tu bstan/ /gang yang yi ge na mang zhing / /rgyud rnams kun la snang ba yin/ /sngags de dag ni zhi bar gsungs//
294a6(rgyud): gshin rje hUM gi sa brgyan pa yis/ /yi ge b+ha ni mang ba de/ /dbang po'i rlung gi phyogs su gsungs/ /yi ge ba ni chu lhar gsungs/ /'jig rten phan zhing rgyas
294a7(rgyud): byed yin/ /sngags gang yi ge e mang ba/ /dbang chen de ni rab tu snang / /dang po dkon mchog gsum skyabs 'gro/ /gang yin sngags ni de bzhin du/ /
294b1(rgyud): phyag 'tshal ba la rab 'jug dang / /zhi ba'i rgyu dang bde ba byed/ /de las gzhan pa'i lha rnams la'ang / /phyag 'tshal don du rab tu sbyar/ /sngags dang rgyud la rang gi
294b2(rgyud): sngags/ /rang sngags las ni thams cad pa/ /gang la yi ge ra mang zhing / /mtha' na yi ge phaT hUM bcas/ /'di dag sngags ni gdug pa che/ /gzi brjid ldan zhing gzi
294b3(rgyud): mdangs che/ /mi zhi srog gcod byed pa ste/ /gdug pa'i sems can dag la sbyar/ /khyad par du na sdig yod pas/ /de bas las de mi bya'o/ /rtag tu thub pas spangs
294b4(rgyud): bas na/ /'bad de zlos pos spang bar bya/ /sngags ni zhi dang rgyas pa dag /gnyis kyi don ni 'grub 'gyur te/ /las la ji srid gsungs pa dag /skad cig gis ni

294b6(rgyud): yin| |rin chen rigs kyis bya ba ni/ /rgyas pa'i las ni thams cad do/ /gang dag sdig pa'i las rnams kun/ /mngon spyod la ni rab tu sbyar/ /mngon par spyod
294b7(rgyud): ba'i las rnams ni/ /rdo rje'i rigs kyis bya ba yin/ /'jig rten mgon gyis bkag na yang / /gnod sbyin dbang la rab tu bstan/ /sems can rnams ni gdul

295a2(rgyud): nyid kyis rigs dag ni/ /gang yang brgyad du yang dag bstan/ /grub pa de dag rnams gsum 'gyur/ /rnam pa gsum du yang dag bstan/ /mchog dang bar ma tha ma
295a3(rgyud): ni| |de dag rnam pa gsum 'byed pa/ /zhi dang rgyas pa dag dang ni/ /mngon spyod par ni 'dod pa yin/ /sngags dang ldan pa nyid dag dang / /rgyud dang ldan pa kho

301b1(rgyud): rab tu bstan/ /rgyal ba'i sras po dag dang ni/ /de bzhin nyan thos rang rgyal dang / /mthong ba'i chos kyi 'bras thob kyang / /de la phyag rgya rab tu bstan/ /chos rnams la
301b2(rgyud): ni rnam rtog med/ /dad cing ser sna bral ba dang / /ston pa'i bka' la rigs par shes/ /de la phyag rgya rab tu bstan/ /rtsa brgyad brgya yi tshad du ni/ /'di dag phyag rgya
301b3(rgyud): phyag rgyas btab/ /lhag dang nyung ba ma yin par/ /mngon sum sangs rgyas kyis rab bshad/ /'jam dpal gang gi cho ga la/ /sngags kyang de dang mnyam pa yi/ /
301b4(rgyud): brgyad bcas brgya zhes gsungs pa dang / /sngags rnams de dang mnyam par bstan/ /phyag rgya'ang brgya ni rtsa brgyad du/ /thub pa mchog gis sngon gsungs so/ /'di tsam
301b5(rgyud): ched du cho ga la/ /phyag rgya sngags ni yang dag 'byung / /sangs rgyas kun gyi mdzod 'di ni/ /sngags kyi mdzod du nye bar bstan/ /phyag rgya sngags ni mnyam ldan na/ /
301b6(rgyud): yang dag ldan pas las myur byed/ /'khor lo med pa'i shing rta ni/ /rigs par 'gro bar mi 'byung ste/ /de bzhin sngags rnams ma lus pa/ /phyag rgya med par
301b7(rgyud): las mi byed/ /sngags dang phyag rgya mnyam ldan zhing / /yang dag ldan pas myur las byed/ /lha dang lha min bcas pa yis/ /'jig rten gsum kun 'gugs byed
302a1(rgyud): na/ /las gzhan dag gis legs sbyar ba'i/ /mi yi 'jig rten sems ci dgos/ /mthong chos 'bras bu 'di dag gi /rgyag rgya sngags la
302a2(rgyud): snang ba yis/ /gnyi ga ldan zhing dag pa dang / /cho ga ldan pa'i don bstan na/ /rgyal ba mchog dang sras rnams dang / /'byung po rnams ni 'gugs par byed/ /sngags
302a3(rgyud): dang phyag rgya dka' thub nyid/ /rnam gsum las ni legs gnas dang / /ci 'dod phun sum tshogs pa kun/ /de bzhin zos pas thob par 'gyur/ /sngags rnams
302a4(rgyud): phyag rgya phyag rgya btab/ /sngags kyis kyang ni de rgyab btab/ /sngags ni phyag rgya med pas min/ /sngags dang phyag rgya spangs pas min/ /phyag rgya sngags ni mnyam
302a5(rgyud): ldan na/ /yang dag ldan pas las kun byed/ /'di dag phan tshun 'bras bu ste/ /phan tshun 'bras bu 'byung ba yin/ /sgrub pas rigs ldan sbyar byas na/ /bsgrub bya
302a6(rgyud): min pa'i las rnams med/ /phyag rgya ldan pa'i zlos pa pos/ /sngags rnams ma lus 'grub par 'gyur/ /cho ga mthong bas rab brtson zhing / /sngags dang phyag
302a7(rgyud): rgya kun byas na/ /gang du 'gugs 'gyur mi 'grub pa/ /de gnas de ni yod ma yin/ /srid rtse mnar med par dang ni/ /'jig rten khams kyi 'gro ba gzhan/ /
302b1(rgyud): gang du mi 'babs mi 'gugs dang / /bsgrub bya ma yin gang yang med/ /sems can skye gnas las skyes dang / /byang chub sems dpa' mi snang ba'ang / /cho gas bskul
302b2(rgyud): nas mi 'gugs pa/ /de ni gang yang yod ma yin/ /srung ba'i cho ga'i rgyud dag gam/ /las 'grub bzlog par bya ba la/ /sa bcu la ni gnas pa yi/ /byang chub sems
302b3(rgyud): dpas kyang mi nus/ /sngags dang phyag rgya la gnas la/ /'byung po kun gyis mi tshugs so/ /dka' thub pa bzlas pa cho ga'i lam/ /sbyin sreg las la rab sbyar na/ /'di
302b4(rgyud): las skye zhing de las grub/ /phyag rgya sngags la snang ba yin/ /zlos pa rtag tu 'bad brtson zhing / /rtag tu de dag la gnas na/ /sngags rnams grub par 'gyur ba ste/ /don
302b5(rgyud): yod 'gyur bar thub pa'i bka'/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung dag ni/ /de dag gis ni gzhan du byas/ /sngags dang rgyud ni rigs pa la/ /gang zhig rtag tu mi 'jug pa'o//
302b6(rgyud): sngags dang phyag rgya mtha' dag gi/ /gang zhig cho ga ldan byed pa'o/ /'jam dpal la gzhon nu 'di dag ni/ /yang dang yang du bstan pa yin/ /sngags kyi rigs pa mtha'
302b7(rgyud): dag ni/ /phyag rgyas sngags ni phan pa 'byung / /de srid las la cho ga'i rgyal/ /'dis ni 'bras bu rgya chen 'byung / /'jig rten gsang mchog phan pa dang / /sngags dang
303a1(rgyud): phyag rgyas dam bcas pa/ /de nas rigs ldan 'jam dpal de/ /khyab par byed pa byis pa'i gzugs/ /cung zad 'dzum pa'i bzhin
303a2(rgyud): gyur gnas/ /gzhon nu sna tshogs yang dag 'byung / /byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus che/ /sa bcu la ni gnas pa yis/ /sangs rgyas nyi ma'i gnyen gyur
303a3(rgyud): pa| |thub pa mchog la rab tu zhus/ /bcom ldan sngags kyi rgyud dag ni/ /gang yin 'di ni 'jig rten bstan/ /sngon gyi sangs rgyas dag gis kyang / /de yang
303a4(rgyud): bdag la gsungs pa yin/ /de ltar shAkya seng ge yis/ /ci yi phyir na rab tu gsungs/ /bdag ni de ltar the tshom 'tshal/ /thub pa mchog gis bdag
303a5(rgyud): la gsungs/ /blo ldan ka la ping+ka'i skad/ /tshangs pa yi ni gsung dbyangs kyi/ /sa bcu la ni rab gnas pa'i/ /byang chub sems dpa' la gsungs pa/ /sngon
303a6(rgyud): ni bskal pa mang po ru/ /da ni 'khor bar 'khor ba na/ /thub dbang me tog kun skyes las/ /cho ga'i rgyal po'ang nga yis thob/ /de dang der ni sems can
303a7(rgyud): la| |phan pa mang po byas pa yin/ /thugs rje'i dbang du song nas ni/ /da tshe bdag gi smon lam byas/ /sangs rgyas mchog tu de tshe bdag /dus kyi mthar
303b1(rgyud): ni yang dag byung / /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas ni/ /bstan pa'i don ni byas pa yin/ /phyi ma yi ni dus dag tu/ /de tshe nga ni mya ngan 'da'/ /des na cho ga'i rgyal
303b2(rgyud): dbang po/ /khyod kyi drung du nga yis bstan/ /nga yang 'jig rten mya ngan 'das/ /dzam bu'i gling ni rab stongs shing / /de bzhin ston pa'i chos kyi mdzod/ /rtsod dus
303b3(rgyud): thag ring gyur pa ni/ /sems can rnams la bstan pa'i don/ /cho ga'i rgyal po gcig byed 'gyur/ /cho ga'i rgyal po rgya chen la/ /de bzhin 'di ni yang dag
303b4(rgyud): 'jug / sems can rnams ni don la brtson/ /nga yi tshe na 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de dus 'jigs su rung ba yi/ /de tshe sems can chos ldan min/ /rtag tu lus
303b5(rgyud): la mi gnas shing / /rgyal po rnams ni ma rungs yid/ /mi dang mi ma yin rnams ni/ /kun kyang bstan la rnam par sdang / /ngas bshad chos kyi mdzod rnams
303b6(rgyud): ni| |de yis thams cad 'jigs par 'gyur/ /de dag gdul ba'i don gyi phyir/ /sngags kyi mdzod ni nye bar bstan/ /bskal pa bsam gyi khyab par sngon/ /
