303b7(rgyud): gzhon nu khyod kyi smon lam 'di/ /sangs rgyas ji snyed gang du dag /'jig rten gnyen gyur mya ngan 'das/ /de dag bstan pa'i don du ni/ /dus dang dus su bya
304a1(rgyud): 'o zhes/ /bdag ni byis pa gzhon nu'i gzugs/ /dus kun du ni rnam par spyod/ /sngags kyi gzugs kyis sems can la/ /de
304a2(rgyud): dang der ni rnam par 'dul/ /gzhon nu khyod kyi smon lam 'di/ /sngon chad du ni byas pa yin/ /des na byis pa'i gzugs thob gyur/ /des na khyod la
304a3(rgyud): bshad par bya/ /skye bo skyabs ni med pa dang / /sangs rgyas zhing ni stongs pa na/ /sngags kyi gzugs kyi sems can la/ /byis pa'i tshul gyis yang
304a4(rgyud): dag shod/ /sems can mang po 'dul byed cing / /phun sum tshogs pa sbyin byed pa/ /dus kyi tha ma de la ni/ /sems can kun la mchog sbyin byed/
304a5(rgyud): 'jig rten nga ni mya ngan 'das/ /sa yi steng ni stongs gyur na/ /khyod nyid byis pa'i gzugs kyis ni/ /sangs rgyas mdzad pa byed par 'gyur/ /de tshe
304a6(rgyud): dgon chen rab dga' ba/ /kha ba can nang yod pa yis/ /chu bo gser dang ldan 'gram du/ /nga ni mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi
304a7(rgyud): rtsa ba'i cho ga byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las/ phyag rgya bskul ba'i cho ga 'jam dpal gyis yongs su zhus
304b1(rgyud): shing bstan pa'i le'u rab 'byams las nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa rdzogs so/ / //de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas/ /gzhan yang / gnas gtsang
304b2(rgyud): ma'i gzhal med khang la gzigs nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya'i mdzod yang dag par bskul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /
304b3(rgyud): snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i mdzod spu nas 'od zer du ma bye ba khri phrag brgya stong grangs med pa'i 'khor dang bcas
304b4(rgyud): pa byung ste/ 'od zer gyi dra ba du ma des sangs rgyas kyi zhing du ma gsal bar byas nas sangs rgyas thams cad la yang dag par bskul nas phyir yang bcom
304b5(rgyud): ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i mdzod spur zhugs par gyur to/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la yang dag par bskul ma thag tu nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid kyi ting nge
304b6(rgyud): 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ gnas gtsang ma'i steng gi nam mkha'i dkyil du zhugs par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas sangs rgyas
304b7(rgyud): thams cad la mchod nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ phyag rgya'i le'u cho ga'i mdzod sangs rgyas thams cad kyis
305a1(rgyud): byin gyis brlabs pa bshad kyi nyon cig / de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyis zhabs la btud/
305a2(rgyud): de phyag bcal nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mdzod kyi phyag rgya mchog tu shin tu
305a3(rgyud): gsang ba gang yin pa de dus la bab par mkhyen na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni legs te bshad du gsol/ /skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la
305a4(rgyud): bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / skye bo'i tshogs mang po'i don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir dang / lha dang / mi rnams dang / sems can
305a5(rgyud): thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba dang / bde ba'i rnam par smin par 'gyur ba'i slad du'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas 'jam dpal
305a6(rgyud): gzhon nur gyur pas gsol ba btab nas/ phyag rgya thams cad la gzigs shing sangs rgyas thams cad la mkhyen par byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa'
305a7(rgyud): thams cad rab tu dga' bar byed pa/ 'phags pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag par tshim par byed pa/ 'phags pa'i sngags
305b1(rgyud): rnams la yid brtson par byed pa la gzengs bstod pa/ ma rungs pa thams cad zlog par byed pa/ 'jigs pa thams cad dbugs 'byin par byed pa/ 'khor
305b2(rgyud): bar gnas pa dag pa la bde ba dang / shes pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la rab tu 'jog par byed pa/ sems can sdug bsngal ba thams cad la bde ba'i don gyi
305b3(rgyud): phyir phyag rgya'i le'u'i cho ga ngas bshad kyi/ 'jam dpal gzhon nu nyon cig /dang po gtsug phud lnga pa ni/ /de ni phyag rgya chen por 'dod/ /gnyis pa gtsug
305b4(rgyud): phud gsum pa yin/ /ral pa gcig pa gsum pa ste/ /bzhi pa ut+pa lar gsungs pa/ /rkang gnyis dam pa rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /lnga pa bkra shis ldan du
305b5(rgyud): brjod/ /drug pa rgyal mtshan zhes su brjod/ /bdun pa gang ba zhes bstan te/ /sngags shes dag la legs mdzes shing / /brgyad pa srog shing zhes brjod
305b6(rgyud): pa| |sngags shes dag la legs mdzes yin/ /dgu pa gdugs shes bstan pa ste/ /bcu pa mdung du brjod pa yin/ /de bzhin bcu gcig sangs rgyas kyis/ /
305b7(rgyud): kha sbyar zhes ni yang dag bstan/ /bcu gnyis pa ni phub ces gsungs/ /bcu gsum pa ni da pus yin/ /bcu bzhi pa ni ral grir bshad/ /de bzhin dril bu
306a1(rgyud): bco lnga pa/ /bcu drug pa ni zhags par bstan/ /bcu bdun pa ni lcags kyur shes/ /bco brgyad pa ni bzang po'i gdan/ /bcu dgu pa ni
306a2(rgyud): gdan du brjod/ /nyi shur bstan pa rma bya'i gdan/ /nyi shu gcig pa paT+Ti sa/ /rtags gcig nyi shu gnyis pa ste/ /rtags gnyis nyi shu gsum pa yin/ /de
306a3(rgyud): bzhin phreng ba nyi shu bzhi/ /nyi shu lnga pa gzhu yin te/ /nyi shu drug par gsungs pa ni/ /lcags mda' dag tu rnam par brtags/ /nyi shu bdun par gsungs
306a4(rgyud): pa ni| |rtags kun dag tu rab tu bstan/ /nyi shu brgyad pa gsal shing ste/ /nyi shu dgu pa tho ba yin/ /sum cu pa ni mda' bo che/ /sum cu gcig pa mche bar bstan/
306a5(rgyud): sum cu gnyis pa de bzhin kha/ /sum cu gsum pa ras kyi gos/ /sum cu bzhi pa bum pa ste/ /sum cu lnga pa la 'khar gsil yin/ /sum cu drug pa byam bum/ /sum cu bdun
306a6(rgyud): pa gtun shing ste/ /sum cu brgyad pa skyil krung yin/ /sum cu dgu pa pa Ta ha/ /bzhi bcu par ni rang bstan pa/ /chos kyi drung zhes nye bar bstan/ /bzhi bcu
306a7(rgyud): dag ni gcig pa yang / /lcags thag ces ni yongs su bsgrags /gnyis pa 'dod pa mang por gsungs/ /gsum pa yid la re ba rdzogs/ /bzhi pa skyed
306b1(rgyud): byed snang ba ste/ /shes rab pha rol phyin par 'dod/ /lnga pa ma mo zhes bshad pa/ /rkang gnyis rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ /drug ba rta babs zhes byar gsungs/ /bdun pa
306b2(rgyud): rta babs bzang po yin/ /brgyad pa sgra skad dag tu bstan/ /dgu pa rgyal ba'i sga yang yin/ /lnga bcu pa ni rnga bo che/ /lnga bcu gcig pa chos kyi rnga/ /lnga bcu gnyis pa la yang
306b3(rgyud): bshad/ /gsum pa lag pa mchog yin te/ /lnga bcu bzhi par shes bya ba/ /phyag rgya de nyid 'khrul med yin/ /lnga bcu lnga pa mjug ring yin/ /lnga bcu drug pa mda'
306b4(rgyud): yin te/ /bdun pa dag ni dgra star bstan/ /brgyad pa 'jig rten gyis mchod yin/ /lnga bcu rtsa dgur shes bya ba/ /mdor na mtshon ni rtse gcig yin/ /drug cu par ni
306b5(rgyud): 'gyur ba yang / /mdor na gshol du shes par bya/ /drug cu gcig pa pad+ma ste/ /drug cu gnyis pa rdo rjer bshad/ /chos kyi 'khor lo skor byed pa/ /'jig rten drug cu gsum
306b6(rgyud): par gsungs/ /drug cu bzhi par shes bya ba/ /mdor na pad+ma dkar po yin/ /drug cu lnga par shes bya ba/ /phyag rgya mchog sbyin dam pa yin/ /de nas drug cu drug pa ni/ /
306b7(rgyud): thag pa'i phyag rgyar sangs rgyas gsungs/ /drug cu bdun par 'jig rten du/ /mkhas pas mdung du bstan pa yin/ /drug cu brgyad par bya ba yin/ /rdo rje dbyug pa'i phyag rgyar
307a1(rgyud): gsungs/ /drug cu rtsa dgur 'gyur ba ni/ /dgra 'joms byed par rab tu bstan/ /bdun cu par ni shes bya ba/ /mdor na klu yi phyag rgya yin//
307a2(rgyud): bdun cu gcig par gsungs pa ni/ /gzhal med phyag rgya mchog bzang yin/ /bdun cu gnyis ba mdor bsdu na/ /shing rta zhes ni de la brjod/ /mdor na bdun cu
307a3(rgyud): gsum pa ni/ /'jig rten mgon gyi gdan du gsungs/ /de bzhin bdun cu bzhi dang ni/ /bdun cu lnga ru bstan pa dag /tshes brgyad zla ba pi wang dag /phyag rgya
307a4(rgyud): gnyis su bstan pa yin/ /bdun cu rtsa drug 'jig rten du/ /phyag rgya pad+ma 'dra ba yin/ /bdun cu bdun pa'i phyag rgya mchog /ut+pal ni 'byung ba'i gnas/ /bdun
307a5(rgyud): cu brgyad pa'i phyag rgya ni/ /phyag 'tshal ba zhes bstan pa yin/ /bdun cu rtsa dgu mchod yon rgya/ /dgra bcom phyag rgya brgyad cu pa/ /mar me brgyad cu gcig par
307a6(rgyud): shes| |thal sbyar brgyad cu gnyis par 'dod/ /gsum pa phreng ba zhes bya 'o/ /bzhi pa gdan zhes gsungs pa yin/ /lnga pa gnas kyi phyag rgyar bstan/ /drug pa
307a7(rgyud): rab gnas gsungs pa ste/ /bdun pa dbang gi phyag rgyar brjod/ /brgyad cu brgyad pa mchog tu 'dod/ /dgu dang dgu bcu'i grangs dag ni/ /phyag rgya gnyis ni dge
307b1(rgyud): pa mchog / kha sbyar zung gi phyag rgya ste/ /grangs ni dgu bcu 'byung ba ste/ /dgu bcu rtsa gcig ces gsungs pa/ /me tog gi ni phyag rgyar bstan/ /gnyis pa gtor ma'i phyag rgya
307b2(rgyud): ste| |gsum pa rtag tu spos kyi yin/ /bzhi pa dri yi phyag rgya ste/ /lnga pa mar mer shes par bya/ /drug pa sbyor bar shes par bya/ /bdun pa skyil krung phyed kyi gnas/ /brgyad
307b3(rgyud): pa dag ni bod pa ste/ /dgu pa dag ni gshegs su gsol/ /de bzhin brgya rdzogs phyag rgya ni/ /thams cad pa yi las shes bya/ /brgya las rtsa gcig gsungs pa ni/ /phyag
307b4(rgyud): rgya chen po zhes bya ste/ /gtsug tor 'jig rten mgon po ni/ /rtag tu bla ma 'khor los bsgyur/ /phyag rgya de ni dang por gsungs/ /gnyis pa gdugs dkar las byung yin//
307b5(rgyud): gsum pa rtsa ba'i phyag rgya ste/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs su snang ba yin/ /bzhi pa chos kyi mdzod kyi gnas/ /chos kyi phyag rgyar shes par bya/ /lnga pa dge 'dun zhes bya ste/ /
307b6(rgyud): de ni phyag rgya chen po'ang yin/ /drug pa 'byung po zhi byed pa/ /rang rgyal lag pa'i phyag rgya nyid/ /bdun pa byang chub sems dpa' ni/ /sa bcu dag la zhugs pa yi//
307b7(rgyud): phyag rgya pad+ma'i phreng ba ste/ /phyag rgya chen por de shes bya/ /'jig rten pa ni thams cad kyi/ /phyag rgya sngags rnams mchog sbyin byed/ /mthu chen gtso bo chen po ste/ /gtso
308a1(rgyud): bo 'jig rten gsum gyis mchod/ /brgyad pa yang dag rab sbyar ba/ /phyag rgya srid gsum skye gnas yin/ /phyag rgya rnams kyi grangs bstan pa//
308a2(rgyud): rgyud 'di las ni rab 'byung ba/ /brgya gcig de bzhin rtsa brgyad du/ /phyag rgya'i grangs su brtags pa yin/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis 'di tshad du/ /sa steng sngon ni bstan
308a3(rgyud): pa yin/ /ston dang bstan pa 'jig pa na/ /lus can rnams ni rab spyod 'gyur/ /dang po re zhig lag pa gnyis/ /thal mos byar te rtse mo sprad/ /sor mo phan tshun
308a4(rgyud): nang du gshib/ /sor mo phan tshun sbyar nas ni/ /de nas yang dag sbyar nas kyang / /lag gnyis yang dag ldan pa la/ /gtsug phud lngas ni legs mtshan bya/ /
308a5(rgyud): sor mo rnams kyi rtse mo dag /de nas de dag rnam bzlog pa/ /phyag rgya gtsug phud lngar shes bya/ /gtsug phud lnga pa nyid dag ni/ /phyag rgya chen po zhes su bsgrags/ /
308a6(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa'i dbu la yod/ /'di ni phyag rgya mthu bo che/ /rab sbyar las kun byed pa yin/ /'jam dpal gyi ni sngags dag gam/ /snying po nyid ni rab tu
308a7(rgyud): sbyar| |skra can ma yi sngags dag gam/ /rtsa ba'i sngags kyis rtag tu bya/ /cho ga mthong bas sbyar ba'am/ /sngags rnams kun gyis byas na ni/ /las rnams kun ni
308b1(rgyud): don yod par/ /thub pa'i bkas ni bstan pa yin/ /de bzhin lag pa rnam bkod nas/ /de yi lag pa kha sbyar bya/ /de bzhin rtse mo gsum bya ste/ /sor mo rnams ni rab
308b2(rgyud): sbyar na/ /lag gnyis mthe bong spyod pa dang / /rab tu phyung ste drang por bya/ /gung mo dang ni srin lag dag /phyin ci log tu 'brel ba bya/ /'di ni gtsug phud gsum zhes bya/ /
308b3(rgyud): ral pa gsum pa zhes bya'ang yin/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs ni blo ldan gyi/ /phyag rgya 'di ni phyag rgya che/ /gang dag chog mthong ba yi/ /las rnams kun ni byed pa yin/ /'jam
308b4(rgyud): dpal gsang sngags gang yin pa/ /de dag kun la sbyar bar bya/ /zlos pa yid la gang 'dod la/ /don de myur du grub par byed/ /lag pa de bzhin rnams bkod nas/ /de
308b5(rgyud): bzhin gtsug phud gcig par bya/ /sor mo gung mo yang dag sbyar/ /nges par gtsug phud gcig par 'gyur/ /rgya 'di phyag rgya chen po ste/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
308b6(rgyud): kyis gsungs/ /gzhon nu'i sngags ni rab bkod dang / /gang yang 'jig rten kun gyi yang / /de dag sbyar na 'grub 'gyur te/ /myur ba nyid du 'grub par 'gyur/ /de bzhin
308b7(rgyud): 'di yis bsgrub bya ni/ /sngags mchog rgyal bas bshad pa yin/ /cho ga mthong ba'i las kyis ni/ /'di don myur du bsgrub par bya/ /de bzhin lag pa yang dag sbyar//
309a1(rgyud): sor mo'i rtse mo dgug cig dgod/ /mdzub mo gnyis ni rtse sprad dgug /sor mo gzhan ni rang bzhag la/ /mthe bong gnyis ni rab gshib nas//
309a2(rgyud): gung mo gnyis ni rab brkyang bya/ /srin lag gnyis ni rtse sprad bkug /ut+pa la ru bstan pa yin/ /'di ni byang chub sems dpa' yi/ /rtsa ba'i sngags ni brjod cing
309a3(rgyud): bya| |gtsug phud lnga par bstan pa yin/ /las rnams gang yin de dag nyid/ /de kun ut+pa la yis ni/ /myur du sgrub par byed pa yin/ /'di ni mchog sbyin phyag
309a4(rgyud): / de bzhin lag gnyis sbyar sngags dang ldan byas na/ /myur du nor ni byed par 'gyur/ /lag gnyis de bzhin sbyar byas nas/ /lag pa
309a5(rgyud): gnyis po rab bkan la/ /khor yug tu sor mo yis/ /de nyid kha ni yang dag sbyar/ /bkra shis ldan pa'i rnam par 'byung / /mdzes pa'i rnam par dgod par bya//
309a6(rgyud): gung mo'i sor mo'i dbus su ni/ /mthe'u chung gnyis ni yang dag sbyar/ /mthe bong gnyis ka rnam sbyar ba/ /phyag rgya bkra shis ldan du brjod/ /don kun byed
309a7(rgyud): pa'i phyag rgya 'di/ /zhi ba'i las la rab tu sbyar/ /snying po'am yi ge drug ldan pas/ /las rnams kun ni byed par 'gyur/ /de bzhin lag gnyis sbyar
309b1(rgyud): nas ni/ /sor mo phan tshun rab sbyar ba/ /'gro ba'i khyad par mkhyen pa yin/ /gang ba bzang zhes gsungs pa yin/ /rtse mo'i phyogs kyi sor mo rnams/ /kun nas yongs
309b2(rgyud): su 'gyed byas pa/ /gang ba bzang zhes sangs rgyas kyis/ /zlos pa rnams la gsungs pa yin/ /de 'di sdug bsngal dag dang ni/ /dbul ba'i sdug bsngal rab zhi
309b3(rgyud): byed| |rtsa ba'i sngags kyis bskul byas na/ /myur du nor gyis phyug par byed/ /'jig rten mkhyen cing legs spyod pas/ /phyag rgya gzhan yang gsungs pa ni/ /
309b4(rgyud): lag gnyis de bzhin byas nas ni/ /g.yon pa phab cing de la brten/ /lag pa g.yas pas bya ba ni/ /de yi sor mo dgug cing gzhag /mdzub mo gung mo nyid
309b5(rgyud): dag ni/ /bsgreng ba rgyal mtshan zhes brjod de/ /rgyal mtshan phyag rgya zhes grags pa/ /bsgreng bas dgra ni zlog par byed/ /phyag rgya 'di yi bya ba ni/ /rim gyis
309b6(rgyud): gtor ma sbyin sreg sogs/ /phyag rgya 'di yis bya ba yin/ /rtsa ba'i sngags kyis rab bskul na/ /'di ni las kun byed pa yin/ /lag pa de bzhin rnam sbyar
309b7(rgyud): ba| |thal mo sbyar ba'i phyag rgya ste/ /bgegs rnams ma lus rnam 'jig cing / /sngags shes mnyam par brjod pa ni/ /rim gyis las rnams byed par 'byung /
310a1(rgyud): cho ga mthong ba'i ldan pas ni/ /myur du don ni sgrub bar byed/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi snying po ni/ /snying gi gnod pa sa yang dag phyung / /
310a2(rgyud): 'jig rten ma lus bsam pa yi/ /las rnams yang dag ldan pas byed/ /lag pa de bzhin sbyar byas nas/ /g.yon pa'i steng du g.yas pa gzhag /g.yas kyi mdzub
310a3(rgyud): mo blangs nas ni/ /g.yon pa'i mdzub mo bsgreng byas pa/ /'di ni srog shing phyag rgya yin/ /dgra rnams kun ni zlog byed cing / /mi bzad shin tu 'jigs rung
310a4(rgyud): ba'i| |bgegs rnams thams cad zhi bar byed/ /sngags zlos pa yis bstan pa ni/ /ma rungs thams cad gsad don phyir/ /rtsa ba'i sngags dang yang dag
310a5(rgyud): ldan| |myur du las ni byed par 'gyur/ /de bzhin lag pa sbyar byas la/ /srog shing 'dra bar btsugs byas nas/ /de steng lag g.yas brkyang byas pa/ /phyag
310a6(rgyud): rgya gdugs zhes bya bar brjod/ /phyag rgya 'di yis bya ba ni/ /bdag gi spyi bor bsrung bar bya/ /sngags rnams kun gyis byed pa ste/ /las ni srung bar byed pa
310a7(rgyud): yin| |dgra rnams kyi ni gdong 'gebs shing / /mi 'dod pa dag rengs par byed/ /mi ma yin dang ma rungs pa/ /ji ltar 'dod par byed pa yin/ /gdugs
310b1(rgyud): kyi phyag rgya de mthong bas/ /bgegs rnams kun ni rnam par 'jig /lag gnyis de bzhin byas nas ni/ /lag pa dag ni mdzes sbyar nas/ /mthe bo mdzub mo rtse sprad ldan//
310b2(rgyud): gung mo gnyis ni rab rkyang zhing / /srin lag gnyis ni rtse sprad bkug /gung mo'i tshigs gnyis sbyar bar bya/ /de nyid mdung gi phyag rgyar bstan/ /ma rungs thams cad
310b3(rgyud): zlog par byed/ /srin po gdon rnams 'jigs byed ces/ /'jig rten mgon gyis gsungs pa yin/ /khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed/ /khros pas rab tu bstan
310b4(rgyud): pa yin/ /mi bzad sdig pa'i las byed pa'i/ /'jig rten la ni rab myur byed/ /srog la gnod par byed pa'i las/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis spangs pa yi/ /las
310b5(rgyud): 'di dag ni mi bya ste/ /'jig rten dam pas bkag pa yin/ /yang na kun 'gro'i sngags sbyar ba'i/ /mdung gi phyag rgya dam pa yin/ /gang dag 'jig rten sngags
310b6(rgyud): rnams dang / /de bzhin rgyal bas rab bshad pa/ /de dag gi ni sngags rnams sbyar/ /mdung gi phyag rgya legs mnyam gzhag /sngags kyi mchog ni mi bzad mthong /
310b7(rgyud): bden bral thams cad 'jig par 'gyur/ /sha za skar ma yi dwags dang / /srul po dang ni ma pa dang / /byis pa'i gdon dang mi sdug gzugs/ /byis pa rnams la
311a1(rgyud): gnod byed pa/ /gang dag gdug pa'i las ldan pa/ /ma rungs thams cad 'joms par byed/ /de bzhin lag ni sbyar byas nas/ /thal mo'i
311a2(rgyud): rnam par byas pa dag / de nyid rnam par bzlog bya ste/ /sor mo phan tshun 'byar ba ni/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas pa zhe sdang bral/ /de nyid kha sbyar zhes ni gsungs/ /
311a3(rgyud): yi ge gcig pa'i sngags dang ni/ /phyag rgya 'di yi las kyis bya/ /'di nyid phyag rgyas phyogs kun bcing / /de ni phyogs bcing zhes bya 'o/ /phyag rgya 'di ni
311a4(rgyud): bsrung ba che/ /kha sbyar byas nas 'dug pa yin/ /gzhan yang gang dag gnod byed pa'i/ /ma rungs thams cad 'jig par byed/ /lus dang sems can 'khor
311a5(rgyud): dang ni/ /spyod yul dag kyang 'dzin par byed/ /gang du zlos pa rtag gnas pa/ /ma lus tshogs ni srung bar byed/ /de la sdig pa ci yang med/ /phan pa med pa'ang
311a6(rgyud): 'byung mi 'gyur/ /bde dang lo legs nad med na/ /pha rol dmag tshogs 'jigs pa gang / /de nas lag gnyis yang sbyar nas/ /bzlog par yang ni
311a7(rgyud): bya ba yin/ /g.yas pa 'og tu byas nas ni/ /g.yon pa'ang steng du bkan par bya/ /lag gnyis phan tshun bsnol ba 'di/ /rgyal ba mchog gis mchog
311b1(rgyud): sbyin gsungs/ /sdig pa yang dag 'byung byed pa'i/ /ma rungs dgra rnams zlog par byed/ /yi ge gcig gnyis gsum dag gi /yi ge ldan ba brjod pa dang //
311b2(rgyud): sngags ni 'dod pa dang ldan pas/ /'di ni myur du las rnams byed/ /dgra las byung ba'i sdig dag la/ /don gyi las rnams sna tshogs byed/ /rtsa ba'i sngags dang
311b3(rgyud): ldan pa yis/ /sbrul gyi dug ni sel bar byed/ /yang na gzhan gyis sbyor ba yi/ /lus can skyon ni sel bar byed/ /sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog dag gis//
311b4(rgyud): 'di ni phyag rgya mchog tu gsungs/ /lag pa de bzhin sbyar byas nas/ /sor mo rnams ni sbyar ba las/ /de tshe da pus 'dra bya ba/ /rtsa bar yang ni bcing ba ste/ /
311b5(rgyud): mthe bong gnyis kyi dbus su ni/ /mthe'u chung dag gis legs par dkri/ /sor mo drug gi bya ba ni/ /rtse mo sbyar te legs mdzes bya/ /'di ni da pus phyag rgyas
311b6(rgyud): gsungs/ /lha min thams cad 'joms par byed/ /lha ma yin dang gdug sems ldan/ /mthong bas sems ni zhi 'gyur zhing / /phyag rgya brjod na 'jig
311b7(rgyud): par 'gyur/ /da bus phyag rgya legs mchod pa/ /rtsa ba'i sngags ni rab sbyar na/ /myur du don rnams byed cing zhi/ /de bzhin ral gri bstan pa yang / /srin lag
312a1(rgyud): mdzub mo bkug pas so/ /de bzhin lag gnyis byas nas ni/ /rab brkyang dang bo dgug par bya/ /sor mo dag gis khor yug tu/ /kham
312a2(rgyud): phor mnyam pa'i dbyibs su bya/ /dril bur sangs rgyas kyis mkhyen cing / /lus can rnams la yang dag bstan/ /lag gnyis de bzhin sbyar nas ni/ /gnyis
312a3(rgyud): ka kha sbyar rab bcings nas/ /phan tshun bsre ba byas nas ni/ /de bzhin gung mo'i sor mo gnyis/ /dkyil 'khor 'dra bar byas pa yis/ /zhags pa 'dra bar
312a4(rgyud): 'byung ba ni/ /de nas mdzub mo gnyis po dag /dbu ma'i tshigs su bcing bya ba/ /'di ni zhags pa zhes bya ste/ /rgya 'di sangs rgyas kyis sprul pa'o/ /sems
312a5(rgyud): can rnams ni gdul don du/ /mi bzad 'ching ba byed par gsungs/ /gang yang ma rungs gdug pa'i gza'/ /gang yang gnod sbyin srin po rnams/ /'di ni
312a6(rgyud): cung zad rab bskul bas/ /'dir ni ma mor bcas pa 'ching / /chings shig chings shig ces brjod pas/ /brgya byin bcas pa'ang 'dir 'ching na/ /
312a7(rgyud): sha za sha ni za ba dang / /mi yi 'jig rten smos ci dgos/ /lag gnyis de bzhin byas nas ni/ /de ni gnyis ka mnyam byas nas/ /de bzhin lag pa g.yas
312b1(rgyud): pa ni/ /g.yon pa'i steng du yongs su gzhag /gung mo dang ni mdzub mo dang / /de nyid lcags kyu 'dra bar bya/ /tshigs ni bar ma la brten nas/ /mdzub mo gnyis ni lcags
312b2(rgyud): kyur bya/ /rtsa ba'i sngags la 'di rab sbyar/ /lcags kyur 'di ni rab tu bya/ /yid la gang zhig zlos par 'dod/ /myur du las ni rab tu byed/ /myur du lha dbang tshangs
312b3(rgyud): pa sogs/ /brgya byin bcas pa'ang 'gugs par byed/ /phyag rgya gtso mchog rab sbyar ba/ /lcags kyu 'gugs pa dge ba yin/ /lag gnyis de bzhin rab sbyar nas/
312b4(rgyud): bzlog pa'i rnam pas nang bcings la/ /g.yon pa'i lag pa'i sor mo ni/ /gung mo srin lag dgug par bya/ /g.yas pa'i lag pa'i sor mo ni/ /gung mo srin lag
312b5(rgyud): rnam par dgug / mdzub mo mthe'u chung dag kyang ni/ /gnyis ka sdigs mdzub bya ba ni/ /de nas rnam bzlog bzhag pa la/ /mthe bong gnyis ni dgug cing sbyar/ /de
312b6(rgyud): nyid bzang po'i gdan gsungs pa/ /phyag rgya mchog ni dge ba yin/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gdan yin te/ /khro ldan sems can zlog pa yin/ /rgyal ba mchog gi rigs
312b7(rgyud): las byung / /sngags rnams kun la rab tu sbyar/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' kun/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po 'joms byed cing / /lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten
313a1(rgyud): dag |thams cad g.yo byed med pa 'o/ /bzang po'i stan ni de nyid la/ /gung mo la ni yang dag brten/ /steng du rnam par dgod pa ni/ /gung
313a2(rgyud): mo srin lag rab brkyang ba'o/ /de nyid gdan du gsungs pa ni/ /thub pa dgra rgyal seng ges so/ /de bzhin lag gnyis sbyar nas ni/ /sor mo rnams ni bcing
313a3(rgyud): bar bya/ /de nas yal ga 'dra bar ni/ /'og tu mthe'u chung rtse mor sbyar/ /gung mo yang dag dgug bya zhing / /pad+ma'i 'dab ltar yangs pa bya/ /mthe bong gnyis
313a4(rgyud): ka sbyar bzhag nas/ /rtag tu bsgreng ste bzhag pa yin/ /zhe sdang bral ba'i sangs rgyas kyis/ /'di ni rma bya'i gdan du gsungs/ /'di ni blo ldan 'jam pa'i
313a5(rgyud): dbyangs/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'di yi ni/ /byis pa rtag tu rtse byed pa'i/ /gdan du thub pa mchog gis gsungs/ /mthu chen phyag rgya chen po 'di//
313a6(rgyud): rang byung rnams kyis sngon bshad pa'o/ /'jam dbyangs sngags kyi rab bskul na/ /rnam pa sna tshogs las rnams byed/ /sha za sha ni za ba rnams/ /
313a7(rgyud): gdug pa rnams ni 'jig par byed/ /nyi shu de bzhin tshang bar ni/ /de dag phyag rgyar 'dod pa ste/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas pa rkang gnyis mchog /'jig rten
313b1(rgyud): gtso bos gsungs pa yin/ /de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /phyag rgya rnams kyi cho ga rnams/ /lag pa dge zhing dag pa dang / /dri med chu yis bkrus pa dang / /tsan+dan
313b2(rgyud): dkar dang ga pur dang / /gur gum chu dang ldan pa yi/ /dri yi khyad par mang po yis/ /byugs shing me la bskams pa yi/ /lag pha ma nyams gtsang ba dang / /
313b3(rgyud): ma smad shu ba med pa yis/ /dang por phyag rgya rkang gnyis mchog /de yi phyag rgya bcing bar bya/ /sa la me tog kun skyes dang / /'od dpag med dang rin chen tog/
313b4(rgyud): dpag med tshe zhes mi g.yo dbang / /'jig rten mgon po nyin byed dang / /bde byed 'jig rten mgon po dang / /spyan bzang chos kyi tog dang ni/ /'od kyi phreng ba zhes
313b5(rgyud): grags pa/ /gtso bo mchog ni dam pa dag /'di dag ga bur sangs rgyas ni/ /rkang gnyis mchog la phyag byas nas/ /gtsang ba'i gnas su gtsang byas nas/ /
313b6(rgyud): zlos pa'i dus su phyag rgya bcing / /slob dpon la ni yang dag dris/ /the tshom don las rnam par grol/ /de 'dra'i spyod pa de ldan na/ /ji ltar bde bar phyag rgya
313b7(rgyud): bcing / /rnam sbyangs rnam par dben pa dang / /gnas kyang mngon par bsngags byas pa/ /khros min zan zas lhag bcas min/ /gzhan dag gis ni sems g.yengs
314a1(rgyud): min| |sol ba thal ba'i nang dag tu/ /nam yang phyag rgya bshad mi bya/ /gzhan gyi bud med la chags dang / /gzhan nor chags la'ang bshad
314a2(rgyud): mi bya| |langs dang nyal ba dag la ni/ /phyag rgya bde 'byung bshad mi bya/ /lhor ltas 'dug la'ang ma yin te/ /nub tu bltas te 'dug la'ang min/ /steng dang 'og
314a3(rgyud): gi phyogs dag tu'ang / /phyag rgya bcing bar mi bya 'o/ /byang dang shar du bltas pa dang / /phyogs mtshams dag ni de dag tu/ /dkyil 'khor bdag po'i sngags
314a4(rgyud): dran nas/ /sngags shes pas ni phyag rgya bcing / /phyag rgya ma lus bcing ba la/ /cho ga mchog 'di 'dod pa yin/ /de yi 'og tu brjod bya ba/ /phyag rgya nyi shu
314a5(rgyud): gcig pa yin/ /lag gnyis mnyam par byas nas ni/ /sor mo rnams ni sbyar bar bya/ /de nas sor mo gung mo ni/ /rtse mo sbyar bar bya ba yin/ /mdzub mo
314a6(rgyud): dang ni mthe'u chung gi / rtse mo tshigs ni bar mar gzhag /phyag rgya shes pas rtag bya ba/ /mthe bong gnyis ni bkug rten cing / /rtse mo gsum sbyar yang dag ldan//
314a7(rgyud): paT+Ti saM du mkhas pas shes/ /phyag rgya 'di ni mchog yin te/ /myur du gzhan gyi sngags rnams gcod/ /de nas gzhan gyi phyag rgya gcod/ /ma rungs sems can
314b1(rgyud): la sbyar bya/ /gza' dang ma mo srul po yi/ /'byung po kun ni skrag par byed/ /las rnams sna tshogs byed pa ste/ /zhi ba'ang myur du 'gugs par byed/ /drag po khyab
314b2(rgyud): 'jug tshangs pa dag / gang dag rang gis smras pa'i sngags/ /cho ga mthong ba'i las kyis ni/ /sngags shes pas ni de dag gcod/ /bdag nyid chen po paT+Ti sa'i/ /
314b3(rgyud): phyag rgya dang ni ldan pa dang / /rgyal ba'i zhal nas byung ba yi/ /sngags nyid dang yang ldan gnas na/ /rnam pa sna tshogs las byed de/ /de bzhin gcod dang dral ba'i
314b4(rgyud): las| |sems can gzhan gyis byas pa'i skyon/ /ma lus mtha' dag 'jig par byed/ /lag gnyis de bzhin sbyar nas ni/ /gung mo srin lag bsgreng bya ste/ /lag
314b5(rgyud): gnyis yang dag ldan pa ni/ /mtshan dang 'dra bar yang dag 'byung / /sor mo bzhi ni yang dag ldan/ /mtshan gyi phyag rgya zhes 'dod do/ /lha yi bu na dbang phyug che//
314b6(rgyud): rang gi rgyas ni phyag rgya btab/ /thub pas sngon ni bkug pa la/ /rgyud 'di las ni gsungs pa yin/ /cho ga mchog 'dir dam tshig dang / /bdag nyid sngags 'di ma
314b7(rgyud): lus dag / de bzhin phyag rgya rgya cher bcas/ /bkug nas rab tu bstan pa yin/ /phyag rgya yi ni rab mchog 'di/ /'jig rten dag la rab tu bstan/ /phyag rgya dag ni
315a1(rgyud): gang ji snyed/ /drag pos sa steng rab bstan pa/ /de dag gi ni bdag po mchog /phyag rgya 'di ni rtags cig yin/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs
315a2(rgyud): ni blo ldan pa/ /byang chub sems dpa'i mthu yis ni/ /dkyil 'khor 'dir ni bsdus pa ste/ /sbyin sreg las ni rab sgrub pa'o/ /gang dag ji snyed gdug pa pa//
315a3(rgyud): sa yi steng na rgyu ba yi/ /gdon dang sha rjen sha za dang / /ma mo dang ni lus srul po/ /drag pos bgegs ni byas pa dag /de dag bzlog pa'i don ched du/ /
315a4(rgyud): mtshan mo gtor ma'i las dag la/ /phyag rgya mchog 'di gsungs pa yin/ /sangs rgyas byin rlabs rdzu 'phrul gyis/ /las rnams ma lus byed par 'gyur//
315a5(rgyud): de bzhin de ni rnam gnyis byas/ /rtags ni gnyis su yang dag bstan/ /de bzhin sor mo phreng bar byas/ /phreng ba zhes ni yongs su bsgrags/ /de nyid phreng
315a6(rgyud): ba yang dag bsdus/ /kha sbyar 'dra bar yang dag 'byung / /mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse sprad pa/ /gzhu dang 'dra bar bya ba yin/ /mthe bong gnyis ni chang bar
315a7(rgyud): mnan/ /de ni gzhu yi phyag rgyar mtshon/ /de bzhin sor mo byas nas ni/ /g.yas pa'i mdzub mo nges par brkyang / /g.yon pa'i mdzub mo'ang brkyang byas
315b1(rgyud): te| |mthe bo'i tshigs ni chang par mnan/ /lcags mda'i phyag rgya zhes bstan te/ /mtshan mo mnyam par yang brjod do/ /de bzhin lag gnyis byas nas ni/ /sor
315b2(rgyud): mo rnams ni phan tshun bcing / /mdzub gnyis bslang bar yang dag sbyar/ /mdung dang 'dra bar byas pa yang / /ma rungs thams cad rjes skrag pa/ /'di ni mdung zhes
315b3(rgyud): rab tu gsungs/ /de bzhin lag gnyis byas nas ni/ /gnyi ga'ang khu tshur bcing bya zhing / /mthe bong gnyis ni bsgreng byas pa/ /tho ba'i phyag rgyar bstan pa yin/ /
315b4(rgyud): kha sbyar tho ba de nyid las/ /cung zad rab tu bskyod pa ni/ /mda' chen mchog tu gsungs pa ste/ /phyag rgya dgra ni 'jig byed pa'o/ /de nas ut+pal bcings byas te/ /
315b5(rgyud): de bzhin mthe'u chung sor mo gnyis/ /mthe bo'i 'og gi nang dag tu/ /dgod cing mdzub mo bstan par bya/ /'di ni mche ba zhes gsungs te/ /rnam par phye ba zhal
315b6(rgyud): zhes brjod/ /sor mo dag ni kun nas kyang / /de dag mnyam par byas nas su/ /g.yas pa'i lag pa'i dkyil dag tu/ /g.yon pa'i lag bzhag ba dan brjod/ /
315b7(rgyud): lag pa dag ni gnyis ka yang / /kha sbyar dag ni mdzes par gzhag /sor dang sor mo dag kyang ni/ /phan tshun rtse mo dag sbyar bya/ /de nas srin lag rtse gnyis
316a1(rgyud): dgug / bum pa'i phyag rgyar yang dag bstan/ /de nyid khu tshur sbyar nas ni/ /mdzub mo gnyis ni sngon du bsgreng / /rtse mo dgug pa'i
316a2(rgyud): rnam par bya/ /'khar gsil 'dra bar 'gyur ba yin/ /phyag rgya 'di ni yang dag bstan/ /'khar gsil dgra ni sel bar byed/ /'khar gsil de nyid cung zad
316a3(rgyud): tsam| |legs par rab tu btud pa ni/ /mthe bo gnyis la rnam par sbyar/ /de 'dir bya ma bum du brjod/ /mdzub mo dang ni srin lag gnyis/ /bsgreng bar yang
316a4(rgyud): ni bya ba ste/ /de dag gi ni rtse bzhi sprad/ /gtun shing 'dra bar yang dag 'gyur/ /sngags shes yang dag ldan pa yis/ /gtun shing gi ni phyag rgyar bshad/ /
316a5(rgyud): lag gnyis de bzhin sbyar nas ni/ /gung mo srin lag 'og dang ni/ /steng du de dag rnam par dgod/ /g.yas pas g.yon pa bcing bar bya/ /de bzhin mthe bong
316a6(rgyud): sbyar nas ni/ /gung mo srin lag 'og dang ni/ /steng du de dag rnam par dgod/ /g.yas pas g.yon pa bcing bar bya/ /sor mo mdzub mo mthe'u chung dag /
316a7(rgyud): phan tshun du ni yang dag sbyar/ /khor yug skyil krung 'dra ba yi/ /phyag rgyar de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs/ /'di ni skyil krung phyag rgya zhes/ /'jig rten
316b1(rgyud): kun tu grags pa yin/ /phyag rgya 'di dag ldan pa dang / /de bzhin sngags dang rab ldan pa/ /rgyal ba kun gyis gsungs pa dang / /rdo rje pad+ma'i rigs las byung / /
316b2(rgyud): 'di dag gi ni sngags ldan 'di/ /zhi ba'i las kun byed pa yin/ /gtun shing la sogs mdung gi bar/ /gang yang phyag rgya de bzhin gsungs/ /thams cad khro bo'i
316b3(rgyud): rgyal po ni/ /gshin rje gshed 'di'i bstan pa yin/ /mtshon cha drag po 'di dag ni/ /thams cad gdul phyir sbrul pa yin/ /byang chub sems dpa'i mthu yis ni/ /
316b4(rgyud): de tshe bsgrub bya sgrub pa yin/ /gdul bya gdug pa thams cad la/ /bum pa la sogs phyag rgya gsungs/ /lag gnyis de bzhin byas nas ni/ /pa Ta ha yi rnga 'dra bya/ /
316b5(rgyud): sor mo rnams ni mnyam par sbyar/ /thams cad kyis kyang rim par bsnol/ /mthe bong yang ni rim par bya/ /de nas lag pa'i nang du gzhug /gung mo mdzub mo
316b6(rgyud): gnyis po ni/ /gyen du bsgreng pa dag tu bya/ /'di ni pa Ta ha zhes bstan/ /phyag rgya ma rungs zlog byed pa'o/ /lag gnyis de bzhin byas nas ni/ /sor mo rnams ni
316b7(rgyud): legs rab sbyar/ /gdub kor 'dra bar mdzes pa yi/ /mdzub mo gnyis ni rnam bkug la/ /mthe bong gnyis ni 'og mthar bya/ /mthe bong gnyis kyang smad par
317a1(rgyud): bya| |gung mo sbyar la rab gzhug bzhag / dung ni mdzes par 'gyur ba yin/ /'di ni chos kyi dung zhes ba'i/ /lag pa'i phyag rgya
317a2(rgyud): rab tu bstan/ /thub mchog gsungs pa'i sngags ldan na/ /las ni thams cad byed pa yin/ /rnam pa sna tshogs las byed pa/ /rtsa ba'i sngags dang rab sbyar
317a3(rgyud): na| |mche ba'i dug can thams cad dang / /sbrul gyi dug rnams thams cad sel/ /rig pa'i rgyal po rdzu 'phrul che/ /phyag rgya mchog ni rdzu 'phrul che/ /phyag rgya dung ni 'bud bzhin bzlas/ /
317a4(rgyud): dug gis brgyal ba'i skye bo ni/ /myur du dug ni med par 'gyur/ /phyag rgya mchog ni rdzu 'phrul che/ /bzhi bcu dag ni yang dag bstan/ /de nas gzhan
317a5(rgyud): yang phyag rgya yi/ /mtshan nyid yang dag bshad bya ba/ /lag gnyis de bzhin rnam bkod pa/ /sor mo'i rtse mo legs par sbyar/ /g.yon min lag
317a6(rgyud): pa'i nang du ni/ /'bad pas lag g.yon gzhug par bya/ /thams cad 'og tu byas pa yi/ /lu gu rgyud du bstan pa yin/ /'di ni phyag rgya rab mchog ste/ /
317a7(rgyud): gdug pa ma lus 'ching bar byed/ /thub pa mchog gis gsungs pa yi/ /sngags 'di dag dang ldan byas na/ /gza' dang ma mo sdig ldan rnams/ /
317b1(rgyud): 'byung po ma lus 'ching bar 'gyur/ /lag gnyis de bzhin kun bsdus nas/ /bkrol zhing rim par yang dag bsgreng / /gung mo'i tshigs su mthe bong ni/ /'di
317b2(rgyud): nyid cho gas gzhag par bya/ /mthe bong gnyis kyi rtse mo yang / /gung mo'i bar tshigs yang dag sbyar/ /me la mngon phyogs bstan byas nas/ /me yi sngags dang
317b3(rgyud): legs par sbyar/ /me yi las la thams cad du/ /me lha spyan ni drang bya ste/ /me yi phyag rgya rab sbyar na/ /myur du me ni spyan drang 'gyur/ /phyag rgya sngags kyis gshegs
317b4(rgyud): su gsol/ /mdzub mo'i rtse mo nyid la ni/ /mthe bong rtse mo rab sbyar bas/ /me yi lha ni gshegs gsol ba'i/ /phyag rgya 'di ni kun gyis bzhed/ /me yi lha ni rab
317b5(rgyud): sgrub pa'o/ /zlos pa sngags ni gang 'dod pa'i/ /lha rnams dag ni spyan drang 'gyur/ /phyag rgya kun gyi bzhed pa 'di/ /sangs rgyas byin brlab gsungs pa yin/ /sngags
317b6(rgyud): mchog dang ni ldan pa yis/ /las rnams rnam pa sna tshogs byed/ /lag gnyis de bzhin byas nas ni/ /sor mo tshang bar sbyar nas ni/ /sor mo'i rtse mo mthong
317b7(rgyud): dbye zhing / /lhod cing zlum par yang dag bya/ /de nas pad+ma yongs rdzogs pa/ /kha ni bye bar ma gyur bya/ /'di ni re ba rdzogs byed pa'i/ /phyag rgya don kun sgrub
318a1(rgyud): byed ces/ /phyag rgya 'di ni rab mchog ste/ /sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs/ /sems can rnams la phan 'dod nas/ /'jam dpal
318a2(rgyud): dbyangs kyis sbyar ba yin/ /sems can yid la 'dod pa dag /yid la re ba'i phan 'dod gang / /rdzu 'phrul chen po sngags ldan pas/ /myur du de dag sgrub par
318a3(rgyud): byed| |phyag rgya 'di ni rab mchog ste/ /yid la re ba rdzogs zhes brjod/ /'di ni phyag rgya rab mchog ste/ /las kun rab tu sgrub byed pa'o/ /myur du sngags rnams
318a4(rgyud): sgrub byed cing / /rgya che nyid kyi rdzas dang bcas/ /thub pa'i zla ba de yis ni/ /zla ba'i 'od la rab tu bstan/ /zla bas pad+ma'i rigs dag la/ /des ni phyag rgya 'di la
318a5(rgyud): sbyar| |sngags mkhan ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin/ /rnam pa sna tshogs las rnams byed/ /lag gnyis de bzhin bsdu byas nas/ /mdzub mo gnyis ni bsgreng bar bya/ /
318a6(rgyud): gung mo'i sor mo'i rtse mo gnyis/ /cung zad smad pa rta babs yin/ /de nyid yang dag bsgreng byas nas/ /rta babs bzang por gsungs pa yin/ /de nyid phan tshun
318a7(rgyud): sbyar byas pa/ /sangs rgyas ru dung sgra ru bstan/ /mthe bo'i gtso bo bsgreng byas pa/ /mkhas pas rgyal ba'i sgra ru shes/ /lag gnyis de bzhin yang dag sbyar//
318b1(rgyud): mdzub mo'i rtse mo yang dag dgug /sor mo thams cad sbyar byas la/ /cung zad yangs par 'byung ba ni/ /de ni sangs rgyas rnga chen mkhyen/ /chos kyi rnga ni bsgreng byas
318b2(rgyud): pa'o/ /de nas lag gcig thal mo ni/ /g.yas pa g.yon pa'i steng du bsgreng / /'og tu rab tu sbyar ba ni/ /glang po'i rnam par yang dag sbyar/ /g.yas pa'i gung
318b3(rgyud): mo'i sor mo ni/ /glang po'i sna 'drar rab tu bya/ /'khor ba'i pha rol phyin pa yis/ /phyag rgya de ni glang por bstan/ /phyag rgya 'di ni phyag rgya che/ /rdzogs sangs
318b4(rgyud): rgyas kyis rab tu bstan/ /las rnams mtha' dag byed pa ste/ /'jig rten kun gyis mchod pa yin/ /lag g.yas brkyang zhing rab bsgreng ba/ /de ni mi 'jigs
318b5(rgyud): sbyin par brtags / lag pa g.yon pa brkyang byas pa'i/ /mkhrig ma'i tshigs la rab bzhag pa'o/ /gung mo mdzub mo sbyar byas la/ /mthe bong gnyis ni rab
318b6(rgyud): tu gzhug / gung mo gnyis ni bsgreng bar bya/ /'khrul pa med pa'i rgya de yin/ /de nyid sor mo rnam sbyar zhing / /mthe bong steng du gnas byas te/ /tshigs kyi 'og tu
318b7(rgyud): rab bzhag pa/ /mjug rings kyi ni rgya zhes bstan/ /de nyid mdzub rtse rab bsgreng ba/ /mda' yi phyag rgyar bstan pa yin/ /mdzub rtse gnyis ni yang dag ldan/ /
319a1(rgyud): phan tshun rtse mo rnam sprad cing / /de gnyis tshigs su mthe ba gnyis sbyar/ /mthe'u chung gnyis ni yang dag brkyang / /de nyid dgra star bstan pa
319a2(rgyud): ste| |phyag rgya don kun sgrub byed pa'o/ /thams cad yang dag bsdu ba yang / /phyag rgya kun gyis mchod pa yin/ /de bzhin du ni rab bsgreng ba/ /mdzub gnyis
319a3(rgyud): rtse mo sbyar byas pa/ /de ni mtshon cha rtse gcig rgya/ /de bzhin 'khor lo mda' chen gshol/ /mdzub mo 'khor lo bzhin bya dang / /phyag rgya dam pa gshol yang
319a4(rgyud): bya| |phyag rgya drug cu 'di dag ni/ /cho ga dang bcas gsungs pa'ang yin/ /'di dag ma lus mtshon cha'i rgya/ /sngags dang yang dag ldan par gsungs/ /dman
319a5(rgyud): pa kun gyis byas pa'i skyon/ /gza' dang grul bum ma mo dang / /srin po kun gyi gtso bo rnams/ /byis pa'i sems can 'jigs byed pa/ /phyag rgya'i mtshon
319a6(rgyud): cha las byung bas/ /de dag thams cad des 'jig 'gyur/ /phyag rgya drug cu 'di dag gi /mtshan nyid nye bar bstan pa yin/ /de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba//
319a7(rgyud): phyag rgya'i cho ga yang dag 'byung / /lag gnyis de bzhin rnam bkod pa/ /pad+ma 'dra bar yang dag bsgreng / /sor mo thams cad kyis bsgrubs pa/ /phyag rgya pad+ma
319b1(rgyud): zhes bya'o/ /phyag rgya 'di ni mchog ces bya/ /pad+ma'i rigs la yang dag sbyar/ /pad+ma'i rigs ni ji snyed pa'i/ /sngags dang ldan pas dge par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas byin
319b2(rgyud): rlabs las byung ba/ /myur du lam rnams byed par brjod/ /ji snyed pad+ma'i rigs gsungs pa/ /sngags rnams ma lus sgrub par byed/ /pad+ma rnams kyi phyag rgya 'di/ /
319b3(rgyud): phyag rgya'i pad+ma zhes su brjod/ /lag gnyis yang dag sbyar nas ni/ /mdzub mo gnyis ni yang dag bsgreng / /gung mo'i rtse mo sbyar byas nas/ /rdo rje rtse gsum yang dag
319b4(rgyud): 'gyur/ /gung mo'i sor mo'i tshigs dbus su/ /mthe bong gnyis kyi rtse mor sbyar/ /de nyid rdo rje zhes gsungs te/ /phyag rgya dam pa tha ma yin/ /ji snyed rdo rje'i rigs kyi
319b5(rgyud): sngags/ /de dag phyag rgya 'dis sgrub 'gyur/ /cho ga ldan par rab zhugs na/ /myur ba nyid du 'grub par 'gyur/ /sgrub pa las ngang yang dag ldan/ /bsgrub bya rtag tu
319b6(rgyud): sgrub pa na/ /sgrub mchog tha ma bar ma ni/ /de la rtag tu 'grub par 'gyur/ /'jig rten sngags rnams ma lus pa'ang / /the tshom med par 'grub par 'gyur/ /
319b7(rgyud): lag gnyis yang dag sbyar byas nas/ /gung mo gnyis ni yang dag bsgreng / /srin lag mthe bong dag kyang dgug /mthe'u chung gnyis ni sbyar byas la/ /mdzub gnyis
320a1(rgyud): rtse mo sprad nas ni/ /mdzub mo'i dbus tshigs gnyis dgug bya/ /gung mo gnyis kyi rtse mo sbyar/ /'khor lo 'dra bar yang dag 'byung / /'di
320a2(rgyud): ni chos kyi 'khor lo ste/ /'di ni phyag rgya'i rgyal por bstan/ /de tshe chos rgyal gyis gsungs te/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /thub pa'i zla ba bdun pa
320a3(rgyud): yis| |de tshe zhi ba'i 'khor lor gsungs/ /phyag rgya'i rgyal po rab sbyar nas/ /dus gsum rgyun mi chad bzlas na/ /'jig rten pa yi sngags kun dang / /khyab
320a4(rgyud): 'jug dbang ldan gyis bshad pa/ /zlos pa phyag rgyar yang dag ldan/ /mthong ba tsam gyis de dag gcod/ /'di ni phyag rgya rab mchog ste/ /chos kyi dbyings las
320a5(rgyud): rnam par byung / /sems can rnams ni ci 'dod pa/ /thams cad las ni byed par 'gyur/ /chos kyi rgyal pos zhi don du/ /phyag rgya 'di ni yang dag bstan/ /cho
320a6(rgyud): ga'i rgyal po'i mchog 'di ni/ /las rnams ma lus rab tu sgrub /'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis bstan pa la/ /chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya 'di'o/ /ma zhi ba yi
320a7(rgyud): phyag rgya kun/ /zhi ba'i las la rab tu sbyar/ /sngags pas rtag tu mgo bor ni/ /'khor lo'i phyag rgya brtag par bya/ /lag gnyis de bzhin byas nas ni/ /kha
320b1(rgyud): sbyar 'dra bar bya ba yin/ /sor mo lhod cing yangs par bya/ /lag gnyis sor mo'i rtse dgug pa/ /'di ni pad+ma dkar po yin/ /phyag rgya sems can
320b2(rgyud): don sgrub shes/ /de las lag pa gcig btang nas/ /khu tshur phye zhing sor mo bsrings/ /lag pa brkyang ba lta ba ni/ /mchog sbyin gyi ni phyag rgyar brjod/ /
320b3(rgyud): lag gnyis kyang ni de bzhin byas/ /kun nas sor mo rnams kyis ni/ /phreng ba bzhin du gshibs byas pa/ /rgyal ba'i phyag rgyar 'di brjod do/ /de bzhin lag
320b4(rgyud): gnyis sbyar nas ni/ /gung mo mdzub mo gnyis dag ni/ /khab kyi rnam par bya ba yin/ /de las gzhan pa'i sor mo ni/ /cung zad dgug par bya ba yin/ /de la mdzub
320b5(rgyud): mo gnyis dag ni/ /gnas pa'i rnam par legs dgod bya/ /de yang yang dag sbyar byas te/ /srin lag gi ni tshigs su brten/ /'jig rten mang po'i 'dren pas ni/ /
320b6(rgyud): rus sbal phyag rgyar 'di bstan te/ /de bzhin lag gnyis rnam par dgod/ /sor mo dag ni kun nas kyang / /gnyis ka khu tshur mnyam byas nas/ /mdzub mo gnyis
320b7(rgyud): ni sbyar bya ba/ /mkhas pas phyag rgya de nyid ni/ /rdo rje dbyug par yang dag brjod/ /lag gnyis de bzhin yang dag par/ /kha sbyar 'dra bar byas nas ni/ /phan tshun
321a1(rgyud): sbyar ba la brten nas/ /sor mo'i thal mor rnam par dgod/ /mthe bong gnyis ni nang gzhug pa/ /dgra 'jigs phyag rgyar brjod pa
321a2(rgyud): yin| |de nas lag gnyis mnyam byas te/ /de nas thal mo sbyar nas ni/ /kun nas gzhol bar rab tu bya/ /gru yi bzhon bar rab tu 'byung / /'jig rten gsum
321a3(rgyud): gyi skyob pa yis/ /gru yi phyag rgyar 'di rab bstan/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtsho chen po las/ /'byung po rnams ni yang dag sgrol/ /sor mo de nyid bsgreng nas ni/ /de tshe
321a4(rgyud): lag gnyis sna tshogs bya/ /phyag rgya gzhal med khang zhes bya/ /sems can steng du rjes su 'dzud/ /de bzhin las gnyis yang dag bsdus/ /shing rta zhes ni
321a5(rgyud): de la brjod/ /theg gsum 'gro ba'i gtso bo ste/ /skyob pa rnams kyis shing rtar gsungs/ /zlos pa sngags ni 'dod pa dang / /'byung po kun ni 'dren par
321a6(rgyud): byed| |theg pa mchog la brten nas ni/ /sangs rgyas go 'phang thob par byed/ /de nyid lag gnyis rab bsgreng nas/ /gnyi ga yang ni kha sbyar bya/ /lag mthil
321a7(rgyud): gnyis ni mnyam byas brkyang / /lan ka na 'dra bar yang dag 'byung / /'di ni phyag rgya rab mchog ste/ /'jig rten mgon gyis legs mchod pa'o/ /sangs rgyas
321b1(rgyud): kun gyi gnas rnams su/ /thub pa'i zla bas yang dag gsungs/ /gang du 'das pa'i sangs rgyas dang / /ma 'ong sa de ltar bzhugs pa dang / /mya ngan 'das pa'i dbyings
321b2(rgyud): la bzhugs/ /gung du gnas mal la bzhugs pa/ /phyag rgya gnas mal zhes bya bar/ /'jig rten 'dren pas de 'dir mkhyen/ /lag gnyis de bzhin byas nas ni/ /
321b3(rgyud): sor mo rnams ni yang dag sbyar/ /kha sbyar du ni rnam par dgod/ /g.yas pa'i mdzub mo gcig gis ni/ /g.yon pa'i rtse mor gtug bya ba/ /de ni zla ba phyed du brjod//
321b4(rgyud): lag gnyis de bzhin byas nas ni/ /g.yas pa'i sor mos khu tshur bya/ /lag pa g.yon la yod pa yi/ /sor mo kun ni mnyam bsgreng ste/ /sor mo'i rtse mos khu tshur
321b5(rgyud): bcing / /g.yas dang g.yon pa ldan pa yi/ /sor mo rnams ni sbyar byas nas/ /mthe'u chung gnyis ni brkyang byas pa/ /pi wang phyag rgyar nye bar bstan/ /lag gnyis
321b6(rgyud): de bzhin byas nas ni/ /sor mo cung zad kha bye yang / /mthe bong gnyis kyi bar du ni/ /mdzub mo gnyis ni brten par bya/ /'di ni pad mtsho'i phyag rgya ste/ /rdzogs
321b7(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyis 'gro la gsungs/ /rtag tu mthe bong gnyis brkyang ba/ /ut+pal yi phyag rgya zhes/ /rkang gnyis dam pa sangs rgyas kyis/ /'jig rten du ni gsungs
322a1(rgyud): pa yin/ /de nyid thal mo sbyar byas pa/ /'gro pa phyag 'tshal 'dra ba ste/ /bla ma phyag 'tshal rgya 'di zhes/ /'jig rten kun tu rnam par
322a2(rgyud): grags/ /rgya de nyid ni bsdam byas na/ /lag gnyis zung du yang dag 'byung / /rgya 'di lag pa gnyis zung zhes/ /'jig rten gsum du rnam par grags/ /cung
322a3(rgyud): zad mthe bong rtsar bzhag ste/ /mthe rtsar phan tshun legs gnon pa/ /de ni kha sbyar rgya ru 'gyur/ /mya ngan 'khrug pa rnam par 'jig /gang dag mtshon cha las byung
322a4(rgyud): rnams/ /phyag rgya 'di dag gsungs pa yin/ /me tog gdan dang bzhon pa dang / /gzhan yang gdon ni 'jigs byed pa/ /thams cad las kun byed ldan pa/ /skyo ba
322a5(rgyud): pa'i sngags kun thams cad yin/ /chos grangs dang ni rgyu skar dang / /smyung ba dag kyang mi bya ste/ /phyag rgya sngags su rab ldan pa/ /las rnams myur du grub
322a6(rgyud): par byed/ /zlos pa dka' thub ldan pa dang / /sngags zlos pa la mkhas pa dang / /phyag rgya sngags su rab ldan na/ /bsgrub bya min pa'ang cung zad med/ /lag
322a7(rgyud): pa gnyis po bya ba yin/ /phan tshun thal mo yang dag sbyar/ /mthe'u chung srin lag mthe bo yi/ /tshigs ni par ma sbyar bya ba/ /gung mo sbyar ba'i tshigs gsum
322b1(rgyud): par| |mdzub mo bkug ste sbyar bar bya/ /rigs gsum gyi ni spyi la yang / /mchod yon gyi ni phyag rgyar bstan/ /sor mo zung ni gsum po dag /de bzhin phan tshun
322b2(rgyud): yang dag sbyar/ /mdzub mo'i rtse gnyis yang dag sprad/ /mthe bong gnyis kyi 'gram du bskum/ /thal mo 'dra bar yang dag ldan/ /me tog phyag rgyar bstan pa yin/ /
322b3(rgyud): lag pa'i thal mo bkan byas nas/ /mthe'u chung sbyar byas rgyab tu ni/ /srin lag yang dag sbyar bar bya/ /de yi rgyab tu gung mo sbyar/ /mdzub mo gnyis ni sbyar bar
322b4(rgyud): bya| |sa la thal sbyar bya ba yin/ /mthe bong gnyis ni 'gram bzhag pa/ /chos kyi phyag rgya rgyar bstan pa yin/ /thal mo gzhan gyi sbyor ba yis/ /mdzub gnyis cung
322b5(rgyud): zad bkug pa ni/ /gtor ma'i spyi yi phyag rgya ru/ /'jig rten skyob pas de gsungs so/ /ji ltar cho ga bzhin du ni/ /nang du me tog gzhug byas na/ /gtor ma kun gyi
322b6(rgyud): las la ni/ /gsang sngags kun la byin par 'gyur/ /g.yas pa mi 'jigs sbyin pa'i lag /g.yon pa'ang de bzhin bya ba yin/ /mkhrig mar sbyor ba'i bya ba yis//
322b7(rgyud): g.yas g.yon dag ni bsnol bar bya/ /'di ni sngags rnams ma lus pa'i/ /dri yi phyag rgyar brjod pa yin/ /lag g.yas khu tshur bcings nas ni/ /mthe bo dang ni
323a1(rgyud): gung mo gnyis/ /de nas rab tu sbyar bar bya/ /mar me'i phyag rgyar brjod pa yin/ /srin lag dang ni mthe bo nyid/ /bgrang phreng dag tu yang
323a2(rgyud): dag gnas/ /rtag tu mthe'u chung rnam par brkyang / /de 'og gung mo'ang brkyang bar bya/ /mdzub mo bskums te bzhag pa la/ /bgrang phreng gi ni phyag rgyar brjod/ /
323a3(rgyud): de nas thal sbyar nang du ni/ /sngags rig pas ni phreng ba gzhug /ci 'dod sngags ni bzla byas na/ /myur du grub pa'i mchog rab ster/ /cho ga 'di ni rtag mthong
323a4(rgyud): na| |sngags rnams kun ni spyod par byed/ /me la lag pa g.yas pa ni/ /mi 'jigs sbyin pa'i phyag rgyar bya/ /me la sngon du bltas bzhag nas/ /mdzub mo
323a5(rgyud): rtag tu dgug par bya/ /mthe bong lag pa'i dbus su ni/ /bkug nas yang dag rab tu dgod/ /me ni yongs su spyan drang ba'i/ /phyag rgyar 'di ni bstan pa yin//
323a6(rgyud): mdzub mo yi ni rtse mo dang / /mthe bong gcig tu sbyar bya ba/ /me dang las rnams kun la ni/ /gshegs su gsol bar rab tu snang / /sngags rnams kun la
323a7(rgyud): mkhas pa yis/ /sbyin sreg las la bya ba yin/ /phyag rgya 'di dag ldan pa yis/ /sngags ni me la legs par sbyar/ /phyag 'tshal thal mo byas pa las/ /
323b1(rgyud): sor mo kun nas nang du gzhug /de nyid rnam par bzlog byas nas/ /mthe bong gnyis kyang gshib par bya/ /mdzub mo phyi rol yang dag bkug /gung mo dag la yang
323b2(rgyud): dag brten/ /phyag rgya 'di ni mchog tu gsungs/ /mchod pa'i las la sbyar bar bya/ /sngags rnams kun la phyag 'tshal dang / /sngags kyi mgon po
323b3(rgyud): rgyal sras sbyar/ /sngags rnams kun la sbyang ba dang / /gdan dag la yang rab tu sbyar/ /me tog med bar gyur na yang / /phyag rgya bcings la mchod
323b4(rgyud): par bya/ /cho ga 'di yis mchod na ni/ /sngags rnams don kun sgrub par byed/ /mchod yon phyag rgya byas pas ni/ /mchod pa bzang po byas par 'gyur/ /gnyis
323b5(rgyud): pa sems kyi mchod pa ste/ /me tog ci 'dra yod pas so/ /rdzogs sangs rkang gnyis dam pa yis/ /mchod pa'i cho ga 'di gsungs so/ /me tog med par gyur na
323b6(rgyud): yang | |mchod pa rnam pa gnyis su brjod/ /sngags rnams rab tu 'grub bya'i phyir/ /las rnams kun la sbyar bar bya/ /sngags kun byed pa'i phyag rgya ni/ /sangs
323b7(rgyud): rgyas kun gyis gsungs pa'ang yin/ /gnas dang mal dang bzhon pa dang / /khrus dang btung dang bza' ba dang / /mar me spos dang sngags khrus dang / /dkyil 'khor
324a1(rgyud): dag ni byed pa la/ /sngags rnams kun gyi dam tshig dang / /sngags pa rnams kyis byin rlabs byed/ /'jig rten mgon gyis gsungs pa
324a2(rgyud): yi| |phyag rgya 'di ni las kun byed/ /phyag rgya rnams kyis nges byung ba/ /yongs rdzogs brgyar ni gsungs pa yin/ /de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /phyag rgya
324a3(rgyud): dag ni brgyad po ste/ /lag gnyis de bzhin sbyar nas ni/ /gnyi ga kun nas mnyam byas la/ /de dag nyid la mdzub mo dang / /gung mo gnyis ni sbyar bar bya/ /
324a4(rgyud): mthe bong gnyis kyi sen mo ni/ /gsum pa'i tshigs char sbyar bar bya/ /cung zad nang du bkug nas ni/ /rab tu sbyar ba dag tu bya/ /bdag nyid chen po 'khor lo
324a5(rgyud): can| |sngags kyi bdag po'i phyag rgya yin/ /'di nyid las ni mdzub mo dgug /gung mo dag ni mnyam par sbyar/ /srin lag gnyis kyi sen mo ni/ /sbyar ba'i
324a6(rgyud): rnam par dgod par bya/ /'di ni gtsug tor phyag rgyar ni/ /rgyal ba'i dbang pos gsungs pa yin/ /lag gnyis de bzhin bkod nas ni/ /gung mo'i sor mo'i
324a7(rgyud): bcing byas pa/ /mthe'u chung sor dang yang dag ldan/ /gdugs dkar po las rgya 'di byung / /gung mo mnyam par byas nas ni/ /sor mo gnyis ni yang dag
324b1(rgyud): sbyar| |gdub kor zlum po 'dra ba ni/ /phyag rgya chen po de la brjod/ /de nyid las ni mdzub mo yi/ /tshigs ni skam kha lta bur bya/ /de nas gung mo sbyar te dgod/ /lag pa'i
324b2(rgyud): 'og gi cher sbyar nas/ /de las gsum pa'i tshigs dag tu/ /mthe bo'i sor mos gnon par bya/ /'jam dpal dbyangs ni blo ldan gyis/ /'di ni phyag rgya mchog tu
324b3(rgyud): gsungs/ /lag gnyis de bzhin bkod nas ni/ /cho ga mthong la yang dag gnas/ /sor mo de nyid kun gyis ni/ /kun nas gang ba'i mdzod ltar gnas/ /lag pa
324b4(rgyud): gnyis ni rnam bskyed nas/ /lag sor brgyad ni rab tu brkyang / /skyes bu brgyad po de nyid shes/ /zung bzhi dag tu gyur pa ni/ /rdzogs sangs rkang gnyis dam pa yis/ /
324b5(rgyud): de nyid dge 'dun zhes kyang gsungs/ /de nyid 'phags pa'i dge 'dun rgyar/ /srid pa'i gnas 'dir gsungs pa yin/ /phyag rgya 'di ni rab mchog ste/ /phyag rgya
324b6(rgyud): ma lus rab tu sgrub/ /lag gnyis de bzhin kha sbyar te/ /thal mo sbyar ba'i rnam par gnas/ /mdzub mo gcig ni rab brkyang ba/ /lag pa g.yas pa yang dag
324b7(rgyud): brkyang / /de 'di 'byung po zhi byed par/ /de nyid gzigs pa rnams kyis bstan/ /phyag rgya 'di ni mchog ces bya/ /las rnams kun gyi don sgrub byed/ /lag gnyis
325a1(rgyud): de bzhin sbyar nas ni/ /sor rtse rim bzhin mtshan pa yi/ /bsdus nas kha sbyar dag tu bya/ /mthe bong gnyis ni bsgreng nas bskum/ /
325a2(rgyud): de 'di pad+ma'i phreng ba zhes/ /dang po'i sangs rgyas dag gis gsungs/ /lag pa dag ni de gnyis kyis/ /sor mo kun nas bkan la brkyang / /sor mo gsum
325a3(rgyud): gnyis bsgreng nas ni/ /me tog kha bye'i rnam par bya/ /gnyis pa'i tshigs la bzhag pa ni/ /mthe bo dang ni mdzub mo gnyis/ /de 'dir srid pa gsum gnas
325a4(rgyud): kyi| |phyag rgyar rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis gsungs/ /phyag rgya 'di ni phyag rgya che/ /las kun byed pa'i phyag rgya brgyad/ /mthu mnyam brtson 'grus chen por ni/ /
325a5(rgyud): rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis yang dag gsungs/ /muSh+Ti gtams phrad bye ba ni/ /stong phrag brgyad du yang dag 'byung / /thub mchog grangs med 'das pa yis/ /
325a6(rgyud): phyag rgya 'di dag rab tu gsungs/ /phyag rgya cho ga yang dag 'byung / /rtsa brgyad brgya ni rab tu gsungs/ /'di dag kun gyi sngags kun dang / /las rnams dag
325a7(rgyud): kyang grub pa yin/ /sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul che kun gyi/ /phyag rgya 'di ni bzhed cing gsungs/ /cho ga 'di dag sbyar ba yis/ /don rnams myur du sgrub par byed/ /
325b1(rgyud): shAkya seng ge mi yi mchog /thub pa mchog gis de gsungs nas/ /byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs la de bzhin gsungs/ /'jam dpal gyi
325b2(rgyud): ni cho ga 'di/ /phyag rgya dag ni yang dag byung / /sa steng bstan pa bsrung don du/ /phyag rgya 'di ni rab tu gtad/ /dus mtha' nye bar 'ong 'gyur zhing / /dus mthar mya
325b3(rgyud): ngan 'das pa na/ /nga yi bstan pa bsrung don du/ /nga yis 'di dag thams cad bshad/ /sngags rnams dag ni rgya cher bcas/ /phyag rgya rnams kyi mtshan nyid bshad//
325b4(rgyud): 'jig rten kun la gsang ba dang / /shin tu gsang ba'ang brjod pa yin/ /mdo 'dir cho ga lhag pa ste/ /yon tan rgya chen gsal bar byas/ /sngags rnams du ma'i
325b5(rgyud): tshig dang ni/ /yon tan brjod pa yang dag 'byung / /phyag rgya rnam pa mang por ldan/ /rigs pa'i rgyud ni rab tu bstan/ /mthu dang yon tan grub mtha' dang / /zlos
325b6(rgyud): pa'i rgyu ni yang dag 'byung / /'gro ba'i skye gnas sems can gyi/ /dge ba'i 'bras bu 'byung ba'ang gsungs/ /gzhon nu khyod kyi sngags rnams kyi/ /grub pa'i gtan
325b7(rgyud): tshigs rab tu sbyar/ /de skad gsungs nas 'jam dpal ni/ /gzhon nu nam mkhar gnas pa yis/ /'jig rten mgon po 'od byed pa/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas la
326a1(rgyud): mgos phyag 'tshal/ /dbugs ring byung nas snying rjes brlan/ /mchi ma de nas phyis nas kyang / /sangs rgyas zhabs drung gnas nas kyang //
326a2(rgyud): de la myur du zhus pa ni/ /bcom ldan 'jig rten 'das pa na/ /sngags kyi mdzod 'dis steng du/ /bdag nyid chen po'i sems can la/ /de tshe ji ltar 'byung bar 'gyur//
326a3(rgyud): de skad gsungs nas sangs rgyas kyis/ /de tshe 'jam pa'i dbyangs la gsungs/ /gzhon nu khyod kyis yongs zhus pa/ /bu khyod 'jam dpal rab tu nyon/ /nga ni 'jig
326a4(rgyud): rten mya ngan 'das/ /sa steng stongs par gyur pa dang / /chos kyi mdzod kyang 'jig pa dang / /nyan thos rnams kyang 'das pa na/ /rkang gnyis dam pa ston pa yi/ /
326a5(rgyud): gzugs brnyan mchod rten dag kyang bya/ /spos dang dri dang byug pa yis/ /mchod dang bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / /rnam pa sna tshogs gos mchog dang / /gzhan yang
326a6(rgyud): nor bu'i gdub kor rgyan/ /rnam pa sna tshogs bza' dang bca'/ /yang dag sbyor ba dbul bar bya/ /rnam pa sna tshogs phun sum tshogs/ /ci 'dong kha zas byas pa
326a7(rgyud): la| |de bzhin sngags ni bzlas byas dbul/ /sems can dge ba'i skye gnas 'gyur/ /dam pa'i 'gro ba'i skye gnas su/ /grong mchog dag tu skye bar 'gyur/ /
326b1(rgyud): mthar ni byang chub gzhol 'gyur zhing / /phyi nas zhi bar de dag 'gro/ /de skad gsungs nas 'jam dpal ni/ /sangs rgyas kyis ni gsungs la dga'/ /byang chub sems
326b2(rgyud): dpa' rdzu 'phrul che/ /blo ldan de nas cang mi smra/ /chos kyi 'khor lo skor byed pa'i/ /sangs rgyas 'dus par sangs rgyas kyi/ /gsang ba'i gnas kyi steng gnas nas//
326b3(rgyud): 'di dag sangs rgyas snga ma gsungs/ /de tshe chos kyi 'khor lo bskor/ /yun ring dus su 'das pa yin/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga byang chub sems
326b4(rgyud): dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las/ phyag rgya'i cho ga'i le'u rab 'byams las nyi shu rtsa dgu pa rdzogs so// //de nas
326b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas/ /gzhan yang / gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang la gzigs nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam
326b6(rgyud): dpal/ mchog tu rab tu gsang ba'i khyod kyi phyag rgya dang ldan pa'i phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid 'khor dang bcas pa yod de/ las thams cad la nye bar sbyar ba/ phun sum
326b7(rgyud): tshogs pa thams cad sbyin par byed pa/ 'bras bu dang bcas pa/ sngags thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba/ las thams cad sgrub pa/ mdor na/ 'jam dpal nyon cig/
327a1(rgyud): dang po re zhig thal mo rab tu brkyang la mdzub mo dang / mthe'u chung gnyis rtse sprad de tshigs bar ma btud nas so so so sor rjes su bcug pa yin
327a2(rgyud): te| de la 'di ni/ 'jam dpal/ khyod kyi rtsa ba'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba las thams cad byed par 'gyur pa'o/ /lag pa gnyis de bzhin du byas la srin lag gnyis sbyar
327a3(rgyud): la| de bzhin du gung mo dang / mdzub mo yang bya zhing mthe'u chung gnyis kyi ri mo gong ma la mthe bo'i rtse mo bzhag pa ste/ 'jam dpal/ 'di ni khyod kyi gdong gi phyag
327a4(rgyud): rgya zhes bya ba ste gnyis pa'o/ /phan tshun du sor mo bsnol ba khu tshur du byas la gung mo'i sor mo gnyis rnam par bkrol la rtse mo sbyar te/ de'i 'gram gnyis su mdzub
327a5(rgyud): mo gnyis dkri zhing mthar gzhag par bya'o/ /de la 'di ni/ 'jam dpal/ khyod kyi mche ba'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba gzhan yin no/ /mche ba'i phyag rgya'i 'gram du
327a6(rgyud): mthe bong gnyis bzhag pa'i phyag rgya 'di ni mngon sum du 'jam dpal gzhon nu khyod nyid yin no/ /gnas de dang / lag pa'i kha sbyar der nye bar bzhugs
327a7(rgyud): shing dam tshig gi byin gyis rlob par byed do/ /lag pa'i sor mo phan tshun khu tshur byas la mdzub mo gnyis bkrol te mthe bong gnyis gung mo'i nang du chud
327b1(rgyud): par byas pa 'di ni/ 'jam dpal/ khyod kyi gtsug phud kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ste gzhan yin no/ /thal mo'i tshigs rnams brkyang ba byas la srin lag dang / mdzub mo gnyis
327b2(rgyud): kyi rtse mo gung mo'i nang du rtse sprad de bzhag pa 'di ni/ 'jam dpal/ mngon sum khyod nyid kyi rtsa ba'i sngags su bstan pa yin no/ /'di nyid kyi phyag rgya la mdzub mo gnyis
327b3(rgyud): brkyang bar byas pa ste/ de la 'di ni/ 'jam dpal/ khyod kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ro/ /mthe'u chung dang / srin lag gnyis bsnol ba byas nas lag pa kha sbyar gyi nang du
327b4(rgyud): bzhag la/ gung mo'i phyi rol du mdzub mo'i rtse mo yongs su bkug la mthe bong gnyis kyi rtse mo yang dag par bcar ba'o/ /gzhan 'di yang / 'jam dpal/ khyod kyi
327b5(rgyud): zhal gyi phyag rgya yin no/ /las thams cad pa yang yin te/ 'di nyid kyi rim gyis sor mo re re bkrol ba mthe bong dang bcas pa byas na ma rungs pa'i gdon thams
327b6(rgyud): cad rab tu 'byer bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du rna ba dang / mgrin pa dang / lag ngar dang / snying dang / lag pa dang / lkog ma dang / rked pa dang / lte ba dang / brla
327b7(rgyud): dang | byin pa dang / rkang pa dang / mig dang / kha dang / lce rnams te/ de ltar sor mo bcu rnams mthar gyis brkyang na rims bzhin du phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid du 'gyur
328a1(rgyud): te| mthar gyis kyang las byed do/ /zhal gyi phyag rgyas ni kha 'ching bar byed do/ /mche ba'i phyag rgyas ni gdon ma rungs ba las grol lo/ /lce'i phyag
328a2(rgyud): rgyas ni tshig ngan bzlog par byed do/ /snying gi phyag rgyas ni mi'i bdag po'i khor ba sel bar byed pa'am/ sems can gzhan lha dang / lha ma yin dang / mi dang / mi
328a3(rgyud): ma yin dang / 'gro ba rnam pa sna tshogs la brten pa'i khros pa rnams kyi khro ba 'jig par 'gyur te/ de bzhin du mthar gyis thams cad du las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro//
328a4(rgyud): de ltar rim pa 'dis phyag rgya grangs med par 'gyur te/ las grangs med pa dag kyang byed par 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal/ khyod kyis rnam pa thams cad du phyag
328a5(rgyud): rgya thams cad kho na las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /dpa' bo chen po de bzhin gshegs pa grangs las 'das pa dag gis phyag rgya 'di dag bcings so//
328a6(rgyud): phyag rgya chen po dpa' po chen pos chen po la gnas pas bcings so/ /gang du gtams pa phrag bye ba sum cu rtsa gsum mam/ brgyad cu'am/ dgu bcu rtsa lnga'am
328a7(rgyud): khri drag drug cu'i grangs la sogs pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i yang dag 'das pas phyag rgya bcings so/ /'jig rten bya ba gang gzhan ni/ /kun kyang phyag
328b1(rgyud): rgya rnams su 'dus/ /'di dag gang yang rung ba yi/ /phyag rgyas don kun sgrub byed pa'o/ /dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa'i dus dag tu/ /lag pa gnyis kyis bcing bar bya/ /
328b2(rgyud): sngon du bsnyon ba la brtson pas/ /sbyin sreg bzlas pa dag la'ang bya/ /'dug pa'am 'greng ba dag gis kyang / /zlos pas ci 'dod par du bzla/ /srung ba chen po'i cho gas
328b3(rgyud): kyang | |myur du grub pa thob par 'gyur/ /dus kun phyag rgya kun gyis ni/ /las rnams kun ni bya ba yin/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga byang chub sems
328b4(rgyud): dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las/ phyag rgya'i cho ga'i le'u rab 'byams gnyis pa las sum cu pa rdzogs so// // de nas
328b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la/ gzhan yang / gnas gtsang ma'i gzhan med khang la gzigs nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam
328b6(rgyud): dpal/ khyod kyi rtsa ba'i cho ga la phyag rgya mchog tu shin tu gsang ba gzhan yod de/ phyag rgya dang / rgyud thams cad kyi cho ga /sngags thams cad kyi mngon par
328b7(rgyud): 'dod pa/ sngags thams cad dang lhan cig yang dag par sbyar na las thams cad rab tu sgrub par byed pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam rnam par
329a1(rgyud): sbyor bar byed pa/ sems can thams cad kyi lam du 'jug pa yin no/ /mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo dang / gung mo gnyis kyi rtse mo dag yongs
329a2(rgyud): su sbyar ba ni gtsug tor 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya yin te/ 'dir sngags ni/ oM dz+wA la dz+wA la 'di gtod ga toSh+NI ShA dU ra hUM haM/ srin lag de nyid bkug pa dang /
329a3(rgyud): gung mo sbyar ba de nyid kyi sor mo'i rtse mo'i sen mo gshibs la rna cha gdub kor zlum po ltar bya ba ni gtsug tor gdugs dkar po'i phyag rgya yin te/ 'dir yang
329a4(rgyud): sngags su 'gyur ba ni/ oM ma ma ma ma hUM ni/ mdzub mo de nyid phan tshun mnyam par sbyar la gung mo gnyis sbyar ba ni gzi brjid phung po'i phyag rgya'o/ /'dir
329a5(rgyud): sngags ni/ oM ta thA ga toSh+NI ShA a ba lo ki te/ mUrti te dzo rA shi hUM dz+wa la dz+wa la/ d+ha ka d+ha ka /da ra bi da ra/ tshin d+ha tshin d+ha/ hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ mdzub mo de nyid
329a6(rgyud): yang dag par sbyar ba dkyil 'khor lta bur bya ba ni rgyal ba'i gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya'o/ /'dir sngags su 'gyur ba ni/ oM dza ya dza yoSh+Ni Sha dz+wA la dz+wA la ban+d+ha ban+d+ha da
329a7(rgyud): ma da ma hUM hUM hUM ho ha na hUM/ rgyal ba'i gtsug tor gyi sngags so/ /mdzub mo de gnyis kyi rtse mo btud pa byas pa kha gung mo sbyar ba la mdzub mo'i sen mo gung mo'i tshigs gsum
329b1(rgyud): pa'i char sbyar ba ni 'khor lo sgyur ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /oM na mo a bra ti ha ta ta thA ga to Sh+NI Sha ya/ a na a ba lo ke te mUr+d+ha na tsakra brti hUM dz+wA la dz+wA la/ d+ha ka d+ha ka/ d+hu na d+hu na/
329b2(rgyud): bi d+hu na trA sa ya mA ra yod sA d+hi ya/ ha na ha na/ AM AM A/ ka ka /dro khi ni/ dro khi ni/ kuN+Da li ni/ A ba rA dzi tA tra pa ri Ni hUM phaT/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i sngags so//
329b3(rgyud): mdzub mo de nyid kyi rtse mo mdud pa byas la gung mo sbyang ba byas pa la mdzub mo sen mo'i 'og gi gsum pa'i chal sbyar ba ni sngags kyi bdag po 'khor los bsgyur ba'i phyag
329b4(rgyud): rgya'o| |mdzub mo de nyid kyi rtse mo yang dag par bkug pa gung mor sbyar ba'i 'og tu yang dag par bcar ba ni sngags kyi bdag po'i phyag rgya'o/ /mdzub mo de nyid kyi rtse mo yang dag
329b5(rgyud): par bkug la gung mo sbyar ba'i sen mo dang / tshigs nang du yang dag par sbyar ba ni 'khor los bsgyur ba chen po'i phyag rgya'o/ /mdzub mo de nyid kyi rtse mo gnyis yang dag par bkug
329b6(rgyud): la gung mo sbyar zhing 'og tu yang dag par sbyar te/ gdub kor ltar byas pa ni 'khor los bsgyur ba chen po'i phyag rgya'o/ /mdzub mo de nyid kyi rtse mo yang dag par bkug la/
329b7(rgyud): gung mo'i tshigs gsum pa'i nang du yang dag bar sbyar ba ni/ sngags kyi bdag po 'khor los bsgyur ba chen po'i phyag rgya ste/ srid pa'i las thams cad rnam par
330a1(rgyud): 'jig par byed pa/ sems can thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho ba/ tshe dang / nad med pa dang / dbang phyug dang / bsam pa thams cad yongs
330a2(rgyud): su rdzogs par byed pa/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ sems can thams cad yongs su dga' bar byed la/ sems can
330a3(rgyud): thams cad kyi yid la mngon par 'dod pa 'bras bu dang bcas par byed pa/ las thams cad byed pa/ sngags thams cad rab tu sgrub par byed pa/ phyag rgya dang /
330a4(rgyud): sngags thams cad dang ldan pa yin te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa/ khyod de nyon cig /dbang po re zhig gtsug tor gyi mtshan nyid du gyur pa ni lag pa gnyis
330a5(rgyud): mnyam po bkan zhing brkyang bar bya'o/ /mthe bong dang / srin lag gnyis lag pa'i dkyil du sen mos gzung zhing mthe bo'i rtse mos sbyar bar bya'o/ /mthe'u
330a6(rgyud): chung gnyis kyi rtse mo gtug cing sbyar bar bya'o/ /de bzhin du gung mo gnyis kyi sen mo dang rtse mo gnyis sbyar bar bya zhing / mdzub mo dang / mdzub mo yang sbyar
330a7(rgyud): bar bya'o/ /kun tu snang ba'i gtsug tor gyi mtshan nyid chen po zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya yin te/ 'dir sngags ni aM mu haM/ mdzub mo de nyid yang dag par bkug ste/ sen
330b1(rgyud): mo dang / sen mo'i rtse mo dkyil 'khor ltar sbyar bas ni lta ba ngan pa'i zug rngu'i phyin ci lag sel ba zhes bya ba chos kyi 'khor lo chen po'i phyag rgya'o/ /'dir sngags su
330b2(rgyud): 'gyur ba ni/ oM badzrA sha ni hUM phaT/ 'di ni skyil krung gi phyag rgya ste/ sngags dang yang dag par ldan na las thams cad byed pa/ ji ltar ston ka'i sbrin bzhin du bgegs
330b3(rgyud): thams cad 'jigs par byed pa/ gang yang bdud bzhis byas pa dang / gang yang lha dang / lha ma yin gyi bgegs rnams ni skyil krung gi phyag rgya dam pa mthong ba tsam gyis
330b4(rgyud): 'jigs par 'gyur ro/ /'og ma gnyis kyang rtse mo mnyam par gshibs na khu tshur gyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ro/ /sngags kyang 'di dag gang yang rung ba dang / phyag rgya lag pa
330b5(rgyud): gnyis kyis bcings te/ sgrub pa'i dus sam/ sngon du bsnyen pa'i dus su 'dug pa'am/ langs te lan gcig gam/ ji srid 'dod kyi bar du bzlas pa'o/ /de ltar byas
330b6(rgyud): na bgegs dang / log 'dren thams cad kyis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur zhing grub pa yang mngon du 'gyur ro/ /mdzub mo de nyid kyi rtse mo gnyis sbyar la/ kun nas zlum
330b7(rgyud): por bya zhing / gung mo gnyis sbyar te gung mo'i tshig gsum po'i 'og tu sbyar ba ni gzhan gyis mi thub pa gtsug tor 'khor los bsgyur pa'i snying po'i phyag rgya'o/ /'dir snying po ni
331a1(rgyud): oM a pa rA dzi te d+hi ka / gtsug tor gyi rtsa ba'i phyag rgya de nyid la gzhan gang yang rung ba dang / lhan cig gis spyod pas bkod
331a2(rgyud): na las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /de las mthe bo'i rtse mo bteg la srin lag gi rtse mor gtugs nas yang dang yang bteg pa ni bod pa'i phyag
331a3(rgyud): rgya'o| |'dir sngags ni/ na mo b+ha ga wa te a pra ti ha toSh+NI Sha ya/ e h+ye hi b+ha ga wAn d+harma rA dza pra tIts+tshe da ar+g+haM/ gan+d+haM/ puSh+paM/ d+hu paM/ ba liM/ dI paM/ mAM
331a4(rgyud): tsA bi rAk+Sha/ a pra ti ha ta/ ba la pa rA kra ma ya swAhA/ me tog dkar pos spyan drang bar bya'o/ /rang gi gzugs kyi mchod yon dang / zhabs bsil ba
331a5(rgyud): dbul bar bya'o/ /gdan dang / bzhugs su gsol ba yang bya'o/ /de la 'di nyid kyi phyag rgya dang / sngags kyis phyogs dang / phyogs mtshams dang /
331a6(rgyud): steng 'og bcing bar bya'o/ /de nyid kyi srin lag dang / mthe bo'i rtse mo gtugs shing smad pa byas la/ tshigs bar ma la mthe bos gtugs shing yang
331a7(rgyud): dang yang bteg par byas nas mchod yon phul na rang gis lha gshegs su gsol bar 'gyur ro/ /phyag rgya g.yon phyogs su bskor na phyogs bcings
331b1(rgyud): ba las grol bar 'gyur ro/ /'dir sngags ni/ na mo a pra ti ha toSh+NI Sha ya/ gats+tsha gats+tsha b+ha ga bA na d+harma rA dza pra tsI ts+tshe daM ar+g+haM/ gan+d+haM/ puSh+paM/ d+hu paM mAM tsa a b+hi rak+Sha/ a pra ti
331b2(rgyud): ha ta ba la pa rA kra mA ya/ phyag rgya dang / sngags gshegs su gsol ba ni mchod yon gyis so/ /mdzub mo de nyid gung mo'i tshigs gsum pa'i 'og tu bzhag
331b3(rgyud): ste| gung mo yang dag par sbyar la mthe bong gnyis dang / mthe'u chung gnyis phan tshun mnan cing khu tshur du bya'o/ /'dir sngags ni/ na mo b+ha ga ba te a pra ti
331b4(rgyud): ha toSh+NI Sha ya/ oM drA ban+d+ha hUM phaT/ a pra ti ha to Sh+NI Sha ya/ bi ki ri Ni/ bi ki ri Ni/ d+hu na d+hu na d+hu/ rnam par 'jig par byed pa/ bcom ldan 'das rig pa'i rgyal
331b5(rgyud): po'i gtsug tor gyi sngags bgegs dang / log 'dren thams cad kyis zin pa dag dang / dbang bskur ba dang / bdag srung ba dang / phyogs bcing ba dang //
331b6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor bcing ba la sogs te/ las thams cad rab tu sbyar ro/ /mdzub mo de gnyis kyi rtse mo gnyis bkug cing / yang dang / yang brkyang ba ni me lha spyan
331b7(rgyud): drang ba'o/ /de nas sbyin sreg gi las bya ste/ 'di nyid kyis slar gshegs su gsol ba ni bzlog pa'o/ /mdzub mo gnyis kyang 'bar ba'i phreng bar bsam mo/
332a1(rgyud): gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya 'di ni las thams cad la thogs pa med pa'o/ /'dir sngags ni/ na mo b+ha ga ba te/ a pra ti ha toSh+NI Sha ya/
332a2(rgyud): i h+ye hi te dzo mA li ni ag+ha ye swAhA/ mdzub mo de nyid kyi rtse mo gnyis cung zad bkug par bya zhing / gung mo sbyar la gung mo'i tshigs gsum pa'i nang du
332a3(rgyud): sbyar bar bya'o/ /gtsug tor gyi stobs shin tu drag po'i phyag rgya yin no/ /'dir sngags ni/ na mo b+ha ga ba te/ a pra ti ha toSh+NI Sha ya/ i maM/ g+han+d+haM/ d+hu
332a4(rgyud): paM| puSh+paM ba liM dI paM tsa pra tIts+tshaM ha ra sarba a d+hi Sh+Thi te/ d+harma rA dza a pra ti ha tA ya swAhA/ dri la sogs pa'i sngags so/ /srin lag gnyis bzlog ste tshigs
332a5(rgyud): gsum pa la mthe bong gnyis yang dag par sbyar zhing / mdzub mo gnyis kyang sbyar ba ni gzi brjid gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya ste/ log 'dren thams cad
332a6(rgyud): kyis 'joms par mi nus so/ /phyag rgya 'di ni bsrung ba dang / bzlas pa'i dus dang / sgrub pa'i dus dang / dkyil 'khor dang / las thams cad la
332a7(rgyud): yang bya ba yin no/ /'dir sngags ni/ na mo b+ha ga ba te/ a pra ti ha toSh+nI Sha ya/ sarba big+h+naM bi d+h+waM sa na ka rA ya kro d+ha ya swAhA/ srin lag gnyis kyi rtsa bar mthe bong
332b1(rgyud): gnyis gtugs te/ de bzhin du gdub kor ltar bya zhing mdzub mo gnyis kyis nang stong pa'i rnam par bya'o/ /'di ni thams cad du thogs pa med cing gzhan gyis
332b2(rgyud): mi thub pa'i gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya yin no/ /'dir sngags ni/ na mo b+ha ga ba te/ a pra ti ha toSh+NI Sha ya/ sarba tra a pa rA dzi tA ya/ sha ma ya sha ma ya/ shAn+te dAn+te/
332b3(rgyud): d+harma rA dza ba shi te/ mahA bid+ye sarbAr+tha sa d+ha ni swAhA/ mar gyi sbyin sreg la sogs pas zhi ba dang / rgyas pa la sogs pa'i las bya'o/ /srin lag gnyis kyis gdub
332b4(rgyud): kor ltar bya zhing mdzub mo'i rtse mo gnyis bkug pa ni thogs pa med pa'i bde byed kyi gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya'o/ /'dir sngags ni/ na mo b+ha ga ba te/ a pra ti ha toSh+NI
332b5(rgyud): Sha ya| oM shang ka re swAhA/ las thams cad srung bar byed pa'o/ /mthe bong gnyis kyi rtse mos srin lag gnyis kyi gsum pa'i tshigs la mnan la/ de bzhin
332b6(rgyud): du mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo yang rdo rje'i rtse dang 'dra bar bya'o/ /'di ni dam tshig thogs pa med pa'i spyi gtsug gi phyag rgya ste/ dam tshig thams cad kyi thun mong
332b7(rgyud): ngo| |'dir sngags ni/ na mo b+ha ga ba te/ a pra ti ha toSh+NI Sha ya/ oM shang ka re sa ma yaM swAhA/ mthe bong gnyis kyi rtse mos srin lag gnyis kyi bar ma'i tshigs la
333a1(rgyud): bcar la/ mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo dgug par bya zhing gung mo gnyis kyi rtse mo dang / tshigs bar ma sbyar ba ni dam tshig thogs pa med pa
333a2(rgyud): gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya yin te/ lha dang / lha ma yin la sbyar na dam tshig la 'jog par byed do/ /'dir sngags ni/ na mo b+ha ga ba te/ a pra ti ha toSh+NI Sha ya/ oM shang
333a3(rgyud): ka re mahA sa ma yaM swAhA/ 'dis dkyil 'khro bcing ba byas nas bzlas na 'khor los bsgyur ba yang dam tshig la gnas par 'gyur zhing / 'khor los
333a4(rgyud): bsgyur ba gzhan yang zil gyis gnon par 'gyur ro/ /gnas de nyid du bzlas pa byas na rig pa'i mthu stobs kyis 'jigs rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das
333a5(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi sngags rnams kyis phan tshun gnod pa byed par nus pa ma yin no/ /bzlas pa ni gnas gcig tu rnam pa thams cad du bya'o/ /de la sogs
333a6(rgyud): pa gtsug tor gyi rgyal po grangs med pa yod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs la rgya cher bya'o/ /'jam dpal cho ga'i rgyal po 'di la ni sngags
333a7(rgyud): tshad med pa yod de/ phyag rgya yang rnam pa sna tshogs nyid de/ ngas 'di mdor bsdus nas bshad pa yin no/ /ngas gal te rgya cher bshad na ni mi dang / mi
333b1(rgyud): ma yin pa thams cad kyis bskal pa stong gi tshad du yang 'dzin pa'am/ 'chang bar nus pa ma yin no/ /'jam dpal/ de lta bas na mdor bsdus nas bshad
333b2(rgyud): par bya yi/ mdor na yad la nye bar gzung bar gyis shig /dang po thub pa'i phyag rgya mchog /'dir ni rab tu gsungs pa yin/ /lha yi lha ni de nas kyang / /
333b3(rgyud): 'khor los bsgyur ba'i phyag rgya dang / /byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan ni/ /spyan ras gzigs ni zla ba dang / /de nas phyag na rdo rje'i rgya/ /gnod sbyin dbang po'i bstan pa
333b4(rgyud): yin| |de nas gzhan yang phyag rgya ni/ /dpag med chen po'i gzi brjid ldan/ /pho nya pho nya mo tshogs kun/ /bran pho dran mo de bzhin gzhan/ /de bzhin gnod sbyin gnod sbyin
333b5(rgyud): mo| |klu dang klu mo de bzhin gzhan/ /mngag gzhug mngag gzhug mo dag dang / /rdzu 'phrul chen po sha za mo/ /de bzhin gzhan yang srin mo dang / /lha dang lha min bu
333b6(rgyud): mo dang / /grub dang rig pa 'dzin rnams dang / /mi rnams ma lus pa dag dang / /skye bo thams cad dag gi ni/ /so so so sor phyag rgya bstan/ /sngags kyang rnam pa sna tshogs
333b7(rgyud): dang | |las dang ting 'dzin sna tshogs dang / /glang po nor bu'i rigs dag dang / /de dag so so'i phyag rgya dang / /dgra bcom dang ni rang rgyal dang / /legs 'byung phyag rgya
334a1(rgyud): de nyid dang / /sa bcu la ni rab gnas pa'i/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi/ /phyag rgya snying po sngags dag ni/ /gcig pa nyid du yongs su bsgrags/ /lha
334a2(rgyud): dang gnod sbyin rigs dang ni/ /drang srong dri zas mchod pa dang / /phyag rgya dri zas bstan pa dang / /bdun pa'i rigs kyis gsungs pa dang / /de bzhin brgyad pa'i phyag rgya ni/ /gnod sbyin
334a3(rgyud): rigs su yongs su bstan/ /phyag rgya thams cad yang dag bstan/ /gzhan yang bde gshegs bka' dag gis/ /rgyud rnams dag ni so so dang / /'jig rten pa yi yang 'dir gzung //
334a4(rgyud): phyag rgya ldan pa'i sngags dag ni/ /las rnams la ni gsal bar 'gyur/ /phyag rgya 'ching la sogs mkhas na/ /log 'dren dag gis gnod mi 'gyur/ /de nas phyag rgya chen po la sogs
334a5(rgyud): pa'i mtshan nyid bshad par bya ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi snying po'i phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid du 'gyur ba ni lag pa gnyis kyi sor mo phan tshun bsdams la mthe bong gnyis
334a6(rgyud): bstan par bya'o/ /'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis thags kyi phyag rgya'o/ /'di nyid la ni mthe bong g.yas pa gcig bstan pa ni pad+ma 'dzin pa'i phyag rgyar 'gyur ro/ /
334a7(rgyud): lag pa g.yas g.yon snga ma bzhin du khu tshur bcangs te gung mo'i sor mo gnyis rab tu phyung zhing brkyang bar byas la gcig tu byas shing rdo rje'i rtse mo 'dra ba 'di ni rdo rje
334b1(rgyud): 'dzin gyi phyag rgya'o/ /de las gcig bkug pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' spos kyi glang po'i phyag rgya'o/ /yang de nyid brkyang nas gung mo gnyis gdub kor ltar byas pa 'di ni byang chub
334b2(rgyud): sems dpa' glang po'i spos kyi phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa gnyis po thams cad bsdus te khu tshur du byas pa 'di ni rin po che'i rigs kyi phyag rgya'o/ /nor bu la spyod pa thams cad dang / dzam+b+ha la chu
334b3(rgyud): dbang la sogs pa'i sngags dang / phyag rgya 'di nyid sbyar bar bya'o/ /mdzub mo gnyis kyi tshigs gnyis bkug nas sen mo gnyis phan tshun sprad pa 'di ni gnod sbyin gyi rigs lngas rtsen
334b4(rgyud): la sogs pa'i gnod sbyin rdzu 'phrul chen po'i phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa gnyis snga ma bzhin du khu tshur bcing ba byas la mthe bo'i sen mo gnyis phan tshun sprad cing steng du bzhag la/ gung mo
334b5(rgyud): gnyis ka'i rtse mo rdo rje'i rtse mo dang 'dra bar byas pa 'di ni lha thams cad de/ lha'i rigs 'og min la sogs pa'i phyag rgya yin no/ /lag pa gnyis de bzhin du bsdams la khu tshur bcangs nas
334b6(rgyud): mthe bo gnyis bstan pa 'di ni rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / 'phags pa nyan thos kyi phyag rgya'o/ /khu tshur bcang bar byas pa 'di dag ni 'phags pa'i gang zag brgyad kyi phyag rgya'o/ /rgyal
334b7(rgyud): ba'i sras thams cad kyi phyag rgya ni gcig tu brjod par bya ste/ thal mo brkyang ba sbyar nas cung zad rtse mo bskum par byas pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpang grags pa'i phyag rgyar bstan pa yin
335a1(rgyud): no| |nor bu rin po che dang / 'khar gsil dang / snam sbyar dang / lhung bzed dang / chos gos dang / mche ba dang / mi 'jigs pa'i lag pa ste bdun po de dag ni thub
335a2(rgyud): pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /spyan dang / byams pa dang / 'od kyi dra ba dang / chos ston pa dang / mdzod spu'i nor bu dang / gnas pa dang / phyag rgya bdun po 'di dag kyang rgyal ba'i sku nyid las skyes pa'o//
335a3(rgyud): bdun gnyis kyi tshogs gnyis pa 'di dag dang / phyag rgya lnga ngas bshad pa dang / thub pa'i snying po dang ldan pa nyi shu ni dang po'i rang byung gis kyang bstan pa yin te/ 'khor los bsgyur
335a4(rgyud): ba nyi shu'i 'khor gyi phyag rgya yang bstan to/ /phyag rgya dang / sngags byung ba 'di grangs kyi mthar yang byas pa yin no/ /thal mo sbyar ba byas nas gdub kor ltar byas pa ni nor bu rin po che'i
335a5(rgyud): phyag rgya'o/ /skyil mo krung gi g.yas g.yon brla'i nya'i phyogs su khu tshur rgyal mtshan du 'dzin pa ni 'khar gsil gyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ro/ /lag pa thal mo sbyar la phan tshun du mngon
335a6(rgyud): par phyogs pa ni snam sbyar gyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ro/ /lag pa thal mo sbyar ba las bzed pa ltar byas pa ni lhung bzed kyi phyag rgya'o/ /chos ges ni lag pa g.yon pas so/ /thugs kyi phyag rgya
335a7(rgyud): bzhin du g.yon pa'i mthe bong bteg pa ni mche ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa g.yas pas mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa dang / g.yon pas chos gos la 'dzin pa ni mi 'jigs pa'i lag pa'o/ /thal
335b1(rgyud): m o sbyar ba las gung mo gnyis rdo rje'i rtse mo ltar byas la de'i rgyab tu mdzub mo gnyis cung zad bkug cing bzhag la mthe bong gnyis nang du bcug pa 'di ni sangs rgyas spyan gyi phyag rgyar 'gyur
335b2(rgyud): ro| |'di nyid kyi gung mo'i tshigs bkug la mdzub mo gnyis gcig tu byas pa 'di ni sangs rgyas byams pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /thal mo sbyar ba yangs par byas la mdzub mo dang / srin lag
335b3(rgyud): gnyis bkug la rdo rje rtse gsum du byas pa 'di ni mA ma kI'i phyag rgyar 'gyur ro/ /thal mo sbyar bar byas nas mdzub mo gnyis gung mo gnyis kyi tshigs gsum pa la bkug nas bzhag la
335b4(rgyud): mthe bong gnyis so sor bkyed nas/ thal mo'i rnam par bya ba 'di ni longs spyod ldan pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya yin no/ /lag pa gnyis thal mo sbyar nas mdzub mo gnyis dang / gung mo
335b5(rgyud): gnyis sbyar ba ni rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /g.yas pa'i sor mo gsum rdo rje'i rtse mo ltar byas la/ rked pa'i phyogs su brten pa 'di ni gnas pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /de ltar bdag nyid
335b6(rgyud): kyi mgo bor rig pa'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya dang / phyag rgya chen po brgyad bcings la las thams cad bya zhing dam tshig gzung ba'am/ dkyil 'khor bya ba dag la'ang me tog gtor bar bya'o//
335b7(rgyud): yang na sngar bstan pa'i cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du byas na ci 'dod pa'i las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / rig pa brjod pas ni/ dam tshig thams cad du
336a1(rgyud): 'gyur ro/ /legs par phyag rgya bcings na ni phyag rgya'i mthu 'byung bar 'gyur gyi/ gang phyag rgya bab col du byas pa dang / gnas ma yin par bcas pa des ni 'di'i
336a2(rgyud): dam tshig nyams par 'gyur ro/ /gang rdo rje'i phyag rgya de nyid ni mdung rtse'i phyag rgya yin mod kyi/ rtse gsum dang / rdo rje ni khyad par yod de/ gang gyen du bstan pa de ni rdo rje 'dzin gyi phyag rgyar
336a3(rgyud): 'gyur la/ 'og tu bltas ba ni dbang phyug chen po'i phyag rgya yin no/ /bar du bzhag pa ni sbyin gnas su 'os pa'i slob dpon dang / bla ma la ni phyag rgya dbus su gzung bar bya'o/ /mi
336a4(rgyud): thams cad la ni sor mo gcig gdeg par bya'o/ /mi ma yin pa thams cad dang / rkang gnyis dang / rkang bzhi dang / rkang mang dang / srid pa gsum la gnas pa'i sems can
336a5(rgyud): rnams kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni sor mo gnyis bsgreng ba'o/ /gnod sbyin dang / gnod sbyin mo thams cad kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni gsum bsgreng ba'o/ /rig pa 'dzin pa dang / rig
336a6(rgyud): pa 'dzin ma thams cad kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni sor mo bzhi bsgreng ba'o/ /lha dang / lha ma yan thams cad kyi bu mo'i phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni lag pa'i mthil mnyam por bzhag
336a7(rgyud): pa'o| |thal mo sbyar ba legs par byas te bzhag pa ni gzugs na spyod pa'i lha thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o/ /thal mo de nyid legs par byas pa las khu tshur bcing ba byas pa ni 'dod
336b1(rgyud): pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug la sogs pa 'dod pa'i khams na gnas pa thams cad kyi yin no/ /dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dwags dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sems can
336b2(rgyud): thams cad kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni de nyid las sor mo gcig yang dag par bsgreng ba'o/ /sha za dang / sha za mo la sogs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni sor mo gnyis
336b3(rgyud): bsgreng ba'o/ /srin po dang / srin mo rnams kyi ni gsum bsgreng ba'o/ /sha rjen za ba thams cad dang / gdon dang / ma mo dang / grul bum la sogs pa dang / sha za rnams dang /
336b4(rgyud): mkha' 'gro ma thams cad dang / sdig pa'i sems dang ldan pa thams cad la ni sor mo bzhi bsgreng ba'o/ /sdig pa thams cad kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni sor mo thams cad
336b5(rgyud): bsdus pa'o/ /lag sor bsdus pa'i phyag rgya ni dgug pa'o/ /lag sor brkyang ba ni slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /las thams cad ni rang gi sems kyis bya'o/ /ci 'dod
