336b6(rgyud): pa'i phyag rgya 'di dag la rang rang gi sngags sbyar bar bya'o/ /gzhan gyi phyag rgyar gzhan gyi las ni mi bya'o/ /gang gi sngags gang la yod pa de dang / de'i phyag rgya sbyar bar bya'o/ /phyag rgya 'di dag
336b7(rgyud): ni ring thung mnyam pa med pa yin te/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa/ sems can thams cad kyis phyag rgya mthong nas khro bar byed mi nus so/ /phyag rgya las 'da' bar byed
337a1(rgyud): pa ni rnam par nyams pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /phyag rgya nyams pa las ni dam tshig nyams pa dang / rig pa thams cad las rnam par 'das par 'gyur ro/ /mthar yang
337a2(rgyud): ngu 'bod kyi 'gro ba thob par 'gyur ro/ /dmyal ba chen po mnar med par yang shin tu brtan pa'i skye ba thob par 'gyur ba ni phyag rgya la bgegs byed pas so/ /gang yang phyag rgya
337a3(rgyud): dang | dam tshig la gnas pa de dag ni yun ring po mi nyung bar bde bar 'gyur te/ lha'i gnas chen po'i 'gro bar skye bar 'gyur ro/ /mthar yang nges par byang chub la gzhol bar
337a4(rgyud): 'gyur ro/ /mdor na/ dang po'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul chen po dag gis phyag rgya rnam pa mang po rnams rab tu gsungs so/ /sems can thams cad kyis kyang
337a5(rgyud): 'di'i mtha' rtogs par ram/ gzung bar ram/ grangs rtsi bar byed par mi nus so/ /mdor na/ rgyal ba'i rigs kyi rig pa'i rgyal po 'khor los bsgyur ba'i yi ge gcig pa de'i phyag rgyar
337a6(rgyud): 'gyur ba ni lag pa g.yas g.yon snga ma bzhin du khu tshur du byas la/ gung mo gnyis phyir phyung la brkyang ste gcig tu rtse sprad la/ gnyi ga'i yang rtse mo'i tshigs bkug la mdzub mo
337a7(rgyud): gnyis kyi tshigs gnyis bkug cing sen mo gnyis phan tshun rtse sprad de mthe bong gnyis kyi sen mo'i steng du bzhag pa 'di ni 'khor los bsgyur ba'i phyag rgya ste/ las thams cad byed
337b1(rgyud): pa| phyag rgya thams cad kyi rab mchog / 'jig rten gyi skyob pa rnams kyis gsungs pa/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i yi ge gcig pa dang yang dag par ldan na las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /'dis
337b2(rgyud): bsgrubs na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs dang / 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad kyi sngags grub par 'gyur ro/ /'dis bzlas pa byas na sngags thams cad bzlas par 'gyur
337b3(rgyud): ro| |sgrub pa pos nges par sngon du cho ga'i rgyal po 'dir gsungs pa'i sngags kyis mchog brgyad stong bzlas par bya'o/ /de ltar byas na rig pa 'di thams cad mngon du 'gyur zhing myur du grub pa
337b4(rgyud): rab tu ster bar 'gyur ro/ /myur du mchog kyang ster bar 'gyur ro/ /nges par byang chub la gzhol bar 'gyur ro/ /pad+ma 'dzin pa'i phyag rgyas dang / spyan ras gzigs kyi snying po yi ge gcig pa
337b5(rgyud): dang ldan par byas na las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /yang na gos dkar mo'i rig pa phyag rgya dang ldan par byas na'ang de bzhin du las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje 'chang gi phyag rgya
337b6(rgyud): dang | de nyid kyi snying po yi ge gcig pa dang ldan par byas na'ang de bzhin du las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /yang na mA ma kI'i rig pa chen mo dang ldan par byas na'ang las thams
337b7(rgyud): cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du glang po'i rigs kyi yi ge gcig pa byang chub sems dpa' glang po'i spos kyi snying po dang / de bzhin du de nyid kyi phyag rgya dang / rin po che'i rigs dang /

344b7(rgyud): la brten pa/ bskal ba stong du'ang 'di'i phan yon bstan par ni mi nus so/ /yon tan chen po/ /rgya che ba'i yon tan 'byung ba ni mthong ba'i chos dang / 'jig rten pha rol du
345a1(rgyud): yang yin no/ /dad pa can gang zhig gis the tshom med par 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / the tshom med par rgyud 'di la brtson pa byed cing sngags sgrub
345a2(rgyud): pa dang / zlos pa dang / phyag rgya 'ching ba dang / rtag tu mngon par brtson par byed pa de la ni mthong ba'i chos kho na la yon tan gyi phan yon brgyad rab tu 'thob ste/ 'khrul pa
345a3(rgyud): med par 'gyur ba dang / phyir rgol ba thams cad dang / dgra'i 'jigs pa 'di la mi 'byung ba dang / 'di'i lus la dug mi 'byung ba dang / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub
345a4(rgyud): sems dpas kyang 'di la byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ba dang / tshe ring ba dang / bde ba sten par 'gyur ba dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa yang 'di'i dge ba'i
345a5(rgyud): bshes gnyen du 'gyur ba dang / mtshan mo'ang 'di la nyin re zhing rmi lam du mthong ba stsol ba dang / sngags thams cad kyang 'di la bsrung bar 'gyur ro/ /phyag
345a6(rgyud): rgya'ang 'di la rmi lam du ston par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po ma rungs pa dang / sems can ma rungs pa dang / mi phan pa 'dod pa rnams kyis kyang gnod pa med par 'gyur
345a7(rgyud): ro| |nges par byang chub la gzhol bar 'gyur ro/ /dad cing the tshom med la mngon par brtson pa'i phan yon ni brgyad po 'di dag yin te/ khyim pa'am/ rab tu
345b1(rgyud): byung ba'am/ bud med dam/ skyes pa'am/ sems can chen po bstan pa la phan par byed pa rnams kyi yin gyi/ sdig pa la zhugs pa gzhan gyi ni ma yin te/ de las bzlog pa de'i
345b2(rgyud): 'gro ba ni du 'bod la sogs par skye bar 'gyur ro/ /phyag rgya snga dro bcing bar byas nas tshe ring bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngags dang / 'khor gyi snying po
345b3(rgyud): dang | gtsug tor la sogs pa'i sngags dang / spyan la sogs pa gzhan gyi phyag rgya de bcing bar bya'o/ /yang na 'jam dpal gzhon nu khyod kyi phyag rgya bya ste/ 'di dag ni
345b4(rgyud): brtson 'grus dang / stobs mnyam pa yin no/ /gtsang zhing gtsang ma'i gnas su 'dug ste zhes bya ba ni gnas gtsang ma'i phyogs su zug rdu med pa'i gnas la ba'i lci bas
345b5(rgyud): la ma lhung bas byugs la me tog dkar po dri zhim po dag gis gcal bkram pa der 'dug la sngags bzlas shing phyag rgya bcing bar bya yi/ gzhan du ni ma yin no/ /
345b6(rgyud): gzhan dag tu ni phyag rgya dang lhan cig bzlas pa gcig kyang mi bya'o/ /gtsang zhing gtsang ba zhes gang gsungs pa ni nyi ma nub pa na/ srog chags med pa'i chu gtsang mas khrus
345b7(rgyud): byas te/ gos gsar pa bgos la gtsug tor gyi sngags kyis bsrung ba byas la grong gi chos rnam par spangs shing gtsang spra la dga' zhing dge ba/ ske rags dkar po
346a1(rgyud): bcings pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa bsgoms la thun gcig 'das pa dang der nyal bar bya'o/ /bram ze'i bu mo gtsang mas bkal ba'i skud pa blangs
346a2(rgyud): la sngags 'dis brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par sngags bar bya'o/ /oM ha ra ha ra ban+d+ha ne shukra d+hA ra NI sid+d+hA r+the swAhA/ mA ma kI'i phyag rgya dang / bzlas pa bya'o/ /de nas skud pa rked
346a3(rgyud): pa la lan gsum dkris nas bcing ba byas na sa bon bcing ba byas par 'gyur te/ 'dod pa'i dbang phyug gis kyang rmi lam du yid la gnod pa byed par mi nus na rmi lam du
346a4(rgyud): log 'dren rnam pa sna tshogs kyis lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de bzhin du cho ga 'dis 'dod chags dang ldan pas kyang mi nus na 'dod chags dang bral bas lta smos kyang ci
346a5(rgyud): dgos/ 'dod pa'i dbang phyug dga' ldan gyi bu mo gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs 'chang ba'i 'dod chags can gyis kyang yid la gnod pa skyed par mi nus na/ de las
346a6(rgyud): gzhan pa'i mi dang / mi ma yin pa'i bud med kyis kyang lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de lta bu'i cho gas nang bar langs la so shing bcas shing gdong rab tu bkrus la/ cho ga
346a7(rgyud): snga ma bzhin du srog chags med cing dri ma med pa'i chus khrus byas te/ shar phyogs su bltas la phyag rgya bcing zhing sngags bzla ba byas na tshe ring bar 'gyur zhing las
346b1(rgyud): thams cad la nus pa dang / nad chen po las grol te skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /dgra rnams kyang bshes gnyen nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /mthong ba tsam gyis
346b2(rgyud): gdon thams cad dang / sha rjen za ba dang / sdig can la sogs pa rab tu 'byer bar 'gyur ro/ /dgra rnams rengs par 'gyur ro/ /mthong ba tsam gyis gtsang ba 'am/ mi gtsang
346b3(rgyud): ba'i chogs las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du cho ga'i rgyal po 'di'i phyag rgya dang / sngags kyi tshogs kyi 'khor 'di yang grangs med pa yin te/ sangs rgyas bcom
346b4(rgyud): ldan 'das grangs med pas gsungs pa dang / gsung ba yin te/ shAkya thub pa ngas kyang da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis kyang
346b5(rgyud): 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi nang du gsungs te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nu/ khyod la yang bstan pa yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir dang / chos kyi dbyings yun ring du yang dag par bsrung
346b6(rgyud): ba'i phyir 'di khyod la yongs su gtad te/ /nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das te chos kyi de nyid la brten cing yang dag pa'i mtha'i tha mar gyur te zhi bar gyur pa na/ sems can
346b7(rgyud): snying rje chen po dang bral ba'i sems dang ldan pa la phan pa'i phyir gsungs shing / dus kyi mtha' 'jigs pa chen po'i dus la bab pa na/ dkon mchog gsum la gnod
347a1(rgyud): pa byed pa'i sems can rnams kyang bzlog pa'i don dang / gdul ba'i don gyi phyir cho ga'i rgyal po 'di ngas gsungs la/ rgya cher rnam par dbye bar
347a2(rgyud): byas na sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir yin no/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas

347a7(rgyud): 'phrul che kun sangs rgyas kyis/ /'di kun sngar ni gsungs pa yin/ /sngags shes bdag nyid chen po dang / /yon tan kun kyang bstan pa yin/ /dang po'i sangs rgyas
347b1(rgyud): dag gis sdar/ /sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir/ /sngags kyi 'khor lo dag dang ni/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bla med bskor/ /yang dag mtha' la brten nas ni/ /zhi ba'i
347b2(rgyud): 'khor lo'i rjes su song / /'jig rten sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul che/ /sangs rgyas de kun zhi bar gshegs/ /dang po'i de bzhin gshegs rnams kyis/ /'di kun sngon ni bstan pa
347b3(rgyud): yin| |ngas kyang phyi ma'i dus dag tu/ /'jam pa'i blo ldan khyod la bstan/ /sangs rgyas 'od can de yi bka'/ /de tshe 'di ni thos nas kyang / /'jam pa'i dbyangs ni gzhon

347b5(rgyud): rab chen pos chos gsungs shig / mdor bsdus rgya ni mi che bar/ /yon tan bdag nyid che 'bras 'byung / /'jam dpal gyis ni de skad gsol/ /de nas cang mi smra bar
347b6(rgyud): gnas/ /de nas dpal ldan tshangs pa'i dbyangs/ /ka la ping+ka'i sgra skad kyis/ /dkyil 'khor dgod pa'i phyag rgya ni/ /de dag kun ni ston pa yin/ /gnas gtsang steng du
347b7(rgyud): gnas pa'i dus/ /de tshe sngags dang rgyud dag ni/ /shAkya seng+ge mi mchog ni/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis yang dag gsungs/ /phyag rgya'i cho ga 'byung ba dang / /phyag rgya rgyud dang

348a4(rgyud): 'khor lo dang / /'jig rten sna tshogs mtshon cha ni/ /ji srid yongs su bstan pa dang / /ut+pal 'dra ba'i phyag rgya dang / /de kun phyag rgya dkyil 'khor dgod/ /de dag go
348a5(rgyud): rims gnas pa dang / /cho ga ldan par bstan pa yin/ /rtag tu de dag nyid la ni/ /rang gzugs 'dra bar bri bar bya/ /dkyil 'khor phyag rgyar gsungs pa ni/ /thams
348a6(rgyud): cad du ni spyir gsungs pa'o/ /de dag phyag rgyar yongs bstan pa/ /gnas ni ji bzhin dag la dgod/ /dkyil 'khor dag ni kun la yang / /rang dang 'dra ba nyid du sbyar/
348a7(rgyud): 'khor los bsgyur la 'khor lo dang / /gtsug tor gdugs dkar nyid la ni/ /gtso bor gdugs ni dkar po yin/ /dkyil 'khor la ni rtag tu bri/ /chos kyi 'khor
348b1(rgyud): lo sangs rgyas la/ /pad+ma pad+ma'i rigs dag la/ /rdo rje rdo rje'i rigs la gsungs/ /glang po glang po'i rigs zhes bya/ /nor bu'i rigs la bum pa ste/ /dkyil 'khor kun la rab
348b2(rgyud): tu sbyar/ /lha gzhan gyi ni rigs dag la/ /dpal be'u bkra shis ldan pa bri/ /tshangs pa che la ngang pa bri/ /brgya byin la yang rdo rje dang / /dbang phyug che la bri ba ni/ /rtse gsum khyu

348b4(rgyud): phrag ni/ /lha yi mtshon cha sna tshogs dang / /de dag gzhan yang bzhon pa ni/ /rnam pa sna tshogs de tshe bri/ /gzugs brnyan ji ltar gnas pa ni/ /rang gzugs 'phos pa bzhin
348b5(rgyud): du bri/ /dkyil 'khor dag ni thams cad du/ /gang yang rung ba 'di gcig bri /gcig dang gnyis dang yang dag ldan/ /grangs med gsum la sogs pa bya/ /dkyil 'khor rgyal
348b6(rgyud): ba mchog gsungs pa/ /lan kan phreng ni de dang mnyam/ /gang gi ched du dkyil 'khor gsungs/ /de ni dbus su nges par sbyar/ /rgyal ba'i rigs ni nang du bri/ /nang gi dbus
348b7(rgyud): su'ang sangs rgyas te/ /de tshe nang du'ang gzugs brnyan ni/ /ston pa yi ni kun tu bri/ /gnyis par pad+ma'i rigs dgod cing / /gsum par rdo rje'i rigs kyang bri/ /mthar gyis lha dang /
349a1(rgyud): lha mo yin/ /de bzhin de tshe thams cad ni/ /de nas sa kun la gnas pa'i/ /gnod sbyin srin po mi dang bcas/ /mthar gyis ji ltar gnas pa
349a2(rgyud): yi| |mu stegs rnams kyang de nas bri/ /cho ga bzhin du thams cad kyang / /phyogs skyong de bzhin bri bar bya/ /mdor na gzugs brnyan gcig dang ni/ /gnyis dang gsum

351a1(rgyud): pa bstan pa'i phyir dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sems can yongs su

351b1(rgyud): dag dang / /lha min dbang dang ma mor bcas/ /gza' rnams kun gyi gtso bo dang / /lha tshogs mi dang bcas pa dang / /ma rungs sems ldan srul po dang / /rab 'gul yid

351b6(rgyud): gnod sbyin srin po dang / /lha min thams cad ma 'jigs shig /mi dang mi ma yin pa dang / /'byung po ma lus lha rnams kun/ /khyed kyis dam tshig ngas bshad bsrung / /

352a1(rgyud): dang ni/ /gtsug tor spyan la sogs pa'o/ /'jig rten gsum las 'khor lo rgyal/ /gzi brjid phung po dam brgya la/ /rnam sbyor gtsug nyor
352a2(rgyud): gsang sngags dang / /phyag na pad+ma rnam gzigs dang / /kun tu gzigs pa'i mgon po dang / /khro gnyer sgrol ma grags ldan ma/ /lha mo gos dkar mo dang ni/ /dkar
352a3(rgyud): chen ma dang snyan ldan ma/ /rig ma longs spyod ldan ma dang / /rta mgrin sngags kyi rgyal po dang / /'di dag pad+ma'i rigs sngags dang / /gtsor ni rgyal bas gsungs pa
352a4(rgyud): dang | |yi ge gcig dang 'khor los bsgyur/ /sngags rnams bdag po mnga' bdag dang / /'od chen sngags kyi mgon po ni/ /'di dag de bzhin dran par gyis/ /gshin
352a5(rgyud): rje gshed ces bya ba yi/ /khro bo'i gtso bo de yang dran/ /mgon po spyan ras gzigs pa yi/ /thugs ni thugs rje 'byung ba dang / /thugs rje chen pos thugs brlan par/ /sangs
352a6(rgyud): rgyas snga mas gsungs ba'ang dran/ /sgrol ma skye bo sgrol bar ni/ /spyan ras gzigs kyis gsungs pa dang / /rtag dang ting 'dzin skyes 'phags ma/ /ming gi gzugs
352a7(rgyud): ni brtan pa'ang yin/ /byang chub sems bzhin spyod pa ste/ /byang chub spyod byed dam pa'ang yin/ /'jig rten khams ni stong dag tu/ /grangs med rnam pa mang por yang //
352b1(rgyud): sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir/ /de tshe lha mo rgyu bar byed/ /bud med gzugs ni gzung nas kyang / /sngags kyi tshul gyis lus can la/ /de tshe sems can 'dus byed
352b2(rgyud): cing / /byang chub theg par sbyor bar byed/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa ni/ /bsam zhing brtan par mi nus so/ /phyag na rdo rje dpa' bo ni/ /sngags rnams kun gyi bdag po'ang
352b3(rgyud): dran| / bdag ma rig 'dzin lha mo ni/ /'jig rten gsum gyis rab mchod dang / /lu gu rgyud dang 'od dpag ma/ /rdo rje khu tshur snyan ldan ma/ /khro dbang thig le dkar mo dang / /
352b4(rgyud): dbyig sngon 'jigs par byed dang bcas/ /'di dag khro mo pho nya'i tshogs/ /rig ma'i spyan du rab tu bstan/ /rdo rje'i rigs la gtso bo ste/ /gang zhig dran na phan zhing srung / /
352b5(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che/ /'jig rten dag ni spos glang dang / /byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che/ /blo dang mthu chen thob dang ni/ /sras kyi thu bo gtso bo ni/ /kun
352b6(rgyud): tu bzang po dge ba ste/ /de tshe gang gis dran gyur pa/ /de la 'jigs pa yod ma yin/ /rtag tu de tshe nor bzang dang / /gnod sbyin dam pa dzam+b+ha la/ /nyan thos rang rgyal ma lus
352b7(rgyud): pa| |dran na 'jigs pa ga la yod/ /kun nas de dag mchod byas na/ /srung ba chen por rab tu bstan/ /de tshe 'bras bu che lha dang / /bsod nams skyes dang 'du shes med//
353a1(rgyud): gzugs med gzugs can lha dag dang / /rdzu 'phrul chen po 'dod chags bral/ /dkon mchog gsum la mchod byed dang / /rgyal ba'i
353a2(rgyud): bstan la rab dang ba/ /sngags dang dgra la rtag 'jigs pa/ /de dag la ni cung zad med/ /de ltar dam tshig rjes gsungs pa/ /sngags pa kun gyis bsgoms min te/ /
353a3(rgyud): 'di ni khro rgyal mchog ces pa/ /gshin rje gshed kyis brjod pa yin/ /sems can dam tshig la gnas na/ /mi ni ma lus gnod mi nus/ /lha dang lha min thams
353a4(rgyud): cad dag / de nas yid ni dag 'gyur nas/ /rgyal ba'i sras kyis rab bskul nas/ /thams cad dam tshig bstan gnas 'gyur/ /gnod sbyin bdag po khro ldan pas/ /
353a5(rgyud): khyad du gsod tshig brjod par byed/ /'jig rten khams ni grang med pa/ /de tshe thams cad rab tu 'gul/ /don med khro bo'i rgyal po yis/ /ci yi phyir na 'di bstan
353a6(rgyud): byas| |sems can rnams ni gdul don du/ /de tshe sngon gyi rgyal ba'i sras/ /khro bo'i rgyal po'i nus pa ni/ /sngon chad bstan pa ma yin nam/ /rdo rje can gyis de smras
353a7(rgyud): nas| |rdo rje sa la dor zhing gnas/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po byis pa'i gzugs/ /blo dang ldan pa 'jam pa'i dbyangs/ /gzhon nu rab tu bzhad gyur nas/ /tshig 'di dag
353b1(rgyud): ni smras pa ste/ /lag na rdo rje rdzu 'phrul che/ /gnod sbyin chen po sdang ma byed/ /khro bo'i rgyal po rdzu 'phrul che/ /'di ni nga yis rab tu bstan/ /de bzhin rjes su sbyin par bya/ /ji ltar
353b2(rgyud): 'dod bzhin rab tu ston/ /khyod kyis khro bo'i mthu dag ni/ /yongs su bstan par mi nus te/ /lus 'di gnas shing snang ba yin/ /de nyid khyod kyis drangs pa ste/ /khyod nyid kyi ni
353b3(rgyud): snying la dris/ /khro bo'i mthu ni khugs pa dag /'dir ni bzlog par nus pa min/ /ji ltar 'dod bzhin khyod la bstan/ /gzhan du dam tshig btang ba yin/ /khrus med rab tu
353b4(rgyud): nyal ba dang / /grong gi chos la rjes 'jug dang / /til mar gyis byugs srung med dang / /rtag tu gdug pa'i sems ldan dang / /sngags mchog thams cad spangs pa dang / /
353b5(rgyud): bstan pa la ni ma zhugs dang / /de bzhin mi ni the tshom ldan/ /dad pa med cing 'gyod par gnas/ /dam chos the tshom thob pa dang / /de spong mnyam par ma bzhag dang / /
353b6(rgyud): gcer bu rtag par lhag mar ldan/ /mi gtsang spyod pa'i spyod yul dang / /mi brtson sngags dang mi ldan dang / /rtag tu brtse med lhag mar ldan/ /lha yi gnas dang mchod
353b7(rgyud): rten dang / /lha gang 'khor sa dkyil 'khor du/ /'khrig pa la ni mngon dga' ba/ /khro bos de dag rnam par 'jig /dam tshig nyams dang dad med dang / /sngags kyi
354a1(rgyud): rigs pa mi shes dang / /cung zad shes pa 'khrul pa dang / /spyod pa 'khrul pa de dag la/ /khro bos rnam par 'jig par byed/ /mi yi 'jig rten
354a2(rgyud): rnam kun tu/ /bag yod pa ni med pa dang / /bag med shin tu 'dod chags can/ /dam tshig nyams shing skyon ldan la/ /sngags rnams legs par sbyar ba yis/ /khro bo'i
354a3(rgyud): rgyal por 'joms par byed/ /bag med rigs min 'gro ba yi/ /byis pas rnam kun thams cad dang / /rtag tu 'dod chags bral gyur pa'i/ /rang rgyal dgra bcom nyan thos
354a4(rgyud): kun| |khro bo yi ni rgyal po yis/ /thams cad du ni 'ching dang gcod/ /de skad smras nas 'jam dpal ni/ /snying rje yi ni brlan sems kyis/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems
354a5(rgyud): dpa' yi/ /rdzu 'phrul spyod pa bsam mi khyab/ /de skad smras nas de dag kun/ /cang mi smra bar gyur nas gnas/ /de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang / /phyir yang rdo rje rab tu
354a6(rgyud): blangs/ /de tshe rdo rje blangs nas kyang / /khro rgyal mthu ni shes nas dga'/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen
354a7(rgyud): po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las/ gshin rje gshed kyi yongs su bsngags pa dang / /sngags kyi bdag nyid chen po'i nges par sdom pa'i le'u rab 'byams las/ sum cu
354b1(rgyud): rtsa gsum pa rdzogs so/ / //de nas gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po la bltas te gnas gtsang ma'i
354b2(rgyud): steng na 'dug par gyur ba'i tshogs de dag la smras pa/ dang po re zhig grogs po khyed cag/ khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed kyi stobs dang / pha rol gnon pa dpag tu med pa/
354b3(rgyud): gdul dka' 'dul bar byed pa/ /gshin rje'i 'tsho ba mthar byed pa/ /sems can ma rungs pa tshar gcod pa de gtsor byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ de'i
354b4(rgyud): ras ris kyi cho ga yod de nyon cig / chos grangs dang ni rgyu skar dang / /smyung ba dag kyang mi bya ste/ /dgra yi 'jigs pa byung ba na/ /ras ris 'di ni bri bar bya/ /mar ngo'i zlas phyed dag
354b5(rgyud): gnas te/ /tshes grangs bcu bzhi'am brgyad dag la/ /bram ze dam pa mchog dag gi /dur khrod shi ba'i ro snyed na/ /de ni mtshan mo mun par blangs/ /de yi khrag gis tshon
354b6(rgyud): rtsi bya/ /ras ni chu yis lan gsum bkru/ /de nas de ni bskam bar bya/ /'di byed gdug sems khro ldan zhing / /'jigs par byed pas pri bar bya/ /mar ngo'i zla phyed dur khrod du/ /zhag
354b7(rgyud): ni gsum mam bdun du bri/ /tshes brgyad bcu bzhi'i nub mor ni/ /zhag chen mar mes sbar ba la/ /der gnas ri mor byed pa ni/ /rtag tu g.yas kyi phyogs su blta/ /mi yi thod
355a1(rgyud): pas gdan byas shing / /mnyam par bzhag ste bsrung ba bya/ /dgra yi sdug bsngal gyis nyen na/ /yang na sngags pa rang gis bri/ /dang po'i mtshan mor
355a2(rgyud): rtsom pa na/ /dgra rnams lus la tsha ba 'byung / /gnyis par tsha ba chen po yis/ /dgra rnams brgyal bas gnon par 'gyur/ /gsum pa'i mtshan mor srog 'dor zhing / /'jig
355a3(rgyud): rten pha rol 'gro bar 'gyur/ /sngags pa rab tu ma dad na/ /de la zhi ba ga la yod/ /dgra yi lus ni skams 'gyur zhing / /khyim la 'jigs pa'ang 'byung bar 'gyur/ /gshin
355a4(rgyud): rje gshed ni 'jigs chen gyi/ /ras ris 'di ni bris tsam gyis/ /zhal drug zhabs drug phyag drug bri/ /kha dog sngo zhing gsus pa 'phyang / /khro ldan thod pa'i phreng ba
355a5(rgyud): 'chang / /stag gi pags pa rab tu mnabs/ /mtshon cha sna tshogs mi bzad ldan/ /lag na dbyug to 'jigs par byed/ /spyan ni dmar zhing khro dang bcas/ /spyan gsum
355a6(rgyud): dag gi rnam par mtshan/ /skra 'bar gyen du brdzes pa ni/ /de bzhin la lar du ba'i mdog /mig sman nag po mi bzad dang / /dbyar gyi sprin dang 'dra ba'i mdog/
355a7(rgyud): gshin rje'i gzugs dang 'dra ba yi/ /ma he la zhon yang dag bri/ /gdug pa'i las can 'jigs pa che/ /drag cing drag po 'joms byed pa/ /sems can 'jigs par
355b1(rgyud): byed pa yi/ /gshin rje'i 'tsho ba 'jigs byed brjod/ /shin tu gdug pa'i las can dang / /'jigs shing shin tu mi bzad pa/ /lus can thams cad gsod byed pa/ /'jigs
355b2(rgyud): pa'ang 'jigs shing dngangs byed pa/ /bdag gi khrag gi tshogs dag gis/ /khro bo mchog 'di bri bar bya/ /zhag chen po yi zhag dang ni/ /shin tu dmar ba'i tshon bsres bris/ /
355b3(rgyud): tshon rtsi'i snod du thod pa bya/ /mi yi rus pas par shing bya/ /shi ba'i skra las byas pa yis/ /pir dang pir ni bcing ba'ang bya/ /rang ngam ri mo mkhan gyis kyang / /de nas zas mi bza'
355b4(rgyud): bar bri/ /gtor ma me tog mang po sogs/ /phreng ba dmar dang tsan+dan dmar/ /sha chen tshil gyi spos dang ni/ /zhag gi spos kyis mchod pa bya/ /ras ris dam pa de la ni/ /dang po
355b5(rgyud): bar mthar mchod par bya/ /ras ris yongs su rdzogs byas nas/ /ri mo mkhan la sbyin pa'ang bya/ /nor ni rab tu mang po'am/ /yang na gang gis dge ba'ang sbyin/ /las kyang
355b6(rgyud): 'jigs pa chen po bas/ /de yi don med mi bya'o/ /mdor na dpa' bo'i rin du ni/ /ji ltar 'dod pa de la bya/ /bzo bo'i las ni 'bras bcas bya/ /kha zas med pa'ang rnam par
355b7(rgyud): spang | / ji ltar de ni yang dag dga'/ /de lta de ltar rab tu sbyar/ /srung pa chen po'ang rab tu bya/ /gzhan du de ni 'chi 'gyur zhing / /gzo bo bza' dang bcas 'jigs pas/ /bdag
356a1(rgyud): gis kyang ni mngon par bsrung / /rig pa bzlas nas bya ba ste/ /gzhan du cho gar brjod pa min/ /ras ris yongs su gsal byas pa'am/ /yid la 'dod
356a2(rgyud): pa byas mthong na/ /gdug pa'i dgra rnams 'joms byed pa'i/ /las ni thams cad byed par 'gyur/ /ras ris mchog blangs 'gro ba ni/ /ji ltar 'dod pa'am gar 'dod pa'o//
356a3(rgyud): phyogs chen rgyal po chen po dang / /sems can de ni dregs bcas dang / /mngon pa'i nga rgyal nga rgyal che/ /gdug dang gdug pa'i las rnams dang / /dkon mchog
356a4(rgyud): gsum la gnod byed dang / /chad par smra dang sngags spangs dang / /sngags rnams mchod par mi byed dang / /de la dad rten smod pa dang / /gang yang zlos pa smod byed dang / /de
356a5(rgyud): bzhin mchod rten khyad du gsod/ /cho ga mthong ba'i las kyis ni/ /de dag la ni sbyor bar bya/ /sems can kun dang skyob pa la/ /rtag tu de bzhin chos mi ldan/ /de dag
356a6(rgyud): la ni las rab sbyar/ /'phral du srog ni 'gag par byed/ /lung tang 'bras bu sngags bzlas blangs/ /rtsa ba dang ni shun pa'ang blang / /'bras bu'i rang skyur yang dag
356a7(rgyud): ldan/ /mi yi rus phye legs btags dang / /yungs mar dang ni dug nyid dang / /star bu dang ni lang tang tshe/ /ske tshe dang yang khrag nyid kyang / /mi las yang dag byung ba
356b1(rgyud): dag |thams cad blangs nas yang dag ldan/ /ras ris dben pa'i phyogs su bzhag /sgrub po lho phyogs mngon bltas nas/ /ras ris kyang ni byang du bstan/ /me thab ji 'dod
356b2(rgyud): byas nas ni/ /tsha zhing skam pa'i shing dag gis/ /me thab de la mnyam gzhag nas/ /dur khrod me yis sbar bar bya/ /thams cad ldan pas bsreg byas na/ /cho gar bstan pa'i
356b3(rgyud): sbyin sreg yin/ /khro bo'i rgyal po'i sngags kyis ni/ /me lha dag ni spyan drang bya/ /las rnams dag ni kun la'ang 'dir/ /mdung gi phyag rgya bcing bar bya/ /me thab la ni khror bcas
356b4(rgyud): pas| |rtsa brgyad stong gi sreg blugs sbyin/ /dang por bu dag 'chi ba ni/ /sems can zhugs nas de bzhin 'gyur/ /gnyis pa la ni chung ma dang / /'khor dang gtso bor
356b5(rgyud): bcas pa'ang yin/ /de la gsum par 'chi ba ni/ /gang gi ched du byas pa'o/ /gang tshe mtshan phyed bzlas pa ni/ /ras ris mdun du byed pa'ang / /dgra rnams gsad par
356b6(rgyud): bya phyir te/ /de ni de dang mthun par 'gyur/ /de yi yul 'khor 'jig par 'gyur/ /dpung dang 'chi bar 'gyur ba ste/ /mes tshig rlung ni chen po dang / /char chen dag kyang
356b7(rgyud): 'byung bar 'gyur/ /thams cad bsdus pa'i tshogs dag ni/ /pha rol tshogs kyis gnod par 'gyur/ /de la gnod pa sna tshogs dang / /nad chen dag gis yang dag
357a1(rgyud): khyab| |rgyal po de yi lus kun kyang / /skam par 'di la the tshom med/ /de yi khyim ni thams cad kyang / /mi ma yin pas yang dag dkrugs/ /mal
357a2(rgyud): du brtan pa mi rnyed cing / /sa yi steng du'ang 'khyor bar 'gyur/ /srin po yi dwags sha rjen zas/ /de yi khyim ni yongs su bskor/ /thams cad du ni nyam thag 'jigs/ /sdug
357a3(rgyud): bsngal drag pos sdug bsngal 'gyur/ /sa steng lha yi dbang phyug sogs/ /de yi srung ba byed mi nus/ /'jig rten skyong ba tshangs sogs dang / /brgya byin sogs pa sum
357a4(rgyud): cu'i dbang / /sngags kun lha dang bcas pa dang / /'jig rten kun las byung ba'ang rung / /nga rgyal gyis 'khrugs ma rungs dgra/ /de yi 'tsho ba de mthar byed/ /mtshan
357a5(rgyud): phyed nyi ma gung dag la/ /gang du khros nas zlos byed pa/ /gshin rje khros pa mngon sum ltar/ /bsrung bar yang ni nus ma yin/ /mar ngo'i zla phyed ci 'dod par/ /sa
357a6(rgyud): steng ras ris bzhag nas ni/ /gtor ma mchod pa che bya ba/ /dur khrod dgon pa'i gnas dang ni/ /shing gcig de bzhin rtags dang ni/ /brag dang bas mtha' phug
357a7(rgyud): kyang rung / /gcig pu gnyis su med par yang / /rtag tu las rnams yang dag brtsams/ /dgon ba chen po dben pa dang / /lha yi khang pa stong pa dang / /khang stong dang
357b1(rgyud): ni chu bo dang / /rgya mtsho'i 'gram la brten pa dang / /grong khyer de dang nye ba dang / /der gnas yang na ci 'dod par/ /dpag tshad brgya yi tshad tsam nas/ /rtag tu las rnams bya ba yin//
357b2(rgyud): gtsang ba'i yul ni brgya dag dang / /tshad med yul du gnas pa'ang rung / /sngags kyi rdzu 'phrul bsam mi khyab/ /zlos pa'i grub pa bsam mi khyab/ /las ni bsam mi khyab par snang / /'bras bu'ang
357b3(rgyud): bsam mi khyab pa'o/ /gshin rje gshed ni bdag nyid che/ /khro bo'i rgyal po bsam mi khyab/ /las dang rdzu 'phrul yul dang ni/ /rnam par
357b4(rgyud): 'phrul pa che 'byung ba/ /bsam gyis mi khyab zlos pa yis/ /sa steng 'di la grub pa snang / /byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che/ /kun gyis bsrung bar yong mi nus/ /'jig
357b5(rgyud): rten pa yi sngags rnams dang / /gza' dang ma mo smos ci dgos/ /dbang ldan dang ni khyab 'jug gam/ /skem byed dang ni brgya byin dang / /rgyal dang rgyal ba'i sras dag
357b6(rgyud): ni| |dam tshig 'dzin par byed pa dang / /sa bcu la ni yang dag gnas/ /byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid che/ /gang zhig dgra bcom rang rgyal dang / /rdzu 'phrul
357b7(rgyud): chen po chags bral ba/ /dam tshig sngon byas de dag gis/ /bsrung bar yang ni mi nus so/ /mdor bsdus nas ni bshad par bya/ /'byor pa 'dod pas mnyan par
358a1(rgyud): gyis| |zlos pa sems ni ma dad na/ /gzhan gyis nus par mi 'gyur ro/ /sngags ba mchog ni mi dga' na/ /de 'dir zhi ba ga la yod/ /
358a2(rgyud): bdag nyid chen po gshin rje gshed/ /khro bo'i rgyal po zlos pa po/ /gang tshe yid ni dang ba dang / /gang tshe snying rjes brlan gyur pa/ /de tshe de ni zhi thob pa'am/ /brtan
358a3(rgyud): pa'am 'tsho ba 'dzin par 'gyur/ /birtsu marda yungs mar dang / /rang skyur dug dang ldan pa ni/ /khrag dang mi yi sha dang ni/ /lan tshwa tsha ba gsum dang ni/ /ske tshe dung
358a4(rgyud): gi phye ma dang / /star bu dang ni sra ma gyi sha /lang tang tshe yi rtsa ba dang / /de bzhin ko sha ta ka'i dang / /e ran+da rtsa nas tshig thal/ /leb rgan rtsi dang gze ma dang / /
358a5(rgyud): po son cha yi rtsa ba dang / /de bzhin sgog skya ke'u dang / /gzhan gyi zhag dang chu dang ni/ /kun dong chang ni btung bar bcas/ /'di kun cha mnyam byas nas ni/ /ras
358a6(rgyud): ris nye bar sbyin sreg bya/ /sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na/ /zla ba phyed kyi nang du ni/ /bu dang gnyen sdug bcas pa yi/ /dgra rnams rtsad nas 'jig 'gyur te/ /'khor
358a7(rgyud): kun ma lus 'joms par byed/ /gnyis pa'i nang du sbyin sreg bya/ /de yi rtsad nas 'byin par byed/ /zlos pas me nang sbyin sreg byas/ /gsum pa'i dus su phyin
358b1(rgyud): pa na| |de yi grong rdal bcas de la/ /mu ge dag ni 'byung ba dang / /char mi 'bab cing 'chi ba mang / /srin pos kun tu khyab pa dang / /mes tshig rdo yi char 'bab dang / /rdo rje
358b2(rgyud): dang ni thog kyang 'bab/ /ljongs dang phyogs dang yul dang ni/ /ji snyed rgyal po de la yod/ /'tshe ba mang por rab 'byung zhing / /de bzhin gzhan gyi dmag tshogs 'byung / /
358b3(rgyud): de yi yul du 'tshe ba ni/ /du ma mang po dag kyang 'byung / /dpal min mang po rab ston pa/ /rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur/ /lang tang rtsa bas sbyin sreg byas/ /de la rims
358b4(rgyud): ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /tsha bas rtag tu sbyin sreg byas/ /tsha ba chen po skye bar 'gyur/ /shin tu skyur bas sbyin sreg byas/ /grang ba'i rims ni yang dag 'byung / /ma rungs rgyal
358b5(rgyud): po stobs kyis dregs/ /de yi lus la de dag 'gyur/ /phyogs chen nor dang ldan pa dang / /gdug cing dpung tshe yang dag gnas/ /de yi 'tsho ba tha ma ni/ /nub gnyis yang na
358b6(rgyud): bdun gyis so/ /gang zhig gang la dad lha 'am/ /skyes pa'i skar ma ming yang rung / /ras ris mdun du gzugs bya ba/ /dur khrod sol bas bris pa la/ /mgo la rdog pas
358b7(rgyud): mnan nas ni/ /khro bas bzlas pa brtsam par bya/ /glo bur rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i/ /mi yi bdag po zug gzer 'byung / /nad chen pos ni thebs 'gyur te/ /de yi mod
359a1(rgyud): la'ang 'chi bar 'gyur/ /yang na dgra stas gcod pa 'am/ /yan lag dag kyang mi tshang 'gyur/ /sdig can mi ma yin pa yi/ /srin po gdug
359a2(rgyud): pas za bar 'gyur/ /bdag gi 'khor dang bcas pa dag /sha rjen za dang srul po dang / /sha za yi dwags ma mo yis/ /de yi mod la'ang gsod par byed/ /de nas dpal
359a3(rgyud): ldan rdo rje 'chang / /de tshe 'khor la 'di skad smras/ /sangs rgyas kun la phyag btsal nas/ /de nas cang mi smra bar gnas/ /'jig rten rnams la phan 'dod phyir/ /'di
359a4(rgyud): skad du ni yang smras pa/ /gnod sbyin mo ni thams cad dang / /gnod sbyin kun tshogs bos nas ni/ /de tshe gnod sbyin bdag po ste/ /byang chub sems dpas smras pa ni//
359a5(rgyud): gnod sbyin rnams kyis ras ris smras/ /'dod pa kun dang nye bar ldan/ /'gugs par byed dang dbang byed kun/ /zug rdu ma lus yang dag 'byin/ /sngags pa gang tshe
359a6(rgyud): 'khrig pa 'dod/ /'dod chags ldongs pa'am rmongs pa'i blos/ /bde gshegs bkas kyang bzlog pa dang / /gnyen pos kyang ni mi nus so/ /thog med pa yi 'khor ba
359a7(rgyud): nas| |shin tu sdug bsngal rgyu sngon byas/ /de dag sdug bsngal sdug bsngal bar/ /snying rje chen pos 'gro ba gdungs/ /tshangs spyod dbang po dul bas ni/ /bde 'gro
359b1(rgyud): dag ni thob par 'gyur/ /bzas po shis par bstan pa dang / /mthar ni zhi ba'ang thob par 'gyur/ /theg pa gsum la brten nas ni/ /mya ngan 'das pa legs par thob/ /
359b2(rgyud): bzlog pa blo ngan gyis zin pa/ /'dod chags kyis ldongs dka' thub med/ /'khor ba mi bzad tshang tshing gi /'gro ba ldar ni 'khor bar 'gyur/ /de dag sdug bsngal ldan don
359b3(rgyud): du| |'dod pa'i longs spyod rjod par byed/ /khro bo 'di ni mnyes byas na/ /sdig pa kun las ldog par 'gyur/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga byang chub sems
359b4(rgyud): dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las/ khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed kyi mngon spyod dang / legs par sdom pa'i le'u rab 'byams
359b5(rgyud): las sum cu rtsa bzhi pa rdzogs so/ / //de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhi ba'i blo gros zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus shing 'dug par
359b6(rgyud): gyur pa de stan las langs te sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'atsal nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'dug ste/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la lan gsum
359b7(rgyud): bskor ba byas nas zhabs gnyis la btud do/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la bltas nas tshig 'di smras so/ /phyag na rdo rje/ /zheng khyod sems can thams
360a1(rgyud): cad la gnod par byed pa dang / 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i sngags dang rgyud bshad na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
360a2(rgyud): po rnams kyis nges par chos 'di ni ma yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gang gi phyir snying rje chen pos rab tu phye zhing / byang chub sems dpa'i
360a3(rgyud): spyad pa spyod cing sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir phan pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa la rab tu zhugs na 'khor ba'i 'ching ba las grol bar 'gyur ro/ /kye rgyal
360a4(rgyud): ba'i sras/ gzhan yang / sems can la gnod par byed pa'i chos ston pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang /
360a5(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ni sems can thams cad kyi ched du gsungs pa ma yin te/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i phyir sems can thams cad la phan
360a6(rgyud): pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa la rab tu zhugs pa yin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros
360a7(rgyud): la smras pa/ /ji ltar khyod smra ba dang / ji ltar khyod rab tu ston pa de bzhin du/ zhi ba'i blo gros/ byang chub sems dpas bslab par bya/ /de bzhin du bsgrub par
360b1(rgyud): bya| |ji ltar sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa de bzhin du bdag gis kyang bstan par bgyi'o/ /don dam par ni yang dag pa'i mtha' las
360b2(rgyud): yang dag pa'i mtha' la yang dag par brten nas chos kyi mtha' las grol ba thob par 'gyur ro/ /sems can mtha' ni bsam mi khyab/ /rnam par smin pa'ang bsam mi khyab/
360b3(rgyud): sangs rgyas chos kyang bsam mi khyab/ /byang chub spyod pa'ang bsam mi khyab/ /gdul ba'i sems can la brten nas/ /phan pa'i spyod pa bsam mi khyab/ /byang chub sems
360b4(rgyud): dpa'i spyod pa rnams/ /bsam mi khyab par yongs su bstan/ /rgyud rnams kun la rgyud 'di yi/ /mthu ni bsam mi khyab pa yin/ /gshin rje gshed ni bdag nyid che/ /khro
360b5(rgyud): bo'i rgyal po'i sngags dag dang / /yul gsum dag kyang bsam mi khyab/ /rtogs pa'i bdag nyid bsam mi khyab/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
360b6(rgyud): chen po'i spyod pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rgyu mthun pa las byung ba'i sgrub pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ byang chub sems dpa'
360b7(rgyud): sngags zlos ba na 'di ltar sems bskyed par bya ste/ 'phags pa ma yin pa'i sems can 'dod pa la lhag par chags pas bsod nams ma yin pa shin tu rab tu
361a1(rgyud): mang po 'phel bas dmyal ba chen por skye zhing sems can 'di dag ni bsod nams kyi phung po shin tu mang po 'di 'phel bar mi 'gyur ro/ /sems
361a2(rgyud): can 'di dag byang chub rnam pa gsum gyis skal ba med par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir/ zhi ba'i blo gros/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sngags zlos pas sems
361a3(rgyud): nye bar gzhag par bya zhing thabs mkhas pa 'di la mngon spyod kyis las rab tu sbyar bar bya'o/ /las thams cad la yang mtshan mar 'dzin par mi bya'o/ /mi
361a4(rgyud): dge bar 'dzin par mi bya zhing snying rjes brlan pa'i sems kyis sems can gdul ba'i thabs la yang bslab par bya'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ gzhan yang / chos dang /
361a5(rgyud): chos ma yin pa dang / dkar po dang / nag po dang / dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / 'gro ba'i bdag nyid chen po sems can gdul ba'i thabs sgrub pa dang / /chos kyi dbyings
361a6(rgyud): sgrub pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis rab tu rtogs par 'gyur te/ de nyid chos ston bas sems can smin pa'i thabs kyang rab tu sgrub par byed do/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/
361a7(rgyud): de bzhin du bdag cag gis bslab par bya zhing / 'di lta ste/ sems can gdul ba dang / sems can smin pa dang / bstan par bya ba'i phyir dang / de la/ rgyal ba'i
361b1(rgyud): sras khyed cag / gang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'dir dam tshig chen po la zhugs pa de thams cad kyis mnyan par bya/ /dad par bya/ de nyid dge ba dang / mi dge ba 'tshol ba
361b2(rgyud): nyid du bya ste/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos ston pa la mngon par dga' bar bya'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhi ba'i blo gros kyis
361b3(rgyud): gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la rnam par bltas nas cang mi smra bar gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo zhes yid la byas nas
361b4(rgyud): sangs rgyas la rnam par lta bzhin du rang gi stan la 'dug par gyur to/ /de nas gsang ba ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de la rnam par bltas
361b5(rgyud): nas khro bo'i rgyal po'i cho ga yang smras pa/ gang dag lha'i tshogs dang / sems can gyi khams la brten pa'i 'byung po'i tshogs khyed cag nyon cig /dang po re zhig
361b6(rgyud): bsrung ba byas la khro bo'i rgyal po'i ras ris de yongs su blangs la/ gnas dben par song nas dbang phyug chen po'i rtags gcig pa'i gnas su rtags de la dug dang /
361b7(rgyud): khrag dang / ske tshe dang / rang skyur gyis gtor la/ shing pi tsu mar da'i me tog gis mchod cing mi'i rgyu ma rlon pa dag gis bdag nyid la mchod phyir thogs byas la/ mi'i
362a1(rgyud): m go bo'i thod pa g.yas pa'i lag na thogs pas brdegs pa lta bur byas la lag pa g.yon pa'i sdigs mdzub kyis mtshan gcig po la sdigs
362a2(rgyud): ba bzhin du byed cing / gtsor khro ba'i dbang du gyur pa dang / rgyal po ma rungs pas brnyas pa chen po'i sems kyis byas pa 'am/ gzhan skyon can gyi skyes bu phyogs
362a3(rgyud): chen po dang ldan pa dang / nor chen po dang ldan pa dang / rab tu gtum pa chen po dang / gtso bo chen po dag gis khyad du gsod par 'gyur na sgo bcad pa byas la gcer
362a4(rgyud): bur byas shing skra bshig pas dbang phyug chen po'i mtshan la khro bo'i sngags ji srid dbang phyug chen po'i mtshan dkyil du gas par gyur ba de srid du bzlas pa bya'o/ /
362a5(rgyud): dum bu gnyis su gyur na yi ge hUM gi sgra chen po yang thos par gyur te/ de la 'jigs par yang mi bya'o/ /de thos pa'i dbang gis rgyal po ma rungs pa'am/ gzhan gang
362a6(rgyud): la la dbung chen po dang ldan pa'i dag de'i mod la rims chen pos zin par 'gyur ba'am/ srin po la sogs pa mi ma yin pas zin par 'gyur ro/ /de nyid ji srid yud
362a7(rgyud): tsam du bzlas pa byas na de'i mod la dgra rnams kyis 'tsho ba ni mtha' mar 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te mtshan mo bzlas na ni gza' 'khor dang bcas pa 'jig par
362b1(rgyud): 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang / las su 'gyur ba ni de bzhin du dbang phyug chen po'i gnas su nyi ma phyed la song ste/ nim pa'i lo mas mchod cing sha chen po'i spos kyis bdugs
362b2(rgyud): la| ji srid dgra'i khyim du mes tshig pa'i bar du bzlas pa byas na dgra yang 'dar ba'i rims chen pos thebs par 'gyur ro/ /yang na khros pas bzlas pa ma btang zhing
362b3(rgyud): g.yas phyogs su rtags kyang yod na dgra de 'chi bar 'gyur zhing rigs rgyud 'jigs par 'gyur ro/ /ci ste slar gso bar byed na ni rtags de chus phyir yang rab tu bkrus
362b4(rgyud): la shin tu bsil ba'i 'o mas khrus byas na slar yang sos par 'gyur ro/ /las gzhan yang yod de/ dbang phyug chen po'i mtshan g.yas phyogs su bzhag la/ po son cha'i
362b5(rgyud): shing dang / tsher ma can gyi shing gis me rab tu sbar la/ shing pA kang ta ka'i yam shing la dug dang / khrag dang / ske tshe la mngon par btags la stong rtsa brgyad kyi sbyin
362b6(rgyud): sreg byas na dgra thams cad nad chen pos thebs par 'gyur te/ las thams cad kyis kyang nus pa med par 'gyur ro/ /zhag gnyis pa la ni rims nad chen po dang /
362b7(rgyud): zug gzer chen pos thebs pa 'am/ nad rnam pa sna tshogs sam/ mi ma yin pas zin cing mthar 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /zhag gsum pa la grangs gsum gyis
363a1(rgyud): byas na ni 'tsho ba thams cad kyis thams cad du 'dor bar 'gyur ro/ /slar gso bar byed na ni'o ma'i sbyin sreg byas na zhi bar 'gyur zhing
363a2(rgyud): yul mi thams cad dang / dgra thams cad kyang sos par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du lha thams cad dam/ ma mo thams cad dam/ 'byung po thams cad gang zhig gang
363a3(rgyud): gi lha la dad pa de rkang pas mnan pa'i las bya ba 'am/ yang na de'i rgyu skar ram/ sngags sam/ ming dag la rkang pas mnan la las byas te/ de bzhin gshegs
363a4(rgyud): pa'i rig pa ni ma gtogs te/ thams cad kyis kyang zhabs kyi mthe bong g.yon pa bzung ste las bya yi/ mnan par yang mi bya/ /'gom par yang mi bya'o/ /gang
363a5(rgyud): yang 'jig rten pa thams cad kyi sngags ni mnan nas las bya'o/ /khro bo'i rgyal po'i bzlas pa ma grub pa nyid kyang bzlas pa tsam kho nas las rnams byed par 'gyur//
363a6(rgyud): sngags thams cad rnam par 'jig par 'gyur/ /dgra thams cad 'joms par 'gyur/ /sngags thams cad nus pa med par 'gyur ro/ /mdor na/ 'jig rten
363a7(rgyud): dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sngags kyi chogs kyang ji lta ji ltar rab tu sbyar ba de lta de ltar thams cad sgrub par 'gyur/ bzlas pa tsam gyis re ba thams
363b1(rgyud): cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /khro bo'i rgyal po'i sngags 'di bzlas pa tsam kho nas grub pa nyid de grub pa dam pa'ang rjes su rab tu sbyin no/ /yid la 'dod pas dgra rnams
363b2(rgyud): 'joms par byed do/ /mdung rtse chen bo'i phyag rgya dang ldan par byas na las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /las gzhan du'ang 'gyur pa ni nyi ma phyag la dur khyod du song ste/
363b3(rgyud): sreg pa'i sar mtshan gcig smyung ba byas te/ mar ngo'i bcu bzhi la dur khrod kyi shing gis me rab tu sbar la/ dug dang / khrag gis btags pa'i ske tshes sbyin sreg byas na de las
363b4(rgyud): ha ha zhes pa'i sgra sgrogs shin gyi dwags thams cad 'ong par 'gyur na 'jigs par mi bya zhing / dgra la gnod pa gyis shig ces byas na de bzhin du bya'o zhes smras nas mi
363b5(rgyud): snang bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas yud tsam gyis dpag tshad stong du yang song nas dgra rnams 'jom par byed cing rigs rgyud kyang brlag par byed do/ /de la sogs pa'i las mang
363b6(rgyud): po byed par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang / las su 'gyur ba ni dben pa'i phyogs gtsang mar gos gtsang ma bgos te khang stong du rab tu zhugs nas mi'i rus pa'i sreg blugs
363b7(rgyud): kyis stong rtsa brgyad sbyin bsreg bya ste/ de nas thal ba de lag pa gnyi gas blangs la gos gtsang ma'i dum bu la so sor bcings te thum po gnyis su byas la/ kham phor
364a1(rgyud): kha sbyar gnyis kyi nang du so sor bzhag la bdag nyid srung ba chen po byas nas rdzas de blangs la/ khyim du slar zhugs nas mtshan mo dur khrod
364a2(rgyud): chen por song nas mar ngo'i bcu bzhi 'am/ tshes brgyad la mi sreg pa'i sar bzhag cing lho phyogs su bltas nas kham phor kha sbyar gnyis blangs la/ langs shing
364a3(rgyud): gcer bur byas te skra bshig pa dang / khro ba dang bcas pas 'jigs par byas te rig pa stong phrag bcu bzlas pa byas na thal ba de grub par 'gyur ro/ /mi gang su
364a4(rgyud): dag rdzas de slong par gyur na sbyin par mi bya'o/ /gal te tshan khar slong bar byed na ni khro bo'i rgyal po dran nas yi ge hUM rab tu sbyar ba byas na de'i mod la 'byer par 'gyur
364a5(rgyud): ro| |bgegs thams cad rnam par 'joms par yang cho ga 'di nyid do/ /lag pa g.yon pa dang / g.yas pas blangs pa'i thal bas ni rtags mtshan bya zhing / bag
364a6(rgyud): yod pas bsrung ba'ang byas la/ tho rangs nyi ma 'char ba'i dus su slar 'ong bar bya ba na khrus byas shing gtsang zhing gtsang ba'i gos bgos te rang gi khyim du 'jug
364a7(rgyud): par bya ste/ rang gi gnas sa ma/ ji ltar 'dod par 'gro bar bya'o/ /de nas lag pa g.yas pa gang gis blangs pa'i thal ba des mi dang / rkang gnyis dang /
364b1(rgyud): rkang bzhi dang / srog chags 'byung po thams cad dang / lha dang bcas pa'i klu dang / gnod sbyin rnams kyis spyi bor gtor na dbang du 'gyur ro/ /gang lag pa g.yon pas
364b2(rgyud): blangs pa'i thal ba des ni mi'i bud med thams cad kyi spyi bor gtor na dbang du 'gyur ro/ /lag pa g.yas pas blangs pa'i thal ba gang yin pa des mi rnams kyi lte ba'i phyogs
364b3(rgyud): sam| pho mtshan gyi phyogs su gtor na grong ba'i chos bsten pa la nus pa med par 'gyur ro/ /gang zhig bud mad la mngon par chags pa de'i gsang ba'i gnas su thal
364b4(rgyud): ba'i phye mas gtor na skyes pa gzhan brten pa la nus pa med par 'gyur ro/ /skyes bu gzhan brten pa la rma med par yang 'gyur ro/ /ji srid rang gi skyes pa nyid thob na ni phyir
364b5(rgyud): yang de'i rma'i sgo de rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /'dod pas log par g.yem bsten pa la yang nus pa med par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du skyes pa la yang skyes pa'i dbang po
364b6(rgyud): la lag pa g.yas pas thal ba'i phye mas gtor na de yang gzhan gyi bud med la 'gro ba'i nus pa med par 'gyur te/ yongs su rnyid pa bzhin du de nyid 'byung zhing gnas par
364b7(rgyud): 'gyur ro/ /ji srid du rang gi chung ma de nyid dang yang phrad na phyir yang rnyid pa med par 'gyur ro/ /skyes pa 'am/ bud med gang la thal ba gtor bar 'gyur ba de med par
365a1(rgyud): 'gyur ba 'am med par mi 'gyur ba'o/ /yang na ni ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du byed do/ /gal te nan gyis byed na ni gsang ba'i phyogs su
365a2(rgyud): srin bu rnams rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / de dag gis zos pa na 'tsho ba yang 'gag par 'gyur la/ zla ba gcig gi nang du rul bar 'gyur te/ dri mi zhim zhing
365a3(rgyud): ro myangs par 'dra bar 'gyur ro/ /gcin sri ba'i nad la sogs pas skyes bu zin par 'gyur la/ skrangs nad chen po'ang 'byung bar 'gyur te/ gang de dag gi nad
365a4(rgyud): kyis dus byed par 'gyur ro/ /yang na gzhan gyis bud med la| bsten par 'dod na yang nus pa med par 'gyur ro/ /ji ltar ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa de dag thams
365a5(rgyud): cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /gal te gtor ba tsam gyis thal ba dang phrad par ma gyur na mthong ba 'am/ ma mthong ba la yang mthun pa'i rlung dang sbyar te/ thal pa gtor
365a6(rgyud): te| de la thal ba cung zad kyang babs par 'gyur ba 'am/ gtor bar byed pas yid kyis bsams te thal ba gtor na/ gang brtsams par 'gyur ba de dag thams
365a7(rgyud): cad kyis las rnams byed par 'gyur ro/ /bdag nyid dam/ gzhan gyis lag pas/ gtor na ji ltar 'dod pa de thams cad kyi las byed par 'gyur gyi gzhan
365b1(rgyud): du ni ma yin no/ /ci ste gnas mal la sogs pa dang / stan dang / gos la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs sam/ bzhon pa dang / theg pa dang / lham dang / gdugs la
365b2(rgyud): sogs pa yo byad thams cad dang / lhag ma ni bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / bca' ba la sogs pa dang / lus thams cad la dgos pa'i cha byas thams cad dang / me
365b3(rgyud): tog dang / so rtsi dang / 'bras bu dang / spos la sogs pa 'di dag thams cad la thal ba'i phye mas gtor na dgra de dag lus la shig dang / ma kun ta'i srin bu rnams
365b4(rgyud): kyis kun nas khyab par 'gyur te/ shing ji ltar ba bzhin du za bar 'gyur ro/ /rmi lam ngan pa yang mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /zhag bdun gyis kyang 'chi bar 'gyur te/ sman pa
365b5(rgyud): thams cad dang / lha thams cad kyis kyang bzlog par mi nus so/ /sngags thams cad kyis kyang bsrung bar mi nus te/ grang gis thal ba gtong bar byed pa ni ma gtogs
365b6(rgyud): so| |ci ste slar gso bar byed na ni shing mngar dang / ut+pa la sngon po dang / tsan+dan dkar po gcig tu byas la chu grang mo la btags te/ de nas spyi bo nas bzung ste/
365b7(rgyud): rkang ba'i mthil gyi bar du de'i lus la byugs shing 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i sngags bzlas na sos par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang / bud med rnams la
366a1(rgyud): l us su bya ba ni mthun pa'i rlung gi phyogs gang du 'dod pa der song nas bud med mkha' 'gro ma ma rungs pa nga rgyal can thams cad la yang sbyor
366a2(rgyud): ba bya ste gzhan la ni ma yin no/ /mthun pa'i rlung yod pa de nyid la gnas nas/ bcom ldan 'das yid la bsams te thal ba gtor na mo mtshan dang / nu ma thams
366a3(rgyud): cad mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /skyes pa la yang kha spu dang / ba spu med pa dang / mo mtshan dang / nu ma yang rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de lta bur rnam pa mang po du ma'i
366a4(rgyud): las kyang byed pa 'am/ gzhan byed du gzhug par 'gyur ro/ /yang na gang dga' ba skye ba de byed du gzhug par 'gyur ro/ /bud med dam skyes pa gang la sems dga'
366a5(rgyud): ba skye ba de la thal ba de byin na ji ltar 'dod pa'i las byed du 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /sbyor ba'ang bslab par bya'o/ /de ltar nad chen po dag gis kyang 'debs su gzhug
366a6(rgyud): par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das yid la bsams nas/ /thal ba'i lag pas spyi bo la reg na klad pa zug gzer skye bar 'gyur ro/ /kha la reg par byas na kha'i
366a7(rgyud): nad 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du mthar gyis snying gi bar du reg par byas na snying gi nad dam/ lto ba'i nad 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du rkang pa
366b1(rgyud): gnyis dang / rje ngar gnyis la reg par byas na yang khrag las byung ba'i nad khrag 'khrug pa la sogs pa'i nad kyis 'debs par byed par 'gyur ro/ /mdor na/ 'chi bar
366b2(rgyud): byed pa dang / dbang du byed par yang 'gyur te/ ji lta ji ltar rab tu sbyar ba de lta de ltar de thams cad byed par 'gyur zhing / gsad pa dang / dgug pa dang / dbang du
366b3(rgyud): byed par yang 'gyur ro/ /shin tu thag ring po na gnas kyang las thams cad byed do/ /mkhar shin tu bgrod dka' ba dang / nye ba mthun pa'i rlung yod par gnas par
366b4(rgyud): byas la/ lag pa gnyis kas thal ba de nyid blangs la yang dag par gtor na ra ba dang / sgo khang dang / yang thog kyang rab tu ltung bar 'gyur te/ mkhar srung ba yang
366b5(rgyud): ltung bar 'gyur zhing / mes tshig pa chen po yang 'byung bar 'gyur/ /dpung rnams kyang 'jig par 'gyur/ rnam par 'tshe ba chen pos kyang nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur/
366b6(rgyud): thams cad bor nas rab tu 'byer bar yang 'gyur/ /yang na skyabs su mngon par 'gro bar 'gyur/ /de ltar gzhan gyi dpung la yang mthun pa'i rlung yod pa'i phyogs
366b7(rgyud): su thal ba gtor na/ dpung dang / sde chen po yang 'jig par 'gyur zhing / tshig pa chen po 'am/ nad kyis 'debs par 'gyur ba'am/ glang po dang / rta dang /
367a1(rgyud): shing rta dang / rkang thang la sogs pa'i sde dpon yang 'jig par 'gyur ba'am/ skyabs su mngon par 'gro bar 'gyur te/ de ltar rnam pa du ma

374a5(rgyud): pa las sor gdub gnyis pa yang bzhag nas 'gro bar byed do/ /yang na gdu bu dang / rked pa'i 'og pag dang / rkang pa gnyis kyi rkang gdub dang / mgo bo'i nor bu dang /
374a6(rgyud): de bzhin du gzhan dang / gzhan lha'i rgyan gcig cig gang de khyer ba de dang de rjes su ster bar byed do/ /'gro ba dang / 'ong ba yang don med par mi byed do/ /de bzhin du
374a7(rgyud): nyin re zhing yang ma lus par thams cad zad par bya'o/ /de bzhin du zla ba drug na smra bar byed na de'i tshe smra bar byas nas chung mar 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu gnas na bcud kyis
374b1(rgyud): lan yang rab tu sbyin zhing gang 'thungs pas dus ring por 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /yid kyis bsgoms nas seng ldeng gi phur bus sa brkos na lha'i gzhal med khang 'byung bar 'gyur
374b2(rgyud): la| phyung na ni mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /'di'i sngags gnyis pa yod pa ni/ oM ma hA na g+ni na g+ni dzai swAhA/ de nyid kyis mar me rab tu spar la sngags 'dis lan brgya rtsa brgyad mngon
374b3(rgyud): par sngags pa byas na nges par 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /phur bus mngon par sngags pa byas nas brko bar bya'o/ /phur bu phyung zhing mar me zad na mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /phur bu dang /
374b4(rgyud): mi'i zhag gi mar dang / ba'i rwa 'am/ ma he nag po'i rwa dang / dur khrod kyi ras kyi snying po 'chang na yul gzhan du gang ci 'dod pa de yang ster bar byed do/ /yang na rang nyid bya ste
374b5(rgyud): sngags kyang gzhan la mis byin no/ /ci ste byin na ni rig pa chad par 'gyur/ gang 'byin pa de'i phun sum tshogs par 'gyur te/ gang 'dod pa de yang gnas dben par byed na
374b6(rgyud): 'di'i grub pa don med par mi 'gyur ro/ /yang na gzhan dang rtse bar ni byed de 'on kyang de dang lhan cig smra bar ni mi byed de/ bud med gzhan dang phrad par mngon par 'dod
374b7(rgyud): pa'am/ yid de la sems na yang de'i tshe zlos pa de'i gan du 'ong bar mi 'gyur te/ bud med gzhan dang phrad pa de'i dbang du 'gyur ba yin no/ /lha mdzes ma'i sngags ni/ oM
375a1(rgyud): su ra su na da ri swAhA/ 'di'i cho ga ni seng ldeng gi shing gis me rab tu sbar la mar gyi sreg blugs kyis zla ba gcig la dus gsum du sbyin sreg stong
375a2(rgyud): rtsa brgyad bya zhing / de nas yar ngo'i zla ba nya la bsang byed kyis khres la 'dug ste/ gtsang zhing gtsang pa'i sa phyogs dben par ji srid na ma phyed pa de srid du sngags
375a3(rgyud): bzlas pa byas na nges par 'ong bar 'gyur zhing de nas ma dang / sring mo dang / chung ma sngar ji lta ba de thams cad byed par 'gyur te/ thams cad kyang rgya cher brjod par bya'o/ /bdun
375a4(rgyud): po 'di dag gnod sbyin ma/ /phyag na rdo rje'i bka' yis kyang / /lha dang lha min khams gsum du/ /sa rnams kun tu yongs su rgyu/ /mi yul dag na sbyor bar dga'/ /snying rjer
375a5(rgyud): ldan zhing rnam par rgyu/ /kha cig 'phags ma byis pa dang / /gnod sbyin ma gzhan blun pa'o/ /gzhan dag phan byed 'tshe ba yang / /de bzhin mtshan ma yongs su rgyu/ /byis
375a6(rgyud): pa'i 'tsho ba 'phrog pa'i phyir/ /brkam zhing sha ni za byed gzhan/ /gang phyir 'dzam gling 'ongs pa ni/ /de bzhin khrag la chags byed pa'o/ /rtag tu srog la gnod byed pa'i//
375a7(rgyud): khrag la dga' ba'i gnod sbyin mo/ /srung byed 'chi dang bcas gyur pa'i/ /khyim ni kun tu yongs su rgyu/ /de dag tshar bcad bsgrub don du/ /dam tshig 'di ni rab tu
375b1(rgyud): bstan/ /ji ltar 'dod chags 'ching ba la/ /byis pa rnams ni bsdus pa'i don/ /sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir/ /de ltar 'di kun gsungs pa yin/ /'dod chags kyis mdongs
375b2(rgyud): sems rmongs pa'i/ /gang tshe sngags pa 'khrig don gnyer/ /sngags kyis bkug byas longs spyod pa/ /gnod sbyin mo 'am srin mo 'am/ /klu mo 'am yang na dri za ma/ /mi'am
375b3(rgyud): ci 'am lha min nam/ /lha min lha bas mchog gyur pa'i/ /sa 'og gnas ni nyams dga' bar/ /gang du bud med grangs med pa/ /sngags shes de ni rab tu 'jug /sngags
375b4(rgyud): shes sngags ni zlos pa dag / der song bskal par gnas par 'gyur/ /byams pa zhes bya'i rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /sangs rgyas chen po 'byung 'gyur te/ /de tshe des ni dam chos thos/ /
375b5(rgyud): thos nas rab tu grol bar 'gyur/ /lha dang lha min bu mo dang / /rig 'dzin bu mo dam pa dag /sngags kyis bkug nas spyod byed cing / /de tshe lha yi bde bas dga'/ /sngags pa
375b6(rgyud): dzam+bu'i gling gnas pas/ /de nyid du ni rtag 'dren pa/ /gang tshe gtsang gnas gsang ba dang / /gtsang spra spyod pa rtag dga' ba'o/ /grub pa dam pa rmongs rnams la /rnam yang sems
375b7(rgyud): la 'byung mi 'gyur/ /bshad gci mi gtsang gnas dang ni/ /rtag tu dri nga rul pa dang / /nad kyi sdug bsngal mya ngan dang / /tha mar 'chi zhing sdug bsngal snod/ /bral ba'i
376a1(rgyud): rnam par yang dag ldan/ /mi yi bud med reg mi bya/ /mi rtag sdug bsngal stong pa dang / /stong pa gsog dang ther zug med/ /byis pa rnams ni rje
376a2(rgyud): brid dang / /kun tu rtog las byung ba la/ /thog ma med nas 'dod kun 'byung / /sngags pas 'dod kun bsten mi bya/ /de dag chags bral zhes gsungs te/ /rnam grol de
376a3(rgyud): dag grub pa nyid/ /gang zhig 'dod la chags bral ba/ /'di yi sngags ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /bshang gci khrag gis brlan pa dang / /rul pas kun tu khyab pa dang / /rga
376a4(rgyud): dang 'chi dang mya ngan bcas/ /mi yi lus la reg mi bya/ /rmongs pa'am chags pa'i sems kyis ni/ /der ni 'khrig pa brten mi bya/ /de dag rtag tu mi gtsang brten/ /sngags kyi
376a5(rgyud): grub pa rnyed mi 'gyur/ /sngags shes sngags kyi gzugs can dang / /shes ldan dbang po thul ba dang / /dpa' bo gtsang ba'i spyod la dga'/ /rtag tu de yi sngags kyang 'grub/ /
376a6(rgyud): pad+ma mtho ma rab dga' ma/ /mi pham ma dang rtag rgyal dang / /sngo bsangs ldan pa'i gnod sbyin mo/ /rdzu 'phrul che 'di gnod sbyin mo/ /pad+ma mtho ma'i sngags ni/ oM pad+ma uts+tshe
376a7(rgyud): swAhA/ 'di'i cho ga ni gang gA'i ngogs sam/ rgya mtsho'i ngogs sam/ skyed mos tshal gyi me tog gi ldum ra'i nang du lo ma'i spyil po byas te/ rab tu gtsang zhing bdag
376b1(rgyud): nyid kyang gtsang bar byas la/ rdo'am/ sa'i sgo glegs byas la/ de nyid du mtshan mo sgo bcad nas 'dod pa'i yo byad kyi longs spyod rnams bsogs te/ de nyid du bdag nyid dang nye
376b2(rgyud): bar gnod sbyin mo'i mal yang bsham par bya ste/ rig pa stong phrag bcu bzlas pa byas la/ de bzhin du zla ba gcig byas na nges par 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /'ongs nas kyang 'dod pa
376b3(rgyud): la longs spyod par byas na/ mu tig gi phreng ba bzang po mal du yongs su bor nas tho rangs 'gro bar 'gyur te/ ji srid zla ba drug gi bar du nyin re zhing rtag tu gnas par 'gyur
376b4(rgyud): ro| |gal te mu tig gi phreng ba de len na ni de tsam kho na yod par 'gyur la/ phreng ba rin po che chen pos nye bar mdzes par byas pa de ni ti na ra 'bum ri ba yin no/ /zla ba
376b5(rgyud): drug 'das nas ni rtag tu gnas par 'gyur ro/ /chung ma 'dod pa thams cad ster bar byed pa ji ltar rjes su mthun pa byas te nye bar gnas par byed do/ /sgrub pa po 'dod pa bzhin
376b6(rgyud): du ji ltar 'dod pa bdag nyid kyis mngon par sprul par byed do/ /gnod sbyin mo thams cad kyi cho ga yang 'di yin no/ /ji ltar bstan pa 'di dang / gzhan du yang sbyar bar bya'o/ /
376b7(rgyud): rgyal ba ma'i sngags ni/ oM dza ye su dza ye dza ya ma ti sarba kaR+yA Ni me ku ru swAhA/ /gser mdog lus ni sna tshogs lus/ /sngo zhing 'khyil ba'i skra dang ldan/ /lha mo yan lag
377a1(rgyud): kun mdzes ma/ /zhi ba'i 'od ldan skal ldan dge /snyan smra sgeg ldan gtso mo ste/ /mu tig 'od ldan mthong na mdzes/ /rab bsngags gzugs
377a2(rgyud): ldan smin ma mdzes/ /'jig rten kun gyis legs par mchod/ /cung zad dmar ba'i gos gyon pa/ /de ni rgyal mar mngon par ston/ /'di yis cho ga ni dang po 'bum phrag
377a3(rgyud): gcig bzlas pa byas na sngon du bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas dgon pa chen por rab tu zhugs nas 'bras bu'i zas za zhing / ji srid du rang nyid kyi gzugs kyis 'ong
377a4(rgyud): ba de'i bar du bzlas pa bya'o/ /'ongs nas kyang smra ba ni ci zhig bya zhes so/ /gal te mar gyur na ni mar bzhin du re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed cing rgyal thabs
377a5(rgyud): ster bar byed la/ /nor gyi bdag po chen po yang byed la tshe ring ba nyid du yang gnas par 'gyur ro/ /ci ste sring mor 'gyur na ni dpag tshad stong du gnas kyang ji ltar 'dod
377a6(rgyud): ba'i bud med 'gugs par byed do/ /nyin re zhing yang ti nar 'bum sbyin par byed de/ de yang zad par bya'o/ /ci ste chung mar gyur na ni rang gi gnas su khyer te/ lha'i
377a7(rgyud): gzhal med khang du 'dzegs nas de dang lhan cig dga' bar byed cing / dus ring por lo stong phrag sum cu'i bar du ji ltar 'dod pa rnam par spyod de/ gnod sbyin chen
377b1(rgyud): po dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro/ /rab tu dga' ma'i sngags ni/ oM hr-iSh+TI ma hA na g+ni hUM phaT/ 'di'i cho ga ni mtshan phyed kyi bar du bzlas pa grangs med pa byas te/ phyir yang gnyid log par ma byas na zla ba gcig
377b2(rgyud): gi nang du nges par 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /chung mar gyur na ni 'dod pa thams cad sbyin par byed de/ nyin re zhing ti na ra nyi shu rtsa lnga rab tu sbyin par byed de/ /rang gi mdzod nyid kyang
377b3(rgyud): ston par byed do/ /dus ring po yang 'tsho bar byed do/ /de bzhin du gnod sbyin mo brgya stong phrag du ma yang yod do/ /de bzhin du sha za mo dang / sha za mo rdzu 'phrul che ba dang / klu'i
377b4(rgyud): bu mo dang / lha ma yin gyi bu mo dang / lha'i bud med dang / lha ma yin gyi bud med dang / de bzhin du rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi bud med dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa thams
377b5(rgyud): cad kyi sngags grangs med pa dag kyang yod do/ /de bzhin du gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / drang srong rnams dang / dri za rnams dang / lha ma yin
377b6(rgyud): rnams dang / yi dwags rnams dang / srin po rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / khyab 'jug dang / ma mo rnams dang / dbang mo dang / rgan
377b7(rgyud): byed ma dang / phag mo la sogs pa'i sngags rnams kyang yod de/ so so so sor thams cad dam tshig gis 'dir bkug nas khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed kyis zos
378a1(rgyud): pa dang / dam tshig la bzhag cing 'jam pa'i dbyangs la nye bar gtad nas rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur te/ go rims bzhin du gnas shing bsnyen
378a2(rgyud): bkur yang byed do/ /thams cad kyi yang mdor bsdu na 'khrul 'khor gyi gzugs sam/ de nyid kyi gzugs brnyan byas nas/ khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed kyi rig pa
378a3(rgyud): ji srid gzugs brnyan rab tu 'gul ba'am/ rab tu g.yos pa'am/ rdul 'byung ba'i bar du bzlas pa byas na rang nyid kyi gzugs kyis 'ong bar 'gyur te/ gang smras pa de
378a4(rgyud): thams cad yang dag par sgrub par byed do/ /de bzhin du gang / gzhan yang / gzhon nu ma bzhi gnod sbyin ma chen mo'i ming po tum pu ru zhes bya ba yang dag par rten pa/ gru'i
378a5(rgyud): theg pa la yang dag par zhon pa/ 'jig rten thams cad kyis rab tu mchod pa/ sems can rnams rjes su 'dzin par byed pa de dag kyang cho ga 'di bzhin du bya'o/ /dper na
378a6(rgyud): ras sam/ rtsig pa'am/ spang leb la mtsho'i dkyil du bri bar bya ste/ gru'i theg pa la zhon pa/ phu bo ming po'i rjes su 'gro ba/ bu mo bzhi po nyid kyang rgya mtsho'i nang du zhugs
378a7(rgyud): shing mnyam par 'dug pa'o/ /de dag mi snang gnas gzhan nas/ /khro bo'i bzlas pa yang dag brtsam/ /de tshe g.yo 'gul rdul 'byung bar/ /de dag kun ni skye 'gyur ba/ /
378b1(rgyud): de tshe grub pa yin shes nas/ /sngags kyi bzlas pa yongs su btang / /mtshan mo'i tha mar rang tshul nyid/ /dge dang mi dge ston par 'gyur/ /skad cig gis ni zlos ba yi/ /don rnams

378b5(rgyud): de dag bsgo ba mnyam par bstan/ /gang yang 'phags pa'i sngags dag ni/ /thams cad kun 'gro'i khyad par can/ /mchog dang rab mchog drag po dang / /gang yang de bzhin
378b6(rgyud): rgyal bas gsungs/ /de bzhin pad+ma 'dzin sngags dang / /bdag nyid kyis kyang rab bshad dang / /gang yang gzhan gyis sngags mchog ni/ /rigs lnga dag gis gsungs pa
378b7(rgyud): dang / /rdzu 'phrul chen po 'jig rten pa'i/ /rgyal ba'i sras kyis gsungs ba dag /khro bo'i rgyal po rdzu 'phrul ches/ /thams cad de dag yang dag 'gugs/ /sngags dang rgyud

379b2(rgyud): bstan/ /sngags kun rab tu 'jug pa yang / /khro bo las ni yang dag 'byung / /sngags 'di khro bo chen po ni/ /gshin rje gshed ces bya ming gis/ /bdag nyid chen po gshin
379b3(rgyud): rje yang / /myur du bkug nas 'joms par byed/ /nyi ma'i bu ni gshin rje dang / /brgya byin bdag nyid chen po yang / /bkug nas dbang med mi bzad pa/ /gdul dka' 'dul phyed

379b5(rgyud): skad smras nas dpal ldan ni/ /lag na rdo rje rdzu 'phrul ches/ /shAkya seng+ge mi yi mchog /dpa' chen sangs rgyas la btud nas/ /sngags 'khor rten pa'i rdo rje can/ /rdzu 'phrul can
379b6(rgyud): gyis sngags rnams gsungs/ /'byung po kun tshogs dge ba ni/ /sems can kun gyis mnyan pa min/ /sngags rnams kun tshogs lta byed pa/ /sngags kyi mchog ni bdag gis
379b7(rgyud): bshad/ /blo dang ldan pa 'jam pa'i dbyangs/ /byang chub sems dpas bshad pa yin/ /mi bzad gdul dka' 'dul byed pa/ /ma rungs thams cad zlog par byed/ /'phags
380a1(rgyud): pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las/ gnod sbyin mo sgrub pa'i
380a2(rgyud): cho ga rab 'byams las le'u sum cu rtsa lnga pa rdzogs so/ / //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /sdug bsngal spang zhing bde bya ba/ /sdug bsngal spang zhes
380a3(rgyud): bstan pa ni/ /mdor bsdus na ni bzlog pa yin/ /de nyid theg pa rnam gsum du/ /nga yi 'di ni bstan pa yin/ /mi rtag sdug bsngal bdag med dang / /'dus byas thams

380a5(rgyud): yin| |byang chub sems dang sangs rgyas dang / /rang rgyal byang chub la brten dang / /'dod chags bral ba rdzu 'phrul che/ /de bzhin gzhan dag dgra bcom nyid/ /nyan
380a6(rgyud): thos byang chub la brten nas/ /rnam gsum zhi ba thob par byed/ /chos 'di dag ni mdor bsdu na/ /dge dang mi dge bstan pa yin/ /rtag tu mi dge spang bya ste/ /dus rnams
380a7(rgyud): kun tu dge ba spyad/ /'byung po kun la mi 'tshe bar/ /ngas ni chos kyang rab tu brtan/ /'gro ba lnga po'i lam nyid du/ /chos 'di nyid ni 'gyur ba yin/ /gang zhig zag
380b1(rgyud): med chos rnams ni/ /yang dag mtha' la yang dag brten/ /dang po'i sangs rgyas snga ma yis/ /'di nyid lam du gsungs pa yin/ /zhi ba mya ngan 'das 'gro bar/ /ngas kyang thams
380b2(rgyud): cad bstan pa yin/ /chos kyi mtha' la brten nas ni/ /yang dag mtha' la brten nas ni/ /yang dag mtha' ni thob pa yin/ /chos rnams kun gyi mtha' med pa/ /yang dag mtha'
380b3(rgyud): zhes brjod pa yin/ /chos 'di dag ni mdor bsdus nas/ /nyon cig lha ni thams cad dang / /byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che/ /dgra bcom nyan thos dag kyang nyon/ /nga
380b4(rgyud): ni sa steng mya ngan 'da'/ /kha ba can gyi nang dag tu/ /sA la'i nags ni yang dag 'byung / /gser dang ldan pa'i chu bo dang / /gyad rnams kyi ni nyen kor du/ /sA la zung gi nags
380b5(rgyud): nang du/ /nga ni mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur/ /grong khyer ming ni sdig pa can/ /cod pan bcings pa'i mchod rten dang / /chu bo'i 'gram ni rtag nyams dga'/ /der ni sa steng mya ngan
380b6(rgyud): 'da'/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / /rdzu 'phrul che ldan nyan thos dang / /lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / /'jig rten skyong ba rdzu 'phrul che/ /brgya byin tshangs bcas
380b7(rgyud): 'dab bzang dang / /gzhan yang 'og min la sogs lha/ /der ni thams cad 'dus par ni/ /rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin/ /der ni gyad kyi nye 'khor dang / /gang+ga'i byang phyog
381a1(rgyud): 'gram dag ni/ /chu bo chen po de las gzhan/ /kha ba can ri'i lho phyogs char/ /sA la'i nags zhes bya ba 'byung / /de tshe nub phyogs bltas
381a2(rgyud): ba'i mal/ /de yi gnas su 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de tshe chu bo rab dga' ba/ /bzang po gser ldan 'gram dag tu/ /lha rnams kun gyi tshogs la sogs/ /'dus pa dag ni
381a3(rgyud): 'byung bar 'gyur/ /mi dang rgyal po'i mchog rnams dang / /mi dang mi ma yin par 'byung / /de tshe mi dang 'byung po kun/ /de tshe byis pa 'phags pa dang / /dga' ston chen
381a4(rgyud): po dga' chen ltar/ /gnas de la ni yang dag 'dus/ /rang lus zang zing bcas par ni/ /bzang po chen po'i bkod pa'ang byas/ /chos kyi mtha' ni yongs spangs nas/ /
381a5(rgyud): yang dag mthar ni yang dag zhugs/ /de tshe sngon gyi skye ba ni/ /ser skya'i grong khyer gzhi dag tu/ /shAkya rigs kyi gtso bo ni/ /nga ni 'khor ba'i btson rar skyes/ /bdag gi sdug
381a6(rgyud): bsngal bdag nyid kyis/ /khyim las nges 'byung yongs su spangs/ /de tshe mu stegs mang po bsten/ /bdud rtsi dag kyang thob ma gyur/ /dka' ba dag kyang bdag gis
381a7(rgyud): spyad/ /lus kyi gdung pa'ang yun ring ba/ /lo drug tu ni bsten pa yis/ /lus kyang zhig cing rnam par skams/ /shes dang shes bya gsal ba ni/ /ngas ni cung zad
381b1(rgyud): thob pa med/ /de nas nga ni langs nas kyang / /'bras tshan dkar ba'i zas kyang zos/ /lha rnams kyis mchod lam dag ni/ /der ni sa steng nga yis bgrod/ /chu bo nai rany+dza na'i 'gram/ /
381b2(rgyud): shing gi rgyal po legs mdzes pa/ /me tog rnam pa du mas khyab/ /de 'gram sa ni nyams dga' ba/ /nags chen 'bras bu ldan pa dang / /rnam pa sna tshogs shing dag 'byung / /
381b3(rgyud): chu bo chen pos yongs bskor ba'i/ /shing gi rtsar ni nga yis phyin/ /sa yi cha ni mthong tsam gyis/ /bdag gis sems ni brtan pa thob/ /de lta'i shing ni bdag gis mthong / /
381b4(rgyud): yal ga lo ma nyer mdzes pa'i/ /shing chen grib ma chen po ni/ /rtsa ba mi mngon nyer spyad 'os/ /shing rtsa a shwad thar 'dug nas/ /sems ni shin tu dang bar gyur/ /bsam gtan
381b5(rgyud): dang ni ting 'dzin dang / /der ni brtan ba'ang mngon par thob/ /mtshan mo'i mthar ni skye mthar byed/ /der ni snang ba med ba'ang thob/ /bdud kyi bgegs ni rnam mang po/ /rnam pa du ma
381b6(rgyud): rab tu sbyar/ /sde rnams bcom nas slar ldog cing / /rang gi gnas su'ang de dag song / /sngags dang rgyud ni 'di don du/ /rnam pa mang po'ang gsungs pa yin/ /rnam pa du ma'i
381b7(rgyud): sbyor ba dang / /bsam gtan shes pa'ang bstan pa yin/ /der ni theg pa gsum yang spyad/ /gzhan dag sems can rten la 'dzud/ /nyes pa rnam pa gsum nyid kyi/ /gnyen
382a1(rgyud): po dag kyang rab tu bstan/ /de nas langs nas yang song nas/ /grong khyer lteng rgyas chu bzang gis/ /khrus byas der gnas drang srong rnams/ /slob mar
382a2(rgyud): bcas pa'ang rab tu byung / /sems can rnam mang don byas nas/ /de nas nga ni yang dag 'das/ /ka shi'i grong ni nyams dga' bar/ /mthar gyis su ni yang dag zhugs/ /rdzu
382a3(rgyud): 'phrul chen po sngar sangs rgyas/ /de yi gnas su'ang zhugs pa yin/ /ka shi skye bo'i yul dag tu/ /der ni rang bdag nyid gnas gyur/ /zhi ba mya ngan 'das byed pa'i/ /
382a4(rgyud): dam chos chos kyi 'khor lo bskor/ /'jig rten lha dang lha min bcas/ /'gro ba lnga la yang dag brten/ /'byung po kun la bde ba'i phyir/ /der ni chos kyang rab tu bstan/ /
382a5(rgyud): der ni snga ma'i sangs rgyas kyis/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bla na med/ /de ni nga yis rab tu bstan/ /srid las grol zhing bde don dang / /
382a6(rgyud): sems can nyes pa bzlog pa'i phyir/ /bde zhing zhi bar gzhol ba 'o/ /tshangs ba'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /srid pa'i lam ni gzhig don du/ /bde ba'i ting
382a7(rgyud): 'dzin las byung ba'i/ /'phags lam yan lag brgyad pa ni/ /tshangs ba'i gnas bzhis rnam par brgyan/ /rten cing 'brel bar 'byung dang bcas/ /rnam pa bcu
382b1(rgyud): gnyis byas pa yin/ /ma rig 'gag par yang dag ldan/ /rig pa bskyed pa'i rim las byung / /yang dag mtha' yi legs mthar skyes/ /de nyid mthar ni bstan pa yin/ /lugs
382b2(rgyud): su 'byung dang bzlog ba dag / tha mar bdag nyid rtogs chen skyes/ /sems can mang po thar don du/ /zhi ba'i 'khor lo yang dag ldan/ /nyams dga' ka shi'i grong spangs nas/ /
382b3(rgyud): de tshe bdag ni mnyan yod song / /de tshe mu stegs gdul bya'i phyir/ /cho 'phrul chen po'ang byas pa yin/ /mi yul dag tu rdzu 'phrul ni/ /de tshe yang dag bstan pa byas/ /mu
382b4(rgyud): stegs mang po'i gnas dag tu'ang / /de tshe'ang rab tu dga' bar byas/ /yul ming me thab ces bya bar/ /lha las babs ba bzang bo byas/ /sum cu rtsa gsum dag tu yang / /
382b5(rgyud): chos nyid la ni brgya byin sbyar/ /de nas 'og min lha sogs dang / /tshangs sogs brgya byin bcas pa dang / /rnam thos gnod sbyin dbang dang bcas/ /rgyal chen bzhi yi
382b6(rgyud): ris dag dang / /rtag tu myos dang gzhong thogs dang / /pi wang gsum pa phreng thogs dang / /lha dang gnod sbyin tshogs rnams kun/ /sa bla lha dang bar snang gnas/ /
382b7(rgyud): 'phags pa gnod sbyin tshogs bdag dang / /lha dang lha min thams cad dang / /chos kyi 'bras bu ldan bar byas/ /mya ngan 'das gsum rjes 'gro byas/ /sems can
383a1(rgyud): bsam gyis mi khyab pa'ang / /de tshe legs pa nyid la btsud/ /de dag rtsis kyis grangs med pa/ /'khor ba'i mtha' bzhin de mtha' med/ /stong
383a2(rgyud): chen po yi 'jig rten gyi/ /khams dang 'dra bar bsam mi khyab/ /rtag tu sems can mang po ni/ /bden pa'i don la yang dag sbyar/ /de tshe der ni nga 'ongs nas/ /gnas
383a3(rgyud): gtsang steng du gnas nas kyang / /theg pa gsum la rjes 'jug pa'i/ /dam chos sngags ni rab tu bskor/ /sems can gdul bya la brten nas/ /nga yis cho ga'i rgyal po
383a4(rgyud): 'di| |'jig rten mang la rab bstan nas/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs la'ang gtad pa yin/ /nga ni 'jig rten mya ngan 'das/ /sa steng stobs par gyur pa na/ /de nas 'jam
383a5(rgyud): dpal sems can la/ /sangs rgyas mdzad pa byed par 'gyur/ /thub dbang yongs su mya ngan 'das/ /dam pa'i chos ni bsrung ba'i phyir/ /de tshe rtag tu srung bar ni/ /
383a6(rgyud): 'jam pa'i dbyangs ni 'gyur ba yin/ /sngags ni rab tu dbye don du/ /cho ga rgya chen bstan pa yin/ /de tshe dus kyi tha ma la/ /ma rungs mi bzad chen po yi/ /mi bdag gdugs
383a7(rgyud): pa chen po ni/ /phan tshun gsod pa dag la dga'/ /sdig pa'i las can spyod pa ngan/ /de tshe longs spyod chung ba dang / /de tshe dus kyi tha ma la/ /'byung bar 'gyur bar the
383b1(rgyud): tshom med/ /sA la zhes bya'i nags su ni/ /de dag mchod don rtsom par byed/ /chu bo gser ldan 'gram dang ni/ /cod pan 'ching ba'i mchod rten du/ /zhi ba'i dbyings la brten
383b2(rgyud): ba'i phyir/ /nga ni mya ngan 'das mal 'cha'/ /lus ni sreg pa'i shing la bzhag /rdzogs longs spyod pa longs spyod spangs/ /de'i sngon mdzad pa nyid dang ni/ /nga yi rmad byung spyod
383b3(rgyud): mthong nas/ /nga yi gdul bya'i spyod yul dang / /sangs rgyas gdul bya'i mdzad pa dang / /spyod pa dge ba sna tshogs te/ /mi yi bdag por kun dran nas/ /thams cad mchod par
383b4(rgyud): byed par 'gyur/ /lha dang lha min mir bcas pa/ /de nas sa bdag kun 'dus nas/ /de tshe nga yi drung du ni/ /dga' ston chen po mchod pa kun/ /byed par 'gyur bar the tshom med/ /
383b5(rgyud): sku ni shing la rab bteg nas/ /zang zing yon tan 'byung ba'i gnas/ /dge ba dang ni mi dge dang / /bsod nams bsod nams ma yin spangs/ /yang dag mtha' don stong nyid mtha'/ /phung po lnga ni 'byung ba che//
383b6(rgyud): sems can mang pos de rjes mthong / /bsod nams che ba'i don du sbyar/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po 'dod chags bral/ /nyan thos chen po bdag nyid che/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams
383b7(rgyud): cad kyang / /sa bcu la ni yang dag gnas/ /yang dag mtha' ni rtogs nas kyang / /chos kyi mtha' la yang dag gnas/ /sems can kun la snying brtse bar/ /kun gyis yongs
384a1(rgyud): su bskor nas gnas/ /lha yi tshogs ni thams cad dang / /'phags dang so so'i skye bo dang / /'di kun bsod nams chen po'i gnas/ /mchod rten la ni
384a2(rgyud): 'dus par 'gyur/ /mi rtag sdug bsngal don gnas nas/ /dang ba'i sems ni rab tu thob/ /mchod rten mtha' yi nyen kor du/ /'byung po'i tshogs kyang 'dug pa yin/ /mchod
384a3(rgyud): pa chen po byas nas ni/ /smre sngags 'don cing du bar byed/ /dbugs 'byin snying rjes brlan nas ni/ /mchi ma'i thigs pa'ang rab tu 'dzag /smre sngags 'di ltar kun 'don pa/ /mi
384a4(rgyud): rtag sdug bsngal stong pa yi/ /sangs rgyas chos ni sngar ston mdzad/ /de ltar sa steng 'di la ni/ /de 'dir thub mchog dam pa ni/ /drang srong mchog gyur bdun pa dang / /sems can
384a5(rgyud): kun mchog shAkya'i rgyal/ /de mthong ba yi tha ma yin/ /sdug bsngal mi rtag ston pa yi/ /bcom ldan de 'di gzims pa yi/ /mthong ba yi ni tha ma 'am/ /stong nyid don dam
384a6(rgyud): ston byed dang / /thog ma nas zhi don ston pa/ /lha yi tshogs dag ci yi phyir/ /kye ma mnga' bdag sad mi byed/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po lha yi bu/ /thams cad 'dir ni lhags
384a7(rgyud): par gyur/ /dpa' bo chen po chos don gnyer/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po nyan thos dang / /sems can kun ni sdug bsngal ba'i/ /mi dang lha dang lha ma yin/ /chos kyi 'khor lo
384b1(rgyud): rjes bskor ba'i/ /de yi dus ni 'di dag yin/ /bcom ldan khyod ni myur du bzhengs/ /sangs rgyas dus kyi rjes 'gro ba/ /rgya mtsho chen po'i dus bzhin du/ /thub pas de 'drar mi
384b2(rgyud): 'da' mdzod/ /yun ring dus nas brten mdzad pa'i/ /sems can mang po'i don mdzad stsol/ /zhi ba mya ngan 'das lam mam/ /bsam gtan rnam thar bstan du gsol/ /de
384b3(rgyud): ltar rnam pa du ma yi/ /smra ba mang po'i tshig brjod nas/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po'i lha yi tshogs/ /de nas thams cad cang mi smra/ /mtshungs med smre sngags byas nas ni/ /bdud dang
384b4(rgyud): bcas pas rab tu 'dug / yun ring du zhing smre byas nas/ /'gul nas 'chi bcas sgra 'dzer bcas/ /mya ngan yid mi bde dang bcas/ /tshangs tshogs lha dang lha min bcas/ /mi
384b5(rgyud): dang mi yi bdag po kun/ /sa steng de la gnas par 'gyur/ /gzhan yang shAkya'i rigs skyes pa/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po 'dod chags bral/ /bdag nyid chen po sangs rgyas ni/ /lha
384b6(rgyud): yi lha yi gnyen gyur pa/ /dge slong ma 'gags pa zhes bya/ /de gcung mi yi nang na dge /shin tu phra la mkhas shing gsal/ /chags bral lugs la mkhas pa dang / /dgra
384b7(rgyud): bcom gtso bo rgyal po ni/ /du ma'i 'khor gyis yongs su bskor/ /mya ngan gyis bskyed dbugs phyung nas/ /shin tu yun ring tshig kyang smras/ /snying rje yid mi bdes drangs
385a1(rgyud): pas| |rgyal po dang bcas gyad rnams la/ /grogs po re zhig shing la ni/ /me ni 'jug par ma byed cig /ji srid bcom ldan sras bo ni/ /mchog
385a2(rgyud): gyur chos nyid las byung ba/ /de ni nyan thos rdzu 'phrul che/ /'od srung chen po zhes bya ba/ /thub pa chen po blo yi mchog /bram ze'i rigs skyes zang zing med/ /ma ga d+ha yi mi
385a3(rgyud): nang skyes/ /ri bo der ni mnyam par bzhag /grong khyer rgyal po'i khab mchog tu/ /bi pa li yi khyim du gnas/ /der ni myur du 'dir 'ong bar/ /byed kyi gzhan du ma yin
385a4(rgyud): no| |lha ni gang zhig der dad pa/ /sku la me 'bar des bzlog pas/ /de bar sku la ma gtong ba/ /dal ba don med ma byed cig /ji srid rdzu 'phrul che ba'i mchog /
385a5(rgyud): nyan thos thub pa thugs dgyes des/ /'jig rten gsum mchod sangs rgyas dang / /ston pa 'jig rten gyis mchod la/ /zhabs la spyi bos phyag btsal nas/ /bla ma
385a6(rgyud): g.yas su bskor byas pa/ /de tshe sku 'di sbar don du/ /der ni kun gyis rab byos shig /gang tshe sngar ni sbar 'gyur na/ /kun tu 'bar ba'ang don med gyur/ /thams
385a7(rgyud): cad don med ma byed cig / 'dir ni ngal ba kho na 'byung / /blo dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas/ /kun la de skad smras nas ni/ /mi dang mi yi bdag po dang / /gyad
385b1(rgyud): rnams kun kyang 'dug bar 'byung / /mi yi rigs su nga skyes shing / /mi rnams kyis kyang rab tu skyes/ /longs spyod rnams mang gzhan dang ni/ /bzo dang sgyu rtsal dge ba'ang bskyed/ /
385b2(rgyud): sa steng shing gi rtsa dag tu/ /mi yi gzugs kyis byang chub thob/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi mdzad pa ni/ /mi rnams la ni chos kyang bstan/ /de nyid phyir na mi rnams kyis/ /sku sbyong don
385b3(rgyud): phyir me yang spar/ /nga ming 'byung po kun gyi ni/ /mchog nyid du ni gyur pa yin/ /mi yi 'jig rten zhi ba dang / /nga ni mya ngan 'das par brtags/ /gang dag sangs rgyas thams
385b4(rgyud): cad ni/ /'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar gyi/ /thams cad mi yi 'jig rten du/ /mi yi lus su yang dag 'byung / /skye dang byang chub de bzhin du/ /dam chos 'khor lo dge ba spyod//
385b5(rgyud): zhi ba yang dag kun gshegs par/ /de bzhin rang rgyal dgra bcom pa/ /mi yi lus la brten nas ni/ /bla med zhi bar gshegs pa yin/ /bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab
385b6(rgyud): bar| |de dag la ni ngas phan byas/ /nga ni phyi mar zhi ba dang / /bsil bar gyur cing 'gog par gyur/ /sa steng stong bar gyur pa na/ /de na sku gdung rab bzhag pa/ /mi rnams
385b7(rgyud): la ni phan don du/ /mchod pa rjes su gzung 'dod bas/ /'jig rten lta dang lha min bcas/ /mi dang gnod sbyi mkha' lding bdag /srin po yi dwags grul bum
386a1(rgyud): bdag / rdzu 'phrul chen po sha za rnams/ /'byung po dag ni thams cad dang / /gzar bcas ma mo rnams dang ni/ /de bzhin 'jig rten thams cad
386a2(rgyud): ni| |grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab khams/ /srog chags thams cad nyid dag ni/ /mchod pa'i don phyir sku gdung dag /sa steng stong par gyur pa na/ /de yi tshe na yang
386a3(rgyud): dag bzhag / kha cig sa steng mi dag dang / /lha yi rgyal po de bzhin gzhan/ /lha min dbang po rdzu 'phrul che/ /sa 'og gnas pa gzhan dag dang / /de bzhin klu rgyal
386a4(rgyud): lha min dag / sku gdung so so so sor ni/ /yon tan ldan pa rdzu 'phrul ches/ /phyogs gnas thams cad bdag gir byas/ /rang gi gnas su khyer nas ni/ /de tshe mchod
386a5(rgyud): pa byed 'gyur zhing / /rdzu 'phrul chen po sangs rgyas su/ /thams cad the tshom med par 'gyur/ /mchog dang tha ma bar gnas pa'i/ /sems ni dad pa rnam gsum gyis//
386a6(rgyud): 'jig rten rnam gsum 'gyur ba ni/ /sangs rgyas bse ru dgra bcom thob/ /theg pa rnam gsum 'jig rten gsum/ /rnam gsum yang dag bstan pa yin/ /theg chen
386a7(rgyud): la 'jug lam gyis ni/ /de la brten nas nges par 'byung / /rang rgyal byang chub la brten pa/ /de bzhin 'jig rten 'gyur ba yin/ /de las gzhan pa nyan thos kyang //
386b1(rgyud): rdzu 'phrul chen po 'dod chags bral/ /de bzhin 'jig rten 'gyur ba yin/ /rnam gsum rigs kyis rnam par brgyan/ /sa bdag longs spyod chen po dang / /bde chen don du 'khor
386b2(rgyud): los bsgyur/ /lha dang mi yi phun sum tshogs/ /yun ring de tshe rjes myong nas/ /mthar ni 'chi ba la brten nas/ /de dag zhi ba rnam gsum 'gro /dang por sngar ni sangs rgyas dang / /
386b3(rgyud): da ltar ma 'ongs pa dag kyang / /thams cad la ni 'di nyid de/ /'di ni yang dag ji bzhin bstan/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i sa de la/ /lha rnams thams cad 'dug nas ni/ /yid 'byung
386b4(rgyud): sems ni skyo nas kyang / /skad 'dzer bcas pas smra ba ni/ /de tshe thams cad 'di skad smra/ /kye ma'o kyi hud mi rtag pa/ /'jig rten sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul che/ /de 'dir yongs su
