386b5(rgyud): mya ngan 'das/ /lha yi rgyal po rdzu 'phrul che/ /de dag kun gyis de smras nas/ /snying ni mya ngan bcas gyur nas/ /de nas cang mi smra bar gnas/ /ma ga d+hA yi skye bo mchog /ku
386b6(rgyud): sha'i mchog gi grong gnas pa/ /de dang nye ba'i ri bo ni/ /phag rgod ces bya'i ming du grags/ /dge slong bsam gtan der byed pa/ /pi pa li yi phug zhugs pa/ /'di ni nyan
386b7(rgyud): thos nga yi bu/ /thugs skyes chos las byung ba gang / /de ni 'od srung chen po yin/ /de tshe phug mchog la 'dug nas/ /de nas bsod snyoms la spyad de/ /'dug nas rang nyid
387a1(rgyud): sems par byed/ /dus ring bdag gi sangs rgyas la/ /bdag gis kyang ni de phyag byas/ /rang byung gyur pa mi yi mchog /bdag gis da ltar de blta
387a2(rgyud): bya| |shAkya'i rigs skyes thub pa mchog / bcom ldan de ni ga la bzhugs/ /bram ze'i rgyal po 'od srung che/ /der ni yang dag dgongs par gyur/ /thub pa'i thub pa kho na ni/ /
387a3(rgyud): sems kyis de ltar bsams par gyur/ /lha yi mig gis 'jig rten la/ /'jig rten ma lus lta bar byed/ /'og min de bzhin 'jig rten mtha'/ /srid rtse'i 'jig rten
387a4(rgyud): khams kyi bar/ /'jig rten ma lus thams cad dang / /stong chen srid pa las byung ba/ /nyan thos spyod yul ji tsam par/ /lha yi mig gis blta byas nas/ /mya ngan 'das
387a5(rgyud): gzims zhi ba dang / /bsil bar gyur zhing nad med pa/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po lha tshogs kyis/ /kun nas yongs su bskor ba dang / /mi dang mi yi bdag po dang / /lha min
387a6(rgyud): gnod sbyin srin po dang / /'byung po'i tshogs ni thams cad dang / /byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che/ /grags chen nyan thos chen po yang / /shes rab gtsor ni gyur
387a7(rgyud): pa dang / /'dod chags bcas dang 'dod chags bral/ /lha dang bcas pa mi rnams kyis/ /dpa' bo shing la bteg pa ni/ /sangs rgyas nyi ma'i rigs las byung / /de
387b1(rgyud): bzhin lha yi lhar gyur gtso/ /thub pa dam pa'i mnga' bdag ni/ /sa bdag gling la gnas rnams kyis/ /kun nas yongs su bskor gyur nas/ /mi yi dbang mchog gyad dag gis/ /
387b2(rgyud): lag na rtswa sgron yang dag thogs/ /de dag me sbar mi nus par/ /lha rnams kyis ni bzlog 'gyur zhes/ /dge slong ma 'gags pa yang ni/ /brtul zhugs can gyis de skad smras/ /
387b3(rgyud): mchi mas brnangs shing smre sngags 'don/ /sa rnams sgra ni chen pos gang / /ha ha zhes bya'i sgra nyid dang / /rnga bo che yi sgra yang thos/ /lha dang drang srong tshogs kyis khyab/ /lha yi bu
387b4(rgyud): mo'i tshogs kyis bstod/ /grub pa rig 'dzin klu dang ni/ /mi 'am ci klu rgya che ba/ /snyan pa'i sgra ni sgrogs par byed/ /bya yi skad ni dge ba dang / /yid 'ong sna tshogs rol mo dang / /lha dang
387b5(rgyud): mi yis rjed pa dang / /lha yi bu mo'i tshogs kyis gang / /grub pa rig 'dzin dag dang ldan/ /de tshe sA la'i nags dag tu/ /rnal 'byor dag gis kun tu khyab/ /thub mchog gzims
387b6(rgyud): mal dam pa ni/ /kun nas yongs su bskor bar mthong / /rdzu 'phrul chen po mya ngan bral/ /de nas dbugs 'byin mya ngan bcas/ /de tshe bram ze 'od srung ni/ /mchi ma'i thigs
387b7(rgyud): pa'ang rab tu 'don/ /nga yi nyan thos mchog gyur pa/ /de tshe sa yi steng du 'gyel/ /tshig kyang myur du brjod pa ni/ /kye ma'o dga' ba rab tu byung / /gang du sangs rgyas zhes bya ba/ /
388a1(rgyud): zag med mya ngan 'das gyur tam/ /mi rtag sdug bsngal stong pa zhes/ /de nyid kyis ni 'dir gsungs pa/ /skye ba gzhan gyi rjes 'gro ba/ /bdag
388a2(rgyud): gis ston pa'i sku mi mthong / /de nas langs nas myur du ni/ /ma ga d+hA yi rgyal por song / /sdug bsngal nyams thag ma skyes dgra/ /pha yi mya ngan gyis non pa'i/ /de tshe de yi
388a3(rgyud): phug 'ongs nas/ /mi yi bdag po de la smras/ /rkang gnyis dam pa rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /rgyal po chen po mya ngan 'das/ /bzhon pa myur du sbyor mdzod dang / /nga ni ston pa'i
388a4(rgyud): drung 'gro ba/ /sA lar gzims mal bzhugs pa ni/ /nad med sems dang rnam par bral/ /bstan pa thams cad las 'das shing / /sku yi dam pa longs spyod rdzogs//
388a5(rgyud): ma rungs de tshig thos nas ni/ /rgyal po de yang sdug bsngal zhing / /nyam thag smre bar gyur ba yi/ /de tshe tshig ni rgyal po 'don/ /ston pa dang ni pha dag dang / /gnyi ga
388a6(rgyud): las kyang bdag nyams gyur/ /gnyen rnams kun gyis spangs pa ste/ /de tshe skye bo yid ches med/ /dmyal ba mi bzad ltung 'gyur na/ /bdag ni su yi skyabs la
388a7(rgyud): brtan/ /nyan thos ston pa'i mchog gyur pa/ /dpa' bo chen po skyabs mdzod cig /nyan thos chen po gzi brjid che/ /bdag gi 'tsho ba 'di na med/ /ma ga d+hA yi mi
388b1(rgyud): yi bdag / de nas de skad smras pa dang / /nyan thos mchog gi rkang gnyis la/ /de yi mod la spyi bos gtugs/ /der ni sems med brgyal gyur ba/ /de yi tshe na gzhon nu ni/ /rdzu
388b2(rgyud): 'phrul chen po 'jam pa'i dbyangs/ /dbugs 'byin pa ni byed par 'gyur/ /sems can rjes su gzung 'dod pas/ /'jig rten kun tu rgyu bar gyis/ /gang tshe sA la'i nags su
388b3(rgyud): ni| |nga lus shing gi steng bzhag pa/ /byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs bskor nas/ /de tshe khyod ni 'dug par 'gyur/ /gang phyir nga lus mchod pa'i phyir/ /sa steng 'dir ni
388b4(rgyud): khyod kyis byas/ /'jig rten kun tu bltas nas ni/ /su zhig sdug bsngal gang las drang / /gzhon nu zab pa'i blo ldan pa/ /de ltar sa la 'gyel bar 'gyur/ /'jam dpal
388b5(rgyud): gyis ni de yi tshe/ /sa bdag de ni sdug bsngal ba/ /der gnas pa la khyod kyis ni/ /khyod nyid kyis ni de 'dul gyur/ /byang chub sems dpas rtogs 'gyur gyi/ /lha dang drang
388b6(rgyud): srong rnams dang ni/ /nyan thos rang rgyal gzhan dag dang / /rdzu 'phrul chen pos mi nus so/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis mi bdag ni/ /rmi lam gnas pa bzhin du mthong / /
388b7(rgyud): khyod kyi rdzu 'phrul byin rlabs kyis/ /rgyal po mya ngan gyis brgyal des/ /de tshe de ni rmi lam du/ /mngon sum byis pa lta bur mthong / /rdzu 'phrul chen po 'jam pa'i
389a1(rgyud): dbyangs/ /gzhon nu bdag nyid sna tshogs pa/ /de bzhin chos ni rnam par 'phrul/ /byang chub sems dpa' byis pa'i gzugs/ /sna tshogs
389a2(rgyud): rdzu 'phrul bsam mi khyab/ /'jam dpal gyis bstan sems dad byas/ /rgyal po mnar med 'gro ba las/ /myur du de las ldang bar 'gyur/ /rnam pa sna tshogs las dang
389a3(rgyud): ni/ /ngan song mtho ris bzang po dang / /'gro ba bdag nyid che yon tan/ /nyan thos thams cad rnam spangs pa/ /de nas rgya cher byas pa ni/ /mdo sde 'gyod pa sel ba ste/ /
389a4(rgyud): rgyal po ma skyes dgra yi ni/ /shin tu rgya cher bsal ba 'o/ /rgya che don gyis brgyan pa yi/ /mdor bsdus nas ni 'di gsungs so/ /dang po bar ma tha ma yi/ /sangs rgyas
389a5(rgyud): kun gyi gsung dag ni/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /cho ga rgya cher gsungs pa yin/ /de nas 'jam dpal dus kun tu/ /gzhon nu khyod ni de yi tshe/ /
389a6(rgyud): sdig pa'i las la rjes 'jug pa'i/ /sa bdag rnams ni 'dul bar 'gyur/ /khyod ni rdzu 'phrul bsam mi khyab/ /gdul bya dag kyang bsam mi khyab/ /'byung po'i
389a7(rgyud): tshogs rnams ma lus pa/ /khyed ni 'dul byed nyid du 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas dpa' bos de gsungs nas/ /'od chen ldan pas 'jam dbyangs la/ /gnas gtsang
389b1(rgyud): steng bzhugs de tshe gzigs/ /rkang gnyis dam pa rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /smra ba'i mchog gis de la gsungs/ /bskal ba mang po 'das pa na/ /khyod ni rdzogs sangs rgyas par 'gyur//
389b2(rgyud): grangs kyis mnyam med bsam mi khyab/ /mi yi grangs dang mnyam med par/ /'jam pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten 'byung bar 'gyur/ /rtag tu yang ni mthar
389b3(rgyud): gyis kyang / /sangs rgyas mdzad pa de tshe byed/ /sems can mang po rnam bkrol nas/ /mya ngan 'das pa nyid du 'gyur/ /gzhon nu'i gzugs can rdzu 'phrul che/ /gzhon nu la ni de
389b4(rgyud): gsungs nas/ /brtse bas brlan pa'i sems kyis ni/ /yun ring dbugs phyung rnam par skyo/ /yun ring rdzogs sangs rgyas bltas nas/ /mchi ma'i thigs pa'ang rnam 'dzag cing / /
389b5(rgyud): thal mo sbyar dang bcas nas ni/ /de nas kyang ni 'dug par 'gyur/ /de nas de ni sa gnas pa/ /mi yi dam pa ma skyes dgras/ /rmad byung 'od srung chen po ni/ /bram ze la ni mgos
389b6(rgyud): btud nas/ /dran pa rnyed cing sems sad nas/ /rkang gnyis skyil krung bcas nas 'dug /de ni yun ring dbugs phyung la/ /don ni rgya cher nges bstan byas/ /dbang phyug chen
389b7(rgyud): po ma skyes dgra/ /rgyal po'i bu ni 'dug bar 'gyur/ /de nas 'od srung ches smras pa/ /nga ni spur sbyong gnas su 'gro /mi rnams la ni phan phyir dang / /mchod rten gzugs
390a1(rgyud): gnas mchod don du'o/ /nyan thos mchog ni gnas de ru/ /rdzu 'phrul nyid kyis nye bar lhags/ /de dang 'brel bar sems skye ba/ /bdag gi rdzu
390a2(rgyud): 'phrul rigs pa min/ /mchod rten chen po mthong bar ni/ /rkang gnyis bdag ni 'gro bar 'tshal/ /de nas lam gyi bar 'dug nas/ /'khor ba'i stegs ni rab tu
390a3(rgyud): bstan/ /ji tsam der ni 'ongs gyur pa/ /dge 'dun kun dga' rar gnas pa'i/ /dge slong rgan zhugs gsar bu ni/ /sdig pa nyid kyis rnam rmongs pas/ /mthong
390a4(rgyud): nas rgan zhugs rnam 'khrugs te/ /gang phyir de dang nye bar 'ongs/ /grags pa che zhing skal ba che/ /sems can dag pa rims nad med/ /bram ze de yi drung lhags
390a5(rgyud): nas| |de tshe rkang gnyis phyag byas nas/ /de la smras pa skal ba che/ /legs 'ongs khyod ni ci phyir byon/ /myur du khyod ni gang du 'gro/ /yid byung ci phyir rab tu 'dug /de
390a6(rgyud): smras khro ldan byis pa la/ /tshe ldan khyod kyis ma thos sam/ /rkang gnyis dam pa rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /'jig rten kun gyi ston pa ni/ /sangs rgyas bdag gi pha zhes
390a7(rgyud): smras| |mar me 'bar bzhin mya ngan 'das/ /dpa' bo chen po nub par 'gyur/ /sa yi steng ni stongs par gyur/ /de bzhin 'jig rten ma lus stongs/ /bdag gi phyogs
390b1(rgyud): rnams kun stongs gyur/ /byis de phyin ci log sems kyis/ /der ni rgan zhugs rab dga' nas/ /rab dgod tshig tu smras pa ni/ /rab tu ring de 'das gyur tam/ /phyag ring
390b2(rgyud): lus che che ba dang / /mgo ni gdugs kyi rnam pa 'dra/ /bdag cag rnams kyi gtso bo mchog /bslab dang bslab min rjes su ston/ /da ltar de ni mya ngan 'das/ /ci 'dod bzhin du
390b3(rgyud): bdag cag spyod/ /rgan zhugs kyis ni de smras nas/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po rab tu 'khrugs/ /gdong la khro gnyer byas nas ni/ /yi ge hUM ni rab tu sbyar/ /sdom brtson bag
390b4(rgyud): chags bslang nas ni/ /bram ze de mod rab 'khrugs nas/ /rkang ba'i mthe bos de ma thag /sa yi steng du rab bsnun pas/ /sa rnams dang ni ri rab kyang / /rab tu 'gul bar gyur pa
390b5(rgyud): dang | |rgya mtsho rnams dang shing rnams dang / /ri rab rnams kyang 'khrugs par gyur/ /klu rgyal dang ni lha rnams dang / /ri sul phug kyang rnam par 'gyel/ /zla ba dang ni nyi ma
390b6(rgyud): dang / /sa steng de tshe snang ba nyams/ /rlung yang rgyu ba med par gnas/ /skar mda' dag kyang sa la lhung / /de nas de ni sngags zhes brjod/ /nyan thos rnams kyi rigs las
390b7(rgyud): byung / /yi ge hUM de yi ge gcig /las rnams ma lus byed cing dge /sngags kyi rgyal po bzlas tsam gyis/ /'di ni bzlas pa tsam gyis byed/ /'gro dang gnas pa'i dug
391a1(rgyud): dang ni/ /de bzhin dgra kun rengs par byed/ /sems can gdug pa thams cad la/ /bzlas pa tsam gyis rengs par byed/ /rnam pa sna tshogs las
391a2(rgyud): byed cing / /khyad par du yang gzhan nyid byed/ /rgan zhugs tshig kyal rab smras pa/ /der ni mi smra thur bltas 'dug /de yi rdzu 'phrul la dad nas/ /de yi mod la rnam par
391a3(rgyud): btul/ /de tshe nyan thos mchog gi ni/ /gdung sbyor shing gi drung du khyer/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po 'dod chags bral/ /dge slong de ni rkang gis song / /der song des ni thub
391a4(rgyud): pa'i sku/ /shing la yod par rab tu mthong / /lha yi tshogs ni du mas kyang / /mchod pa chen po byed pa dang / /gau ta ma ni thub pa yi/ /sku ni shing gi steng bzhag mthong //
391a5(rgyud): 'od srung chen po rmad byung ba/ /skal pa chen po de mthong nas/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po'i dge slong rnams/ /thams cad smre sngags 'don par byed/ /lha dang bcas pa'i tshogs kun
391a6(rgyud): ni| |ha ha'i rnam pa rab 'don cing / /de ltar mya ngan las skyes pa'i/ /nyam thag sgra ni shin tu che/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po lha dang klu/ /de nas kun gyi rab bsu nas/ /rkang
391a7(rgyud): gnyis mchog la phyag byos zhes/ /skal pa che la'ang rab tu smras/ /lha tshogs mi dang bcas pa dang / /'byung po kun gyi tshogs dag dang / /mi bdag drang srong gnod
391b1(rgyud): sbyin dag / khyod la sdod cing gzhol ba yin/ /shing la me gtong 'bad gyur kyang / /sku sbyong shing ni spar mi nus/ /de nas de ni skyon bral ba/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po skal ba ches/ /
391b2(rgyud): gdung sbyong shing gi smad cha la/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po des phyag byas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rjes dran nas/ /bskor ba dag kyang mang du byas/ /de tshe lcags kyi sgrom phral nas//
391b3(rgyud): zhabs gnyis dag kyang rnam brkyang la/ /yang dang yang du zhabs byugs nas/ /zhabs gnyis spyi bos phyag byas nas/ /thub pa mchog gi zhabs gnyis la/ /lan mang dag
391b4(rgyud): tu rnam par bltas/ /der ni zhabs gnyis yang zhugs te/ /lcags kyi sgrom la yang dag gnas/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po 'dod chags bral/ /de ni de nas langs 'dug pa/ /rdzu 'phrul
391b5(rgyud): chen po 'dod chags bral/ /dgra bcom rnams kyis yongs su bskor/ /ma ga d+ha gtso rgyal po yang / /sku sbyong shing gi thad 'ongs pa/ /glang po shing rta bzhon rta dang / /mthar gyis de
391b6(rgyud): nas theg pa yis/ /de nas dpung chen sa yi bdag /kun kyang stobs dang bzhon par bcas/ /de tshe thub pa shAka thub la/ /der ni phyag 'tshal don du lhags/ /sa steng zhi ba'i
391b7(rgyud): gzims mal du/ /bas mtha' dgon par mya ngan 'das/ /chu bo gser ldan 'gram dang ni/ /cod pan bcings pa'i mchod rten du/ /zhi ba'i dbyings la yang dag zhugs/ /
392a1(rgyud): yang dag mtha' la yongs su brten/ /ma ga d+hA yi rgyal po der/ /dpung chen ldan pas yang dag lhags/ /rnam pa sna tshogs spyod pa yis/ /de yang nga la
392a2(rgyud): stod par byed/ /phan yon che zhing stobs dang ldan/ /ngo mtshar sa yi rgyan gyur pa/ /thub pa'i sku sbyangs las byung ba'i/ /der ni sku gdung mchod rten byas/ /dge slong kun dga' bo
392a3(rgyud): zhes bya| |slob pa nga yi bsnyen bkur ba/ /mi yi dam pa mnyes gshin pa/ /nga la rtag tu yongs su dad/ /yid ni zhum zhing mya ngan gdungs/ /de yi tshe na 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de
392a4(rgyud): nas 'od srung thad song nas/ /rkang pa gnyis la rab btud nas/ /sdug bsngal nyam thag 'dar ba yis/ /'di skad sgra ni 'dzer bas smras/ /deng 'dir nga yi ston pa 'das/ /de
392a5(rgyud): lta bdag ni mgon med gyur/ /nga yi rten dang gnas dang skyabs/ /khyod nyid du ni rab tu bstan/ /thub pa'i zla ba de nyid kyis/ /nye gnas khyod kyir lung yang bstan/ /nyon mongs
392a6(rgyud): kun ni rnam spangs pa/ /khyod kyi nye gnas dgra bcom pa/ /thun gyi phyi ma mtshan mtha' la/ /rgyal ba des ni bstan pa yin/ /nga nyid mya ngan 'das pa na/ /rtag tu khyod ni
392a7(rgyud): yod par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas mdzad pa'i don du ni/ /phan par 'dod par khyod byed 'gyur/ /sdug bsngal can bdag spangs nas kyang / /thub pa chen po zhi bar gshegs
392b1(rgyud): blo ldan ma 'gags pa zhes pas/ /sdom chen de ni dbugs 'byin byed/ /khyod ni mya ngan du ma byed/ /mya ngan dag kyang ma byed cig /gnas ni gang du'ang 'gro mi byed/ /'di nyid du
392b2(rgyud): ni gnas par gyis/ /'jig rten mig ni 'das gyur nas/ /'di nyid ston par 'gyur ba yin/ /'dir ni ston pas lung bstan nas/ /sangs rgyas mdzad pa byed par 'gyur/ /nga yang bcom
392b3(rgyud): ldan lhan cig tu/ /'od srung rjes su 'gro bar bya/ /ston pa gnyis po dag gi yang / /sa yi steng na gzugs brnyan yin/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po'i nyan thos ni/ /'od srung chen po gtso
392b4(rgyud): bo ni| |'tsho zhing yongs su gzhes pas na/ /khyod ni mya ngan ma byed cig /rdzu 'phrul chen po snying rjes non/ /rnal 'byor chen po 'dod chags bral/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po thub
392b5(rgyud): pa'i sras/ /thams cad de bzhin smra bar byed/ /gyad dang rgyal po dag gis ni/ /spur sbyong shing la me btang bas/ /khor yug kun nas me 'bar nas/ /spur sbyong shing de thal bar
392b6(rgyud): gyur| |de mthong lha yi tshogs dag dang / /gdengs can brang 'gro rnams kyis ni/ /spur sbyor shing gnas zhi ba'i phyir/ /tsan+dan chu yi rgyun dag gis/ /char chen rab tu gtong zhing
392b7(rgyud): gnas/ /de nas de yi mod la yang / /sa steng du yang de bzhin du/ /me tog tshogs kyi char yang btang / /rgyal ba'i ring bsrel mchod pa'i phyir/ /de yi mod la kun der
393a1(rgyud): lhags/ /thams cad phan tshun 'thab pa'i phyir/ /de yi mod la bya ba rtsom/ /tshangs sogs brgya byin 'thab bral dang / /lha tshogs kun kyang de
393a2(rgyud): bzhin no/ /nyan thos chen po 'dod chags bral/ /rdzu 'phrul chen pos bzlog par byas/ /sku gdung rgyal ba'i ring bsrel ni/ /'od srung chen pos rnam bgos pa/ /mchod
393a3(rgyud): pa'i don du thams cad la/ /cung zad cung zad nges par byin/ /theg pa gsum las mi ldog dang / /zhi ba'i mthar phyin bya phyir ro/ /rnal 'byor de tshe 'od srung che/ /rdzu 'phrul
393a4(rgyud): chen po 'dod chags bral/ /rgan zhugs kyis ni smras pa'i tshig /de ni yongs su sems par byed/ /'dir ni gsungs rab ma lus pa/ /yan lag bcu gnyis bde
393a5(rgyud): 'byung gnas/ /mdo dang 'dul ba mngon pa'i chos/ /nam mkha'i dud bzhin ma gyur tam/ /dpa' bo chen po nub gyur nas/ /bstan pa 'jig par 'gyur bas ni/ /sangs
393a6(rgyud): rgyas gsungs pa'i bka' 'di ni/ /ma lus bdag gis bsdu bar bya/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po 'dod chags bral/ /ma lus lhan cig bgro bar bya/ /ma ga d+hA yi grong
393a7(rgyud): mchog tu/ /grong khyer bzang po rgyal po'i khab/ /ku sha'i grong khyer nyams dga' dang / /ri bo rdo 'jog mtho ba dang / /yul bzang yangs pa can dang ni/ /mchod
393b1(rgyud): rten gnas ni legs mdzes pa/ /de bzhin rnam pa du ma'i gnas/ /bstan pa bsdu ba'i ched dag tu/ /'dus nas smra ba kun smra ba/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po byed par 'gyur/ /nga yang 'dir
393b2(rgyud): ni nub pa dang / /de tshe dus kyi mtha' ma la/ /phan tshun gsod par dga' ba yi/ /sa bdag rnams ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /las kyi mtha' mang dge slong rnams/ /sems can
393b3(rgyud): rnams ni chags pas rmongs/ /de bzhin dge bsnyen dge bsnyen ma/ /dus kyi mtha' la ma zhir 'gyur/ /phan tshun skyon ni tshol byed cing / /phan tshun gsod la mngon par zhen//
393b4(rgyud): rma ldan skyon ni ma rungs ltar/ /skyon la rtag tu rtog par byed/ /thub pa de dus nub pa ni/ /dge slong rnams ni ma bsdams 'gyur/ /de tshes steng bstan pa ni/ /bsrung ba'i don du
393b5(rgyud): bzhag gyur pa/ /chags bral zag med 'jig rten du/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po rnam pa brgyad/ /de tshe dgra bcom thu bo yang / /sgra gcan 'dzin sogs rab tu bsgrags/ /de tshe dus kyi
393b6(rgyud): tha ma la/ /de dag kyang ni snang ba med/ /sngags pa grub pa'i dus su ni/ /de dag mthong ba don yod 'gyur/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing rdzu 'phrul che/ /sangs rgyas thams cad bzhag pa
393b7(rgyud): yin| |grags pa chen po chad pa'i las/ /de dag la ni ngas bstan pa/ /de dag bka' las 'das pa 'am/ /cud zad bslab las 'das na'o/ /ji srid dam chos yang dag
394a1(rgyud): mtha'/ /zang zing med par gnas par gyis/ /nga yi gsung gi bsod nams 'di/ /ji srid bstan pa stobs dang ldan/ /des na bdag nyid zhir 'gyur
394a2(rgyud): zhing | |zag med mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur/ /de tshe thub pa'i bstan pa ni/ /yongs su nub par 'gyur ba na/ /dge slong rnams dang dge tshul rnams/ /dge slong ma rnams ser
394a3(rgyud): snar bcas/ /rtag tu ngan spyod g.yo sgyu can/ /de tshe yongs su ma dag pa'o/ /nga yi bstan la mi gnas shing / /khyim dang chung ma tshol bar byed/ /de yi tshe na dge bsnyen rnams/ /
394a4(rgyud): gzhan gyi bud med la rtag dang / /lhag ma rnam pa bzhi po nyid/ /de tshe rtags dang ming tsam yod/ /'khon 'dzin thams cad goms byed cing / gcig la gcig ni rnam
394a5(rgyud): 'tshe byed/ /phal cher mu stegs kyis non cing / /lha rnams kun kyang gnod par 'gyur/ /de tshe bram ze'i rigs la ni/ /skye bo rnams ni dga' bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin log
394a6(rgyud): spyod rmongs pa dang / /mi rnams srog chags 'tshe bar dga'/ /nga ni yongs su mya ngan 'das/ /rtsod dus 'di la lung bstan yin/ /mi ni rnam mang gzhan dag kyang / /
394a7(rgyud): rtag tu gzhan gyi bud med dga'/ /mi dge kun la dga' ba dang / /dge ba'i don ni rnam spangs pa/ /nga ni sa steng zhir gshegs nas/ /sems can mang po 'byung bar
394b1(rgyud): 'gyur/ /nga yi sku ni mchod pa'i phyir/ /gzi brjid chen po lha tshogs dang / /bdag nyid chen po mi rnams dang / /de bzhin gnod sbyin 'byung po'i tshogs/ /lha min dang ni dri za
394b2(rgyud): dang | |rdzu 'phrul chen po mi 'am ci/ /de nas mkha' lding klu dang ni/ /de bzhin srin po drang srong rnams/ /rnal 'byor ba dang grub pa dang / /gzi brjid chen po gza' rnams dang //
394b3(rgyud): rnam pa sna tshogs skye gnas dang / /rnam pa sna tshogs sems can rnams/ /srid pa'i 'ching bas bcings pa dang / /blo ldan 'ching ba bcad pa dang / /sku gdung nad bral 'di
394b4(rgyud): la ni| |de tshe mchod pa byed par 'gyur/ /chu bo gser ldan 'gram dang ni/ /sA la'i zung gi tshal dang ni/ /cod pan bcings pa'i mchod rten dang / /gyad rnams kyi ni nye 'khor
394b5(rgyud): du| |nga ni der yang mya ngan 'da'/ /'jig med zhi bar yongs su 'gro/ /nga yi sku gdung de blangs nas/ /de bzhin gzhan gyis 'phrog par byed/ /lha dang lha ma yin rnams dang //
394b6(rgyud): de tshe 'byung po'i tshogs kun gyis/ /so sor cha ni rnam phye nas/ /rnam par gzhag pa byas par 'gyur/ /mi yi rgyal po dpung chen ldan/ /ma ga d+hA yi ma skyes dgra /rdzu 'phrul che
394b7(rgyud): ldan nyan thos ni/ /kun la'ang gsol bar rab 'debs pa/ /bsod nams bdag gis ma byas pas/ /bdag gi pha yang shi bar gyur/ /bdag ni sdug bsngal ltung
395a1(rgyud): gyur pas/ /bdag nyid chen pos drang du gsol/ /de nas blo ldan nyan thos mchog /sangs rgyas thugs las skyes pa'i sras/ /'od srung chen po zhes
395a2(rgyud): grags pa/ /skye dgu rnams la phan byed pas/ /ma skyes dgra ni ngo tsha ldan/ /sems zhum gyur te mthong nas ni/ /rdzu 'phrul nyid la rab gnas nas/ /de yi dus su yang dag
395a3(rgyud): dgongs/ /rgyal ba'i ring bsrel sku gdung ni/ /cha gcig khyod kyis blang bar gyis/ /rgyal po gzhan ni stobs ldan gyis/ /gzhan dag rab tu khyer bar gyur/ /phan
395a4(rgyud): tshun ba bcol 'khrugs nas ni/ /gcig la gcig ni 'khon byas nas/ /de tshe nam mkha' sku gdung khyer/ /rang gi gnas su'ang bzhag par 'gyur/ /de tshe thub pa'i
395a5(rgyud): nyan thos mchog / dge slong 'od srung chen po de/ /kye ma'o kyi hud sems pa ni/ /sa steng 'dir ni rab stongs pa/ /sangs rgyas dang ni rang rgyal dang / /rdzu 'phrul chen po'i
395a6(rgyud): nyan thos kyis/ /sems can 'jigs par snang ba ste/ /srid pa'i btson rar spyod pa yin/ /rnam pa sna tshogs sdug bsngal drag /yun ring rjes su myong bar 'gyur/ /
395a7(rgyud): 'jig rten mgon po skyob pa yi/ /ring srel yang dag mchod byas nas/ /de dag lha yi 'jig rten du/ /yun mi thung bar bde ba myong / /rgyal srid de nas longs
395b1(rgyud): spyod dang / /rnyed par dka' ba'i sngags rnams ni/ /'gro ba sna tshogs spyod pa yis/ /rnam pa sna tshogs thob par 'gyur/ /phun tshogs 'dod pa 'jig rten mchog /rnam thar
395b2(rgyud): gsum gyis rnam par brgyan/ /sku gdung rnams ni mchod byas na/ /grub pa mchog ni thob par 'gyur/ /'jig rten rnam grangs bram ze zhes/ /thub pa mchog ni nyan thos gtso//
395b3(rgyud): 'od srung zhes ni bya ba yis/ /'di ltar de ni bsams nas ni/ /de tshe sa las ma phye bar/ /de yi sku gdung blangs nas ni/ /ma ga d+hA bdag ma skyes dgras/ /'bad nas cung zad
395b4(rgyud): yongs su sbyin/ /de bzhin rgyal po kun la yang / /'od chen po ni ma mthong yang / /nyan thos bdag nyid chen po des/ /kun la'ang thams cad rab tu byin/ /kun la'ang mi
395b5(rgyud): rtag 'du shes kyis/ /de ni yang ni gnas par gyur/ /snying rjes brlan pa'i sems kyis ni/ /sems can rnams la mya ngan byed/ /shAkya'i skyes mchog bstan pa ni/ /'jig
395b6(rgyud): rten dam chos nub pa na/ /bskal pa rnam pa mang por ni/ /yun ring sems can dub par 'gyur/ /'di dag dud bzhin mi 'gyur bar/ /'di dag gsung ni bsdu bar bya/ /
395b7(rgyud): dpa' bo de las langs nas ni/ /sems kyi stobs ni nyams pa med/ /rgyal po ma skyes dgrar gyur pa'i/ /mi yi dbang pos mgron du bos/ /bston pa'i bstan pa bya ba'i phyir//
396a1(rgyud): rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer 'dir/ /'bad pas sku gdung myur du ni/ /gser gyi snod kyi nang du bcug /de dag sngon du yang dag btang / /de tshe rgyal po'i
396a2(rgyud): khab myur 'gro/ 'od ma'i tshal du phyin nas ni/ /sku gdung dag ni yang dag bzhag /'jig rten mgon po skyob pa yi/ /mchod rten rmad byung chen po byas/ /mchod rten de ni
396a3(rgyud): mchod byed pa/ /rnam pa sna tshogs rgyan dang ni/ /phreng ba gos dang gdugs dang ni/ /dar la rol mo byug pa dang / /dar la rol mo byug pa dang / /rnam pa sna tshogs du ma dang / mar me me tog phreng ba
396a4(rgyud): yis| |phyag 'tshal rjes song sems kyis ni/ /rgyal po rab tu mchod pa byed/ /mchod rten de la mgos btud nas/ /de yi tshe na smon lam btab/ /'jig rten mchog la
396a5(rgyud): mchod pa yis/ /bdag gi dge ba mang po gang / /de bzhin gshegs la mchod pa 'dis/ /bsam gyis mi khyab mchog thob shog /de nas rgyal po langs nas ni/ /'od srung
396a6(rgyud): che la rab tu smras/ /mig ni mchi mas kun khyab nas/ /mig gi mchi ma phyis nas ni/ /snying ni brtse bas rab brlan nas/ /de tshe pha ni yang dag dran/ /shes rab chen po 'phags
396a7(rgyud): pa khyod/ /khyod ni bdag gi dbang gyur mdzod/ /bdag gis sdig pa gang byas pa/ /nges par mnar med rab tu gzhol/ /ston pa bka' yi lam gnas pa/ /de 'dra'i
396b1(rgyud): chos kyi rgyal po yi/ /pha yi srog la gnod bcas pa'i/ /mya ngan bsal bar mi nus pas/ /'phags pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis/ /bdag la chos don bstan par rigs/ /
396b2(rgyud): de skad smras nas bdag nyid che/ /rgyal ba'i nyan thos mchog gyur pa/ /blo ldan 'od srung zhes bya bas/ /'di dag tshig ni rab tu smras/ /rgyal po chen po ma 'jigs shig /khyod kyis
396b3(rgyud): dge ba mang du byas/ /skye ba brgya phrag du mar yang / /khyod la goms pa rab tu yod/ /sangs rgyas 'byung ba med pa na/ /rang rgyal gcig ni yang dag byung / /grong khyer bA ra na sI ru/ /de
396b4(rgyud): tshe tshong dpon bu zhig byung / /mi shes byis pa g.yo ba yis/ /de tshe shing rta zhon nas byung / /bcom ldan de nyid de ru ni/ /rang rgyal yongs su byung ba ni/ /'jig rten rjes su gzung 'dod
396b5(rgyud): pas| |de ni slongs mo'i don du rgyu/ /byis pa des ni de mthong nas/ /sems ni yang dag dad gyur nas/ /rkang gnyis la gtugs dris pa ni/ /dge slong khyod ni ci zhig byed/ /bse ru
396b6(rgyud): lta bur skye ba med/ /bcom ldan de ni mi smrar 'dug /de tshe byis pa de yi ni/ /gos la bzung nas yang dag gnas/ /'deng ngo 'deng ngo khyim bzang 'dir/ /rgyal mtshan gyis ni
396b7(rgyud): rab mtshan pa/ /'di ni bdag gi khyim yin te/ /zhabs bkrus nas ni bshos gsol te/ /ji ltar dus bzhin myur gsol nas/ /ci 'dod par ni rtse bar bgyi'o/ /de nas nyes
397a1(rgyud): dang bral ba de/ /nyes gsum mthar byed 'joms pa po/ /gzhan dag rjes gzung de dag gtsor/ /mthar gyis kyang ni rab 'gro zhing / /song nas sgo yi
397a2(rgyud): rtsa ba la/ /'od chen der ni 'dug par gyur/ /de nas byis pa nang zhugs nas/ /ma la yang ni 'di skad smras/ /ma ni bdag la 'bras chan stsol/ /bza' ba rnam mang dag kyang
397a3(rgyud): stsol/ /yun ring sa rdul la rtse ba'i/ /bdag gi grogs po 'dir 'ongs gyur/ /yun ring bdag ni dgar 'gyur ba/ /sgor ni 'ongs nas 'dug pa yin/ /de tshe de ni rab rings
397a4(rgyud): par| |de yi mod la sgor yang byung / /rdzu 'phrul chen po zhi ba'i gzugs/ /bdag nyid chen po de yang mthong / /de tshe de ni myur 'ongs nas/ /snod ni bzang po blangs nas kyang / /
397a5(rgyud): lag pa legs par rab bkrus nas/ /me tog spos sogs sngon 'gro bas/ /'bras chan gtsang ma blangs nas ni/ /du ma'i ro yis rnam brgyan pa'i/ /rnam pa sna tshogs bza'
397a6(rgyud): ba dang / /dngul gyi snod du rab tu bcug /de tshe myur du phyir byung ste/ /de yi lhung bzed la blugs nas/ /khyor bcas chos la dad pa yis/ /de yi rkang pa gnyis la gtugs/ /de
397a7(rgyud): yis bsod snyoms blangs nas ni/ /nam mkha' la ni mngon par song / /de nas de ni rab 'bar zhing / /mar me'i phreng ba bzhin du snang / /bse ru ltar spyod gang yin pa/ /de
397b1(rgyud): dag ngag gis chos ston min/ /rdzu 'phrul 'od kyis sems can la/ /bdag nyid chen po ston par byed/ /de yang lhag par snying rje can/ /sems can 'gro ba ser snar ldan/ /pha
397b2(rgyud): rol don du sems can la/ /de ni rdzu 'phrul ston par byed/ /de yi rnam smin las kyis ni/ /ma dang lhan cig byas pa yang / /stong phrag lnga yi skye bar ni/ /lha nyid kyang ni byas par 'gyur/ /
397b3(rgyud): lha rnams kyi ni lha rgyal der/ /ma de nyid ni yang dag gyur/ /'khor los bsgyur nyid mi rnams kyi/ /mi yi bdag por de tshe gyur/ /yun ring bde ba rjes myong nas/ /gzugs can
397b4(rgyud): snying po'i bur 'di gyur/ /gang gis bcom ldan de smras dang / /gos kyi tha ma la bzung dang / /tshig ngan smra bas smras pa ni/ /dge slong smra bas smras pa dang / /sa rdul bdag dang
397b5(rgyud): rtse ba zhes/ /de tshe sngon ni khyod ces smras/ /tshig gi las ni de yis ni/ /ma 'dod pa yi tsha ba yi/ /drag cing rab tsha'i sdug bsngal ba/ /yun ring mang po rjes myong ba/ /mi 'dod
397b6(rgyud): sdug bsngal bzod dka' ba/ /mi zad dmyal bar lhung bar gyur/ /las kyi zhags pas rab bcings nas/ /sems can ngan 'gror 'gro bar gyur/ /rgod pas las ni byed pa
397b7(rgyud): yis| |ngu bas rjes su myong bar gyur/ /de bzhin byis pa'i rang bzhin gyis/ /nyan thos rgyal ba skyob pa la/ /tshig ni ma rungs rgya che ba/ /de yi las ni 'di 'dra'o/ /dmyal
398a1(rgyud): ba las ni thar nas kyang / /mi nyid du ni 'dir yang 'ongs/ /rnam smin skyes pa mi yi bdag /dmyal ba yang ni dran par gyur/ /de yi khro ba bdo ba yis/ /
398a2(rgyud): khyod kyis pha yi srog kyang bcad/ /rang rgyal dag gi spyod pa yang / /sngon gyi bag chags kyis dran pas/ /sangs rgyas mngon sum mthong nas ni/ /skye dgu dag kyang de bzhin
398a3(rgyud): byas/ /de nyid rgyu ni dran byas pas/ /'dir ni rgyal thabs nyid kyang byas/ /de ltar 'od ma'i tshal du ni/ /phan tshun de dag sa steng smra/ /nga yi slob ma mchog 'di dang / /
398a4(rgyud): gnyis pa mi yi bdag po yis/ /mchod rten lan brgyar phyag btsal nas/ /de tshe rang gi khyim du song / /de nas slob ma'i mchog gyur pa/ /pi pal phug na gnas pa
398a5(rgyud): de| |rdzu 'phrul chen po 'dod chags bral/ /thub pa ma lus 'dus nas ni/ /gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis dang / /'dul ba ma lus sdung par byed/ /gang zhig chos
398a6(rgyud): ni ngas bstan dang / /de bzhin sngon gyi rgyal ba mchog /de ni slob ma'i mchog des kyang / /rnam pa gsum du yang dag bstan/ /'dul ba dang ni mngon pa dang / /mdo
398a7(rgyud): sde'i dbye bas gzhung du byas/ /sems can 'ching ba gsum las bgrol/ /nyes pa gsum yang skem par byed/ /dpa' bo sdug bsngal gsum las 'grol/ /rtag
398b1(rgyud): tu theg pa gsum la dgod/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis bstan pa'i don/ /blo yi mchog ni byed par 'gyur/ /rgyal chen ma skyes dgra zhes pa'i/ /ma ga d+hA pa mi yi bdag /ang+ga ma
398b2(rgyud): ga d+hA dang ni/ /bA ra Na sI de las gzhan/ /byang du yangs pa can dang ni/ /rgyal chen stobs po che bar ni/ /the tshom med par 'gyur ba yin/ /bstan pa'i don ni byed par 'gyur/ /
398b3(rgyud): gzhon nu khyod ni 'dul byed cing / /zhi ba dam pa ston par 'gyur/ /de yi bu yang rgyal po ni/ /yi ge u zhes bya bar bsgrags/ /de ni 'byung bar 'gyur ba ni/ /myur du bstan pa
398b4(rgyud): pa'i don la brtson/ /des ni ston pa'i gsung rab 'dir/ /rgya cher 'dri bar byed 'jug 'gyur/ /mchod pa chen po'ang byas nas ni/ /phyogs rnams kun tu rgyas par byed/ /phyir
398b5(rgyud): yang ngan song 'di mi 'gro/ /ltar skye bar ni de 'gyur ro/ /lo ni nyi shu sum cur ni/ /pha dang lhan cig 'grogs par 'gyur/ /grong khyer stobs ldan mtshan phyed du/ /rigs
398b6(rgyud): las skyes pa'i nad kyis ni/ /mngon par zil gyis non bar 'gyur/ /nyin zhag sum cu rtsa drug tu/ /nad chen dag gis nyam thag 'gyur/ /nad rnams kun gyis btab nas
398b7(rgyud): de| |rnam pa sna tshogs brgyal nas ni/ /rgyal po de myur shi 'phos nas/ /lha rnams su ni skye bar 'gyur/ /de ni mthar gyis 'bad nas ni/ /nges par byang chub thob par
399a1(rgyud): 'gyur/ /'di dag gzhan yang mang po ni/ /'das pa dang ni ma 'ongs par/ /rang rgyal skyob pa dag la ni/ /rnam pa sna tshogs byas pa yis/ /de bzhin
399a2(rgyud): lha dang mi rnams kyis/ /'dod dang khyad par phun tshogs 'thob/ /de dag mthar gyis 'gro 'gyur ba/ /zhi ba nad med go 'phang 'thob/ /rgyal po mchog dang dman pa dang //
399a3(rgyud): mi yi bdag po bar ma rnams/ /rgyal po na hu sha la sogs/ /dang po'i dus su bstan pa dag /des kyang de bzhin gshegs mchog dang / /rjes yi rang bas mtho ris
399a4(rgyud): song / /nges par de dag sangs rgyas gyur/ /kha cig nyan thos theg pa la/ /nges par kha cig nyan thos nyid/ /de kun thar la mngon par gzhol/ /dus kyi rnam gzhag rjes
399a5(rgyud): mthun par/ /tshe yang rnam par brtag pa yin/ /dam pa tshe yang ring ba ste/ /de bzhin bar ma bar ma yin/ /shin tu dka' ba'i dus mtha' la/ /dus kyi tha ma rtsod dus
399a6(rgyud): la| |rgyal po rtsod pa la dga' bas/ /gzhan ni tha mar bstan pa yin/ /phan tshun 'khon du 'dzin chags pas/ /gcig la gcig ni rnam 'tshe byed/ /dman pa'i skye ba
399a7(rgyud): thob pa dang / /mtshon gyi reg pas 'chi bar 'gyur/ /mtshon gyis 'tsho bas yang dag dga'/ /de bzhin gzhan gyi bud med chags/ /rgyal po 'jig rten smod par
399b1(rgyud): ni| |the tshom med par 'gyur ba yin/ /g.yon can las ngan can dang ni/ /de bzhin 'phags min ser sna can/ /de yi tshen 'byung bar 'gyur/ /cha gnyis ldan dang rtsod
399b2(rgyud): dus bar/ /mdor bsdus nas ni bshad par bya/ /gzhon nu de ni rtogs par gyis/ /dus gang 'byung bar 'gyur ba na/ /sa steng rgyal po 'byung ba yi/ /de dag gzugs dang mtshan
399b3(rgyud): ma dang / /kha dog kyang ni rtogs par gyis/ /ko sa'i rgyal po gsal rgyal dang / /gzugs can snying po de bzhin gzhan/ /rgyal rigs gtso bo 'char ba dang / /dmag brgya
399b4(rgyud): pa ni yang dag 'byung / /lag bzang gzhu bzang zhes bya dang / /de bzhin dbang chen tsam sha /de bzhin lits+tsha bir skyes pa'i/ /shAkya'i rigs skyes seng+ge dang / /cher ldan
399b5(rgyud): gsal dang rab gsal dang / /sde chen du yang bstan pa'o/ /de bzhin 'phags rgyal gtum po dang / /ser skya'i grong gi rgyal po ni/ /zas gtsang zhes ni bya ba dang / /dpa'
399b6(rgyud): po zhes bya stobs chen dag / 'di dag rgyal po'i rigs su gsungs/ /sa srung ston pa mchod byed pa'o/ /shAkya seng+ge mi yi mchog /sangs rgyas mngon du lta bar 'gyur/ /
399b7(rgyud): de yang de nas chos thos nas/ /yun ring phun sum tshogs pa 'thob/ /nges par byang chub 'dod nas kyang / /shi nas zhi ba thob par 'gyur/ /sa bdag sa yi dkyil 'khor
400a1(rgyud): du| |'di dag 'jig rten rnam par grags/ /rigs ni rgyal rigs dag tu bstan/ /'du shes ming gis mtshon pa yin/ /sa steng nga yis bstan
400a2(rgyud): pa'i tshig / de dag mchod pa byed par 'gyur/ /gzhon nu byis pa'i gzugs can gyis/ /khyod kyis 'jig rten lung bstan pa/ /ma skyes zhes bya'i rgyal po de/ /nges par
400a3(rgyud): byang chub gzhol bar 'gyur/ /nga ni sa steng mya ngan 'das/ /lo brgya dag ni 'das pa na/ /snang ba med cing nyes par bcas/ /mi shes mun pas rab tu bsgribs/ /de tshe
400a4(rgyud): sa ni stongs pa zhes/ /rgyal ba rnams kyis spangs pa yin/ /de tshe mi bzad chen po yi/ /grong khyer me tog can du ni/ /mya ngan med cing bya ba yi/ /rgyal po sa ni skyong
400a5(rgyud): byed pa/ /khro bcas las ni drag po byed/ /de tshe de ni snying rje med/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po 'dod chags bral/ /nad med ser sna bral ba dang / /dge slong tshul khrims
400a6(rgyud): ldan pa yi/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen thang du lhags/ /sngon gyi bag chags rgyu dang ni/ /sa rdul byin pa'i byin rlabs kyis/ /rigs ni nges par 'gyur ba dang / /rgyal
400a7(rgyud): bo nor chen ldan par 'gyur/ /chos dang chos min rnam spyod cing / /brtse dang snying rje ldan pa dang / /chags bral rdzu 'phrul chen po des/ /rgyu ni phye zhing bstan par
400b1(rgyud): byas| |sngon ni khyod kyang rgyal po ste/ /mi shes byis pa g.yo ba yi/ /rgyal pa shAkya seng+ge la/ /sa yi rdul ni snyim gang phul/ /zhing de la ni rab phul bas/ /lha yul phun sum
400b2(rgyud): tshogs pa thob/ /lha yi 'jig rten shi 'phos nas/ /sa yi 'jig rten 'dir 'ongs gyur/ /'dzam gling nags tshal phun sum tshogs/ /rgyal po'i rgyal thabs spyod par byed//
400b3(rgyud): bdag nyid chen po dzam+b+ha la/ /gnod sbyin gyi ni sngags kyang bsgrubs/ /bdag nyid chen po sa yi bdag /de nas gnod sbyin shing rta grub/ /de la gnod sbyin 'dug pa ni/ /bka'
400b4(rgyud): dang mthun par yid kyang 'jug / klu rnams kyang ni 'dug pa ste/ /bran dang bka' bzhin byed pa'i rgyu/ /de ltar rdzu 'phrul che bdag nyid/ /de tshe stobs kyis 'khor sgyur 'byung / /
400b5(rgyud): ci 'dod de ni 'gro ba na/ /gang du'ang 'gog pa med par 'gyur/ /rgyal ba'i sku gdung mchog sa la/ /gang yang sngon ni rab bzhag pa/ /rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer gyi/ /de tshe
400b6(rgyud): 'ong ma'i tshal du'o/ /sku gdung mchog ni blangs nas kyang / /dge ba la dmigs yid can gyis/ /ji ltar sngon ni byas pa bzhin/ /mchod rten de la mchod pa byas/ /sku gdung
400b7(rgyud): bum pa de blangs nas/ /de ni de bzhin rnam bgos nas/ /blo ldan des ni skad cig gis/ /de nas gnod sbyin la yang smras/ /dzam bu'i gling 'di ma lus pa'i/ /mchod rten rgya
401a1(rgyud): gyis brgyan pa dang / /sa rnams sku gdung snying por ni/ /khyod kyis kyang ni rab tu bya/ /'bad pa yis ni mtshan phyed du/ /gnod sbyin gyis ni bka' yang
401a2(rgyud): blangs/ /mi ma yin pa'i bya bas byas/ /sa steng rdo yi srog shing bsgreng / /ka ba stong phrag du ma ni/ /de tshe yongs su btsugs par gyur/ /mchod rten rnams la mchod don du/ /
401a3(rgyud): lus can rnams la mtshon par gyur/ /'jig rten mgon po skyob pa yis/ /mchod rten sna tshogs byas nas ni/ /skad cig gcig gis gnod sbyin rnams/ /rgyal po yi ni
401a4(rgyud): drung du lhags/ /de nas gnod sbyin rab btud nas/ /dben par tshig ni rab tu smras/ /ji skad bka' stsal ma lus byas/ /sa bdag ci ste gzigs mi mdzad/ /de nas myur
401a5(rgyud): dus bdag de/ /de tshe shing rta de la zhon/ /rnam pa sna tshogs mchod don du/ /rnam pa sna tshogs mdzes pa'i phyir/ /gser dang de bzhin dngul dag dang / /rnam pa sna
401a6(rgyud): chogs mchod rten brgyan/ /de nas gnod sbyin shing rta dang / /myur du rgyal po rab tu song / /gang ni rgyal ba'i mchod rten yod/ /skad cig gis ni de yul du'o/ /rnam
401a7(rgyud): pa sna tshogs mchod pa yis/ /rgyal po des ni de la mchod/ /de tshe rgyal ba'i mchod rten gyis/ /sa rnams ma lus mdzes par byas/ /bdag nyid chos rgyal mya ngan
401b1(rgyud): med| |smon lam dag ni 'debs par brtson/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di don gyis/ /bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas shog /de bzhin des kyang rigs nas ni/ /rgyal po chos ni ston par byed/ /
401b2(rgyud): de ni shi nas lha ru 'gro/ /nges par byang chub gzhol bar 'gyur/ /lo ni brgyad cu rtsa bdun du/ /sa steng mchod rten mchod par 'gyur/ /lo ni brgya dang lnga bcur 'tsho/ /gnod pa med
401b3(rgyud): pa'i rgyal thabs byed/ /de rang las las byung ba yi/ /lus la nad ni yongs su 'byung / /nad des gnod cing sdug bsngal nas/ /shi nas mtho ris 'gro bar 'gyur/ /lha yi
401b4(rgyud): phun sum tshogs pa che/ /thob nas rjes su myong bar byed/ /de ni yid gzhungs rim gyis su/ /rnyed par dka' ba'i byang chub thob/ /rdo rje pad+ma'i rigs dag ni/ /sngags kyang
401b5(rgyud): de tshe 'grub par 'gyur/ /dzam+b+ha la sogs gnod sbyin yang / /'di yi bstan pa'i rjes su 'jug /rdzu 'phrul chen po 'phrog ma sogs/ /gnod sbyin mo yang yang dag 'grub/ /
401b6(rgyud): 'khor los bsgyur bas bskyed pa yi/ /'khor los bsgyur ba'i sngags kyang 'grub/ /gang dag rgyal bas bstan pa'i sngags/ /rig pa'i rgyal po rdzu 'phrul che/ /gtsug tor
401b7(rgyud): la sogs thams cad dang / /gang gzhan rgyal bas gsung pa'ang yin/ /de yi dus ni rab bzang la/ /sgrub pa dam pa dag kyang bya/ /dam pas tha ma bsgrub mi bya/ /dam pa
402a1(rgyud): thob par bya phyir ro/ /di lI pa dang na hu sha /nga las nu dang dug chen mtsho/ /rgyal bas bshad pa'i 'khor los bsgyur/ /sngags ni de dag sgrub par
402a2(rgyud): byed| |bdag nyid chen po na hu sha / de tshe gzi brjid phung po 'grub/ /rgyal po chen po dug chen pa/ /gdugs dkar po yang 'grub pa yin/ /de bzhin rgyal po di lI pa/ /yi ge
402a3(rgyud): gcig pa'i sngags kyang 'grub/ /nga las nu ni 'jig rten dang / /de bzhin gtsug tor dam pa 'grub/ /rgyal mchog d+hu mar ni/ /de bzhin rgyal ba'i gtsug tor 'grub//
402a4(rgyud): de bzhin 'dam gyi rgyal po ni/ /rnam rgyal gtsug tor 'grub pa 'o/ /de bu skye dgu'i bdag po ste/ /de yang sa steng spyan sngags grub/ /skye dgu'i bdag po skye ba ste/ /de
402a5(rgyud): yang mdzod spu'i sngags kyang 'grub/ /lte ba'i bu ni khyu mchog ste/ /de ni las grub brtul zhugs brtan/ /kha ba can gyi ri dag tu/ /de yang nor sbyod gnod sbyin 'grub/ /
402a6(rgyud): khyu mchog bu ni rgyas pa ste/ /de yang de tshe sngags bzlas byed/ /de tshe sa steng der mthar gyis/ /dpa' bo chen po'ang rab tu 'grub/ /'di dag gzhan yang mang ba yis/ /
402a7(rgyud): rgyal po 'jig rten rnam grags pas/ /sngags rnams rab tu bsgrubs nas ni/ /rgyal srid byas nas lha yul 'gro/ /rig pa'i rgyal po rdzu 'phrul che/ /rgyal ba'i dbang
402b1(rgyud): pos gang gsungs pa/ /de kun dus ni bzang po ste/ /lo ni stong phrag brgyad cu ba/ /sngags dang rgyud kyi don mkhas pas/ /grub pa dag ni sgrub par 'gyur/ /'di dag gzhan
402b2(rgyud): yang rab mang ba'i/ /sa bdag 'jig rten rnams grags pa/ /de nas stong phrag brgyad cu'i sngags/ /de bzhin yang dag bsgrubs nas ni/ /rgyal srid byas nas mtho ris
402b3(rgyud): 'gro/ /nges par byang chub gzhol bar 'gyur/ /de tshe bar ma'i dus dag tu/ /lha mo rdzu 'phrul chen mo dang / /lha rnams kyi ni sngags dang ni/ /pad+ma'i rigs kyi sngags dang
402b4(rgyud): ni| |blon po mi yi gtso bo dang / /sa bdag sa kun bdag po 'o/ /bA ra Na sI'i grong khyer du/ /rgyal po tshangs pas byin pa yang / /'jig rten 'jig rten dbang phyug grags//
402b5(rgyud): phyag na pad+ma rab tu 'grub/ /bdag nyid chen po brtson 'grus che/ /lhag par snying rje chen po de/ /sems can rnams la sngags tshul gyis/ /chos rnams ston pa byin pa
402b6(rgyud): yin| |rgyal po yang ni tshangs byin gyis/ /mi yi bde ba rjes myong nas/ /de nas de ni sngags grub ste/ /lus dang bcas pas mtho ris song / /de yi bu yang blo ldan ni/ /bsod
402b7(rgyud): nams las ni brtul zhugs brtan/ /brtson 'grus chen po rta mgrin zhes/ /rnam par grags pa de yang 'grub/ /de yi sngags kyi mthu yis ni/ /de tshe brgya byin las rgyal
403a1(rgyud): 'gyur/ /de bu dkar po zhes bya ba'i/ /rgyal po thams cad gtong pa 'byung / /de yang nor ni sbyin pa'i sngags/ /dkar mo che zhes bya ba yi/ /sngags ni
403a2(rgyud): rab tu bsgrubs pas ni/ /lo ni sum brgya dag tu 'tsho/ /de yi sngags kyi mthu yis ni/ /bde ba can du yang dag 'gro/ /nges par byang chub 'dis nges 'thob/ /de bzhin
403a3(rgyud): gzhan yang ngas lung bstan/ /de tshe bar ma'i dus dag tu/ /bar ma'i sngags ni rab tu 'grub/ /dka' ba tha ma'i dus dag tu/ /nga ni sangs rgyas nyid thob nas/ /rdo rje pad+ma'i
403a4(rgyud): rigs dag gi / sngags kyang rab tu 'grub par gyur/ /gzhon nu khyod kyi sngags dag ni/ /gang zhig sa steng sngon bstan pa/ /sngags ni longs spyod rgyu nyid du/ /de yang
403a5(rgyud): rab tu grub par 'gro/ /'jig rten rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i/ /phal pa dag gi sngags dag ni/ /mi sdug gzugs can rnyog par ldan/ /bar snang dang ni nam mkhar sbyod//
403a6(rgyud): sa blar gnas pa'i gnod sbyin mo/ /de bzhin sna tshogs sha za mo/ /mi 'am ci dang mkha' lding dang / /yi dwags srin pos bshad pa rnams/ /sha za lto 'phye gnod sbyin
403a7(rgyud): dang / /rdzu 'phrul chen po klu rnams kyis/ /dus ngan de tshe tha ma la/ /sngags ni rab tu grub par 'gyur/ /gzhon nu'i gzugs kyi sngags dang ni/ /gzhon nu ma yi gzugs
403b1(rgyud): kun yang / /dus ni 'jigs rung de yi tshe/ /de yang grub pa rab tu 'gro/ /de bzhin sngags ni rnams gsum/ /sgrub ba'ang rnam pa gsum yin no/ /rnam gsum nyid kyis dus su
403b2(rgyud): ni| |rnam gsum sgrub par 'dod pa yin/ /rgya che'i gtam dang ldan pa dag /mdor bsdus nas ni bshad par bya/ /gtso bo mya ngan med ba yi/ /de 'og rgyal po byung ba ni/ /mya ngan
403b3(rgyud): bral zhes rnam par grags/ /'jig rten chos kyis spyod par ldan/ /lha mo gos dkar mo yi ni/ /de yi sngags 'di yongs su 'grub/ /mya ngan rnam bral gyis bsgrubs nas/ /lha
403b4(rgyud): yi gnas su rab tu song / /yun ring bde ba mtho ris su/ /rgyal po chen po rjes su myong / /phyir yang mi yul phyin nas ni/ /blo ldan chos kyi ngang tshul ldan/ /rgyal thabs rnam pa sna
403b5(rgyud): tshogs ldan/ /'od chen pos ni rjes su myong / /lo ni bdun cu rtsa drug tu/ /dpal ldan mchod rten mchod pa byed/ /de nas de ni nad btab nas/ /lus zhig nas ni lha ru 'gro/ /
403b6(rgyud): de yi 'og tu rgyal po ni/ /dpa' bo'i sde zhes rab tu brjod/ /chos la spyod cing rnam par grags/ /bstan pa 'di la mnyam par gzhag /lha mo mchod rten dpal chen ma/ /
403b7(rgyud): de yi sngags kyang rab tu bsgrubs/ /des kyang ston pa'i khang chen ni/ /de yi tshe na byas par 'gyur/ /sa rnams rgya mtsho'i mthar thug par/ /ma lus mchod rten rnams kyis
404a1(rgyud): brgyan/ /de la rnam smin las kyis ni/ /lus las skyes pa'i nad kyang 'byung / /zla phyed gcig tu sdug bsngal nas/ /de ni shi 'phos lus zhig 'gyur/ /lo
404a2(rgyud): ni bdun cu dag tu yang / /mi yi nang du rgyal thabs byas/ /shi 'phos de ni mtho ris 'gro/ /nges par byang chub gzhol bar 'gyur/ /de yi 'og tu rgyal po ni/ /dga' bo zhes bya
404a3(rgyud): 'byung par 'gyur/ /dpal ldan grong khyer me tog ces/ /sde chen stobs ni che bar gnas/ /sha za pi lu zhes bya ba'i/ /sngags kyang des ni bsgrubs pa yin/ /de yi sngags
404a4(rgyud): kyi mthu yis ni/ /longs spyod chen po yod par 'gyur/ /rgya yi gtso bo zhes bya ba/ /'jig rten 'dir ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de nor thob pas blon por 'gyur/ /'jig rten
404a5(rgyud): rgyal po nyid du'ang 'gyur/ /de yi dus su 'byung ba ni/ /bram ze tshad ma shes pa 'o/ /log pa'i nga rgyal dag la zhen/ /ma ga d+hA yi grong khyer gnas/ /log pa'i nga rgyal gyis
404a6(rgyud): dregs rnams/ /'byung ba nyid du the tshom med/ /de dag gis ni rgyal po bskor/ /de dag la ni des nor byin/ /nor ni mang po de dag gis/ /dge ba'i bshes la rab mchod
404a7(rgyud): nas/ /de yi nor ni zad par byed/ /ma 'dres de la goms pa dang / /sbyin la zhum med rgyu yis ni/ /blo ldan de yis lha khang ni/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi byed du bcug /grong khyer me
404b1(rgyud): tog ces bya bar/ /bdag nyid chen po blon po'i mchog /bram ze bzang po snying rjer ldan/ /de yi tshe na 'byung bar 'gyur/ /rgyal po dang ni rab mdza' ba'i/ /chos kyi bdag nyid 'byung
404b2(rgyud): bar 'gyur/ /gnod sbyin ma ni dpa' mo ldan/ /sa steng de yi sngags kyang 'grub/ /des kyang sa steng dag tu ni/ /mchod rten bzang po byed du bcug /gnod sbyin ma yi mthu yis ni/ /
404b3(rgyud): shes rab rab tu che bar 'gyur/ /de yi bag chags las kyis ni/ /sngon gyi bag chags yongs bskul nas/ /blo dang ldan pas mthar gyis ni/ /rnyed par dka' ba'i byang chub
404b4(rgyud): 'thob/ /mchog sred ces ni rnam grags pa'i/ /de tshe 'dod chags shas che 'byung / /bud med byas pa'i skyon gyis ni/ /bram ze'i khye'us 'chi ba 'thob/ /dpal ldan rgyal po dga'
404b5(rgyud): bo yang / /snga ma'i las kyi nyes pa yis/ /me tog ces bya'i grong khyer gyi/ /mi rnams chad pas gnod par byed/ /blon po'i tshogs kyang ma dad 'gyur/ /stobs chen bden par
404b6(rgyud): smra ba yang / /sngon gyi las kyi nyes pa yis/ /nang chen dag gis thebs 'gyur te/ /rims nad chen pos sdug bsngal gdungs/ /nam phyed tsam na shi bar 'gyur/ /rgyal po
404b7(rgyud): de yi tshe tshad ni/ /de bzhin lnga bcu rtsa drug go /de ni nyan thos byang chub tu/ /rgyal po nges par 'gyur ba yin/ /de yi grogs po gzhan gyur pa/ /bram ze'i khye'u pA Ni ni/ /
405a1(rgyud): nges par nyan thos byang chub tu/ /nga yis lung bstan byas pa yin/ /'jig rten dbang phyug bdag nyid che/ /de yang de yi sngags grub pa'o/ /bram ze
405a2(rgyud): shes rab 'dod pas kyang / /khro bo ha la ha la bsgrubs/ /rgyal po de las gzhan pa yang / /zla ba spas zhes bya bar 'byung / /gnod sbyin chu dbang grub pa ste/ /rgyal srid gnod
405a3(rgyud): pa med par byed/ /longs spyod che zhing bden par smra/ /chos kyi bdag nyid sa yi bdag /mi dge'i bshes gnyen rab brten nas/ /srog chags mang po gsod par byed/ /las
405a4(rgyud): kyi rnam smin de yis ni/ /'brum bu'i nad byung rab tu brgyal/ /de yi mtshan phyed sad nas ni/ /rgyal srid la ni bu bzhag pa/ /snying po thig le zhes bya ba/ /blon po la sdang byis pa
405a5(rgyud): de| |de nas zla ba spas pa de/ /shi 'phros sa steng dus las 'das/ /mi yi 'gro ba spangs pa yi/ /de tshe yi dwags 'jig rten song / /'gro ba las grol sngags goms pas//
405a6(rgyud): de nas lha yi gnas su song / /dge ba'i sems kyis dmigs nas ni/ /sngags kyi rgyus ni yang dag bskyed/ /rgyal po des ni mthar gyis kyang / /nyan thos kyi ni byang chub
405a7(rgyud): 'gro/ /snying po thig le rgyal po yis/ /byis pa mi gsal blo yis ni/ /bye ma las byas srid gzhan du/ /sngon ni mchod rten dag kyang byas/ /de yi rnam smin mthu yis ni//
405b1(rgyud): ma smad lha yi gnas su song / /skye ba stong phrag lnga brgyar ni/ /lha yi nang du bde ba myong / /mtho ris 'jig rten shi 'phos nas/ /mi yi nang du rab skyes pa/ /blo ldan zla ba sbas pa yi/ /
405b2(rgyud): rgyal po dga' ba'i rigs su skyes/ /byis pa nyid nas rgyal por 'gyur/ /yun mi thung ba bde ba myong / /'jigs med brtan dang yang dag rig /spyi brtson pa dang snyan par smra/ /de
405b3(rgyud): nyid rang dbang rgyal srid ni/ /lo ni bdun cur yongs su byas/ /skra can zhes bya'i sngags dag kyang / /rgyal po de la rab tu grub/ /khyod nyid kyi ni sngags nyid kyang / /de tshe grub par
405b4(rgyud): byed par 'gyur/ /khyod nyid kyis bshad sngags dag kyang / /de yi tshe na 'grub par 'gyur/ /byis pa'i tshul can sna tshogs gzugs/ /byis pa rnams la mthu dang ldan/ /sngags kyi
405b5(rgyud): gzugs kyis lus can la/ /the tshom med par 'byung bar 'gyur/ /sems can rnams la phan 'dod pas/ /gang zhig khyod kyis bstan pa'i sngags/ /de tshe de yi dus dag tu/ /
405b6(rgyud): brjod pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur/ /blo ldan snying po thig le yi/ /rgyal po de yi blon po ni/ /tsa nag kya zhes rnam grags pa/ /bram ze'i khye'us khro bo 'grub/ /gshin rje gshed
405b7(rgyud): ces bya ba ni/ /blo ngan des ni de yang 'grub/ /des ni khro bas zil non nas/ /srog chags dag gi 'tsho ba bcad/ /de tshe rgyal po gsum gyi bar/ /shin tu mi bzad sdig
406a1(rgyud): pa byas/ /der ni dus ring 'tsho ba yi/ /bram ze ngan pa 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de yi sngags kyi mthu yis ni/ /lus des lha min brten par byed/ /lha min lus
406a2(rgyud): la zhugs nas ni/ /de nas dus ring 'tsho bar byed/ /de nas lus de zhig nas kyang / /mnar med dmyal bar yang dag 'gro/ /de nas dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de/ /blo
406a3(rgyud): ngan des ni rjes su myong / /dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal sna tshogs pa/ /mi 'dod de tshe las las byung / /las gcig sdug bsngal de zad nas/ /khro bo'i sngags
406a4(rgyud): kyis rab bskul te/ /dmyal ba las ni de 'chi 'phos/ /dud 'gro dag tu nye bar skyes/ /klu yi skye gnas brten nas ni/ /'jigs pa'i gzugs can dag tu 'gyur//
406a5(rgyud): khro ldan chen po klu yi rgyal/ /gdengs can dug gis dregs byed dang / /mi bzad las ni rab byed pas/ /ma rungs las las de 'chi 'phros/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po
406a6(rgyud): yi dwags kyi/ /gshin rje'i rgyal por rab tu 'gyur/ /de ltar sdug bsngal stong phrag ni/ /yang dang yang du rjes su myong / /blo ngan de ni mthar gyis su/ /bram ze'i
406a7(rgyud): khye'ur sa steng 'ongs/ /mi yi skye bar 'ongs nas ni/ /'jigs pa yi ni gzugs can 'gyur/ /khro ba dang ni dbul ba nyid/ /grags pa chung ba nyid du 'gyur/ /gang
406b1(rgyud): yang 'jig rten rang sangs rgyas/ /'dod med bse ru lta bur spyod/ /dman pa la ni rjes brtse ba/ /sa yi steng na rnam par rgyu/ /sems can rnams la phan 'dod phyir/ /bsod
406b2(rgyud): snyoms spyod la rab tu zhugs/ /de tshe gzhan sems rig pa des/ /blo ngan de ni rab tu mthong / /snying rjes yin gyi gzhan min des/ /de yi thad du byon par 'gyur/ /
406b3(rgyud): de ni zan don gsol ched du/ /bse ru lta bu la ni khyer/ /des ni sngags la rab brnyas nas/ /de tshe rgyu ni yang dag bstan/ /de las gcig gi bdag nyid la/ /bsod
406b4(rgyud): snyoms de ni yang dag bstabs/ /kye 'di rab byung ma lus pa/ /ji ltar bde ba bzhin du gsol/ /de la snying brtse rang sangs rgyas/ /de tshe rdzu 'phrul bstan par 'gyur//
406b5(rgyud): de yi mthu yis yid bskyod nas/ /de nas ngo mtshar rab skyes te/ /sangs rgyas bse ru lta bu la/ /sbyi bos kun la rab tu btud/ /ji ltar 'dod par nyes bral rnams/ /
406b6(rgyud): dge ba'i rtsa ba de yi mthus/ /rang rgyal byang chub smon lam btab/ /bdag nyid chen po ci 'dra ba/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po zhi ba'i gzugs/ /sdug bsngal blo ngan mi 'gyur
406b7(rgyud): bar| |de 'dra bdag ni 'jig rten shog / las kyi lhag ma zad pa dang / /'chi 'phos de tshe mtho ris song / /chos kyi bdag nyid de mthar gyis/ /nyan thos de ni byang
407a1(rgyud): chub thob/ /de bas sngags kyis sgrub pa ni/ /mngon spyod dag ni yong mi bya/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yis/ /mngon spyod rab tu
407a2(rgyud): bkag pa yin/ /snying rje mchog ldan sangs rgyas dang / /byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul ches/ /sngags rnams mthu bstan don du ni/ /las rnams thams cad bstan
407a3(rgyud): pa yin/ /de bzhin nor bu lta bu'i sngags/ /gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs/ /khro dang chags pas zil mnan pa'i/ /byis pa rmongs pa'i sems
407a4(rgyud): dag gis/ /de dag sngags ni mngon spyod la/ /phan tshun rab tu sbyor bar byed/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' ni/ /blo dang ldan pas de bzhin bkag /rnam
407a5(rgyud): pa thams cad sngags rnams ni/ /sems can longs spyod 'phel ba dang / /de nas rgyal po dam pa dang / /srung ba tshe dang dbang phyir dang / /skye gnas sna tshogs
407a6(rgyud): la gnas pa'i/ /sems can rnams ni dgug don du/ /sngags kyang bsgrub par bya ba ste/ /'tsho ba dgag phyir ma yin no/ /dge slong mang du thos pa ni/ /de
407a7(rgyud): yi tshe na 'byung 'gyur ba/ /ma khol zhes kyang bya ba ste/ /nga nyid kyi ni bstod byed pa/ /ji bzhin yon tan bzang po ni/ /ji ltar bzhin du brjod par 'gyur/ /kun
407b1(rgyud): nas sems ni rab dang zhing / /sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstan la dad/ /sgrub dka'i sngags ni rab bsgrub cing / /'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis de bzhin no/ /yon tan
407b2(rgyud): ldan zhing tshul khrims ldan/ /mang du thos shing chos kyang smra/ /dud 'gror sngon ni gyur pa na/ /nga yi bstod pa yongs mra/ /nyams dag 'grong khyer rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshul
407b3(rgyud): 'od ma'i tshal gyi sa steng du/ /slob ma'i tshogs dang lhan cig tu/ /ji ltar bde bar bzhugs pa na/ /der ni bya rog gcig yod pas/ /nga la sems ni rab dad byas/ /
407b4(rgyud): sems ni nga la dad byas pas/ /lus zhig nas ni mtho ris song / /lha rnams las ni shi 'phos nas/ /mi rnams nang du nye bar skyes/ /mi yi nang du skyes nas kyang / /nga
407b5(rgyud): yi bstan la rab tu 'byung / /rab byung bdag nyid chen po de/ /ji bzhin de tshe 'byung bar 'gyur/ /ma khol zhes bya'i brtul zhugs can/ /de ni de tshe 'byung bar 'gyur//
407b6(rgyud): ji bzhin don ni bstod pas mchod/ /rnam pa sna tshogs dpe dag gis/ /'byung po kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /legs par spyod pa rab byed pa'o/ /sems can rjes
407b7(rgyud): su gzung ba'i phyir/ /bstod pa brjod pa de gtsor byed/ /dus mtha' 'jig rten smad pa la/ /de yi tshe na 'byung bar 'gyur/ /rnam par smin pa de yis ni/ /lus
408a1(rgyud): zhig nas ni bde 'gror 'gro/ /blo ldan de ni mthar gyis kyang / /rnam pa sna tshogs de myong nas/ /bsam gyis mi khyab mchog gsungs
408a2(rgyud): pa'i| |thams cad mkhyen pa'i byang chub 'thob/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nga 'das nas/ /lo ni bzhi brgya lon pa na/ /dge slong klu zhes de 'bod 'byung / /bstan
408a3(rgyud): pa la ni dad cing phan/ /rab tu dga' ba'i sa thob pa/ /lo ni drug brgya dag tu 'tsho/ /rig pa rma bya chen mo ni/ /bdag nyid chen po des kyang grub/ /bstan
408a4(rgyud): bcos sna tshogs don dang ni/ /dngos po med ba'i don de rig /gang tshe lus de bor ba na/ /bde ba can du'ang skye bar 'gyur/ /de ni mthar gyis sangs rgyas
408a5(rgyud): nyid| |nges pa kho nar yang dag 'thob/ /thogs med ces bya'i dge slong ni/ /bstan bcos de nyid don la mkhas/ /mdo sde nges don drang ba'i don/ /rnam
408a6(rgyud): pa mang po'ang rab tu 'byed/ /'jig rten rig pa ston bdag nyid/ /gzhung byed ngang tshul can du 'gyur/ /de yi rig pa grub pa 'di/ /sA la'i pho nya mo zhes
408a7(rgyud): brjod/ /de yi sngags kyi mthu yis ni/ /blo ni bzang po skye bar 'gyur/ /bstan pa yun ring gnas bya'i phyir/ /mdo yi de nyid don sdud byed/ /lo ni brgya
408b1(rgyud): dang lnga bcur 'tsho/ /de lus zhig nas lha yul 'gro/ /'khor ba rnams su 'khor ba na/ /yun ring bde ba rjes myong nas/ /bdag nyid chen po mthar gyis de/ /
408b2(rgyud): byang chub thob par 'gyur ba yin/ /de ltar rnam pa mang po yi/ /nga yi bstan la dge slong rnams/ /shes rab ldan nyid chos kyang sbyod/ /dus kyi mtha' la de tshe 'byung / /
408b3(rgyud): phyi ma de tshe dus dag tu/ /dge slong dgra bcom zhes bya ba/ /de ni sngags don bdag nyid ldan/ /rgyud shes de bzhin mang du thos/ /gnod sbyin sngags ni rab brjod pas//
408b4(rgyud): de la bum pa bzang po grub/ /sngon ni ngas ni gang bshad pa'i/ /theg pa chen po'i mdo sde yang / /de yi tshe na bum pa las/ /dka' thub chen po 'dren par byed/ /
408b5(rgyud): glegs bam de la nges bltas nas/ /de la sngags ni zlos pa na/ /gnod sbyin bsgrub pa'i bum pa la/ /der ni bsrung ba ma byas pa'i/ /bag med dran pa nyams pa
408b6(rgyud): yis| |gtsug spyod kyis ni bum pa 'phrogs/ /de nas de yi sngags grub pa'i/ /dge slong sngags ni zlos byed pas/ /bum pa dag ni bltas pa na/ /der ni mngon par
408b7(rgyud): mthong ma gyur/ /de nas khro bo mig dmar zhing / /rnam g.yo tshig tu smra ba ni/ /tshangs pa dka' ba'i mthar gyur par/ /brgya byin sogs bcas dbang phyugs che/ /sngags kyis ma bkug ma 'ongs
409a1(rgyud): na/ /sngags pa bdag min sngags rgyal min/ /gang zhig sangs rgyas sras sngags dang / /rgyal ba mchog gis sngags dag ni/ /tshar gcod
409a2(rgyud): don du gang gsungs pa'am/ /gdul dka' 'dul bar byed ba'ang / /gal te kun rnams ma bkug na/ /sa steng ma lus de dag med/ /de nas sngags pa chen po
409a3(rgyud): langs/ /brtul zhugs brtan cing las rnams grub/ /ji ltar sngags ni byas pa yi/ /sbyor ba mthong bas rgyud dag kyang / /rkun ma dgug pa de don gtsor/ /sbyor
409a4(rgyud): ba rab tu byas par 'gyur/ /skad cig dran pa tsam gyis ni/ /sdom brtson de ni las myur byed/ /yi ge hUM gi sngags gcig gis/ /tshangs sogs sa steng 'dren
409a5(rgyud): par byed/ /lha rnams ma lus rab bkug pa/ /tshangs sogs brgya byin dang yang bcas/ /ha ha zhes bya'i sgra 'don cing / /nyam thag 'jigs pa'i sgra yang
409a6(rgyud): sgrogs/ /ci bgyi zhes bya'i blo byed cing / /bdag cag 'dir ni nyes med smra/ /myur zhing rab tu rings par yang / /blo ldan dge slong 'jigs med pas/ /lha rnams
409a7(rgyud): la ni rab smras pa/ /'dir ni bum pa slar byin zhes/ /lha rnams phan tshun thams cad la/ /dge slong des ni rab tu smras/ /gang gis bum pa bzang po khyer//
409b1(rgyud): khyod kyis myur du rab tu smros/ /lha rnams kun gyis bltas pa na/ /kun tu yang ni ma mthong gyur/ /bum pa 'di ni su yis khyer/ /lha yi dbang po yang dag dgengs//
409b2(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' 'od chen po/ /dpal ldan lag na rdo rje can/ /de yi bu ni mi bzad yod/ /khro ba che zhing shin tu gdug /bgegs kyi gzugs kyis sngags pa
409b3(rgyud): la| |'gro ba kun la rnam par rgyu/ /bum pa de ni des khyer mthong / /lha yi bdag pos de yang smras/ /rdo rje rigs kyi bgegs yod pa/ /sa steng rtse zhing rol par
409b4(rgyud): byed/ /'dis ni bdag la ma mchod pas/ /des ni bum pa de 'dir khyer/ /lha yi bdag pos de smras nas/ /phyir yang lha yi gnas su song / /de tshe rang nyid
409b5(rgyud): sngags kyis ni/ /lha rnams ma lus slar gshegs gsol/ /skad cig yud tsam nyid kyis ni/ /shin tu legs par yang dag bkug /de tshe dbang med bum
409b6(rgyud): par bcas/ /bgegs de nyid dang bcas par 'ongs/ /de nas de ni bgegs de yis/ /yi dwags rnams la bum pa byin/ /de nas de yi bgegs des ni/ /tshig
409b7(rgyud): 'di dag ni rab tu smras/ /yi dwags 'jig rten bum pa khyer/ /nga ni de la dga' ba med/ /sngags ba des ni dka' ba dang / /dka' bas btud de bgegs la smras/ /song
410a1(rgyud): zhig song zhig bgegs chen po/ /phyin chad 'di ltar ma byed cig /de nas des ni yi dwags dag /de yi mod la bkug par 'gyur/ /ltogs
410a2(rgyud): shing ngal ba'i sems dang ni/ /dman zhing de dag khab tsam kha/ /shin tu mi bzad chen po de/ /nyam thag skad kyang rab tu 'don/ /snying rje'i tshig tu smra ba ni/ /bdag
410a3(rgyud): nyid chen po yongs su skyobs/ /khyod kyi bum pa 'dir 'ongs kyi/ /ji ltar 'dod bzhin bdag la byos/ /sngags pa snying rje cher ldan pas/ /yang dag 'dar ba
410a4(rgyud): rab tu skyes/ /snying rjes brlan pa'i sems kyis ni/ /tshig ni 'di dag rab tu smras/ /khyod kyi 'jig rten sdug bsngal ci/ /yun mi ring bar rab tu smon/ /dman pa'i
410a5(rgyud): yid kyis de smras pa/ /bkres pas yang dag gdungs par 'gyur/ /yi dwags 'jig rten skom pa yis/ /bdag nyid chen po yin yang rung / /dge slong snying
410a6(rgyud): rje chen pos ni/ /de dag la ni bum pa byin/ /de nas de dag yid dga' nas/ /myur bar rang gi gnas su song / /de dag bsams pa tsam gyis ni/ /bum pa
410a7(rgyud): las ni bza' btung byung / /dge slong dga' bo'i 'og tu ni/ /tsan+dan skyong ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de tshe dus kyis tha ma la/ /lo ni sum brgya dag tu 'tsho/ /bdag
410b1(rgyud): nyid chen pos byang chub ni/ /bgegs med myur du rnyed dka' thob/ /rgyal po btsun pa zhes bya ba/ /nga yi bstan pa nub byed pa/ /dus kyi tha ma de yi che/ /the tshom med
410b2(rgyud): par 'byung bar 'gyur/ /shar phyogs nas ni brtsams nas su/ /kha che'i yul gyi bar dag tu/ /rmongs pas lha khang mchod rten rnams/ /de tshe de bzhin 'jig par
410b3(rgyud): 'gyur/ /dge slong tshul khrims ldan pa rnams/ /blo ngan des ni gsod par byed/ /byang gi phyogs su brten nas ni/ /de ni 'chi bar 'gyur ba yin/ /mi ma yin pa nyid
410b4(rgyud): 'khrugs nas/ /yul 'khor phyugs dang gnyen rnams dang / /ri yi dum bus bcom par 'gyur/ /blo ngan de ni sa 'og 'gro /de ni 'og nas 'og tu 'gro /dmyal
410b5(rgyud): nas dmyal bar ba drag par/ /sdug bsngal sdug bsngal drag por ni/ /mi bzad par ni yang dag ltung / /mnar med zhes ni bya ba yi/ /sdig pa'i las kyis dmyal
410b6(rgyud): ba ni/ /de ni bskal ba cher 'tshed pa/ /bdag nyid ngan pa go mi shes/ /mi dge'i bshes gnyen la brten nas/ /sdig pa shin tu mi bad byas/ /de ni nga yi bstan
410b7(rgyud): pa la/ /rnam pa kun gyis 'bad nas ni/ /sems ni ma lus rab btang nas/ /phun sum tshogs dang de nas spyod/ /nges par sangs rgyas nyid lam ni/ /yan las
411a1(rgyud): brgyad kyi theg pas ni/ /de tshe de ni rab 'gro zhing / /mya ngan nad med dam ba thob/ /de yi 'og tu sa srung ba/ /sangs rgyas phyogs zhes rnam par grags//
411a2(rgyud): phyogs che gtong ba che ba dang / /sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstan la dad/ /de tshe dus kyi tha ma la/ /'byung bar 'gyur bar the tshom med/ /thams cad mngon dga' rgyal po
411a3(rgyud): ste| |ston pa'i bstan pa de gtsor byed/ /kun dga' ra ba mchod rten gnas/ /ston pa'i gzugs brnyan bla na med/ /mtshe 'u rdzing dang khron pa dang / /mtsho rnams
411a4(rgyud): dag ni du ma dag / rgyal po chen pos byas nas ni/ /tshe zad lha yi gnas su song / /des kyang sa steng grub pa ni/ /pad+ma 'chang ba brtson 'grus che/ /bdag nyid chen
411a5(rgyud): po sems dpa' la/ /sa yi bdag por don du gnyer/ /de yi sngags kyi mthu yis ni/ /lo ni sum brgya dag tu 'tsho/ /de yi las kyi lhag ma yis/ /myur du byang
411a6(rgyud): chub thob par 'gyur/ /de yi bu ni rgyal po yang / /sde chen stobs ni che ba yi/ /zab mo'i phyogs zhes rnam par grags/ /grong khyer sa ni lnga len byung / /rig pa'i bdag
411a7(rgyud): nyid rgyal po de'ang / /de yi tshen 'byung bar 'gyur/ /gtsug lag khang dang gnas khang dang / /mchod rten rdzing dang khron pa ni/ /'od chen sa yi bdag po de/ /du ma
411b1(rgyud): byed par the tshom med/ /blo dang ldan pa 'jam dbyangs kyi/ /sngags kyang des ni rab bsgrubs pa/ /de dag yi ge drug ces bya/ /don chen longs spyod 'phel byed pa'o/ /de yi
411b2(rgyud): sngags kyi mthu yis ni/ /de ni longs spyod che bar 'gyur/ /blo dang ldan pa mthar gyis ni/ /myur du byang chub gzhol bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan 'di la/ /rnam
411b3(rgyud): pa sna tshogs bya ba byed/ /byang gi phyogs la brten nas ni/ /de yi tshe na 'byung bar 'gyur/ /lha ldan yul zhes bya ba yi/ /gangs can ri yi nang gnas pa'i/ /rgyal po mi
411b4(rgyud): yi lha zhes pa/ /li tsA bI rnams rigs su byung / /de yang sngags kyi don bsgrubs te/ /longs spyod che dang ldan par 'gyur/ /rig pa longs spyod ldan zhes bya/ /mi yi bdag
411b5(rgyud): pos de yang grub/ /lo ni brgyad cur rgyal srid byas/ /des ni rkun ma rnam par spangs/ /rgyal po des ni srog spangs nas/ /der yang sngags ni myur 'grub ste/ /zhi dang rgyas pa
411b6(rgyud): bsil byed pa'o/ /'jig rten sgrol ma zhes grags dang / /lha mo gos dkar ma dang ni/ /dkar mo chen mo gzhan phan brtson/ /rtag tu yid ni mi skyo ba'o/ /de la sogs pa
411b7(rgyud): gsungs pa yi/ /de bzhin rgyal po mang po ni/ /rnam pa du ma mang po dag /kha dog sna tshogs sna tshogs gzugs/ /kha ba can gnas kla klo'i rgyal/ /de yang ston pa mchod
412a1(rgyud): byed pa'o/ /khyu mchog khyu mchog bzang po dang / /sa 'od de bzhin sa 'od bzang / /de bzhin pha rol gnon nyid dang / /rkang pa'i 'gros zhes bstan
412a2(rgyud): pa yin/ /sa srung dang ni be 'u dang / /'od ldan nyid ni phyi ma yin/ /tha mar char rgyal ngang tshul te/ /kla klo rnam pa sna tshogs yin/ /de 'og lugs ni rnam zhig cing / /phyi rol
412a3(rgyud): skye dgus nye bar spyod/ /de tshe bal yul bdag po ni/ /mtshon gyis 'thab pas rnam par 'jig /kla klo'i rkun po bsten pa yi/ /der ni rgyal po rnam par 'jig /sa
412a4(rgyud): bdag du ma gsungs pa rnams/ /sna tshogs lha dang bram ze dag /de yi tshe na 'byung bar 'gyur/ /rgya yul kun la brten pa yi/ /rgyal po dbyig gi snying zhes bya/ /sde chen
412a5(rgyud): stobs kyang che ba dang / /blon po rgya che nyid dang ni/ /skye bo rtsa lag rab tu mang / /kla klo btud dang rnam par rgyal/ /ston pa'i bstan pa de gtso byed/ /gzhon nu bdag nyid
412a6(rgyud): chen po nyid/ /de yi sngags ni rab bsgrubs pas/ /mthu ni chen po dang ldan pa'i/ /rig pa'i rgyal po yi ge brgyad/ /dpa' bo che zhes rnam par grags/ /phun sum
412a7(rgyud): tshogs pa'i gnas chen yin/ /de yi byis pa'i blo yis ni/ /rgyal srid phyir ni rab smon byas/ /gang gis dran pa tsam gyis ni/ /sangs rgyas nyid du nges 'gyur ba/ /
412b1(rgyud): mi bdag rgyal thabs nyid kyi phyir/ /de ni skal ba mi nyung 'gyur/ /mchog gi sbyin pa bla na med/ /bsams pa tsam gyis thob pa nyid/ /tshangs sogs lha rnams thams
412b2(rgyud): cad la/ /ma lus lung ni stsol byed na/ /lha ngan phal pa dag dang ni/ /mi yi 'jig rten smos ci dgos/ /lo ni brgya dang lnga bcur 'tsho/ /grags chen lha yi gnas su
412b3(rgyud): 'gro/ /chos kyi bdag nyid de mthar gyis/ /byang chub dam pa thob par 'gyur/ /gzhon nus yongs su bshad pa yi/ /rig pa 'di ni li yul du/ /de ni myur du 'grub 'gyur
412b4(rgyud): gyi| |rig pa gzhan ni nam yang min/ /byang chub sems dpa' dpa' bo che/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs ni 'od chen po/ /mngon sum de yi yul dag na/ /byis pa'i gzugs
412b5(rgyud): kyis bzhugs pa yin/ /grub pa'i zhing mchog dam pa la/ /mi ni yongs su sgrub par 'gyur/ /rgyal po tu ruSh+ka zhes bya/ /byang phyogs la ni yang dag brten/ /sde chen brtson
412b6(rgyud): 'grus che ba te/ /de yi gnas su 'byung bar 'gyur/ /shing shun gyon yul ma gtogs pa/ /kha che'i mthar thug ka shir bcas/ /de ni dpag tshad bdun brgya dang / /'bum
412b7(rgyud): phrag gnyis kyis bdag tu/ /de tshe dus kyi tha ma la/ /de tshe the tshom med par 'gyur/ /de yang sngags ni grub pas na/ /lo ni sum brgya dag tu 'tsho/ /blo ldan mi yi spyan
413a1(rgyud): gyur pas/ /skra can ma yi rig pa bsgrubs/ /bdag nyid dge bar bya ba'i phyir/ /lha khang dag ni mang po byas/ /stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa gcig gi
413a2(rgyud): mchod rten mchog ni de bzhin byas/ /theg pa chen po mchog chos dang / /de bzhin sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum/ /'jig rten shes rab pha rol phyin/ /de yi yul
413a3(rgyud): du rab gnas byas/ /rgyal po de ni lus zhig nas/ /mtho ris 'jig rten 'gro bar 'gyur/ /sa bdag de ni mthar gyis su/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub bla med 'thob/ /
413a4(rgyud): de 'og sa bdag rgyal po ni/ /chen po tu ruSh+ka zhes bya/ /blo ldan mang pos bkur zhes bya/ /rtag tu dge zhing mchod la dga' / /lha mo sgrol ma rdzu 'phrul che/ /de yi
413a5(rgyud): sngags kyang rab tu bsgrubs/ /des kyang sngags ni rab bsgrubs pa/ /sa steng rgyal po'i ched du'o/ /phyogs che dpung ni chen po dang / /rgyal po grags pa chen po
413a6(rgyud): ste| |gnyen dang rigs dang rgyal pos kyang / /de ni bkur ba nyid du 'gyur/ /rtsa brgyad stong gi gtsug lag khang / /de yi dus su yod par 'gyur/ /de yi sngags kyi mthu
413a7(rgyud): yis ni/ /lo ni nyis brgya dag tu 'tsho/ /gang tshe de lus zhig pa na/ /dga' ldan du ni skye bar 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che/ /lha yi bus kyang bkur bar
413b1(rgyud): 'gyur/ /chos kyi bdag nyid de mthar gyis/ /byang chub yan lag mngon rdzogs nas/ /'bad pas de ni mthar gyis kyang / /mnyam med byang chub 'thob par 'gyur/ /dus
413b2(rgyud): kun de yi yul du ni/ /gsung rab mang po gnas 'gyur ba/ /sngon gyi rgyal ba dag gis gsungs/ /da ltar ngas kyang gsungs pa yin/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po klu dang ni/ /'dod
413b3(rgyud): chags bral bas rnam par gnas/ /de bzhin 'jig rten skyong ba dang / /gnod sbyin bstan pa srung byed dang / /sa steng dam chos srung byed pa/ /de yi tshe na 'byung bar 'gyur//
413b4(rgyud): de ltar rnam pa mang po bstan/ /sa bdag 'jig rten rnam grags pa/ /bstan dang ston par 'gyur ba yin/ /nub phyogs sa yul ni mtha' yas pa/ /'phags rgyal zhes bya'i
413b5(rgyud): pha rol tu/ /la da'i yul gyi skye bo ni/ /ngang tshul zhes bya'i rgyal po yod/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstan la dad/ /grong khyer phyin nas yang dag zhugs/ /chos kyi rgyal por 'gyur
413b6(rgyud): ba ste/ /'jig rten sna tshogs gtsug lag khang / /de bzhin srog chags dge bar ni/ /sa bdag chos la mnyes gshin pas/ /rig pa'i bdag nyid byed par 'gyur/ /rgyal
413b7(rgyud): pa'i gzugs brnyan yid 'ong la/ /rnam pa sna tshogs mchod pa byed/ /'jig rten mgon po grags chen gyi/ /mchod rten mchog la'ang mchod pa byed/ /des na de ni
414a1(rgyud): sngags kyang grub/ /rgyal po las skyes kho na ni/ /de yul du yang yang dag grags/ /dge slong bsod snyoms byed pa ni/ /tshul khrims ldan
414a2(rgyud): zhing blo dang ldan/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstan la dad/ /bdag nyid chen po dus su rgyu/ /de ni bsod snyoms rab zhugs rgyu/ /rgyal po'i khab bzang rab mthong ba/ /rgya
414a3(rgyud): che skye bos gang ba la/ /bslang pa'i don du der yang zhugs/ /bkres pa dang yang yang dag ldan/ /ngal zhing ltogs pa'i yid gyur kyang / /de tshe bsod snyoms rnyed ma
414a4(rgyud): gyur/ /rgyal po'i skyes bus de myur bzung / /khyim de las ni phyung par 'gyur/ /de nas de ni yid byung nas/ /rgyal po'i mi la rab khros te/ /grong khyer de las nges
414a5(rgyud): byung nas/ /mod la de yi rang gnas phyin/ /ltogs shing skom pa nyid gyur pas/ /sdug bsngal yid mi bde bar 'gyur/ /de nas de ni zas chad nas/ /mtshan phyed
414a6(rgyud): du ni langs gyur nas/ /sdom brtson de ni sems chung bas/ /de tshe srog ni btang bar rtsom/ /de tshe smon lam byed pa ni/ /la da'i yul gyi bdag por shog /de nas
414a7(rgyud): dge slong dus las 'das/ /spu gri zhes bya'i rgyal rigs su/ /bdag nyid chen po de skyes gyur/ /ston pa'i bstan pa mchod par byed/ /lo ni sum cu dag tu
414b1(rgyud): yang / /rgyal srid gnod pa med par byas/ /brkam chags rang mi'i sbyor ba yis/ /ma zhu'i nad kyis btab par 'gyur/ /de tshe rgyal po lus zhig nas/ /dus byas
414b2(rgyud): lha yi gnas song ba/ /byams pa gang du bzhugs pa yi/ /dga' ldan lha yi gnas mchog tu/ /bdag nyid chen pos chos 'chad par/ /de nyid du ni skye bar 'gyur
414b3(rgyud): 'od chen byams pa chen po la/ /bsnyen bkur byed cing chos kyang nyan/ /bdag nyid chen po de mthar gyis/ /rnyed par dka' ba'i byang chub 'thob/ /tshul khrims
414b4(rgyud): zhes bya'i rgyal po'i 'og / g.yo ba zhes bya 'byung bar 'gyur/ /lo ni lnga bcu rtsa lnga dang / /de bzhin zla ba lnga ru 'tsho/ /de srid rgyal srid des byas nas/ /mtshon chas
414b5(rgyud): 'tsho bas rab bsad pa/ /bud med byas pa'i skyon nyid kyis/ /de ni mtshon chas bsad par gyur/ /de yi nu bo brtan zhes bya/ /brtan pa ches ni brtan par 'gyur/ /sngon
414b6(rgyud): ni bkren pa zham 'bring 'gyur/ /yul ni la da'i bdag por gyur/ /lhag ma rgyal po thams cad dang / /skye dgu kun kyang zham 'bring ba'o/ /tshul khrims zhes bya rab 'das
414b7(rgyud): nas/ /de ni de dag kun gyi sngar/ /sa bdag thams cad 'byung 'gyur ba/ /dpa' bo rgya mtsho'i pha rol 'gro/ /rgyal po dbang bo zla mdzes dang / /de bzhin du ni gzhu dang tog /
415a1(rgyud): me tog gzhu dang rgyal po'i bu/ /res ldan grong las byung ba yin/ /dang po'i dang po snga ma dag /ba la'i grong du 'byung ba yin/ /'od ces bya ba
415a2(rgyud): stod rnams dang / /de bzhin khyab 'jug ces bya ba/ /rgyal po mtha' yas gsungs pa ni/ /yang ba yi rigs su 'byung / /de dag phyi ma'i rgyal po ni/ /khyab 'jug
415a3(rgyud): ces ni bya ba byung / /grong dang skye bo gnyen dang bcas/ /drang srong dmod bas gnod gyur pas/ /blo ldan rgyal po med par 'gyur/ /grong khyer chu yis rab tu gang / /
415a4(rgyud): de tshe de yi res ldan grong / /rgya mtsho chen pos rab tu gang / /byang gi phyogs ni thams cad du/ /rtsom pa sna tshogs ri zhol brtan/ /sna tshogs rigs la gnas pa
415a5(rgyud): yi| |rgyal po rnams ni mtha' yas gsungs/ /nyi shu gcig dang sum cu yi/ /mi yi rgyal por shes par bya/ /bco brgyad sa yi bdag po zhes/ /par ma'i sa
415a6(rgyud): kun bdag po yin/ /mtha' yas klu yi sde la sogs/ /de las tham rnam par zhig /de nas khyab 'jug 'phrog byed dang / /mdung zhes bya ba 'phrog byed gzhan/ /dbang
415a7(rgyud): ldan dang ni phreng kun dang / /bza' dang brtul zhugs bzang po gzhan/ /dus kun chos lugs rnam par nyams/ /rgyal po de dag dus las 'das/ /des ni bram
415b1(rgyud): ze rigs byung pa/ /de tshe longs spyod tshe nor dang / /bar mthar yi ge dang po b+ha/ /de tshe blon po gnyi ga gtso/ /gnyi ga nor ldan dpal ldan grags/ /bstan pa la ni phan par
415b2(rgyud): dga'/ /gzhon nu khyod kyi sngags rgyal po/ /blon pos de tshe sngags kyang bzlas/ /de nas bzung nas sa yi bdag gnyi ga mi yi dbang phyug gyur/ /bdun dang brgyad
415b3(rgyud): dang de bzhin gsum/ /de tshe dpal mgrin gnas na 'dug /ston pa nyi ma zhes bya ba'i/ /gnas na dbang phyug rab tu gnas/ /thams cad gnas su sa yi bdag /
415b4(rgyud): 'byung bar 'gyur bar the tshom med/ /yi ge ha zhes rab gsungs pa/ /sa rnams kun la mi yi bdag /de yi yul du sngags 'di dag /de tshe grub par 'gro ba yin/ /
415b5(rgyud): zhi dang rgyas pa'i rig pa rnams/ /gang zhig chos rgyal gyis gsungs pa/ /longs spyod rnam pa sna tshogs tshogs/ /de bzhin rnam pa sna tshogs ldan/ /sna tshogs
415b6(rgyud): gzugs kyi gzungs dang ni/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po gnod sbyin mo/ /de tshe dus kyi tha ma la/ /der ni grub par 'gyur ba yin/ /lho yi phyogs la yang dag brten/ /rgya
415b7(rgyud): mtsho'i 'gram gyis dag la/ /rgyal po dkar dang zla mdzes dang / /sa la yi ni bzhon pa dang / /dbang chen dang ni bde byed dang / /sa bdag de bzhin yid du 'ong / /longs spyod
416a1(rgyud): skra bzang skra zhes su/ /lho yi phyogs su rnam par grags/ /bkra shis dang ni rnyed sla dang / /ba lang rnyed dang khyu nyid dang / /gru bzang de bzhin gru nyid
416a2(rgyud): dang / /dbang chen dang ni zla ba nyid/ /ba lang srung dbang zla ba'i sde/ /'dod lha de bzhin ma ga d+ha/ /grangs byed bde byed nyid dang ni/ /stag dang seng+ge gza' lhag dang / /sangs
416a3(rgyud): rgyas dag pa bum pa dag / bum pa ma lus nyid du brjod/ /mnyam dang legs par 'jam pa dang / /skra bzang skra ni ldan pa dang / /lho yi phyogs su sa yi bdag/ mtha'
416a4(rgyud): yas mang por bstan pa yin/ /'das dang ma 'ongs pa dag dang / /da ltar dag tu rtogs par gyis/ /rnam pa sna tshogs nang btab nas/ /'di dag rnam pa sna tshogs
416a5(rgyud): 'chi/ /mtshon gyis 'debs dang mu ge yis/ /'chi zhing kha cig phyogs gzhan 'gro/ /de ltar 'di dag rgyal po rnams/ /ka na tsi pu rar gnas par bstan/ /de bzhin
416a6(rgyud): stong phrag rnam grags pa/ /de tshe 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin/ /de dus de tshe phyogs dag tu/ /sngags rnams grub par 'dod na ni/ /khro bo rdo rje'i rigs bstan pa'i/ /
416a7(rgyud): sngags 'di dag ni bsgrub par bya/ /mngon par spyod pa'i las dag dang / /de bzhin dbang gi don yang 'grub/ /gzhon nu byis pa'i gzugs can ni/ /'jam pa'i
416b1(rgyud): dbyangs ni bdag nyid che/ /de tshe dus mthar phyin pa na/ /de tshe yul der 'grub par 'gyur/ /ri bo 'bigs byed la brten nas/ /rgya mtsho ba tsha can 'gram du/ /gdong drug
416b2(rgyud): ces ni yang dag bsgrags/ /sems can rnams la mchog sbyin byed/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs ni blo dang ldan/ /byang chub sems dpas bka' stsal pa/ /sems can
416b3(rgyud): rnams la phan 'dod phyir/ /lho yi phyogs su gnas par gyis/ /gdong drug gang gi sngags dag ni/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis rab bstan pa/ /de tshe de phyogs de dus
416b4(rgyud): su| |'grub par 'gyur bar the tshom med/ /de tshe dpal gyi ri bo'i phyogs/ /'bigs byed nang dang ri zhol dang / /gling nyid rnam pa thams cad dang / /ka ling ka zhes rab
416b5(rgyud): bsgrags dang / /yon tan gsum dang kla klo dang / /kho ra khor yug ko sa la/ /rgya mtsho'i nang dang 'gram dag tu/ /rgyal po dag ni mtha' yas yod/ /cha shas kA ma ru zhes pa//
416b6(rgyud): kha ba can gyi nang na gnas/ /o Da yul gyi mtshams kun na/ /rgyal po rnams ni mang po gsungs/ /sna tshogs kla klo'i rgyal po ni/ /ston pa mchod byed de gtso byed/ /
416b7(rgyud): dbang po zla ba dga' ba yi/ /rgyal po kla klo'i gnas na gnas/ /de las rgyal po gnyis dag ni/ /bstan pa la ni lo brgyad dang / /ston pa'i sku gzugs mchod byed pa'o//
417a1(rgyud): de las skyes pa thams cad ni/ /rgyal ba'i bstan la rab dad par/ /the tshom med par 'byung bar 'gyur/ /shar gyi phyogs la brten pa yi/ /
417a2(rgyud): rgyal po'i mchog ni mang po gsungs/ /gang zhig 'das dang ma 'ongs dang / /da ltar byung ba thams cad du'o/ /dang po'i rgyal po mchog bshad bya/ /gau DA'i rgyud du sa
417a3(rgyud): steng skyes/ /grong khyer 'phel byed nyams dga' bar/ /grags ldan de ni rab tu skyes/ /de ming 'jig rten zhes bya ba/ /rgyal po go DA 'phel byed 'byung / /nga ni 'jig
417a4(rgyud): rten skyes med 'dir/ /de ni chos la sems pa byung / /sa bdag mang po rnams mnan nas/ /zho shas 'tsho ba dag tu byas/ /bar ma'i dus su 'di dag mnyam/ /bar
417a5(rgyud): ma bar ma'i chos dang ldan/ /rtsod pa'i dus kyi tha ma la/ /mi yi dbang po de nyid nyon/ /rgyal po rgya mtsho zhes bya dang / /rnam par gnon pa nyid dang ni/ /rgyal mchog
417a6(rgyud): gtso bo dbang chen dang / /de 'og yi ge sa zhes bya/ /lha yi rgyal po zhes bya de/ /tha ma'i dus la 'byung bar 'gyur/ /rgyal po'i gtso bo sna tshogs zhes/ /blo ldan chos ni
417a7(rgyud): 'phel byed pa'o/ /de yi nu bo byis zhes bya/ /bstan par di la phan zhing dga'/ /shar phyogs rgya mtsho'i mthar thug par/ /mchod rten gyis brgyan mdzes pa ni/ /de
417b1(rgyud): tshes rnams ma lus par/ /byed par 'gyur bar the tshom med/ /lha khang kun dga' ra ba rdzing / /skyed mos tshal dang bkad sa ni/ /de tshe dpal ldan byed 'gyur zhing / /
417b2(rgyud): gzings dang zam pa byed pa po/ /de tshe ston pa'i gzugs brnyan mchod/ /de la zhugs pa'ang mchod par byed/ /rgyal srid sa yi bdag po byed/ /gnod pa med cing
417b3(rgyud): 'gran zla med/ /lo ni sum brgya dag tu'ang 'tsho/ /zhag ni sum cu rab byung nas/ /pha rol rgol bas pham byas te/ /de nas rgyal pos rang srog bcad/ /de 'og de ni
417b4(rgyud): lus zhig nas/ /dmyal ba dag tu rab skyes te/ /zhag gsum dang ni gcig dag tu/ /dmyal ba dag gi 'gro bar gnas/ /de nas dmyal ba'i lus bor nas/ /rtag tu
417b5(rgyud): rgyal po lha gnas 'gro/ /lha rnams legs spyad 'jig rten du/ /gtsang ma'i gnas zhes rab tu dran/ /der ni lha rgyal zhes byar 'gyur/ /dag pa'i bdag nyid byang chub
417b6(rgyud): gzhol/ /brgya phrag dang ni stong phrag tu/ /lha yi bde ba rjes su myong / /phyir yang mi lus thob nas ni/ /srid pa gzhan la sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /skye ba gzhan du sems can
417b7(rgyud): la| |de nyid kyis ni las kyang byas/ /grong khyer 'phags rgyal zhes bya ba/ /de tshe ma la bar skye 'o/ /der ni tshong dbon mchog gyur pa/ /ma la bar skyes nor chen ldan/ /
418a1(rgyud): 'jig rten skyong zhing gnas med pa/ /sangs rgyas 'byung ba med dus su/ /rang sangs rgyas ni 'jig rten du/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po rnam par rgyu/ /
418a2(rgyud): sems can rnams la phan don du/ /sa yi steng du rnam spyod de/ /grong khyer 'phags rgyal phyin nas ni/ /bsod snyoms spyod la rab tu zhugs/ /bdag nyid chen po
418a3(rgyud): tshogs spyod pas/ /de che lam chen grong bar du/ /de che tshong pa de nyid kyis/ /thub pa mngon du mthong bar gyur/ /'bras chan la ni mgron bos nas/ /de tshe rang
418a4(rgyud): gi khyim du khyer/ /de nas thub mchog myur khyer nas/ /stan dag la ni bzhugs su gsol/ /zas kyi dus ni nyer gnas pas/ /bcom ldan de ni dgongs su
418a5(rgyud): gsol/ /bdag nyid chen po de dag kyang / /de tshe cang mi smra bar gyur/ /de tshe tshong pa de la ni/ /lhung bzed dag ni zed par gyur/ /tshong pa zur gyis go ba dang / /de
418a6(rgyud): tshe blo dang ldan gyur pas/ /rnam pa sna tshogs bza' ba yis/ /lhung bzed rnams ni yongs su bkang / /de nas des ni rang lag gis/ /de dag la ni 'bad pas
418a7(rgyud): byin/ /thogs nas de dag thams cad ni/ /mar me'i phreng ba bzhin du mthong / /nam mkha' la ni lus brten nas/ /de dag de yi mod la song / /de nas ba spu langs
418b1(rgyud): nas ni/ /de tshe skyo ba mang por gyur/ /yid ni rdzu 'phrul la dad nas/ /sa de la ni rab tu 'gyel/ /smon lam de tshe byed pa yang / /ji ltar tshig tu smra ba ni/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di
418b2(rgyud): yis ni/ /de ring bdag gis gang thob pa/ /des ni thub pa rab mchog ni/ /'jig rten blo yi mchog 'gyur shog /de tshe sa steng 'khor los bsgyur/ /skye ba stong phrag bcu
