418b3(rgyud): ru 'gyur/ /de nas de yi lus spangs nas/ /bye ba drug cur lha gnas 'gro/ /der ni yul ring bde myong nas/ /lha gnas skye ba yongs bor te/ /de tshe mi yi skye ba ni//
418b4(rgyud): gzhan gyis dbang gis 'dir yang byin/ /de ni rgyal po'i rigs skyes pa/ /thams cad du ni 'dir yang 'gyur/ /rgyal po byis pa zhes bya de/ /shar gyi phyogs su
418b5(rgyud): 'byung bar 'gyur/ /skye ba stong phrag brgyad du ni/ /bde ba sgrib med thob 'gyur ba/ /dpal ldan rgyal pos thob pa'o/ /thams cad mkhyen nyid mthar thob 'gyur//
418b6(rgyud): de ltar rnam mang sems can dang / /de bzhin phun tshogs rgya che ba/ /de tshe mchod dang skul byed pa/ /ston pa la ni sun mi 'byin/ /rig pa dge ba byed pa yi/ /
418b7(rgyud): byang chub lam la nges par sbyor/ /de las gzhan ba'i rgyal po ni/ /go DA nus pa'i ngang tshul can/ /gzhon nu zhes bya'i rgyal por gsungs/ /de yang shin tu chos
419a1(rgyud): dang ldan/ /de nas gzhan pa dpal ldan bcas/ /yi ge u zhes rnam par grags/ /de las gzhan ni rnam 'byed cing / /de bzhin phan tshun
419a2(rgyud): 'jigs par byed/ /de dag go DA drag sems kyis/ /'di dag 'byed pa chen por byed/ /de nas lha zhes bya ba yi/ /rgyal po lam ni byed par shes/ /dgra rnams
419a3(rgyud): kun gyis yongs khyab nas/ /de ni dgra yis bsnun nas shi/ /de 'og zla ba zhes ni bya/ /des ni rgyal po nyid kyang byas/ /sngon gyi las kyis bskul nas ni/ /de nas
419a4(rgyud): mtshon gyis rmas nas shi/ /de yi bu ni bcu gnyis grangs/ /lo brgyad bcas pa dag tu 'tsho/ /de yang mtshon gyis rab btab nas/ /de tshe byis pa nyid du shi/ /de dag
419a5(rgyud): gcig la gcig sems shing / /drag po phan pa med la dga'/ /rgyal mchog yi ge ta zhes bya/ /de yi tshe na 'byung bar 'gyur/ /go DA'i 'jig rten rnams kyi
419a6(rgyud): gtso/ /chen po'i nad kyis yang dag btab/ /nad de nyid kyis nyams thag gnas/ /dus byas nas ni 'og tu song / /de 'og yi ge da zhes bya/ /nyin zhag cung zad rgyal
419a7(rgyud): po byed/ /go DA'i yul du byung gyur pa/ /gang+gA'i 'gram du yang dag gnas/ /de 'og yi ge b+ha zhes bya/ /zhag gsum du ni rgyal po byas/ /de nas sa srung rgyal po ni/ /
419b1(rgyud): thams cad du ni de tshe 'byung / /rgyal po de ni snyan par smra/ /byas pa gzo zhing stobs kyang che/ /bud med dbang 'gyur bkren zhing glen/ /dgra las rgyal zhing mi phyed 'gyur/ /
419b2(rgyud): dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brnyen nas/ /de tshe gtong ba chen por gyur/ /mchod rten nyams dga' gtsug lag khang / /kun dga' rab rnam mang po/ /rdzing yang chu
419b3(rgyud): ni phun sum tshogs/ /bsod nams gang ni legs mdzes pa/ /de dag mang po ston byed cing / /grags dang snyan pa'i don la brtson/ /lha yi stegs ni nyams
419b4(rgyud): dga' dang / /phug dang gnas khang dag kyang byas/ /ya mtshan can gyis yang dag gnon/ /sna tshogs mu stegs gnas kyis ni/ /rgya mtsho'i 'gram gyi mthar thug par//
419b5(rgyud): phyogs de thams cad rnam par gnon/ /brtse ldan longs spyod ldan dpag med/ /rgyal po de ni chos la dga'/ /shar gyi phyogs su rgyas par ni/ /the tshom med par
419b6(rgyud): 'byung bar 'gyur/ /rtag tu cho gar yang dag ldan/ /ka ba nye bar gnas gyur tshe/ /gang+gA'i 'gram la yang dag brten/ /de tshe rgyal thams byas pa ni/ /lo ni sum cu dag
419b7(rgyud): dang bdun/ /lo ni brgyad cu dag na 'che/ /de nas de yi lus zhig nas/ /lha rnams dag tu nye bar skye/ /de nas dpal ldan klu yi rgyal/ /chos kyi bdag nyid chos la
420a1(rgyud): la dga'/ /mchod rten gang zhig 'di byas dang / /ston pa'i gzugs brnyan yid du 'ong / /de tshe sa steng dge 'dun ched/ /logs su gtsug
420a2(rgyud): lag khang dag byas/ /rnam par smin pa de yis ni/ /srid pa tha ma la brten nas/ /nges par sangs rgyas nyid lam dang / /mi g.yo go 'phang thob par 'gyur/ /de
420a3(rgyud): yi 'og tu go DA ra ni/ /de dag gtsor ni mu stegs gnon/ /shar gyi phyogs su 'byung ba ni/ /grong khyer du ni mu stegs gnas/ /rgyal po'i ming ni bcom ldan zhes//
420a4(rgyud): go DA'i nang na mthu dang ldan/ /brtul zhugs can ni mthur ldan pa/ /sbyin gnas zhes pas dbang yang bskur/ /der ni rgyal srid byas nas su/ /nub kyi phyogs su
420a5(rgyud): yang dag song / /ci 'dod sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i/ /grong khyer nyams dgar rab tu zhugs/ /ma zhu bas ni rab btab nas/ /phyir yang rab tu log par 'gyur/ /shar
420a6(rgyud): phyogs rgya mtsho mthar thug par/ /rkun ma rnams kyis yang dag khyab/ /mtshon gyi gnod pas rab bshig nas/ /shi nas yi dwags 'gro bar song / /sa bdag
420a7(rgyud): rgyal po mi mang ba/ /de sa ni lo gsum bar du byas/ /de nas de ni rkun pos bsad/ /rdzu 'phrul che ba'i yi dwags song / /de nyid du ni lo gsum bar/ /yi dwags
420b1(rgyud): rgyal thabs yongs su byas/ /yi dwags 'jig rten mi bzad pa/ /de nas de ni lus kyang btab/ /skye ba de las rnam grol nas/ /rtag tu mtho ris 'jig rten song / /de yi
420b2(rgyud): 'og tu rgyal po ni/ /rgya mtsho zhes ni bya bar grags/ /blo ngan lo ni gsum gyi bar/ /blo gros ngan pas rgyal srid thob/ /de yi nu bor rnam grags pa/ /thal ba zhes bya'i
420b3(rgyud): rgyal po 'byung / /srog gcod pa dang yang dag ldan/ /bab col chen po rab tu byed/ /'bad pas rang gi lus la yang / /brtse med bag ni med pa 'o/ /byis par gyur pas

420b5(rgyud): gnon/ /mi dang mi ma yin dag gi /longs spyod rnam pa sna tshogs dang / /rnam pa sna tshogs phun sum tshogs/ /rgyal po des kyang rab tu 'thob/ /de ni mthar gyis
420b6(rgyud): song ba dang / /rgyal po nub kyi phyogs dag tu/ /kha che'i sgo ye mthar thug par/ /byang gi phyogs la brten nas ni/ /der yang g.yul las rnam rgyal nas/ /rgyal thabs
420b7(rgyud): de tshe byas pa ni/ /bcu gnyis lo dang zla ba lngar/ /sa la rgyal srid de tshe byas/ /de nas de ni nad kyis btab/ /yang dang yang du brgyal bar 'gyur/ /sdug bsngal chen pos/
421a1(rgyud): zil mnan nas/ /lus ni zhig nas shi 'phos 'gyur/ /rgyal srid phyir ni rab chags nas/ /de dag phan tshun zhe sdang zhing / /mtshon chen
421a2(rgyud): tshogs kyis 'phen pa ni/ /de dag phan tshun byas par 'gyur/ /yi ge sa ming byis pa khye'u/ /de tshe rgyal srid dbang yang bskur/ /mtshan ma tsam zhig de byas nas/ /
421a3(rgyud): phyir yang de ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /bram ze'i gtso bo gnyis kyi ni/ /de dag phan tshun phye nas ni/ /ma ga d+hA yi yul phyin zhing / /u dum bA ra'i grong zhes par/ /bram
421a4(rgyud): ze'i gtso bo byis pa gnyis/ /sa steng rang gis dbang yang bskur/ /de nas mthar gyis de song nas/ /shar phyogs su ni yang dag brten/ /go DA'i yul gyi mir
421a5(rgyud): yang phyin/ /de tshe 'gran zla med par 'gyur/ /bdag nyid ngan pa'i rtsod rgyal gyis/ /byis pa'i gtso bo de gnyis pos/ /mi dge bshes gnyen la brten nas/ /

421a7(rgyud): gsod par rtsom/ /de nas rgyal po zla ba zhes/ /dpa' bo gcig pu 'byung bar 'gyur/ /gang+gA'i 'gram gyi mthar thug dang / /bA ra NA sI de las gzhan/ /ston
421b1(rgyud): pa'i gzugs brnyan nyams dga' ba/ /blo ngan gyis ni 'jig par 'gyur/ /chos kyi stegs ni mi nyung ba/ /rgyal ba rnams kyis sngon bstan pa/ /blo ngan dag gis bsreg
421b2(rgyud): 'gyur zhing / /mu stegs rnams ni gsod par dga'/ /de nas de ni khro dang chags/ /mi sdom log pa'i nga rgyal can/ /mchod rten kun dga' ra ba gnas/ /sa steng gcer
421b3(rgyud): bu'i gnas dag kyang / /de nas thams cad 'jig byed cing / /'tsho ba 'gog pa'ang byed par 'dod/ /yul gyi dbus su rgyal po gzhan/ /de yi dus su 'byung 'gyur ba/ /
421b4(rgyud): yi ge ra ming rigs bdag nyid/ /rje rigs kyis 'tsho de las gzhan/ /ston pa'i bstan pa 'di la dad/ /zla ba zhes bya'i rgyal mchog des/ /gcer bu'i rigs gyur rgyal
421b5(rgyud): po ni/ /de yang rab tu bsad par gyur/ /yi ge ha ming de'i nu bo/ /dpa' bo gcig pu 'byung bar 'gyur/ /dpung ni chen por yang dag ldan/ /dpa' zhing zil gnon
421b6(rgyud): yang dag gnon/ /rgyal po yi ge ha bya bas/ /zla bar rnam grags gnas las bton/ /de nas rgyal po rje'u rigs spyod/ /sde che stobs ni che ba dang / /de tshe shar gyi
421b7(rgyud): phyogs dag ni/ /bsod nams che ba'i grong mchog song / /rgyal rigs chos la gnas nas ni/ /chos kyi don shes brtser ldan pas/ /de ni nga rgyal khro tshul gyis/ /

422a4(rgyud): thob/ /yang na rgyal srid sbyong gnas pas/ /longs spyod rab tu thob ldan pa/ /snga mar rang sangs rgyas la ni/ /bza' dang gos ni byin pa dang / /de tshe lham ni byin
422a5(rgyud): pa dang / /gos kyis brgyan pa'i gdugs kyang byin/ /de yi las kyi mthu yis ni/ /lha mi'i rgyal srid chen po thob/ /lha dang mi yi phun sum tshogs/ /longs spyod phun
422a6(rgyud): sum tshogs ldan spyod/ /zla ba zhes bya'i bram ze'i rigs/ /longs spyod cher ldan gang phyir de/ /bram ze dag la longs spyod byin/ /de tshe rgyal thabs byed pa ni/ /
422a7(rgyud): lo ni bcu dang bdun dag dang / /de bzhin gzhan ni zla ba gcig /nyin zhag bdun dang brgyad dag tu/ /kha yi nad kyis yang dag btab/ /srin bu rnams
422b1(rgyud): kyis zos nas ni/ /dus byas nas ni 'og tu 'gro/ /mi ma yin pas zil mnan nas/ /de tshe grong de bshig par 'gyur/ /mi ma yin pa'i nyes pa yis/ /rims kyis
422b2(rgyud): nyam thag nad kyis brgyal/ /sngags kyi sbyor bas 'chi ba ste/ /de tshe rgyal po dus las 'das/ /mnar med pa zhes bya ba yi/ /dmyal bar sdig pa'i las byed rnams/ /
422b3(rgyud): sdig pa'i las rnams rjes spyod pa/ /de ni de ru skye bar 'gyur/ /dmyal bar de tshe bskal chen du/ /ma rungs sems ldan 'tshed par 'gyur/ /de nas so tham kyi hud
422b4(rgyud): zer/ /yang sos dang ni thig nag dang / /mi bzad ral gri'i nags tshal yang / /yang dang yang du myong bar 'gyur/ /yi dwags 'jig rten dud 'gro nyid/ /de bzhin
422b5(rgyud): gshin rje'i 'jig rten du'ang / /de ltar skye ba stong rnams su/ /'khor bar yang ni 'khor 'gyur yang / /des ni bde ba mi thob cing / /rtag tu sdug bsngal bsten
422b6(rgyud): par gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la/ /de bas 'bad pa thams cad kyis/ /sems ni kun gyis dad byas te/ /nad med phun sum tshogs par song / /
422b7(rgyud): sangs rgyas phan 'dogs byed pa yi/ /'bras bu mtha' yas 'byung 'gyur bas/ /sangs rgyas la ni dad par bya/ /chos dang dge 'dun de bzhin no/ /rgyal pos
423a1(rgyud): dkon mchog gsum mchod na/ /'jig rten gyi ni mchog tu 'gyur/ /rgyal thabs chen po'i grags pa thob/ /nor gyi dbang phyug longs spyod
423a2(rgyud): che| |rgyal pos phun tshogs rgya che ba'i/ /bde ba rnam pa sna tshogs thob/ /'jig rten mchog ni mchod byas na/ /'jig rten dbang phyug nyid du 'gro/ /de nas brgya

423a4(rgyud): theg pa la ni chags med 'gyur/ /de ltar sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab/ /sangs rgyas ye shes bsam mi khyab/ /de ltar 'bras bu bsam mi khyab/ /rnam par
423a5(rgyud): smin pa'ang bsam mi khyab/ /de nas gzhan yang rgyal po ni/ /zla ba sa steng med pa na/ /phan tshun 'khrug pa'i ngang tshul du/ /go DA'i rgyud du 'byung bar 'gyur/ /
423a6(rgyud): phan tshun ltos pa med par ni/ /de tshe mtshon ni 'debs par 'gyur/ /zhag ni bdun po gcig dang ni/ /de bzhin gzhan ni zla ba gcig /de tshe chogs kyi rgyal
423a7(rgyud): srid rgyud/ /de tshes steng byed par 'gyur/ /gang+gA'i 'gram gyi grong der ni/ /gtsug lag khang gi gnas kyang byas/ /de nas zla ba zhes bya ba'i/ /bram ze'i khye'u de yi
423b1(rgyud): bu| |zla ba brgyad dang zhag lnga dang / /phyed dang gnyis zhag 'das nas 'chi/ /de'i mthar rgyal po 'dug pa ni/ /klu yi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ /go DA'i yul gyi rgyal po 'byung / /
423b2(rgyud): dang po dza ma'i rigs bram ze/ /kun nas rje'u rigs kyis bskor ba'i/ /klu zhes bya ba de yang 'byung / /de yang mu ges gnod pa dang / /de bzhin pha rol dmag tshogs
423b3(rgyud): gnod/ /de dag rgyal srid thob pa na/ /chom rkun chen pos kun tu khyab/ /des kyang de yi lugs nyams te/ /der ni lo ni lnga dang gcig /rgyal srid kun nas 'khrugs
423b4(rgyud): bzhin spyod/ /srog gcod mang po byas nas ni/ /de tshe srog la gnod par byed/ /snga ma'i las kyi nyes pa yis/ /rje'u rigs spyod pa de dag byed/ /phan tshun 'khrugs
423b5(rgyud): pa'i ngang tshul du/ /de tshe de ni 'byung bar gyur/ /de dag de tshe nus ldan tshul/ /rgyal rigs spyod la gnas pa yi/ /go DA'i rgyud kyi mi yi bdag /'byung bar 'gyur
423b6(rgyud): bar the tshom med/ /kha cig de tshe mtshon gyis 'chi/ /nad rnams kyis kyang yang dag 'debs/ /de nas dus byas rgyal po rnams/ /dmyal ba rnams su 'gro bar
423b7(rgyud): 'gyur/ /bud med gtso bo'i byis pa ni/ /de yang phyis ni rgyal por 'gyur/ /de dag de bzhin zla phyed nas/ /mtshon gyis bsnun nas de nyid bsad/ /mu ge chen po yang
424a1(rgyud): dag 'byung / /pha rol dmag tshogs dag gis dkrugs/ /yid ni skrag par gyur pa yis/ /shar phyogs yul mi nyams par gyur/ /de
424a2(rgyud): yi yul du mi bdag ni/ /the tshom med par 'byung 'gyur ba/ /bcom brlag skyes pa'i rgyal po mchog /yangs pa can gyi tshong pa sngon/ /de yang lus la mchod
424a3(rgyud): pa yin/ /ma ga d+hA yi rgyal por 'gyur/ /de yi yang nu bo yi ge b+ha/ /shar gyi phyogs la yang dag gnas/ /de'i bu yi ge pra zhes bya/ /shar phyogs nyid du yang
424a4(rgyud): dag skyes/ /rgyal rigs mchog tu skyes par bstan/ /legs par spyod pas byis pa bcings/ /lo ni bcu dang bdun dag tu/ /'ching ba dag la yang dag
424a5(rgyud): bzhag / glang rdzi zhes bya'i rgyal pos bcings/ /bcom ldan zhes byas de ni dkrol/ /yi ge ha zhes rgyal chen ni/ /nub kyi phyogs nas yang dag 'ongs/ /shar
424a6(rgyud): gyi phyogs ni mtha' med par/ /gang+gA'i 'gram na gnas par gyur/ /dmangs rigs gzi brjid che ba dang / /sde chen stobs ni che ba dang / /de ni de yul 'gram
424a7(rgyud): gnas nas/ /kun tu yang ni rab tu gnas/ /go DA'i skye bo zhes grags grong / /mu stegs zhes kyang rnam par grags/ /rgyal pos de ni rnam mnan nas/ /
424b1(rgyud): stobs chen de ni 'dug par gyur/ /der ni rgyal rigs byis pa de/ /tshong pa dang ni lhan cig 'ongs/ /der ni nam phyed zhugs nas ni/ /nam gyi mthar ni de yang mchod/ /
424b2(rgyud): dmangs rigs rgyal po zhes bya bas/ /slar nyid du ni ldog par byed/ /gang+gA'i 'gram gyi mthar thug par/ /grong khyer dga' ba zhes bya bar/ /de tshe rgyal srid ma ga d+har
424b3(rgyud): byis pa der ni bzhag par gyur/ /wa ra NA si'i pha rol tu/ /ka shi yul gyi mir yang phyin/ /stobs chen sa yi bdag po ni/ /dmangs rigs der ni zhugs par gyur//
424b4(rgyud): sdug bsngal nyam thag nad chen pos/ /de tshe bu ni dbang yang bskur/ /byis pa khye'u phug ces pa/ /de tshe rgyal thabs dbang yang bskur/ /chen po'i nad kyis zil
424b5(rgyud): mnan nas/ /de tshes yang 'khor bar mthong / /de nas 'bar bas shugs nar phyung / /lus zhig nas ni dur 'gror song / /de tshe zla ba bdun dang brgyad/ /dud 'gro dag
424b6(rgyud): tu gnas par gyur/ /de yi skye ba las grol nas/ /lha rnams kyi ni nang du skyes/ /de tshe skye ba nyi shur ni/ /lha yi phun sum tshogs pa thob/ /chos kyi bdag nyid de mthar
424b7(rgyud): gyis/ /rang rgyal byang chub thob par byed/ /sngon gyi skye ba'i dus dag tu/ /'di nyid las ni nye bar bsags/ /bdag nyid chen por rang rgyal la/ /gos kyis kun nas bkab
425a1(rgyud): pa dang / /glang po rta dang shing rta'i rgyur/ /lham ni rab tu phul bar gyur/ /de la blo ldan sems dang bas/ /de tshe de la bza' ba byin/ /rnam
425a2(rgyud): par smin pa de yis ni/ /lha yi rgyal po brgya byin du/ /skye ba bye ba phrag dgur ni/ /lha yi 'jig rten dag tu gyur/ /sa steng 'ongs nas rgyal po ni/ /de ni skye ba 'di
425a3(rgyud): la gyur/ /gzhan gyis rjes bsgrubs rgyal thabs ni/ /rjes su spyod par 'gyur ba yin/ /de yi bu yang rgyal po ni/ /wa rA Na sir rab tu gnas/ /chags 'og
425a4(rgyud): rgyal phran gyis bcom pa'i/ /rgyal thabs rnam 'jigs 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de yi rgyal srid dgra dang ni/ /bram zes phal cher gnod par 'gyur/ /bag med
425a5(rgyud): 'dod pa spyod pa dang / /rgyal po de ni gdon gyis 'dzin/ /phyi ma'i yi ni dus dag tu/ /de nas mtshon gyis brgyab nas 'chi/ /ma ga d+hA rgyal de dag ni/ /phan tshun
425a6(rgyud): du ni gnod byed pas/ /zla ba zhes bya'i rgyal po 'das/ /shar gyi phyogs kyi kun nas kyang / /gang+gA'i 'gram gyi mthar thug par/ /wa rA Na si de las gzhan/ /
425a7(rgyud): yi ge pra zhes rgyal rigs ni/ /de yi tshe na rgyal po 'byung / /gang zhig dmangs rigs gyur pa ni/ /yi ge ha yis yongs su mchod/ /grong khyer dga' ba zhes bya
425b1(rgyud): bar/ /gang+gA'i 'gram la yang dag rten/ /sngon gyi las kyis yongs bskul nas/ /rgyal rigs rgyal por 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de nyid las byas byed du bcug /
425b2(rgyud): rjes su yang ni yi rang byas/ /de tshe dus ni 'das pa na/ /gser thub ces bya'i ston pa byung / /wa rA Na si'i grong khyer du/ /nor chen ldan pa'i tshong dpon yod/ /tshong
425b3(rgyud): dpon bu ni byis pa de/ /byis pa dag gis yang dag bskor/ /sa rdul dag la rtse ba'i phyir/ /lam chen dag tu zhugs par 'gyur/ /rang khyim mchod rten mchog
425b4(rgyud): mthong la/ /pha dang ma ni mchod byed pa/ /de nyid yid la bzung byas nas/ /sa rdul gyi ni mchod rten byas/ /de tshe me tog dman mas ni/ /mchod pa yang ni byed par
425b5(rgyud): 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas dad pa'i dran pa yis/ /sangs rgyas de la'ang bstod pa byas/ /byis pa rnams kyis yongs bskor nas/ /der ni byis pa rtse bar gyur/ /ston pa
425b6(rgyud): gser thub rgyal ba yis/ /nyan thos mchog de gcig pu zhig /skyon bral bdag nyid grol ba dang / /khams gsum las ni rnam grol blo/ /de tshe dang po skyon bral ba/ /bsod
425b7(rgyud): nams la ni rgyu bar gyur/ /wA rA Na si legs mdzes pa'i/ /de tshe grong khyer rab tu zhugs/ /gang du sa steng byis pa yod/ /de tshe chags bral phyogs der phyin/ /der ni byis pa
426a1(rgyud): de kun gyis/ /kun nas yongs su bskor bar gyur/ /'dir gshegs dge slong 'dir spyon cing / /ston pa'i mchod rten phyag phyogs mdzod/ /bdag
426a2(rgyud): cag gis ni 'bad byas na/ /bzang po 'di la mi gzigs sam/ /de nas tshong dpon bu khye'u/ /rtsa yi thag pa blangs nas ni/ /rdu 'phrul chen po 'dod chags bral
426a3(rgyud): brtse ba'i tshul gyis de bcings khrid/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po chags bral bas/ /der gnas rnams la yang dag dgongs/ /sa steng dag tu gzigs pa na/ /de dag
426a4(rgyud): gis ni mchod rten byas/ /byis pa'i spyi bor lag byugs nas/ /blo ldan de la 'di skad smras/ /gang du khyod kyis mchod rten byas/ /thongs shig khye'u bdag cag 'deng /
426a5(rgyud): gang du sa steng mchod rten ni/ /de yang thams cad 'od gyur nas/ /de tshe byis pa dang lhan cig /bdag nyid chen po des phyag byas/ /bsod nams don du ci 'dod
426a6(rgyud): par/ /dpa' bo des ni phyir yang chas/ /de nas tshong dpon byis pa yis/ /chos gos mtha' nas bzung nas ni/ /dge slong de ni bzung khyer ba/ /bshos gsol bya ba'i
426a7(rgyud): ched du'o/ /de nas tshong dpon gtso bo des/ /byis pa khye'u de mthong nas/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po chags bral ba'i/ /chos gos mtha' la 'dzin byed la/ /'jigs shing
426b1(rgyud): ba spu ldang ba dang / /nga yi khyim du mchog kyang gshegs/ /myur du rkang gnyis la btud de/ /byis pa yis ni 'dzin pa btang / /bu de yis kyang bzung byas la/ /'bad pa
426b2(rgyud): yis ni bzod gsol byas/ /skye bo'i mchog gyur phan 'dod pa/ /de yi lhung bzed blangs nas ni/ /sA lu'i tshod ma bza' ba yis/ /lhung bzed dag ni bkang byas nas//
426b3(rgyud): bu la bos nas smras pa ni/ /yang dag long la 'di la byin/ /de nas byis pa shes ldan pas/ /'bad pas lag gnyis bkrus nas ni/ /lhung bzed gang ba blangs nas
426b4(rgyud): su/ /'dod chags bral bal ni phul/ /phul nas myur ba nyid du ni/ /rkang pa gnyis la phyag kyang byas/ /'dod chags bral bas blangs nas ni/ /gtsug lag khang song
426b5(rgyud): zas la spyad/ /bde bar reg pa'i sems kyis ni/ /de tshe 'dod chags bral bar gyur/ /de las byis pa gzhan zhig ni/ /phrag dog sems su gyur nas ni/ /mu stegs
426b6(rgyud): rnams la rab dad nas/ /bstan pa la ni de mi mchod/ /khro ba'i sems ni kho na yis/ /'dod chags bral la nyin zhag gzhan/ /bza' ba bca' ba rnams mang po/ /khyer
426b7(rgyud): nas de la rab tu byin/ /khyod la byin pa'i bsod snyoms kyi/ /dge ba cung zad gang yod pa/ /tshong dpon bu ni de bas kyang / /sa steng bdag ni dam par shog /de nas mu stegs
427a1(rgyud): de kun dang / /de tshe bram ze'i chung ma rnams/ /de nas thams cad 'dus nas ni/ /tha dad par ni 'thab mo'ang byas/ /byis pa khyed cag yong mi
427a2(rgyud): shes/ /ci phyir mo reg gam du 'gro/ /'di dag bdag la'ang gnas med na/ /gzhan dag gang du mya ngan zlo/ /byis pa de yi sems can la/ /de lta bu yi zhe sdang skyes/ /
427a3(rgyud): ston pas nye bar bsngags pa yi/ /chos kyi zam pa grags pa dang / /sa steng lha khang mchod rten mchog /mu stegs rnams kyi sa de dag bshig /tshong dpon mchog
427a4(rgyud): gi bu de la/ /kun nas 'khrug pa'i sems kyang byas/ /mgo reg 'di la byin pa yi/ /sbyin pa'i 'gro ba gang du 'gro/ /ngan 'gro'i 'gro bas zin sems la/ /rnam
427a5(rgyud): par gnod pa bdag gis bya/ /gnyis pa byis pa gang yin te/ /zla ba zhes bya'i rgyal po yin/ /rnam smin de yis mi 'dod pa/ /yun ring sdug bsngal rjes su myong / /
427a6(rgyud): tshong dpon mchog gi bu de ni/ /lus zhig nas ni bde 'gror song / /de dag der ni lha gnas su/ /yun ring bde ba rjes su myong / /de tshe de tshe de dang der/ /shi 'phos
427a7(rgyud): lha yi 'jig rten gnas/ /de tshe tha ma'i skye ba la/ /thams cad du ni 'ching ba gcod/ /tha ma'i skye ba thob pa na/ /mir gyur pa yi bdag por 'gyur/ /las kyis de
427b1(rgyud): tshe 'phos na yang / /de tshe de tshe de dang der/ /'jig rten dag tu skyes gyur pa/ /sa steng mi yi bdag por byed/ /gang zhig me tog sman ma ni/ /byis pa g.yo ba des phul ba/ /des
427b2(rgyud): na longs spyod nyon mongs can/ /de 'di'i 'bras bu nyon mongs ldan/ /sdug bsngal longs spyod thob pa yang / /rgyal po de yi bstan pa nyams/ /mi brtan byis pa'i rang
427b3(rgyud): bzhin dang / /ji lta de ltar g.yo sems kyis/ /sa steng ston pa'i mchod rten la/ /mchod pa chen po yongs su byas/ /rnam par smin pa'i las de yis/ /byis pa rgyal po'i
427b4(rgyud): dbang phyug byed/ /med par rgyal po byed par 'gyur/ /yod pa rab tu 'jig par 'gro/ /byang dang nub kyi bar dag tu/ /de ni rgyal po byed par 'gyur/ /blo gros gang de bcings
427b5(rgyud): pa dang / /byis pas yang ni rab dang ba/ /byis pas bcings dang grol ba yi/ /rnam smin las ni de yi su/ /skye ba dag ni lnga brgyar yang / /byis pa bcings dang grol bar
427b6(rgyud): 'gyur/ /tha ma'i skye ba de yi tshe/ /thams cad du ni 'ching ba bcad/ /lo ni lnga bcu lnga dag gam/ /bdun cu rtsa bdun dag du 'gyur/ /shar phyogs rgya mtsho'i mthar thug
427b7(rgyud): par/ /sa steng de ni rgyal por 'gyur/ /'bigs byed ri yi nang gnas pa/ /mtha' khob kla klo'i rkun ma rnams/ /de dag kun la dbang sgyur ba'i/ /yi ger ming rgyal
428a1(rgyud): por 'gyur/ /gangs can ri yi nang gnas pa/ /byang gi phyogs la brten pa yi/ /de tshe rgyal rigs rgyal pa de/ /yul mi kun la spyod
428a2(rgyud): par 'gyur/ /mi shes byis par gyur pa yis/ /mchod rten sa rdul gyis byas pas/ /'gran zla med cing gnod med par/ /ma ga d+hA yi rgyal por gyur/ /shar
428a3(rgyud): phyogs rgya mtshor brten nas ni/ /de 'di 'brog gi mthar thug par/ /blo ldan lo hi ta las gzhan/ /byang du de bzhin kha ba can/ /nub tu kA shi nyams dga'i grong
428a4(rgyud): rtse mo zhes bya'i grong de bzhin/ /'di yi nang du rgyal po ni/ /ston pa'i bstan pa gsal byed pa/ /de ni seng+ge lnga zhes bya/ /pham nas rgyal pos gzhan yang pham/ /
428a5(rgyud): seng+ge las skyes thams cad de'ang / /de tshe rtsa nas rnam par bshig /gangs can nang dang shar phyogs dang / /rgya mtsho bcu yi 'gram gnas nas/ /de tshe rgyal rigs
428a6(rgyud): rgyal po de/ /yul mi dag ni kun la spyod/ /lha chogs seng+ge rgyal po ni/ /g.yon can gzhan la bsten pa dang / /'bigs byed nang na gnas pa la/ /des kyang
428a7(rgyud): rang gi rgyal po byas/ /bgrod dka' zhes bya'i yul dbus su/ /dug chen rgyal bas rnam rgyal byas/ /byang shar kun la gnas pa yi/ /seng+ge zhes bya de bzhin
428b1(rgyud): gzhan/ /zla ba zhes bya'i rgyal po 'das/ /de tshe go DA'i skye bo'ang 'jig /de tshe rgyal rigs sa yi bdag /'byung bar 'gyur bar the tshom med/ /rgyal po mngon 'phel skye
428b2(rgyud): zhes bya/ /de yi longs spyod 'phel bar 'gyur/ /de tshe rgan por gyur pa na/ /de yang g.yo ba med par song / /lo ni brgyad cur 'tsho ba ste/ /de bzhin gzhan ni bdun dang
428b3(rgyud): bdun/ /de nas 'khogs pas zil mnan nas/ /dus byas lha yi gnas su song / /yun ring lha yi bde ba ni/ /de tshe rgyal pos rjes su myong / /sngon ni kun nas nyon mongs
428b4(rgyud): pas/ /las kyis yang ni shi 'phos te/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po klu yi rgyal/ /blo ldan dud 'gro'i nang du gnas/ /tshong pa sngags ni grub pa ste/ /ji ltar 'dod pa'i blo byed cing / /de
428b5(rgyud): tshe rig pa'i rgyal po dang / /de tshe bde 'gro dag tu 'gyur/ /de yi tshen 'khor los bsgyur/ /sna tshogs tog ces rgyal por 'gyur/ /de bzhin du ni blo ldan de/ /de tshe rig 'dzin
428b6(rgyud): chos kyang 'chad/ /lo ni bye ba brgyad cu dang / /de tshe dgu dang bdun du 'gyur/ /lha dang mi yi bde ba yis/ /'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ba yin/ /de yi 'khor du bu mo ni/ /
428b7(rgyud): bye ba drug cu skye bar 'gyur/ /de nas de ni lus zhig nas/ /lha mo sgrol ma mnyes byas te/ /lha rnams bdag por song nas ni/ /der ni chos kyang ston par byed/ /rgyal po de ni
429a1(rgyud): mthar gyis su/ /myur du byang chub gzhol bar 'gyur/ /de yang lo ni gsum dag tu/ /rgyal po'i dbang phyug byas nas ni/ /yi ge pa yi rgyal po 'dam
429a2(rgyud): de tshe dus kyi tha ma la/ /phan tshun rgyud ni byas nas su/ /rtsod pa chen po la yang gnas/ /de yi nu bo yig pa zhes/ /brtul zhugs can du rnam par gnas/ /lo ni gsum
429a3(rgyud): dang gcig dag tu/ /rgyal srid yongs su 'phel bar byas/ /de ma thag tu 'khru bas btab/ /'di dag gnyi ga 'chi bar gyur/ /'jig rten dus 'das shi nas ni/ /gnod
429a4(rgyud): sbyin dag gi nang du skyes/ /de gnyis mthar gyis chos ldan pas/ /rang rgyal byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /de'i yang nu bo yig pa zhes/ /rgyal rigs kyi ni chos la dga'/ /
429a5(rgyud): de yang rgyal po lo gsum du/ /mi yi bdag po byed par 'gyur/ /de'i yang nu bo rgyal po ni/ /yi ge dza zhes rnam par bsgrags/ /de yang yul ni 'di dag tu/ /sa kun
429a6(rgyud): gyi ni bdag por 'gyur/ /rta dang shing rta glang po dmag /kun nas gru dang theg pa yis/ /g.yul du nye bar gnas nas ni/ /dgra yi tshogs ni kun las rgyal/ /des ni
429a7(rgyud): yul 'di ma lus dang / /sa rnams thams cad nyid la ni/ /ston pa'i gzugs brnyan lha khang dang / /de bzhin rgyal ba'i mchod rten dang / /sa rnams dag ni thams
429b1(rgyud): cad la/ /thams cad mdzes par byas par 'gyur/ /de tshe sngon gyi rgyal po de'i/ /bran ze de bzhin shAka rigs skyes/ /nga rgyal shes rab ldan zhing rno/ /byang chub mthar byed nga rgyal
429b2(rgyud): blo/ /de tshe dus kyi tha ma la/ /'di nyid 'di yi grogs nyid 'gyur/ /rgyal po chos la dga' ba yi/ /rgyal rigs kyi ni mchog tu gsungs/ /lo ni nyi shu bdun dang brgyad/ /de
429b3(rgyud): ni de tshe 'tsho bar 'gyur/ /bud med byas pa'i skyon nyid kyis/ /dus byas nas ni lha gnas 'gro/ /blo ldan de ni mthar gyis kyang / /bla med byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /de
429b4(rgyud): nas grags pa dpal zhes bya/ /de bzhin sa yi bdag po ni/ /u DI yan rgyal po che/ /chos la dga' ba 'byung bar 'gyur/ /u D-I yan gyi grong mchog la/ /grong khyer yi
429b5(rgyud): ge pa zhes bya/ /der ni rgyal po byed pa ste/ /kun nas dgra las rgyal ba 'gyur/ /der ni de tshe brgyad dag gi /gtsug lag khang yang byed par 'gyur/ /bram ze'i gtso bo de bzhin
429b6(rgyud): ldan/ /shAkya'i skyes zhes yang dag brten/ /de yi grogs la brten nas ni/ /khor yug tu ni rgyal srid byas/ /lo ni brgyad cu gcig bcas par/ /mi yi bdag po der
429b7(rgyud): 'tshor gyur/ /las byed skyon gyis chos bdag nyid/ /dus byas nas ni lha gnas 'gro/ /lha rnams kyi ni rgyal thabs kyang / /de bzhin mthar gyis byed par 'gyur/ /de
430a1(rgyud): nas lus de zhig nas kyang / /mtho ris las kyang mtho ris 'gro/ /de yi byang chub rgyu dag ni/ /dge ba'i chos ni yongs rdzogs byas/ /de yi
430a2(rgyud): bran nyid rgyal po ste/ /rgyal srid gnod med byed par 'gyur/ /yi ge'i dang po ya zhes bya/ /sa yi bdag po 'byung bar 'gyur/ /lo ni bdun dang gcig dag tu/ /de yi dus
430a3(rgyud): su rgyal srid byed/ /de gcig bud med rnams kyis ni/ /brdegs nas kyang ni shi bar 'gyur/ /yi ge pa rgyud yang byung ba/ /rgyal rigs rgyal por 'gyur ba yin/ /des
430a4(rgyud): ni bran tshogs rnams bsad nas/ /rang dbang du ni yongs su gyur/ /mi dge'i bshes gnyen la brten nas/ /rnam mang srog ni gcod pa yin/ /dpa' zhing 'byor la
430a5(rgyud): rmongs par ni/ /'jig rten kun la 'byung bar 'gyur/ /g.yo zhing myur du byed pan/ /chang dang g.yo sgyu can la dga'/ /chang gis bag med rnam rmongs nas/ /des na
430a6(rgyud): de ni sa la nyal/ /dgra rnams kyis ni brtson byas nas/ /mtshon chas bsnun nas de gsod 'gyur/ /des nas de ni lus zhig nas/ /dus byas nas ni 'og tu 'gro/
430a7(rgyud): de yi spun zla gnyis pa ni/ /ming ni yi ger zhes shes/ /nyin zhag bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad du/ /de tshes la rgyal srid byas/ /bram ze rnams la nor byin nas/ /the tshom
430b1(rgyud): med par dus byas kyang / /de nas gzhan yang sa bdag ni/ /de che rgyal po bzang po byung / /de yang dmangs rigs skyes nas ni/ /yan lag mtshang ngan pa nyid/ /chos min
430b2(rgyud): phal cher tshul khrims 'chal/ /'thab pa la yang rtag tu dad/ /bram ze'i tshogs dang rgyal phran dang / /sdom brtson de bzhin rang byung ba/ /kun la yang ni gnod byed cing / /
430b3(rgyud): rtag tu tshar gcod dag la'ang dga'/ /drag pos 'dul bar byed pa dang / /de bzhin rkun ma rnams kyang gsod/ /ma rungs thams cad gnod byed cing / /ya mtshan can gyi
430b4(rgyud): brtul zhugs ston/ /rnam par grol ba'ang spyin mi byed/ /de che rgyal srid byed par 'gyur/ /lo ni bcu dang bdun gyi bar/ /der ni sa bdag 'tsho bar 'gyur/ /mdze yi nad
430b5(rgyud): kyis sdug bsngal nas/ /de nas dus byas dud 'gror 'gro /dud 'gro dag las klu rgyal du/ /gdengs ka che ldan mgyogs par 'gro/ /mchog tu 'jigs rung lus ldan
430b6(rgyud): zhing / /de tshe sgra ni drag par sgrogs/ /de la lor ni mi 'dod pa/ /yun ring sdug bsngal rjes su myong / /sa srung 'jig rten 'phel byed pa/ /'jig rten kun gyis shes pa
430b7(rgyud): ste| |lus can shar phyogs gnas pa yin/ /rgyal po yi ge pa zhes pa'i/ /rgyud rnams kun tu skyes pa gzhan/ /rgyal rigs dpa' bo rnam par gnon/ /de bzhin rgya
431a1(rgyud): mtsho gsum gyi bdag / sde che stobs ni che ba dag /shar gyi phyogs su 'byung bar 'gyur/ /ston pa'i mchod rten bzang po dang / /gtsug lag
431a2(rgyud): khang dang 'dug gnas khyim/ /rnam pa sna tshogs skyed mos tshal/ /rdzing dang khron pa bkang sas bskor/ /de bzhin rtag tu bsod nams khang / /sa ni mdzes par byed par
431a3(rgyud): 'gyur/ /de ni thub mchog dam pa dag /theg pa bla na med la brten/ /shAkya'i rab byung de nyid ni/ /rtag tu de ni rab gnas byed/ /mi khom rnams ni spong byed cing / /dal
431a4(rgyud): ba nyid kyang legs par thob/ /yi ge ka zhes rnam par bsgrags/ /'jig med dran dang ldan pa nyid/ /lo ni nyi shu gcig par du/ /sa skyong rgyal srid byas par gyur/ /de nas
431a5(rgyud): gsud nad kyis btab ste/ /dus byas nas ni lha gnas 'gro/ /blo ldan de ni mthar gyis su/ /myur du byang chub gzhol bar 'gyur/ /de yi lhag ma'i rgyud las kyang / /
431a6(rgyud): gzhan la rab gnas 'tsho byed pa/ /de yi 'og tu sa skyong ba/ /sa srung 'tsho ba gnas pa yin/ /bram ze bkren pa'i skye bo ni/ /the tshom med par 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de yi
431a7(rgyud): dus su chos min ldan/ /ston pa'i bstan pa nges par nyams/ /sngags kyi bstan pas sems can rnams/ /dge ba'i don du nges par sbyor/ /gang zhig gzhon nus
431b1(rgyud): bstan pa yi/ /sngags ni longs spyod 'phel byed pa/ /rgyal po'i dbang phyug don du ni/ /de tshe de yi yul phyogs su'ang / /grub pa mchog ni bsgrub bya min/ /chos kyi
431b2(rgyud): 'khor lo nyams dga' dang / /de bzhin 'od ma'i tshal chen dang / /gang du bcom ldan de zhi par/ /phung po med par rab zhugs pa/ /sngags gnyis 'di dag bsgrub bya ba//
431b3(rgyud): lha mo sgrol ma khro gnyer can/ /rtag tu rgya mtsho'i 'gram dang ni/ /snying po med pa'i 'bab chu mchog /gang+gA'i 'gram ni thams cad du/ /pad+ma 'byung ba bsgrub par bya/ /sa
431b4(rgyud): bcu thob pa'i bdag po ni/ /gang yang byang chub sems de yang / /sems can rnams ni 'dul byed pa/ /zla ba zhes ni rnam par bsgrags/ /rig pa'i rgyal mo rdzu 'phrul che/ /de
431b5(rgyud): ni sgrol ma zhes kyang bstan/ /bud med gzugs 'chang lha mo ni/ /'gro ba kun tu rnam par rgyu/ /snying rjes brlan pa'i sems kyis ni/ /sems can rnams la phan don du//
431b6(rgyud): mi mjed 'jig rten khams gnas ma/ /bud med ming gis 'jug par byed/ /sa bcu la ni rab gnas thob/ /byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che/ /sems can
431b7(rgyud): rnams ni 'dul byed pa/ /lha mo sgrol ma zhes su bstan/ /'di ni 'bad med grub pa ste/ /srung dang skyob dang sbed par byed/ /longs spyod dbang phyug 'phel byed pas/ /
432a1(rgyud): 'di ni lha mo bsgrub par bya/ /byang chub tshogs kyi ched du ni/ /bskyed pa nyid ni brtsam par bya/ /snying rjes brlan pas lus can la/ /de tshe lha mo rjes 'brang
432a2(rgyud): ba| |sngags kyi gzugs kyis sems can la/ /byang chub tshogs ni bya phyir ro/ /re ba thams cad dga' rgyas phyir/ /shar gyi phyogs su gnas pa yin/ /bdag nyid
432a3(rgyud): rnam pa stong dang ni/ /rnam pa mang po byas nas kyang / /rgya mtsho bzhi yi mthar thug par/ /sa rnams kun tu rnam par rgyu/ /de nas shar gyi phyogs su'am/ /yang na bA
432a4(rgyud): rA Na sIr 'grub/ /lha mo da yi zhing du ni/ /shar gyi phyogs su rab tu bstan/ /'od chen po ni dzam+b+ha la/ /gnod sbyin rgyal po yang dag 'grub/ /de tshe longs spyod ma lus
432a5(rgyud): 'dod/ /de che dus kyi tha ma la/ /lha mo sgrol ma gnod sbyin rgyal/ /de nor rgyas pa 'dod pas sgrub/ /de tshe khro bo'i sngags dag ni/ /lho phyogs dag tu bsgrub par bya/ /kla klo
432a6(rgyud): rkun ma'i gling dang ni/ /de bzhin rgya mtsho'i nang du ni/ /stobs chen sgrol ma gnod sbyin rgyal/ /de bzhin du yang 'grub par 'gyur/ /ha ri ke la kad ri tsa/ /kA ma ru
432a7(rgyud): pa gA dA ha'i/ /pho nya mo tshogs rnam mang dang / /gnod sbyin rdzu 'phrul chen mo 'grub/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis gang gsung sngags/ /longs spyod kyi ni rgyur 'gyur
432b1(rgyud): ba| |de bzhin yul der grub pa ste/ /gzhan yul de bzhin ma yin no/ /shar phyogs dang ni phyogs mtshams su/ /rnam pa sna tshogs sngags kyi rgyur/ /de yi dus su bstan
432b2(rgyud): pa ni| |lus can rnams kyis bsgrub par bya/ /dbus kyi yul du de bzhin sngags/ /de bzhin sa srung mang po ni/ /rgya che thams cad nyams chung ba'i/ /blo chung rnams kyis
432b3(rgyud): rtogs par byed/ /rgyal po'i gtso bo mdor bsdus nas/ /ming ni 'di dag nges par brjod/ /dang po'i yi ge sha dang na/ /dang po'i yi ge par yang bstan/ /dang por yi
432b4(rgyud): ge ba dang e/ /dang po'i yi ge ar yang bstan/ /dang po'i yi ge har bstan te/ /dang po'i yi ge bar yang bsgrags/ /dang po'i yi ge dza dang wa/ /dang yig d+ha ni zla ba'i
432b5(rgyud): rigs/ /yi ge ha nyid rnam bsgrags dang / /de bzhin yang ni dang po'i a/ /dang po'i yi ge sa la yang / /bud med rigs min 'jig rten sdang / /dang po'i yi ge a dang
432b6(rgyud): ma| |'jig rten rnams la mthu dang ldan/ /rim gyis rim gyis rigs dag ni/ /bram ze rje'u rigs dag tu 'jug /phal cher chos min las byed cing / /rnam sdang bud
432b7(rgyud): med la brkam chags/ /sa srung skyon ni rab mang par/ /de tshe dus kyi tha ma la/ /yul gyi dbus su mi yi bdag /'byung bar 'gyur bar the tshom med/ /dus kyi tha mar
433a1(rgyud): 'di dag tshe/ /lo ni brgya dang nyi shu nyid/ /de yi tshe na mi rnams kyi/ /tshe ni ring bar rab tu bstan/ /de dag bar ma bzang po las/ /khyad par ring dang
433a2(rgyud): thung ba yin/ /rgyal po rnams ni tshe thung bar/ /de tshe dus su bstan pa ni/ /gang+gA'i 'gram gyi dogs dang ni/ /gangs can gyi ni ri zhol dang / /de tshe kA ma ru yul du/ /de
433a3(rgyud): 'dra'i rgyal po 'byung bar 'gyur/ /dang po bar ma tha ma yi/ /rigs kyi lhag ma brjod bya ste/ /dang po'i gtso bo chen po ni/ /rna can rgyal por rab tu bsgrags/ /tha ma ang
433a4(rgyud): ga'i bdag po dang / /der ni 'byor bzang 'byor pa dang / /legs byin srid pa byin pa ni/ /kA ma ru pa'i yul du byung / /tha mar legs 'byor gzhon nu dang / /yi ge ba
433a5(rgyud): dang tha gnyis ni/ /yangs pa can du yang dag byung / /gang du thub pa de skyes pa/ /ser skya zhes bya'i grong mchog tu/ /tha mar zas gtsang shAka rigs kyi/ /nyi ma bu ram
433a6(rgyud): rigs skyes pa/ /tha mar zas gtsang rnam bsgrags pa/ /shAkya shAkya'i rnams 'phel byed/ /sems can brtson 'grus chung bar ni/ /'jig rten skyes mchog bstan
433a7(rgyud): pa yin/ /gang zhig rgyal bas gsung sngags dang / /de bzhin bran po'i tshogs kun dang / /pho nya'i tshogs kun du ma dang / /rdo rje pad+ma'i rigs dag kyang / /rgyud rnams
433b1(rgyud): kun gyi don rig pas/ /bsgrubs na grub par 'gyur ba yin/ /'jig rten kun gyi sngags dag ni/ /yul gyi dbus der grub par 'gyur/ /dbus yul gnas par
433b2(rgyud): khyad par du/ /rgyal bas gsungs par bsgrub par bya/ /rnam pa sna tshogs rtags dang ni/ /rnam pa sna tshogs rgyud dag dang / /rnam pa sna tshogs sbyor bar
433b3(rgyud): ldan/ /lus can rnam pa sna tshogs 'grub/ /dbus kyi yul du de bzhin sngags/ /longs spyod 'phel ba bsgrub par bya/ /de bzhin lus can bsrung don dang / /
433b4(rgyud): skyob dang dbang dang dgug pa 'grub/ /dbus kyi yul du mi yi bdag /'das dang ma 'ongs rab tu gsungs/ /rnam pa sna tshogs rtags dang ni/ /rnam pa sna tshogs
433b5(rgyud): tshe dang rigs/ /rgyal po thams cad gsungs pa ni/ /mchog dang tha ma bar ma yin/ /de bzhin rnam gsum grub pa ste/ /dus kyang gsum du sbyar bar bya/ /de bzhin
433b6(rgyud): sngags kyang rnam gsum du/ /de bzhin thub pa mchog gis gsungs/ /rgyal po mtha' yas gsungs pa ni/ /dbus kyi yul dang nub phyogs dang / /byang phyogs
433b7(rgyud): dang ni shar phyogs dang / /de bzhin phyogs mtshams thams cad dang / /rnam pa bzhi ru mtshon pa yi/ /gling dag de bzhin kun tu yang / /sa bdag mtha' yas rab gsungs
434a1(rgyud): pa| |mtha' yas sngags ni sgrub pa dang / /mtha' yas yul la gnas pa dag /mtha' yas sngags ni yongs su grub/ /thub pa'i
434a2(rgyud): bstan pa nub pa na/ /tshar gcad rjes su gzung bar byed/ /dus su rgyal po dag la sngags/ /'jam dpal gyis ni gsungs pa yin/ /rdzu 'phrul rtse dang rnam
434a3(rgyud): 'phrul dang / /'dir ni dus kyi spyod pa'ang bstan/ /sngags kyi bdag nyid sems can gyi/ /'gro ba skye gnas rgyal po'i ming / /sngags ni sgrub par 'dod
434a4(rgyud): rnams la/ /yul dang dus ni yang dag bstan/ /bstan pa nub pa'i 'og tu ni/ /zhar la rgyal po rnams kyis bstan/ /yon tan bdag nyid che sngags rnams/ /
434a5(rgyud): tha mar 'bras bu rtogs par byas/ /rgyal po gzhan ni theg pa dang / /sngon ni 'gal ba med par bstan/ /dus kyi tha ma de dus su/ /rab tu gnas par the tshom
434a6(rgyud): med/ /de dag phyogs la gnas par ni/ /rgyal po thams cad gsungs pa yin/ /de bzhin shAkya'i gsung rab la/ /nges par rab byung gnas nas ni/ /'jig rten
434a7(rgyud): mig gcig gyur pa yi/ /thub pa mchog ni med pa na/ /rtag tu sngags smra la dad pas/ /bstan pa'i don ni byed par 'gyur/ /de dag gzhon nu bshad par bya/ /rtse
434b1(rgyud): gcig yid kyis mnyan par gyis/ /ston pa'i gsung rabs steng du/ /dus mthar 'jig rten nyams pa na/ /sdom brtson rgyal po'i tshul gyis ni/ /'byung bar 'gyur bar theng
434b2(rgyud): tshom med/ /dper na ma khol zhes bya dang / /me tog ces byar rnam par grags/ /yi ge ma zhes gzhon nu zhes/ /dang po tha mar chos la dga'/ /klus bos zhes kyang
434b3(rgyud): rnam par grags/ /rin chen 'byung zhes bya ming dang / /yi ge ga zhes gzhon nu zhes/ /yi ge ba zhes chos sems byed/ /yi ge a ming bdag nyid che/ /ston pa'i bstan
434b4(rgyud): pa gces 'dzin byed/ /blo ldan yon tan kun gyis bkur/ /dang po'i yi ge la zhes bstan/ /rgyal po sangs rgyas pa yi phyogs/ /ston pa'i bstan pa gsal bar byed/ /
434b5(rgyud): sdom brtson yi ge a zhes bsgrags/ /bram ze las ni rab tu byung / /grong khyer gnas bcas gnas pa ste/ /de bzhin tshe ni brgyad cur 'tsho/ /dang yig yi ge a dge
434b6(rgyud): slong / /lho yi phyogs su 'byung bar 'gyur/ /blo ldan tshe ni drug cur 'tsho/ /ka shi zhes bya'i grong du gnas/ /yi ge d+ha zhes sdom brtson nyid/ /lho yi phyogs su rnam par
434b7(rgyud): bsgrags/ /pha rol rgol ba bzlog nas kyang / /de bzhin sdom brtson sngags kyang grub/ /gzhan yang rang byung dam pa ni/ /sing+ga la yi grong na gnas/ /'phags pa min
435a1(rgyud): la 'phags pa'i ming / /sing+ga la yi gling na gnas/ /pha rol rgol ba bzlog nas ni/ /mu stegs rnams kyi sngags sun phyung / /de dus 'jigs
435a2(rgyud): su rung ba yi/ /dus kyi mtha' la 'byung bar 'gyur/ /yi ge nga dang la dang por/ /sdom brtson gang zhig rab gsungs dang / /yi ge ra dang ba dang por/ /dge slong gang
435a3(rgyud): zhig rab byung gsungs/ /ston pa'i bstan pa gsal byed pa/ /'byung bar 'gyur bar the tshom med/ /rgyal po nag po zhes bya bar/ /yi ge ma zhes sdom brtson

435a5(rgyud): byed par 'gyur bar the tshom med/ /mtshon gyis lus zhig mtho ris 'gro/ /de nas yi ge sa dang ka /dang po dag tu brjod pa dang / /de bzhin yi ge ra dang g+ha/ /dang po
435a6(rgyud): dag tu rab brjod dang / /dang por yi ge ba dang ni/ /legs bzhin legs te sde zhes bstan/ /sbyin byed sbyin par byed pa nyid/ /gzhan gyi grub mtha' sun byed
435a7(rgyud): pa| |tshong pa sngon dang sman pa sngon/ /gnyi ga sbyin byed sna tshogs byed/ /yi ge ba zhes sdom brtson bsgrags/ /de las gzhan pa dang yi ger/ /dang po yi ge ba
435b1(rgyud): grags dang / /ston pa'i gzugs brnyan don yang byed/ /blo ldan dang por yi ge ma/ /de bzhin sdom brtson dad pa 'byung / /rnam pa du ma sdom brtson gsungs/ /de tshe mtha'

435b3(rgyud): la| |ston pa'i gzugs brnyan yid du 'ong / /phyed par 'gyur bar the tshom med/ /thams cad byang chub lung bstan te/ /de yis byang chub mchog thob 'gyur/ /de bzhin

435b5(rgyud): tshul can/ /de ni rab tu brjod par bya/ /sngags dang rgyud la mngon brtson pas/ /rgyal po'i lugs la nye bar gnas/ /de tshe mi bzad dus dag tu/ /'jig rten kun
435b6(rgyud): la 'byung bar 'gyur/ /yi ge ba zhes bram ze mchog /phyug cing rig byed pha rol phyin/ /de 'dir sa rnams ma lus par/ /rtsod pa'i phyir ni rab tu rgyu/ /mtsho gsum sa
435b7(rgyud): yi mthar thug par/ /pha rol mu stegs rtsod la dga'/ /gang phyir dang po gtso bo'i tshig /sems can rnams la phan 'dod pas/ /gzhon nus yongs su gsungs gyur

436a6(rgyud): byas/ /khro rgyal gshin rje gshed de yi/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis 'dir gsungs pa/ /sems can ma rungs rnams dang ni/ /gdul dka' 'dul bar byed pa
436a7(rgyud): dang / /phan pa'i min las bzlog don dang / /phan pa nye bar 'phel phyir dang / /sems can rnams ni rjes gzung dang / /sems can srog 'chad 'gag phyir ro/ /
436b1(rgyud): bram ze'i khye'u rmongs pa de/ /dbul ba khro ba chags pa yis/ /rgyal po'i srog la gnod pa'i phyir/ /khro ba'i sngags ni zlos par byed/ /de 'og rnam par grags pa ni//
436b2(rgyud): bram ze yi ge dang po a/ /chos don dge ba ldan bdag nyid/ /bden par smra zhing dbang po thul/ /mnga' bdag mang pos bkur ces pa/ /de tshe sngags ni zlos par 'gyur//

436b6(rgyud): dag ma lus dbang du 'gyur/ /de bzhin bram ze'i mtshan ldan pa/ /thams cad de yi dbang du 'gyur/ /de 'og rnam par grags pa ni/ /lho yi phyogs su bram ze ni/ /
436b7(rgyud): yi ge dang po ba bstan pa/ /ston pa'i bstan pa de gtsor byed/ /mchod rten kun dga' ra ba gnas/ /ston pa'i gzugs brnyan yid 'ong gis/ /sa ni rgya mtsho gnyis
437a1(rgyud): mthar thug / thams cad kyi ni rgyan du byas/ /de 'og rnam par grags pa ni/ /bram ze gtso bo nor chen ldan/ /dang po'i yi ge na zhes pa/ /lho yi phyogs

437a3(rgyud): pa| |'dul ba dang ni tshul bzang nyid/ /gang ba bcom brlag dag tu gnas/ /dang yig b+ha ni nor gyi spyan/ /rgyal po rnams kyi sngags mchod byed/ /bram ze 'di dag
