437b1(rgyud): lha rnams kyang / /nges pa'i tshig ni rab tu bsgrags/ /'thab bral lha yi bu dang ni/ /'phrul dga' gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / /rgyal po dga' ldan gsung ba dang / /'dod
437b2(rgyud): pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug mchog / gcig gi ming ni brgya byin sogs/ /de bzhin 'dod khams dbang phyug yin/ /de yang rtag tu gcig gnas te/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po
437b3(rgyud): gcig gi gzugs/ /de yang mtha' yas dag tu bstan/ /rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs 'chang lha/ /de las gong du thams cad mnyam/ /de yang thams cad rdzu 'phrul che//
437b4(rgyud): lha yi gtso bo ming gcig ste/ /'du shes med pa'i mthar yang bstan/ /de dag gtso bo med pa ste/ /mnyam pa'i tshul du yang dag gnas/ /'og tu mnar med mthar thug
437b5(rgyud): par/ /der ni rgyal po yod ma yin/ /'jam dpal/ de lta bas na/ de ltar phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus su rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la las de bzhin gshegs
437b6(rgyud): pa rnams kyi chos kyi mdzod 'di glegs bam du chud par byas te 'dri bar 'gyur/ klog par 'gyur/ kha ton du byed par 'gyur ba'am/ glegs bam du byas te 'chang bar
437b7(rgyud): 'gyur/ gus par byas te yid la byed par 'gyur/ gos rnam pa sna tshogs dang / phye ma dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / dril bu dang / rol mo dang / phreng
438a1(rgyud): ba dang / byug pa dang / spos dang / dri dang / dri zhim po dag gis mchod par byed par 'gyur/ /ri mor byed par 'gyur/ /yang dag par 'dzin par byed par 'gyur
438a2(rgyud): yid rtse gcig pa'i sems kyis chos byed par 'gyur ba de la ni/ phan yon bcu po 'di dag tu 'gyur te/ bcu gang zhe na/ der 'di la pha rol gyi dmag tshogs
438a3(rgyud): kyi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ char 'bab pa mi mkhas pa dang / gza' dang / 'ching ba chen po'i 'tshe ba 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ mi ma yin pa'i 'jigs
438a4(rgyud): pa'am/ der 'di la mi'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ phyir rgol ba thams cad kyi 'jigs pa'am/ der 'di la nad kyi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro//
438a5(rgyud): dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa'am/ der 'di la dus ma yin pa'i char gyis 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /char ches pa'i 'jigs pa'am/ der
438a6(rgyud): 'di la rlung chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /sha za thams cad kyi 'jigs pa'am/ der 'di la dgra'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi
438a7(rgyud): 'gyur/ de bzhin du g.yon can rkun po'i 'jigs pa'am/ der 'di la 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /gshin rje'i rgyal pos khyer ba'i 'jigs
438b1(rgyud): pa'am/ der 'di la chom rkun gyi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /lha thams cad dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za'i 'jigs pa'am/ der 'di la gzhan gyi sngags
438b2(rgyud): kyi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /sbyar ba'i dug thams cad kyi 'jigs pa'am/ der 'di la nad kyi 'jigs pa dang / rims dang / tshad par 'khru ba dang / ma zhu ba dang / yan
438b3(rgyud): lag dang / nyid lag gi nad kyi 'jigs par 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ phan yon bcu po 'di dag tu shes par bya'o/ /gang du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi cho ga chen po
438b4(rgyud): rab 'byams chos kyi mdzod 'di glegs bam du byas te bzhag la/ 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / mchod pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / kha ton du byed na de bzhin gshegs pa
438b5(rgyud): rnams kyis shin tu bzung zhing chos kyi mdzod mngon du 'gyur ro/ /dam tshig gi spyod pa la rjes su ma zhugs pa dang / dam tshig mi shes pa gzhan dag la ni rnam pa thams
438b6(rgyud): cad du bstan par mi bya ste/ gang gi phyir 'di ni gsang ba yin pa'i phyir te/ 'dis ni thams cad mtshon pa yin na/ sems can rnams kyi dran pa med par ma byed cig /
438b7(rgyud): 'on kyang khyod kyis shes par 'gyur/ /mchod pa byed par 'gyur/ yang dag par 'dzin par 'gyur zhing bsod nams chen po yang rab tu skye bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can
439a1(rgyud): skal ba med pa rnams la bstan par mi bya ste/ gzhan du na dbul ba dang / nad dang / mdze dang / 'tshe ba dang / 'go ba'i nad nyid byed par 'gyur
439a2(rgyud): ro| |de bas na gzhan dag la yang bstan par mi bya'o/ /dam tshig dang / gsang ba'i sngags kyi spyod pa la rjes su zhugs pa'i sems can rnams dang /
439a3(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la legs par bslab pa rnams dang / legs par rnam par bzhag pa'i dran pa dang ldan pa rnams dang / chos kyi don
439a4(rgyud): la mkhas pa dang / bsam gtan la rab tu zhugs pa dang / chos la gnas pa dang / bden par smra ba dang / sems can gyi spyod pa rab tu gnas shing snying
439a5(rgyud): rje'i spyod pa dang rab tu ldan pa rnams te/ sems can 'di dag la bstan par bya yi/ gzhan dag la ni ma yin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam
439a6(rgyud): d pal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la gtsugs te thal mo sbyar ba byas nas
439a7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci zhig bya/ 'di bdag gis ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom
439b1(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod ces bya bar yang zungs shig /ngo mtshar rmad
439b2(rgyud): du byung ba'i chos kyi man ngag legs par bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya bar yang zungs shig / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rjes su 'jug pa rgyud thams cad kyi mdzod ces
439b3(rgyud): bya bar yang zungs shig / theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa nges par bstan pa nyams pa med pa zhes bya bar zungs shig /byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod ces bya bar yang
439b4(rgyud): zungs shig / 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga zhes bya bar yang zungs shig /chos thams cad kyi don rdzogs pa nges par bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zungs shig/
439b5(rgyud): 'jig rten ma lus thams cad la/ /chos dang chos min rnam spyod cing / /byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che/ /gang khyod kun tu rnam par rgyu/ /de bzhin chos kyi dam pa
439b6(rgyud): mchog / gsang ba gzhan ni ma mthong ngo / /sngags rgyud don dang mdo rnams dang / /'gro ba yul ni skyon med pa/ /byang chub chos la rab gzhol ba/ /dpa' bo gzhan ni
439b7(rgyud): ma mthong ngo / /gang 'di bla ma gsang ba dang / /drang don mdo yis yongs su brgyan/ /rnam pa sna tshogs mdo don dang / /sngags dang rgyud kyi rjes 'jug pa/ /cho ga rab 'byams
440a1(rgyud): 'di las gzhan/ /ma byung gang yang yod ma yin/ /rgyal srid chen po longs spyod che/ /lha gnas dag tu'ang phun sum tshogs/ /de bzhin lhag
440a2(rgyud): dang mi rnams kyi/ /grags pa rgyas pa'ang thob par 'gyur/ /mi khom brgyad ni spong byed cing / /dal ba dag ni thob par byed/ /theg pa rnam gsum bdag po dang / /de des
440a3(rgyud): sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur/ /mdo 'di 'dzin pa'i bsod nams dang / /de bzhin du ni phan yon ni/ /'di yi lus la mtshon mi 'byung / /dug dang mes kyang ma
440a4(rgyud): yin no/ /ro langs dang ni gdon dang ni/ /de bzhin srul po ma mo dang / /srin mo sha zas 'tshe byed pa'ang / /gang zhig mdo 'di 'don la min/ /'chang ba dang ni klog
440a5(rgyud): pa dang / /yang dang yang du mchod byed dang / /'jigs pa med pas mchod byed dang / /rnam pa sna tshogs mchod byed de/ /phan yon 'di ni rab bstan pa/ /'jig
440a6(rgyud): rten 'dir ni thob 'gyur ba/ /nad pa rnams ni nad las grol/ /sdug bsngal can ni bde bar 'gyur/ /dbul pos nor ni rnyed 'gyur te/ /bcings pa rnams ni
440a7(rgyud): 'ching las grol/ /'gro ba lnga dang ldan pa yi/ /'khor ba'i sdug bsngal ltung ba rnams/ /bde ba zhi ba mya ngan 'das/ /mi g.yo go 'phang 'thob par 'gyur/ /rang
440b1(rgyud): rgyal sangs rgyas nyid dang ni/ /nyan thos mthar ni phyin par 'gyur/ /mdo sde 'di ni bklag pa yis/ /sangs rgyas sku mdog thob par 'gyur/ /gang+gA'i bye ma mnyam pa
440b2(rgyud): yis/ /rgyal ba mchog ni mtha' yas par/ /mchod pas thob pa'i bsod nams dang / /mdo 'di bton pa'i bsod nams mnyam/ /'jig rten ji snyed gang su dag /
440b3(rgyud): zhing ni bye ba mtha' yas pa/ /de srid phra rab rdul snyed kyi/ /sangs rgyas rnams la rtag mchod pa/ /rnam pa sna tshogs bza' btung dang / /na ba rnams kyi gsos sman dang //
440b4(rgyud): rnam pa sna tshogs gnas mal rnams/ /rtag tu thams cad rab sbyin dang / /rnam pa sna tshogs gos dang ni/ /phye ma dag ni kun gyis kyang / /bsod nams skye bos thob
440b5(rgyud): gang yin/ /'di dag 'chang dang klog pas so/ /gang zhig rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / /'jig rten nyan thos rdzu 'phrul che/ /byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid che/ /sa
440b6(rgyud): bcu la gnas de las gzhan/ /de rnams tshad ni de mnyam la/ /de dag mchod pa'ang de bzhin te/ /gang gi lag par glegs bam chung / /mi yis de mnyam bsod nams
440b7(rgyud): thob/ /'jig rten ji snyed bstan pa yang / /'jig rten khams na gnas pa yi/ /grangs med sems can ma lus pa/ /thams cad nad ni med byas te/ /skye bo gang zhig yang
441a1(rgyud): dang yang / /bkur stir byas nas de mchod pa/ /chos mchog 'di la mchod na ni/ /blo ldan de yis bsod nams thob/ /bskal pa bye ba
441a2(rgyud): mtha' yas par/ /rgyal ba mchog gis rtag par yang / /'jig rten mgon chos mdzod mchog 'di/ /mchod par yang ni nus so/ /chos mchog 'di ni sa steng
441a3(rgyud): du| |yid bzhin nor bu rin chen 'dra/ /'jam pa'i cho ga 'dir gsungs pa/ /bklags pa dang ni 'chang ba yis/ /des ni 'dod 'jo'i pa 'drar 'gyur/ /longs spyod
441a4(rgyud): tshe nor phun sum tshogs/ /yid ni skyo ba med byas nas/ /sa steng 'di ni rab tu sgrub/ /sngags dang rgyud don drang ba'i don/ /don yod tshig ni rab bshad pa/ /bya ba dus
441a5(rgyud): la brten nas ni/ /sa steng rig pa 'dzin bsgrub na/ /rin chen phun tshogs rab gang ba/ /de yi phyogs kun dag tu gsungs/ /'bras bcas 'gro ba'i bdag nyid
441a6(rgyud): che| |spyod par bzang bar brjod pa yin/ /gang zhig cho ga mchog 'di las/ /rgyal po sngags gcig 'chang byed pa/ /rgyal srid phun tshogs 'dod bcas te//
441a7(rgyud): tshe ring phun sum tshogs par 'gyur/ /rnam pa sna tshogs longs spyod tshogs/ /rgyal mchog dam pas thob par 'gyur/ /'gro dang gnas pa'i dug dag
441b1(rgyud): dang / /gzhan gyis byas pa'i rig pa dang / /ro langs sngags kyis sgrub pa dang / /mtshon gyis kyang ni gnod mi 'gyur/ /gzhan gyi gnod byed gtsor byed pas/ /sa steng
441b2(rgyud): 'jig rten gnod mi byed/ /chom rkun nad ni gzhan dag dang / /me yi 'jigs pa de la med/ /rgyal po skye bo dag kyang rung / /su zhig de la mchod mi byed/ /gang zhig
441b3(rgyud): mdo sde dkon mchog 'di/ /'chang dang klog pa'ang de bzhin no/ /rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas/ /dbang bskur yul du nyer gnas tshe/ /mdo sde mgo la nges bcings
441b4(rgyud): nas/ /yang dang yang du phyag btsal na/ /de la rkun pos mi gnod cing / /mtshon gyis de la phog mi 'gyur/ /gzhon nu'i gzugs su yang dag byung / /rma bya'i gdan
441b5(rgyud): la legs bkod pa/ /glang po'i mtshog ma'i steng bzhag nas/ /g.yul du yang dag zhugs byas na/ /skye bo rnam sdang de dag kun/ /mthong ba tsam gyis ldog par
441b6(rgyud): byed/ /byis pa'i gzugs can bzang po ni/ /gzhon nu'i rgyan gyis yongs su brgyan/ /gser dang dngul dang ra gan gyis/ /rgyal mtshan yu ba bsgreng ba la/ /rgyal mtshan
441b7(rgyud): ba dan btags nas ni/ /legs dgod legs par mnyam par gzhag /g.yul du dgras ni legs gang ba/ /mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs byed pa/ /thams cad g.yul
442a1(rgyud): du 'dus pa la/ /de yi tshen 'jug par bya/ /rgyal mtshan sgreng la gnas pa yi/ /gzhon nu las ni sna tshogs pa/ /rnam pa du ma'i gzugs
442a2(rgyud): dang ldan/ /bdag nyid chen po 'jam pa'i dbyangs/ /sa bcu'i bdag po'i bdag po ni/ /mthong ba tsam gyis 'jig par byed/ /rgyal rigs rgyal po chen po ni/ /
442a3(rgyud): 'jig rten sa srungs gnas pa/ /dang ldan yid gnyis the tshom ni/ /rnam bral chos la mnyes gshin pa/ /bde bar gshegs la dad bskyed nas/ /snying rjes brlan
442a4(rgyud): pa'i yid kyis ni/ /'dir bshad 'di dag bya ba ni/ /grub par 'dod pas rab tu bya/ /cho ga'i sbyor ba'i sngags dang ni/ /rgyud dang ldan pas sa steng du/ /chos dbyings
442a5(rgyud): tshogs pa'i rgyal ba yis/ /gsung rab 'di ga nges par bstan/ /chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam gnas pa'i/ /rgyal mchog snga ma grangs med pas/ /sa yi steng
442a6(rgyud): gi mi rnams la'ang / /chos kyi mdzod ni gsungs pa yin/ /lha dang lha min sngon g.yul 'thab/ /pha rol 'jigs pa byung ba na/ /gang tshe brgya byin sngon gyur pa//
442a7(rgyud): dpung ni pham byas zhes sdang bas/ /de tshe gcig tu song nas ni/ /sa steng rnam par du bar gyur/ /rgyal mchog 'od srung de la ni/ /thub pa mchog la de tshe zhus/ /ji ltar
442b1(rgyud): bya zhes tshig tu ni/ /bde sogs bdag pos rnam par smras/ /mi bzad lha min gyis pham nas/ /bdag kyang 'dir ni yang dag lhags/ /de skad bcom ldan gsol na sa
442b2(rgyud): ni| |lha yi dbang po brgya byin gyis/ /de che thub mchog zhabs gnyis la/ /spyi bo'i gtsug gis rab btud nas/ /mig stong ko'u shi ka ni/ /de yi spyan sngar 'dug par
442b3(rgyud): gyur/ /de skad gsol nas thub mchog ni/ /bram zer gyur pa 'od srung gis/ /de che gsung du bka' stsal pa/ /ka la ping+ka'i sgra skad du/ /rgyal ba mchog gis sngon
442b4(rgyud): gsungs pa/ /gzhon nu sna tshogs yang dag 'byung / /bdag nyid chen po 'jam dpal ni/ /rnyed dka' sku ni 'bum gyur pa/ /yang dag mtha' la gnas nas ni/ /zab
442b5(rgyud): mo'i don gyi don ston byed/ /spros med rnam pa med pa dang / /gnas med pa la gzugs byas nas/ /shin tu don ldan chos kyang ston/ /lha yi dbang phyug de ni dran/ /de nas
442b6(rgyud): de ni da dran pas/ /byang chub sems dpa' dran tsam gyis/ /gzhon nu sna tshogs gzugs can ni/ /der ni de yi mod la lhags/ /der ni bcom ldan 'das dang ni/ /bcom
442b7(rgyud): ldan lha yi dbang phyug bcas/ /lhags nas byang chub sems dpa' des/ /de tshe rgyal ba mchog la btud/ /rgyal ba mchog kun phyag 'tshal nas/ /'od chen 'od srung
443a1(rgyud): la yang btud/ /de tshe thub pas rjes gnang nas/ /sngags kyi tshig ni 'di smras so/ /namaHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwe b+h+yaHa pra ti ha ta shA sa ne b+h+yaH/
443a2(rgyud): oM ha na ha na/ sarba b+ha yod A da ya trA sA ya/ mo Ta ya/ tshin+d+ha/ b+hin+d+ha/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal
443a3(rgyud): gzhon nur gyur pas sngags 'di smras ma thag tu sa chen po 'di ri dang rgya mtsho'i mthar thug pa dang bcas pa rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
443a4(rgyud): 'das thams cad kyi zhing mtha' yas pa 'jig rten gyi khams kyi phyogs kyi mthar thug pa thams cad dang bcas pa yang rab tu 'gul bar gyur to/ /sangs rgyas
443a5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis kyang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag byin gyis brlabs so/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'jigs pa dang bral nas ba spu langs
443a6(rgyud): te ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba thob nas/ mig gnyis phye ste stan las langs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la btud nas lan gsum bskor ba byas
443a7(rgyud): s hing 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la mngon du bltas nas sngags kyi tshig de dag gzungs ste yid la byas nas phyir yang shing rta la zhon te lha ma yin gang
443b1(rgyud): yin pa de logs su phyin par gyur to/ /de nas lha ma yin thams cad rgya mtsho chen po'i mtha'i 'gram du gang rang gi grong khyer gang yin pa der mngon du phyogs shing
443b2(rgyud): song bar gyur te/ sems zhum zhing nyams la dpung gi 'jigs pas sems dkrugs shing gdong gi mdog nyams shing nga rgyal dang / dregs pa la sogs pa dang
443b3(rgyud): bral bar gyur la/ mtshon cha dang bral zhing ri 'bigs byed 'bar ba bzhin du lha'i dbang phyug de mthong nas byer bar gyur to/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis
443b4(rgyud): sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams la smras pa/ grogs po dag /ma 'jigs shig /ma 'jigs shig /sangs rgyas kyi mthus lha ma yin las bdag cag nges par
443b5(rgyud): rgyal bas rang gi gnas su 'gro bar bya'o/ /rang rang gi gnas ji lta ba bzhin du song nas khyed cag rtse ba dang / dga' ba yongs su spyod par gyis shig /de nas lha
443b6(rgyud): de dag thams cad yid shin tu dga' nas phyir yang rang gi gnas su log par gyur ro/ /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/
443b7(rgyud): gang bdag gis gzhon nu'i gzugs can gyi gzugs brnyan gyi rnam pa de byas la rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la'ang btags na/ des na gong gi lha ma yin gyi 'jigs pa mi
444a1(rgyud): 'byung ngo zhes bstan to/ /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis chen po la 'os pa'i nor bu rin po che nang 'od dang ldan zhing gsal
444a2(rgyud): ba'i phreng ba blangs nas gzhon nu'i cha byad kyi gzugs brnyan byas te/ steng gi khang bzangs su grong khyer chen po blta na sdug pa'i dbus na lha rnams kyi mdun sa chos
444a3(rgyud): bzang gi rtse mor rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba legs par bkod pa byas nas bzhag par gyur to/ /de nas lha ma yin de dag rab tshim byed dang / thag bzangs ris la
444a4(rgyud): sogs lha rnams kyi steng du mi 'gro zhing lha de dag kyang zil gyis gnon par mi 'gyur la/ rdzu 'phrul las rnam par 'phrul pa'am/ /g.yul mngon du phyogs
444a5(rgyud): par 'gro bar mi nus so/ /de ltar lo bye ba khri phrag du ma mi ma yin pa'i grangs kyis bgrang bar yang lha ma yin gyi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin
444a6(rgyud): du phan yon dpag tu med pa bstan pa dang / tshe dang / nad med pa 'phel bar/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
444a7(rgyud): pos kyang sngon du gsungs pa yin no/ /de bzhin du phan yon gyi yon tan mchog 'di dag rgya che ba dang / mtha' yas shing mu med pa sngon gsungs pa yin no/
444b1(rgyud): gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spangs sam/ /rnam par rtog par byed na bsod nams ma yin pa dpag tu med par 'phel bar 'gyur zhing dmyal bar yang skye bar
444b2(rgyud): 'gyur la/ dud 'gro dang / yi dwags dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi skye ba ngan par yang 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /sman dang / sngags rnams med do/ /byang chub sems dpa'
444b3(rgyud): med do/ /de rnams bdag nyid chen po rdzu 'phrul che ba dang / rnam par 'phrul pa yang med do/ /cho ga rgya che ba yang med do/ /'phags pa ma yin pas bshad do zhes
444b4(rgyud): byas nas spong ba'am/ yang na 'gro zhing 'di nyan par mi nus so zhes gnas de las gzhan du 'gro na de dag la bsod nams ma yin pa chen po 'byung bar 'gyur
444b5(rgyud): ro| |ci ste blo chung ba gang gis chos 'di ni thub pa mchog dang / thub pa'i sras blo dang ldan pa ma yin no/ /zhes rab tu spong bar byed do/ /mi de dmyal
444b6(rgyud): bar 'gro 'gyur zhing / /de nyams nas ni dud 'gror 'gro/ /thig nag dang ni yang sos dang / /spu gri so dang me ma mur/ /ro myags chu bo rab med skye/ /de nas phyir
444b7(rgyud): yang spu gri sor/ /lo ma ral gri lta bu'i nags/ /yang na kyi hud zer de bzhin/ /'jig rten grags pa so thams thams/ /sdig pa'i las kyi dmyal ba ru/ /gang gis
445a1(rgyud): chos ni sun byed pa/ /des ni skye bo de dag 'gro/ /'jig rten smad par rab bstan pa/ /mi bzad mnar med pa zhes bya/ /ma dad sems kyis
445a2(rgyud): chos spangs pa/ /sdig pa'i las can gnas yin te/ /gang zhig chos ni 'di 'jigs pa/ /de la skye bo de 'tshed 'gyur/ /kun gyi mthar thug mnar med pa/ /de nyams
445a3(rgyud): de bzhin dmyal chen skye/ /dmyal ba'i sa mtha' mtha' yas par/ /rtag tu blo med de ni 'gro/ /mdo sde de ni rgya cher bcas/ /chos kyi nor kun rab spangs nas/ /de
445a4(rgyud): nas 'jig rten ngan par 'gro/ /dbang med rtag par dbang du 'gro/ /gang zhig mdo sde'i cho ga 'di/ /sngags dang rgyud kyis legs par brgyan/ /grub pa sna tshogs
445a5(rgyud): brgya rnams 'thob/ /yang dag mtha' ni sgrib pa med/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi sku nyid yin/ /dmigs su med pa'i ngo bo nyid/ /cho ga cho ga rgya chen bcas/ /le'u
445a6(rgyud): rab 'byams 'dis 'dren byed/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs ni legs dgod pa/ /phun tshogs dpal dang blo gros mchod/ /rtsa ba'i cho ga mi nyung ba/ /rgya che mang por
445a7(rgyud): bstan pa yin/ /rtag dang chad dang thog mtha' ni/ /gnyi ga'i mtha' don rnam par spangs/ /rim bcas rim ni nges par bstan/ /sngags kyi lus ni btus pa
445b1(rgyud): yin/ /me dang rlung dang nam mkha' dang / /stong pa'i de nyid legs gsungs pa/ /spangs pa rtag tu 'gro ba ni/ /'og nas 'og tu de che 'gro/ /bskal pa rnams mang gsum gyi
445b2(rgyud): grangs/ /de tshe bsod nams yongs bsags nas/ /de tshe byang chub thob nas ni/ /bdag dang rgyal ba mchog rnams kyis/ /sngags dang rgyud kyi don gsungs pa/ /'gro ba yul
445b3(rgyud): ni sdig med pa'o/ /rtsa ba'i cho ga dag byed dang / /sdig pa med cing bkra shis pa'i/ /le'u rab 'byams rab gsungs pa/ /nges pa'i mdo sde bzang po yin/ /sa bdag
445b4(rgyud): yon tan bdag nyid che/ /yul dang dus kyi sbyor ba dang / /rgyal sras mi ru skyes pa yis/ /sa steng dam pa'i chos bstan ces/ /'jig rten gtso bo thub pa ni/ /rgyal ba bdun
445b5(rgyud): pas bstan pa yin/ /cho ga rgya cher gsungs pa ni/ /blo dang dpal ni mngon par 'phel/ /rtsa ba rab 'byams le'u zhes/ /sngags dang rgyud dang ldan pa de/ /gang zhig mdo
445b6(rgyud): mchog gtso bo 'di/ /rgyal bas mchod pa'i chos kyi mdzod/ /sa steng mis ni spong byed pa/ /de ni mnar med dmyal bar 'gro/ /bskal pa chen por de 'tshed ces/ /
445b7(rgyud): rnam pa du mar dbye bar bstan/ /nam zhig gang du 'byung ba ni/ /mi yi lus su skyes na yang / /dbul zhing nad mang glen pa dang / /kla klo dag tu skye bar 'gyur/ /'jig
446a1(rgyud): rten smad par 'gro ba ste/ /de ni mdze can nad par 'gyur/ /lkugs shing 'on pa yan lag nyams/ /blo nyams long ba nyid dang ni/ /rtsub cing rtag tu
446a2(rgyud): 'jig pa'i gzugs/ /sa steng yi dwags lta bur snang / /gros ngan sems ni zhan pa dang / /sen mo dang ni lus kyang ngan/ /srin bu rnams kyis zos pa dang / /shu ba
446a3(rgyud): g.yan par yang dag ldan/ /mdo sde 'di ni rab spangs na/ /gang dang gang gi 'gro bar 'gro/ /de dang der ni skye ba na/ /blo ngan rmongs par skye bar 'gyur/ /de nas byang
446a4(rgyud): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha
446a5(rgyud): ngas la btsugs te mig phye zhing mi 'dzum pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang na gnas pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang / 'byung po'i tshogs
446a6(rgyud): du ma chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dus pa shes nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ji tsam du chos kyi rnam grangs
446a7(rgyud): 'di ni ngo mtshar te mchog tu legs par gsungs pa lags na/ de la/ bcom ldan 'das/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sems can mi rigs pa'i chags pas zil
446b1(rgyud): gyis non pa/ slu bar byed pa/ nga rgyal can/ ma dad pa/ gya gyu can/ dum rgod/ tshul khrims 'chal ba dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag sngags rnams kyi rtog pa'i bdag
446b2(rgyud): nyid chen po rgyas pa grub pa dang / dus dang / yul dang / nges par sdom pa dang / sngags dang / spyod pa dang / sbyin sreg dang / bzlas pa nges par sdom pa dang / chog rab
446b3(rgyud): 'byams dag la ma dad par 'gyur/ yid mi byed par 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi bka' ma yin no zhes byas nas spang bar 'gyur te/ de dag nyon mongs pa'i sems
446b4(rgyud): su gyur nas dus byed par 'gyur zhing / sdug bsngal drag cing tsha ba'i tshor pa myong zhing de dag dmyal ba chen por skye bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sdug bsngal ba'i
446b5(rgyud): sems can de dag la ji ltar bsgrub par bya/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal
446b6(rgyud): gzhon nur gyur pa la spyi bor byugs nas bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ khyod sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir rab tu zhugs pa khyod kyang legs so/ /legs
446b7(rgyud): so| |'jam dpal gzhon nu gyur pa/ khyed de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di yongs su zhu bar sems pa de khyed yang legs so/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa/ de'i
447a1(rgyud): phyir legs par shin tu rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang / sems can thams cad kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir
447a2(rgyud): zhugs pa dang / lha dang / mi rnams dang / 'jig rten la rab tu brtse ba'i phyir ngas khyod la bshad do/ /spyod pa thams cad la zhugs pa dang / byang chub kyi lam
447a3(rgyud): dang / thams cad shes pa dang / chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa dang / 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi skul gnas par 'dod pa rnams kyis rig pa'i rgyal po
447a4(rgyud): mchog tu gsang ba/ gzhon nu khyod kyi rtsa ba'i cho ga'i le'u rab 'byams 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe yang 'di dran par bya'o/ /de gang zhe na/ na mo stai ya d+h+ya ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/
447a5(rgyud): ar+ha te b+h+yaH/ samyak+saM bud+d+he b+h+yaH/ oM ku mA ra rlu pi Ne/ bi shwa saM b+ha ba/ A gats+tsha A gats+tsha/ la hu la hu/ b+h+rUM b+h+rUM/ dzi na dzi ka/ many+dzu shri ye/ su shrI ye/ tA ra ya mAM/
447a6(rgyud): sarba duHkhe b+h+yaHphaT phaT/ sha ma ya/ sha ma ya/ a mr-i tong b+ha ba/ pA paM me nA sha ya swAhA/ 'jam dpal/ 'di ni khyod kyi snying po dam pa yin te/ zhi ba thams
447a7(rgyud): cad byed pa/ sdig pa thams cad zad par byed pa/ sdug bsngal thams cad las rab tu grol bar byed pa/ tshe dang / nad med pa dang / dbang phyug dang / skal pa
447b1(rgyud): bzang po mchog dang / ngag gi dbang phyug skyed par byed pa/ rig pa'i rgyal po thams cad gzengs bstod par byed pa/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas 'di
447b2(rgyud): gsungs ma thag tu sa chen po ri dang / rgya mtsho dang bcas pa/ sems can dang snod nye ba'i mthar thug pa rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos par gyur to/ /'gro ba thams cad
447b3(rgyud): de yi dwags kyi 'gro ba dang / dud 'gro dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / dmyal ba'i sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rab tu sbyangs shing bde ba rnams kyang
447b4(rgyud): rab tu thob par 'gyur la/ 'jam dpal/ rig pa'i rgyal po 'di yang yid la byed cing de'i tshe dam pa'i chos spong ba'i sems kyang med par 'gyur na bdud sdig to can
447b5(rgyud): gyis kyang glags rnyed par mi 'gyur la/ bgegs dang / log 'dren thams cad kyang 'byer bar 'gyur ro/ /'di ltar yang sems bskyed par bya ste/ sangs rgyas bcom
447b6(rgyud): ldan 'das kyi sangs rgyas dang / chos ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ bsam pa'am/ gzhal ba'am/ spong ba ni bdag cag gis ci zhig nus te/ sangs rgyas bcom
447b7(rgyud): ldan 'das nyid kyis mkhyen par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i
448a1(rgyud): mdo las/ phan yon dang / nyes dmigs kyi nus par ba 'byams bstan pa'i le'u sum cu drug pa rdzogs so// //bcom
448a2(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / gnas
448a3(rgyud): gtsang ma'i steng na gnas pa'i lha'i bu'i tshogs rnams dang / sems can bye ba khri phrag brgya stong du ma dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang /
448a4(rgyud): lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / grub pa dang / rig 'dzin dang / drang srong mchog dam pa du ma dang / 'jam dpal
448a5(rgyud): gzhon nur gyur pa dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byams pa dang / mthu chen thob dang / mthu chen gnas dang / phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa byang chub
448a6(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa dang / chos kyi dbyings mtha' yas pa na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas
448a7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi 'khor dang bcas pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i ngo bo dang 'dra bar bzhugs pa'i sangs
448b1(rgyud): rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams thugs rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/
448b2(rgyud): 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i rgyud rdzogs so// //dpal lha btsan po lha btsun pa byang chub 'od kyi bkas/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po dge bsnyen chen po
448b3(rgyud): ku mA ra ka la sha dang / sgra bsgyur gyi lots+tsha ba dge slong shAkya blo gros kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //rgya gar skad du/ sid+d+ha e ka bI ra mahA
448b4(rgyud): tan+t+ra ra dza nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpa' bo gcig pu grub pa zhes bya ba rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal
448b5(rgyud): bo gcig grub dpa' bo'i gtso/ /rab mchog smra ba rnams kyi mchog /'gro ba'i bla ma 'jam rdo rjes/ /'jig rten don du rgyud rab gsungs/ /lha nyid gsang sngags tshul
448b6(rgyud): gyis ni/ /dngos grub thams cad stsol mdzad pa/ /sngags pas de nyid bsgoms nas ni/ /de grub na ni de 'grub 'gyur/ /sngags pa lus ni rnam dag dang / /gang tshe dngos
448b7(rgyud): grub phra mo 'grub/ /snod du gyur pa'i lus la ni/ /dngos grub chen po rab tu skye/ /rim pa 'di yis 'di la ni/ /sa la sogs pa 'thob pa skye/ /sngags pas yid bzhin
449a1(rgyud): nor bu ltar/ /rtag tu sems can don byed do/ /de ltar mkhyen nas thugs brtses non/ /rdo rjes 'chang sogs kyis zhus tshe/ /grub pa'i gsang
449a2(rgyud): sngags bsdus pa ni/ /'gro ba'i don du gsungs pa yin/ /oM kA lu me lu kA lu me stam+b+ha ya shi lA baR+ShaM tu ShA rany+tsa luts+tsha i luts+tsha i swAhA/ gsang sngags kyi rgyal po
449a3(rgyud): 'di legs par bzlas na ser ba gcod par byed do/ /dran pa nyid dang / thal ba la mngon par bzlas na ser ba 'bab pa'am/ kha ba 'bab pa gcod par 'gyur zhing
449a4(rgyud): gang du 'dod pa der 'gro'o/ /de bzhin du glog dang / rlung dang / rdo rje dang / thog 'bab pa la sogs pa med par byed do/ /oM ga ru Da haM sa he/ tsa la tsa la swAhA/ sngags
449a5(rgyud): kyi rgyal po 'di dran pa nyid na ser ba 'bab pa zlog par byed do/ /rdo rgyus kyis rnga pa Ta ha la bris shing rnga lcags la mngon par bzlas pa'i rnga pa Ta ha'i sgras ser ba zlog
449a6(rgyud): par byed do/ /de bzhin du dung la sogs pa'i sgras kyang bya'o/ /oM he he/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ d+hA ra ya d+hA ra ya/ ni run+d+ha ni run+d+ha/ de ba da ta ur+N+Na ma Ni swAhA/ gsang sngags
449a7(rgyud): kyi rgyal po 'di sngon du bsnyen pa'i tshogs 'bum phrag gcig yongs su bzlas na 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /glog dang / rlung dang / rdo rje dang / thog 'bang
449b1(rgyud): pa'am| kha ba la sogs pa dran pa tsam nyid kyis zlog par byed do/ /char ches pa la thal pa dang / yungs kar la mngon par bzlas na char ches pa gcod pa
449b2(rgyud): dang / byi ba dang / sbrang ma la sogs pa'i mchu 'ching bar byed do/ /skyed mos tshal lam/ zhing la bya dang / 'bu srin dang / byi ba rnams kyis nye bar 'tshe ba zlog par
449b3(rgyud): byed do/ /dur khrod kyi ras la ming dang bcas pa'i sngags bris la spra tshil gyis gtums te dur khrod kyi bum par bcug nas kha bcad de de nyid du sbas pas mngal
449b4(rgyud): rengs par byed do/ /phyung nas 'o ma dang / chus bkrus te chur bor bas zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /yung ba'am/ ba blas gro ga'am/ gos sam/ lo ma la mngon par bris te
449b5(rgyud): s pra tshil gyi nang du gtums pa'i sngags 'di grog mkhar gyis las 'jigs byed kyi gzugs su byas pa de'i snying gar bcug ste thal bas bkang nas sbas na rgol
449b6(rgyud): pa dang / phyir rgol pa'i kha rengs par byed do/ /rtsod sbyong byed pa na gzugs de nyid kyi lce la lan bdun mngon par sngags pa'i tsher ma bdun gyis btsugs na kha
449b7(rgyud): 'ching ba byed par 'gyur ro/ /rdo rgyus kyis khams phor la bris te thal bas bkang la kha sbyar du byas te sbas na ni mi snyan par smra ba'i kha rengs par byed do/ /rdza mkhan gyi lag
450a1(rgyud): pa phyis nas 'jim pa las lug gi gzugs byas pa'i snying gar spra tshil gyis gtums pa'i sngags bcug na khros pa'i kha rengs par byed do/ /ske'am
450a2(rgyud): dpung pa la btags na g.yul ngogs kyi mtshon cha'i dpal zhi bar byed do/ /grog mkhar gyi 'jim pa las byas pa'i tshogs kyi bdag po'i rkang pa'i mthil du sngags
450a3(rgyud): kyi rgyal po bcug ste bzhi mdor sbas na 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba thams cad rengs par byed cing brtags pa byed pa thams cad rengs par byed do/ /gro ga'am/ gos la
450a4(rgyud): s ngags kyi rgyal po 'di bris la spra tshil gyis gtums te de nyid kyi khong par bcug la bum pa sar pa chus bkang ba'i nang du bcug na yongs su brtag pa rengs par
450a5(rgyud): byed do/ /bla gos kyi mtha' ma la sngags rjes su dran zhing mdud pa bcings pas lam du rkun po la sogs pa rengs par byed cing nags kyi ba men la sogs pa rwa
450a6(rgyud): can rnams dang / mche ba can rnams rengs par byed do/ /gyo mol lan bdun bzlas te chur bcug na chu gnas pa rnams kha bcings par byed do/ /dur khrod kyi ras
450a7(rgyud): l a pha rol gyi dpung gi tshogs kyi gtso bo'i ming smos pa'i sngags sna tshogs rdo rje'i dbus su bris pa sna tshogs rdo rje'i phyi rol du yi ge laM brgyad bris shing phyi rol
450b1(rgyud): dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa bris te/ phyogs rdo rjes brgyan pa'i spra tshil las byas pa'i tshogs kyi bdag po'i khong par bcug pa'i sngags pha rol gyi dpung
450b2(rgyud): gi tshogs kyi sa mtshams su bcug na dpung gi tshogs rengs par byed do/ /sngags oM gnyis kyi kha sbyor du bcug la yi ge tha zung gis yongs su bskor ba'i phyi rol
450b3(rgyud): du yi ge laM brgyad kyis bskor ba dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor gyis non pa/ sna tshogs rdo rjes nye bar mdzes par byas pa/ grog mkhar gyi 'jim pa las byas pa'i
450b4(rgyud): tshogs kyi bdag po'i khong par bcug nas dur khrod kyi bum pa'i nang du bcug ste dur khrod du sbas pa'am/ phub ma'i sbyin sreg gis pha rol gyi dpung gi tshogs rengs
450b5(rgyud): par byed do/ /grong khyer tshig pa'i me la mngon du phyogs shing sngags 'dis mngon par sngags ba'i chu snyim pa bdun rab tu gtor na khyim gang bsrung bar 'dod pa'i
450b6(rgyud): khyim de srung bar byed do/ /thal bas mgul ba bcings pas skyugs pa zlog par byed do/ /mthe'u chung gi rtse dam du btsir la sngags brjod pas skyigs bu med par
450b7(rgyud): byed do/ /thal ba mngon par sngags pas mig rengs pa sos par byed do/ /'brum bu la sogs pa rnam par 'tshe ba la byang bu la bris te khyim gang gi sgor btags
451a1(rgyud): pa'i khyim der 'brum bu la sogs pa'i rnam par 'tshe ba zlog par byed do/ /nya dang / sha dang / chang dang / 'bras chan la sogs pa sbyin
451a2(rgyud): par 'gyur ba las grong gi phyi rol gyi char gtor ma chen po gtang bar bya ba'am/ yam shing lnga dang / 'bru lnga'i bye brag mar la btags pas grong gi dbus su
451a3(rgyud): zhi ba'i thab khung du byas la sbyin sreg byas na bdud dang / rnam par 'tshe ba thams cad rengs par byed do/ /gang 'ga' zhig la grong la sogs pa 'byin par
451a4(rgyud): 'gyur ba la bzlas pa tsam gyis zlog par byed do/ /rtag tu bzlas na lha dang / lha ma yin dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mi mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /dpal rje btsun
451a5(rgyud): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mngon par byang chub pa'i dus su/ bdud bzhi las rgyal bar bya ba'i phyir sngags kyi rgyal po 'di mdzod spu las rnam par phyung
451a6(rgyud): ba'i mdzod spu'i nor bu zhes bya bar rab tu grags pa yin no/ /gseg ma la mngon par sngags te gtor bas sbrul dag 'byer bar byed do/ /khyim gyi rtsig ngos la
451a7(rgyud): rdo rgyus la mngon par sngags pas bris na sbrul gyi zil gyis non par mi 'gyur ro/ /yang sngags rdo leb la gzong bus brkos te bris pa sbas na ri dwags dang /
451b1(rgyud): sbrul gdug pa rnams khyim mam/ grong ngam/ grong khyer du ji srid 'dod kyi bar du mche ba 'ching bar byed do/ /phyung bas grol bar 'gyur ro/ /sngags 'di ma bsgrubs su zin na
451b2(rgyud): yang las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /gseg ma la sogs pa la yongs su bzlas te gtor na mche ba can thams cad kyi mche ba 'ching bar byed do/ /de dbang chen gyi
451b3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyis khyab pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje'i dbus su bsgrub par bya ba'i ming dang bcas pa'i sngags thams cad bri bar bya'o/ /dur khrod kyi ro bsregs pa'i shing gi
451b4(rgyud): phur bu la lan bdun mngon par sngags pa'i sgo'i steng du sbas na skyed kyis 'tsho ba thams cad kyi skyed med par byed do/ /phyung bas grol bar 'gyur ro/ /oM ni hi ni ts+tsha
451b5(rgyud): le a b+ha ya b+ha yaM ka ri/ e lu be lu tsu le lu/ shi lA ya Da i dza ha ye/ paT+Ta i dzaT+Ta/ e pe lu A ga sa pa the ke ra te/ i a tum+b+ha ri khi n+ni khi l+la mo hi ni thi b+hi dza kA raM dza
451b6(rgyud): hi thA kA ro Ni hi ThaHThaHswAhA/ sngags kyi rgyal po 'dis sdar smos pa'i las rnams ma bsgrubs su zin kyang byed par 'gyur ro/ /de las gzhan pa mngon par 'dod
451b7(rgyud): pa'i las thams cad byed pa the tshom med do/ /lan tsha dang / ske tshe'i sbyin sreg gam/ phub ma'i sbyin sreg gis pha rol gyi dpung gi tshogs rnams 'byer bar byed do/ /
452a1(rgyud): oM am+sha sim+sha ka s+yA su dzo me phe Da e du s+yA su swAhA/ zhes 'byung ngo / /oM aM bA shim+b+ha kap+pa su dzo me phi dup+pA su/ sngags kyi rgyal po 'di ma bsgrub
452a2(rgyud): su zin kyang rtag tu bzlas na 'jigs pa thams cad zlog par byed do/ /rdo rje chu'i thig les dgra bo thams cad rmongs par byed cing khro ba rab tu dang bar byed do/ /bcings
452a3(rgyud): pa la bzlas na bcings pa grol bar byed do/ /phongs par gyur pas bzlas na rnyed pa 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /e Sho na thi to/ hu lu hu dz+wA lA dzi twe/ oM Shot+thi to hu lu hu lu/ dzA
452a4(rgyud): lA dzi hwa twe hu lu ru trai ba pra ti rAts+tsha tu hu lu swAhA/ hu lu hu lu ya trai bot+thi to hu lu ta trai ba pra ti gats+tshan+tu hu lu hu lu swA hA/ sngags kyi rgyal po 'dis 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo
452a5(rgyud): dang / rnam par rtsod pa thams cad la bzlas pa byas na zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /phub ma'i sbyin sreg gis kyang thams cad du zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /ji ltar rnyed pa'i me tog
452a6(rgyud): la sngags bzlas te chu la bskur na thams cad du zhi bar 'gyur zhing rnam par rgyal ba thob par the tshom med do/ /grong khyer tshig pa'i me la mngon par phyogs te
452a7(rgyud): ' dug la mngon par sngags pa'i chu snyim pa bdun gtor na khyim gang bsrung bar 'dod pa'i khyim de srung bar byed cing mes tshig pa'i me'i kha las thar bar byed
452b1(rgyud): do| |rkang gnyis dang / rkang bzhi'i mche ba la phub ma'i sbyin sreg gis zhi bar byed do/ /oM pad+me pad+ma a k+She pad+ma su b+ha ge phuH/ sngags kyi rgyal po 'di thal ba la bzlas te bskus
452b2(rgyud): pas mig brgya btab pa rengs pa sos par 'gyur ro/ /byabs pas mig rengs pa sos par byed do/ /lan bdun mngon par sngags pa'i mig gis khros pa mthong
452b3(rgyud): ma thag tu rab tu dang bar byed do/ /lan bdun mngon par sngags pa'i chus gdong bkrus na/ skye bo thams cad dga' bar byed do/ /rtsig pa la ming smos pa'i sngags rdo
452b4(rgyud): rgyus kyis bris na mig gi nad thams cad 'joms par byed do/ /dben par 'dug ste sems rtse gcig pas skyes bu'i mig gnyis la mngon par bsngags pa byas na
452b5(rgyud): gang gi tshe g.yon pa 'gul bar gyur bde'i tshe bsam pa'i dgos pa 'grub par ston pa yin no/ /g.yas pa 'gul bar byed na mi dge ba'i dgos pa ston par byed
452b6(rgyud): do| |oM mo tsa ni mo tsa ya/ mok+Sha Ni mok+Sha ya/ dzI baM bar de swAhA/ 'di mngon par sngags pa'i til mar gyis bud med kyi skye ba'i sgo la bskus na sbrum ma bde bar btsa'
452b7(rgyud): bar byed do/ /bcings pa la phyogs par byed pas lan bdun mngon par sngags pa'i chu snyim pa bdun mngon par gtor ba dus gsum du byas pas bcings pa rnams
453a1(rgyud): grol bar byed do/ /gur gum mam/ gi wang gis gro ga la mngon par bris te bcings pa'i mgo bo la btags na bcings pa las
453a2(rgyud): mngon par grol bar byed do/ /rtag tu bzlas na bcings pa grol bar byed do/ /oM ha ri marka Ta nA ma/ sa hA sa ha sra bA huH/ da de ba da te taM/ banad+ha nAM mok+ShA ya swAhA/
453a3(rgyud): rdo rgyus la mngon par sngags pas sa'i steng du yang dang yang du bris te lugs las bzlog pas phyis na bcings pa las grol bar byed do/ /lo ma la ming dang /
453a4(rgyud): sngags su bcas te mngon par bris te mgo bo la btags na bcings pa thams cad grol bar 'gyur ro/ /oM tA ri Ni tA ra ya/ mo tsa ni mo tsa ya/ mo k+Sha ni mo k+Sha
453a5(rgyud): ya/ dzI baM ba ra de swAhA/ sngags kyi rgyal po 'di legs par bzlas na las thams cad byed par 'gyur zhing / lan bdun mngon par sngags pa'i til mar gyi
453a6(rgyud): skye ba'i sgo la bskus na sbrum ma bde bar btsa' bar 'gyur ro/ /lan bdun mngon par sngags pa'i chu 'thungs na mngal 'khyim pa bde bar btsa' bar byed do//
453a7(rgyud): rtag tu bzlas na bdag dang gzhan 'ching ba las thar bar byed do/ /ske'am/ dpung pa la bsrung ba btags pas sdig pa thams cad las srung bar byed do/ /oM
453b1(rgyud): tA re tut+tA re tu re mok+Sha ya dzI baM swAhA/ sngags kyi rgyal po 'dis sngar smos pa'i las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /gur gum gyis gro ga la gang gis ming smos pa'i

468b6(rgyud): 'phel ba 'khyil ba bzad legs sku/ /mdog sdug chu skyes snang ba mtsho lo bzhin/ /shin tu dang ba'i yid kyis 'dzum pa mdzad/ /zhal ras zla 'dra gser gyi mdog

475a4(rgyud): ldan 'das ma 'phags ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma/ mos pa la byams ma/ yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan ma/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye

475a6(rgyud): pradz+nye/ mahA pradz+nye/ pradz+nye a wa b+hA se/ pradz+nyA A lo ka ka re/ a dz+nyA na bid+ya ma ne/ sid d+hi/ su sid d+hi/ sid d+ha ma ne/ b+ha ga ba ti/ sarbA ga sun dA ri/ b+ha ga ba ti/ brta sa li/

475b1(rgyud): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'bum gzung bar 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu bzlas brjod byas na de'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad
475b2(rgyud): 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang skye ba dran pa dang / yid gzhungs shing shes rab mtshungs pa med par 'gyur ro/ /dus gsum gyi de
475b3(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos ma lus par gzung bar 'gyur ro/ /gsang sngags dang / rig sngags thams cad kyang yongs su bzung bar
475b4(rgyud): 'gyur ro/ /'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang skye ba dran pa dang / yid gzhungs shing shes rab chen por 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol
475b5(rgyud): tu phyin pa'i mchan brgya rtsa brgyad pa rdzogs so/ / //rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya kau shi ka pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA/ bod skad du/ 'phags
475b6(rgyud): pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa kau shi ka zhes bya ba/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis
475b7(rgyud): thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'bum
476a1(rgyud): phrag du ma thams cad kyang gzhon nur gyur pa sha stag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs ste/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
476a2(rgyud): lha'i dbang po brgya byin la bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka /de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don ni 'di yin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su blta

476b1(rgyud): dag pa'i mtha' ma yin/ yang dag pa'i mtha' ma yin par yang ma yin no/ /kau shi ka /de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don ni/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams

476b3(rgyud): pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben no/ /chos thams cad g.yo ba med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa g.yo ba med pa'o/ /chos thams cad rlom sems med

476b7(rgyud): bu'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nam mkha' lta bu'o/ /gzugs mu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med do/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang /
477a1(rgyud): rnam par shes pa mu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med do/ /sa'i khams mu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

477a3(rgyud): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med do/ /rgya mtsho mu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med do/ /rdo rje mnyam pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam
477a4(rgyud): mo| |chos thams cad dbyer med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dbyer med do/ /chos thams cad ngo bo nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol
477a5(rgyud): tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid dmigs su med do/ /chos thams cad bsal ba med par mnyam pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsal ba med par mnyam
477a6(rgyud): mo| |chos thams cad byed pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa byed pa med do/ /chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha

477b3(rgyud): rol tu phyin pa mu med do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid bco brgyad de/ 'di lta ste/ nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang /

477b5(rgyud): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang / tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa

477b7(rgyud): stong pa nyid de/ mdor na/ stong pa nyid 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/ /skar ma rab rib mar me dang / /sgyu ma zil pa chu bur dang / /rmi lam glog dang sprin
478a1(rgyud): lta bu/ /'dus byas de ltar blta bar bya/ /na ma b+ha ga ba t+yai AR+ya pradz+nyA bA ra mi ta ye/ oM d+hIHhrIHshrI shu ti smri ti ma ti ga te bi dza ya swAhA/
478a2(rgyud): 'gag pa med cing skye med la/ /chad pa med cing rtag pa med/ /tha dad don min don gcig min/ /'ong ba med cing 'gro med la/ /spros bzhi bas zhi ba yi/ /rten cing
478a3(rgyud): 'brel bar 'byung ston pa/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang yin pa/ /smra mchog de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe
